NK043(pi)001:1: // a d+hi sh+thi ta ni d+hi ko sha s+ya mu
NK043(pi)001:2: ni bi d+hi pa d+ma goo ra pa r+shina d+h+aa
NK043(pi)001:3: r+m+ma bi ha ra ti sma //
NK043(pi)001:5: // thub chog byin rlab gter mdzod kyi rgyab chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK043(pi)001:7: na mo gu ru many+dzu sh+r+ai ku m+aa ra b+h+au t+aa ya /
NK043(pi)001:8: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa //
NK043(pi)001:9: mtshungs med ston pa mchog de'i yon tan dang //
NK043(pi)001:10: bka' drin dran pas dad pa'i chu skyes dag /
NK043(pi)001:11: nam mkha'i mu khyud mnyam par 'phel zhing rgyas //
NK043(pi)001:12: 'di na nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa la //
NK043(pi)001:13: ched cher 'dzin pa bskal bzang skye bo'i tshogs //
NK043(pi)001:14: dga' ba'i 'jug ngog pad+ma dkar po'i tshal //
NK043(pi)001:15: dus kyis rnam par bzhad pa 'di la ltos //
NK043(pi)001:16: 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor du bya bar 'dod pas /
NK043(pi)001:17: rgyu mtshan shes pa'i dad pa brtan po sngon du btang nas /
NK043(pi)001:18: sangs rgyas kyi sku la dmigs pa'i zhi lhag gi
NK043(pi)001:19: rnal 'byor la brtson pas don thams cad 'grub par
NK043(pi)001:20: 'gyur ba yin pas de'i tshul mdo tsam brjod na
NK043(pi)001:21: / de yang spyir khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas 'dir
NK043(pi)001:22: las nyon gyi dbang gis skye zhing 'khor ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:23: can rnams ni sdug bsngal gsum gyi 'ching ba dang
NK043(pi)001:24: ma bral bas bde ba'i gnas mthar phyin pa mi
NK043(pi)001:25: 'thob cing 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe rabs brgyud
NK043(pi)001:26: pa mang por yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang chos
NK043(pi)001:27: thos pa dang dal ba'i rten thob pa rnams shin
NK043(pi)001:28: tu brgya lam res 'ga' tsam las rnyed par dka'
NK043(pi)001:29: / ba yin kyang / bdag cag rnams ni da
NK043(pi)001:30: lan gyi dus 'di la dal 'byor gyi lus rten
NK043(pi)001:31: / ba yin kyang / thob cing / sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:32: kyi bstan pa rin po che dang mjal du zin
NK043(pi)001:33: / ba yin kyang / thob cing / na yang / snyigs dus kyi tshe shin tu thung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:34: nad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba yang mang /
NK043(pi)001:35: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma drag pos mnar te /
NK043(pi)001:36: sems las su rung ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos la tshul bzhin nan tan byed pa yang dkon /
NK043(pi)001:37: tshe rabs gtan srid kyi don chen po 'byung ba
NK043(pi)001:38: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang mjal ba don yod
NK043(pi)001:40: tshe 'di'i so tshis dang 'jig rten chos brgyad kyi
NK043(pi)001:41: g.yeng ba 'ba' zhig gi dbang du gyur te tshe
NK043(pi)001:42: 'di'i snang ba glog gi zlos gar lta bu la
NK043(pi)001:43: yid brtan ci yang med bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:44: shin tu yun ring pa'i 'du shes dang /
NK043(pi)001:45: rang gi lus chu'i chu bur lta bu snying po med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:46: dgra gnyen dang yo byad rmi lam gyi snang ba
NK043(pi)001:47: lta bu legs par brtags na cis kyang snying po
NK043(pi)001:53: sdug bsngal nye bar len pa'i chos can yid rton shin tu mi rung bar gnas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:54: de ltar mi shes par bde ba dang rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis bslus te /
NK043(pi)001:56: sdig pa dang sdug bsngal gyi brel ba rgyun mar
NK043(pi)001:57: myong ba'i bar skabs zhig tu cis kyang bzlog tu
NK043(pi)001:58: med pa'i 'chi ba klad par gnam lcags bab pa
NK043(pi)001:59: lta bus 'joms par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med
NK043(pi)001:60: cing / 'chi ba de'ang mi 'dod bzhin du nam 'byung gi cha ci yang ma mchis la /
NK043(pi)001:61: shi ba'i rjes su las dkar nag gi 'phen pa
NK043(pi)001:62: ji yod pa dang mthun par mtho ris dang ngan
NK043(pi)001:63: song gang rung du skye bar nges shing /
NK043(pi)001:64: de yang rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa'i tshul 'di
NK043(pi)001:65: las ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na su
NK043(pi)001:67: dgra bcom pa srid pa tha ma pa rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:68: sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma rang gir mdzad dgos
NK043(pi)001:69: na phal bas lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:70: des na las dkar nag gi 'bras bu bde sdug bslu ba med par smin par nges la /
NK043(pi)001:71: sems can las nyon gyi gzhan dbang can phal mo ches /
NK043(pi)001:72: dge ba'i las ni bgyid pa nyung /
NK043(pi)001:73: mi dge ba'i las ni mang po zhig ngang gis
NK043(pi)001:74: 'grub pas ngan song gsum du gzhol ba mang ngo
NK043(pi)001:75: // de yang ngan song du skyes na dmyal bar
NK043(pi)001:76: tsha grang gi sdug bsngal bzod par dka' zhing shin
NK043(pi)001:77: tu yun ring bas mnar ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:78: yi dwags na bkres skom sogs kyi sdug bsngal rgya chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:79: dud 'gro rnams blun rmongs dang gcig la gcig za
NK043(pi)001:80: ba dang bkol spyod la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal sna
NK043(pi)001:82: da lta mtho ris mi'i gnas na nyin gcig gi
NK043(pi)001:83: tsha grang ngal dub bkres skom dag kyang mi bzod
NK043(pi)001:84: pa rnams / gnas der skyes na sdug bsngal ci ltar bzod /
NK043(pi)001:85: mi bzod du zin kyang las ma zad pa'i bar
NK043(pi)001:86: du gnas gzhan du 'pho ba'i go skabs mi rnyed
NK043(pi)001:87: pa'i phyir na shin tu skrag pa'i gnas yin kyang
NK043(pi)001:88: / da lta nas bsam gzhig byed pa ni nyung /
NK043(pi)001:89: gal te mtho ris su skyes na yang /
NK043(pi)001:92: mi 'dod pa thog tu bab pa sogs sdug bsngal mang la /
NK043(pi)001:94: lha la 'chi 'pho ltung bas mtshon te /
NK043(pi)001:95: khams gsum gyi gnas ris gang du skyes kyang /
NK043(pi)001:96: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK043(pi)001:98: khyab pa 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gsum gyi rang
NK043(pi)001:99: dbang med par zil gyis mnan pa 'khor ba'i gnas
NK043(pi)001:100: me'i 'obs dang srin mo'i gling lta bu 'dir yang
NK043(pi)001:101: nas yang du thog ma dang tha ma med par
NK043(pi)001:102: 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:103: ni / gnas de las thar pa la sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:104: dang chos dang dge 'dun ma gtogs pa'i skyabs gzhan
NK043(pi)001:105: med par blos kho thag bcad de /
NK043(pi)001:106: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sogs la brtson pa
NK043(pi)001:107: ni shin tu don che ba'i phyir na thog mar
NK043(pi)001:108: sangs rgyas la dad pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya
NK043(pi)001:109: ste / 'jig rten na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:110: sngon bskal pa grangs med pa nas sems can thams
NK043(pi)001:111: cad kyi don du thugs bskyed pa'i don bzhin rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:112: smin sbyangs pa tshad med pa'i mthar phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:113: sgrib pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i ye shes chen
NK043(pi)001:114: po'i sku sems can thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mu
NK043(pi)001:115: mthar thug gi bar du skyabs dang mgon dang dpung
NK043(pi)001:116: gnyen gyi dam par gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:117: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa sogs zag med kyi
NK043(pi)001:118: chos rgya mtsho lta bu'i chos kyi sku brnyes pa
NK043(pi)001:119: / dus gsum gyi shes bya thams cad mngon sum du gzigs pa'i ye shes can /
NK043(pi)001:120: yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i gsung gi dbyangs
NK043(pi)001:121: tshad med pas mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten kun du
NK043(pi)001:122: chos kyi snang ba ston pa /
NK043(pi)001:123: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
NK043(pi)001:124: brgyad cus spras pa'ii sku mthong na mi mthun pa
NK043(pi)001:125: med pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na nyi
NK043(pi)001:126: ma bzhin du lhang nge lhan ne lham mer gsal
NK043(pi)001:127: ba gang gi / ba spu'i bu ga gcig dang 'od zer gcig gi yon tan kyang /
NK043(pi)001:128: zhing rab 'byams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:129: 'das rnams kyis bskal pa rgya mtshor brjod kyang zad
NK043(pi)001:130: mi nus na yon tan mtha' dag lta ci smos
NK043(pi)001:131: / des na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan
NK043(pi)001:132: mchog gi bdag nyid de lta bu sku dngos su
NK043(pi)001:133: mthong ba dang gsung thos pa dang rtse gcig tu
NK043(pi)001:134: dran pa dang drung du bsnyen cing mchod pa lta
NK043(pi)001:135: / ci smos kyi / tha na sku gzugs ri mor bris pa tsam mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:136: mtshan gyi sgra rna ba'i lam du thos pa dag
NK043(pi)001:137: kyang mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol ba'i sa bon
NK043(pi)001:139: de'i bar du bde 'gro'i bde ba sna tshogs myong ba'i rgyur 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:140: snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las /
NK043(pi)001:141: sangs rgyas la dmigs nas me tog gcig tsam nam mkhar dor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:142: sangs rgyas la dmigs nas sems dwangs ba gcig bskyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:143: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:144: can rnams kyang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pa
NK043(pi)001:145: tsam rnyed pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i
NK043(pi)001:146: 'bras bu myang na las 'das pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:147: mya ngan las 'das par rang smra'o zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:148: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:149: khams 'di rgyun zhugs dang phyir 'ong phyir mi 'ong
NK043(pi)001:150: dgra bcom pa dag gis 'bras kyi zhing stug po
NK043(pi)001:151: la sogs pa bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de
NK043(pi)001:152: la / rigs kyi bu'am bu mo gang gis bskal
NK043(pi)001:153: pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bsti stang dang rim
NK043(pi)001:154: la / gror byas te / bde ba'i yo byad
NK043(pi)001:155: thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bsod nams des
NK043(pi)001:156: de bzhin gshegs pa la thal mo lan gcig sbyar
NK043(pi)001:157: te phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gcig smras pa'i bsod
NK043(pi)001:158: nams de'i brgya stong 'bum gyi cha dang grangs dang
NK043(pi)001:159: bgrang bar yang mi nus par gsungs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:160: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgra bcom pas gang ba lta zhog gi /
NK043(pi)001:161: rang sangs rgyas kyis de ltar gang ba la gong bzhin bsnyen bkur byas te /
NK043(pi)001:162: rang sangs rgyas de dag mya nga na las 'das
NK043(pi)001:163: pa'i mchod rten rin chen sna bdun las byas te
NK043(pi)001:164: / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang bdug
NK043(pi)001:165: pa dang phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa sna
NK043(pi)001:166: tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur stir byas pa de bas
NK043(pi)001:167: / / sangs rgyas la sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyi sems dwangs bas rjes su dran pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:168: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dad pas de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:169: gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes ni bsam gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:170: khyab ces tshig tu smra ba tsam gyi bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:171: ches 'phags te / dpe dang rgyu tsam du 'gran du med par gsungs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:172: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams
NK043(pi)001:173: pa dang snying rje dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:174: yon tan thams cad dpag tu med pas sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:175: kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la
NK043(pi)001:176: dad pa'i rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:178: yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:179: mtshan gyi sgra thos pa de yang de dag la
NK043(pi)001:180: yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du don
NK043(pi)001:181: med par mi 'gyur ro zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:182: sngon gyi dus na tshong pa'i tshogs mang po rgya
NK043(pi)001:183: mtshor zhugs pa mtsho'i dbus su gru chu srin gyis
NK043(pi)001:184: zin par gyur pa na tshong pa de dag skrag
NK043(pi)001:185: cing smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa dang lha sna
NK043(pi)001:187: de'i tshe na ded dpon mkhas pa dkon mchog gsum
NK043(pi)001:188: la dad cing lha gzhan skyabs su mi 'dzin pa
NK043(pi)001:189: des tshong pa'i tshogs de dag la dbugs dbyung zhing
NK043(pi)001:191: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis tshong pa de
NK043(pi)001:192: dag lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal
NK043(pi)001:193: lo zhes pa'i sgra chen po phyung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:194: sgra de chu srin des thos nas dga' ba dang
NK043(pi)001:195: mi 'tshe ba'i sems su gyur te kha slar btsum
NK043(pi)001:196: nas tshong pa rnams bde bar don grub ste slar
NK043(pi)001:198: chu srin de yang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos
NK043(pi)001:199: pas bde ba myong zhing phyin chad srog chags ma
NK043(pi)001:200: zos pas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i de ma thag
NK043(pi)001:201: tu mir skyes te de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:202: chos 'dul ba la dad pas rab tu byung nas
NK043(pi)001:203: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten cing bsnyen bkur byas pas
NK043(pi)001:204: dgra bcom pa thob ste mngon par shes pa drug
NK043(pi)001:205: mngon du byas nas phung po lhag med kyi dbyings
NK043(pi)001:207: de ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bas sangs
NK043(pi)001:208: rgyas kyi sgra thos pa des mir gyur nas mya
NK043(pi)001:209: ngan 'das pa'i 'bras bu thob pa de ltar sangs
NK043(pi)001:210: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan thos pa dang
NK043(pi)001:211: brjod pa de ltar mthu dang rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes
NK043(pi)001:212: gsungs pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan
NK043(pi)001:213: thos pa sogs dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:214: gsungs pa dang / / rang gi sems kyi 'dun
NK043(pi)001:215: pa'i dbang gis kha cig la nyan rang gi byang
NK043(pi)001:217: kha cig la bla na med pa'i byang chub chen
NK043(pi)001:218: po yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar gsungs pa
NK043(pi)001:220: kun dga' bo nga ni sems can chud zos pa rnams kyi skyabs so //
NK043(pi)001:224: nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o //
NK043(pi)001:226: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can no //
NK043(pi)001:228: kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus zad pa'i dus /
NK043(pi)001:229: dam pa'i chos 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i dus na gang
NK043(pi)001:230: dag nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu 'byung bar
NK043(pi)001:231: 'gyur ba dag rab tu byung nas bu'i lag pa
NK043(pi)001:232: nas bzung ste / bu dang lhan cig tu chang
NK043(pi)001:233: skyogs gang gi phyir chang ma'i khyim du 'khyams pa
NK043(pi)001:234: nas bzung ste / / nga'i dam pa'i chos 'di'i
NK043(pi)001:235: rjes su slob pa de dag thams cad kyang kun
NK043(pi)001:236: dga' bo bskal pa bzang po 'di la yongs su
NK043(pi)001:239: ci lta bu'i dge sbyong ltar bcos pa ma rungs
NK043(pi)001:240: pa rnams kyang bskal pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan
NK043(pi)001:241: pa la mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste /
NK043(pi)001:242: dge slong gcig kyang lhag mar mi lus te /
NK043(pi)001:244: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs
NK043(pi)001:245: shing rjes su rtogs pa la sems dwang ba gcig
NK043(pi)001:247: zhes lan gcig brjod pa tshun chad mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:249: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
NK043(pi)001:250: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
NK043(pi)001:251: bsam mi khyab la dad byas na //
NK043(pi)001:252: de yi rnam smin bsam mi khyab //
NK043(pi)001:254: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge rtsa chud mi za ba'i dper /
NK043(pi)001:255: chu'i thigs pa phra mo rgya mtshor lhung ba mi
NK043(pi)001:256: zad pa'i dpe'i tshul du sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:257: sems gcig bskyed pa tsam yang nam yang chud mi
NK043(pi)001:258: za ste / sems can de dag sngon gyi las kyis ngan song ngan 'gror lhung du zin kyang /
NK043(pi)001:259: sngar sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK043(pi)001:260: de kho na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba
NK043(pi)001:261: rnams kyis gzigs nas de log par ltung ba las
NK043(pi)001:263: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dran par byed cing mya
NK043(pi)001:264: ngan 'das pa 'thob par byed pa'i tshul gsungs shing
NK043(pi)001:265: / yang kun dga' bo nga lta bu la dge
NK043(pi)001:266: ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam chung ngu byas pa yang
NK043(pi)001:267: chud mi za zhing sems gcig bskyed pa'i dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:268: rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi 'bras bu mya
NK043(pi)001:270: tha ma mya ngan las 'das par nga smra'o //
NK043(pi)001:272: de'i dper mchil pas zin pa'i nya de chu'i nang na 'dug kyang skam la 'don nges pa ltar /
NK043(pi)001:273: sangs rgyas la dge rtsa bskyed pa de dag sngon
NK043(pi)001:274: gyi nyes pas log par ltung ba'i gnas su skyes
NK043(pi)001:275: kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de sangs rgyas rnams
NK043(pi)001:276: 'jig rten du byon pa'i tshe ye shes sgrib pa
NK043(pi)001:277: med pas gzigs nas log par ltung ba de las
NK043(pi)001:278: 'don cing thar pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:279: kyang / pa dang / gal te sangs rgyas la
NK043(pi)001:280: yon phul ba sogs kyis sems can 'khor bar gcig
NK043(pi)001:281: tu chags pa dag gis kyang mya ngan las 'das
NK043(pi)001:282: pa la smon pa mi byed du zin kyang /
NK043(pi)001:283: de dag mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i gnas med de /
NK043(pi)001:284: yul sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid bla na med pa'i zhing yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:285: ji ltar zhing sa bzang po la lo thog btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:286: sa bon khyod ma skye zhig ces brjod na yang skye ba dper byas te gsungs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:287: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal po sdig spyod dang kla klo dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:288: de dag gi phyogs su gtogs pa'i skye bo sna
NK043(pi)001:289: tshogs pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos dang sangs
NK043(pi)001:290: rgyas kyi yon tan mi shes su zin kyang de
NK043(pi)001:291: bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang /
NK043(pi)001:292: sku gzugs mthong nas sems dwangs bar gyur pa de
NK043(pi)001:293: dag sngon sangs rgyas kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
NK043(pi)001:294: bsdu bar byas pa'i 'brel pa las de dag sems
NK043(pi)001:296: sems dwangs ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:297: mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur bar gsungs pa dang
NK043(pi)001:298: / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:299: dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:300: tshad med pa mchod pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
NK043(pi)001:301: bsten nas bka' bzhin byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:302: sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos pos bsdus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:303: dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab
NK043(pi)001:304: pa mthar phyin par mdzad pa'i stobs kyis rdo rje
NK043(pi)001:305: lta bu'i sku mi phyed pa brnyes pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:306: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang khor yug chen po
NK043(pi)001:307: de dag rdo rje ltar sra bar gyur du zin
NK043(pi)001:308: kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:309: las 'das pa'i dbu skra gcig kyang snad pa tsam
NK043(pi)001:310: dang dbyung ba tsam yang mi nus mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:311: de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la thugs brtse
NK043(pi)001:312: ba dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sku
NK043(pi)001:313: gdung rnams yungs 'bru tsam du byin gyis brlabs te
NK043(pi)001:314: / des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi don byed la /
NK043(pi)001:315: gang ring bsrel de dag mchod cing bsti stang byed
NK043(pi)001:316: pa de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras
NK043(pi)001:318: yang sangs rgyas dngos su bzhugs pa la bsti stang
NK043(pi)001:319: byed pa dang sku gdung la mchod pa byed pa
NK043(pi)001:320: lta zhog gi / gang dag cig tha na rmi
NK043(pi)001:321: lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:322: sems dang bar byed na dge ba'i rtsa ba des
NK043(pi)001:323: kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:324: lta zhog gi / ro // zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:325: gzhan yang sangs rgyas la yon phul ba ni yongs su zad pa dang mthar gyur pa med de /
NK043(pi)001:326: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis me tog gcig
NK043(pi)001:327: nam mkhar dor na de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de
NK043(pi)001:328: ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis kyang tshad bzung
NK043(pi)001:329: ba'am bstan par sla ba ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:330: yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
NK043(pi)001:331: sems can de sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa'i bskal
NK043(pi)001:332: pa de snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rgyu
NK043(pi)001:333: yang / dge rtsa de'i rnam smin tshangs pa'am brgya
NK043(pi)001:334: byin nam 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyis mthar
NK043(pi)001:335: phyin pa sla ba ma yin gyi /
NK043(pi)001:336: mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol zhing mthar mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i tshul des na /
NK043(pi)001:337: rigs kyi bu'am bu mo 'khor los sgyur ba'am tshangs pa'am brgya byin nam /
NK043(pi)001:339: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'jig
NK043(pi)001:340: rten thams cad kyi bdag po thob par 'dod pa'am
NK043(pi)001:341: / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
NK043(pi)001:342: bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'dod pa
NK043(pi)001:343: des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang dang
NK043(pi)001:344: rim gro dang mchod par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:346: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:347: nga byang chub thob pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon lta zhog la /
NK043(pi)001:348: nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
NK043(pi)001:349: yon tan gyi chos rnams byung ba de ni nyan
NK043(pi)001:350: rang rnams la yang med na de las gzhan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:351: sems can rnams la lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:352: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:353: rgyal srid dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma
NK043(pi)001:354: dang bdag gi srog dang sha dang rus pa sogs
NK043(pi)001:355: btang ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa du ma brjod
NK043(pi)001:356: pas yid ches par dka' ba de dag thams cad
NK043(pi)001:357: sems can khyed ga cig gi don du yin la
NK043(pi)001:358: / de lta bu thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:359: des bdag cag gi phyir rab tu dka' ba spyad
NK043(pi)001:360: do zhes gal te byis pa so so'i skye bo
NK043(pi)001:361: dag tshig bzhi pa gcig gis snying rje skyed na
NK043(pi)001:362: de'i 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa yin no
NK043(pi)001:364: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rigs dang rus dang gzugs
NK043(pi)001:365: dang mtshan dang dpe byad dang stobs dang mi 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:366: pa dang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dus kyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:367: smon lam dang phar phyin dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
NK043(pi)001:368: byams pa chen po sogs dang spyod lam sogs kyi sgo nas kyang rjes su dran par byas na /
NK043(pi)001:369: rnam pa de dang de dag gis rdzu 'phrul che
NK043(pi)001:370: gzi brjid che rgya che bdud rtsi dang mtshungs te
NK043(pi)001:371: / bdud rtsis klas shing bdud rtsis mthas gtugs par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:372: skyes pa thams cad 'chi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:373: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams la bag yod par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:375: kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran nas /
NK043(pi)001:377: spu zing zhes byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:378: chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byin pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:379: de dag ni log par ltung ba thams cad du
NK043(pi)001:380: mi 'agro'o // de bas na bag yod pa la brtson par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:381: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang /
NK043(pi)001:382: de las gzhan pa'i dge rtsa thams cad bag yod pas thob bo zhes gsungs shing /
NK043(pi)001:383: sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK043(pi)001:384: ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnams //
NK043(pi)001:385: 'das nas bskal pa du ma na //
NK043(pi)001:386: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
NK043(pi)001:387: dpa' bo chen po 'di na bzhugs //
NK043(pi)001:390: de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra //
NK043(pi)001:392: de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad //
NK043(pi)001:393: mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang //
NK043(pi)001:394: sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:395: mchod dang bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir //
NK043(pi)001:396: gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa //
NK043(pi)001:397: byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams //
NK043(pi)001:399: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK043(pi)001:400: dam pa'i chos ni mnyan pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:401: mchod cing 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin te //
NK043(pi)001:402: sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:404: mdo gzhan las gsungs pa'i don //
NK043(pi)001:405: sems can rnams la nyin re bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:406: bskal pa gang+g+aa'i bye ma snyed //
NK043(pi)001:407: lha yi zas gos byin pa bas //
NK043(pi)001:408: dge bsnyen gcig la zan gcig byin //
NK043(pi)001:409: de bas bsod nams grangs med bskyed //
NK043(pi)001:410: dge slong dad pa'i rjes 'brang dang //
NK043(pi)001:412: dgra bcom rang rgyal bar du sbyar //
NK043(pi)001:413: la las phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed kyi //
NK043(pi)001:414: rang rgyal rnams la nyin re bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:415: bskal pa gang+g+aa'i bye ma snyed //
NK043(pi)001:416: lha yi zas gos byin pa bas //
NK043(pi)001:417: gang gis sangs rgyas sgra thos sam //
NK043(pi)001:418: sangs rgyas sku gzugs bris pa'am //
NK043(pi)001:419: 'jim pa las byas mthong ba yang //
NK043(pi)001:420: de bas bsod nams ches lhag na //
NK043(pi)001:421: sku mthong thal mo sbyar ba'am //
NK043(pi)001:422: basngagasa pa tshig gcig tsam brjod dam //
NK043(pi)001:423: mchod pa byed pa lta ci smos //
NK043(pi)001:424: gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan bzung ste //
NK043(pi)001:425: yid ches mos shing mi spong na //
NK043(pi)001:426: zhing bcu rin po che yis bkang //
NK043(pi)001:427: sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:428: phul ba'i dge bas dper mi phod //
NK043(pi)001:429: gzhan yang mtshan tsam bzung ba la'ang //
NK043(pi)001:430: tshe 'di nyid dang phyi mar yang //
NK043(pi)001:431: phan yon mtha' yas gsungs gyur na //
NK043(pi)001:432: rgyal ba'i basngagasa pa 'di lta bu //
NK043(pi)001:433: klog dang yid ches smos ci dgos //
NK043(pi)001:436: gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la //
NK043(pi)001:437: bya ba cung zad byed na'ang de //
NK043(pi)001:438: mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:441: mdo snge bskal pa bzang po las /
NK043(pi)001:442: nam mkha' dag ni tshad dag bzung ba dang //
NK043(pi)001:443: rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nus kyi //
NK043(pi)001:444: sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyi //
NK043(pi)001:445: bsod nams tshad bzung bar ni nus par dka' //
NK043(pi)001:446: ji srid mya ngan 'das de ma reg par //
NK043(pi)001:447: de srid mi khoms sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:448: de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas //
NK043(pi)001:449: bag yod mi yis bkur sti mchod pa gyis //
NK043(pi)001:451: nges pa dang ma nges pa la 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i mdo las /
NK043(pi)001:452: stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la /
NK043(pi)001:453: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i khang bzang
NK043(pi)001:454: nor bu rin chen glog gi sgron ma sogs kyis
NK043(pi)001:456: spos sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gnas 'bul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:457: lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang lha'i gos
NK043(pi)001:458: rnams bskal pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
NK043(pi)001:459: byin pa pas / gzhan gang gis sangs rgyas zhes sam /
NK043(pi)001:461: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:462: ri mor bris pa mthong ngam /
NK043(pi)001:463: gzugs su byas pa mthong na 'di ni de bas
NK043(pi)001:464: bsod nams ches grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na
NK043(pi)001:465: / gang sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:468: mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:469: tha na de'i yon tan la basngagasa pa gcig tsam
NK043(pi)001:470: brjod na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:472: longs spyod chen po 'grub par byed cing mthar gyis
NK043(pi)001:473: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:474: // chu'i thigs pa chung ngu rgya mtshor song ba
NK043(pi)001:475: bskal pa'i me ma byung gi bar du mi zad
NK043(pi)001:477: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge rtsa ji ltar chung
NK043(pi)001:478: ba yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me
NK043(pi)001:479: ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su
NK043(pi)001:480: zad pa'am mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:481: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chung yang skar ma'i tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ltang nger 'dug pa bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:482: sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge rtsa chung yang mtho ba dang yangs pa dang che bas /
NK043(pi)001:483: dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon nas lhang nger 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:484: de ltar sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:485: khyab pa dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa'i don bsdus
NK043(pi)001:487: rgyas par mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:488: sangs rgyas phal po che las /
NK043(pi)001:490: de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
NK043(pi)001:491: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang
NK043(pi)001:492: thos pa dang / de dag dang 'grogs pa'i dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:493: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i blos don yod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:495: shin tu mthar thug par grub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:497: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:498: 'dus byas thams cad la spyod pa'i rgyun mi zad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:499: 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:500: phyi ma'i mu mtha' yas pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:501: rang byung gi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:502: pa'i sku 'thob par 'gyur ba khong du chud par
NK043(pi)001:504: de'i dper mi zhig gis rdo rje'i khams zos na
NK043(pi)001:505: de bar ma dor zhu mi nus pas chud mi
NK043(pi)001:506: za ba dang / rtsa yi nang du me phra
NK043(pi)001:507: mo lhung ba'i dpe sogs kyi sgo nas kyang sangs
NK043(pi)001:508: rgyas la dge rtsa ba skyed pa thams cad 'khor
NK043(pi)001:509: ba'i nang du chud za ba med par de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:510: gshegs pa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas pa'i mthar thug
NK043(pi)001:513: de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos ma 'dres pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:516: kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis yid ches pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:517: khong du chud pa bya na /
NK043(pi)001:518: sems can la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:519: mthong ngam thos kyang las kyi sgrib pas kun nas
NK043(pi)001:520: bskor ba'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa la ma
NK043(pi)001:521: dad pa zhig byas na yang de dag gis mthong
NK043(pi)001:522: ba'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de ni yongs su mya
NK043(pi)001:523: ngan las 'das pa'i bar du don yod do zhes
NK043(pi)001:524: bskor ba'i phyir / bdag smra'o // zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:525: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa dpag
NK043(pi)001:526: med lon na'ang mtshan thos pa tsam gyis de na
NK043(pi)001:527: dngos su bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar yon sbyong zhing
NK043(pi)001:528: dge rtsa mi zad par mdzad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:529: de bzhin du phyogs mtha' yas pa na bzhugs kyang
NK043(pi)001:530: dran pa tsam gyis 'dir bzhugs par 'gyur ba'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:531: gsungs shing / yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
NK043(pi)001:532: phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i mnyam
NK043(pi)001:533: pa'ii bsod nams mi zad pa dang ldan pa'i mi
NK043(pi)001:534: zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste /
NK043(pi)001:535: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid che ba
NK043(pi)001:536: ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho
NK043(pi)001:537: ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o zhes
NK043(pi)001:538: sogs gsungs so // khang bu brtsegs pa'i mdo las /
NK043(pi)001:539: kun dga' bo gang la la thal mo sbyar te
NK043(pi)001:540: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:541: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
NK043(pi)001:542: phyag 'tshal bar byed na sems can de dag ngas
NK043(pi)001:543: yongs su bzung zhing yongs su mya ngan las bzlas
NK043(pi)001:544: pa yin no // sems can de rnams la nga ni thugs khral chung ba yin no //
NK043(pi)001:546: kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
NK043(pi)001:547: kyi dbyings ni shin tu rab tu gnas pa yin
NK043(pi)001:548: no // de shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:549: thal mo sbyar ba yang chud za bar mi 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:550: no // na / sbyin pa la sogs pa byed pa lta smros kyang ci dgos zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:551: kun dga' bo sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun
NK043(pi)001:552: la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gsum po 'di
NK043(pi)001:553: ni 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su
NK043(pi)001:555: zad mi shes pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur bar byed pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:557: dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi le'u las /
NK043(pi)001:558: sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod pa de yang sgron ma chen po yin te /
NK043(pi)001:559: nyon mongs pa rnams nges par bsreg par 'gyur ba yin no //
NK043(pi)001:560: gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan
NK043(pi)001:561: thos pa de yang de dag gi mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:563: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa yang mun pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:564: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa yang mun pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:567: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:568: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i mdo sogs las /
NK043(pi)001:569: bdag cag gi ston pa sh+aakya thub pa 'di'i mtshan
NK043(pi)001:570: thos pa thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog
NK043(pi)001:571: par 'gyur na / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ring
NK043(pi)001:572: srel can gyi mchod rten la me tog gcig 'thor
NK043(pi)001:574: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pas mtshan gyi sgra
NK043(pi)001:575: tsam thos pa de dag kyang byang chub bla na
NK043(pi)001:576: med pa'i sa bon du 'gyur te rim gyis sangs
NK043(pi)001:578: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /
NK043(pi)001:579: sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyi'ang yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:580: de ltar sangs rgyas la dmigs nas dge rtsa bskyed
NK043(pi)001:581: pa che phra thams cad phan yon tshad med cing
NK043(pi)001:583: 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs rnams su mtho ris
NK043(pi)001:584: kyi bde ba yang nas yang du myong ba'i rgyu
NK043(pi)001:585: byed cing / de tsam gyis bar ma dor chud
NK043(pi)001:586: mi za bar mthar thug gi 'bras bu byang chub
NK043(pi)001:587: chen po'i bar gyi rgyu byed par nges pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:588: du mdo rnams las yang yang basngagasa pa'i don la
NK043(pi)001:590: zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs las /
NK043(pi)001:591: sngon mi zhig mchod sbyin la bsad pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:592: des 'chi khar sangs rgyas la dad pas phyag 'tshal
NK043(pi)001:593: lo zhes lan gcig smras pa'i dge rtsa de dag
NK043(pi)001:594: gis bskal pa drug cu'i bar du sum cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:596: bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du tshe rabs dran /
NK043(pi)001:597: skye ba dang skye bar mya ngan gyi zug rngu thams cad bral la /
NK043(pi)001:598: skyes ma thag tu sdug bsngal thams cad zlog par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:600: rgya mtsho'i chu srin gdug pa'i kha gdangs pas 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:601: nas tshong pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod
NK043(pi)001:602: pa'i sgra tsam thos pas chu srin de kha zum
NK043(pi)001:604: mir skyes nas bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung
NK043(pi)001:605: ste dgra bcom pa thob pa chos srid bya bar
NK043(pi)001:606: gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas las chos thos nas
NK043(pi)001:607: dad bzhin pa'i bran mo bas brdungs te shi ba
NK043(pi)001:608: sing+ga la'i gling du bu mo mu tig can zhes
NK043(pi)001:609: bya bar skyes nas lus dang 'byor ba rmad du
NK043(pi)001:610: byung ba'i rten de la bden pa mthong ba sogs
NK043(pi)001:611: kyi lo rgyus rnams mdo las 'byung ba bzhin no
NK043(pi)001:612: gyur pa dang / // tshul de ltar shes par
NK043(pi)001:613: byas nas da lta rang cag rnams 'chi ba la
NK043(pi)001:614: sogs pa'i 'jigs pa chen pos rang dbang med par
NK043(pi)001:615: ma gyur pa'i dus 'dir bag yod pas sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:616: rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya
NK043(pi)001:617: gyur pa dang / // dgos shing / de yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas tshad med pa las /
NK043(pi)001:618: gang dang gang zhig yid la byas kyang sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:619: de thams cad chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid dang
NK043(pi)001:620: / spangs rtogs mthar phyin pa yin pas khyad med mod kyang /
NK043(pi)001:621: rang cag mi mjed kyi zhing 'di'i sems can gdul
NK043(pi)001:622: dka' ba sangs rgyas gzhan gyis yal bar bor ba
NK043(pi)001:623: rnams snying rje chen pos rjes su 'dzin pa ni
NK043(pi)001:624: ston pa thugs rje can 'di kho na yin pas
NK043(pi)001:625: / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rjes su dran pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:626: byas pa shes shing drin gzo ba yin te /
NK043(pi)001:627: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon pa ni gzhan don kho na'i ched yin na /
NK043(pi)001:628: sems can gcig la phan thog kyang /
NK043(pi)001:629: de'i rang ngos nas sangs rgyas byon pa don yod par byas pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:630: sangs rgyas la drin du gzo ba yang yin zhing /
NK043(pi)001:631: bdag cag gi ston pa 'di bka' drin che bar shes shing gsol ba btab na /
NK043(pi)001:632: ston pa 'dis kyang bdag cag thugs rjes bzung ba'i
NK043(pi)001:633: zhing du gyur pa'i phyir thugs rje dang byin rlabs
NK043(pi)001:634: lhag par 'jug pa chos nyid yin te /
NK043(pi)001:635: de yang snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las gsungs pa /
NK043(pi)001:636: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la /
NK043(pi)001:637: dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:638: byams pa la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:639: chub sems dpa' chen po sa ya phrag brgyad dang
NK043(pi)001:640: / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs
NK043(pi)001:641: lha dang gnod sbyin dang klu la sogs pa'i 'khor
NK043(pi)001:642: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dag gis yongs
NK043(pi)001:643: su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te bzhugs pa de'i
NK043(pi)001:644: / tshe na / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
NK043(pi)001:645: byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang seng ge'i
NK043(pi)001:646: blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri
NK043(pi)001:647: lhan cig tu stan las langs te /
NK043(pi)001:648: shar lho'i phyogs su thal mo sbyar bas rab tu
NK043(pi)001:649: dga' zhing dwang ba'i yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:650: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:651: pad+ma dam pa sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon
NK043(pi)001:652: par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas /
NK043(pi)001:653: sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gi
NK043(pi)001:654: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad cing
NK043(pi)001:655: bla med byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bkod
NK043(pi)001:656: pa ni ngo mtshar te phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal
NK043(pi)001:658: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam
NK043(pi)001:659: par snang byed kyis gus pas btud de bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:660: 'das la / sangs rgyas de phyogs ji srid cig na bzhugs /
NK043(pi)001:661: de sangs rgyas nas yun ji srid cig yin pa sogs zhus pa'i lan du bkab stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:662: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa'i
NK043(pi)001:663: dge rtsa smin pa'i don du sangs rgyas pad+ma dam
NK043(pi)001:664: pa'i byang chub thob pa'i cho 'phrul dang zhing gi
NK043(pi)001:665: bkod pa dris pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
NK043(pi)001:666: don de lta bu zhus pa khyod kyi spobs pa
NK043(pi)001:667: dge ba yin te legs so //
NK043(pi)001:668: rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su
NK043(pi)001:669: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:670: gang g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs
NK043(pi)001:671: rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:672: 'jig rten kyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yon tan
NK043(pi)001:673: sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa me tog dang spos dang
NK043(pi)001:674: rin po che'i shing dang rin po che'i pad+ma dag
NK043(pi)001:675: gis gang ba / sa gzhi beed+aur+ya sngon po las grub pa /
NK043(pi)001:676: byang chub sems dpa' dag gis gang ba /
NK043(pi)001:677: chos kyi sgras khyab pa sogs zhing gi yon tan tshad med pa'i bkod pa bstan nas /
NK043(pi)001:678: zhing der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa mdang
NK043(pi)001:679: gi nam gyi thun tha ma la bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:680: pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas da nang nangs
NK043(pi)001:681: par gyi dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul
NK043(pi)001:683: bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon
NK043(pi)001:684: par sprul nas dbu'i gtsug tor nas 'od zer bye
NK043(pi)001:685: ba khrag khrig 'bum rab tu bkye bas steng gi
NK043(pi)001:686: phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:687: gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed snang bas khyab
NK043(pi)001:688: par mdzad cing / steng gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis thur du bltas na /
NK043(pi)001:689: ri rab dang khor yug ri nag po sogs mi
NK043(pi)001:690: snang bar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi byang
NK043(pi)001:691: chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:692: gzungs dang ting 'dzin dang bzod pa thob pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:693: sa las shin tu 'das pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:694: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang sems chen po
NK043(pi)001:695: de dag kyang snang ba des khyab pas thal mo
NK043(pi)001:696: sbyar te / sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa de'i sku
NK043(pi)001:697: dang 'khor dang zhing gi bkod pa mthong nas mchog
NK043(pi)001:698: tu dga' ba skyes te sangs rgyas de la mchod
NK043(pi)001:699: pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma
NK043(pi)001:701: yang sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa dang bzhengs pa dang
NK043(pi)001:702: 'chag bzhin du zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:703: po phyung ste / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:704: de nas byang sems ting 'dzin la zhugs pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:705: kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:706: pa pad+ma dam pa 'khor bcas la mchod par byed
NK043(pi)001:707: do // de ltar ljags kyi dbang po'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa bsdus nas /
NK043(pi)001:708: sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba 'bum phrag drug cu phyung pas /
NK043(pi)001:709: phyogs bcu re re yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
NK043(pi)001:710: rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
NK043(pi)001:711: kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad nas /
NK043(pi)001:712: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag lung bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:713: ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag kyang de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:714: gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa blta ba dang phyag bya
NK043(pi)001:715: ba dang bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi
NK043(pi)001:716: stobs kyis zhing der lhags so //
NK043(pi)001:717: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas rdzu
NK043(pi)001:718: 'phrul de bsdus nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:719: chub sems dpa'i 'khor la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor
NK043(pi)001:720: lo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to
NK043(pi)001:721: // 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rtag tu sangs
NK043(pi)001:722: rgyas kyi 'od kyis khyab pas nyin mo dang mtshan
NK043(pi)001:723: // mo med kyang / pad+ma kha zum pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:724: bya rnams kyang sgra chung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:725: sangs rgyas dang byang sems de dag kyang bsam gtan
NK043(pi)001:726: dag gis rol zhing rnam grol gyi dga' bde myong
NK043(pi)001:727: bar mdzad pa'i tshe mtshan mo dang /
NK043(pi)001:728: pad+ma kha phyes zhing bya rnams kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:730: phyogs bzhi nas dri mchog tu zhim pa yid du
NK043(pi)001:731: 'ong zhing 'jam la reg na bde ba'i rlung ldang
NK043(pi)001:732: ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dang byang sems de dag ting 'dzin las bzhengs nas /
NK043(pi)001:733: sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas nyan rang gi gtam las
NK043(pi)001:734: shin tu 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
NK043(pi)001:735: kyi chos 'chad pa nyin mor shes so //
NK043(pi)001:736: zhing der skyes pa'i byang sems rnams ni mtshan so gnyis dang ldan zhing 'od dpag tshad brgya pa /
NK043(pi)001:737: byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can /
NK043(pi)001:739: rnyogs pa med pa'i sems dang /
NK043(pi)001:740: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang /
NK043(pi)001:741: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang /
NK043(pi)001:742: dge chos thams cad tshol ba'i sems sogs dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:743: phar phyin dang zhi lhag dran pa sogs kyi stobs can /
NK043(pi)001:744: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa'i stobs can /
NK043(pi)001:745: sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la lhag par bya
NK043(pi)001:746: ba byas shing dge rtsa bskyed pa can sha stag
NK043(pi)001:747: las / zhing der bud med kyi ming yang med /
NK043(pi)001:749: sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:751: mun pa dang dri nga ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:752: ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:753: tsher ma dang rdo ba sogs med /
NK043(pi)001:754: nyi zla skar ma yang med /
NK043(pi)001:755: me dang rlung dang sprin dang char ba yang med la /
NK043(pi)001:759: bsod nams kyi 'od kyi snang ba chen pos rtag tu gsal bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:760: zhing der ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la khams kyi zas med pa bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:761: bsam gtan gyi zas dang chos kyi zas dang dri za ba las /
NK043(pi)001:762: tha mal gyi zas med do //
NK043(pi)001:763: de na bya 'bras bu dang bcas pa zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:764: ba ngang gi sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong bas
NK043(pi)001:765: dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag
NK043(pi)001:766: rab tu sgrogs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:767: zhing de'i rgya khyon gyi tshad ni dper na ri'i
NK043(pi)001:768: rgyal po ri rab 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:769: drug khri brgyad stong yod la /
NK043(pi)001:770: rgyar dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa de
NK043(pi)001:771: yung 'bru'i tshad tsam du byas pa de tsam gyi
NK043(pi)001:772: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed zhing
NK043(pi)001:774: ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du zhing de yang
NK043(pi)001:775: de ltar byang chub sems dpas gang ba yin no
NK043(pi)001:776: // sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa de bar gyi bskal pa sum cur bzhugs te chos ston no //
NK043(pi)001:777: yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:778: chos bar gyi bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:779: // zhing der skyes pa dang skye bar 'gyur ba'i
NK043(pi)001:780: byang sems thams cad kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi
NK043(pi)001:782: 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma de sngon tsan dan zhes bya bar gyur pa'i skabs na /
NK043(pi)001:783: da ltar gyi zhing pad+ma ltar yongs su dag par
NK043(pi)001:784: ma gyur la de ltar sems can dag pa dag
NK043(pi)001:785: gis kyang yongs su gang bar ma gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:786: 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan de dag tu de
NK043(pi)001:787: bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa sangs rgyas nas
NK043(pi)001:788: de bzhin gshegs pa des bar gyi bskal pa sum
NK043(pi)001:790: de mod nam gyi gung thun la mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:791: 'da' ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam
NK043(pi)001:792: mkha'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba la nga yongs su
NK043(pi)001:793: mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bar gyi
NK043(pi)001:794: bskal pa bcur gnas nas nam gyi gung thun la
NK043(pi)001:795: dam pa'i chos nub pa'i thun tha ma la rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:796: pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa zhes bya bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:798: de'i tshe zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
NK043(pi)001:799: de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas zla ba dam pa
NK043(pi)001:800: la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen
NK043(pi)001:801: pos mchod nas / bdag cag ni 'gog pa la
NK043(pi)001:802: mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bskal pa bar ma
NK043(pi)001:803: bcu po de 'da' bar bgyid 'tshal lo zhes zhus
NK043(pi)001:804: pos mchod nas / so // de nas de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:805: gshegs pa zla ba dam pas byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:807: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi
NK043(pi)001:808: sgo la 'jug pa 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:809: rnams kyis kyang rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i byang
NK043(pi)001:810: chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad pa yin la /
NK043(pi)001:811: de bzhin du da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:812: rgyas rnams kyis kyang bshad pa'i gzungs 'di zungs shig
NK043(pi)001:813: ces gsungs pa'i gzungs bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya'i rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:815: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba
NK043(pi)001:816: sogs kyi cho 'phrul chen po dag kyang byung ngo
NK043(pi)001:817: // zhing tshad med pa nas gzungs de nyan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:818: phyir lhags pa'i sems can de thams cad bla med
NK043(pi)001:819: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sogs
NK043(pi)001:820: phan yon gyi basngagasa pa rgya chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:821: gzungs 'di dag thob pa'i rgyu rnams kyang gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:822: 'khor de'i byang sems phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:823: kyang so so rang rang gis sngon gzungs 'di thos
NK043(pi)001:825: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag
NK043(pi)001:826: kyang bstan te cho 'phrul dag kyang mngon du mdzad
NK043(pi)001:827: nas sems can tshad med pa'i don byas so //
NK043(pi)001:828: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po blo gros zhi bas gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:829: bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gis sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:830: gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su
NK043(pi)001:831: dag cing snyigs ma lnga dang bral la /
NK043(pi)001:832: yon tan bkod pa sna tshogs pa dag kyang mchis /
NK043(pi)001:833: zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' chen po
NK043(pi)001:834: yon tan sna tshogs rdzogs pa bde ba du ma
NK043(pi)001:836: nyan rang gi ming yang med la /
NK043(pi)001:837: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing 'di ni smad par 'khrugs shing tshe'i snyigs ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:839: sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:841: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma byung bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:842: mngon par sangs rgyas nas 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum las brtsam ste chos ston par mdzad lags /
NK043(pi)001:843: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga
NK043(pi)001:844: dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa ma bzung lags
NK043(pi)001:846: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bsdus te bstan na /
NK043(pi)001:847: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying
NK043(pi)001:848: rje chen po dang smon lam gyi dbang gis zhing
NK043(pi)001:849: ma dag pa yongs su 'dzin te /
NK043(pi)001:850: sngon byung ba bskal ba grangs med gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:851: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la /
NK043(pi)001:852: gling bzhi pa 'dir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:853: rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba zhig byung ngo
NK043(pi)001:854: // de'i mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
NK043(pi)001:855: bram ze de la bu mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
NK043(pi)001:856: rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya bar ming btags pa
NK043(pi)001:857: de nyid rab tu byung ste rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:858: tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la mtshan
NK043(pi)001:859: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:860: ste / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:861: mang po mtho ris dang thar pa la rab tu
NK043(pi)001:862: ste / bkod do // de bzhin gshegs pa de
NK043(pi)001:863: 'khor nyan thos mang po dang bcas pa rim gyis
NK043(pi)001:865: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi grong khyer gyi
NK043(pi)001:866: phyi rol ha cang mi ring ba'i 'dzam bu'i tshal
NK043(pi)001:867: zhes pa'i skyed mos tshal du bzhugs pa /
NK043(pi)001:868: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis thos nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:869: po'i 'byor pa dang mthu chen pos 'khor 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:871: 'dzam bu'i tshal ga la ba der de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:872: pa rin chen snying po'i drung du phyin nas phyag
NK043(pi)001:873: 'tshal te chos kyi gtam nyan nas /
NK043(pi)001:874: dgung zla gsum la bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
NK043(pi)001:875: pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar gsol ba btab pa
NK043(pi)001:876: bzhin de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gnang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:877: rgyal pos yul thams cad du yang sangs rgyas 'khor
NK043(pi)001:878: bcas la bsnyen bkur byos shig ces dril bsgrags te
NK043(pi)001:879: / sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs pa'i gnas rin chen
NK043(pi)001:880: sna bdun gyi khang bzang dang rgyan gyi bkod pa
NK043(pi)001:882: 'khor lo rin po che sogs rgyal srid bdun po
NK043(pi)001:883: dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur gyi phyir
NK043(pi)001:884: bzhag ste / 'khor nyan thos re rer yang tsan dan sa mchog gi phye ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:885: nor bu beed+aur+ya dag kyang bzhag pa sogs mchod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:886: yo byad phul du byung bas bsti stang du byas
NK043(pi)001:887: te / nyin re bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyan
NK043(pi)001:888: sngar lhags nas zhal zas dang na bza' phun sum
NK043(pi)001:889: tshogs pas bsnyen bkur byas so //
NK043(pi)001:890: rgyal po nyid kyis bsil yab blang ste bcom ldan 'das la byabs so //
NK043(pi)001:891: rgyal bu stong dang khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis
NK043(pi)001:892: kyang nyan thos re re la de bzhin du byas
NK043(pi)001:893: te / zhal zas brim pa rdzogs te gdugs tshod
NK043(pi)001:894: gyur ma thag tu srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:895: du ma dag chos nyan par lhags shing /
NK043(pi)001:896: lha'i tshogs kyis rol mo 'khrol zhing me tog gi char sogs mchod pa byed /
NK043(pi)001:897: gnod sbyin gos sngon can sa ya phrag bzhis tsan
NK043(pi)001:898: dan sa mchog blangs te sangs rgyas 'khor bcas srung
NK043(pi)001:900: rgyal po des mtshan mor sangs rgyas dge 'dun dang
NK043(pi)001:901: bcas pa'i spyan sngar mar me bye ba khrag khrig
NK043(pi)001:903: rgyal po nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas /
NK043(pi)001:907: rkang pa gnyis su yang mar me'i kong bu re
NK043(pi)001:908: re bzhag nas mtshan mo rdzogs pa'i bar du mar
NK043(pi)001:909: me btang yang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus lus la ngal ba med cing /
NK043(pi)001:910: dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu'i bde ba tshor bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:911: de ltar zla ba gsum du bsnyen bkur byas so //
NK043(pi)001:912: de bzhin du rgyal bu stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:913: khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:914: gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag khrig phrag 'bum
NK043(pi)001:915: gyis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum
NK043(pi)001:916: du yo byad de lta bus bsnyen ba kur byas
NK043(pi)001:917: so // rgyal po'i ji lta ba bzhin du btsun
NK043(pi)001:918: mo dam pa lha mo dpal gyis kyang zla ba
NK043(pi)001:919: gsum du spos dang me tog gis bsnyen bkur byas
NK043(pi)001:920: so // so // de bzhin du bu mo bye
NK043(pi)001:921: ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang
NK043(pi)001:922: nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du spos
NK043(pi)001:923: dang me tog gis bsnyen bkur byas so //
NK043(pi)001:924: zla ba gsum po rdzogs nas rgyal pos /
NK043(pi)001:925: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i rgyan brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:926: 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa gser gyi 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:927: de bzhin du glang po dang rta dang nor bu rin po ches thog drangs pa'i nor bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:928: glang po sogs re re nas brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:929: khyim bdag rin po che la sogs pa rgyal bu brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:930: blon po rin po che la sogs pa khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:931: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas kyi 'tsho ba'i phyir du btsun
NK043(pi)001:932: mo'i 'khor gyi grong khyer sogs grong khyer brgyad khri
NK043(pi)001:933: bzhi stong / rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:934: rin po che'i me tog gi phon po brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:935: rin chen sna bdun gyi gdugs brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:936: rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos rgyan chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:937: rin po che'i phreng ba brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:938: rin po che'i bya dang ri dwags dang bsil yab brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:939: sman bcud kyis len brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:940: rgyan dang khri'u snyan cha ga dub kor /
NK043(pi)001:945: rgyal mtshan kun dga' ra ba /
NK043(pi)001:946: mar me'i kong bu la sogs pa dag kyang sangs rgyas la phul nas /
NK043(pi)001:947: bdag ni bgyi ba mang ba lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bzod par mdzad de /
NK043(pi)001:948: skyed tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs pa dang dgyes par mdzad du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:949: bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:950: phyag dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag slad kyis kyang mchi'o //
NK043(pi)001:952: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi bu stong po
NK043(pi)001:953: dag re re nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor bcas
NK043(pi)001:954: la zla ba gsum du rgyal po'i ji lta ba
NK043(pi)001:955: bzhin du bsnyen bkur bya bar zhus shing gnang ngo
NK043(pi)001:956: // de'i tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:957: 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu nyul zhing mir gyur pa thams cad la zas slong ba'i tshul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:958: skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa la bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:959: rgyal bu gzhon nu mig mi 'dzum pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:965: grub pa la sogs pa stong po dag gis re
NK043(pi)001:966: re nas ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud
NK043(pi)001:967: kyis zla ba gsum gyi bsnyen bkur dang /
NK043(pi)001:968: de'i rjes su gser gyi 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi
NK043(pi)001:969: stong sogs yo byad thams cad phul ba de kho
NK043(pi)001:970: na ltar bsnyen bkur dang yon de las mi nyung
NK043(pi)001:971: ba phul lo // de lta bu'i sbyin pa byas nas de dag kha cig brgya byin du smon /
NK043(pi)001:972: de bzhin du tshangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:975: nyan thos kyi theg par smon cing /
NK043(pi)001:976: lo nyis brgya lnga bcur sangs rgyas 'khor bcas la bsnyen bkur te mthar bzod par gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:977: de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze
NK043(pi)001:978: rgya mtsho'i rdul 'ong nas na bza' dang bshos la
NK043(pi)001:979: sogs pa 'tshogs chas thams cad kyis lo bdun du
NK043(pi)001:980: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po 'khor dge
NK043(pi)001:981: slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa
NK043(pi)001:982: gnang ste / ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu
NK043(pi)001:983: khyud kyi bsnyen bkur byas pa de bzhin du yo
NK043(pi)001:984: byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
NK043(pi)001:985: gnang ste / byas so // de nas dus gzhan
NK043(pi)001:986: zhig na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul la 'di lta
NK043(pi)001:987: bu'i rtog pa skyes te bdag gis srog chags bye
NK043(pi)001:988: ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de nyid bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:989: pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug kyang
NK043(pi)001:990: gnang ste / byas so // / rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud 'di /
NK043(pi)001:991: lha dang mi'i rgyal srid dam /
NK043(pi)001:994: ci 'dod pa'i smon lam mi shes te /
NK043(pi)001:995: bdag ni bla med rdzogs byang 'dod cing sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:996: rgyal po 'di'i yid la ci zhig 'dod pa de /
NK043(pi)001:998: sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang bram ze 'ga' zhig
NK043(pi)001:999: gis bdag la rmi lam du sbron grang snyam mo
NK043(pi)001:1000: // der bram ze de'i rmi lam na phyogs bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:1001: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams
NK043(pi)001:1002: // mthong zhing / sangs rgyas de rnams kyis bram ze de la /
NK043(pi)001:1006: ze ba rnams ni rdo'i snying po las byas pa'i pad+ma dag bskur te /
NK043(pi)001:1007: pad+ma de thams cad la yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag kun tu snang zhing /
NK043(pi)001:1008: nyi ma de dag gi steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs kun nas gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1009: nyi dkyil re re las kyang 'od zer bye ba
NK043(pi)001:1010: phrag drug cu byung bar gyur nas 'od zer de
NK043(pi)001:1011: thams cad bram ze de'i khar zhugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1012: rang gi lus dpag tshad stong gi tshad tsam du
NK043(pi)001:1013: gyur pa me long gi dkyil 'khor dag pa bzhin
NK043(pi)001:1014: du yongs su dag par mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1015: lus kyi khong na yang byang chub sems dpa' bye
NK043(pi)001:1016: ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu pad+ma dag la
NK043(pi)001:1017: skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing bsam gtan byed
NK043(pi)001:1019: nyi ma'i gzugs de dag kyang bdag gi mgo la
NK043(pi)001:1020: phreng ba dang ra bar mthong zhing gdugs rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:1021: steng gi nam mkhar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar
NK043(pi)001:1022: thug pa'i bar du gnas pa mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:1023: kho ra khor yug na yang pad+ma sna tshogs yod
NK043(pi)001:1024: cing de dag la mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i sil
NK043(pi)001:1025: snyan dag byung ste sgra yang grag go //
NK043(pi)001:1026: de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud lus khrag
NK043(pi)001:1027: gis bskus shing phag gi gdong du gyur nas rgyug
NK043(pi)001:1028: cing srog chags mang po za ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1029: zos nas kyang e ran+da'i shing drung na snyel zhing 'dug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1030: srog chags sna tshogs dag 'ongs nas rgyal po zos
NK043(pi)001:1031: te keng rus la thug par byas shing bor ba
NK043(pi)001:1032: dang / yang phyir sha skyes te phag gi gdong
NK043(pi)001:1033: du gyur pas gzhan za ba sogs gong bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:1035: gzhan yang rgyal bu dag kyang la la ni phag gi gdong /
NK043(pi)001:1036: la la ni glang po'i gdong /
NK043(pi)001:1037: de bzhin du ma he dang seng ge spyang ki
NK043(pi)001:1038: wa khyi spre'u'i gdong du gyur pas lus khrag gis
NK043(pi)001:1039: bsgos te srog chags rnam pa mang po zos nas
NK043(pi)001:1040: e ran+da'i shing drung na 'dug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1041: srog chags mang pos keng rus la thug par za ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1042: yang sngar bzhin za res byed pa sogs mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:1043: rgyal bu kha cig sna ma'i me tog gis brgyan
NK043(pi)001:1044: nas ma he'i shing rta la zhon te lam gol
NK043(pi)001:1045: bar zhugs nas g.yas phyogs su bltas shing dong bar
NK043(pi)001:1046: mthong ngo // brgya byin dang tshangs pa 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:1047: skyong ba dag kyang 'ongs nas bram ze la smras
NK043(pi)001:1048: mthong ngo // pa / kye bram ze khyod kyi
NK043(pi)001:1049: khor yug na pad+ma yod pa gang yin pa de
NK043(pi)001:1050: mthong ngo // pa / dag las / dang por pad+ma gcig ni rgyal po'i skal bar phul cig /
NK043(pi)001:1051: de nas rgyal bu 'di dag la pad+ma re re byin cig /
NK043(pi)001:1052: lhag ma rnams ni khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1053: skye bo gzhan la byin cig /
NK043(pi)001:1054: ces zer ba thos nas lha rnams kyis bsgo ba
NK043(pi)001:1055: bzhin du pad+ma 'gyed bzhin pa las mnal sad pa
NK043(pi)001:1056: dang / de mal nas langs te rmi lam de
NK043(pi)001:1057: dran zhing 'dug pa na 'di snyam du sems te
NK043(pi)001:1058: dang / / rgyal po dang rgyal bu kha cig
NK043(pi)001:1059: dman pa 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' ba dang
NK043(pi)001:1060: dang / / / ma he'i shing rta la zhon
NK043(pi)001:1061: pa'i lam gol ba de dag rgyal bu kha cig
NK043(pi)001:1062: nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1063: snang ba chen po dang sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba
NK043(pi)001:1064: ni bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:1065: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum la bkod pa
NK043(pi)001:1067: bdag gis 'dzam gling gi skye bo dge ba la bkod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1068: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas la lo bdun du spyan drangs
NK043(pi)001:1069: par byas pa des snang ba chen po dang phyogs
NK043(pi)001:1072: bdag gis bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab
NK043(pi)001:1073: pas sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag la gdugs bskur
NK043(pi)001:1074: ba yin na / bdag gis pad+ma de dag la nyi ma'i gzugs mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1075: 'od zer de dag rang gi khar zhugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1076: lus chen por gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1077: nyi ma'i gzugs rnams phreng bar dngar ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1078: khong par byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma la 'dug pa de dag bsam gtan byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1079: brgya byin sogs kyis pad+ma 'di dag bgos la byin
NK043(pi)001:1080: cig ces pa ltar byed pa de rgyu dang rkyen
NK043(pi)001:1081: ci yin bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:1082: de'i nang par bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis zhal
NK043(pi)001:1083: zas sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:1084: la rang gi lag dar te bstabs shing tshim par
NK043(pi)001:1085: byas la bshos gsol zin pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1086: kyi spyan sngar stan dma' ba la 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:1087: der rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud bu stong srog
NK043(pi)001:1088: chags stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa yang sangs
NK043(pi)001:1089: rgyas kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te
NK043(pi)001:1090: 'khor do // de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rmi lam ci rmis pa gsol pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1091: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:1092: bram ze gang khyod kyi snang ba chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:1093: snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK043(pi)001:1094: bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:1095: khyod la pad+ma bskur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1096: pad+ma de dag las nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1097: 'od de dag khyod kyi khar zhugs par mthong ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:1098: bram ze khyod kyis lo nyis brgya lnga bcur 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:1099: gling nyul bar byed cing nyul ba des sems can
NK043(pi)001:1100: bgrang ba las 'das pa bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
NK043(pi)001:1101: po gsum la bkod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1102: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:1103: pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa
NK043(pi)001:1104: dang / theg pa chen po 'di la brtsam par
NK043(pi)001:1105: byas pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyod
NK043(pi)001:1106: bla med byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i snga ltas
NK043(pi)001:1107: dang / so // sangs rgyas de dag gis rin
NK043(pi)001:1108: po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bskur zhing de dag
NK043(pi)001:1109: steng gi bar snang la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:1111: gang gi nub mo khyod sangs rgyas pa de nyid
NK043(pi)001:1112: du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+aa'i bye snyed
NK043(pi)001:1113: du khyod kyi grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su
NK043(pi)001:1114: bcad pa rgya chen po dag mngon par 'phags par
NK043(pi)001:1115: 'gyur zhing / khyod kyi spyi gtsug kyang tshangs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1116: 'jig rten gyi bar du gyen du 'phags shing bltar
NK043(pi)001:1117: mi mngon par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas so //
NK043(pi)001:1118: gang khyod tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:1119: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phreng ba mgo la bcings
NK043(pi)001:1120: pa de ni khyod kyis sems can bgrang ba las
NK043(pi)001:1121: 'das pa bla med rdzogs byang 'dzin du bcug pa
NK043(pi)001:1122: de dag kyang khyod sangs rgyas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1123: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1124: gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du mngon par
NK043(pi)001:1126: de dag gis khyod kyi basngagasa pa brjod cing bdag
NK043(pi)001:1127: cag la sangs rgyas des byang chub chen po 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:1128: du bcug pas bdag cag mngon par sangs rgyas pas
NK043(pi)001:1129: na / de ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no //
NK043(pi)001:1131: de dag gis khyod la mchod par bya ba'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:1132: byang chub sems dpa' gtong bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:1133: byang sems de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
NK043(pi)001:1134: par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis khyod la mchod par
NK043(pi)001:1135: byas shing / khyod las chos thos nas gzungs dang ting 'dzin bzod pa sna tshogs thob stee /
NK043(pi)001:1136: so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong nas khyod
NK043(pi)001:1137: kyi basngagasa pa rjes su sgrogs pa'i snga ltas yin
NK043(pi)001:1138: no // bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam na khong
NK043(pi)001:1139: par pad+ma la bsam gtan byed pa'i byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:1140: dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu de
NK043(pi)001:1141: no // ni / bram ze khyod sangs rgyas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1142: gang dag srog chags de snyed bla med byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1143: 'dzin du 'jug cing rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
NK043(pi)001:1144: mi ldog la / khyod mya ngan las 'das nas
NK043(pi)001:1145: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'das pa'i 'og tu
NK043(pi)001:1146: phyogs bcu'i zhing gzhan du sangs rgyas par 'gyur te
NK043(pi)001:1147: mi ldog la / / de dag gis sngar bskal
NK043(pi)001:1148: pa grangs med 'das pa na sangs rgyas 'dis bdag
NK043(pi)001:1149: cag byang chub la bzhag go zhes khyod kyi basngagasa
NK043(pi)001:1150: pa brjod pa de'i snga ltas so //
NK043(pi)001:1151: bram ze khyod kyi rmi lam na phag gi gdong
NK043(pi)001:1152: dang khyi'i gdong gi bar du gyur cing lus khrag
NK043(pi)001:1153: gis bskus te srog chags rnam pa du ma dag
NK043(pi)001:1154: zos nas e ra n+da'i shing ngan pa'i drung na
NK043(pi)001:1155: 'dug pa dang / de yang srog chags gzhan gyis keng rus la thug par za ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1156: yang lus phyir skyes shing sngar bzhin byed pa mthong ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:1157: skyes bu blun po gang dag khyod kyi bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:1158: bya ba'i dngos po gsum yang dag par 'dzin du
NK043(pi)001:1159: bcug cing rab tu bkod pa de dag /
NK043(pi)001:1160: lha dang mi'i rgyal srid la 'dod pa rnams /
NK043(pi)001:1161: de dag der sems can thams cad la longs spyod par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:1162: de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi kha zas dang longs spyod du 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:1167: dud 'gror gti mug gi mun pa dang mgo gcod pa sogs kyi sdug bsngal dang /
NK043(pi)001:1169: dmyal bar tsha grang sogs gnod pa sna tshogs kyis
NK043(pi)001:1170: sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bas skyes bu blun po de
NK043(pi)001:1171: dag yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i
NK043(pi)001:1173: gang khyod kyi rmi lam na kha cig sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas mgo brgyan cing /
NK043(pi)001:1174: ma he'i shing rta zhon te g.yas su lta zhing
NK043(pi)001:1175: lam gol bar dong bar mthong ba de dag ni
NK043(pi)001:1176: / bram ze khyod kyis bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
NK043(pi)001:1177: po gsum la rab tu bkod pa'i rigs kyi bu
NK043(pi)001:1178: kha cig bdag dul zhing zhi ba'i phyir nyan thos
NK043(pi)001:1179: kyi theg pa la zhugs pa de'i snga ltas yin
NK043(pi)001:1181: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:1182: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1183: rgyal po chen po mir gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1184: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1185: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba yang re re
NK043(pi)001:1186: nas u dum w+aa ra'i me tog bzhin du rnyed
NK043(pi)001:1187: par dka' / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang
NK043(pi)001:1188: yang dag pa'i smon lam kyang rnyed par dka' lags
NK043(pi)001:1189: par dka' / so // rgyal po chen po lha'i
NK043(pi)001:1190: rgyal srid ni sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu lags so
NK043(pi)001:1191: par dka' / so // // gling gcig dang gnyis
NK043(pi)001:1192: dang gsum dang bzhi pa'i rgyal srid kyang sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:1194: yun ring por 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bgyid pa lags so //
NK043(pi)001:1195: lha mi'i 'byor pa ni rlung gi shugs bzhin du g.yo zhing mi gnas pa lags so //
NK043(pi)001:1196: byis pa rnams ni chu zla lta bu 'dod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1197: yon tan lngas ngoms pa mi myong zhing yul rnams
NK043(pi)001:1198: la myos nas lha dang mi'i dpal 'tshal bar bgyid
NK043(pi)001:1199: de byis pa de dag ni yang nas yang du
NK043(pi)001:1200: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dwags
NK043(pi)001:1201: dang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:1203: byis pa rnams 'khor bar 'khyams pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1204: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1205: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bgyi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1206: mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon sum du bgyi
NK043(pi)001:1207: ba'i slad du yang dag pa'i smon lam mi 'debs
NK043(pi)001:1208: shing rtsol bar mi bgyi ba'i slad du ste /
NK043(pi)001:1209: de ltar byis pa glen pa dag ni gang la
NK043(pi)001:1210: sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1211: sems kyis skyo bar bgyid cing gang la yang nas
NK043(pi)001:1212: yang du sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor bas
NK043(pi)001:1213: skyo bar mi bgyid cing yid 'byung bar mi bgyid
NK043(pi)001:1214: do // rgyal po chen po de bas na 'khor
NK043(pi)001:1215: ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi snod du gyur
NK043(pi)001:1216: pa lags pas yongs su brtag pa mdzad cing /
NK043(pi)001:1217: rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis ni /
NK043(pi)001:1218: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la lhag par mdzad pa mdzad de dge ba'i rtsa ba ni bskrun /
NK043(pi)001:1219: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa brnyes /
NK043(pi)001:1220: longs spyod chen po'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la dbul ba ni phul /
NK043(pi)001:1221: mtho ris su skye ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du tshul khrims ni bsrungs /
NK043(pi)001:1222: bcom ldan 'das la chos gsan pas khyod shes rab chen po rnyed par ni gyur /
NK043(pi)001:1223: mchod sbyin ni mdzad lags kyi /
NK043(pi)001:1224: rgyal po chen po khyod bla na med pa yang
NK043(pi)001:1225: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed cig
NK043(pi)001:1227: bram ze kho bo ni bla med rdzogs byang mi 'dod de /
NK043(pi)001:1228: 'khor ba mngon par 'dod pa'i don du sbyin pa byin /
NK043(pi)001:1229: tshul khrims bsrungs chos nyan to //
NK043(pi)001:1230: bram ze bla med rdzogs byang ni thob par dka' ba yin pas mi dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:1231: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po la lan gnyis su smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1232: rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi lam ni yang
NK043(pi)001:1233: dag pa lags so bsam nas smon lam gdab par
NK043(pi)001:1234: bgyi ba ste / lam de ni sgrib pa ma
NK043(pi)001:1235: mchis pas rdzogs shing shin tu dad pa lags so
NK043(pi)001:1236: bgyi ba ste / // lam de ni lhag pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1237: bsam pa rnam par dag cing drang po lags so
NK043(pi)001:1238: bgyi ba ste / // // lam de ni nyon
NK043(pi)001:1239: mongs pa bsal bas g.yo med cing dag pa lags
NK043(pi)001:1240: bgyi ba ste / // // so // zhes sogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:1241: lam de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
NK043(pi)001:1242: byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang bcas pa lags
NK043(pi)001:1243: so // lam de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
NK043(pi)001:1244: kyi rin po che dang mthun pas rin po che
NK043(pi)001:1245: chen por nges par bsgrub pa lags so //
NK043(pi)001:1247: lam de ni mi dge ba thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror mchi ba lags so //
NK043(pi)001:1248: rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi lam de ni
NK043(pi)001:1249: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas bde ba
NK043(pi)001:1250: 'thob pa lags kyi rgyal po chen po byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1252: ces byang chub sems kyi basngagasa pa rgya chen po brjod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1254: bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni skye dgu
NK043(pi)001:1255: tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi nang du 'jig
NK043(pi)001:1257: de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad zhi bar mdzad par mi spyod de /
NK043(pi)001:1258: sems can rang rang gi dge rtsa bskyed pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:1259: la las gzungs dang ting 'dzin bzod pa grub /
NK043(pi)001:1260: dge rtsa mchog tu gyur pa'i byang sems rnams ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur /
NK043(pi)001:1261: sems can kha cig lha mi'i dpal nyams su myong /
NK043(pi)001:1262: de ltar sems can rnams rang rang gi dge dang mi dge'i las kyis 'phyan par gyur pa las /
NK043(pi)001:1263: sems can gcig tsam gyi sdug bsngal yang rab tu
NK043(pi)001:1264: zhi bar ma mdzad na bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul
NK043(pi)001:1265: bya'i sems can gang zhig yin /
NK043(pi)001:1266: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni zhing du gyur pa 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
NK043(pi)001:1267: dge rtsa ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams sdug bsngal las thar bar ni ma mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:1268: kho bos ni byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang spyod la /
NK043(pi)001:1269: ye shes chen po bsags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1270: chos kyi sgo rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab
NK043(pi)001:1271: pa la 'jug pa des sems can rnams 'dul zhing
NK043(pi)001:1272: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byed mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:1273: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs can 'di lta bur
NK043(pi)001:1274: byang chub kyi phyir sems yongs su bsngo ba 'ba'
NK043(pi)001:1276: gal te gang gi tshe kho bo bla med byang
NK043(pi)001:1277: chub la reg par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1278: der / kho bos sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:1279: thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:1280: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig 'thob par
NK043(pi)001:1282: de'i tshe kho bo byang chub tu sems bskyed cing
NK043(pi)001:1283: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang spyad par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:1285: de nas sangs rgyas rin chen snying po ting nge
NK043(pi)001:1286: 'dzin me long bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms
NK043(pi)001:1287: par zhugs ma thag tu snang ba chen pos phyogs
NK043(pi)001:1288: bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
NK043(pi)001:1289: rgyas kyi zhing stong gi 'jig rten gyi rdul snyed
NK043(pi)001:1290: dag gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad snang bar
NK043(pi)001:1291: gyur te / zhing la la dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1292: la la dag na yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1293: de bzhin du la la na byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:1294: byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug nas bdud pham
NK043(pi)001:1296: sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:1297: zhing la la na sangs rgyas byang sems kyis khyab cing nyan rang med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1298: la la na nyan rang yod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1299: la la na sangs rgyas dang nyan rang byang sems kyis stong pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1300: la la na snyigs ma lngas nyon mongs can du gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1301: la la na snyigs ma lnga dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1302: zhing kha cig na sems can mchog rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1304: kha cig na tshe ring ba /
NK043(pi)001:1305: kha cig tshe thung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1308: kha cig me la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:1309: pa'i zhing de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab
NK043(pi)001:1310: par kun tu snang zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1311: 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
NK043(pi)001:1312: pa de dag mthong ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu
NK043(pi)001:1314: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1315: rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag la gzigs nas /
NK043(pi)001:1316: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed cig /
NK043(pi)001:1317: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar bzhed pa bzung bar mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:1318: de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis /
NK043(pi)001:1319: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo spyar te gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:1320: gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin pa nas /
NK043(pi)001:1321: gang gis sems can rnams bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1322: gang gis sems can rnams tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i bar du rgya cher gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1325: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
NK043(pi)001:1326: smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs
NK043(pi)001:1327: ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:1328: la smon lam gyi dbang gis zhing yongs su ma
NK043(pi)001:1331: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag grong khyer du zhugs
NK043(pi)001:1332: te rtse gcig tu mchis nas smon lam la bsam
NK043(pi)001:1333: par bgyi zhing / snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba'i
NK043(pi)001:1334: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu la dga' ba
NK043(pi)001:1335: der dge ba'i spyod pa 'di dag yongs su bsngo
NK043(pi)001:1336: par bgyi zhing / bar bagyi'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:1337: rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:1338: de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1339: 'khor bcas la phyag byas nas rang gi khyim nang
NK043(pi)001:1340: du yang dag par 'dod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1341: gi yon tan bkod pa dag sems par byed do
NK043(pi)001:1342: // de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal
NK043(pi)001:1343: bu thu bo mig mi 'dzum pa la khyod bla
NK043(pi)001:1344: med rdzogs byang du sems skyed la /
NK043(pi)001:1345: bsod nams bsgrubs pa de dag der bsngosa shig /
NK043(pi)001:1347: mkhan po bdag kyang rang gi khyim du zhugs te /
NK043(pi)001:1348: dben par mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag bsam par bgyi ste /
NK043(pi)001:1349: gal te byang chub kyi slad du sems bskyed pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:1350: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du slar mchis nas byang
NK043(pi)001:1351: chub tu sems yongs su bsngo bar bagyi'o zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:1352: nas dong ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
NK043(pi)001:1353: bkod pa la sems par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:1354: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:1356: rim bzhin rgyal bu stong rdzogs pa'i bar du re
NK043(pi)001:1357: re bzhin bos te snga ma bzhin du sbyar nas
NK043(pi)001:1358: byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:1359: khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:1360: gzhan sems can dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
