NK043(pi)001:1361: bye ba phrag gnyis la de bzhin du byas pa
NK043(pi)001:1362: thams cad rang gi khyim du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1363: gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sems par byed
NK043(pi)001:1364: do // de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze
NK043(pi)001:1365: rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can
NK043(pi)001:1366: mang po de snyed bla med rdzogs byang 'dzin du
NK043(pi)001:1367: do // bcug pa dang / sangs rgyas 'khor bcas
NK043(pi)001:1368: la lo bdun du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen
NK043(pi)001:1369: bkur ba'i phyir spyan drangs pa des /
NK043(pi)001:1370: bla med byang chub tu bdag gis bsam pa rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:1371: par 'gyur zhing smon lam 'di yang 'grub pa lta
NK043(pi)001:1372: na / bdag gis lha dang lha min dang dri
NK043(pi)001:1373: za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang grul bum
NK043(pi)001:1374: rnams mchod sbyin chen po 'di la yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:1376: de nas bram ze des rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu mthong bar 'dod ma thag /
NK043(pi)001:1377: rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du mas
NK043(pi)001:1378: bskor ba bram ze de'i mdun du lhags nas 'di
NK043(pi)001:1379: skad ces bram ze khyod kho bo las ci zhig
NK043(pi)001:1383: nga gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu
NK043(pi)001:1384: zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos pa de ni
NK043(pi)001:1389: rgyal po chen po khyod kyang mchod sbyin chen po 'di la spro bskyed cig /
NK043(pi)001:1391: bram ze khyod ci 'dod pa de ltar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1393: rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod kyi kho bo'i
NK043(pi)001:1394: tshig gis gnod sbyin rnams bla na med pa yang
NK043(pi)001:1395: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du chug la
NK043(pi)001:1397: gal te gnod sbyin khyed cag bla med rdzogs byang 'dod pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:1398: khyed cag song la rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas tsan
NK043(pi)001:1399: dan sa mchog dang sbrul gyi snying po dag longs
NK043(pi)001:1400: shig / kha cig gis ni spos sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:1401: kha cig gis ni me tog sna tshogs dag longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:1403: des kho bos nyin re bzhin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1404: rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bram ze de ltar
NK043(pi)001:1405: bya'o zhes mnyan nas de nyid du mi snang bar
NK043(pi)001:1406: gyur te / rnga bo che brdungs nas gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams bsdus te 'di skad ces /
NK043(pi)001:1407: kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:1408: gang 'dzam bu'ii gling 'dir rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu
NK043(pi)001:1409: khyud kyi mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze
NK043(pi)001:1410: rgya mtsho'i rdul zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:1411: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:1412: rgyas rin po che'i snying po dge slong gi dge
NK043(pi)001:1413: 'dun dang bcas pa la lo bdun du yo byad
NK043(pi)001:1414: thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyis de'i phyir khyed
NK043(pi)001:1415: cag gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la yi rang
NK043(pi)001:1416: bya zhing dge rtsa des khyed cag bla na med
NK043(pi)001:1417: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
NK043(pi)001:1418: skyed cig / de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang srin po
NK043(pi)001:1419: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis
NK043(pi)001:1420: thal mo sbyar te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1421: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de ltar sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1422: 'khor bcas la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bsod nams kyi
NK043(pi)001:1423: rgyun gang yin pa la bdag cag rjes su yi
NK043(pi)001:1424: rang ngo // dge rtsa de bla med rdzogs byang du 'tshang rgya bar bsngo bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1425: rgyal po rnam thos bus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1427: khyed cag las gang su dge rtsa dang bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:1428: 'dod pas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun
NK043(pi)001:1429: du sangs rgyas 'khor bcas la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1430: tsan dan sa mchog dang sbrul gyi snying po dag
NK043(pi)001:1431: rgya mtsho'i pha rol nas longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:1432: de nas gnod sbyin dgu khri nyis stong gis tshig
NK043(pi)001:1433: mthun par bdag cag gis de ltar bagyi'o zhes dang
NK043(pi)001:1434: / gnod sbyin bzhi khri drug stong gis bdag cag gis spos blang bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1436: gnod sbyin lnga khri nyis stong gis bdag cag gis me tog sna tshogs blang bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1437: gnod sbyin nyis khris bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:1438: 'khor bcas kyi phyir sman bcud kyi sa len sna
NK043(pi)001:1439: tshogs blangs la / zhal zas dang /
NK043(pi)001:1440: rlung nan sbyor bar 'gyur ba der mthu gzhug par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:1442: gnod sbyin bdun khris bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:1443: 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhal zas sbyar bar bagyi'o zhes
NK043(pi)001:1444: smras so // de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:1447: yul 'khor srung 'khor mang po dang bcas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1449: dri za bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
NK043(pi)001:1450: rnams kyang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi drung du
NK043(pi)001:1451: 'ongs pa la / rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:1452: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
NK043(pi)001:1453: gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1454: stong gsum pa'i stong chen po'i zhing gi rnam thos
NK043(pi)001:1455: kyi bu sogs rgyal po bzhi ther 'bum 'khor dang
NK043(pi)001:1456: bcas pa yang bram ze de'i gan du 'ongs pa
NK043(pi)001:1457: la bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:1458: du bcug go // de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i
NK043(pi)001:1459: rdul gyis bdag bla med byang chub tu 'tshang rgya
NK043(pi)001:1460: ba'i re ba yang dag par grub cing smon lam
NK043(pi)001:1462: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la mchod sbyin
NK043(pi)001:1463: de'i bgo bsha' byed cing bla med rdzogs byang 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:1465: lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang /
NK043(pi)001:1468: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyang bdag la lta ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur cig snyam ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:1469: de rnams de bzhin du 'ongs pa la su yin zhes dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1470: so so'i ming bstan nas bram ze bsgo ba ci zhig yod ces zer ba la /
NK043(pi)001:1471: bcom ldan 'das 'khor bcas kyi phyir lha'i 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:1472: na khyad par 'phags pa'i lha rdzas kyi khang brtsegs
NK043(pi)001:1473: dang ljon shing spos dang me tog /
NK043(pi)001:1476: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rol mo la sogs pa
NK043(pi)001:1477: gang dag yod pa de thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:1478: gling gi tshal thams cad brgyan par gyis shig ces
NK043(pi)001:1479: bsgo ba bzhin du lha'i rgyal po lnga po dag
NK043(pi)001:1480: gis lha'i 'jig rten du song ste /
NK043(pi)001:1484: sa rtsom dga' rnams bos te /
NK043(pi)001:1485: 'dzam bu'i skyed mos tshal du rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang /
NK043(pi)001:1486: gdan dang gding ba sna tshogs dag gis ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:1487: lha'i 'jig rten 'di brgyan pa de lta bu dang
NK043(pi)001:1488: / khang pa brtsegs pa yang brgya byin gyi khang
NK043(pi)001:1489: brtsegs 'di lta bu rtsigs shig ces bsgos pa bzhin
NK043(pi)001:1490: mtshan gcig gis de thams cad 'grub par byas te
NK043(pi)001:1491: / / lha'i 'jig rten dang 'dzam bu'i skyed mos
NK043(pi)001:1492: tshal khyad par cung zad kyang ma mchis par bsgrubs
NK043(pi)001:1493: nas der lha'i rgyal po lnga phyir zhing bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:1495: 'dzam bu'i tshal ni brgyan zin na yang kho bo
NK043(pi)001:1496: cag gi bya ba ci yod ces smras pa dang
NK043(pi)001:1498: lha'i rgyal po khyod lnga ni lha'i ris so so
NK043(pi)001:1499: na rgyal srid byed pa yin pas de na khyed
NK043(pi)001:1500: cag dbang che bas so so'i 'khor gyi lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:1501: bsdus te / bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la lta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1502: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du shog la sangs rgyas las chos nyon cig /
NK043(pi)001:1503: ces smras pa ltar lha'i rgyal po lngas so so'i ris kyi lha'i 'khor bsdus te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:1504: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi dge rtsa la yi
NK043(pi)001:1505: rang bar byos la bla med byang chub tu sems
NK043(pi)001:1506: skyed cig ces byas pa bzhin so so'i ris kyi
NK043(pi)001:1507: lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag
NK043(pi)001:1508: gis de bzhin bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1509: 'dzam bu'i gling du sangs rgyas la mchod cing chos
NK043(pi)001:1510: mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i rgyal po lnga po so so'i
NK043(pi)001:1511: 'khor 'bum phrag mang po dang lhan cig /
NK043(pi)001:1513: sangs rgyas las chos nyan cing nam mkha'i lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:1514: kyi me tog gi char dang rol mo'i sgra sgrogs
NK043(pi)001:1515: par byed do // de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i
NK043(pi)001:1516: rdul gyi rtog pa sngar bzhin skyes pa'i stobs kyis
NK043(pi)001:1517: par byed do // / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lnga 'ongs te /
NK043(pi)001:1518: de'i tshig gis lha ma yin mang po dang /
NK043(pi)001:1519: de bzhin du bdung gang po zhes bya ba 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1520: tshangs pa chen po 'khor bye ba mang po dang /
NK043(pi)001:1521: gling bzhi pa gnyis pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin sogs lha'i rgyal po lnga dang /
NK043(pi)001:1522: bdud dang tshangs pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1523: de bzhin du gling bzhi pa gsum pa dang bzhi
NK043(pi)001:1524: pa dang lnga pa'i bar gyi lha dang lha min
NK043(pi)001:1525: bdud dang tshangs pa rnams so so'i 'khor du ma
NK043(pi)001:1527: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1528: gi bar dag nas brgya byin ther 'bum sa ya
NK043(pi)001:1529: sogs lha'i rgyal po dang tshangs pa dang bdud dang
NK043(pi)001:1530: lha min gyi rgyal po rnams so so'i 'khor mang
NK043(pi)001:1531: po dang bcas pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin
NK043(pi)001:1532: du byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1533: la mchod cing chos nyan pa'i slad du bsdus so
NK043(pi)001:1534: // de nas bram ze des 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:1535: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nas stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:1536: gyi khams kyi bar gyi zhing de'i mi dang dud
NK043(pi)001:1537: 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang dmyal ba pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:1538: kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad nas de
NK043(pi)001:1539: dag gi mdun na sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa bzhugs
NK043(pi)001:1540: shing de dag bla med byang chub 'dzin du 'jug
NK043(pi)001:1541: par gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
NK043(pi)001:1542: 'phrul 'du mdzad par gyur cig snyam pa'i mod la
NK043(pi)001:1543: / de'i rtog pa sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen nas ting
NK043(pi)001:1544: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas sku'i ba spu
NK043(pi)001:1545: nas 'od zer spros pas sems can rnams kyi sdug
NK043(pi)001:1546: bsngal rgyun chad de sangs rgyas mthong zhing bla med
NK043(pi)001:1547: byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas shing sems can
NK043(pi)001:1548: gzhan mang po tshad med pa'i don kyang byas so
NK043(pi)001:1549: / // 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis /
NK043(pi)001:1550: rgyal po'i pho brang yid 'ong 'dzin gyi 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:1551: tshal gyi skyed mos tshal lha'i rgyan dang lhab lhub
NK043(pi)001:1552: dag gis brgyan to zhes thos nas bdag cag der
NK043(pi)001:1553: dong ste lta zhing sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:1554: yang bltas la chos nyan par bya'o zhes skye bo
NK043(pi)001:1555: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nyin gcig
NK043(pi)001:1557: skyed tshal der yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo nyi khri yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:1558: sgo re re zhing rin po che'i khri'u lnga brgya lnga brgya bshams nas /
NK043(pi)001:1559: de dag la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya 'khod de /
NK043(pi)001:1560: sems can gang dag skyed tshal der 'jug pa de
NK043(pi)001:1561: dag dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bla
NK043(pi)001:1562: med rdzogs byang 'dzin du bcug ste /
NK043(pi)001:1563: de ltar bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun
NK043(pi)001:1564: po der lha dang klu dang lha min dang gnod
NK043(pi)001:1565: spyin dang / srin po dang grul bum dang /
NK043(pi)001:1566: dri za dang yi dwags dang /
NK043(pi)001:1569: dud 'gror skyes pa nas re re nas bgrang ba
NK043(pi)001:1570: las 'das pa dag bla med rdzogs byang 'dzin du
NK043(pi)001:1571: bcug ste / btul zhing rab tu bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:1572: lo bdun po de song nas lha'i 'khor lo rin
NK043(pi)001:1573: po che ma gtogs bar 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi
NK043(pi)001:1574: stong dang glang po rin po che ma gtogs par
NK043(pi)001:1575: rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i glang po
NK043(pi)001:1576: che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang shing rta brgyad khri
NK043(pi)001:1577: bzhi stong gi bar dag kyang 'bul bar 'dod do
NK043(pi)001:1578: // rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyang lo bdun
NK043(pi)001:1579: po de dag 'das pa'i bar du dug gsum la
NK043(pi)001:1580: // 'dun pa dang / rgyal srid dang nor dang /
NK043(pi)001:1581: bu dang bu mo zas skom gnyid sogs la 'dun pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1582: bdag gzhan gyi 'dun pa ma skyes par /
NK043(pi)001:1583: lo bdun du glos phab ste nyal bar ma gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:1584: nyin mtshan dang gzugs sgra sogs kyi 'du shes ma skyes /
NK043(pi)001:1585: lus la ngal ba yang ma skyes te /
NK043(pi)001:1586: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed kyi yon tan bkod pa mthong zhing de'i mig lam du /
NK043(pi)001:1587: ri dang khor yug dang nyi zla sogs gzhan gang
NK043(pi)001:1588: yang mi snang bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
NK043(pi)001:1589: dag pa mthong ba bzhin du lta zhing smon lam
NK043(pi)001:1591: rgyal po la ji ltar byung ba de bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:1593: khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:1594: gzhan srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba
NK043(pi)001:1595: phrag gnyis po thams cad kyang de lta bur dben
NK043(pi)001:1596: par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa lta zhing
NK043(pi)001:1597: / kha cig zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1598: kha cig ma dag pa sems par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:1599: lo bdun po rdzogs par rigs nas bram ze rgya
NK043(pi)001:1600: mtsho'i rdul gyis rin po che sna bdun 'bul bar
NK043(pi)001:1601: 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la thal mo
NK043(pi)001:1603: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang /
NK043(pi)001:1605: khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1606: srog chags gzhan bla med byang chub 'dzin du bcug
NK043(pi)001:1607: pa de dag rang gi khyim du mchis te dben
NK043(pi)001:1608: par nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la gnas
NK043(pi)001:1609: nas der mi su yang mchir mi ster lags so
NK043(pi)001:1610: // bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas rgyal po rtsibs
NK043(pi)001:1611: kyi mu khyud la sogs pa de dag nang du
NK043(pi)001:1612: yang dag 'jog pa de las langs te 'dir mchis
NK043(pi)001:1613: nas bla med byang chub las blo mi g.yo ba
NK043(pi)001:1614: // dang / bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa
NK043(pi)001:1615: 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag la dgongs su gsol
NK043(pi)001:1616: // dang / zhes zhus pas / sangs rgyas rin
NK043(pi)001:1617: chen snying po ting nge 'dzin blo gros sgrub ba
NK043(pi)001:1618: zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pas /
NK043(pi)001:1619: zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po /
NK043(pi)001:1623: shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung bas
NK043(pi)001:1624: nang du 'jog pa de dag gi mdun du tshangs
NK043(pi)001:1625: par sprul te / grogs po dag longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:1626: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lo bdun du mchod sbyin bya ba ni zin te /
NK043(pi)001:1627: bcom ldan 'das kyang gzhan du rgyu zhing gshegs kyis /
NK043(pi)001:1628: bcom ldan 'das 'khor bcas la phyag dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:1629: ces bskul bas de dag langs te rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la bskul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:1630: de thams cad langs te chas so //
NK043(pi)001:1631: rgyal po chas pa dang nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra bsgrags so //
NK043(pi)001:1632: de nas rgyal po dang bu stong la sogs pa
NK043(pi)001:1633: de thams cad lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi drung
NK043(pi)001:1635: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:1636: rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:1637: 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du bsnyen
NK043(pi)001:1638: bkur bgyis pa dang yon phul ba de dag la
NK043(pi)001:1639: rjes su yi rang bar gyis la /
NK043(pi)001:1640: gtong ba dang rjes su yi rangs ba'i bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:1641: de dag bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos
NK043(pi)001:1642: shig ces dang / de bzhin du rgyal bu stong
NK043(pi)001:1643: la sogs pa srog chags gzhan rnams la'ang rjes su
NK043(pi)001:1644: shig ces dang / gdams so // de nas de
NK043(pi)001:1645: bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos bram ze 'dis
NK043(pi)001:1646: byang chub 'dzin du bcug cing phyir mi ldog pa
NK043(pi)001:1647: la bkod pa'i sems can 'di dag lung bstan par
NK043(pi)001:1648: bya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang bstan
NK043(pi)001:1649: par bya'o snyam du dgongs te /
NK043(pi)001:1650: ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa
NK043(pi)001:1651: zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dzum par
NK043(pi)001:1652: mdzad do // 'dzum pa mdzad pa des sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1653: kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa snang ba chen
NK043(pi)001:1655: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud sogs la sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1656: kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnams kyang bstan
NK043(pi)001:1657: to // phyogs bcu'i zhing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1658: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis snang ba de mthong
NK043(pi)001:1659: nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang bsnyen
NK043(pi)001:1661: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos
NK043(pi)001:1662: bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:1663: smon lam lung bstan pa thos par 'dod pas bcom
NK043(pi)001:1665: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:1666: rtsibs kyi mu khyud la dang por khyod kyis sangs
NK043(pi)001:1667: rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zungs shig
NK043(pi)001:1668: ces smras pas / rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:1669: logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das bdag
NK043(pi)001:1670: ni byang chub don du gnyer ba lags te /
NK043(pi)001:1671: bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa sogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:1672: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:1673: pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngosa shing /
NK043(pi)001:1674: dgung lo bdun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsams lags na /
NK043(pi)001:1675: bdag gang du 'tshang rgya ba'i zhing der ngan song gsum dang /
NK043(pi)001:1676: mi dge ba dang 'chi 'pho ba sogs sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang med cing /
NK043(pi)001:1677: tshe dang lus dang ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes
NK043(pi)001:1678: sogs dang snod bcud kyi yon tan rgya chen po
NK043(pi)001:1679: yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams bzung bar mdzad de
NK043(pi)001:1681: rgyas par ni mdo nyid du blta bar bya ste 'dir ma spros so //
NK043(pi)001:1682: de ltar snod bcud yongs su dag pa'i zhing de
NK043(pi)001:1683: lta bu 'grub pa'i rgyu tshogs rdzogs nas smon lam
NK043(pi)001:1685: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas /
NK043(pi)001:1686: dus la bab tshe rang gi byang chub shing gi
NK043(pi)001:1687: dbang po'i drung du sems bskyed pa'i skad cig gcig
NK043(pi)001:1688: gis bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1689: te / de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od dang 'khor nyan thos dang /
NK043(pi)001:1690: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi grangs dang /
NK043(pi)001:1692: zhing gi yon tan rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1693: ye shes ma gtogs par gzhan sus kyang bgrang bar
NK043(pi)001:1694: rngo mi thogs pa de lta bur gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:1695: phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams su sangs rgyas de dang de'i
NK043(pi)001:1696: zhing gi basngagasa pa rjes su sgrogs zhing gzhan nas
NK043(pi)001:1697: chos spong ba dang mtshams med byed pa ma gtogs
NK043(pi)001:1698: pa'i sems can su zhig bdag gi ming thos pa
NK043(pi)001:1699: thams cad bdag gi zhing der 'ong bar 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:1700: la sogs pa smon lam gyi khyad par phul du
NK043(pi)001:1701: byung ba rnams btab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1702: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos rgyal
NK043(pi)001:1703: po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la legs so zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:1704: ba byin te / rgyal po chen po legs so //
NK043(pi)001:1705: khyod kyi smon lam zab bo //
NK043(pi)001:1706: rgyal po chen po ltos shig /
NK043(pi)001:1707: 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1708: 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po ltar shin tu mdzes
NK043(pi)001:1709: pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
NK043(pi)001:1710: po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba bzhugs te
NK043(pi)001:1711: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston to //
NK043(pi)001:1712: zhing der nyan rang du gdags pa med la de'i
NK043(pi)001:1713: gtam yang mi ston te theg pa chen po 'ba'
NK043(pi)001:1714: zhig brjod do // der sems can thams cad rdzus
NK043(pi)001:1715: te skye zhing bud med kyi ming yang med do
NK043(pi)001:1716: zhig brjod do // // sangs rgyas de mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:1717: las 'das shing dam pa'i chos nub nas bar gyi
NK043(pi)001:1718: bskal pa drug cu 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1719: 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lhun po'i 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:1720: der de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bsam yas yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:1721: zhing gi yon tan ni sangs rgyas snga ma'i zhing bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:1722: sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug cu'o //
NK043(pi)001:1723: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1724: chos bar gyi bskal pa bcu drug tu gnas so
NK043(pi)001:1725: // dam pa'i chos nub nas bar gyi bskal pa
NK043(pi)001:1726: stong 'das pa na 'jig rten de'i ming rnam par
NK043(pi)001:1727: dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:1728: der de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:1729: zhing gi yon tan dang sku tshe'i tshad sangs rgyas snga ma dang mnyam la /
NK043(pi)001:1730: de'i chos nub pa na 'jig rten de ni rtsibs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:1731: der de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbang phyug dbyangs
NK043(pi)001:1732: zhes bya ba bar gyi bskal pa lngar bzhugs so
NK043(pi)001:1733: // zhing gi yon tan ni snga ma bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:1734: de mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bar gyi bskal pa bdun du gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:1735: de'i dam chos nub pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:1736: der de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dpag tu med
NK043(pi)001:1737: pa dag byung nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
NK043(pi)001:1738: par gyur kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig pa yang med /
NK043(pi)001:1740: der ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med
NK043(pi)001:1741: pa gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed ni 'das
NK043(pi)001:1742: / bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1743: 'jig rten gyi khams de ni bde ba can zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:1744: rgyal po chen po khyod der bla na med pa
NK043(pi)001:1745: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar
NK043(pi)001:1746: 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK043(pi)001:1747: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med
NK043(pi)001:1750: bcom ldan 'das zhing der bdag bas ches sngar sangs rgyas pa'i byang sems de dag gang nas mchis /
NK043(pi)001:1752: zhing gzhan grangs med pa nas lhags pa'i byang sems chen po 'di dag ste /
NK043(pi)001:1753: 'di dag 'das pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1754: rnams kyis bla med byang chub tu lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:1756: bdag cag rnams la bla med byang chub 'dzin du
NK043(pi)001:1757: 'jug pa'i bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di dus ji
NK043(pi)001:1760: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:1761: 'dis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa na khyod kyis kyang thos par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:1763: ci nas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1764: bdag gi smon la ma de 'grub pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:1765: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag
NK043(pi)001:1766: lngas phyag bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams
NK043(pi)001:1767: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed g.yo zhing 'gul la
NK043(pi)001:1768: / zhing de dag na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:1769: rgyas de dag gis kyang bdag lung ston par gyur
NK043(pi)001:1770: cig ces sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag byas pa
NK043(pi)001:1771: / dang / ji ltar smon pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:1772: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:1773: bya ba shes pa'i sems can mchog rab longs /
NK043(pi)001:1774: stobs bcu gang+g+aa snyed kyis khyod lung bstan /
NK043(pi)001:1775: ri dang bcas pa'i sa yang g.yos gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:1776: mi mchog 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:1777: de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud dga' zhing rab tu mgu ste /
NK043(pi)001:1778: chos nyan pa'i phyir ha cang yang mi ring ba phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:1779: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rtsibs kyi
NK043(pi)001:1780: mu khyud kyi bu thu bo mig mi mdzum la
NK043(pi)001:1781: bos nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
NK043(pi)001:1782: de nas mig mi 'dzum gyis gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:1783: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ngan song rnams la bltas na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1784: mtho ris rnams la bltas na nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis slar ngan song du ltung ba /
NK043(pi)001:1785: sems can thams cad la bltas na mi dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:1786: bshes kyis zin cing chos kyi mu ge'i mun par
NK043(pi)001:1787: / dge ba'i rtsa ba zad nas lta ba'i chu
NK043(pi)001:1788: srin 'dzin khris zin cing lam ngan pa gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:1789: / lags te / bdag de dag gi phyir dge
NK043(pi)001:1790: ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang bla med byang chub tu
NK043(pi)001:1791: / lags te / bsngo zhing / bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1792: sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba dang 'jigs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1794: zhum pa zhan pa skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:1795: bdag rjes su dran cing ming nas brjod par gyur
NK043(pi)001:1796: cig / de bdag gi lha'i rna bas thos shing lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:1797: de ltar sems can de dag sdug bsngal dag las
NK043(pi)001:1798: yongs su thar ba ma bgyis par bdag bla med
NK043(pi)001:1799: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang mi rgya bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:1800: cig / bdag smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems
NK043(pi)001:1801: can rnams kyi slad du yun ring por byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1802: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag gi re
NK043(pi)001:1803: ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:1804: rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud sangs rgyas tshe dpag med par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:1805: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing dam pa'i chos
NK043(pi)001:1806: nub kyi bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
NK043(pi)001:1807: pa spyod cing / srod la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i tho rang la 'tshang rgya bar bgyid na /
NK043(pi)001:1808: bcom ldan 'das dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1809: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:1810: rigs kyi bu khyod ni mtho ris dang ngan song
NK043(pi)001:1811: gi sems can thams cad la bltas te snying rje'i
NK043(pi)001:1812: sems bskyed pas na de'i phyir khyod spyan ras gzigs
NK043(pi)001:1814: spyan ras gzigs khyod kyis ni sems can tshad med pa sdug bsngal las thar bar byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:1815: byang chub sems dpa'i dus na yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:1816: rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
NK043(pi)001:1817: dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal
NK043(pi)001:1818: pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK043(pi)001:1820: nam gang gi srod la dam pa'i chos nub par
NK043(pi)001:1821: gyur pa de nyid kyi tho rang la byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1822: kyi shing bkod pa du ma'i drung du rdo rje'i
NK043(pi)001:1823: gdan la 'dug nas bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:1825: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:1826: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa
NK043(pi)001:1827: dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes
NK043(pi)001:1828: lung bstan cing / sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i tshad dang /
NK043(pi)001:1829: rgyal bu nyid kyis bden pa brjod pas phyogs bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:1830: zhing g.yos shing sil snyan gyi sgra sgrogs pa dang
NK043(pi)001:1831: / sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa sogs rgya cher byung ste mdo nyid du blta'o //
NK043(pi)001:1832: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu
NK043(pi)001:1833: gnyis pa mu khyud sogs la rim par bskul zhing
NK043(pi)001:1834: de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
NK043(pi)001:1835: pa so so'i bsam pa ltar bzung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:1836: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par dam bcas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1837: de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan zhing ngo mtshar ba'i
NK043(pi)001:1838: ltas byung ba rnams rgyas par mdo las shes par
NK043(pi)001:1839: bya'o // de la rgyal bu gnyis pa mu khyud ni /
NK043(pi)001:1840: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob ces bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:1841: spyan ras gzigs nyid dpal brtsegs rgyal por sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1842: kyi zhing rin po che thams cad yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:1843: bsags pa zhes bya ba der /
NK043(pi)001:1844: dpal brtsegs rgyal po 'das pa'i 'og tu 'tshang rgya ste /
NK043(pi)001:1845: de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brtan pa yon tan nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:1846: zhing gi yon tan ni dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:1847: rgyal bu gsum pa dbang po'i tshogs ces bya bas
NK043(pi)001:1848: ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che ba
NK043(pi)001:1849: dang / zhing gi tshad dang yon tan shin tu
NK043(pi)001:1850: rgya che ba bzung ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK043(pi)001:1851: dang / bka' stsal pa / legs so skyes bu
NK043(pi)001:1852: dam pa khyod ni mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhung
NK043(pi)001:1853: dang / bka' stsal pa / pa ste / smon lam shin tu bzang po btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:1854: khyod ni yon tan dang ldan zhing ye shes dang ldan pas /
NK043(pi)001:1855: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de ltar
NK043(pi)001:1856: rab dang mchog gi blo gros bkra shis par byas
NK043(pi)001:1857: shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
NK043(pi)001:1858: rab mchog yongs su bzung bas /
NK043(pi)001:1859: rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal zhes bya bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:1860: 'jam dpal khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal
NK043(pi)001:1861: pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma
NK043(pi)001:1862: snyed 'das nas gsum pa la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1863: lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams dag pa rdul bral yang dag bsags pa zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:1864: mi mjed 'di yang de'i khongs su 'dus pa zhig 'byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:1865: der khyod bla med rdzogs byang du 'tshang rgya ste /
NK043(pi)001:1866: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:1867: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:1869: rgyal bu bzhi pa nyon mongs med ces bya bas ni /
NK043(pi)001:1870: ji ltar 'jam dpal gyi smon lam bzhin du zhing
NK043(pi)001:1871: dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu
NK043(pi)001:1872: bzung bas / de bzhin gshegs pas de la khyod
NK043(pi)001:1873: byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yang sems can
NK043(pi)001:1874: dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i ri 'joms par
NK043(pi)001:1875: bzung bas / 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
NK043(pi)001:1876: pa yang byed pa de'i phyir khyod kyi ming ni
NK043(pi)001:1877: rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes
NK043(pi)001:1879: khyod ni bskal pa grangs med gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye
NK043(pi)001:1880: ma snyed gcig 'das te gnyis pa la bab pa
NK043(pi)001:1881: na / shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
NK043(pi)001:1882: gang+g+aa'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab
NK043(pi)001:1884: 'jig rten gyi khams mig mi 'dzum pa zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:1885: khyod rang gi ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i yon tan bkod pa dang ldan par /
NK043(pi)001:1886: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:1887: rgyal bu lnga pa 'jigs med ces bya bas kyang
NK043(pi)001:1888: yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams nyon mongs dang ngan
NK043(pi)001:1889: song med pa sogs 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:1890: rgyas kyi zhing lta bur bzung ba la /
NK043(pi)001:1891: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:1892: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smon lam shin tu bzang ba dang zhing bzang po yang bzung /
NK043(pi)001:1894: bden pa'i tshig gi pad+ma'i char yang rab tu bab /
NK043(pi)001:1895: nam mkha' la pad+ma dag gis shin tu myur bar
NK043(pi)001:1896: rgyas btab pas khyod ni nam mkha'i phyag rgya zhes
NK043(pi)001:1898: khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gcig
NK043(pi)001:1899: gi bye ma snyed 'das nas gnyis par bab pa
NK043(pi)001:1900: na / shar lho'i phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya bar /
NK043(pi)001:1901: sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa zhes bya ba sku tshe
NK043(pi)001:1902: dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'ba' zhig gi
NK043(pi)001:1903: tshad kyang dpag tu med pa nyid du 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:1905: rgyal bu drug pa nam mkha' zhes bya bas /
NK043(pi)001:1906: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgya'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:1907: dang zhing ji lta ba bzhin du bzung ba la
NK043(pi)001:1908: / de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa legs so //
NK043(pi)001:1909: khyod kyi smon lam rgya che ste /
NK043(pi)001:1910: khyod kyi bsod nams des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:1911: khams gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po dag
NK043(pi)001:1912: tshad gcig tu gyur la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra
NK043(pi)001:1913: 'bum phrag mang po dag gis bskul ba'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1914: kyi zhing der khyod rnam par snang byed ces bya
NK043(pi)001:1915: bar gyur cig / khyod ni ma 'ongs par bskal
NK043(pi)001:1916: pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK043(pi)001:1917: 'das nas grangs med gnyis pa la bab pa na
NK043(pi)001:1918: bar gyur cig / / shar phyogs logs su 'jig
NK043(pi)001:1919: rten gyi khams nyi zla zhes bya bar de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:1920: gshegs pa chos la dbang bsgyur dbang phyug rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:1921: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:1922: de nas rgyal bu bdun pa yan lag skyes zhes bya bas /
NK043(pi)001:1923: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyom mongs can ma yin pa /
NK043(pi)001:1924: ngan song gsum dang bud med kyi dngos po dang /
NK043(pi)001:1925: ri brag dang mtho dman dang rdo gseg mtsher ma sogs med pa /
NK043(pi)001:1926: gshang gci snab sogs mi gtsang ba med pa /
NK043(pi)001:1927: rin po che'i rgyan dang me tog dang /
NK043(pi)001:1928: rol mo'i sgra sogs sna tshogs pa'i bkod pa dang
NK043(pi)001:1929: ldan pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs pa
NK043(pi)001:1930: dang / bcud kyi sems can thams cad kyang ting
NK043(pi)001:1931: nge 'dzin dang ldan pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mthong
NK043(pi)001:1932: ba sogs zhing gi yon tan rgya chen po shin
NK043(pi)001:1933: tu rmad du byung ba bzung ba la /
NK043(pi)001:1934: de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes gnang ste rigs
NK043(pi)001:1935: kyi bu khyod seng ge spos zhes bya bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:1936: cig / khyod ni bskal pa grangs med gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la /
NK043(pi)001:1938: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK043(pi)001:1939: kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
NK043(pi)001:1941: 'jig rten gyi khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral zhes bya ba der /
NK043(pi)001:1942: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rdul bral spos
NK043(pi)001:1943: mthong dang dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:1945: rgyal bu brgyad pa gnod pa med pa zhes bya bas /
NK043(pi)001:1946: bdag ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs
NK043(pi)001:1947: pa can ma yin pa zhing khams dri sngo snang
NK043(pi)001:1948: ba rdul bral ji 'dra bar gyur pa de ltar
NK043(pi)001:1949: yongs su dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing de ltar
NK043(pi)001:1951: bdag gis ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa la
NK043(pi)001:1952: sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin khri chig
NK043(pi)001:1954: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mu med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:1955: dus gsum las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal
NK043(pi)001:1956: mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bgyi ba rgyal
NK043(pi)001:1957: ba rnams kyis yongs su gtams pa de dag mthong
NK043(pi)001:1958: bar gyur cig / gzhan yang nyan thos byang sems
NK043(pi)001:1959: mu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i rgyal ba rnams
NK043(pi)001:1960: bar gyur cig / mthong ba dang / de rnams
NK043(pi)001:1961: la zhing rdul dang mnyam pa mu med pa'i lus
NK043(pi)001:1963: mchod pa tshad med byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1965: dri sngo snang ba rdul bral lta bu'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:1966: kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i smon lam btab pa
NK043(pi)001:1967: dang bden tshig brjod pa bzhin du rmad du byung
NK043(pi)001:1968: ba'i ltas dang bcas par gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:1969: de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes gnang ste /
NK043(pi)001:1970: khyod ni zhing dag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:1971: sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud yongs su dag par
NK043(pi)001:1972: byed pa dang sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med la
NK043(pi)001:1973: mchod pa tshad med cing grangs med pa dag byed
NK043(pi)001:1974: par spro bas / de'i phyir khyod kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:1975: kun tu bzang po khyod bskal pa grangs med gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das te /
NK043(pi)001:1976: gnyis pa la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:1977: byang phyogs su zhing 'di nas gang+g+aa'i klung drug cu'i
NK043(pi)001:1978: bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:1979: khams ye shes kyi chu shin tu rnam par dag
NK043(pi)001:1980: pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:1981: zhing der khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK043(pi)001:1982: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes rdo
NK043(pi)001:1983: rje rnam par bsgyengs pa'i dbang phyug tog ces bya
NK043(pi)001:1984: bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:1985: de'i tshe na srog chags le lo can khris tshig mthun par /
NK043(pi)001:1986: bsam pa shin tu dag pa'i byang sems kun tu
NK043(pi)001:1987: bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing
NK043(pi)001:1988: zhing yongs su dag par 'jog par 'gyur ba na
NK043(pi)001:1989: / bdag cag kyang zhing der sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:1991: khyed cag kyang 'jig rten khams de'i khor yug tu 'tshang rgya ste /
NK043(pi)001:1992: stong phrag re mtshan mthun pa dri med dbyangs kyi
NK043(pi)001:1993: dbang phyug rgyal po zhes pa la sogs par lung
NK043(pi)001:1994: bstan to // rgyal bu dgu pa sdig med kyis
NK043(pi)001:1995: bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
NK043(pi)001:1996: bstan to // / byang chub chen po 'thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:1997: bar gyi tshe rabs thams cad du 'gyod pa dang
NK043(pi)001:1999: the tshom dang nyan rang gi sems dang mi dge ba'i sems thams cad spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:2000: rab tu byung bar byed cing chos smra ba la gus pa sogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:2001: dam bcas pa brtan zhing ji skad smras pa bzhin
NK043(pi)001:2002: du bgyid pa la sogs pa'i dam bcas bden tshig
NK043(pi)001:2003: dang bcas pa brjod pa bzhin lag pa gnyis su
NK043(pi)001:2004: lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong byung ba
NK043(pi)001:2005: sogs ngo mtshar ba'i rnam 'phrul dang bcas pa bstan
NK043(pi)001:2006: pa la / de bzhin gshegs pas legs so gnang ste /
NK043(pi)001:2007: khyod kyis ni smon lam shin tu bzang po btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:2008: lha'i 'khor lo 'dis kyang snyigs ma lnga ldan gyi
NK043(pi)001:2009: zhing stong pa dag tu sems can tshad med pa
NK043(pi)001:2010: rnyogs pa med pa'i sems la bkod cing byang chub
NK043(pi)001:2012: khyod mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2013: khyod ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis /
NK043(pi)001:2014: zhing gi bkod pa dag zungs shig ces gsungs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2016: sa gzhi thams cad gser las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa la /
NK043(pi)001:2017: lha'i nor bu rin po che bkram pa sogs snod kyi yon tan dang /
NK043(pi)001:2018: snyigs ma lnga dang ngan song dang rga na 'chi ba med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2019: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sogs dge chos dang ldan zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2020: yongs su 'dzin pa med cing bdag gir med pa sogs sems can gyi yon tan dang /
NK043(pi)001:2021: khang brtsegs dang gos rgyan rol mo la sogs pa
NK043(pi)001:2022: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ldan pa'i zhing gi
NK043(pi)001:2023: bkod pa rmad du byung ba bzung ba la /
NK043(pi)001:2024: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:2025: rigs kyi bu mi 'khrugs pa khyod ni ma 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:2026: par bskal pa gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
NK043(pi)001:2027: 'das te / gnyis pa la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2028: shar phyogs logs su zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2029: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:2030: ba ji ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa de
NK043(pi)001:2031: lta bu'i yon tan dang bkod par ldan pa der
NK043(pi)001:2032: / khyod bla med byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:2033: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2034: de nas rgyal bu bcu pa gangs kyi nor bu
NK043(pi)001:2035: zhes bya bas mi 'khrugs pa'i smon lam ji lta
NK043(pi)001:2036: ba bzhin du btab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2037: de bzhin gshegs pas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smon lam rgya chen po btab pa legs so //
NK043(pi)001:2038: gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi lag tu tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po bzhag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2039: bsam pa thag pas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa bskyed pas na /
NK043(pi)001:2040: khyod ni spos kyi glang po che zhes bya bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2041: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te /
NK043(pi)001:2042: dam pa'i chos nub nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2043: 'jig rten gyi khams der rdzogs pa'ii sangs rgyas gser
NK043(pi)001:2044: gyi me tog ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung
NK043(pi)001:2045: bstan to // rgyal bu bcu gcig pa seng ge
NK043(pi)001:2046: zhes bya bas spos kyi glang pos smon lam ji
NK043(pi)001:2047: lta ba bzhin du btab pa la /
NK043(pi)001:2048: de bzhin gshegs pas khyod ni rin po che'i tog ces bya ba ste /
NK043(pi)001:2049: mngon par dga' ba'i zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:2050: gser gyi me tog 'das pa'i 'og tu dam chos
NK043(pi)001:2051: nub nas bar gyi bskal ba gsum 'das pa na
NK043(pi)001:2052: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes
NK043(pi)001:2054: der khyod de bzhin gshegs pa glang po rnam par
NK043(pi)001:2055: bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya
NK043(pi)001:2056: ste khyod kyi zhing yang mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing gi
NK043(pi)001:2057: bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:2059: de nas mnyan des la sogs pa lnga brgyas byang
NK043(pi)001:2060: chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam dang
NK043(pi)001:2061: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzung ba ltar de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:2062: kyang bzung ba la de bzhin gshegs pas zhing gzhan
NK043(pi)001:2063: dang gzhan du bla med byang chub 'thob par lung
NK043(pi)001:2064: bstan to // rgyal bu bzhi brgyas rdo rje gcod
NK043(pi)001:2065: pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis yongs su bzung
NK043(pi)001:2066: ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur smon lam
NK043(pi)001:2067: btab pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
NK043(pi)001:2068: sangs rgyas su lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2069: de bzhin du rgyal bu dgu bcus kun tu bzang
NK043(pi)001:2070: pos smon lam ci btab pa ltar zhing bzung bas
NK043(pi)001:2071: de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:2072: // de bzhin du khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad so so nas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:2073: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag
NK043(pi)001:2074: bzung nas smon lam khyad par can btab pa dang
NK043(pi)001:2075: / srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
NK043(pi)001:2076: bye ba phrag gnyis kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:2077: bzung ste bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab
NK043(pi)001:2078: pa de thams cad 'jig rten gzhan dang gzhan du
NK043(pi)001:2079: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:2080: gshegs pas lung bstan par mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:2081: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:2082: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcen du gyur pa bcu po brgyad cu po dag gi thu bo //
NK043(pi)001:2083: bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag la /
NK043(pi)001:2084: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzin par bskul ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2085: des yab khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:2086: bu khyod kyis dang por smon lam thob dang kho bos phyis gdab par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:2088: des yab gcig sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin nam /
NK043(pi)001:2091: bram ze'i khye'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang
NK043(pi)001:2092: ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas zhing nyon mongs can
NK043(pi)001:2093: yongs su len par byed pa yin kyang khyod rang
NK043(pi)001:2095: de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar /
NK043(pi)001:2096: bdag skye rgu rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2097: byang chub dam pa 'thob pa de lta bur bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:2098: de dus kyi sems can rnams 'dod chags sogs chung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2099: 'khor bar skyo ba'i bsam pa can mang ba de
NK043(pi)001:2100: lta bu'i nang du sangs rgya bar smon lam btab
NK043(pi)001:2101: pa la / de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2102: bskal pa grangs med gang+g+aa'i klung gcig 'das pa'i rjes
NK043(pi)001:2103: pa la / su / bskal ba ut+pala yang dag rtogs ces bya ba la /
NK043(pi)001:2104: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar /
NK043(pi)001:2105: skye rgus lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2106: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa zhes
NK043(pi)001:2107: bya bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:2108: // de nas bram ze'i bu gnyis pa yang dag
NK043(pi)001:2109: 'byung ba sogs bu tha chung la thug gi bar
NK043(pi)001:2110: du bskal pa de nyid kyi sangs rgyas su lung
NK043(pi)001:2111: // bstan to // mdun na 'don gyi bu tha chung 'jigs pa'i gdung bral zhes bya bas ni /
NK043(pi)001:2112: gong gi bram ze'i khye'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po
NK043(pi)001:2113: lung bstan pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed kyi sku'i tshad
NK043(pi)001:2115: dge 'dun gyi grangs dang chos ston pa de snyed
NK043(pi)001:2116: kyi sku tshe dang 'dul ba sogs bsdoms pa de
NK043(pi)001:2117: lta bur 'gyur bar smon lam btab pa bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:2118: bskal ba ut+pala de zad kar de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:2119: rdul bral yang dag mngon 'phags zhes su 'gyur bar
NK043(pi)001:2120: lung bstan to // de nas bram ze de'i slob
NK043(pi)001:2121: ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga' ra ba'i sgo
NK043(pi)001:2123: rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u dag byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
NK043(pi)001:2124: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci
NK043(pi)001:2125: 'dod pa dag kyang longs shig ces bskul ba la
NK043(pi)001:2126: / bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:2129: spyod pa ji lta bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:2130: rjes su dran pa ji lta bus byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba lags /
NK043(pi)001:2132: bsod nams ye shes shes rab yang dag sgrub pa
NK043(pi)001:2133: ste mi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po la ma yin
NK043(pi)001:2135: byang chub chen po'i lam gyi basngagasa pa brjod pas /
NK043(pi)001:2136: bram ze'i khye'u des de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du
NK043(pi)001:2137: zhing snyigs ma can 'dir sangs rgya bar dam bcas
NK043(pi)001:2138: shing bden pa'i tshig gis lag pa gnyis su glang
NK043(pi)001:2139: po'i gtso bo dag byung ba'i rnam 'phrul dang bcas
NK043(pi)001:2141: de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas rin po chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:2142: gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:2143: lung bstan to // de bzhin du bram ze'i khye'u stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:2144: bram ze'i khye'u bye ba phrag gsum po dag gis
NK043(pi)001:2145: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla med rdzogs byang du
NK043(pi)001:2146: smon lam btab pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:2147: gshegs pa rin chen snying pos lung bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:2148: tha ma ni sangs rgyas rnam gzigs dang /
NK043(pi)001:2150: thams cad skyob kyi bar du 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:2151: bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de thams cad las
NK043(pi)001:2152: gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong zhig
NK043(pi)001:2153: yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba
NK043(pi)001:2154: / khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:2155: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:2156: ldan par sangs rgyas nas dug gsum bdo ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2157: can la chos ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2158: bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya bas /
NK043(pi)001:2159: kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:2160: ci zhig mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma
NK043(pi)001:2161: lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs pa lags /
NK043(pi)001:2162: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:2163: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:2164: dpa' gang yin pa de ni zhing snyigs ma lnga
NK043(pi)001:2165: dang ldan par byang chub 'thob par byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:2166: skyabs dang dpung gnyen med pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:2167: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:2168: khyab 'jug rlung khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus su shar
NK043(pi)001:2169: phyogs na ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i
NK043(pi)001:2170: 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal
NK043(pi)001:2171: po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:2172: // de nas bram ze'i khye'u stong gi dang por
NK043(pi)001:2173: bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gis sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:2174: zhing 'dir skye dgus tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa
NK043(pi)001:2175: na 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa la /
NK043(pi)001:2176: de bzhin gshegs pas mi mjed kyi zhing 'dir tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2177: sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig tu lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2178: de bzhin du bram ze'i bu gnyis pa nas brtsams
NK043(pi)001:2179: te dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu po thams cad
NK043(pi)001:2180: bskal pa bzang po 'di la so so'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:2181: bzhin du sum khri pa'i dus su gser thub dang
NK043(pi)001:2182: / rtsod dus kyi mtshan ma byung ba nyi khri'i dus su 'od srung dang /
NK043(pi)001:2183: yar 'phel ba'i rjes kyi brgyad khri pa'i dus su byams pa la sogs par lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2184: bram ze'i khye'u stong gi nang nas tha chung stobs
NK043(pi)001:2185: chen shugs 'chang gis ni bskal ba bzang po 'di'i
NK043(pi)001:2186: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing chos bzung nas
NK043(pi)001:2187: chos nub pa dang bskal pa'i snyigs ma rnams su
NK043(pi)001:2188: sems can la phan btags te de'i 'og tu sangs
NK043(pi)001:2189: rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de thams cad kyi sku
NK043(pi)001:2190: tshe dang chos ston pa sogs bsdoms pa'i phrin las
NK043(pi)001:2192: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la bslab pa 'chal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2193: ma gus pa dang 'phags pa la skur pa btab
NK043(pi)001:2194: pa sogs bgyis pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas 'dis 'khor
NK043(pi)001:2195: ba'i 'dam las 'byin cing myang 'das kyi grong khyer
NK043(pi)001:2196: du 'jug par byed pa la sogs par smon lam
NK043(pi)001:2198: khye'u de la sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa zhes bya bar ming btags te /
NK043(pi)001:2199: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi tha mar mos
NK043(pi)001:2200: pa snang mdzad dam gsal mdzad ces bya ba'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:2202: de la bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis basngagasa pa
NK043(pi)001:2203: brjod cing da phan chad kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya
NK043(pi)001:2204: mi dgos kyis ji ltar bde bar spyod cig /
NK043(pi)001:2206: yang bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bsnyen bkur ba
NK043(pi)001:2207: bram ze'i khye'u lnga po la so sor rin po
NK043(pi)001:2208: che'i rgyan la sogs pa byin nas sems bskyed du
NK043(pi)001:2209: bcug pas de bzhin gshegs pas so so nas sangs
NK043(pi)001:2211: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:2212: ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dir /
NK043(pi)001:2213: bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
NK043(pi)001:2214: mang po la bla med byang chub 'dzin du bcug
NK043(pi)001:2215: cing / thams cad kyis smon lam rgya che rgu
NK043(pi)001:2216: btab ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag cing
NK043(pi)001:2217: dwang ba sha stag bzung ste /
NK043(pi)001:2218: khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:2219: gzhan dag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus spangs pas na
NK043(pi)001:2220: / bdag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2221: sems can nams chos kyi mgron du gnyer ba'i brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:2222: bdag gis ci nas 'khor 'di dang lha la sogs
NK043(pi)001:2223: pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bdag la phyag 'tshal zhing
NK043(pi)001:2225: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin cing basngagasa pa brjod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2226: phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:2227: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:2228: de dag kyang / rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshe zhing
NK043(pi)001:2229: nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub
NK043(pi)001:2230: yongs su 'dzin zhing sems can phongs pa rnams skyob
NK043(pi)001:2231: pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2232: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal
NK043(pi)001:2233: pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du phyogs bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:2234: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su basngagasa pa brjod cing
NK043(pi)001:2235: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi
NK043(pi)001:2236: smon lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:2237: de thos nas ngo mtshar zhing snying rje chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:2238: smon lam gyi tshul de lta bu 'dzin par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:2239: ba'i phyir na / bdag gis smon lam gyi seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:2240: mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de /
NK043(pi)001:2241: chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:2242: de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig gis sil
NK043(pi)001:2243: snyan 'khrol zhing me tog gi char phab nas skyes
NK043(pi)001:2244: bu dam pa legs so zhes basngagasa pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2245: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kun gyis kyang thal
NK043(pi)001:2246: mo sbyar te tshig mthun par skyes bu dam pa
NK043(pi)001:2247: legs so // mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la
NK043(pi)001:2248: phan par mdzad pa khyod kyis smon lam brtan por
NK043(pi)001:2249: legs so // thob cig / bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:2250: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdun na
NK043(pi)001:2251: 'don gyis pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2252: mod la / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog
NK043(pi)001:2253: gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:2254: khams ji tsam pa de thams cad g.yos shing rab
NK043(pi)001:2255: mod la / tu g.yos la / sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar 'khrol /
NK043(pi)001:2256: bya dang ri dwags thams cad 'jam pa'i sgra sgrogs /
NK043(pi)001:2257: ljon pa thams cad las me tog 'bul /
NK043(pi)001:2258: 'jig rten 'di'i ngan song rnams rgyun chad cing byams pa'i sems su gyur /
NK043(pi)001:2259: nam mkhar rgyu ba rnams kyis me tog sogs kyis mchod par byed /
NK043(pi)001:2260: 'og min gyi bar gyi lha thams cad bram ze'i smon lam mnyan pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:2261: 'dzam bu'i gling du bab ste nam mkha'i dkyil na
NK043(pi)001:2262: 'khod cing lha'i spos dang ras bcos bu'i bar dag
NK043(pi)001:2263: gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:2264: de nas bram ze des thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa la /
NK043(pi)001:2265: bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:2266: gzugs kyi 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste //
NK043(pi)001:2267: rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing //
NK043(pi)001:2268: rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:2269: zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la seng ge 'dra //
NK043(pi)001:2270: mi 'gul brtan pa lhun po 'dra ba ste //
NK043(pi)001:2271: rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrugs pa mi mnga' zhing //
NK043(pi)001:2272: yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod //
NK043(pi)001:2273: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa sngon du btang nas gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:2274: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags bye
NK043(pi)001:2275: ba khrag khrig mang po dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:2277: de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya
NK043(pi)001:2278: che rgu dag yongs su bzung zhing gdul bya'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2279: can kyang bsam pa dag pa /
NK043(pi)001:2281: gdul sla ba dag bzung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:2282: gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:2283: khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po 'di
NK043(pi)001:2284: dag ni / de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por sangs rgyas su lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2285: skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang /
NK043(pi)001:2286: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang nga rgyal la spyod
NK043(pi)001:2287: pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar
NK043(pi)001:2289: 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2290: rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas /
NK043(pi)001:2291: de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2292: dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2295: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba /
NK043(pi)001:2298: dge sbyong dang bram zer mi 'dzin pa /
NK043(pi)001:2299: bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa /
NK043(pi)001:2300: bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa /
NK043(pi)001:2301: dge bcu'i lam dang bral ba /
NK043(pi)001:2302: 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba /
NK043(pi)001:2303: legs par spyod pa gsum po don du mi gnyer ba /
NK043(pi)001:2304: nyes par spyod pa gsum po la zhugs pa /
NK043(pi)001:2305: mkhas pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa /
NK043(pi)001:2306: srid pa'i btson rar chud cing rgyun phyogs su 'das pa /
NK043(pi)001:2308: gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa /
NK043(pi)001:2310: nyam nga chen po thob pa rnams spangs lags te /
NK043(pi)001:2311: mi mjed 'di'i bskal pa bzang po 'dir tshe lo
NK043(pi)001:2312: bcu thub pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad ni
NK043(pi)001:2313: skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis kyang spangs pas
NK043(pi)001:2314: / de dag ni srid pa'i dba' klong na /
NK043(pi)001:2315: 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor du chud de skyabs dang dpung gnyen med la /
NK043(pi)001:2316: rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bzang zhing dag la /
NK043(pi)001:2317: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can bsam pa
NK043(pi)001:2318: dag cing 'dul sla ba rnams yongs su bzung ba
NK043(pi)001:2319: ma lags sam / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:2320: bram ze de de bzhin te /
NK043(pi)001:2321: sems can rang rang gi bsam pa ji lta ba
NK043(pi)001:2322: bzhin du smon lam 'debs shing sangs rgyas kyis zhing
NK043(pi)001:2323: bkod pa yang yongs su bzung ba rnams ngas kyang
NK043(pi)001:2324: de nyid du lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:2326: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dper na shing
NK043(pi)001:2327: king shu ka'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 'dar zhing
NK043(pi)001:2328: bdag gi yid ni skyo la lus thams cad sha
NK043(pi)001:2330: bcom ldan 'das gal te de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing /
NK043(pi)001:2331: rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyis mun par 'phangs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2332: sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas su 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:2333: ba lta na / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
NK043(pi)001:2334: bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas /
NK043(pi)001:2335: gnyis pa la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2336: bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu'i tshe lo
NK043(pi)001:2337: stong thub pa na sdod cing bdag yun ring po
NK043(pi)001:2338: de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa
NK043(pi)001:2339: na 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2340: / bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun
NK043(pi)001:2341: ring po na smin cing gdul ba'i sems can mthong
NK043(pi)001:2342: nas yongs su 'dzin par spro zhing phar phyin drug
NK043(pi)001:2343: la spyod pas yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ste /
NK043(pi)001:2344: bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po'i mtshan ma yongs su
NK043(pi)001:2345: btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
NK043(pi)001:2346: pa lags so zhes gsungs pa de lta bu'i sbyin
NK043(pi)001:2347: pa'i phar phyin la spyad par bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:2348: tshe rabs gzhan na slong mo ba dpag tu med pa dag mchis na /
NK043(pi)001:2349: de dag la zas dang skom dang gnas dang /
NK043(pi)001:2351: rgyal mtshan dang rin po che la sogs pa ji
NK043(pi)001:2352: 'dod pa gtong ba na mchog tu dga' zhing snying
NK043(pi)001:2353: rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'dod par sems can
NK043(pi)001:2354: la stsal nas sems can de yongs su smin par
NK043(pi)001:2355: bgyi ba dang / sems can de dag la phan
NK043(pi)001:2356: gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs
NK043(pi)001:2358: gal te yang gtong bar dka' ba slong ba /
NK043(pi)001:2363: yan lag dang dbang po rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2364: pags pa dang sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2365: mgo dang lus dang srog kyang mchog tu dga' ba'i
NK043(pi)001:2366: snying rje'i yid kyis sems can la phan gdags pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2367: slad du byin par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2368: gang sngon chad sus kyang de lta bu'i gtong ba ma byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2369: slan chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rdzogs byang gi
NK043(pi)001:2370: phyir du spyad pa spyod pa na de lta bu
NK043(pi)001:2371: gtong bar mi 'gyur ba lta bu'i sbyin pa yongs
NK043(pi)001:2373: de ltar tshe rabs gzhan na bskal pa grangs ma
NK043(pi)001:2374: mchis pa de dag tu byang chub kyi phyir sbyin
NK043(pi)001:2375: pa'i phar phyin la spyod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2376: gzhan de la dgod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2377: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs sna tshogs kyis dka' ba spyod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2378: yul rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2379: bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bzod pa'i phar phyin sgom pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2380: 'dus byas thams cad dben pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2381: 'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar bsgom pa la brtson par bya zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2382: bla na med pa'i spyod pa las slar mi ldog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2383: 'du byed thams cad la phyin ci log spangs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2384: slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i bsam gtan
NK043(pi)001:2386: rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa shes rab kyi phar phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:2387: sngon chad dang slad nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:2388: dag gis de ltar spro ba brtan po'i shugs kyis
NK043(pi)001:2389: shes rab kyi phar phyin la spyod par dka' ba
NK043(pi)001:2390: de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2391: slad ma'i byang sems snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:2392: pa rnams tshul gyi yon tan la dgod pa dang
NK043(pi)001:2393: bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i
NK043(pi)001:2394: byang sems rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par
NK043(pi)001:2395: gyur cig / bla na med pa'i mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:2396: 'das pa'i bar du byang sems rnams ngo mtshar du
NK043(pi)001:2397: 'dzin pa'i slad du bdag spyin pa dang tshul khrims
NK043(pi)001:2398: sogs la rloms sems dang gnas sogs ma mchis par
NK043(pi)001:2400: sems can 'phags nor dang bral zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2401: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2402: chos spong ba mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs
NK043(pi)001:2403: pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa /
NK043(pi)001:2404: lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:2405: kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro
NK043(pi)001:2406: ba brtan po'i shugs kyis phar phyin rnams spyod par
NK043(pi)001:2407: gyur cig / bdag gis sems can re re'i don
NK043(pi)001:2408: du de'i rgyud la dge ba'i sa bon bzhag pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2409: slad du bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can
NK043(pi)001:2410: dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
NK043(pi)001:2411: dang du len pa la spro bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2414: gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2415: mi dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la yang spro bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2416: ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la
NK043(pi)001:2417: dge ba'i sa bon 'jog pa ltar sems can thams
NK043(pi)001:2418: cad la yang de bzhin du gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2419: tshangs pa stong pa lta bu dang sems kyi rgyud
NK043(pi)001:2420: tshig pa'i dul ba de lta bu dag yongs su
NK043(pi)001:2422: bdag srid pa tha ma pa la byang chub tu
NK043(pi)001:2423: 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba gcig
NK043(pi)001:2424: gis thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas na dus la
NK043(pi)001:2425: sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs par /
NK043(pi)001:2426: bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du yang lha'i bde ba skye
NK043(pi)001:2427: ba dag don du mi gnyer bar bdag gis yun
NK043(pi)001:2428: ring po de srid du 'khor ba 'dir sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:2429: bcom ldan 'das zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi grangs
NK043(pi)001:2430: snyed dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas /
NK043(pi)001:2431: sangs rgyas re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:2432: gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi mchod pa sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:2434: sangs rgyas re re las kyang zhing gi rdul snyed kyi yon tan rtogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2435: zhing gi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang bla med byang chub 'dzin du stsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2436: nyan rang gi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:2437: rang gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du so
NK043(pi)001:2439: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis pa na bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:2440: drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge
NK043(pi)001:2441: bcu'i las lam la sbyor bar byed cing ting nge
NK043(pi)001:2442: 'dzin dang mngon shes la sbyor bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2443: sems can gang dag lta ba la chags shing /
NK043(pi)001:2444: dbang phyug chen po dang srid med kyi bu dang
NK043(pi)001:2445: zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshangs pa dang brgya
NK043(pi)001:2446: byin dang nam mkha' lding la sogs pa'i bar dag
NK043(pi)001:2448: bdag gis dbang phyug chen po sogs rang gang la
NK043(pi)001:2449: dad pa'i gzugs des dge ba rnams la sbyor bar
NK043(pi)001:2450: gyur cig / sems can ltogs pa rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bgyid pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2451: sdug bsngal ba rnams la rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2452: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yun ring po de srid
NK043(pi)001:2453: du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK043(pi)001:2454: yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po
NK043(pi)001:2455: che'i shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2456: yun ring por 'khor ba na sems can rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:2457: don du bdag gis gtum pa dang ba rang ba
NK043(pi)001:2458: dang mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dag
NK043(pi)001:2460: gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po la thug pa
NK043(pi)001:2461: na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:2462: pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya bar sangs rgyas pa
NK043(pi)001:2463: de'i tshe na bdag gis 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi
NK043(pi)001:2464: mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:2465: kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag
NK043(pi)001:2466: na / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor
NK043(pi)001:2467: lo bskor nas 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar
NK043(pi)001:2468: na / gyur cig / bdag gis sems can sems
NK043(pi)001:2469: kyi rgyud tshig pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
NK043(pi)001:2470: 'grogs pa dam pa'i chos spong ba sogs nyam nga
NK043(pi)001:2471: ba 'thob pa gang dag la bla med byang chub
NK043(pi)001:2473: sbyin sogs phar phyin la dgod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2474: sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang
NK043(pi)001:2475: bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la
NK043(pi)001:2476: 'jog cing ngan song las thar bar bgyis la /
NK043(pi)001:2477: shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyar nas /
NK043(pi)001:2478: sangs rgyas de dag gi zhing du 'bul bar byed
NK043(pi)001:2479: cing bla med rdzogs byang du lung bstan pa thob
NK043(pi)001:2480: par gyur cig / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang
NK043(pi)001:2481: bzod pa dag kyang thob la sa non par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2482: par gyur cig / cig / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:2483: gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin du 'jug cing de
NK043(pi)001:2484: dag gis kyang 'dzin par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2485: sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig sangs rgyas nas ring por
NK043(pi)001:2486: ma lags pa'i drung du mchis nas mchod pa sna
NK043(pi)001:2487: tshogs bgyis shing zhu ba zhus te rab tu 'byung
NK043(pi)001:2488: ba dang / tshul khrims dang thos pa dang ting
NK043(pi)001:2489: nge 'dzin la mngon par brtson cing chos kyi mchog
NK043(pi)001:2490: ba dang / ston pa dang / sems can nyam nga thob pa lam ngan pas bcom pa /
NK043(pi)001:2491: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2492: sems can 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2493: rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe na bdag
NK043(pi)001:2494: lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid
NK043(pi)001:2495: par 'gyur zhing / skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya
NK043(pi)001:2496: par 'gyur gyi bar du bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
NK043(pi)001:2497: po gsum la sbyor bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2498: dus de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du
NK043(pi)001:2499: mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston pas 'dul ba
NK043(pi)001:2501: sems can rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:2502: bde ba dang dbang phyug dang rigs dang gzugs kyi
NK043(pi)001:2503: dregs pas myos shing ser sna can du gyur te
NK043(pi)001:2504: / snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud pa'i sems can 'dod chags sogs nyon mongs shin tu bdo ba /
NK043(pi)001:2507: dam pa'i chos spong ba sogs mi dge ba'i phyogs dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:2508: legs spyod dang dge ba'i phyogs nyams pa /
NK043(pi)001:2509: ngo tsha dang khrel med pa /
NK043(pi)001:2510: nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa /
NK043(pi)001:2511: mdog ngan pa mi sdug pa /
NK043(pi)001:2512: lta bas gzengs pa sogs nyes pa rgya cher bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:2513: dus der na ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang gsod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2514: dgra dang tsha grang dang bkres skom ngal dub la
NK043(pi)001:2515: sogs pa'i mi snyan pa'i sgra phan tshun du thos
NK043(pi)001:2516: par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams der sems can dge rtsa nyams pa /
NK043(pi)001:2517: dge ba'i bshes kyis spangs pa /
NK043(pi)001:2518: sdang sems dang ldan pa dag gis kun tu gtams par 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:2519: sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i zhing du /
NK043(pi)001:2520: dge ba'i phyogs kyis bor zhing mi dge ba rnams
NK043(pi)001:2521: dang 'grogs te mun khrod nas mun khrod du 'khyams
NK043(pi)001:2522: pa'i sems can de dag de'i tshe na las kyi
NK043(pi)001:2523: rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal ba bzang po der
NK043(pi)001:2524: lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:2525: lags so // sems can de dag gi las kyis
NK043(pi)001:2526: mi mjed kyang dge rtsa dang ldan pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:2528: sa gzhi ba tsh+wa can dang /
NK043(pi)001:2529: gseg ma dang rdul dang rad rod can du 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:2530: sha sbrang sogs dang sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pas gang zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2531: dus min par rdul gyis 'khrigs pa'i rlung ldang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2532: dus min du ro ma mchis pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2535: lo thog dang sman dang rtsi shing 'bras bu bza' btung longs spyod rnams kyang ngan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2537: rtsub pa dang dug dang 'dres par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:2538: sems can de dag gis de la spyod pas rgyud rtsub cing khro ba dang 'jungs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2540: gcig la gcig 'tshe bar byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:2541: sha dang khrag dang ri dwags kyi pags pa 'dod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2542: mtshon cha thogs nas srog chags 'gum pa la btson zhing /
NK043(pi)001:2543: rta rtsal dang mda' gzhu dang mtshon cha dang 'jig
NK043(pi)001:2544: rten gyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs ngan pa sna
NK043(pi)001:2545: tshogs la brtson par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:2546: bdag gdul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
NK043(pi)001:2547: ba yongs su smin pa'i slad du dga' ldan gyi
NK043(pi)001:2549: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyud khyad par du 'phags
NK043(pi)001:2550: pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i rigs su btsun mo dam
NK043(pi)001:2551: pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:2552: par gyur cig / de'i tshe mi mjed 'di 'og
NK043(pi)001:2553: min nas gser gyi sa gzhi'i bar du snang ba
NK043(pi)001:2554: chen pos khyab par bgyis te /
NK043(pi)001:2555: ngan song gsum dang lha mir skyes pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:2556: kyis snang ba chen po de mthong zhing reg la
NK043(pi)001:2557: kun shes te / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yid
NK043(pi)001:2558: byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa
NK043(pi)001:2559: kun shes te / 'dod cing / tha na nyon
NK043(pi)001:2560: mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba de'i sems bskyed par
NK043(pi)001:2561: kun shes te / 'dod cing / byas te /
NK043(pi)001:2562: dang por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di yang skyed
NK043(pi)001:2563: kun shes te / 'dod cing / byas te /
NK043(pi)001:2564: par gyur cig / bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul
NK043(pi)001:2565: la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2567: bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston cing sems mnyam par
NK043(pi)001:2568: bzhag nas zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par
NK043(pi)001:2569: gyur cig / bdag gis sangs rgyas thob nas 'khor
NK043(pi)001:2570: ba las thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:2571: de dag gis bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na
NK043(pi)001:2572: nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la
NK043(pi)001:2573: sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyil mo krung gis 'dug
NK043(pi)001:2575: zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:2576: thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:2577: gyis mi mjed 'di 'og min nas gser gyi sa
NK043(pi)001:2578: gzhi'i bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yo zhing sems
NK043(pi)001:2579: can thams cad rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2580: cig / bdag ma'i mchan khung g.yas pa nas mngon
NK043(pi)001:2581: par 'byung ba'i tshe yang mi mjed 'di snang ba
NK043(pi)001:2582: chen pos khyab cing sems can rnams la yang dag
NK043(pi)001:2584: dge rtsa ma bskyed pa rnams la myang 'das kyi sa bon 'debs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2585: myang 'das kyi sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:2586: kyi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu skyed
NK043(pi)001:2587: par gyur cig / gang gi tshe bdag gi rkang
NK043(pi)001:2588: mthil sa la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mi
NK043(pi)001:2589: mjed kyis gzhi gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2590: bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yo 'gul 'khrugs la
NK043(pi)001:2591: par gyur cig / / de'i tshe skye gnas bzhir
NK043(pi)001:2592: gtogs shing 'gro ba lnga la brten pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:2593: par gyur cig / / / chu dang sa dang
NK043(pi)001:2594: nam mkha' la brten pa thams cad rab tu sad
NK043(pi)001:2595: par gyur cig / / / par byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:2596: gang gi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu
NK043(pi)001:2597: ma skyes pa rnams kyang skyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2598: ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu brtan par gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:2599: rnams ni theg pa gsum gyi phyir mi ldog pa
NK043(pi)001:2601: bdag btsas ma thag tu zhing mi mjed de'i tshangs chen dang /
NK043(pi)001:2606: lha min gyi dbang po rnams dang gnod sbyin dang /
NK043(pi)001:2608: klu dang lha min rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad
NK043(pi)001:2609: bdag la mchod pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar
NK043(pi)001:2610: gyur cig / bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2611: bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags
NK043(pi)001:2612: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2613: 'khor gang lags pa de theg pa gsum po dag
NK043(pi)001:2614: gis rab tu dang ba thob pa de lta bu'i
NK043(pi)001:2616: 'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2617: can srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams bdag
NK043(pi)001:2619: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2620: can de dag gis rnam par snang byed me tog
NK043(pi)001:2621: gi bzod pa thob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2622: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2623: pa'i sems can de thams cad rdo rje'i ting nge
NK043(pi)001:2624: 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par
NK043(pi)001:2625: gyur cig / ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2626: gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid par 'tshal na /
NK043(pi)001:2627: klu'i rgyal po chen po khyad par du 'phags pa
NK043(pi)001:2628: gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag la khrus
NK043(pi)001:2630: sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khru bar mthong ba
NK043(pi)001:2631: de thams cad theg pa gsum po dag gis ji
NK043(pi)001:2632: skad smros pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag mngon
NK043(pi)001:2634: sems can gang dag gis bdag shing rta la 'dug pa mthong bar gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2635: de bzhin du bdag gzhon nu rtse ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2636: bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas dang /
NK043(pi)001:2637: skad sna tshogs ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2639: bud med rnams kyi gan du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2640: gang du rtsed mos yid byung nas nam phyed na mngon par byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:2641: rgyan dang lhab lhub spangs nas gos dmar po dang /
NK043(pi)001:2642: chos gos ngur smrig yongs su tshol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2643: byang chub kyi shing drung du nye bar bgrod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2644: slad du mchi ba mthong ba'i sems can de thams
NK043(pi)001:2645: cad theg pa gsum la 'dun pa drag cing brtson
NK043(pi)001:2646: par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston pa dang
NK043(pi)001:2647: / ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang byed me tog
NK043(pi)001:2648: thob pa sogs gong na smros pa bzhin tu 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:2649: / ba dang / bdag nyid kyis stan bting ba bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:2650: byang chub kyi shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan bshams
NK043(pi)001:2651: pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por
NK043(pi)001:2652: bsrangs te / dbugs 'byung rngub nye bar zhi ba
NK043(pi)001:2653: de lta bu'i mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan sgom par
NK043(pi)001:2654: bsrangs te / gyur cig / bdag gdugs la lan gcig bsam gtan las ldang bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2655: langs nas kyang zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed cig 'tshal ba la /
NK043(pi)001:2656: phyed ni slong mo pa la stsol bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2657: zhing mi mjed 'di'i 'og min pa'i bar gyi lha
NK043(pi)001:2658: ji snyed pa thams cad bdag la mchod pa'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:2659: nye bar mchi bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2660: de dag thams cad kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du gyur ba de srid du /
NK043(pi)001:2661: bdag lta bu'i dka' ba spyod par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2662: de na gang dag nyam thos kyi theg pa ba
NK043(pi)001:2663: rnams nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2664: / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:2665: bdag gis 'dul ba'i srid pa tha ma par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2666: / cig / de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin lha ma yin la sogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2667: mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:2668: bdag la mchod pa'i slad du mchi zhing de thams
NK043(pi)001:2669: cad dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:2670: theg pa so sor smin par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2671: gling bzhi pa 'di na mu stegs can brtul zhugs
NK043(pi)001:2672: dang dka' thub ngan pas dka' ba spyod pa de
NK043(pi)001:2673: dag la mi ma yin pa dag gis khyed cag
NK043(pi)001:2674: dka' ba spyod pa min te /
NK043(pi)001:2675: phyogs 'di na byang sems srid pa tha ma pa
NK043(pi)001:2676: dka' ba 'di ltar spyod pa de ni mthu che
NK043(pi)001:2677: zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:2678: gal te yid mi ches na dengs la ltos shig ces bsgo bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2679: de dag gis kyang dka' ba spyod pa btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:2680: bdag dka' ba spyod pa mthong nas nyan thos kyi
NK043(pi)001:2681: theg pa sogs rang rang gi skal ba bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:2682: smin par byed par gyur cig /
