NK043(pi)001:2683: mi'i rgyal po rnams dang bkrabs pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2684: grong khyim gyi mi rnams kyang bdag dka' ba spyod
NK043(pi)001:2685: pa'i drung du mchi zhing theg pa gsum la smin
NK043(pi)001:2686: par gyur cig / bud med gang bdag lta ba'i
NK043(pi)001:2687: slad du mchis pa de dag bud med kyi lus
NK043(pi)001:2688: kyi tha mar gyur cing theg pa gsum la skal
NK043(pi)001:2689: ba bzhin du dgod par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2690: bya dang ri dwags sogs kyis mthong na dud 'gro'i
NK043(pi)001:2691: lus kyi tha mar gyur cing theg pa gsum la
NK043(pi)001:2692: smin pa dang / de bzhin du yi dwags rnams la yang brjod par bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:2693: ji srid du sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
NK043(pi)001:2694: phrag mang pos bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du
NK043(pi)001:2695: 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa dpag med mchis
NK043(pi)001:2696: pa de dag gi rgyud la thar ba'i sa bon
NK043(pi)001:2697: bskyed pa'i yun ring po de srid du bdag skyil
NK043(pi)001:2698: mo krung gcig gis dka' ba spyod par gyur te
NK043(pi)001:2699: / sngon chad sems can du bgrangs pa gzhan mu stegs can dang /
NK043(pi)001:2700: nyan rang byang sems sus kyang de ltar ma spyad la /
NK043(pi)001:2701: slan chad kyang sus spyad par rngo mi thogs pa
NK043(pi)001:2702: de lta bu'i bka' ba bdag gis spyod par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2703: cig / bdag gis bla med byang chub ma thob
NK043(pi)001:2704: pa de'i tshe skyes bu'i rtsal bgyid cing bdud dpung
NK043(pi)001:2705: gi tshogs dang bcas pa pham par bgyid par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2706: cig / cig / las kyi 'bras bu'i lhag ma
NK043(pi)001:2707: dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bdud las rgyal zhing
NK043(pi)001:2708: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:2710: ci nas kyang bdag sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2711: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2712: bzhi pa la yang chos ston cing sems rgyud la dgra bcom pa 'jog par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2713: sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du yang bdag
NK043(pi)001:2714: cho 'phrul 'bum phrag du ma ston cing de'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2715: kyi rgyud la yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2716: chos kyi don dang tshig 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyang rjod par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2717: ji ltar rngo thogs pa'i 'bras bu la 'jog par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2718: sems can rnams kyi sems rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2719: ri bo dag ye shes rdo rjes 'joms par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2720: cig / theg pa rnam pa gsum la dgod pas chos ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2721: sems can gcig gi don du chos ston cing mi
NK043(pi)001:2722: 'jigs pa'i go 'phang la rab tu 'god pa'i slad
NK043(pi)001:2723: du / dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dag tu rkang bas mchi bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2724: bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:2725: nyam chung ba dran pa nyams pa sems rnam par 'khrul ba /
NK043(pi)001:2726: mu cor smra ba spyi brtol can gyi sems dang /
NK043(pi)001:2728: nyon mongs mang pos dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2729: bud med kyang rab tu 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2730: bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /
NK043(pi)001:2733: dge bsnyen ma dag mchis par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2734: skye bo mang po dag gis bdag gi bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2735: lha rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2736: gnod sbyin dang klu dang lha ma yin rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:2737: 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:2739: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2740: bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa na sems
NK043(pi)001:2741: can gang dag bdag la rab tu sdang ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2744: lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'debs su mchi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2746: barlanga po dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:2747: dang phyogs dang mtshams su mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs
NK043(pi)001:2749: dug dang 'dres pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag
NK043(pi)001:2750: stob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras
NK043(pi)001:2751: bu yongs su ma zad pa la gnas nas bdag
NK043(pi)001:2752: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2753: / bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can sngon
NK043(pi)001:2754: gyi 'khon gyis 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi sbyor bas
NK043(pi)001:2755: bdag la tshig rtsub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2757: dug dang 'dres pa'i btung ba dag sbyin zhing khrag
NK043(pi)001:2758: kyang 'byin pa'i sems can de dag la bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:2759: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2761: snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs
NK043(pi)001:2762: kyi rnga sgra bsgrags pas de dag gi sems rab
NK043(pi)001:2763: tu dang bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston cing
NK043(pi)001:2764: dge ba la sbyor bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2765: sems can de dag las kyi sgrib pa 'chag par 'gyur zhing slan chad sdom pa len pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2766: las de sems can de dag gi mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:2767: chags bral dang zag zad la sgrib pa'i chos su ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2768: der bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu yang yongs su
NK043(pi)001:2769: zad cing mthar thug pa dang byang bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2770: / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob
NK043(pi)001:2771: nas kyang gdugs re re bzhin du bdag gi ba
NK043(pi)001:2772: spu'i khang bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs
NK043(pi)001:2773: rgyas kyi sku mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis
NK043(pi)001:2774: dang dpe byad bzar po brgyad cus brgyan pa dag
NK043(pi)001:2775: / sprul zhing / sku de dag sangs rgyas kyis zhing sangs rgyas kyis stong pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2776: stong pa ma yin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2777: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i zhing dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2778: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gis kyang
NK043(pi)001:2779: gdugs gcig la zhing de dag na sems can gang
NK043(pi)001:2783: mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:2784: nyan rang theg chen la zhugs pa dag bslab pa 'dren mar bgyid pa /
NK043(pi)001:2786: ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba /
NK043(pi)001:2789: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par zhugs shing lam ngan pas
NK043(pi)001:2790: rnam par bcom ste nyam nga ba chen po thob
NK043(pi)001:2791: par gyur pa de lta bu'i sems can bye ba
NK043(pi)001:2792: du ma la chos ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2793: gang dag dbang phyug chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:2794: sred med kyi bu sogs la dad pa rnams la
NK043(pi)001:2795: yang de dang de'i gzugs kyis chos ston par byed
NK043(pi)001:2796: cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du des
NK043(pi)001:2797: bdag gi basngagasa pa brjod pas sems can de dag
NK043(pi)001:2799: bdag gi basngagasa pa thos nas bdag gi zhing du
NK043(pi)001:2800: skye bar 'dod cing smon lam 'debs par gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2801: / de lta bu'i sems can de dag 'gum pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2802: dus kyi tshe bdag de'i mdun du ma mchis sam
NK043(pi)001:2804: sems rab tu dang bar ma bgyis na bdag bla
NK043(pi)001:2805: med rdzogs byang du 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2806: / gal te sems can de dag gums nas ngan
NK043(pi)001:2807: 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'am bdag gi sangs
NK043(pi)001:2808: rgyas kyi zhing du mi'i lus thob par ma gyur
NK043(pi)001:2809: / na / bdag gi chos thams cad nyams par
NK043(pi)001:2810: gyur cing bdag slar yang snang bar ma gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:2811: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub
NK043(pi)001:2812: par yang rdo mi thogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2813: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na
NK043(pi)001:2814: mtshams med bgyid cing lam ngan pas bcom pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2815: can dag gums nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skye
NK043(pi)001:2816: bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ni 'di dag lags te
NK043(pi)001:2817: / sems can de dag kha dog rdul lta bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:2823: nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2824: yo byad rnams kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
NK043(pi)001:2825: sems can de dag gi don du bdag de'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:2826: na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi gling bzhi
NK043(pi)001:2827: pa ji snyed cig mchis pa de thams cad du
NK043(pi)001:2828: / yongs su dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'bab cing ma'i mngal du skye ba ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2829: rgya cher bgyi na gzhon nu rtse ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2830: bzo dang las kyi gnas dang /
NK043(pi)001:2833: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2834: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag nye bar ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2835: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2836: sku gdung 'god pa'i bar dag kyang nye bar ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2837: bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig brjod pas chos ston par 'gyur ba na /
NK043(pi)001:2838: nyan rang theg chen gyis gdul ba'i sems can so
NK043(pi)001:2839: sor rang rang gi theg pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal
NK043(pi)001:2840: ba dang / tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can gyis sbyin pa'i gtam dang /
NK043(pi)001:2841: bsod nams bral zhing mtho ris 'dod pas tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /
NK043(pi)001:2842: phan tshun 'jigs sdang rnyogs pa'i sems can gyis byams pa brjod pa'i gtam dang /
NK043(pi)001:2843: de bzhin du srog gcod pa rnams kyis snying rje bstan pa /
NK043(pi)001:2844: phrag dog dang ser snas non pa rnams kyis dga' ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2845: gzugs gzugs med kyi dregs pas myos pas btang snyoms brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2846: 'dod pa la 'dod chags pas myos pas yang dag pa ma nyes dmigs pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2849: theg pa chen pos rgod pas sems dkrug pa rnams kyis dbugs 'byung rngub dran pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2850: shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis rten 'brel brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2851: thos pa nyung ba rnams kyis brjed pa med cing thos pa chud mi za ba /
NK043(pi)001:2852: lta ba ngan pas nyam ngar gyur pas stong pa nyid /
NK043(pi)001:2853: rnam rtog kun tu spyod pa rnams kyis mtshan ma med pa /
NK043(pi)001:2854: smon med yongs su dag pa las nyams pa rnams kyis smon pa med pa /
NK043(pi)001:2855: bsam pa ma dag pa rnams kyis bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i chos brjod pa bstan pa /
NK043(pi)001:2856: rnam par 'dres par spyad pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa /
NK043(pi)001:2857: zad pa'i sbyor ba drod nyams pa rnams kyis bcos ma min pa'i chos brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2858: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa nyams pa
NK043(pi)001:2859: rnams kyis rten pa ma mchis pa brjod pa'i chos
NK043(pi)001:2861: de ltar sems can cis 'dul ba'i chos de dang de nyid bstan par shes par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2862: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pas dge ba'i sems brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2863: dge ba mi bskyud pa rnams kyis rnam par snang byed brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2864: bdud las la brtson pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2865: don dam la zhugs pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2866: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems nyams pa rnams kyis bral ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2867: lam mi mnyam par zhugs pa rnams kyis rnam par ldog pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2868: theg chen la ngo mtshar du rtogs pa rnams kyis ni mi ldog pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2869: 'khor bas skyo ba'i byang sems kyis dga' ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2870: dge ba dang sa dang ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ma rmongs pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2871: dge rtsa gzhan dang gzhan gyis chog 'dzin rnams kyis thos pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2872: gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis 'od zer thogs pa med par brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2873: las dka' ba la zhugs pa rnams kyis bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2874: 'khor gyi 'jigs pa rnams kyis seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2875: bdud kyis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis dpa' ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2876: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa rnams kyis 'od bkod pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2877: rjes chags dang khong khro ba rnams kyis ri bo'i phung po brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2878: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas zil gyis non pa
NK043(pi)001:2879: rnams kyis rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa
NK043(pi)001:2880: / shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyi sgron ma dang ldan par brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2881: gti mug gi mun par mchi ba rnams kyis nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2882: zad pa'i nges tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2883: bdag la dpung dos pa lta bur 'tshal ba rnams kyis sred med kyi bu brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2884: blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis snying po dang ldan par brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2885: spyi gtsug ltar gda' ba rnams kyis lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2886: sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis snying po can brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2887: mngon par shes pa bsam pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2888: byang chub kyi snying por mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2889: chos thams cad la smon pa rnams kyis rdo rje lta bu brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2890: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa 'tshal ba rnams kyis spyod pa dang ldan pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2891: dbang po mchog dang mchog min 'tshal ba rnams kyis shes rab sgron ma brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2892: phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2893: chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2894: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis mig mi 'dzum pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2895: dmigs pa thams cad kyis 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2896: chos 'khor mngon par bskor bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2897: rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis /
NK043(pi)001:2898: rig pa la brten pa'i rjes su mthun pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2899: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pur ther zug tu lta
NK043(pi)001:2900: ba rnams kyis legs par bgyid pa rnam par 'byed
NK043(pi)001:2901: pa brjod pa / mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa
NK043(pi)001:2902: bon bskrun pa rnams kyis rgyan dang ldan pa brjod
NK043(pi)001:2903: pa brjod pa / pa / tshig dang sgra rab
NK043(pi)001:2904: tu 'byed par rdo mi thogs pa rnams kyis so
NK043(pi)001:2906: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba
NK043(pi)001:2907: rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs pa
NK043(pi)001:2909: da ltar gyi chos rnams la yang yang 'jug pa rnams kyis brtan pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2910: chos dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis mngon shes brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2911: shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis nyams pa ma mchis pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2912: lam 'khrugs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2913: nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal bas ci yang ma mchis pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2914: phar phyin yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis yongs su dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2915: bsdu ba'i dngos po ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis shin tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2916: tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshol ba rnams kyis sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2917: byang chub phyogs kyi rin po che yongs su ma
NK043(pi)001:2918: rdzogs pa rnams kyis rnam par gnas pas nges par
NK043(pi)001:2920: shes rab ma bsgoms shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:2921: dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya
NK043(pi)001:2922: brjod pa / mi skye ba'i bzod pa la ngo
NK043(pi)001:2923: mtshar du sems pa rnams kyis sems ma mchis par
NK043(pi)001:2924: brjod pa / brjod pa / ji ltar thos pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2925: chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:2926: kyis bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2927: phan tshun legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2928: dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis bsod nams che ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2929: chos kyi sgo'i char rab tu 'bab pas chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis chos kyi sprin brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2930: dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis rin chen bkod pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2931: shes pa nyams pa'i las la brtson pa rnams kyis dpe ma mchis par brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2932: kun tu sbyor ba dang 'ching ba can thams cad kyis nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2933: chos thams cad gzhan med par sems pa rnams kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2934: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongs su ma rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:2935: pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum
NK043(pi)001:2936: du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2937: sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas
NK043(pi)001:2938: pa rnams kyis rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod
NK043(pi)001:2939: pa / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo
NK043(pi)001:2940: gcig ston pa rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi tshul
NK043(pi)001:2941: pa / brjod pa / mdo sde thams cad la
NK043(pi)001:2942: rnam par nges pa rnams kyis chos kyi rang bzhin
NK043(pi)001:2943: mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod pa
NK043(pi)001:2944: pa / brjod pa / / rnying par snying po yin mchan /
NK043(pi)001:2945: 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs
NK043(pi)001:2946: pa rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa
NK043(pi)001:2947: / rnam par thar ba'i sems kyi theg pa la
NK043(pi)001:2948: brtson pa rnams kyis mngon par shes pas rnam par
NK043(pi)001:2950: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa
NK043(pi)001:2951: la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzhan gyi dring
NK043(pi)001:2953: byang sems kyi spyod pa la mi brtson pa rnams kyis ye shes thob pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2954: nye du la yang dag par rton pa rnams kyis thams cad kyi rjes su song ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2955: byang sems kyi spyod pa lhag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis dbang skur ba brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2956: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni mi choms pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2957: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis mi zad pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2958: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis mi 'phrog pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2959: mnyan pa dang lta ba don ma mchis pa rnams kyis smon lam brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2960: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum rjes su
NK043(pi)001:2961: rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyun 'khrugs pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:2962: kyis rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:2963: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas
NK043(pi)001:2964: pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs
NK043(pi)001:2965: rgyas brjod pa / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:2966: kyi dgongs pa ma thob pa rnams kyis mtha' ma
NK043(pi)001:2967: mchis pa dang thug pa ma mchis pa brjod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:2968: chos bstan pa 'tshal bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2969: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo dang sgyu ma
NK043(pi)001:2970: mchis la drang ba'i rang bzhin can theg chen la
NK043(pi)001:2971: yang dag par zhugs pa dpag med grangs med mchis
NK043(pi)001:2972: pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig
NK043(pi)001:2974: chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:2975: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:2976: gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po'i yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2977: des byang sems chen po rnams kyis go cha chen po 'tshal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2978: smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par 'phags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2979: bsam mi khyab pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:2980: byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:2981: de dag lus mtshan dang dpe byad dang /
NK043(pi)001:2982: ngag legs par smras pas sems can rnams kyi bsam
NK043(pi)001:2983: pa bzhin du mgu bar byed pas brgyan par gyur
NK043(pi)001:2984: cig / ting nge 'dzin tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du thos pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2985: gzungs bskyud pa ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2986: 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du
NK043(pi)001:2987: yid kyis brgyan cing mya ngan las 'das pas brgyan
NK043(pi)001:2988: pa dang / dam bcas pa brtan pa'i slad du bsam pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2989: dam bcas pa nyams su len pa'i slad du sbyor bas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2990: sa nas sar 'phar ba'i slad du lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2991: dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du spyin pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2992: legs par thos pa khong du chud pa dri ma
NK043(pi)001:2993: ma mchis pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa
NK043(pi)001:2994: dang / sems can kun la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa'i slad du bzod pas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2995: tshogs thams cad nye bar bsags pa'i slad du brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:2996: snyoms 'jug thams cad dang mngon par shes pas rnam
NK043(pi)001:2997: par rtse ba'i slad du bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa
NK043(pi)001:2998: dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongs su spong
NK043(pi)001:2999: bar 'tshal ba'i slad du shes rab kyis brgyan par
NK043(pi)001:3000: dang / gyur cig / sems can thams cad yang
NK043(pi)001:3001: dag par skyabs pa'i rjes su mchis pa'i slad du
NK043(pi)001:3003: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du snying rjes brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3004: chos thams cad la the tshom ma mchis par gyur pa'i slad du dga' bas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3005: mtho dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3006: mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse
NK043(pi)001:3007: ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang
NK043(pi)001:3008: / longs spyod mi zad pa'i rin po che'i lag
NK043(pi)001:3009: pa thob pa'i slad du bsod nams kyis brgyan pa
NK043(pi)001:3010: / dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
NK043(pi)001:3011: spyod pa mngon par 'tshal pa'i slad du ye shes
NK043(pi)001:3013: sems can thams cad kyi chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3014: shes rab kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3015: don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa
NK043(pi)001:3016: so so yang dag par rig pa thob ba'i slad
NK043(pi)001:3017: du so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan pa
NK043(pi)001:3018: dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad
NK043(pi)001:3019: zil gyis gnon pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas brgyan
NK043(pi)001:3020: dang / pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon
NK043(pi)001:3021: tan rjes su thob pa'i slad du yon tan gyis
NK043(pi)001:3022: dang / pa dang / brgyan pa dang / rtag
NK043(pi)001:3023: tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3024: spobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i slad
NK043(pi)001:3025: du chos kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3026: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i slad du snang bas brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3027: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i slad du 'od kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3028: khyad par lung ston pa'i slad du kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3029: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rjes su ston
NK043(pi)001:3030: pa'i slad du rjes su ston pa'i cho 'phrul gyis
NK043(pi)001:3031: brgyan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3032: pha rol tu son pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi
NK043(pi)001:3034: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3035: slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin
NK043(pi)001:3036: gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3037: gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3038: slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang
NK043(pi)001:3039: / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing
NK043(pi)001:3040: thams cad kyis mi chom pa'i slad du dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3041: chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas
NK043(pi)001:3043: theg chen la zhugs pa'i sems can dpag dang grangs
NK043(pi)001:3044: med pa la bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas dge
NK043(pi)001:3045: ba rnam par spyod pa yang dag bsags pa chen
NK043(pi)001:3047: der byang sems chen po de dag gis chos thams
NK043(pi)001:3048: cad la gzhan dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes
NK043(pi)001:3049: dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas
NK043(pi)001:3050: myur du bla med rdzogs byang du mngon par 'tshang
NK043(pi)001:3052: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na /
NK043(pi)001:3053: theg pa gsum la zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag mtshams med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3054: ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyis nongs par gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:3055: sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:3056: smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:3057: zhing du skye bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3058: sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa /
NK043(pi)001:3064: kun 'dzin pa'i rgyu can de dag la yang bdag
NK043(pi)001:3065: gis sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa
NK043(pi)001:3066: dang / sems can le lo can gyi bar dag
NK043(pi)001:3067: la bdag gis chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong ston
NK043(pi)001:3068: dang / pa dang / sems can theg pa chen
NK043(pi)001:3069: po pa dag la phar phyin drug rgya cher ston
NK043(pi)001:3070: dang / pa dang / pa dang / nyan rang gi theg pa pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:3071: dge rtsa ma bskrun cing bstan chos la mngon par dga' ba med pa de dag kyang /
NK043(pi)001:3072: gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la 'god cing /
NK043(pi)001:3073: slad kyis phar phyin drug la yang sbyor bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3074: rnam par 'tshe ba la dga' ba rnams srog gcod spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3075: 'dod pa mi bzad pas zin pa rnams ma byin len spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3076: chos min la chags pa rnams 'dod pa'i log g.yem spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3077: phan tshun rdzun tshig smra ba rnam rdzun smra ba spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3078: myos 'gyur la dga' ba rnams myos par 'gyur ba'i chang spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3079: sems can nyes pa lnga po bgyid pa rnams nongs
NK043(pi)001:3080: pa lnga spong ba'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la
NK043(pi)001:3082: sems can gang dag dge chos la mi dga' ba
NK043(pi)001:3083: dag nyin zhag gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3085: sems can dge rtsa chung ngu rnams la mos pa
NK043(pi)001:3086: rnams legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la sbyar
NK043(pi)001:3087: zhing rab tu byung ba'i bslab gzhi bcu'i tshangs spyod
NK043(pi)001:3089: dge chos yongs su tshol ba rnams dge ba'i chos
NK043(pi)001:3090: rnams bsgrubs nas tshangs par sbyor ba thams cad la
NK043(pi)001:3091: 'god pa dang / sems can mtshams med byed cing kun nas 'dzin pa'i rgyud can gyi don du /
NK043(pi)001:3092: bdag gis don dang tshig dang yi ge rnam pa
NK043(pi)001:3093: sna tshogs mang po dag gi cho 'phrul rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:3095: phung khams skye mched dag mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3098: bde dge zhi ba shes pa 'jigs pa med pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3099: grong khyer du mya ngan las 'das pa la rab
NK043(pi)001:3101: de ltar bdag gis dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing /
NK043(pi)001:3102: gang dag rtsod pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dag la
NK043(pi)001:3103: chos kyis brtsad pa'i bstan bcos rab tu ston pa
NK043(pi)001:3104: dang / dge chos la mi dga' ba de dag la zhal ta bgyid pa'i las ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3105: kha ton la dga' ba rnams la stong pa nyid
NK043(pi)001:3106: kyi bsam gtan gyi cha gcig gis rnams par grol
NK043(pi)001:3107: ba'i lam ston pa dang sems can re re'i don
NK043(pi)001:3108: du yang bdag dpag tshad 'bum phrag mang por sug
NK043(pi)001:3109: pas mchi zhing / don tshig yi ge thabs dang
NK043(pi)001:3110: cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag gis skyo ba med par
NK043(pi)001:3112: myang 'das kyi bar la 'god par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3113: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bdag gi tshe'i 'du
NK043(pi)001:3114: byed ji tsam pa'i lnga cha 'dor bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:3115: / bdag mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:3116: dang por sku gdung ni bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3117: sems can la snying rje'i slad du bdag ni slad
NK043(pi)001:3118: kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:3119: / bdag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo stong du gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3120: lo lnga brgyar dam chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3121: sems can gang dag sku gdung rnams la /
NK043(pi)001:3122: rin po che dang rol mo la sogs pas mchod par spro ba skye ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3123: tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:3126: thal mo sbyor ba gcig dang /
NK043(pi)001:3127: me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod par byed pa
NK043(pi)001:3128: de thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:3129: / theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:3130: sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la /
NK043(pi)001:3131: tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ram /
NK043(pi)001:3132: ci skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam /
NK043(pi)001:3133: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag /
NK043(pi)001:3134: kun chub pa dang klog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3136: gang dag gis thos nas sems rab tu dang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3137: tha na dam chos smra ba la me tog gcig tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:3138: phyag gcig tsam gyis mchod pa byed pa de thams
NK043(pi)001:3139: cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg
NK043(pi)001:3140: pa gsum po gang rung gis slar mi ldog pa
NK043(pi)001:3141: dang / ji tsam na dam pa'i chos nub ste /
NK043(pi)001:3142: chos kyi sgron ma ni gums /
NK043(pi)001:3143: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni 'gyel bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3144: bdag gi sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor
NK043(pi)001:3145: lo'i mthar thug pa'i dgos pa lhag par 'gyur zhing
NK043(pi)001:3146: / zhing 'dir rin po ches phongs pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:3147: de dag nor bu beed+aur+ya tog gi blo gros zhes
NK043(pi)001:3148: bgyi bar gyur te me ltar gsal zhing gnas par
NK043(pi)001:3149: gyur cig / de yang de nas mngon par 'phags te /
NK043(pi)001:3150: gong du 'og min gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas /
NK043(pi)001:3152: man d+aa ra ba chen po dang /
NK043(pi)001:3153: sa ri ya dra ka la sogs pa me tog
NK043(pi)001:3154: sna tshogs dag gi char chen po mngon par 'pheb
NK043(pi)001:3155: cing me tog gi char de las /
NK043(pi)001:3156: dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra dang /
NK043(pi)001:3157: dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i sdom pa'i sgra dang /
NK043(pi)001:3158: klog pa dang nang du 'jog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3159: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3167: theg pa gsum gyi sde snod kyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3168: des gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams sngon gyi dge rtsa rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3169: sems can chen po dag dge chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:3170: de dag de nas bab ste mi mjed kyi mi thams cad dge bcu la 'god par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3171: de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis sgra de thos nas /
NK043(pi)001:3173: dga' ba de rtsed mo la mngon par 'jug pa'i sems sems byung rgyun chad de /
NK043(pi)001:3174: sngon gyi dge rtsa dran zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3175: de dag gis kyang lha las babs nas mi thams
NK043(pi)001:3176: cad dge bcu'i lam 'dzin du 'jug par gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:3177: / me tog de dag kyang nam mkha' la /
NK043(pi)001:3181: beed+aur+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3182: rin po che'i char sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'bab par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3183: mi mjed kyi zhing thams cad na 'thab rtsod mu ge nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:3184: tshig rtsub cing barlanga ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3185: dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3186: zhing de dag tu bde ba dang nad med pa
NK043(pi)001:3187: dang 'thab rtsod dang 'ching ba med pa dang lo
NK043(pi)001:3189: sems can gang gis rin po che de mthong reg
NK043(pi)001:3190: longs spyod pa thams cad theg pa gsum po dag
NK043(pi)001:3191: las slar mi ldog par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3192: sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor lo'i sa gzhi'i mthar thug par gnas par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3193: de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus
NK043(pi)001:3194: kyi tshe na yang sku gdung de dag nor bu
NK043(pi)001:3195: rin chen an da rnyil dag tu gnas par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3196: te / steng du 'og min gyi mthar thug par
NK043(pi)001:3197: gnas nas man+d+aa ra sogs me tog sna tshogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:3198: char 'beb cing dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra dang yid
NK043(pi)001:3199: du 'ong ba'i sgra sna tshogs 'byung bar byed cing
NK043(pi)001:3200: slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug par
NK043(pi)001:3202: de bzhin tu mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus
NK043(pi)001:3203: dang nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus su yang
NK043(pi)001:3204: steng du 'og min gyi bar du gnas nas me
NK043(pi)001:3205: tog gi char 'bebs pa sogs gong du smos pa
NK043(pi)001:3207: sku gdung de dag gis bskal pa bzang po la
NK043(pi)001:3208: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur zhing gdul
NK043(pi)001:3209: bya bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang theg pa
NK043(pi)001:3210: gsum gyis slar mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3211: cig / de bzhin du bskal pa chen po sangs
NK043(pi)001:3212: rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
NK043(pi)001:3213: dag byung gi bar du yang /
NK043(pi)001:3214: bdag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:3215: rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog
NK043(pi)001:3217: bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub kyi
NK043(pi)001:3218: phyir spyad pa spyod pa na bdag gis dang por
NK043(pi)001:3219: bla med byang chub 'dzin du bcug pa dang phar
NK043(pi)001:3220: phyin drug la bkod pa de dag slad kyi tshe
NK043(pi)001:3221: bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+g+aa'i klung stong gi
NK043(pi)001:3223: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
NK043(pi)001:3224: pa gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha
NK043(pi)001:3226: bdag byang chub thob nas bla med byang chub 'dzin du bcug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3227: bdag mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam
NK043(pi)001:3228: par 'phrul pas bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed
NK043(pi)001:3229: par 'gyur ba'i byang sems de dag thams cad slad
NK043(pi)001:3230: nas zhing tha dad du sangs rgyas par gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:3231: na / 'di skad du sngon gyi bskal pa bzang
NK043(pi)001:3232: po la bab pa na rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi
NK043(pi)001:3233: pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:3234: na / pa des / bdag cag dang por bla
NK043(pi)001:3235: med byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing
NK043(pi)001:3236: btsud de rab tu bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:3237: bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa /
NK043(pi)001:3240: log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na /
NK043(pi)001:3241: des bdag cag phar phyin drug la bkod pas na /
NK043(pi)001:3242: da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la /
NK043(pi)001:3243: 'gro ba'i 'khor lo bzlog cing sems can tshad med
NK043(pi)001:3244: pa mang po mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:3245: la dgod par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gi
NK043(pi)001:3246: basngagasa pa brjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang brjod par
NK043(pi)001:3247: gyur cig / byang chub don gnyer gyi sems can
NK043(pi)001:3248: rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas las de lta bu'i basngagasa
NK043(pi)001:3250: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad du /
NK043(pi)001:3251: bcom ldan 'das des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs
NK043(pi)001:3252: nas de ltar rtsod pa'i dus snyigs ma lnga byung
NK043(pi)001:3253: ba na bla med byang chub tu sangs rgyas zhes
NK043(pi)001:3254: yongs su zhu bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3255: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang /
NK043(pi)001:3256: byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am bu mo de dag la /
NK043(pi)001:3257: bdag gis snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3258: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3259: sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di yang ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3260: byang chub don gnyer gyi rigs kyi bu'am bu mo
NK043(pi)001:3261: de dag gis kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing rgya
NK043(pi)001:3262: chen po la mos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3263: de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3264: de ltar rtsod dus snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na /
NK043(pi)001:3266: mi dge bas nyams pa'i sems can rnams rjes su
NK043(pi)001:3267: 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3268: cig / sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang de rnams
NK043(pi)001:3269: kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lung bstan
NK043(pi)001:3270: pas lung ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3271: gzhan yang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am bu mo de dag la /
NK043(pi)001:3272: rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:3273: byung ba de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3274: sku gdung rnams kyis sems can gyi don du cho
NK043(pi)001:3275: 'phrul dang rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pas bdag cag bla
NK043(pi)001:3276: med byang chub tu bskul nas sems dang po bskyed
NK043(pi)001:3277: cing phar phyin rdzogs par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:3278: sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul ba'i sngon gyi tshul rgya cher ston par gyur cig ces /
NK043(pi)001:3279: de ltar 'dun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze
NK043(pi)001:3280: rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
NK043(pi)001:3281: snying po'i spyan sngar skye dgu thams cad kyi don
NK043(pi)001:3282: du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:3283: chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des
NK043(pi)001:3286: gal te bdag gis ma 'ongs rtsod dus snyigs ma
NK043(pi)001:3287: lnga bdo ba na 'jig rten ldong zhing 'dren pa
NK043(pi)001:3288: ma mchis pa lta bu'i mun par chud cing mtshams
NK043(pi)001:3289: med sogs byed pa rnams la bdag gis phan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3290: re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:3291: zhing / bdag gis smon lam btab pa de lta
NK043(pi)001:3292: bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par
NK043(pi)001:3294: bdag byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang par
NK043(pi)001:3295: mi bgyi zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang zhing gzhan
NK043(pi)001:3296: du bsngo bar mi bgyi ste /
NK043(pi)001:3297: de ni bdag gi nges pa legs so //
NK043(pi)001:3298: yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nyan rang gi theg pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3299: lha mi'i rgyal srid dang dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:3301: lha dang dri za sogs su skye ba mi 'dod de /
NK043(pi)001:3302: dge rtsa yang gzhan du mi bsngo'o //
NK043(pi)001:3303: gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
NK043(pi)001:3304: sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:3305: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye /
NK043(pi)001:3306: thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:3310: sems can bsod nams dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa
NK043(pi)001:3311: ba yongs su bsngosa pas ni re ba'i bsam pa
NK043(pi)001:3314: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sbyin pa las byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3317: sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrub pas na /
NK043(pi)001:3318: gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa
NK043(pi)001:3319: ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta
NK043(pi)001:3320: na / de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa
NK043(pi)001:3321: ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag dmyal
NK043(pi)001:3322: ba mnar med par drag cing rtsub pa'i sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:3323: nyams su myong ba'i sems can de rnams kyi don
NK043(pi)001:3325: dge rtsa des de dag de nas ldang zhing sangs
NK043(pi)001:3326: rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi yi dngos po thob par
NK043(pi)001:3327: gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos
NK043(pi)001:3328: 'dul ba sgrub par byed cing yongs su mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:3330: sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu ma zad na /
NK043(pi)001:3331: de'i slad du bdag gums nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3332: bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
NK043(pi)001:3333: phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK043(pi)001:3334: kyang mi rtsol ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3335: bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che bar gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:3336: lus re res kyang da ltar gyi lus 'dis bde
NK043(pi)001:3337: sdug myong ba de bzhin bde sdug gi tshor ba
NK043(pi)001:3339: de lta bu'i bdag gi lus re res kyang sems
NK043(pi)001:3340: can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi
NK043(pi)001:3341: bzad pa / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3342: de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3343: kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na
NK043(pi)001:3344: / sems can gang dag mtshams med bgyid pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3345: chos spong ba sogs mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i las bsags pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:3346: gang dag bskal pa chen po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3347: kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du
NK043(pi)001:3348: mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:3349: las de lta bu kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3350: sems can de dag gi don du bdag las des
NK043(pi)001:3351: sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas
NK043(pi)001:3352: pa nyams su myong bar gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:3353: bdag gi sems can dag ni dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3354: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3355: 'khor ba las bsgral te mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3356: grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po
NK043(pi)001:3357: de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs
NK043(pi)001:3359: sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na /
NK043(pi)001:3360: sems can rnams kyi las kun nas bslang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3362: myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa'i sems can dmyal ba /
NK043(pi)001:3369: yang sos kyi bar du yang sngar bzhin smos nas smon lam btab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3370: de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:3372: gnod sbyin dbul bo'i bar dang /
NK043(pi)001:3373: grul bum sha za lha min nam mkha' lding la yang brjod par bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:3374: mi rnams kyi nang du yang /
NK043(pi)001:3378: dran pa nyams pa dag tu skye ba'am /
NK043(pi)001:3379: skye ba'i las bsags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3380: mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la sbyar te /
NK043(pi)001:3381: bdag gi dge bas de dag skye gnas de las thar ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3382: de'i las ma zad na bdag mnar med par skye bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3383: gal te bdag bla med byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su mi rdzogs na /
NK043(pi)001:3384: 'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po de srid
NK043(pi)001:3385: du phung khams skye mched rnams yongs su 'dzin par
NK043(pi)001:3386: 'gyur ba de srid bdag sngar smros pa bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:3393: mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna
NK043(pi)001:3394: tshogs dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:3395: cig / ci ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i don
NK043(pi)001:3396: bzhin bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba
NK043(pi)001:3397: 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:3398: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3399: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis
NK043(pi)001:3400: pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bdag gi dbang du
NK043(pi)001:3401: 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar shog cig /
NK043(pi)001:3402: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam
NK043(pi)001:3403: bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
NK043(pi)001:3404: bsgrub par rngo thogs shing bdag bskal pa bzang po
NK043(pi)001:3405: la / skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3406: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:3407: bdag bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol zhes zhus so //
NK043(pi)001:3408: de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma
NK043(pi)001:3409: gtogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang
NK043(pi)001:3410: / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
NK043(pi)001:3411: pa'i 'jig rten pa dang nam mkha'i ngos na gnas
NK043(pi)001:3412: / pa / de dag thams cad mchi ma rab
NK043(pi)001:3413: tu 'dzag cing yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag
NK043(pi)001:3415: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3416: sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3417: smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa legs so legs so //
NK043(pi)001:3418: lhag bsam de lta bu'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yang dag par bkod cing /
NK043(pi)001:3419: mtshams med byed pa sogs sems can gdul dka' ba yongs su bzung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3420: bzod pa'i smon lam des na khyod ni sems can
NK043(pi)001:3421: rnams kyi sman dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur
NK043(pi)001:3422: par shes so // sems can rnams sdug bsngal las
NK043(pi)001:3423: thar bar byed pa'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:3424: du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3425: par shes so // cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK043(pi)001:3426: bla med byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:3427: par shes so // cig / ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:3428: rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa'am rtsibs kyi mu khyud
NK043(pi)001:3429: nyid kyang ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la phyag
NK043(pi)001:3431: e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po //
NK043(pi)001:3432: khyod ni bde la mi gnas te //
NK043(pi)001:3433: khyod ni sems can snying rjer ldan //
NK043(pi)001:3434: khyod ni bdag gis mtshon ma yin //
NK043(pi)001:3435: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa //
NK043(pi)001:3436: sems can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags //
NK043(pi)001:3437: dbang bo rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul //
NK043(pi)001:3438: dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de //
NK043(pi)001:3439: gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod du gyur //
NK043(pi)001:3441: de bzhin du mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang
NK043(pi)001:3442: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so so'i tshigs su bcad
NK043(pi)001:3443: pas basngagasa so // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
NK043(pi)001:3444: de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas zhabs la phyag
NK043(pi)001:3445: 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas don dang tshig sna
NK043(pi)001:3446: tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
NK043(pi)001:3448: gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de
NK043(pi)001:3449: bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i spyan sngar pus
NK043(pi)001:3450: mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'i mod
NK043(pi)001:3453: zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi grangs
NK043(pi)001:3454: dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi sa
NK043(pi)001:3455: yang g.yos shing kun tu 'khrugs shing ldeg la 'ur
NK043(pi)001:3456: ro // phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa
NK043(pi)001:3457: dang ma dag pa de snyed du sangs rgyas bzhugs
NK043(pi)001:3458: pa rnams su snang ba chen pos khyab cing me
NK043(pi)001:3459: tog sna tshogs kyi char kyang rab tu babs pa
NK043(pi)001:3460: ro // na / zhing de dag gi byang chub
NK043(pi)001:3461: sems dpa' rnams kyis rgyu de lta bu ci las
NK043(pi)001:3462: byung zhes sangs rgyas la gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3464: 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba
NK043(pi)001:3465: na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i drung
NK043(pi)001:3466: du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:3467: sems dpa' gcig yod pa des smon lam btab cing
NK043(pi)001:3468: byang chub tu lung ston pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'o
NK043(pi)001:3469: zhes ngo mtshar bstan par mdzad pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3471: byang chub sems dpa' de yun ring po ci srid
NK043(pi)001:3472: cig na byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub
NK043(pi)001:3473: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags /
NK043(pi)001:3475: rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:3476: des ni da gdod bla med byang chub tu sems
NK043(pi)001:3477: bskyed do // zhes sogs rgya cher bka' stsal pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3478: shar phyogs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3479: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba bzhugs pa'i drung nas /
NK043(pi)001:3480: byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang /
NK043(pi)001:3481: zla ba'i tog ces bya ba la /
NK043(pi)001:3482: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa bskur te /
NK043(pi)001:3483: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas ni skyes
NK043(pi)001:3484: bu dam pa khyod la me tog 'di bskur zhing
NK043(pi)001:3485: legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NK043(pi)001:3486: skyes bu dam pa khyod ni thog mar sems dang
NK043(pi)001:3487: po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas
NK043(pi)001:3488: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:3489: rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams su sgras gang
NK043(pi)001:3490: zhing snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:3491: ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:3492: skyes bu dam pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:3493: sems snying rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la
NK043(pi)001:3494: / snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyis yang dang
NK043(pi)001:3495: yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par
NK043(pi)001:3496: / 'gyur te / ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs
NK043(pi)001:3497: med dpag tu med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
NK043(pi)001:3498: med par khyod kyi snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras
NK043(pi)001:3500: gang khyod kyis byang chub chen po 'dzin tu bcug
NK043(pi)001:3501: pa'i sems can de thams cad phyis lung bstan pa
NK043(pi)001:3502: thob nas / zhing gzhan dang gzhan du sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3503: pa de dag gis kyang khyod kyi basngagasa pa brjod
NK043(pi)001:3504: thob nas / par 'gyur ro // des na rgyu
NK043(pi)001:3505: gsum po des skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so
NK043(pi)001:3507: ces gsung pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:3508: gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
NK043(pi)001:3509: bye ba phrag gnyis dang bcas te skyes bu dam
NK043(pi)001:3510: pa de la lta ba'i phyir zhing 'dir mchis te
NK043(pi)001:3511: / skyes bu dam pa de dag gis de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:3512: gshegs pa rin chen zla bas ji skad gsungs pa
NK043(pi)001:3513: / bzhin bsnyad do // de bzhin du lho dang
NK043(pi)001:3514: nub dang byang dang 'og dang steng gi 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:3515: gyi khams dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang
NK043(pi)001:3516: gzhan dag gis 'khor byang sems mang po dang /
NK043(pi)001:3517: me tog gi skyes dang legs so'i basngagasa pa yang gong bzhin du sbyar te rgyas par byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:3518: de'i tshe zhing der theg pa gsum gyi sems can
NK043(pi)001:3519: dang klu dag gis 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pa bzhin
NK043(pi)001:3520: du gang zhing khyab par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:3521: me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs
NK043(pi)001:3522: rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu char bzhin bab ste
NK043(pi)001:3524: phar phyin dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sgras zhing bkang ste gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:3525: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lhags pa rnams kyang /
NK043(pi)001:3526: sgra de thos nas smon lam dang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
NK043(pi)001:3527: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis zhing 'dir lhags nas chos nyan pa la 'khod do //
NK043(pi)001:3528: de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis me tog
NK043(pi)001:3529: zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag
NK043(pi)001:3530: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la mchod
NK043(pi)001:3532: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa
NK043(pi)001:3533: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
NK043(pi)001:3534: du gsol / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin
NK043(pi)001:3535: chen snying po ting nge 'dzin klog gi sgron ma
NK043(pi)001:3536: zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa des /
NK043(pi)001:3537: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:3538: ri dang shing dang r+ts+wa dang sa gzhi thams cad
NK043(pi)001:3539: kyang rin chen sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du snang
NK043(pi)001:3540: / sems can gang dag chos mnyan par 'khod pa
NK043(pi)001:3541: de thams cad so so rang rang gii dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3542: phyogs ji ltar yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par
NK043(pi)001:3543: / / kha cig gi lus ni ser po /
NK043(pi)001:3544: kha cig ni dkar po sogs mdog sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:3545: kha cig gi rlung lta bu /
NK043(pi)001:3546: kha cig gi me lta bu /
NK043(pi)001:3561: wa lta bur yang mthong la /
NK043(pi)001:3562: rang rang gi lus ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku yang mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:3563: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis ni rang gi mdun
NK043(pi)001:3564: na de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che sna
NK043(pi)001:3565: bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze
NK043(pi)001:3566: ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:3567: sa dang nam mkhar 'dug pa'am 'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang de ltar mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:3568: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi mdun na bzhugs
NK043(pi)001:3569: te thams cad du thugs kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig
NK043(pi)001:3570: pu la chos ston no snyam du bsam mo //
NK043(pi)001:3571: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos
NK043(pi)001:3572: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes
NK043(pi)001:3574: bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:3575: pa sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la
NK043(pi)001:3577: 'jig rten snang bar byed par gyur pa ni snying
NK043(pi)001:3578: rje dang ldan pa yin te legs so legs so
NK043(pi)001:3580: dper na me tog gi shing phun sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:3581: de bzhin du dri dang reg pa /
NK043(pi)001:3582: 'dab ma sdong bu rtsa ba sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do //
NK043(pi)001:3583: de la me tog kha cig ni kha dog dang dris dpag tshad brgyar /
NK043(pi)001:3585: de bzhin du sum brgya sogs nas sbyar te /
NK043(pi)001:3586: kha cig gi mdog dang dris gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
NK043(pi)001:3587: rten khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed
NK043(pi)001:3588: la / me tog gi dri de mig med pas bsnoms na mig dag thob par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:3589: 'on pas bsnoms na rna ba thob /
NK043(pi)001:3590: yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:3591: kyis ni yan lag thams cad thob par 'gyur te
NK043(pi)001:3592: / des dri bsnoms pas nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi
NK043(pi)001:3593: dag gis gtses pa dag nad las thar bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:3594: / ba dang / sems can gang dag myos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3598: myos pa dang sems rnam par g.yengs pa dran pa
NK043(pi)001:3599: nyams pa rnams kyis dri bsnoms pa na dran pa
NK043(pi)001:3600: thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la /
NK043(pi)001:3601: me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po
NK043(pi)001:3602: mkhrang ba sra ba rdo rje las grub pa 'jam
NK043(pi)001:3606: ze ba ni mu tig dmar po /
NK043(pi)001:3607: 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong /
NK043(pi)001:3608: rgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa zhig skyes par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:3609: pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:3610: 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
NK043(pi)001:3611: phra rab kyi rdul snyed du khyab cing lhang nge
NK043(pi)001:3613: des khyab pa'i zhing rnams su sems can gyi khams gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3621: sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:3622: pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing bri bsnoms na
NK043(pi)001:3623: nad thams cad rab tu zhi zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3624: dran pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3625: sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag la /
NK043(pi)001:3626: pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od zer phog gam /
NK043(pi)001:3627: dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang
NK043(pi)001:3628: po thob cing langs te mdza' bshes gnyen mtshams mthong
NK043(pi)001:3629: nas de thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te
NK043(pi)001:3630: / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byor zhing ldan par 'gyur ba la gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3631: gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:3632: de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar
NK043(pi)001:3633: 'gyur la / der tshe rabs dpag tu med par gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3634: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na /
NK043(pi)001:3635: bram ze me tog gi shing de ji lta bar
NK043(pi)001:3636: theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:3638: ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba'i dus na me tog
NK043(pi)001:3639: de dag kha phye zhing rgyas par gyur nas lhang
NK043(pi)001:3640: nge lhan ner / shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya /
NK043(pi)001:3641: kha cig gi 'phang du dpag tshad stong gi bar
NK043(pi)001:3642: du gyur nas sems can mang po'i nad sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:3643: rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:3644: du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes
NK043(pi)001:3645: bu dam pa 'byung ba yin no //
NK043(pi)001:3646: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis me tog kha phye zhing
NK043(pi)001:3647: lam mer gyur nas nad sna tshogs zhi ba ltar
NK043(pi)001:3648: skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste
NK043(pi)001:3649: / thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:3650: la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang nas
NK043(pi)001:3651: yang du sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3652: dngos po gsum po dag la sbyor bar mdzad pa
NK043(pi)001:3653: / dang / khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med
NK043(pi)001:3654: dpag tu med pa dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:3655: du bcug ste nga la phul ba de thams cad
NK043(pi)001:3656: kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
NK043(pi)001:3657: dag pa dang ma dag pa bzung ba ltar so
NK043(pi)001:3658: so'i smon lam bzhin du ngas kyang lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:3659: / dang / // skyes bu dam pa gang dag
NK043(pi)001:3660: nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
NK043(pi)001:3661: pa bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems
NK043(pi)001:3664: dge rtsa bskyed pa dag bzung bas na /
NK043(pi)001:3665: de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:3666: de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:3667: de dag snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa min te /
NK043(pi)001:3668: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla med byang chub tshol ba'ang ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:3669: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'dzin cing snying brtse ba spangs pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:3670: ye shes dang bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa yang ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:3672: bdag gis nyan rang dang ngan song gsum dang /
NK043(pi)001:3673: dge rtsa dang mi ldan pa rnams spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas te /
NK043(pi)001:3674: theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3675: tshe yun ring du gnas shing /
NK043(pi)001:3676: bsam pa dag cing 'dul sla ba'i sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:3677: la chos ston par smon lam 'debs pa des na
NK043(pi)001:3678: / de dag ni ye shes dang bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin la /
NK043(pi)001:3679: byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:3680: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
NK043(pi)001:3681: po des phyag brkyangs te sor mo lnga las 'od
NK043(pi)001:3682: zer kha dog sna tshogs 'bum phrag du ma dang
NK043(pi)001:3683: ldan pa rab tu bkye ste /
NK043(pi)001:3684: 'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste /
NK043(pi)001:3685: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:3686: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bong can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
NK043(pi)001:3687: de'i mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa /
NK043(pi)001:3689: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:3690: khrun ni mthe po'i tshad tsam mo //
NK043(pi)001:3691: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
NK043(pi)001:3692: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga'
NK043(pi)001:3693: ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
NK043(pi)001:3694: de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang /
NK043(pi)001:3695: mthe bong tsam gyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste /
NK043(pi)001:3696: de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
NK043(pi)001:3697: la 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum po dag gi
NK043(pi)001:3698: chos ston to // de nas thams cad dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:3699: pa'i 'khor des zhing de dang mi de dag dang
NK043(pi)001:3700: de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba la /
NK043(pi)001:3701: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:3702: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des bskal pa dpag med grangs med 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3703: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par
NK043(pi)001:3704: 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang por bla med
NK043(pi)001:3705: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
NK043(pi)001:3706: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po bla med
NK043(pi)001:3707: rdzogs byang 'dzin pa la bkod pa dag gis de
NK043(pi)001:3708: bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta
NK043(pi)001:3709: ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dang
NK043(pi)001:3710: ma dag pa yongs su bzung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:3711: de na sems can chen po des nga yang bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du bcug cing /
NK043(pi)001:3712: de la gnas par byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:3713: der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar snyigs
NK043(pi)001:3714: ma lnga dang ldan pa'i zhing du 'tshang rgya bar
NK043(pi)001:3716: de bzhin gshegs pas legs so byin nas byang chub tu lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:3717: de nas gang gis byang chub tu 'jug pa'i dge
NK043(pi)001:3718: ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma
NK043(pi)001:3719: lnga shin tu bdo ba shin tu nyon mongs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3720: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3721: sems can mtshams med byed pa /
NK043(pi)001:3722: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:3724: 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:3725: rnams smon lam gyis yongs su bzung ba de'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:3726: na / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu
NK043(pi)001:3727: med pa na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
NK043(pi)001:3728: kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nya btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:3729: snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so //
NK043(pi)001:3730: nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:3731: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
NK043(pi)001:3732: po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar
NK043(pi)001:3733: 'jig rten gyi khams mthe 'ong can du mthe bo'i
NK043(pi)001:3734: tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3735: nas ring por ma lon te /
NK043(pi)001:3736: de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe
NK043(pi)001:3737: bo'i tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum gyi tshad
NK043(pi)001:3738: tsam gyi skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la
NK043(pi)001:3740: des dang por bla med rdzogs byang 'dzin tu bcug
NK043(pi)001:3741: pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur bzhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:3742: de dag gis de la mchod pa'i phyir pho nya
NK043(pi)001:3743: gtong ngo // des dang por sbyin sogs phar phyin
NK043(pi)001:3744: 'dzin du bcug cing rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3745: sngon gyi byas pa bzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa
NK043(pi)001:3746: de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la
NK043(pi)001:3747: mchod pa'i me tog dag bskur ro //
NK043(pi)001:3748: bram ze ji ltar zhing dag pa na sems can
NK043(pi)001:3749: dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed
NK043(pi)001:3750: pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma
NK043(pi)001:3751: la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:3752: rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga bdo ba de
NK043(pi)001:3753: lta bur sangs rgyas pa nyid thob nas sems can
NK043(pi)001:3754: yongs su ma dag pa rnams la tshe thung dus
NK043(pi)001:3755: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad
NK043(pi)001:3756: pa rnams dang / cing / nyan thos dang rang
NK043(pi)001:3757: sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa
NK043(pi)001:3758: pa rnams dang / cing / la ltos / skyes
NK043(pi)001:3759: bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3760: kyi zhing shin tu ngan zhing snyigs ma lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:3761: ldan par mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3762: sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing smon lam khyad
NK043(pi)001:3764: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to //
NK043(pi)001:3765: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag /
NK043(pi)001:3766: nyan rang dang ngan song spangs pa'i zhing dag par
NK043(pi)001:3767: sems can bsam pa dag cing dge rtsa bskyed pa
NK043(pi)001:3768: dag yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam ni me tog
NK043(pi)001:3770: gang dag shin tu dul ba dge rtsa bskyed pa
NK043(pi)001:3771: rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed
NK043(pi)001:3772: par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad+ma dkar po lta
NK043(pi)001:3773: bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
NK043(pi)001:3774: ma yin no // bram ze byang sems rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste /
NK043(pi)001:3775: zhing dag par smon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3776: sems can bsam pa dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3777: byang chub thob nas nyan rang gi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3778: byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:3779: de ni me tog lta bu zhes bya'i /
NK043(pi)001:3780: pad+ma dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la /
NK043(pi)001:3781: sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:3782: dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di las khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa gzhan bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:3783: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa'i dngos po bzhi ste /
NK043(pi)001:3784: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma dag par smon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3785: sems can bsam pa ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3786: byang chub thob nas nyan rang gi theg pa'i gtam ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3787: byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang mi ring ha
NK043(pi)001:3788: cang mi thung bar bar mar sgrub par smon pa
NK043(pi)001:3789: ste / des na de 'dra ba la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma dkar po rnams zhes su bya'i /
NK043(pi)001:3790: me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:3791: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:3792: bram ze khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:3793: gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:3794: dpa' dpag tu med pa'i nang nas dper na snying
NK043(pi)001:3795: rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur dge bar lung bstan
NK043(pi)001:3797: gang gi tshe khyod kyi snying rje chen pos ma
NK043(pi)001:3798: dag pa'i zhing dang sems can rnams yongs su bzung
NK043(pi)001:3799: ba'i tshe / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:3800: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
NK043(pi)001:3801: snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la
NK043(pi)001:3802: legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NK043(pi)001:3803: pho nya dag btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje
NK043(pi)001:3804: chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so
NK043(pi)001:3805: // 'khor 'di thams cad kyis kyang khyod la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:3806: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma
NK043(pi)001:3807: 'ongs ba'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa gang+g+aa'i klung
NK043(pi)001:3808: gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas /
NK043(pi)001:3809: bskal pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3810: bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi
NK043(pi)001:3811: mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub
NK043(pi)001:3812: pa na / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:3813: pa'i sems can nyam nga ba chen po thob pa
NK043(pi)001:3814: pa na / / mtshams med byed pa /
NK043(pi)001:3816: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa sogs sngar smos
NK043(pi)001:3817: pa de lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de
NK043(pi)001:3818: bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:3819: nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:3822: dbang bsgyur ba'i bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcom ste /
NK043(pi)001:3823: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag
NK043(pi)001:3824: snyan pa'i sgras khyab par byas nas khyod kyi nyan
NK043(pi)001:3825: thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:3826: 'di lta ste / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
NK043(pi)001:3827: bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa
NK043(pi)001:3828: bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs
NK043(pi)001:3829: rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongs
NK043(pi)001:3830: su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:3831: de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud
NK043(pi)001:3832: rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar
NK043(pi)001:3833: 'gyur zhing / bskal pa tshad med pa dag gi
NK043(pi)001:3834: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:3835: ba de bzhin du snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:3836: pa khyod kyang bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:3837: gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya
NK043(pi)001:3838: thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:3839: lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
NK043(pi)001:3840: de lta bu mang po dag byed par 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:3841: // khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang
NK043(pi)001:3842: dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:3843: // ro // chos nub nas lus las skyes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3844: sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:3845: btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang
NK043(pi)001:3846: po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te sngar ji skad
NK043(pi)001:3847: smos pa de bzhin du yun ring por sems can
NK043(pi)001:3848: rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:3849: de'i tshe na gnas grong zhes bya ba na bram
NK043(pi)001:3850: ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so
NK043(pi)001:3851: // skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med
NK043(pi)001:3852: pa de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
NK043(pi)001:3853: // pa na / bdag kyang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:3854: byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang
NK043(pi)001:3855: grogs byed pas khyod la bsnyen bkur byas nas khyod
NK043(pi)001:3856: srid pa tha ma par gyur pa na bdag khyod
NK043(pi)001:3858: khyod byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu
NK043(pi)001:3859: bdag 'gyur la khyod kyis bdag bla med byang chub
NK043(pi)001:3860: tu lung ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3861: gzhan de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu du
NK043(pi)001:3862: la ba zhes bya ba des kyang bskal pa grangs
NK043(pi)001:3863: med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba gong
NK043(pi)001:3864: bzhin la khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3865: tshe bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cing khyod kyis
NK043(pi)001:3866: bdag bla med byang chub tu lung ston par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3867: cig / de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi lha mo
NK043(pi)001:3868: chu lha spyod ces bya bas srid pa tha ma
NK043(pi)001:3869: pa'i dus su snun pa'i ma mar gyur nas bla
NK043(pi)001:3870: med byang chub tu lung bstan thob pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3871: brgya byin mu khyud can dang /
NK043(pi)001:3872: brgya byin pha rol sems zhes bya ba gnyis kyis shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3873: rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:3874: brgya byin spyad spyod lta mdzes tshogs zhes bya bas
NK043(pi)001:3875: srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du bur gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:3876: ces dang / ri rtse'i lha mo des pa king
NK043(pi)001:3877: shu ka zhes bya bas tshe rabs de dang de
NK043(pi)001:3878: dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor 'gyur zhing khyod kyis
NK043(pi)001:3879: bdag bla med byang chub tu lung ston par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3880: ces dang / cig ces dang / lha min gyi
NK043(pi)001:3881: dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya bas khyod bskal pa
NK043(pi)001:3882: de snyed du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
NK043(pi)001:3883: ces dang / cig ces dang / pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3884: bdag skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang
NK043(pi)001:3885: mthun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid
NK043(pi)001:3886: ces dang / cig ces dang / pa na / du gyur te / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3887: srid pa tha ma par gyur pa na yang bsnyen bkur byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:3888: khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor
NK043(pi)001:3889: lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa po dang
NK043(pi)001:3890: / khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3891: chos kyi bcud kyang 'thungs la 'chi ba med pa rtogs te /
NK043(pi)001:3892: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3894: lha dang klu dang lha ma yin gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK043(pi)001:3895: bye ma snyed dag gis kyang snying rje chen po
NK043(pi)001:3896: dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i
NK043(pi)001:3897: phyir smon lam btab ste 'dul ba dag kyang nye
NK043(pi)001:3898: bar bkod do // de na 'tsho ba pa mi
NK043(pi)001:3899: 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig 'dug pa des
NK043(pi)001:3900: bar bkod do // smras pa / kye bram ze
NK043(pi)001:3901: chen po bdag kyang khyod la yo byad mang po
NK043(pi)001:3902: dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3903: bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod
NK043(pi)001:3904: 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho
NK043(pi)001:3906: rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don du khyod kyi
NK043(pi)001:3907: drung du nye bar 'gro zhing mal cha dang stan
NK043(pi)001:3908: dang gos dang glang po che sogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:3909: grong dang khyim dang grong khyer dang /
NK043(pi)001:3910: bu dang bu mo dang sha dang khrag la sogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3911: yan lag dang dbang po dang mgo dag slong bar byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:3912: bdag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i phar phyin gyi grogs su gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3913: de bzhin du phar phyin lnga'i grogs su yang gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3914: de ltar khyod kyis byang chub spyod pa'i tshe na phar phyin drug gi grogs su gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:3915: nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na /
NK043(pi)001:3916: bdag kyang khyod kyi nyan thos kyi gnas thob ste /
NK043(pi)001:3917: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3918: rjes su chos ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3919: khyod kyis bdag bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3920: de bram ze snying rje chen po dang ldan pas thos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3921: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:3922: 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed la bos te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:3923: skyes bu dam pa khyod ni nga'i bla na med
NK043(pi)001:3924: pa spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba ni legs so
NK043(pi)001:3925: // khyod ni tshe rabs kun du nga la dngos
NK043(pi)001:3926: po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ong ba de'i tshe ngas
NK043(pi)001:3927: kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste
NK043(pi)001:3928: // / khyod la yang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3929: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje
NK043(pi)001:3930: chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:3932: bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa
NK043(pi)001:3933: de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa
NK043(pi)001:3934: na / bdag gi mdun du slong mo ba dag
NK043(pi)001:3935: mchis nas zas slong bar bgyid cing tshig 'jam po'am
NK043(pi)001:3936: na / rtsub mo'am / brnyas pa'i tshig gam /
NK043(pi)001:3937: tshig gsal bas slong bar gyur na /
NK043(pi)001:3938: bdag gis slong mo ba de la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig /
NK043(pi)001:3939: khro ba'am ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:3940: sbyin pa'i rnam smin 'dod pas sbyin par byed na /
NK043(pi)001:3941: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu
NK043(pi)001:3942: med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:3944: bdag kyang bla med rdzogs byang du 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3945: gal te bdag gis slong mo ba la ma dad pas sbyin pa stsol tam /
NK043(pi)001:3946: sbyin pa de yang len pa po la ma dad pa sbyin pas chung za bar 'gyur ram /
NK043(pi)001:3947: gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi
NK043(pi)001:3948: tshad tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad
NK043(pi)001:3949: byed par gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas rnams bslus
NK043(pi)001:3950: par gyur cig / gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha
NK043(pi)001:3951: shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:3952: chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag
NK043(pi)001:3953: kyang mnar med par mchi bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3954: zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du gos dang
NK043(pi)001:3955: mgo'i bar dag slong ba la de bzhin du sbyar
NK043(pi)001:3957: sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul
NK043(pi)001:3958: khrims nas shes rab kyi bar dag yongs su gtong
NK043(pi)001:3959: ba la yang brjod par bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:3960: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos basngagasa shing legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NK043(pi)001:3961: 'khor rnams kyis de bzhin du legs so zhes zer zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'khod do //
NK043(pi)001:3962: ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:3963: 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed de'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:3964: bzhin du srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis
NK043(pi)001:3965: kyang btab bo // de thos nas snying rje chen
NK043(pi)001:3966: po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' bas 'di
NK043(pi)001:3967: kyang btab bo // skad du / a la la /
NK043(pi)001:3968: bdag chos kyi mu ge dang zad pa'i dus dang
NK043(pi)001:3969: nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus
NK043(pi)001:3970: na snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:3971: mgon med pa'i ded dpon dang /
NK043(pi)001:3972: snang ba dang sgron ma byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3973: byis pa skyabs med pa dang ldong ba rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:3974: 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas tshe rabs gzhan du bdag gi mgo len pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3975: mig dang rna ba sogs nas kha zas kyi bar
NK043(pi)001:3976: dag len par 'gyur zhing bla med byang chub spyod
NK043(pi)001:3977: pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa
NK043(pi)001:3979: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs bskal pa dpag
NK043(pi)001:3980: tu ma mchis pa de dag tu byang chub kyi
NK043(pi)001:3981: mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slong
NK043(pi)001:3982: mo pa dag gis yun ring po de srid kyi
NK043(pi)001:3983: bar du zas skom blangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:3984: bdag gi lag nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha
NK043(pi)001:3985: shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyur
NK043(pi)001:3986: pa'i sems can de dag bdag mngon par sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:3987: nas / gal te 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar mi bgyid dam /
NK043(pi)001:3988: theg pa gsum du lung ston par mi bgyid na /
NK043(pi)001:3989: bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams bslus par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:3990: bdag kyang bla med rdzogs byang du 'tshang mi rgya ba'i bar du gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:3991: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:3992: skyes bu dam pa legs so //
NK043(pi)001:3993: ji ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' lhun po rtse
NK043(pi)001:3994: 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
NK043(pi)001:3995: 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang por byang chub tu
NK043(pi)001:3996: sems bskyed pa na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:3997: spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:3998: des smon lam btab pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas /
NK043(pi)001:3999: 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing phrag 'bum 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4000: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer so sor rtog pa zhes bya bar /
NK043(pi)001:4001: skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du /
NK043(pi)001:4002: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral
NK043(pi)001:4003: byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:4004: sangs rgyas shing / lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs
NK043(pi)001:4005: rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po lhag ma
NK043(pi)001:4006: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs
NK043(pi)001:4007: sangs rgyas shing / so // de'i dam pa'i chos
NK043(pi)001:4008: ni lo stong dang chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo
NK043(pi)001:4009: stong du gnas par gyur to //
