NK043(pi)001:4010: de'i chos dang chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4011: dge slong pha ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal ba /
NK043(pi)001:4012: sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:4015: chos kyi mchod pa gcod pa mchod rten gyi nor dang /
NK043(pi)001:4017: mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi zas sogs
NK043(pi)001:4018: yo byad gcod cing bdag gir spyod la khyim pa
NK043(pi)001:4019: la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:4020: gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis rim
NK043(pi)001:4022: sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la ngur smrig dmar po
NK043(pi)001:4023: bgos pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du lung bstan
NK043(pi)001:4024: to // 'khor bzhi po gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa
NK043(pi)001:4025: ba byung bar gyur kyang ston par 'du shes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4026: dge rtsa des snga ma bzhin du lung bstan to
NK043(pi)001:4027: to // // rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang de
NK043(pi)001:4028: bzhin du byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa
NK043(pi)001:4029: to // // legs so // byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pas gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:4030: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di lta ste /
NK043(pi)001:4031: bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe rabs rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:4032: byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du sems can
NK043(pi)001:4033: gang dag sbyin sogs phar phyin la bkod pa dang
NK043(pi)001:4034: / tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4035: bdag byang chub thob nas bdag gi bstan pa la
NK043(pi)001:4036: gos ngur smrig bgos par gyur pa las ltung ba'i
NK043(pi)001:4038: nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba la zhugs par gyur pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:4039: dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul bar gyur cing nongs pa
NK043(pi)001:4040: dang bcas par gyur ba'i 'khor bzhi po gang dag
NK043(pi)001:4041: skad cig gcig tsam bdag la ston pa'i 'du shes
NK043(pi)001:4042: sam gus pa'i sems bskyed par gyur pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:4043: de dag las / tha na sems can gcig tsam zhig spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:4044: theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par
NK043(pi)001:4045: lung ma bstan na bdag gis sangs rgyas rnams bslus
NK043(pi)001:4046: par gyur cing bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:4047: / bdag byang chub thob nas chos gos ngur smrig
NK043(pi)001:4048: lha mi rnams kyis gus pas mchod par 'gyur ba
NK043(pi)001:4049: mthong nas ngur smrig mgul na thogs pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:4050: de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi
NK043(pi)001:4052: sems can gang dag bza' btung dang bral zhing bkres skom gyis gnod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4054: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gang dag tha
NK043(pi)001:4055: na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar
NK043(pi)001:4056: 'gyur ba de thams cad kyang bza' btung phun sum
NK043(pi)001:4057: tshogs par 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
NK043(pi)001:4058: gyur cig / lha dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4059: sems can gang dag phan tshun zhe 'gras shing 'khon
NK043(pi)001:4060: gcugs mang por gyur pa dang phan tshun g.yul 'gyed
NK043(pi)001:4061: pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag gi chos gos ngur
NK043(pi)001:4062: smrig rjes su dran par gyur na /
NK043(pi)001:4063: snying rje zhing 'jam pa'i sems dang 'khon med pa'i sems dang /
NK043(pi)001:4064: las su rung ba'i sems su gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4065: sems can gang dag g.yul ngo'i 'thab rtsod 'gyed pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4067: gus par bgyi ba'i slad du ngur smrig gi dum
NK043(pi)001:4068: bu 'chang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:4069: rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4070: 'khrul pa med pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba med par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4071: g.yul du 'thab rtsod de dag las thar bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4072: gal te bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig dmar po
NK043(pi)001:4073: 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:4075: bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams bslus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4076: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag rdzogs par rngo mi thogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4077: chos rnams bskyud par 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4078: mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par rngo mi thogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4079: bdag sangs rgyas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar
NK043(pi)001:4080: du de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa la phyag
NK043(pi)001:4081: 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar
NK043(pi)001:4082: 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib
NK043(pi)001:4083: pa zad par 'gyur zhing mthar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:4084: du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bla na
NK043(pi)001:4085: med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:4086: lags so // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i phyag g.yas pa'i phyag mthil gyis /
NK043(pi)001:4087: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:4088: skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba /
NK043(pi)001:4090: rab tu gtan la phab pa yin te legs so legs so //
NK043(pi)001:4091: skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin du 'phags pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4092: yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ngur smrig dmar pos
NK043(pi)001:4093: sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:4094: ro // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis
NK043(pi)001:4095: byugs pa dang lung bstan cing legs so zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:4096: ba byin pa des byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
NK043(pi)001:4097: chen po dang ldan pa de dga' zhing rab tu
NK043(pi)001:4099: lo nyi shu lon pa lta bu'i tshad tsam du gzhon nur red do //
NK043(pi)001:4100: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang lha dang dri
NK043(pi)001:4101: za la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' snying
NK043(pi)001:4102: rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i las
NK043(pi)001:4103: byed cing me tog dang rol mos mchod cing /
NK043(pi)001:4104: basngagasa pa dang tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis bstod nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod do //
NK043(pi)001:4105: de nas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos
NK043(pi)001:4106: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag
NK043(pi)001:4107: byas te / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4108: tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhus pa la /
NK043(pi)001:4110: ting nge 'dzin dang tshogs kyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam
NK043(pi)001:4111: grangs bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:4113: de nas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po
NK043(pi)001:4114: dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring bar
NK043(pi)001:4115: gyur to // rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa de'ang
NK043(pi)001:4116: bu stong dang khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang
NK043(pi)001:4117: gyur to // / gzhan srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te /
NK043(pi)001:4118: rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang thos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4120: des bdag gi mngon par brtson par byas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4121: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des kyang /
NK043(pi)001:4122: mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad nas nyan thos
NK043(pi)001:4123: kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po brgyad
NK043(pi)001:4125: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri dang /
NK043(pi)001:4126: bla med byang chub kyi theg pa chen po'i gtam la yang /
NK043(pi)001:4127: lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i gtam 'bum la
NK043(pi)001:4128: sogs pa chos kyi phung po 'bum phrag bcu gcig
NK043(pi)001:4129: gi bar du bzung zhing lung mnos te bklags shing
NK043(pi)001:4131: dus gzhan zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
NK043(pi)001:4132: snying po phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:4133: las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:4134: 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
NK043(pi)001:4135: chen po dang ldan pa des rol mo'i sgra dang
NK043(pi)001:4136: me tog dang phye ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:4137: rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pa la sogs
NK043(pi)001:4138: pa'i mchod pa byas nas spos chu sna tshogs kyis
NK043(pi)001:4139: bkrus te / sku gdung bzhag pa'i mchod rten rin chen sna bdun las byas pa /
NK043(pi)001:4141: rgyar ni dpag tshad phyed yod pa yang brtsigs /
NK043(pi)001:4142: zhag bdun bar du mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod
NK043(pi)001:4143: pa byas nas der yang sems can grangs med dpag
NK043(pi)001:4144: tu med pa theg pa gsum yang dag par 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:4145: du bcug / zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4146: srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu
NK043(pi)001:4147: rab tu byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
NK043(pi)001:4148: 'bar bar byas / lo khri'i bar du dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4149: chos bzung nas sems can dpag tu med pa theg
NK043(pi)001:4150: pa gsum 'dzin tu bcug cing skyabs 'gro dang /
NK043(pi)001:4151: dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i sdom pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4152: mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul sogs la bkod de /
NK043(pi)001:4153: byang chub sems dpa' de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:4154: sems can de dag gis kyang dge sbyong chen po de'i rus pa la mchod cing /
NK043(pi)001:4155: ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rus pa mchod pa bzhin du mchod do //
NK043(pi)001:4156: gang gi nyin mo snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:4157: pa'i dge sbyong 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i nyin
NK043(pi)001:4158: mo de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po'i dam
NK043(pi)001:4160: zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag
NK043(pi)001:4161: ni smon lam gyi dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams
NK043(pi)001:4162: gzhan dang gzhan dag tu skye ba yongs su bzung
NK043(pi)001:4163: la / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge
NK043(pi)001:4164: sbyong ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas smon lam gyi
NK043(pi)001:4165: dbang gis zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su zhing
NK043(pi)001:4166: khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag
NK043(pi)001:4167: 'gran zhes pa der mi rnams tshe lo brgyad cu
NK043(pi)001:4168: la / thub la / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:4170: lag pa khrag gis gos pa /
NK043(pi)001:4173: sems can thams cad la brtse ba med par zhugs pa /
NK043(pi)001:4174: 'jig rten pha rol la mi 'jigs par lta ba
NK043(pi)001:4175: sha stag gis gang ba der gdol ba'i rigs su
NK043(pi)001:4176: skyes shing lus shin tu ring ba /
NK043(pi)001:4177: stobs shugs dang shin tu ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:4178: shin tu dran pa dang spobs pa dang mgyogs pa dang ldan par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:4179: de'i stobs kyis shugs brtan pas sems can dag bzung ste smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:4180: kye sems can dag gal te srog gcod sogs log
NK043(pi)001:4181: lta'i bar du spangs na ngas khyed cag gi srog
NK043(pi)001:4182: sbyin la 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang sbyin par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:4183: // gal te mi spong na ngas srog dang phral te 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:4184: de dag gis thal mo sbyar te /
NK043(pi)001:4185: mgon po khyod kyi tshig gis bdag cag ji srid
NK043(pi)001:4186: 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa sogs mi dge bcu
NK043(pi)001:4188: gdol ba stobs can de song nas rgyal po dang rgyal pos bkrabs pa dag la bsgo ba /
NK043(pi)001:4189: kho bo'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad du zas dang skom dang gos dang mal cha dang /
NK043(pi)001:4190: gser dang nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa
NK043(pi)001:4191: dgos kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po dag kho
NK043(pi)001:4192: bo la phul cig ces byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:4193: des ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi rnams dge
NK043(pi)001:4194: bcu la bkod pas mi rnams tshe lo lnga brgya
NK043(pi)001:4196: de nas rgyal po gang yin pa de tshe'i dus
NK043(pi)001:4197: byas pa dang rgyal po'i blon po dag gis gdol
NK043(pi)001:4198: pa stobs can de rgyal por dbang bskur nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:4199: po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4200: des ring por ma lon par yul der rjes su bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:4201: brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul bas yul gnyis par yang rjes su bstan pas /
NK043(pi)001:4202: ring por ma thogs par 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad
NK043(pi)001:4203: du stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur
NK043(pi)001:4204: te / sems can rnams dge bcu la bkod nas /
NK043(pi)001:4205: rang rang gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:4206: theg pa gsum la yang bkod nas phyogs kun tu
NK043(pi)001:4207: sbyin pa byed par sgra bsgrags so //
NK043(pi)001:4208: der 'dzam gling sems can thams cad lhags pa la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag byin no //
NK043(pi)001:4209: de nas 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po'i drung du song ste /
NK043(pi)001:4210: khyod bla med byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa sbyin zhing bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad na /
NK043(pi)001:4211: khyod rgyal ba 'jig rten gyi sgron mar 'gyur lags so //
NK043(pi)001:4214: 'tsho ba bas bdag ni lha min gyi g.yul chen
NK043(pi)001:4215: po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid 'dod
NK043(pi)001:4216: na / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'i slad du mi gson po'i pags pa yang 'dod /
NK043(pi)001:4217: mig kyang 'dod pa'i slad du khyod la gsol ba gdab lags so //
NK043(pi)001:4218: de nas rgyal pos 'di snyam te bdag gis stobs
NK043(pi)001:4219: kyi 'khor los sgyur ba thob nas sems can bgrang
NK043(pi)001:4220: ba las 'das pa dge bcu'i lam la bkod cing
NK043(pi)001:4221: theg pa gsum la nges par sbyar /
NK043(pi)001:4222: sbyin pa yang dpag tu med pa zhig byin na /
NK043(pi)001:4223: da ni snying po med pa'i lus la snying po
NK043(pi)001:4224: len pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:4225: bshes gnyen yin no snyam du 'di skad du /
NK043(pi)001:4226: ngas khyod la sha'i mig tha mal pa 'di sbyin par bya yi dga' bar byos shig /
NK043(pi)001:4227: des ni bdag gis bla na med pa'i chos kyi spyan thob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4228: ngas khyod la rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis rang gi pags pa 'di yang sbyin par bya /
NK043(pi)001:4229: des ni bdag gis bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4230: de nas rgyal po des lag pa g.yas pas /
NK043(pi)001:4231: rang gi mig gnyis byin te gdong khrag gis yog bzhin du smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:4232: 'di na gang dag 'dir lhags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4233: nam mkha' dang sa la gnas pa'i lha dang gnod
NK043(pi)001:4234: sbyin sogs dang mi gang yin pa bdag la nyon
NK043(pi)001:4235: cig / bdag gis sbyin pa byang chub tu bsdos
NK043(pi)001:4236: pa'i dge bas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur
NK043(pi)001:4237: cig / na / sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya
NK043(pi)001:4238: mtsho las sgrol zhing bla med zhi ba'i mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:4240: gal te bdag bla med byang chub 'thob pa lta
NK043(pi)001:4241: na 'tsho ba pa 'dis rig sngags de grub par
NK043(pi)001:4242: ma gyur pa de srid du bdag srog gi dbang
NK043(pi)001:4243: po mi 'gag la dran pa nyams par ma gyur
NK043(pi)001:4244: cing 'gyod par yang ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4245: rgyal po'i pags pa yang khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4246: 'tsho ba pa rdul dbyangs des mtshon rnon pos lus
NK043(pi)001:4247: las pags pa bshus nas khyer te rig sngags bsgrubs
NK043(pi)001:4248: so // de ltar zhag bdun du rgyal po bsod nams stobs srog gi dbang po ma 'gags /
NK043(pi)001:4250: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang ma myong /
NK043(pi)001:4251: skad cig tsam yang 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4252: ston pa sh+aakya'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:4253: nga de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:4254: rin po che'i snying po'i yab bram ze rgya mtsho'i
NK043(pi)001:4255: rdul zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:4256: pa der gyur te ngas bla med rdzogs pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:4257: chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i dang po ni
NK043(pi)001:4258: de yin no // ngas dang po sems bskyed pas
NK043(pi)001:4259: sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa rdzogs pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:4260: chub 'dzin du bcug ste ngas dpa' ba'i dngos po
NK043(pi)001:4261: dang dpa' ba'i bya ba dang po ni de yin
NK043(pi)001:4262: de yin no // no // nga smon lam gyi
NK043(pi)001:4263: dbang gis de nas shi 'phos te sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:4264: zhing yang dag 'dren du gdol pa'i rigs su skyes
NK043(pi)001:4266: sems can rnams dge ba la sbyar zhing stobs dang
NK043(pi)001:4267: rtul bas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob
NK043(pi)001:4268: ste / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du 'thab rtsod
NK043(pi)001:4269: kyi rnyogs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byas shing
NK043(pi)001:4270: ste / / tshe yang bsrings te ngas dang por
NK043(pi)001:4271: lus yongs su btang ba de ni ngas dpa' ba'i
NK043(pi)001:4272: dngos po dang dpa' ba'i bya ba gnyis pa yin
NK043(pi)001:4273: ste / / no // de ltar ngas mig dang
NK043(pi)001:4274: pags pa yongs su btang nas de nas shi 'phos
NK043(pi)001:4275: ste / / no // te / zhing de nyid
NK043(pi)001:4276: du gling gnyis par gdol ba'i rigs su skyes nas
NK043(pi)001:4277: snga ma bzhin du brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul bas
NK043(pi)001:4278: sems can rnams dge ba'i las la sbyar nas stobs
NK043(pi)001:4279: kyi 'khor los sgyur ba thob ste /
NK043(pi)001:4280: gling de dag tu 'thab rtsod 'khon 'gyod rnams zhi bar byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4281: tshe yang bsrings nas der yang rang gi lus las lce dang rna ba dag yongs su btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:4282: zhing yang dag 'gran de'i stong chen po'i gling thams
NK043(pi)001:4283: cad kyi bar du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta
NK043(pi)001:4284: bu byas so // brtson 'grus brtan zhing smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4285: gyi dbang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:4286: rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
NK043(pi)001:4287: tu yang sems can rnams dag pa la sbyar te
NK043(pi)001:4288: theg gsum 'dzin du bcug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4289: 'thab rtsod sogs nyon mongs pa rnams zhi bar byas
NK043(pi)001:4290: pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas so
NK043(pi)001:4291: // sangs rgyas gzhan dag gi zhing dag pa ni rgyu 'dis bsgrubs te /
NK043(pi)001:4292: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
NK043(pi)001:4293: na gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar mi byed cing
NK043(pi)001:4294: / gzhan la 'jigs par ston par mi byed la /
NK043(pi)001:4295: sems can rnams la yang nyan rang gi theg pa 'dzin du ma bcug pas /
NK043(pi)001:4296: de dag dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs te sangs rgyas pa'i zhing na ltung ba'i ming yang med la /
NK043(pi)001:4299: mi dge ba'i sgra yang mi grags te yongs su dag la /
NK043(pi)001:4300: gzhan du chos kyi sgra dang /
NK043(pi)001:4301: yid du mi 'ong ba med pa'i sgras khyab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4302: de na sems can rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:4303: de na nyan rang gi theg pa par gdags pa yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:4304: ngas ni gang gi tshe bskal pa chen po gang+g+aa'i
NK043(pi)001:4305: klung gi bye ma snyed du snyigs ma lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:4306: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas bzhugs pas
NK043(pi)001:4307: stong pa / gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
NK043(pi)001:4308: tshig rtsub po dang 'jigs su rung bas sems can
NK043(pi)001:4309: rnams srog gcod pa spong ba sogs dge ba bcu
NK043(pi)001:4310: dang theg pa gsum po dag kyang 'dzin du bcug
NK043(pi)001:4311: stong pa / ste / rab tu bkod pa de'i las kyi 'phros /
NK043(pi)001:4312: da ltar nga nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing mi dge ba'i sgras kun tu khyab la /
NK043(pi)001:4313: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can
NK043(pi)001:4314: rnams kyis yongs su gang ba'i zhing 'di lta bur
NK043(pi)001:4315: theg pa gsum gyi chos ston te /
NK043(pi)001:4316: nga ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang 'dul ba'i
NK043(pi)001:4317: sems can ji lta bu dag bzung ste smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4318: btab cing stobs dang brtson 'grus dang 'bad pas byang
NK043(pi)001:4319: chub kyi spyad pa spyod pas /
NK043(pi)001:4320: sa bon ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thob bo //
NK043(pi)001:4321: ji ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
NK043(pi)001:4322: pa na sbyin pa yongs su btang ba de lta
NK043(pi)001:4323: bu sngon chad byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4324: phyis 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis gtong bar ma byas mi byed la /
NK043(pi)001:4325: 'on kyang skyes bu dam pa brgyad ni ma gtogs te /
NK043(pi)001:4327: skyes bu dam pas byin zhes bya ba lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams kun dbyangs zhes par /
NK043(pi)001:4328: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dres spong 'od zer zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:4329: ba tshe lo brgya pa ba rnams la chos ston
NK043(pi)001:4330: cing zhag bdun na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
NK043(pi)001:4331: bar 'gyur ro // de bzhin du byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:4332: dpa' brtson 'grus yang dag skul zhes bya ba de
NK043(pi)001:4333: ni shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'pham
NK043(pi)001:4334: can zhes bya bar sangs rgyas nas skye dgu tshe
NK043(pi)001:4335: lo brgya pa rnams la bskal pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK043(pi)001:4336: bye ma snyed las lhag pa nyid du sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:4337: kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:4338: bar 'gyur ro // 'das so // da dung du
NK043(pi)001:4339: yang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i sku
NK043(pi)001:4340: gdung rnams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:4341: kyi zhing stong pa dag na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
NK043(pi)001:4342: bar 'gyur ro // 'das so // pa mdzad do
NK043(pi)001:4343: // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying po
NK043(pi)001:4344: me tog rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:4345: brtson 'grus dang yi dam brtan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4346: yongs su gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod de /
NK043(pi)001:4347: de bskal pa chen po gang+g+aa'i klung bcu'i bye ma
NK043(pi)001:4348: snyed 'das pa'i 'og tu 'di nas byang phyogs su
NK043(pi)001:4349: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK043(pi)001:4350: rgyur bcas yang dag 'dren zhes bya ba zhig 'byung
NK043(pi)001:4352: de bzhin gshegs pa rgyur bcas nag po rnam par
NK043(pi)001:4353: 'joms pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya bar
NK043(pi)001:4354: 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od
NK043(pi)001:4355: zer kun nas 'khrugs 'dzin zhes bya ba'i skyes bu
NK043(pi)001:4356: dam pa de ni bskal pa chen po gcig 'das
NK043(pi)001:4357: nas nub phyogs su snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4358: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs ldan zhes bya ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:4359: 'gyur ro // 'byung ba dang / skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa'i nang du /
NK043(pi)001:4360: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer
NK043(pi)001:4361: dri ma med pa'i dbang po zhes bya bar 'tshang
NK043(pi)001:4363: legs dga' 'di yang bskal pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed rdzogs pa'i 'og tu /
NK043(pi)001:4364: steng gi logs su bskal pa chen po rtsod rnyogs mi bzad yang dag 'khrug ces bya ba la /
NK043(pi)001:4365: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur byed mi gtsang bsags zhes bya bar /
NK043(pi)001:4366: skye dgu tshe lo lnga bcu pa rnams kyi nang du /
NK043(pi)001:4367: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar 'tshang rgya ste /
NK043(pi)001:4368: de sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis lo bcus
NK043(pi)001:4369: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas yongs
NK043(pi)001:4371: de nyid kyi nyin mo sangs rgyas de'i dam pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4372: chos kyang nub par 'gyur zhing lo bcu'i bar du
NK043(pi)001:4373: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de stong par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:4374: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu lag
NK043(pi)001:4375: brkyangs 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis zhing
NK043(pi)001:4376: der skye dgu tshe lo sum cu pa rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:4377: nang du / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar 'tshang rgya ste /
NK043(pi)001:4378: lo bcus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad de /
NK043(pi)001:4379: mya ngan las 'das zhing lo bdun du dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:4380: de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi lung
NK043(pi)001:4381: bstan pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
NK043(pi)001:4382: phyag 'tshal te / mchog tu dga' bas steng gi
NK043(pi)001:4383: bar snang la t+aa la bdun srid tsam du 'phags
NK043(pi)001:4384: phyag 'tshal te / te / tshigs su bcad de gsol ba /
NK043(pi)001:4385: sangs rgyas nyi ma bzhin du lhang nge zhing /
NK043(pi)001:4387: rnam 'dren rdul bral rnam dag spyan mnga' ba /
NK043(pi)001:4388: snang 'gyur bde gshegs khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:4389: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pas bstod cing smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4390: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:4391: skyes bu dam pa legs dga' dang /
NK043(pi)001:4392: rab tu lag brkyangs zhes bya ba 'di gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:4395: snying po me tog rgyas dang /
NK043(pi)001:4396: shes rab 'od zer kun nas 'khrugs 'dzin zhes bya ba bzhi ste /
NK043(pi)001:4397: skyes bu dam pa drug po de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las /
NK043(pi)001:4398: ngas dang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa de nyon cig /
NK043(pi)001:4399: rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
NK043(pi)001:4400: bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das par
NK043(pi)001:4401: gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
NK043(pi)001:4402: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rdul med lhun po spos zhes bya bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4403: de'i tshe bskal pa chen po byung ba na /
NK043(pi)001:4404: skye dgus tshe lo brgya thub cing de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:4405: pa spos kyi pad+ma'i bstan pa chos kyi gzugs brnyan
NK043(pi)001:4406: du gyur pa / de'i tshe na nga 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:4407: gling las rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs kyi 'khor los
NK043(pi)001:4408: sgyur ba nor ngan zhes bya bar gyur cing bu
NK043(pi)001:4409: yang stong yod par gyur nas ngas de dag bla
NK043(pi)001:4410: med byang chub 'dzin du bcug ste /
NK043(pi)001:4411: dus gzhan na rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas spos
NK043(pi)001:4412: kyi pad+ma'i bstan pa rgya cher 'bar bar byas so
NK043(pi)001:4413: // gang dag rab tu ma byung zhing byang chub
NK043(pi)001:4414: tu sems skyed par mi 'dod pa bu drug yod
NK043(pi)001:4415: // pa de la / ngas khyod cag ci'i phyir rab tu mi byung /
NK043(pi)001:4417: gang zad pa'i dus dam pa'i chos gzugs brnyan du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4418: rab tu byung ba des ni tshul khrims kyi phung
NK043(pi)001:4419: po mtha' dag kun tu 'dzin par rdo mi thogs
NK043(pi)001:4420: la / de nor bdun dang bral zhing 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying nas /
NK043(pi)001:4421: slar res 'ga' tsam lha dang mi'i dpal thob par zad kyi /
NK043(pi)001:4422: rtag tu ni ngan song dag tu 'khyams par 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:4423: sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4424: de'i slad du bdag cag rab tu mi 'byung ba lags so //
NK043(pi)001:4425: ngas yang de dag la dris pa khyed cag ci'i phyir byang chub tu sems skyed par mi byed /
NK043(pi)001:4427: gal te bdag cag la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad stsal na /
NK043(pi)001:4428: bdag cag gis bla med rdzogs byang du sems bskyed de /
NK043(pi)001:4429: de lta bu thos nas nga mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:4430: ngas 'dzam gling gi mi rnams skyabs 'gro dang /
NK043(pi)001:4431: gso sbyong dang theg pa gsum 'dzin tu bcug zin gyis /
NK043(pi)001:4432: gang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di cha drug tu bgos te /
NK043(pi)001:4433: bu drug la byin nas bla med byang chub tu sems skyed du gzhug cing /
NK043(pi)001:4434: bdag kyang rab tu byung bar gor ma chag snyam du bsams nas /
NK043(pi)001:4435: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad cha drug tu bgos te /
NK043(pi)001:4436: bu drug po la byin nas bdag nyid rab tu byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4437: 'dzam gling gi rgyal po de dag phan tshun mi mthun par 'thab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4439: 'gyed cing 'khrugs pa dag tu byung ba'i rkyen gyis
NK043(pi)001:4440: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mu ge byung ste
NK043(pi)001:4442: lo tog dang rtsi shing me 'bras mi smin pas
NK043(pi)001:4443: bya rnams kyang bkres pa dang bskom pas nyam thag
NK043(pi)001:4444: par gyur to // de'i tshe na nga 'di snyam du sems te /
NK043(pi)001:4445: ngas da ltar gyi lus 'di yongs su btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:4446: rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can dag tshim par bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:4447: gnas spangs te yul gyi dbus su song nas ri
NK043(pi)001:4448: chu skyong zhes bya ba la 'dzegs te smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4449: btab pa / 'di ltar rang gi lus srog gtong ba ni //
NK043(pi)001:4450: snying rje'i phyir te mtho ris phyir ma yin //
NK043(pi)001:4451: ri 'di'i 'phang tsam dag tu gyur nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:4452: lhar bcas 'jig rten don du 'gyur bar shog /
NK043(pi)001:4453: 'di ltar gzugs mdzes phun sum gtong ba ni //
NK043(pi)001:4454: bdud phyir ma yin brgya byin tshangs phyir min //
NK043(pi)001:4455: bdag gi sha khrag mang por gyur nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:4456: lhar bcas 'jig rten don ni byed gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4457: gang dag ri dang brag la gnas pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:4458: lha klu gnod sbyin lha min mi rnams nyon //
NK043(pi)001:4459: sems can phyir ni bdag gis brtse bskyed de //
NK043(pi)001:4460: rang gi sha khrag dag gis tshim par bya //
NK043(pi)001:4461: gang gi tshe nga'i smon lam de lta bur btab
NK043(pi)001:4462: pa na 'jig rten gsum 'khrugs shing sa yang g.yos
NK043(pi)001:4465: de nas ngas rang gi lus ri chu skyong gi kha nas bor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4466: smon lam gyi dbang gis lus ri yi tshad tsam du gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:4467: mgo 'bum phrag du ma yod par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4468: khyon du ni dpag tshad brgya /
NK043(pi)001:4469: 'phang du yang dpag tshad brgyar gyur nas mi dang
NK043(pi)001:4470: ri dwags dang byang bar dag gis sha dang khrag
NK043(pi)001:4472: nga'i lus la sems can de dag gis zos na
NK043(pi)001:4473: nyin gcig bzhin du phyir skye zhing khyon du dpag
NK043(pi)001:4474: tshad 'bum / 'phang du yang 'bum yod par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4475: thams cad nas mi'i mgo bo skra dang mig sogs
NK043(pi)001:4476: tshang bar gyur pa'i kha 'bum phrag du ma dag
NK043(pi)001:4477: byung ba nas mi'i skad kyis sgra bsgrags pa /
NK043(pi)001:4478: kye sems can dag ci 'dod pa longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:4481: mig sogs gang dang ci 'dod pa khyer cig /
NK043(pi)001:4482: khyed cag tshim zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag gis theg pa gsum du sems skyed cig /
NK043(pi)001:4483: khyed kyi yongs su spyod pa 'di ni zad par
NK043(pi)001:4484: mi 'gyur la khyed la dad pas byin par yang
NK043(pi)001:4485: mi 'gyur gyis / khyed cag myur ba nyid du
NK043(pi)001:4486: srog zad par yang ma gyur cig ces sgra sgrogs
NK043(pi)001:4487: mi 'gyur gyis / par byed do // de na
NK043(pi)001:4488: sems can mkhas pa rnams so so'i 'dod pa ji
NK043(pi)001:4489: lta bar theg pa gsum po gang rung du sems
NK043(pi)001:4490: mi 'gyur gyis / par byed do // bskyed cing / kha cig lha dang mir sems bskyed /
NK043(pi)001:4491: sha za zhing khrag 'thungs la mig sogs ji 'dod
NK043(pi)001:4492: pa khyer kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis sha bri
NK043(pi)001:4493: bar ma gyur zad par ma gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4494: phyir zhing skyes nas lo khri'i bar du 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad dang /
NK043(pi)001:4495: gnod sbyin dang bya dang ri dwags rnams tshim par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4496: ngas lo khri po de'i bar du gang+g+aa'i klung gi
NK043(pi)001:4497: bye ma snyed kyi mig dag yongs su btang ngo
NK043(pi)001:4498: // rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu snyed kyi khrag dag yongs su btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:4499: ri rab stong snyed tsam gyi sha dag yongs su btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:4500: ri khor yug tsam gyi lce dang /
NK043(pi)001:4501: lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin tsam gyi rna ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4502: ri rab tsam gyi sna dang /
NK043(pi)001:4503: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di tsam gyi so dag yongs su btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:4504: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa gzhi tsam gyis pags pa yang yongs su btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:4505: de ltar lo khri'i bar du srog gcig gi rang
NK043(pi)001:4506: gi lus yongs su btab pa tshad med grangs med
NK043(pi)001:4507: dpag tu med pa yongs su btang bas sems can
NK043(pi)001:4508: dpag med tshad med grangs med tshim par byas kyang
NK043(pi)001:4509: / nga'i sems skad cig tsam yang 'gyod par ma gyur pa la ltos /
NK043(pi)001:4510: der ngas smon lam 'di lta bu yang btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:4511: gal te bdag bla med byang chub tu 'tshang rgya
NK043(pi)001:4512: na bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:4513: par gyur cig / ji ltar bdag gling gcig du
NK043(pi)001:4514: rang gi lus kyis sems can tshim par byas pa
NK043(pi)001:4515: par gyur cig / de bzhin du / sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:4516: kyi zhing rdul med lhun po'i spos 'di'i gling thams
NK043(pi)001:4517: cad du yang lo stong phrag gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye
NK043(pi)001:4518: ma snyed du de lta bu'i lus 'byung bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:4519: par gyur cig / de bzhin du / te /
NK043(pi)001:4520: rang gi sha dang khrag la sogs pas sems can
NK043(pi)001:4521: thams cad tshim par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4522: theg pa gsum po yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4523: mi dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dud 'gro'i
NK043(pi)001:4524: 'gro ba gang gis sha za zhing khrag 'thung ba
NK043(pi)001:4526: tha na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar du tshim par byed par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4527: ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu
NK043(pi)001:4528: rang gi lus kyis sems can rnams tshim par byed
NK043(pi)001:4529: par 'gyur ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi
NK043(pi)001:4530: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK043(pi)001:4531: dag tu yang rang gi sha dang khrag la sogs
NK043(pi)001:4532: pas bskal pa chen po gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma
NK043(pi)001:4533: snyed du de lta bu'i lus thob nas lus dang
NK043(pi)001:4534: srog gis sems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur
NK043(pi)001:4535: cig / gal te sems can rnams tshim par bya
NK043(pi)001:4536: ba'i phyir rang gi lus de lta bu gtong bar
NK043(pi)001:4537: cig / mi byed dam / bdag re zhing sems
NK043(pi)001:4538: pa'i smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par
NK043(pi)001:4539: cig / mi byed dam / ma gyur na /
NK043(pi)001:4540: bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang
NK043(pi)001:4541: gzhan na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:4542: 'das de dag bslus par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:4543: bdag kyang bla med rdzogs byang mi thob pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4545: dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra dang /
NK043(pi)001:4546: phar phyin sogs kyi sgra yang mi thos par /
NK043(pi)001:4547: rtag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen
NK043(pi)001:4548: po na gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de
NK043(pi)001:4550: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad du lus btang ba de bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:4551: phyogs bcu gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyii zhing gang+g+aa'i klung
NK043(pi)001:4552: gi bye ma snyed du yang de lta bu'i lus
NK043(pi)001:4553: btang ste / rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:4554: de'i tshe ngas rgyun ma chad par mig dag yongs
NK043(pi)001:4555: su btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi phung
NK043(pi)001:4556: po yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sum cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:4557: gsum pa'i lha'i mthar thug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur
NK043(pi)001:4558: te / lus yongs su btang ba'i sbyin pa'i phar phyin la ltos /
NK043(pi)001:4559: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa mdor bsdus pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:4560: rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de'i 'og tu bskal pa tshad med 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4561: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di zla ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4562: de yang snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4563: nga yang 'dzam bu'i gling der stobs kyi 'khor los
NK043(pi)001:4564: sgyur ba sgron ma snang ba zhes bya bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:4565: nas / ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:4566: bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba la
NK043(pi)001:4568: phyis rang gi skyed mos tshal du sa rnams lta ba'i phyir byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4569: der 'ching ba dam pos phyin ci log tu bcings
NK043(pi)001:4570: pa'i mi zhig mthong nas blon po rnams la dris
NK043(pi)001:4571: pa dang / lha lags mi 'di ni lo gcig
NK043(pi)001:4572: tu mi rnams kyi 'bru dang lo tog ci 'khrungs
NK043(pi)001:4573: pa'i drug cha lha la 'bul ba lags na /
NK043(pi)001:4574: lha'i 'bangs las kyi mthas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:4575: 'du ba'i sgo 'bul bar bgyid pa de ltar mi
NK043(pi)001:4578: mi 'di thong la su la yang mthus nor dang 'bru dag ma sdud cig /
NK043(pi)001:4580: lha 'ga' yang sems shin tu dad pas 'bul bar mi bgyid do //
NK043(pi)001:4581: gdugs gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas skyems sogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:4583: sras dang sras mo rnams kyi longs spyod pa gang
NK043(pi)001:4584: lags pa thams cad gzhan dag las 'du ba lags
NK043(pi)001:4586: de nas nga shin tu yid ma bde ste bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:4587: ngas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi rgyal srid kyi
NK043(pi)001:4588: dbang phyug 'di bu la sbyin par bya snyam du
NK043(pi)001:4589: / nga la bu lnga brgya yod pa de dag
NK043(pi)001:4590: la byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing
NK043(pi)001:4591: / / 'dzam bu'i gling 'di cha lnga brgyar bgos te bu rnams la byin nas /
NK043(pi)001:4592: nga dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ste drang
NK043(pi)001:4593: srong gi rab tu byung ba'i tshangs par spyad pa
NK043(pi)001:4594: spyod cing lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang
NK043(pi)001:4595: ha cang yang mi ring ba'i nags khrod gcig na
NK043(pi)001:4596: nags kyi rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing /
NK043(pi)001:4597: shing u dum b+aa ra'i drung du bsam gtan bsgom
NK043(pi)001:4598: zhing 'dug 'dug nas mthar gyis mngon par shes pa
NK043(pi)001:4600: de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshong pa lnga
NK043(pi)001:4601: brgya zhig rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te rin po
NK043(pi)001:4602: che'i phung po mang du rnyed do //
NK043(pi)001:4603: de na ded dpo na zla ba zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:4604: skyes bu skal ldan mdzangs pa zhig yod pa des
NK043(pi)001:4605: kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnyed nas phyir 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:4606: pa dang / de nas rgya mtsho yang 'khrugs /
NK043(pi)001:4608: de na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang ngu'o //
NK043(pi)001:4609: de na drang srong dbugs 'byin zhes bya ba byang
NK043(pi)001:4610: chub sems dpa' zhig sngon gyi smon lam gyis der
NK043(pi)001:4611: skyes nas sems can chen po des mgron po de
NK043(pi)001:4612: dag bde zhing bkra shis par rgya mtsho chen po
NK043(pi)001:4613: las bsgral to // srin po gdug pa phyir rgol
NK043(pi)001:4614: zhing glags lta la skabs tshol ba zhig mgron po
NK043(pi)001:4615: de dag gi phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:4616: las bsgral to // nas / der zhag bdun gyi bar du rlung dmar drag po dang /
NK043(pi)001:4617: char pa chen po babs nas /
NK043(pi)001:4618: tshong pa de dag lam rab tu stor te /
NK043(pi)001:4619: shin tu skrag nas sgra chen pos ngu zhing cho nge 'debs la /
NK043(pi)001:4623: lus ngan sogs la gsol ba 'debs pa nas /
NK043(pi)001:4624: pha ma dang sdug pa'i bu rnams kyi bar du
NK043(pi)001:4625: ngu zhing 'bod par byed pa nga'i rna bas thos
NK043(pi)001:4626: nas / nga lam ji srid pa der song ste /
NK043(pi)001:4628: ngas khyed cag la lam bstan par bya zhing 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:4629: bu'i gling du bde zhing bkra shis par phyin par
NK043(pi)001:4631: ngas de'i tshe ras til mar gyis bskus te /
NK043(pi)001:4632: rang gi lag pa dkris nas me sbar te bden pa'i tshig brjod pa /
NK043(pi)001:4633: gal te bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don dang
NK043(pi)001:4634: phan pa'i phyir lo nyi shu rtsa drug tu tshangs
NK043(pi)001:4635: pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis nags khrod du
NK043(pi)001:4636: gnas pas / nags kyi rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing /
NK043(pi)001:4637: lha dang gnod sbyin brgyad khri bzhi stong gi sems kyi rgyud smin par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4638: bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:4639: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig de dang /
NK043(pi)001:4640: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa des /
NK043(pi)001:4641: bdag gi lag pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing tshong pa
NK043(pi)001:4642: rnams kyis lam rnyed par gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling
NK043(pi)001:4643: du bde zhing bkra shis par phyin par gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:4644: ces brjod pas / nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du
NK043(pi)001:4645: nga'i lag pa de 'bar bar gyur nas tshong pa
NK043(pi)001:4646: de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:4647: der ngas smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:4648: gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na rin po che
NK043(pi)001:4649: med par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:4650: byang du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na /
NK043(pi)001:4651: bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4652: bdag 'dzam bu'i gling du ded dpon du gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4653: lan bdun gyi bar du yid bzhin gyi nor bu blangs te /
NK043(pi)001:4654: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad kyi bar
NK043(pi)001:4655: du rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu
NK043(pi)001:4657: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs
NK043(pi)001:4658: ma lnga dang ldan pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma
NK043(pi)001:4659: snyed dag tu yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:4660: char rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig ces smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4661: btab pa de bzhin du nga'i bsam pa yongs su
NK043(pi)001:4663: bskal pa chen po gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK043(pi)001:4664: 'das pa'i bar du nga ded dpon du gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:4665: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed du rin po'i char rab tu phab ste /
NK043(pi)001:4666: gling re re yang lan bdun bdun du rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4667: de ltar sems can grangs med dpag med dag rin
NK043(pi)001:4668: po che dag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par
NK043(pi)001:4669: byas nas theg pa gsum po la nges par sbyar
NK043(pi)001:4670: ro // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas rin
NK043(pi)001:4671: po che yongs su gtong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK043(pi)001:4672: ro // la ltos / gzhan yang bskal pa dpag
NK043(pi)001:4673: tu med pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa mgu
NK043(pi)001:4674: byed ces bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
NK043(pi)001:4675: rab rib can zhes bya ba snyigs ma lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:4676: ldan cing skye dgu rnams tshe lo lnga stong bar
NK043(pi)001:4677: ro // la ltos / gyur pa na / nga
NK043(pi)001:4678: smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rig
NK043(pi)001:4679: byed 'don pa'i bram ze nyi phreng spos zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:4680: ro // la ltos / gyur pa na / bar
NK043(pi)001:4681: gyur te / de'i tshe na sems can phal cher
NK043(pi)001:4682: rtag par lta zhing 'khon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4684: pha rol gnon pa gnas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4685: ngas sems can de dag la pha rol gnon pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4686: stobs chen po'i shugs kyis phung po dgra lta bu
NK043(pi)001:4687: dang / skye mched grong stong pa lta bur brtag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4690: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pa bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:4691: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bla med rdzogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4692: byang chub tu bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa la sbyar
NK043(pi)001:4693: nas / nga nyid kyang mngon shes lnga dang ldan par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4694: ngas sems can dpag med grangs med la gdams shing
NK043(pi)001:4695: rjes su bstan pas mngon shes lnga dang ldan par
NK043(pi)001:4696: gyur / de bzhin du sems can dpag med grangs
NK043(pi)001:4697: med dag kyang 'thab rtsod dang 'khon 'dzin spangs te
NK043(pi)001:4698: gyur / / nags khrod na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za la /
NK043(pi)001:4699: bsam gtan sgom zhing tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:4700: de nas bskal pa de zad du nye ba na
NK043(pi)001:4701: sbyin gnas de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag
NK043(pi)001:4704: dus min gyi char dang rlung dag kyang zhi /
NK043(pi)001:4705: sa la brten pa'i lo thog rnams smin zhing mdangs dang ldan par gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:4706: dus kyi nyen pas nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4708: bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi nad zhi bar byed ma nus so snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:4709: brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba
NK043(pi)001:4710: dang lha la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams bsags la
NK043(pi)001:4711: / sems can rnams kyi don du sman sbyar ba'i
NK043(pi)001:4712: bstan bcos dag bstan par bya'o snyam nas nga rdzu
NK043(pi)001:4714: brgya byin dang tshangs pa nas mi'i drang srong rnams
NK043(pi)001:4715: la bsgos nas ri lan tsh+wa'i bdag po zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:4716: ba'i lan tsh+wa spyod pa'i rtse mor nges pa'i gnas
NK043(pi)001:4717: zhes bya ba der bsdus nas /
NK043(pi)001:4718: 'byung po rnams bzlog cing bsrungs la /
NK043(pi)001:4719: rlung mkhris bad kan rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i bstan bcos byas nas rab tu bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:4720: de bzhin du sbyar te sems can dpag tu med pa'i nad rnams kyang zhi bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:4721: der ngas nyi ma gcig la yang sems can grangs
NK043(pi)001:4722: med dpag med dag nad sna tshogs las thar bar
NK043(pi)001:4723: byas te / de dag la shes rab snang bar byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:4724: theg pa gsum po la sbyar nas ngan song gi lam bcad cing mtho ris kyi lam la bkod /
NK043(pi)001:4725: ye shes kyi snang ba byin te bde ba la
NK043(pi)001:4726: bkod pa'i dge rtsa smin pa des nga'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4727: gyi re ba yongs su rdzogs te /
NK043(pi)001:4728: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gling thams
NK043(pi)001:4729: cad du yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byas
NK043(pi)001:4730: pa dang / zhing de ji lta ba bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:4731: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:4732: ldan pa gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu
NK043(pi)001:4733: yang skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu dag byas te
NK043(pi)001:4734: pa dang / / rig pa'i gnas sna tshogs kyang bshad do //
NK043(pi)001:4735: ji ltar zhing 'dir smon lam btab pa de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:4736: du zhing gang+g+aa'i bye snyed du yang ngas ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:4737: smon lam btab pa bzhin du phan gdags pa'i skyes
NK043(pi)001:4738: bu'i rtsal de lta bu byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4739: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i shes rab kyi khyad par dang /
NK043(pi)001:4740: legs spyad gsum gyi dge ba'i sa bon bzhag pa de la ltos /
NK043(pi)001:4741: de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa las shin tu lhag pa snyed 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4742: dus ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po legs bcas zhes bya ba byung ba na /
NK043(pi)001:4743: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di rnam rgyal sgra dbyangs zhes
NK043(pi)001:4744: bya bar gyur te snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par
NK043(pi)001:4745: gyur nas / shar phyogs logs su gling bzhi pa lnga bcu 'das pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4746: 'dzam bu'i gling dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig tu
NK043(pi)001:4747: nga sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:4748: skyes nas / gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur
NK043(pi)001:4749: ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:4750: skyes nas / // der yang sems can rnams dge bcu dang theg gsum 'dzin du bcug ste /
NK043(pi)001:4751: thams cad sbyin zhing kun la sbyin par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:4752: der nga'i gan du slong mo ba dag 'ongs nas
NK043(pi)001:4753: gser dang an+da rnyil dang mthon ka chen po sogs
NK043(pi)001:4754: rin po che sna tshogs slong ba rnams kyis rin
NK043(pi)001:4755: po che mang po de snyed thob par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:4756: // de'i tshe ngas blon po rnams la dris pa /
NK043(pi)001:4757: rin po che 'di dag gang las byung /
NK043(pi)001:4759: klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis gter dag bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:4760: 'jig rten du gter byung bas rin po che rnams byung bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:4761: lha'i zhal snga na slong ba ji tsam mchis pa de tsam nyi tshe las ma bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:4762: de'i tshe ngas smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:4763: gal te bdag snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i zhing du 'tshang rgya ba lta na /
NK043(pi)001:4764: bdag gi re ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4765: bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gling re rer yang
NK043(pi)001:4766: gter ston par byed pa'i klu'i rgyal por yang skye
NK043(pi)001:4767: ba lan bdun bdun len par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4768: skye ba re rer yang rin po che sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:4769: kyis gang ba'i gter bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum
NK043(pi)001:4770: dag ston cing gtong bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4771: gser dang an+da rnyil la sogs pa chu 'dang gi
NK043(pi)001:4772: bar dag gi gter re re zhing rgyar dpag tshad
NK043(pi)001:4773: stong yod la / rin po che mang pos gang ba dag byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:4774: sems can rnams la ston cing gtong bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4775: ji ltar zhing 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs
NK043(pi)001:4776: ma lnga dang ldan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:4777: khams gang+g+aa'i klung gi phye ma snyed du gling thams
NK043(pi)001:4778: cad kyi re rer yang de ltar skye ba bdun
NK043(pi)001:4779: re 'dzin zhing gter ston par smon lam btab pas
NK043(pi)001:4780: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis me tog gis char phab
NK043(pi)001:4781: cing ngal legs so zhes byin te khyod kyi smon
NK043(pi)001:4782: lam bzhin du re ba yang 'grub par 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:4784: lha rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil nas /
NK043(pi)001:4785: rgyal po nam mkha'i ming thams cad sbyin pa zhes
NK043(pi)001:4786: bya bar btags pa skye bo phal mo che rnams
NK043(pi)001:4787: kyis thos so // thos nas kyang bdag cag gis
NK043(pi)001:4788: de la gang yongs su btang dka' ba'i sbyin pa
NK043(pi)001:4790: gal te yongs su btang na 'di'i ming de bzhin du 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4791: mi gtong na mi 'gyur ro snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:4792: rgyal po la btsun mo dang /
NK043(pi)001:4793: bu dang bu mo dag kyang bslangs pa thams cad sems rab tu dang bas byin no //
NK043(pi)001:4794: bram ze skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bas rgyal srid bslangs pa la /
NK043(pi)001:4795: bdag nyid kyis de rgyal por dbang bskur te /
NK043(pi)001:4796: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad byin la bla med byang
NK043(pi)001:4797: chub tu smon lam btab cing bdag gis da lta
NK043(pi)001:4798: rgyal por bcug pa 'di yang 'dzam gling thams cad
NK043(pi)001:4799: du tshig gis dbang bsgyur zhing tshe ring ba dang
NK043(pi)001:4800: / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la yun ring du gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4801: bdag sangs rgyas pa'i tshe rgyal tshab nyid du gyur
NK043(pi)001:4802: nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur
NK043(pi)001:4803: cig ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4804: bram ze 'dod pa zhes bya bas rkang pa gnyis bslangs ba la /
NK043(pi)001:4805: rang gis mtshon rnon pos bcad de sems dang bas byin no //
NK043(pi)001:4806: bram ze lta bsrung zhes bya bas mig gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:4807: bram ze sgra bzang zhes bya bas rna ba gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:4808: 'tsho ba pa yang dag 'tsho zhes bya bas pho mtshan dang /
NK043(pi)001:4809: gzhan dag gis sha dang khrag bslangs pa dag la /
NK043(pi)001:4810: rang gis bcad nas byin te byang chub kyi phyir smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4811: kun tu rgyu 'o ma 'dzag ces bya bas lag pa gnyis bslangs pa /
NK043(pi)001:4812: rang nyid kyis lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa bcad nas /
NK043(pi)001:4813: g.yas pa yang gcod du bcug ste byin nas dad
NK043(pi)001:4814: pa'i phyag bla na med pa thob par smon lam
NK043(pi)001:4815: btab bo // de'i tshe lus khrag gis yog bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:4816: gtong ba 'dis bdag bla med 'thob pa lta na /
NK043(pi)001:4817: bdag gi lus 'di len pa zhig kyang gdon mi za par rnyed par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4819: de na khams kyi rgyal po dang blon po dang
NK043(pi)001:4820: sems can de dag snying rje med pa byas pa
NK043(pi)001:4821: mi gzo ba blo 'chal zhing shes rab chung ba
NK043(pi)001:4822: ste / yan lag thams cad gtubs shing rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug las nyams pas na /
NK043(pi)001:4823: da sha snag dgu 'dis ci bya zer te /
NK043(pi)001:4824: de dag gis de khyer te grong khyer gyi phyi rol dur khrod kyi sar bor te btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:4825: der sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu ring dag gis khrag 'jib par byed /
NK043(pi)001:4827: bya rgod dag kyang lhags nas sha 'thog par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:4828: der ngas sems rab tu dang bas smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:4829: gang gi tshe bdag gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:4830: yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad btang ba na
NK043(pi)001:4831: skad cig kyang 'gyod pa ma skyes pa lta na
NK043(pi)001:4832: / de'i phyir bdag gi re ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:4833: bdag gi lus 'di sha'i rir kun tu gnas par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:4834: sems can gang dag sha khrag za ba rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:4835: za zhing 'thung ba de srid du bdag gi smon
NK043(pi)001:4836: lam gyi dbang gis lus mthar gyis slar skye zhing
NK043(pi)001:4838: rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong yod par gyur nas lo
NK043(pi)001:4839: stong gi bar du sems can rnams tshim par byas
NK043(pi)001:4840: te / der ngas lce ji snyed cig btang ba
NK043(pi)001:4841: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di'i tshad tsam du
NK043(pi)001:4842: te / gyur te / ljags ring ba'i mtshan thob par smon lam rtag tu btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4843: de nas nga shi 'phos nas smon lam gyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:4844: gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir shing ba ta skye bar
NK043(pi)001:4845: klu'i rgyal po gter ston zhes bya bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:4846: // gang du klur skyes pa de nyid kyi nub
NK043(pi)001:4847: mo ngas gter bye ba khrag khrig 'bum kun tu
NK043(pi)001:4848: // bstan nas / nga nyid kyis 'di skad bsgrags
NK043(pi)001:4849: te kye sems can dag phyogs 'di na ni dbyig
NK043(pi)001:4850: dang gser dang chu 'dang gi bar gyi rin chen
NK043(pi)001:4851: sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i gter yod pas
NK043(pi)001:4852: // bstan nas / / khyed kyis longs la dge
NK043(pi)001:4853: bcu'i lam dang theg pa gsum gyi sems skyed cig
NK043(pi)001:4854: ces de ltar klu'i skye ba lan bdun barjesa pa
NK043(pi)001:4855: // bstan nas / / na / lo bye ba
NK043(pi)001:4856: khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi bar
NK043(pi)001:4857: du gter grangs med pa bstan cing byin te /
NK043(pi)001:4858: sems can tshad med pa theg gsum dang dge ba la bkod nas /
NK043(pi)001:4859: bla na med pa'i mtshan so gnyis 'thob pa'i phyir smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:4860: de bzhin du gling gnyis pa nas 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:4861: khams de'i gling thams cad du skyes bu'i rtsal de
NK043(pi)001:4863: de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs
NK043(pi)001:4864: ma lnga ldan gang+g+aa'i bye snyed du yang gling re
NK043(pi)001:4865: rer ji skad smos pa bzhin du klu'i skye ba
NK043(pi)001:4866: bdun bdun blangs te sngar gyi lo de snyed du
NK043(pi)001:4867: gter dpag med bstan pas sems can gyi don byas
NK043(pi)001:4868: so // de bzhin gshegs pas stobs dang brtson 'grus
NK043(pi)001:4869: drag pos mtshan so gnyis 'tshol ba'i byang chub kyi
NK043(pi)001:4870: spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu sngar smos pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4871: skyes bu dam pa brgyad po ma gtogs byang sems
NK043(pi)001:4872: gzhan gyis ma spyad pa dag spyad do //
NK043(pi)001:4873: yang de'i tshe bskal pa grangs med pa 'das nas
NK043(pi)001:4874: dus ngan pa'i tshe bskal pa chen po ut+pala zhes
NK043(pi)001:4876: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bye ru 'byung ba zhes
NK043(pi)001:4877: bya ba snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa'i
NK043(pi)001:4878: tshe / gling bzhi pa der nga brgya byin legs par rnam par byed ces bya bar gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:4879: de'i tshe 'dzam gling gi mi rnams mi dge ba la spyod par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:4880: nga gnod sbyin gyi gzugs shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta
NK043(pi)001:4881: zhig tu sprul te 'dzam bu'i gling du bab nas
NK043(pi)001:4882: mi rnams kyi mdun du bsdad do //
NK043(pi)001:4883: de dag gis nga mthong nas skrag ste khyod la ci dgos pa bdag cag gis dbul lo //
NK043(pi)001:4884: ngas smras pa kho bo la kha zas dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:4886: kha zas ci lta bu lags /
NK043(pi)001:4888: kho bo ni mi dag bsad cing za ste /
NK043(pi)001:4889: mi gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spong ba sogs /
NK043(pi)001:4890: log lta'i bar du spong pa de dag dang /
NK043(pi)001:4891: theg gsum du sems bskyed pa de dag nga mi za'o //
NK043(pi)001:4892: de na ngas sems can dag sprul zhing za ba
NK043(pi)001:4893: de mthong na sems can de dag 'jigs nas ji
NK043(pi)001:4894: srid 'tsho'i bar du mi dge bcu spangs so //
NK043(pi)001:4895: theg pa gsum du sems kyang bskyed de /
NK043(pi)001:4896: gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad dge bcu'i lam dang theg gsum la bkod nas /
NK043(pi)001:4897: der nga'i smon lam btab pa'i stobs kyis gling bzhi
NK043(pi)001:4898: pa 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du zhing de'i gling
NK043(pi)001:4899: thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i zhing gang+g+aa'i bye snyed
NK043(pi)001:4900: du yang gong du smos pa ji lta bu'i gnod
NK043(pi)001:4901: sbyin gyi gzugs kyis dge ba la bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:4902: de ltar ngas sems can rnams bsdigs shing dge ba'i las la bkod pa'i las kyi 'phro des /
NK043(pi)001:4903: nga byang chub shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4904: bdud sdig can dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa nga
NK043(pi)001:4905: byang chub las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar
NK043(pi)001:4906: 'ongs so // rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub kyi
NK043(pi)001:4907: spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na spyin pa'i phar phyin
NK043(pi)001:4908: thob pa mdor bsdus pa ni 'di lta ste de'i
NK043(pi)001:4909: tshe ngas bzod pa zab mo dang gzungs dang ting
NK043(pi)001:4910: nge 'dzin dang 'jig rten pa'i mngon shes lnga yang
NK043(pi)001:4911: 'ongs so // thob ste / sems can dpag tu
NK043(pi)001:4912: med pa theg pa gsum la smin par byas so
NK043(pi)001:4913: 'ongs so // thob ste / // sangs rgyas grangs
NK043(pi)001:4914: med pa mchod cing sangs rgyas re re'i drung nas
NK043(pi)001:4915: rgya mtsho'i chu'i thigs pa snyed kyi yon tan dag
NK043(pi)001:4917: gzhan nyan rang dang pha ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:4918: mngon shes dang ldan pa'i drang srong bgrang ba las 'das pa la yang mchod par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:4919: ngas sngon rang gi sha khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:4920: da ltar yang chos rnams kyis tshim par byas pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:4921: ji ltar ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcu
NK043(pi)001:4922: na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing gi rdul phra
NK043(pi)001:4923: rab kyi rdul snyed dag yongs su mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:4924: 'das par gzigs pa de dag kyang dang por ngas
NK043(pi)001:4925: bla med byang chub 'dzin du bcug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4926: phar phyin drug 'dzin du bcug cing de dag la rab tu bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:4927: de bzhin du da ltar phyogs bcu re rer yang
NK043(pi)001:4928: sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa 'tsho zhing
NK043(pi)001:4929: gzhes la chos ston pa de dag kyang ngas byang
NK043(pi)001:4931: shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun
NK043(pi)001:4932: tu rgyas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med
NK043(pi)001:4933: gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bya ba dang
NK043(pi)001:4934: / mngon par dga' ba na mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4935: 'dzam bu'i chu klung na nyi ma'i snying po zhes
NK043(pi)001:4936: bya ba la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs
NK043(pi)001:4937: med dpag med 'tsho zhing gzhes te chos ston pa
NK043(pi)001:4938: de rnams ngas dang por byang chub 'dzin du bcug
NK043(pi)001:4939: cing phar phyin la bkod nas lung bstan pa thob
NK043(pi)001:4940: pa yin no zhes sogs gsungs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4941: 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa
NK043(pi)001:4942: na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon
NK043(pi)001:4943: tan rgyal po'i gdan g.yos pa na /
NK043(pi)001:4944: 'khor gyi byang sems rnams kyis de'i rgyu rkyen zhus pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:4945: mi mjed na sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pas sngon gyi tshul las brtsams te chos ston te /
NK043(pi)001:4946: de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sngon chad byang chub la btsud cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pas /
NK043(pi)001:4947: khyed cag zhing der deng la de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:4948: de la nga'i tshig gis snyun gsol ba sogs kyis
NK043(pi)001:4950: de dag 'gro bar brtsams pa na mi mjed kyi
NK043(pi)001:4951: zhing phyogs gang du yod pa ma shes nas de
NK043(pi)001:4952: bzhin gshegs pa de la de ltar zhus pa dang
NK043(pi)001:4953: / sangs rgyas des phyag brkyangs te sor mo lnga
NK043(pi)001:4954: las 'od zer sna tshogs bkye bas sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:4955: zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum dag snang
NK043(pi)001:4956: bar byas te mi mjed kyi zhing mthong ba dang
NK043(pi)001:4957: / / de'i tshe mi mjed kyi zhing de byang
NK043(pi)001:4958: chub sems dpa' dang lha dang klu la sogs pas
NK043(pi)001:4959: sa dang bar snang nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab
NK043(pi)001:4960: par mthong nas tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos
NK043(pi)001:4961: tsam yang ma khyab pa med la /
NK043(pi)001:4962: 'khor de dag gis kyang sh+aakya thub pa ni bdag
NK043(pi)001:4963: cag la gzigs shing chos ston par mthong ba'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:4964: zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:4965: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa ni kun tu gzigs pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:4966: mi mjed na gnas pa'i sems can sa dang bar
NK043(pi)001:4967: snang na gnas pa thams cad kyis re res kyang
NK043(pi)001:4968: rang rang la gzigs te chos ston par mthong ngo
NK043(pi)001:4969: // sangs rgyas de ni dbyibs dang kha dog gcig gis kyang dbyibs kha dog sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:4970: tshangs pa dang bdud dang dbang phyug sogs gang dang
NK043(pi)001:4971: gang la mos pa la de dang de'i rnam pa
NK043(pi)001:4972: dang skad kyis chos thos so zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:4973: de nas byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od zer
NK043(pi)001:4974: la sogs pa mi mjed du 'gro bar chas pa
NK043(pi)001:4975: la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol ba
NK043(pi)001:4976: / mi mjed de thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab pas na /
NK043(pi)001:4977: bdag cag gang du mchi ba'i go skabs ma mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:4978: de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:4979: rigs kyi bu dag mi mjed na go skabs med do zhes ma zer cig /
NK043(pi)001:4981: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa de ni sangs
NK043(pi)001:4982: rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag
NK043(pi)001:4983: gis go skabs yangs pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:4984: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:4985: theg gsum las brtsam ste chos ston pa dang bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4986: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ston pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4987: sems can rnams ngan song gsum las 'dren pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:4988: zhi ba'i lam gsum la rab tu 'god par mdzad
NK043(pi)001:4989: pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang
NK043(pi)001:4990: bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no
NK043(pi)001:4991: // rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya
NK043(pi)001:4992: thub pa de sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon
NK043(pi)001:4993: pa'i dus shig na 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs shing
NK043(pi)001:4994: bdag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na /
NK043(pi)001:4995: gnod sbyin dbang po mig ces bya ba gnas shing
NK043(pi)001:4996: s+aa la'i phug tu rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba
NK043(pi)001:4997: dang bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung
NK043(pi)001:4998: gcig gis zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:4999: na / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus s+aa la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5000: de na skus ma khyab pa'i go skabs sor bzhi tsam yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:5001: zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5002: phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po khrag
NK043(pi)001:5003: khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub
NK043(pi)001:5004: pa la / phyag bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5006: chos nyan pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi ri gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5007: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor der rdzu 'phrul mngon
NK043(pi)001:5008: par 'du mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
NK043(pi)001:5009: gis s+aa la'i phug de go skabs yangs par mthong
NK043(pi)001:5011: phug de yang de ltar yangs shing rgya che bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5012: byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:5013: pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul
NK043(pi)001:5014: ba sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:5015: so sor rin chen sna bdun gyi khri stan dag
NK043(pi)001:5016: mngon par sprul zhing de la 'khod nas chos nyan
NK043(pi)001:5017: par byas te / byang chub sems dpa' de dag
NK043(pi)001:5018: phyir dong ba'i ring po ma lon par s+aa la'i
NK043(pi)001:5019: phug de yang sngon bzhin du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5020: gling bzhi de na brgya byin koo shi ka zhes
NK043(pi)001:5021: bya ba tshe zad de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
NK043(pi)001:5023: de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri
NK043(pi)001:5024: bzhi stong dang lhan cig s+aa la'i phug ga la
NK043(pi)001:5025: ba der dong nas phug de'i kho ra khor yug
NK043(pi)001:5027: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:5028: gang bdag gis dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:5029: de'i dbyangs snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum tu bstod na /
NK043(pi)001:5030: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:5031: de ltar dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:5032: des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus dri za'i pi wang blangs te /
NK043(pi)001:5033: glu dang rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas bcom
NK043(pi)001:5034: ldan 'das la bstod pa lnga brgyas basngagasa pa mdzad
NK043(pi)001:5035: do // des bstod par brtsams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5036: bcom ldan 'das de dbyangs snyan rnam par snang byed
NK043(pi)001:5037: tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
NK043(pi)001:5038: zhugs te / ting 'dzin des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na /
NK043(pi)001:5039: gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gnod sbyin dang srin po dang /
NK043(pi)001:5043: lto 'phye chen po rnams dang dri za rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5044: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyang der 'dus par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:5045: gang dag dbyangs la dad pa de dag dbyangs thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5046: gang basngagasa pa dang snyan pa la dga' ba de
NK043(pi)001:5047: dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi basngagasa pa thos nas
NK043(pi)001:5048: shin tu rab tu dang ba'i gus pa skyes so
NK043(pi)001:5049: // gang gling bu'i sgra la dga' ba de dag
NK043(pi)001:5050: gis ni gling bu'i sgra thos nas rab tu dang
NK043(pi)001:5051: // bar gyur to // de nas bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:5052: ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te s+aa la'i phug gi
NK043(pi)001:5054: brgya byin nye bar song ste zhus pa /
NK043(pi)001:5055: bdag gang du mchi bar bgyi /
NK043(pi)001:5057: gnod sbyin dag ji snyed lhags pa rnams 'khod cig /
NK043(pi)001:5058: de nas s+aa la'i phug der gnod sbyin gang+g+aa'i klung
NK043(pi)001:5059: bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag 'khod pa de
NK043(pi)001:5060: ltar s+aa la'i phug rgya che bar gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:5061: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor de dag la chos bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:5062: 'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang
NK043(pi)001:5063: yin pa de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi theg
NK043(pi)001:5065: de dag las dung phyur phrag dgu dang /
NK043(pi)001:5066: bye ba phrag dgus rgyun zhugs kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
NK043(pi)001:5067: 'khor de na theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa
NK043(pi)001:5068: gang yin pa des ni theg pa chen po'i gtam
NK043(pi)001:5070: der dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs
NK043(pi)001:5071: pa khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad ni bla med rdzogs
NK043(pi)001:5072: pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas
NK043(pi)001:5073: par gyur to // gang dag theg pa gsum du sems ma bskyed pa de dag las /
NK043(pi)001:5074: kha cig gis bla med byang chub dang /
NK043(pi)001:5075: kha cig gis nyan thos dang /
NK043(pi)001:5076: kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed do //
NK043(pi)001:5077: brgya byin koo shi ka de yang 'jigs pa las
NK043(pi)001:5078: yongs su grol zhing tshe lo stong du nur nas
NK043(pi)001:5079: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
NK043(pi)001:5080: pa la gnas par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5081: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa
NK043(pi)001:5082: de ni de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no
NK043(pi)001:5083: // de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor kyang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te /
NK043(pi)001:5084: de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
NK043(pi)001:5085: de bzhin du de'i sems can yongs su smin par
NK043(pi)001:5086: mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang rgya che ste
NK043(pi)001:5087: / de'i mtha' sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
NK043(pi)001:5088: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku yang rgya che ste /
NK043(pi)001:5089: de'i spyi gtsug lta ba'am sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
NK043(pi)001:5090: gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de ni /
NK043(pi)001:5091: sems can ji snyed 'dus pa de thams cad de
NK043(pi)001:5092: bzhin gshegs pa de'i khong du zhugs par gyur cing
NK043(pi)001:5093: / de na rgya bar gyur tam /
NK043(pi)001:5094: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba spu'i sgo gcig tu zhugs shing 'byung bar gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:5095: de dag gis cher na lha'i mig gis kyang de
NK043(pi)001:5096: bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba spu'i sgo gcig gi mtha'
NK043(pi)001:5097: yang 'bri ba'am gang bar tshad gzung bar mi nus
NK043(pi)001:5098: te / de ltar sku rgya che'o //
NK043(pi)001:5099: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa ni
NK043(pi)001:5100: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:5101: yin te / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+g+aa'i
NK043(pi)001:5102: klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa 'di
NK043(pi)001:5103: yin te / lta ste / dper na da ltar
NK043(pi)001:5104: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems
NK043(pi)001:5105: can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:5106: can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
NK043(pi)001:5107: mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang thams cad de na
NK043(pi)001:5110: de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang por bla med
NK043(pi)001:5111: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na smon lam de
NK043(pi)001:5112: lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:5113: rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang+g+aa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed phar zhog /
NK043(pi)001:5114: gang+g+aa'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed po de ltar rgya che ba dag /
NK043(pi)001:5115: dper na da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
NK043(pi)001:5116: bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar
NK043(pi)001:5117: gyur pa'i sems can de thams cad 'jig rten gyi
NK043(pi)001:5118: khams mi mjed du zhugs pa rgya chen po de
NK043(pi)001:5119: dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:5120: rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon
NK043(pi)001:5121: dang por sems bskyed pa na bla na med pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5122: ye shes thob pa'i phyir smon lam de lta bu
NK043(pi)001:5123: btab pas na / de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de ltar zhing rgya chen po dang ldan te /
NK043(pi)001:5124: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa de ni ji
NK043(pi)001:5125: skad smros pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de
NK043(pi)001:5126: bzhin gshegs pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa
NK043(pi)001:5127: yin no // rigs kyi bu dag me tog zla ba mdzes pa 'di longs la /
NK043(pi)001:5128: nub phyogs su dbang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der dengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:5129: nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga' 'am /
NK043(pi)001:5130: thugs bade'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig /
NK043(pi)001:5131: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des /
NK043(pi)001:5132: byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang /
NK043(pi)001:5133: byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od zer pho nyar
NK043(pi)001:5134: mngags pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan
NK043(pi)001:5135: cig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sems
NK043(pi)001:5137: 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te /
NK043(pi)001:5138: mi mjed 'dir phyin nas ji skad byung ba rnams gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:5139: de bzhin du mngon par dga' ba'i zhing nas sangs
NK043(pi)001:5140: rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan g.yo ba sogs sngar ji
NK043(pi)001:5142: zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
NK043(pi)001:5143: gzhan shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung nas
NK043(pi)001:5144: mngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa
NK043(pi)001:5145: dag pho nyar mngags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5146: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:5147: kyi zhing yongs su bsgrubs pa mthar phyin ma thag
NK043(pi)001:5148: tu / bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pas /
NK043(pi)001:5149: 'di nas lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba na /
NK043(pi)001:5150: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes
NK043(pi)001:5151: bya ba de yang ngas sngon byang chub kyi sems
NK043(pi)001:5152: dang por bskyed pa dang spyod pa la bcug pa
NK043(pi)001:5153: yin no zhes sogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang zhing
NK043(pi)001:5154: bsgrags pa na / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas grangs
NK043(pi)001:5155: med dpag tu med pa dag gi gdan g.yos shing
NK043(pi)001:5156: byang chub sems dpa' mang po pho nyar mngags pa
NK043(pi)001:5157: sogs gong bzhin du byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5159: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:5160: ngas 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nyer zhi zhes bya ba na /
NK043(pi)001:5161: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:5162: ba bzhugs pa de la sogs pa sangs rgyas mang
NK043(pi)001:5163: po'i mtshan dang zhing bsgrags te /
NK043(pi)001:5164: de thams cad bdag gis dang por byang chub la bcug cing /
NK043(pi)001:5165: byang chub kyi spyod pa la bkod do zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:5166: pas sangs rgyas de dag gi gdan g.yos nas byang
NK043(pi)001:5167: chub sems dpa' tshad med pa zhing 'dir sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:5168: la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir lhags pa gong
NK043(pi)001:5169: bzhin no // de bzhin du byang dang steng dang
NK043(pi)001:5170: 'og dang shar lho la sogs pa nas byang shar
NK043(pi)001:5171: gyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang zhing bsgrags
NK043(pi)001:5173: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi logs
NK043(pi)001:5174: kyi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
NK043(pi)001:5175: khrig 'bum phrag dgu cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na
NK043(pi)001:5176: / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes
NK043(pi)001:5177: bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs bral mngon
NK043(pi)001:5178: par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu s+aa la'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:5179: po zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
NK043(pi)001:5180: de yang dang por ngas bla med byang chub 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:5181: tu bcug cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
NK043(pi)001:5182: bkod nas bla med rdzogs byang du lung bstan thob
NK043(pi)001:5183: bo // zhes pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:5184: mtshan bsgrags pa des de dag gi gdan g.yos nas
NK043(pi)001:5185: byang chub sems dpa' mngags pa'i bar du gong du
NK043(pi)001:5187: mdor na phyogs bcu po dag nas sangs rgyas dpag
NK043(pi)001:5188: tu med pa dag gi drung nas byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:5189: dpa' tshad med pa zhing 'dir lhags te /
NK043(pi)001:5190: zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas rnams kyis me tog bskur zhing snyun dri ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5191: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa de ni bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
NK043(pi)001:5192: bdag cag dang por byang chub 'dzin du bcug cing
NK043(pi)001:5193: phar phyin la bkod nas lung bstan pa thob ste
NK043(pi)001:5194: da ltar sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la chos
NK043(pi)001:5195: ston to zhes phrin springs so //
NK043(pi)001:5196: de ltar phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:5197: dpa' tshad med pa 'dus pa de'i tshe na de
NK043(pi)001:5198: bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:5199: mjed du 'dus pa'i sems can de thams cad kyi
NK043(pi)001:5200: re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du
NK043(pi)001:5201: gyur nas zhing 'di'i sa dang bar snang thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5202: du de lta bu'i sems can dag gis khyab par
NK043(pi)001:5203: ma gyur pa cung zad med kyang /
NK043(pi)001:5204: sems can de thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:5205: sh+aakya thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par nam mkha'
NK043(pi)001:5206: stong pa mthong bar zad kyis gcig gis ni gcig
NK043(pi)001:5207: ma mthong ngo // de dag gi mig lam du
NK043(pi)001:5208: ri rab dang khor yug la sogs pa gzhan gang
NK043(pi)001:5210: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa ting
NK043(pi)001:5211: nge 'dzin mkha' khyab chos sel shin tu sbyangs pa
NK043(pi)001:5212: zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa des me
NK043(pi)001:5213: tog zla mdzes dri ma med pa de dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:5214: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5215: du zhugs te / gang dag zhing khams mi mjed
NK043(pi)001:5216: 'di'i khongs su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de
NK043(pi)001:5217: dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5218: sems can de dag gi sems sems byung dag kyang
NK043(pi)001:5219: gzugs la kun tu lta ba'i yid byed dang bral
NK043(pi)001:5220: nas de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo 'ba'
NK043(pi)001:5221: zhig la nges par rtog ste /
NK043(pi)001:5223: dper na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi
NK043(pi)001:5224: skyed mos tshal lta bur rin po che'i shing ljon
NK043(pi)001:5225: pa sna tshogs dang lo 'bras me tog sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:5226: dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:5227: gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang
NK043(pi)001:5228: dpung rgyan dang mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:5229: kyis brgyan pa de dag mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5230: sems can de dag 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:5231: bdag cag skyed mos tshal de bltar 'dong ngo snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:5232: gang dag mi mjed kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can de thams cad las /
NK043(pi)001:5233: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5235: dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5236: gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ma gtogs par
NK043(pi)001:5237: sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
NK043(pi)001:5238: de'i ba spu'i sgo dag nas spu'i nang du zhugs
NK043(pi)001:5239: par gyur to // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK043(pi)001:5240: rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te bzhengs pa dang
NK043(pi)001:5241: par gyur to // / de nas sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:5242: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa ga la bzhugs /
NK043(pi)001:5243: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:5244: kye sems can dag bdag cag thams cad de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:5245: gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par shes bzhin gyis
NK043(pi)001:5246: soms shig / de nas sems can de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:5247: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyi nang bcas par mthong
NK043(pi)001:5248: zhing ji ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
NK043(pi)001:5249: khong par zhugs te 'dus par gyur pa rang rang
NK043(pi)001:5250: gi mngon sum du gyur nas de dag 'di snyam
NK043(pi)001:5251: soms shig / du sems te / bdag cag gang
NK043(pi)001:5252: nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs shing
NK043(pi)001:5254: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5255: dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la sgras mngon par go
NK043(pi)001:5258: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:5259: gang gi phyir bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa'i ston pas /
NK043(pi)001:5260: chos ston par mdzad kyis de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyis soms shig /
NK043(pi)001:5261: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar bas btud pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5262: bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba la spyod pa'i chos thams cad bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:5266: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5267: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5268: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:5269: de la bsam gtan la gzud pa'i sems bskyed pa
NK043(pi)001:5270: yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa bcu ste 'di lta
NK043(pi)001:5271: ste phan pa'i dngos po yang dag par bskyed pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5272: phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:5273: sems kyis gnas pa dang zhes sogs /
NK043(pi)001:5274: de dag ni bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5275: la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o zhes pa'i bar dang
NK043(pi)001:5276: / mtshan nyid med pa'i sgo yongs su shes pa rtogs pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5277: chos thams cad bdag med par yid la byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5278: sems skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par
NK043(pi)001:5279: rtogs pa gang yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5280: sa yin te de la ni 'jug pa dang ldog
NK043(pi)001:5281: pa chad cing rtog pa med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5283: bzhag pa med pa yin no zhes chos kyi rnam
NK043(pi)001:5284: grangs 'di bshad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i
NK043(pi)001:5285: khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gang+g+aa'i klung dung phyur
