NK043(pi)001:5286: phrag brgyad kyis bye ma snyed bla med rdzogs byang
NK043(pi)001:5287: las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5288: der byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa
NK043(pi)001:5289: ji snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang bzod
NK043(pi)001:5290: pa sna tshogs thob par gyur nas de thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5291: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spu sgo dag nas phyir
NK043(pi)001:5292: thon pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5293: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:5294: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang sku'i
NK043(pi)001:5295: tshad brtag pa'i phyir phyogs bcur rang rang gis sangs
NK043(pi)001:5296: rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5297: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shar phyogs
NK043(pi)001:5298: logs su dong ba de dag shar phyogs su sangs
NK043(pi)001:5299: rgyas kyi zhing dpag med grangs med pa dag 'das
NK043(pi)001:5300: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi
NK043(pi)001:5301: dkyil 'khor ni nyams pa med cing der yang tshig
NK043(pi)001:5302: dang don dang yig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:5303: sgra yang de bzhin du thos te /
NK043(pi)001:5304: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na 'dug pas thos pa bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:5305: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa'i sku skye ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing /
NK043(pi)001:5306: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dag gis khyab par snang ste /
NK043(pi)001:5307: spu'i sgo gcig na yang byang chub sems dpa' dang
NK043(pi)001:5308: nyan thos dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag
NK043(pi)001:5310: de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas spu'i sgo
NK043(pi)001:5311: thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang de ltar snang
NK043(pi)001:5312: ste / ji ltar shar gyi byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:5313: rnams la snang ba de bzhin du lho la sogs
NK043(pi)001:5314: pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK043(pi)001:5315: la yang de bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5316: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed pa bcom
NK043(pi)001:5317: ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs pa de dag
NK043(pi)001:5318: kyang / sku'i spu'i sgo las phyir thon nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
NK043(pi)001:5319: don dang yig 'bru sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstod cing spyan snga na 'khod do //
NK043(pi)001:5320: de nas 'dod gzugs kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang
NK043(pi)001:5321: me tog la sogs pa'i char phab ste rol mo'i
NK043(pi)001:5322: sgra dang gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pas mchod
NK043(pi)001:5323: par byed do // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:5324: chen po 'jigs med yang dag 'dren zhes bya bas
NK043(pi)001:5325: par byed do // / bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
NK043(pi)001:5326: lung bstan pa ba chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags /
NK043(pi)001:5328: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5329: sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5331: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5332: mi 'jigs pa'i lam du sgrol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5333: snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes kyang bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:5335: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am bu mo
NK043(pi)001:5336: gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin 'chang klog
NK043(pi)001:5337: pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs
NK043(pi)001:5338: su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher ston par
NK043(pi)001:5339: bgyid pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par
NK043(pi)001:5340: pa dang / 'gyur lags / bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:5341: ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te /
NK043(pi)001:5342: da yang mdor bsdus nas brjod na /
NK043(pi)001:5343: gang la la zhig chos 'di nyan 'chang klog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5344: gzhan la tshigs bcad gcig tsam rgya cher ston par byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5345: gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na
NK043(pi)001:5346: tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na de bsod
NK043(pi)001:5347: nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur gyi /
NK043(pi)001:5348: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po
NK043(pi)001:5349: bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
NK043(pi)001:5350: spyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de ltar
NK043(pi)001:5351: ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK043(pi)001:5352: lha dang bdud dang tshangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5353: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
NK043(pi)001:5355: dri za dang grul bum dang yi dwags dang sha
NK043(pi)001:5356: za dang lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig
NK043(pi)001:5357: rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya
NK043(pi)001:5358: ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5359: 'thab rtsod 'gyed pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5360: dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char dang 'chi ba
NK043(pi)001:5361: dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba
NK043(pi)001:5362: dang / mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5363: bde zhing lo legs pa dang nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5364: skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med cing bde bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5365: nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5366: dge rtsa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5367: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5368: theg pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5369: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5370: sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5371: rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5373: byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5374: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5375: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams
NK043(pi)001:5376: byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang
NK043(pi)001:5378: mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnas su 'jug par
NK043(pi)001:5379: bya ba'i phyir ngas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
NK043(pi)001:5381: ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad par bya /
NK043(pi)001:5382: su zhig lnga brgya pa tha ma la nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing /
NK043(pi)001:5383: chos ma yin pa lhur len pa'i sems can rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5384: tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du skrogs par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:5385: chos min la chags par gyur pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5386: 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis gnon pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5387: chos log pas dkris pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:5388: sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la kun
NK043(pi)001:5389: tu skyo ba med par ston par 'gyur zhig gu
NK043(pi)001:5391: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas /
NK043(pi)001:5392: 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:5393: lhun po zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo
NK043(pi)001:5394: // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gnod
NK043(pi)001:5395: sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid
NK043(pi)001:5396: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang
NK043(pi)001:5397: // / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:5398: drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung la /
NK043(pi)001:5399: lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5400: byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan dang gzhan du song
NK043(pi)001:5401: ba'i bar dag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig /
NK043(pi)001:5402: de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyed du chu ga cig /
NK043(pi)001:5404: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste /
NK043(pi)001:5405: bdag smon lam gyis bskal pa chen po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa nas /
NK043(pi)001:5406: gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla med rdzogs byang gi spyad pa spyod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5407: bdag gis sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag
NK043(pi)001:5408: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po la bkod cing phyir
NK043(pi)001:5409: mi ldog pa'i sa la yang rab tu bkod do
NK043(pi)001:5410: // bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga brgya pa
NK043(pi)001:5411: tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par
NK043(pi)001:5412: // bgyid pa dang / gang dag 'di las tshig
NK043(pi)001:5413: bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag
NK043(pi)001:5414: 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis
NK043(pi)001:5415: yongs su smin par bgyi lags so //
NK043(pi)001:5417: de ltar 'di ni mdo sde snying rje pad+ma dkar
NK043(pi)001:5418: po'i sngon gyi rabs lung bstan pa'i tshul rnams bsdus
NK043(pi)001:5419: te ma tshang ba med par byas pa 'di'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:5420: gyis ston pa mchog gi bka' drin dang yon tan
NK043(pi)001:5421: la rgyu mtshan shes nas dad pa bskyed par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:5422: // de ltar bdag cag gi ston pa 'dis ni
NK043(pi)001:5423: snying rje chen po mdun du byas nas bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:5424: snyigs ma lnga'i sems can rnams kyi mgon du sangs
NK043(pi)001:5425: // rgyas pa ste / dkon brtsegs byams pas zhus pa'i le'u las /
NK043(pi)001:5426: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams
NK043(pi)001:5427: pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5428: tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5431: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:5432: phyis bdag bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs
NK043(pi)001:5433: rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar zhing rnam
NK043(pi)001:5434: par sbyong ngo // kun dga' bo dus de dang tshod de 'byung ba yod de /
NK043(pi)001:5435: de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5438: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5439: de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
NK043(pi)001:5440: po byams pa smon lam gyi dbang gis bla na
NK043(pi)001:5441: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
NK043(pi)001:5443: kun dga' bo ngas ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:5444: spyad pa spyod pa na snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:5446: sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5447: zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5448: gti mug gi shas che ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5452: chos ma yin par chags shing zhen pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5453: chags pa yang bas zil gyis gnon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5454: chos log par yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5462: mkhan po dang slob dpon la 'khu ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5467: mi cang shes ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du
NK043(pi)001:5468: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5469: sangs rgyas na ci ma rung zhes de ltar smon
NK043(pi)001:5471: dus yang ba 'di lta bu la gnas nas kun
NK043(pi)001:5472: dga' bo ngas snying rje chen po mdun du byas
NK043(pi)001:5473: te / snying rje chen po dang ldan pas nga
NK043(pi)001:5474: da ltar grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang
NK043(pi)001:5476: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su zhugs te chos ston pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5477: nga la kha ngan zer zhes gshe rgya ste tshogs
NK043(pi)001:5478: par mi dbyung brtsub pa barlanga po smra bar byed
NK043(pi)001:5480: nga la chad par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:5481: rtag par smra ba yin no zhes kyang zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:5482: 'khor 'dod pa mang ngo zhes kyang gleng ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5483: khyim gyi nang du zhugs na yang nga las kyang 'thor ro //
NK043(pi)001:5484: dug dang bsres pa'i zas kyang sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:5485: me'i phung po yang nye bar bsgrubs so //
NK043(pi)001:5486: 'di ltar ste sangs rgyas su gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:5487: mdzes ldan ma dang zhes bya ba de lta bur
NK043(pi)001:5488: 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pas nga la skur pa
NK043(pi)001:5489: yang btab bo // kun dga' bo nga ni snying rje chen po mdun du byas te /
NK043(pi)001:5490: snying rje chen po dang ldan pas da ltar sems
NK043(pi)001:5491: can de lta bu de dag la chos ston to
NK043(pi)001:5492: // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5493: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:5494: bcom ldan 'das sems can de lta bu de dag
NK043(pi)001:5495: la chos ston par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:5496: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK043(pi)001:5497: rgyas ma dul ba 'dul ba khur chen po bsnams
NK043(pi)001:5498: pa / dka' ba mdzad pa legs so zhes gsungs pa ltar ro //
NK043(pi)001:5499: gzhan yang bdag cag gi ston pa 'dis sems can
NK043(pi)001:5500: rnams kyi don du bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK043(pi)001:5501: tshol ba'i phyir du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
NK043(pi)001:5502: spyod pa'i tshe na bskal pa grangs med pa 'das
NK043(pi)001:5503: pa'i pha rol gyi sngon gyi tshe na 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:5504: gling 'dir rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:5505: ba rgyal phran lnga stong la dbang byed pa de'i
NK043(pi)001:5506: sras tha chung snying rje chen po zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:5507: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid skye ba bzhes te /
NK043(pi)001:5508: des stag mo bu byung nas zhag du mar bkres
NK043(pi)001:5509: shing skom pas nyen pas rang gi bu yang zab
NK043(pi)001:5510: la thug pa mthong nas snying rje'i sems kyis shing
NK043(pi)001:5511: gi tshal pas rang gi lus las khrag phyung nas
NK043(pi)001:5512: stag mo la ldag tu bcug cing rim gyis sha
NK043(pi)001:5513: ma lus pa za bar byas te lus btang ba
NK043(pi)001:5514: dang / dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skyes pa des
NK043(pi)001:5515: yang yum gyi mya ngan bsang bar mdzad pa dang
NK043(pi)001:5516: dang / // yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom
NK043(pi)001:5517: ldan 'das 'di 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:5518: po zla 'od zhes bya bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5520: lha dang mtshungs par mdzes pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5521: rgyal po'i mnga' dbang dang 'byor ba chen po dang ldan par gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5522: sngon gyi las dge bas 'di ltar gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:5523: da yang dge ba bya bar bsam nas bang mdzod ci yod pa sbyin par dril bsgrags te /
NK043(pi)001:5524: zas dang gos dang rin po che dang sman la
NK043(pi)001:5525: sogs pa ci dang ci 'dod pas thams cad tshim
NK043(pi)001:5526: par byas te / thams cad rgyal po rang nyid dang 'dra bar byas nas bde zhing rtsen to //
NK043(pi)001:5527: de'i tshe rgyal po'i snyan pas sa'i steng kun tu khyab par gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5528: der mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal po chung ba byi ma se na zhes pa phrag dog tu gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:5529: rgyal po zla 'od 'di med par ma byas na
NK043(pi)001:5530: de'i grags pas bdag gi ming dang yon tan mi
NK043(pi)001:5531: mngon par zil gyis gnon pas de med pa'i thabs
NK043(pi)001:5532: ji ltar bya zhes mchod gnas kun tu rgyu rnams
NK043(pi)001:5534: de dag gis rgyal po zla 'od ni 'gro ba
NK043(pi)001:5535: thams cad la pha ma ltar byams pas bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:5536: ni de la gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes
NK043(pi)001:5537: smras so // der rgyal po de ma dga' nas
NK043(pi)001:5538: gang su dag rgyal po zla 'od kyi mgo bcad
NK043(pi)001:5539: de 'ongs na de la rgyal srid kyi phyed dang
NK043(pi)001:5540: bu mo yang chung mar sbyin ces bkar btags pa
NK043(pi)001:5541: smras so // dang / ri brag na bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya bas thos te /
NK043(pi)001:5542: de ltar bsgrub ces smras nas zhag bdun du rang
NK043(pi)001:5543: gi lus bsrung ba'i sngags byas nas rgyal po las
NK043(pi)001:5544: lam rgyags blang te lam du zhugs so //
NK043(pi)001:5545: de'i tshe rgyal po zla 'od kyi yul dus sa g.yo ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5546: skar ma lhung ba sogs ltas ngan pa mang po byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5547: blon po rnams kyis rmi lam ngan pa rmis so //
NK043(pi)001:5548: de'i tshe grong khyer gyi sgo srung ba'i lha mos
NK043(pi)001:5549: bram ze de myos shing bslad par byas te nang
NK043(pi)001:5551: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lhas rgyal po zla 'od
NK043(pi)001:5552: la spyin pa'i phar phyin rdzogs pa'i ched du rmi
NK043(pi)001:5554: de nas rgyal pos blon po zla ba chen po
NK043(pi)001:5555: mngags te grong khyer gyi sgo nas su 'ongs pa
NK043(pi)001:5556: ma bgag par nang du thongs shig ces basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:5557: zla ba chen po sgor song ba dang sgo srung ba'i lhas lus bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:5558: yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i bram ze 'dis sdig pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5559: sems kyis rgyal po'i mgo slong du 'ongs pas nang
NK043(pi)001:5560: du ma btang ba yin no //
NK043(pi)001:5562: gal te de lta bden na gnod pa'i ltas chen po yin te /
NK043(pi)001:5563: 'on kyang rgyal po'i bka' bcag tu mi rung ngo zhes basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:5564: de nas grong khyer srung ba'i lhas bram ze de nang du btang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5565: blon po zla ba chen pos rin po che sna
NK043(pi)001:5566: bdun las byas pa'i mgo lnga brgya byin te rgyal
NK043(pi)001:5567: po'i mgo bslus kyang ma phan par rgyal po'i dbu
NK043(pi)001:5568: bslangs so // rgyal po dga' nas de bzhin du zhag bdun na bgyi bar khas blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:5569: der blon po zla ba chen po dang sa 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:5570: yang mya ngan gyis snying gas te tshe 'phos nas
NK043(pi)001:5571: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tu skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:5572: rgyal po des yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te
NK043(pi)001:5573: rgyal po zla 'od kyis dbu sbyin pa la lta
NK043(pi)001:5574: bar 'dod pa rnams shog ces basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:5575: de'i tshe rgyal phran thams cad 'dus nas dbu mi
NK043(pi)001:5576: sbyin par gsol ba btab kyang zlog tu ma btub
NK043(pi)001:5577: par rang gi dbu las cod pan phud pa na
NK043(pi)001:5578: 'dzam gling gi mi rnams kyi mgo'i cod pan sa
NK043(pi)001:5579: la lhung ngo // de nas grong khyer de'i rgyab
NK043(pi)001:5580: kyi nor bu rin po che'i snying po zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:5581: ba'i skyed mos tshal du dbu tsam pa ka'i shing
NK043(pi)001:5582: la btags te mgo chod la nga'i lag tu bzhag
NK043(pi)001:5584: bdag gi sbyin pa 'dis sems can thams cad kyi
NK043(pi)001:5585: don du bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do
NK043(pi)001:5586: zhes smras nas / bram ze des ral gris gcod par gzas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5587: shing gi lha des bram ze la thal mo gcig bsnun pas 'gyel te /
NK043(pi)001:5588: rgyal pos shing gi lha la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:5589: sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas shing 'di las
NK043(pi)001:5590: mgo dgu brgya dang dgu bcu go dgu snyed kyi
NK043(pi)001:5592: de 'dis mgo stong gi sbyin pa tshang bas na /
NK043(pi)001:5593: nga'i sbyin pa'i phar phyin dang bla med byang chub
NK043(pi)001:5594: kyi bar chad ma byed ces bsgo bas lha des
NK043(pi)001:5595: bram ze de slar sor chud par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:5596: rgyal pos smon lam chen po btab nas bram ze des rgyal po'i dbu bcad do //
NK043(pi)001:5597: de tshe 'phos nas dge rgyas kyi lhar skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:5598: de'i tshe sa rnam par drug tu g.yos shing mi
NK043(pi)001:5599: dang lha rnams kyi mchi ma char bzhin du bab
NK043(pi)001:5600: cing lha'i me tog la sogs pa'i char kyang babs
NK043(pi)001:5601: so // rgyal po zla 'od kyis dbu byin pas
NK043(pi)001:5602: sbyin pa'i phar phyin rdzogs par gyur to zhes grags
NK043(pi)001:5603: pa chen pos sa steng khyab pa rgyal po byi
NK043(pi)001:5604: ma se nas thos nas mi dga' bar snying gas
NK043(pi)001:5606: bram zes rgyal po'i dbu khyer ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5607: rgyal phran dang blon po btsun mo sogs mi thams cad cho nges btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:5609: kha cig mi dran par myos /
NK043(pi)001:5610: kha cig rang gis gdong 'brad cing skra 'bal zhing sa la 'agre'o //
NK043(pi)001:5611: bram ze de lam du zhugs pa na kun gyis
NK043(pi)001:5612: spyo zhing rgyal po'i dbu yang mi sdug cing mnam
NK043(pi)001:5613: par mthong nas sa la bor te song ba'i lam
NK043(pi)001:5614: du / rgyal po byi ma se na yang tshe
NK043(pi)001:5615: 'phos par thos nas re ba ma grub pa'i mya
NK043(pi)001:5616: ngan gyis snying gas te khrag skyugs nas tshe 'phos
NK043(pi)001:5617: du / so // rgyal po dang bram ze de gnyis sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:5618: rgyal po zla 'od kyis mya ngan gyis gdungs te
NK043(pi)001:5619: tshe 'phos pa thams cad mtho ris kyi lhar skyes
NK043(pi)001:5620: so // rgyal po bye ma se na ni bdud sdig can dang /
NK043(pi)001:5621: bram ze de ni lhas byin dang /
NK043(pi)001:5622: blon po zla ba chen po ni sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:5623: sa 'dzin ni moo gal gyi bu yin par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:5624: drin lan bsabs pa'i mdo las rgyal po 'od zer
NK043(pi)001:5625: chen pos dbu btang ba yang tshul 'di dang 'dra
NK043(pi)001:5626: bar byung ngo // yang sngon gyi tshe 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:5627: gling 'dir dbang byed pa'i rgyal po chen po zhig
NK043(pi)001:5628: gi ston pa bram ze nya gro d+ha zhes pa
NK043(pi)001:5629: rgyal po dang 'dra bar kun gyis bskur ba phyug
NK043(pi)001:5630: khyad rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran pa de'i bu
NK043(pi)001:5631: sbyin pa chen po zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das
NK043(pi)001:5632: 'di nyid skye ba bzhes te khye'u de yang gzugs
NK043(pi)001:5633: bar byung ngo // bzang ba / mtshan dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:5634: pa rig byed dang sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi pha
NK043(pi)001:5635: rol du son par gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:5636: de 'byor ba chen pos grong khyer gyi phyir dong ba na /
NK043(pi)001:5638: sdig pas 'tsho ba'i mi sna tshogs mthong nas snying
NK043(pi)001:5639: rje'i mchi ma blags te yab la sbyin pa gtong
NK043(pi)001:5640: bar zhus pa dang gnang ste /
NK043(pi)001:5641: yul gyi slong ba thams cad la ci 'dod pa
NK043(pi)001:5642: byin pas rim gyis bang mdzod sum cha gnyis zad
NK043(pi)001:5643: de gcig lus pa na mdzod srung bar bram ze
NK043(pi)001:5644: la de ltar zhus kyang bu'i ngo mi ldog pas
NK043(pi)001:5646: khyed cag gis mi khom pa ltar snyad thogs shig
NK043(pi)001:5647: ces smras pa ltar mdzod srung gnas gzhan du song
NK043(pi)001:5648: nas sgo mi 'byed pa dang 'ongs na yang yid
NK043(pi)001:5649: bzhin du mi ster bas slong mo ba'i bsam pa
NK043(pi)001:5650: rdzogs par ma gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5651: sbyin pa chen po de 'di snyam du 'di ltar
NK043(pi)001:5652: mdzod srung gis thugs mi thub pas pha ma'i bka'
NK043(pi)001:5654: der ma zad bus pha ma'i bang mdzod stong par bya ba yang mi rigs pas /
NK043(pi)001:5655: bdag gis thabs zhig gis rin po che yid bzhin
NK043(pi)001:5656: rnyed nas nor zad mi shes pa byas te skye
NK043(pi)001:5657: bo mang po la phan gdags par bya'o snyam nas
NK043(pi)001:5658: / mi rnams la thabs dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5660: rkang 'gros spel ba dang tshong byas na zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:5661: kha cig gis rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu blangs na legs zhes smras pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5662: sbyin pa chen po des zhing rmo ba sogs nga'i cha min te /
NK043(pi)001:5663: rgya mtshor zhugs nas nor bu len par bya'o snyam
NK043(pi)001:5664: du pha ma la de ltar bgyi bar zhus pa
NK043(pi)001:5665: dang / de dag gis rgya mtsho la zhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:5666: bde bar 'khor dka' bar smras te ma gnang ngo
NK043(pi)001:5667: dang / // der bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi
NK043(pi)001:5668: bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la kha sbubs
NK043(pi)001:5669: te mi ldang bar dam bcas nas zhag drug gi
NK043(pi)001:5671: pha mas gtam sna tshogs byas te bzlog kyang ma btub nas /
NK043(pi)001:5672: de nas pha mas gnang ste zas zos so //
NK043(pi)001:5673: de nas mi lnga brgya tsam dang 'grogs nas lam
NK043(pi)001:5674: du zhugs te song ba las zhag du ma 'das
NK043(pi)001:5675: pa na mi rgod kyis bcom ste nor thams cad
NK043(pi)001:5676: 'phrogs so // de nas yang song ba las grong
NK043(pi)001:5677: khyer da shu par zhes par phyin nas bram ze
NK043(pi)001:5678: ka byi li zhes pa dang 'phrad de /
NK043(pi)001:5679: de'i khyim du song nas gser srang sum stong bslangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5680: de'i tshe bram ze de'i bu mo gser gyi mdog can skra mthon kar 'dug pa de /
NK043(pi)001:5681: rgyal phran bzhi stong gis bslangs kyang ma ster ba
NK043(pi)001:5682: des khyim gyi nang na 'dug bzhin sgo na gnas
NK043(pi)001:5683: pa'i sbyin pa chen po'i skad thos pa tsam gyis
NK043(pi)001:5684: / phyi sgo na skad grags pa 'di kho bo'i
NK043(pi)001:5685: khyim thab yin no zhes pha ma la smras so
NK043(pi)001:5686: / // de nas bram ze de sgor byung ba
NK043(pi)001:5687: dang khye'u 'di ni gzhan las 'phags so snyam du
NK043(pi)001:5688: / // / gser bslangs pa la lag pa ya gcig gis gser dang /
NK043(pi)001:5689: gcig gis bu mo khrid de gser dang bu mo yang byin no //
NK043(pi)001:5690: sbyin pa chen pos kyang rgya mtsho las phyir 'khor na de bzhin bagyi'o zhes khas blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:5691: bram ze des gser srang sum stong dang gzhan yang
NK043(pi)001:5692: yo byad ci dgos pa sbyar te rgya mtsho'i ngogs
NK043(pi)001:5694: rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i khe nyen bsgrags te /
NK043(pi)001:5696: der tshong pa dag rin po che'i gling du sbyin
NK043(pi)001:5697: pa chen po rin po che brtags pa la mkhas
NK043(pi)001:5698: pas rin po che rnams rin thang bcas tshong ba
NK043(pi)001:5699: rnams la bstan nas gru bkang ste phyir log go
NK043(pi)001:5700: // sbyin pa chen po ni klu'i rgyal po'i pho
NK043(pi)001:5701: brang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu ma thob kyi
NK043(pi)001:5702: bar du phyir mi ldog go zhes smras pas tshong
NK043(pi)001:5703: pa rnams yi mug ste bdag thams cad phyir mi
NK043(pi)001:5704: 'gro bar 'khyam mo zhes smras pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5705: sbyin pa chen pos khyed cag yul du bde bar phyin par kho bos smon lam gdab par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:5706: zhes pog phor lag tu blangs te phyogs bzhir mchod
NK043(pi)001:5707: nas bden pa'i tshig brjod cing slar log ste 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:5710: zhag bdun du chu pus mo nub tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:5711: de nas zhag bdun du barla nub tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:5712: de nas zhag bdun sked pa nub tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:5713: yang zhag bdun du phrag pa nub tsam dang /
NK043(pi)001:5714: de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du rkyal byas te ri zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5715: shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegs nas zhag bdun gyis ri de'i rtser phyin to //
NK043(pi)001:5716: ri rtser zhag bdun song nas yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du phyin to //
NK043(pi)001:5717: der chu'i nang nas pad+ma gser gyi mdog can gyi
NK043(pi)001:5718: rtsa ba la sbrul gdug pas dkris shing 'dug pa
NK043(pi)001:5719: mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de
NK043(pi)001:5720: skyil mo krung bcas te byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:5721: la zhugs pas sbrul gdug pa de dag zhe sdang
NK043(pi)001:5722: zhi zhing snying brtse bas gdug pa kun zhi nas
NK043(pi)001:5723: byang chub sems dpa' de pad+ma'i steng nas gom pa
NK043(pi)001:5724: bor te zhag bdun du song song ba las sbrul
NK043(pi)001:5725: gdug pa de dag las brtol to //
NK043(pi)001:5726: de nas yang song ba las srin po dang 'phrad nas de dag mi'i dri tshor zhing rgyug go //
NK043(pi)001:5727: der yang byams pa'i sems bskyed pas srin po de
NK043(pi)001:5728: dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas
NK043(pi)001:5730: sbyin pa chen pos kho bo yid bzhin gyi nor
NK043(pi)001:5731: bu rin po che tshol du 'ong ba yin no
NK043(pi)001:5732: // srin po de dag dga' nas /
NK043(pi)001:5733: 'di ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:5734: du ba sa'i pho brang shin tu ring bas nam
NK043(pi)001:5735: yang mi phyin pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'di
NK043(pi)001:5736: mthu zhig gis bstangs te bskyal lo snyam du nam
NK043(pi)001:5737: mkhar khyer nas dpag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol na
NK043(pi)001:5739: de nas yang song song ba las ring por ma
NK043(pi)001:5740: lon par dngul gyi mkhar zhig mthong nas 'di ni
NK043(pi)001:5741: klu'i gnas shig yin no snyam ste nye bar song
NK043(pi)001:5742: ngo // mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun
NK043(pi)001:5743: gyis bskor te nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bar
NK043(pi)001:5744: ngo // mthong ngo // de la byams pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:5745: bskyed pas gdug pa zhi zhing de dag rkang pas
NK043(pi)001:5746: bardzisa nas klu'i mkhar du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5747: mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te mgo mkhar sgo la brten cing /
NK043(pi)001:5748: de gnyis kyis sbyin pa chen po mthong nas mgo
NK043(pi)001:5749: bo bteg stee 'dug 'byin pa las byams pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:5750: bskyed pas mgo smad nas sa la nyal ba de'i
NK043(pi)001:5751: mgo la bardzisa nas mkhar nang du song ba dang
NK043(pi)001:5752: / klu zhig rin chen sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5753: klu des byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas sngangs te /
NK043(pi)001:5754: 'obs bdun gyis bskor bas gzhan su yang 'dir 'ong mi nus na /
NK043(pi)001:5755: 'di lta bu su yin snyam du langs nas bsus
NK043(pi)001:5756: te rin po che'i khri la bzhag cing kha zas
NK043(pi)001:5758: de nas ci ltar 'ong ba dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5759: 'dzam gling gi mi rnams dbul zhing phongs pas sdig
NK043(pi)001:5760: pa sna tshogs byas nas tshe 'phos ma thag tu
NK043(pi)001:5761: ngan song du lhung ba de la bdag snying brtse
NK043(pi)001:5762: bas lam ring po'i nyon mongs pa dang bsngosa te
NK043(pi)001:5763: / rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu slong du 'ongs so //
NK043(pi)001:5764: nor bu des sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5765: bsod nams kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'tshal gyis
NK043(pi)001:5766: bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar rin po che
NK043(pi)001:5767: stsal du gsol / klu'i rgyal pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:5768: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed dka' ba yin te /
NK043(pi)001:5769: khyod 'di'i phyir 'ongs na zla ba gcig 'dug ste /
NK043(pi)001:5770: bdag gi mchod pa bzhes shing chos bstan na nor bu rin po che sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:5771: byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya bar
NK043(pi)001:5772: smras nas klu'i rgyal pos nyin gciig bzhin kha zas
NK043(pi)001:5773: ro brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs phul zhing rol
NK043(pi)001:5774: mos kyang mchod / byang chub sems dpas de la
NK043(pi)001:5775: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
NK043(pi)001:5776: zla ba gcig tu bstan nas phyir 'gro bar chas
NK043(pi)001:5777: mos kyang mchod / pa na / klu'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:5778: dga' zhing gtsug gi nor bu rin po che bkrol
NK043(pi)001:5779: mos kyang mchod / pa na / te phul nas
NK043(pi)001:5780: / skyes bu chen po khyod sangs rgyas pa na
NK043(pi)001:5781: khyod kyi nye gnas mchog tu gyur cig ces smon
NK043(pi)001:5782: mos kyang mchod / pa na / te phul nas
NK043(pi)001:5783: / lam btab bo // nor bu 'di la mthu
NK043(pi)001:5784: stobs ci yod ces klu'i rgyal po la dris pa
NK043(pi)001:5785: mos kyang mchod / pa na / te phul nas
NK043(pi)001:5786: / lam btab bo // na / 'dis dpag tshad
NK043(pi)001:5787: nyis stong du dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:5789: byang chub sems dpas nor bu 'di mthu che mod
NK043(pi)001:5790: kyi bdag gi bsam pa'i don chen po 'grub mi
NK043(pi)001:5791: nus so snyam nas klu'i rgyal po 'khor bcas kyis
NK043(pi)001:5793: de nas yang song ba las beed+aur+ya sngon po'i mkhar 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5794: klu gnyis kyis dkris pa la sngar bzhin byams pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5795: sems kyis bardzisa nas song ste mkhar gyi nang na
NK043(pi)001:5796: 'dug pa'i klu'i rgyal pos gong bzhin bsu zhing bkur
NK043(pi)001:5797: stir byas nas / nor bu bslangs pa la zla
NK043(pi)001:5798: ba gnyis su chos bstan na phul bar smras pa
NK043(pi)001:5799: bzhin zla ba gnyis su rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5800: chos bstan nas klu'i rgyal pos yid bzhin gyi nor
NK043(pi)001:5801: bu dpag tshad bzhi stong du ci 'dod pa'i char
NK043(pi)001:5803: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe nye gnas su smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:5804: byang chub sems dpas nor bu 'di yang mthu che ste /
NK043(pi)001:5805: bdag gi bsam pa'i tshod tsam du ma gyur to snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:5806: yang song ba las gser gyi mkhar 'obs bdun dang
NK043(pi)001:5807: klu gnyis kyis dkris pa can gyi nang du sngar
NK043(pi)001:5808: bzhin song ste bsu ba dang dri ba sogs snga
NK043(pi)001:5809: ma bzhin la / der zla ba bzhir chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher phye zhing bstan pas /
NK043(pi)001:5810: klu'i rgyal po'i gtsug nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkrol te phul nas /
NK043(pi)001:5811: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe nye gnas su yang smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:5812: nor bu de'i mthus dpag tshad brgyad stong gi khor
NK043(pi)001:5813: yug tu rin po che'i char dang ci 'dod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:5815: byang chub sems dpa' gdod dga' ste /
NK043(pi)001:5816: 'dzam bu'i gling gi khyon dpag tshad bdun stong las med na /
NK043(pi)001:5817: nor bu rin po che 'dis ni bdag re ba skong ngo snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:5818: snga phyir rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che gsum
NK043(pi)001:5819: gos kyi mthar bcing ste sgor phyung ba dang klu'i
NK043(pi)001:5820: rgyal po 'khor bcas kyis bskyal lo //
NK043(pi)001:5821: de nas byang chub sems dpas pha zad cig tu
NK043(pi)001:5822: phyin nas nor bu rin po che rnams lag par
NK043(pi)001:5823: thogs te / smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:5824: 'di rnams yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yang dag pa yin na /
NK043(pi)001:5825: bdag nam mkha' la 'phur ba gyur cig ces smras
NK043(pi)001:5826: ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'phur te rgya mtsho'i
NK043(pi)001:5827: gegs las thar nas ngogs su phyin cing /
NK043(pi)001:5828: de na cung zad ngal bso zhing gnyid log pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:5829: rgya mtsho'i klu phran rnams bgros nas rgya mtsho 'di
NK043(pi)001:5830: na nor bu rin po che 'di gsum las med
NK043(pi)001:5831: de sum char mi 'dis khyer na /
NK043(pi)001:5832: 'di phyir barku'o zhes byas nas klu rnams kyis brkus so //
NK043(pi)001:5833: byang chub sems dpa' sad nas bltas pas nor bu med par mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:5834: 'di ni gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus kyis /
NK043(pi)001:5835: bdag gi mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskam par bya'o snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:5836: nor bu phyir ma thob kyi bar du lag pa
NK043(pi)001:5837: stong par phyir mi 'gro bar yi dam bcas shing
NK043(pi)001:5838: / rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste rus sbal gyi
NK043(pi)001:5839: khog pa zhig blangs nas lag gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i
NK043(pi)001:5840: / chu bcus so // de nas rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas 'di skad ces so //
NK043(pi)001:5841: rgya mtsho 'di ni gting zab cing yangs te /
NK043(pi)001:5842: dpag tshad stong phrag sum brgya sum cu yod pas /
NK043(pi)001:5843: 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad kyis kyang rgya mtsho
NK043(pi)001:5844: bskam mi nus na khyod gcig pus lta ci smros
NK043(pi)001:5846: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:5847: mi gcig gis snying nas las byas na ci yang mi 'grub pa med do //
NK043(pi)001:5848: bdag gis rin po che rnyed pas 'gro ba thams cad la phan bde bya snyam zhing /
NK043(pi)001:5849: de'i bsod nams kyis 'tshang rgya bar 'dod de /
NK043(pi)001:5850: de la sems ma zhum na /
NK043(pi)001:5851: ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di bskam par mi nus zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:5852: de'i tshe lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pus /
NK043(pi)001:5853: rgya mtsho'i chus cus te 'gro ba mang po'i don du dka' ba byed pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:5854: gcig nas gcig tu sbran pas thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te /
NK043(pi)001:5855: byang chub sems dpas snod kyis chu bcu ba mthong
NK043(pi)001:5856: nas lha de dag so sos lha'i gos phud pa
NK043(pi)001:5857: chur smyugs te / lan gcig phyir phyung bas /
NK043(pi)001:5858: rgya mtsho'i chu dpag tshad bzhi bcur 'grib bo //
NK043(pi)001:5859: yang lan gnyis smyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad cu 'grib bo //
NK043(pi)001:5860: lan gsum smyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu 'grib
NK043(pi)001:5861: pas klu de dag 'jigs skrag nas byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:5863: thongs shig rgya mtsho'i chu skams par ma byed cig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5864: byang chub sems dpas brtson pa de btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:5865: de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
NK043(pi)001:5866: khyod kyis nor bu rin po che 'di ci zhig
NK043(pi)001:5867: tu dgos / bdag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:5869: sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos na rgya
NK043(pi)001:5870: mtsho'i nang na yang sems can mang du yod na
NK043(pi)001:5871: ci'i phyir bskur / smras pa rgya mtsho'i nang na
NK043(pi)001:5872: gnas pa yang sems can yin mod kyi de la
NK043(pi)001:5873: phongs pa'i sdug bsngal med de /
NK043(pi)001:5874: 'dzam gling gi mi rnams nor gyi phyir gcig la
NK043(pi)001:5875: gcig 'tshe bas mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par byas
NK043(pi)001:5876: pas tshe 'phos nas dmyal bar skye ste /
NK043(pi)001:5877: de la bdag snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:5878: de nas klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che phyungs te slar phul lo //
NK043(pi)001:5879: rgya mtsho'i lhas kyang sangs rgyas pa'i tshe nye gnas kyi mchog tu smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:5880: de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu rin po
NK043(pi)001:5881: che phyir thob nas nam mkha' la 'phur te gnas
NK043(pi)001:5882: su 'ongs nas sngar gyi tshong pa grogs po rnams
NK043(pi)001:5883: dris pa dang / de dag bde bar phyin nas
NK043(pi)001:5884: gcig la gcig dri zhing ngo mtshar du bzung ngo
NK043(pi)001:5885: dris pa dang / // rgyal bo ka byi la'i sgor phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5886: byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho las phyir log go
NK043(pi)001:5887: zhes thos nas thams cad kyis sgor bsus te dga'
NK043(pi)001:5888: nas / tshong pa grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' ston chen po bgyis so //
NK043(pi)001:5889: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas rin po che thogs nas khyim du 'ongs ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:5890: bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5891: bram ze ka byi las rin po che sna tshogs kyis bu mo brgyan nas /
NK043(pi)001:5892: rin po che'i chu snod bskur bas byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:5893: dpa'i rkang pa bkrus shing bu mo'i lag pa nas
NK043(pi)001:5894: bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la gtad do //
NK043(pi)001:5895: byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas /
NK043(pi)001:5896: bram ze rab tu dga' ste g.yog bu mo lnga brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:5897: glang po che lnga brgya yang rin po ches brgyan
NK043(pi)001:5898: te rol mo byas nas byang chub sems dpa' la
NK043(pi)001:5899: bardzangasa so // de'i tshe sbyin pa mchog chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:5900: pha ma bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu ngus pas
NK043(pi)001:5901: pha ma gnyis ka'i mig long bar gyur pa bu
NK043(pi)001:5902: dang 'phrad pa na pha ma la phyag 'tshal te
NK043(pi)001:5903: de'i lag pa nas 'dzus shing bu yin par rtogs
NK043(pi)001:5904: bardzangasa so // so // sbyin pa chen po /
NK043(pi)001:5905: khyod nged bor nas song ba'i 'og tu mig kyang mdongs so //
NK043(pi)001:5906: khyod rgya mtshor song bas ci rnyed ces dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:5907: nor bu rin po che pha'i lag tu bzhag ste bdag gis 'di rnyed do zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5908: pha mas lag tu blangs te /
NK043(pi)001:5909: 'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni nga'i mdzod na sngar yang mang du yod na /
NK043(pi)001:5910: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bsngo ci dgos zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:5911: de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te pha ma'i mig phyis pas /
NK043(pi)001:5912: rlung drag pos sprin bus pa bzhin du pha ma
NK043(pi)001:5913: gnyis kyi mig kyang sngar bas gsal bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:5914: // pha ma gnyis dga' ste nor bu rin po che yang dag pa lta ste /
NK043(pi)001:5915: nyon mongs pa'i nad sel bar gyur to zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:5916: de nas sbyin pa chen pos rin po che thogs
NK043(pi)001:5917: te pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che'i gdan dang
NK043(pi)001:5918: steng du rin po che'i bla re 'byung bar smon
NK043(pi)001:5919: lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin du gyur te
NK043(pi)001:5920: bang mdzod thams cad kyang gang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:5921: de nas rgyal po'i pho nya gcig dpag tshad brgya
NK043(pi)001:5922: stong du 'gro ba'i glang po che la bskyon te
NK043(pi)001:5923: / 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa
NK043(pi)001:5924: chen pos rgya mtsho nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu
NK043(pi)001:5925: / rnyed de / da ste zhag bdun na yo
NK043(pi)001:5926: byad thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyis so so
NK043(pi)001:5927: nas ci bde bar longs shig ces bsgrags so //
NK043(pi)001:5928: de'ang sbyin pa chen pos khrus byas gos gsar pa bgos nas /
NK043(pi)001:5929: thang ga la bar mnyam por rgya mtshan btsugs pa'i rtse la yid bzhin gyi nor bu btags nas /
NK043(pi)001:5930: pog phor lag tu blangs te smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:5931: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni dbul phongs sha ltag ste /
NK043(pi)001:5932: de la phan gdags dgos kyi /
NK043(pi)001:5933: yid bzhin gyi nor bu yang dag mi bardzu na
NK043(pi)001:5934: pa yin na so so nas ci dang ci dgos
NK043(pi)001:5935: pa thams cad yid bzhin du char phob cig ces
NK043(pi)001:5936: smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung g.yos pas
NK043(pi)001:5937: mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te char
NK043(pi)001:5938: zim bus rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og tu
NK043(pi)001:5939: / thog mar bza' btung ro brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs so //
NK043(pi)001:5942: de'i 'og tu rin po che char bzhin du bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:5943: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad nor bu rin po che'i
NK043(pi)001:5944: phung pos gang nas rin po che dag gseg ma
NK043(pi)001:5945: dang gyo mo lta bur mang bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:5946: de ltar kun tshim par byas nas 'dzam gling gi
NK043(pi)001:5947: mi rnams langs ni khyed rnams nor gyis phongs nas
NK043(pi)001:5948: sdig pa'i las byas pas ngan song du 'gro ba
NK043(pi)001:5950: rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang nyon mongs pa mang po khyad du bsad de nor bu blangs nas /
NK043(pi)001:5951: da khyed kun cis kyang mi brel bar bde bar gyur gyis /
NK043(pi)001:5952: khyed rnams da lus dang ngag dang yid bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:5953: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson par gyis
NK043(pi)001:5954: shig ces thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas
NK043(pi)001:5955: bstan cing bskul bas dge ba bcu la nan tan
NK043(pi)001:5957: 'dzam gling gi mi rnams tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:5958: de dus kyi sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma ni da ltar zas gtsang dang /
NK043(pi)001:5960: dngul mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:5961: beed+aur+ya'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni moo gal bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:5962: gser gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni kun
NK043(pi)001:5963: dga' bo yin te de'i dus kyang nga la bsnyen
NK043(pi)001:5964: bkur byas so // rgya mtsho'i lha de ni ma 'gags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:5965: yang rgyal bu don grub ces par gyur pa'i dus
NK043(pi)001:5966: na yang rgya mtsho las nor bu blangs pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:5968: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
NK043(pi)001:5969: rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:5970: rin po che'i go cha zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:5971: de la btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas lnga
NK043(pi)001:5972: brgya yod kyang bu med nas nyi zla la sogs
NK043(pi)001:5973: pa'i lha la gsol ba btab kyang bu med nas
NK043(pi)001:5975: bdag shi ba'i rjes su rgyal phran rnams 'khrugs nas yul mi bde bar 'gyur ro snyam pa na /
NK043(pi)001:5976: lha zhig gis rgyal po de la rmi lam du
NK043(pi)001:5977: pho brang gi phyi rol gyi tshal na drang srong
NK043(pi)001:5979: gcig gi lus ni gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa
NK043(pi)001:5980: de la gsol ba thob cig dang de khyod kyi
NK043(pi)001:5981: bur skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgos pa bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:5982: drang srong de la bur skye bar gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:5983: des kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:5984: drang srong gcig gis kyang bdag khyod kyi bur skye
NK043(pi)001:5985: bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang rgyal po dga' ste
NK043(pi)001:5986: de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:5987: de nas dus phyi zhig na drang srong gser gyi mdog can tshe 'phos nas /
NK043(pi)001:5988: btsun mo chen mo'i mngal du skyes te zla ba
NK043(pi)001:5989: dgu tshang nas khye'u gser gyi mdog can skra mthon
NK043(pi)001:5990: mthing du 'dug pa mtshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas
NK043(pi)001:5991: te / btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:5992: brtags nas rgyal bu'i ming dge don du btags so
NK043(pi)001:5993: te / // de nas btsun mo gcig kyang sems
NK043(pi)001:5994: can dang ldan par gyur te drang srong gcig shos
NK043(pi)001:5996: btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan rnams kyis de'i ming sdig don du btags so //
NK043(pi)001:5997: khye'u dge don cher skyes nas rig pa bco brgyad
NK043(pi)001:5998: sogs gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:5999: // phyis dge don gyis rgyal po la gsol te
NK043(pi)001:6000: phyir 'chag cing ltad mo lta bar 'byor pa chen
NK043(pi)001:6001: po dang bcas te dong ba na /
NK043(pi)001:6002: yul mi thams cad kyis lta zhing 'di ni gzi brjid tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes basngagasa so //
NK043(pi)001:6003: rgyal bu de song song ba las /
NK043(pi)001:6004: skye bo dbul po gos ngan pa can dang /
NK043(pi)001:6006: zhing rmo ba nya ba rngon pa sogs mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:6007: dris pa na de dag gis kyang bdag cag dbul
NK043(pi)001:6008: zhing phongs pas khyim gyi mi rnams 'tsho mi nus
NK043(pi)001:6009: pa dang / rigs brgyud kyi las kyi mtha' 'di lta bu la spyod do zhes smras pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6010: rgyal bu des snying brtse ba'i mchi ma gzags te
NK043(pi)001:6011: kye ma 'di dag mun pa nas mun par 'gro
NK043(pi)001:6014: yab la sbyin pa sbyin par gnang ba zhus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6015: yab kyis kyang gnang ste bang mdzod thams cad byin nas sum cha gcig la bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6016: mdzod srung bas rgyal po la gsol te thabs kyis snyad btags nas /
NK043(pi)001:6017: slong mo ba'i bsam pa rdzogs par ma nus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6018: dge don gyis rgya mtsho las nor bu len pa'i bsam pa skyes te /
NK043(pi)001:6019: rgyas par sngar sbyin pa chen po'i skabs su smros pa bzhin du lta'o //
NK043(pi)001:6020: der tshong pa lnga brgya dang 'grogs te ded dpon rgan pa dang bcas pa rgya mtshor chas so //
NK043(pi)001:6021: rgyal bu sdig don yang bdag phu bo'i g.yog tu 'agro'o zhes gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:6022: rgyal po'i bsam par gzhan su song ba las nu bo song na phan snyam ste gnang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6023: de nas rgyal bus gser srang sum stong blangs te srang stong gru zong du byas /
NK043(pi)001:6024: nyis stong 'phral gyi dgos pa'i yo byad du byas
NK043(pi)001:6025: te rgyal po dang btsun mo sogs kyis bskyal la
NK043(pi)001:6026: / de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:6027: grur zhugs shing thag pa bdun gyis brtod nas tshong pa rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6028: rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs sna tshogs yod de /
NK043(pi)001:6029: snga dang phyis 'dong pa ni rab tu mang mod kyi phyir 'khor ba ni nyung rabs so //
NK043(pi)001:6030: de la the tshom za ba yod na phyir dengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6031: gal te lus srog dang pha ma sogs la mi
NK043(pi)001:6032: lta bar 'dong zhing rin po che'i gling du phyin
NK043(pi)001:6033: te phyir 'khor na bu tsha bdun brgyud tshun chad
NK043(pi)001:6034: du nor gyis mi brel bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgos
NK043(pi)001:6035: nas thag pa re re bcad do //
NK043(pi)001:6036: de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du lan
NK043(pi)001:6037: re de skad bsgos nas rlung phyogs su bab pa
NK043(pi)001:6038: la g.yer shing bsgrengs te mgyogs khyad mda' bzhin song
NK043(pi)001:6039: ngo // de nas rin po che'i gling du phyin
NK043(pi)001:6040: nas rgyal bu rin po che brtags la mkhas pa
NK043(pi)001:6041: des rin po che'i bzang ngan dang mang nyung gi
NK043(pi)001:6042: tshad kyang bstan nas so so nas rin po che
NK043(pi)001:6043: ngo // tshol lo // tshong pa phal pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:6044: der bzhag nas ded dpon dang rgyal bu dge don
NK043(pi)001:6045: gnyis gru chung zhig gi nang du zhugs te song
NK043(pi)001:6046: ngo // tshol lo // song ba las / dngul
NK043(pi)001:6047: dang beed+aur+ya'i ri dang gser gyi ri'i drung du song
NK043(pi)001:6048: ste gser gyi bye ma'i steng du 'dug nas ded
NK043(pi)001:6049: dpon rgas pa de na re /
NK043(pi)001:6050: bdag ni rgas zhum ste da ni 'gro mi phod do //
NK043(pi)001:6051: kho bo ni 'di nyid du tshe dus byed par 'gyur gyi /
NK043(pi)001:6052: khyod 'di nas song la rin chen sna bdun gyi
NK043(pi)001:6053: mkhar zhig yod kyi de'i mkhar sgo bcad cing 'dug
NK043(pi)001:6054: na / sgo drung du rdo rje'i gtun zhig yod pa des mkhar sgo rdungs shig dang /
NK043(pi)001:6055: nang nas lha mo lnga brgya zhig so so nas rin po che thogs te 'bul du 'ong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6056: de nas lha mo gcig gis rin po che sngon
NK043(pi)001:6057: po zhig thogs shing mdun du 'ong gis de ni
NK043(pi)001:6058: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin no
NK043(pi)001:6059: // thob ma thag tu ma shor bar dam du zungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6060: bu mo gzhan dag gi nor bu yang longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6061: dbang po rab tu sdoms la de dag lam smra zhig /
NK043(pi)001:6062: bdag ni 'dir tshe 'phos na drin dran par gyis
NK043(pi)001:6063: la 'di nyid du rus pa sbas te songs shig
NK043(pi)001:6064: ces bsgos ma thag tu tshe dus byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6065: de nas de'i rus bu gser gyi bye ma'i nang
NK043(pi)001:6066: du sbas nas song ba ded dpon gyis ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:6068: rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar sgo rdo rje'i gtun bus brdungs pas lha mo lnga brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:6069: nang gi lha mo gcig gis nor bu byin pa
NK043(pi)001:6070: gos kyi tha mar phur te de ma thag tu
NK043(pi)001:6071: phyir log go // de nas tshong pa rnams la
NK043(pi)001:6072: sdig don gyis rin po che mang du longs shig
NK043(pi)001:6073: ces bos pa bzhin mang du blangs pas gru bar
NK043(pi)001:6075: bar 'ga' byung na yang dge don 'ba' zhig ni
NK043(pi)001:6076: nor bu rin po che yod pas chur ma nub
NK043(pi)001:6077: bo // sdig don skra ga nas dge don la skyobs shig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6078: sdig don khrid de rgya mtshor brgal to //
NK043(pi)001:6079: de nas sdig don gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6080: bdag cag spun gnyis pha ma dang bral te /
NK043(pi)001:6081: rgya mtshor rin po che len du song ba las ma sres te /
NK043(pi)001:6082: rin po che dang bral nas lag stong par khyim du 'gro ba ni ngo tsha'o //
NK043(pi)001:6083: dge don ni drang bas bdag gis rin po che
NK043(pi)001:6084: thob na ci'i phyir ngo tsha zhes smras pa dang
NK043(pi)001:6085: rin po che ji lta bu zhig rnyed pa bdag
NK043(pi)001:6087: phu bos rin po che bkrol te bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:6088: de mthong nas sdig don 'di snyam du bdag gi pha ma yang phu bo la byams /
NK043(pi)001:6089: bdag la mi byams pa'i steng du /
NK043(pi)001:6090: phu bos rin po che rnyed la bdag ci yang
NK043(pi)001:6091: ma rnyed par song na de bas kyang mi byams
NK043(pi)001:6092: pas phu bo 'di gnyid log pa'i tshe bsad nas
NK043(pi)001:6093: nor bu khyer te song la pha mas dris pa
NK043(pi)001:6094: na / phu bo ni rgya mtsho'i nang du nub
NK043(pi)001:6095: bo zhes bya'o snyam nas phu bo la smras pa
NK043(pi)001:6096: na / / bdag cag spun gnyis rin po che
NK043(pi)001:6097: thogs te gnyis gcig char nyal ba mi rigs kyi
NK043(pi)001:6098: na / / / res kyis nyal la mel tshe
NK043(pi)001:6099: bya'o zhes smras pa la phu bos kyang de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:6100: na / / / du bya'o // zhes byas te res kyis mel tshe byed pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6101: phu bos sngar mel tshe byas te thun 'khor kyang ring zhig langs su ma btub bo //
NK043(pi)001:6102: phu bos yun ring mel tshe byas nas nu bo gdod langs te /
NK043(pi)001:6103: phu bo gnyid 'thug pos log pa'i 'og tu tshal
NK043(pi)001:6104: gyi nang nas tsher ma ring po gnyis blangs nas
NK043(pi)001:6105: / phu bo'i mig tu tsher ma re re btsugs te rin po che khyer nas bros so //
NK043(pi)001:6106: dge don sngangs nas chom po byung ngo zhes bos na yang cang mi zer te /
NK043(pi)001:6107: de nas shing gi lha mo zhig gis chom po sdig don yin no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6108: de nas dge don mig na ba ma bzod nas 'bod 'grogs te /
NK043(pi)001:6109: gog cing song song ba las yul li shi ba de dang nye bar phyin pa las /
NK043(pi)001:6110: ba lang rdzi bo ba lang lnga brgya skyong ba dang 'phrad do //
NK043(pi)001:6111: ba lang de'i nang nas khyu mchog gcig gis rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6112: bu'i mig mdongs par shes nas de'i mig la lces
NK043(pi)001:6113: bldags pas ba lang kun kyang der 'dus shing /
NK043(pi)001:6114: gnag rdzi yang der 'ongs nas mi zhig 'gro ba
NK043(pi)001:6115: mthong zhing drung du 'ongs te brtags na mig tu
NK043(pi)001:6116: tsher ma zug pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:6117: tsher ma gnyis dal bus phyungs te rang gi gnas su khrid de /
NK043(pi)001:6118: de nas 'o ma dang snum gyis rma kha bskus nas zas kyi bsnyod de gsos so //
NK043(pi)001:6119: de nas phyi zhig na rma yang bgas kyis sos nas da ni 'agro'o zhes byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6120: ba lang rdzis ma btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6121: de nas phyi zhig na rma yang legs par sos nas /
NK043(pi)001:6122: da ni grong khyer 'dir 'agro'o zhes byas nas mthar grong dang nye bar bskyal te /
NK043(pi)001:6123: bdag la rol mo'i cha byad nyi ma zhes bya ba byin cig ces byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6125: rgyal bus rol mo byed cing glu tshig snyan par
NK043(pi)001:6126: blangs pas thams cad de la nyan te kun gyis
NK043(pi)001:6128: de nas sprang po lnga brgya rgyal bu la bsten te gsos so //
NK043(pi)001:6129: phyis zhig na rgyal po de'i skyed tshal srung ba
NK043(pi)001:6130: zhig der 'ongs pas rol mo snyan pa de thos
NK043(pi)001:6131: nas dga' ste / khyod nga'i skyed tshal du rol
NK043(pi)001:6132: mo byed cing skyed tshal yang srung bar nus sam
NK043(pi)001:6133: zhes smras pa la bdag gi mig long bas mi
NK043(pi)001:6134: nas dga' ste / nus so // des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6135: khyod mig gis mi mthong yang sla'i /
NK043(pi)001:6136: shing dag gi kha na the gu la dril bu
NK043(pi)001:6137: btags te bya'i skad grag na the gu drangs pas
NK043(pi)001:6138: chog gi / nga'i skyed tshal du 'dong ngo zhes smras pa bzhin byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6139: de'i tshe sdig don phyir slebs pa la rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:6140: khyod kyi phu bo ga re zhes dris pa na
NK043(pi)001:6141: / phu bo dang tshong pa rnams rin po che mang po dang bcas pa chur nub bo //
NK043(pi)001:6142: bdag ni rkyal bas thar ro zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6143: rgyal po yab yum sa la 'gyel nas brgyal lo //
NK043(pi)001:6144: yul mi thams cad kyang mya ngan gyis brnangs so //
NK043(pi)001:6145: sdig don khyod kyang phu bo dang lhan cig 'gro na ci nyes zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6146: rgyal bu dge don 'dug pa'i tshe bya ngang pa
NK043(pi)001:6147: zhig gsos pa de la rgyal pos mgul du yi
NK043(pi)001:6148: ge btags te dge don tshol du btang ba dang
NK043(pi)001:6149: / ngang pa de 'phur zhing kun tu btsal ba
NK043(pi)001:6150: dang skyed mos tshal na rgyal bu'i skad grag pa
NK043(pi)001:6151: thos nas der bab ste rgyal bu dang 'phrad do
NK043(pi)001:6152: / // rgyal bus kyang ngang pa'i skad shes pas
NK043(pi)001:6153: mgul nas yi ge bkrol zhing klog tu bcug ste
NK043(pi)001:6154: / // / sdig don gyis mig tu tsher ma
NK043(pi)001:6155: bcug nas bros pa sogs lo rgyus zhib tu spring
NK043(pi)001:6156: / // / ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po li
NK043(pi)001:6157: shi bar de la bu mo 'jig rten na dkon
NK043(pi)001:6158: pa zhig yod pa de skyed mos tshal der song
NK043(pi)001:6160: skra 'dzings shing gdong mchi mas gang ba dang gos
NK043(pi)001:6161: ngan pa gyon te shing drung na 'dug pa de
NK043(pi)001:6163: / bu mo de la chags te gar yang ma
NK043(pi)001:6164: song bar de'i drung na 'dug cing gtam byas so
NK043(pi)001:6166: / // dro la bab ste rgyal pos bu mo
NK043(pi)001:6168: / // bos pa na / bdag gi 'tshal ma
NK043(pi)001:6171: phar mi 'ong zhes smras te zan der bskyal ba
NK043(pi)001:6174: dang / bu mos rgyal bu la bdag cag gnyis
NK043(pi)001:6175: lhan cig zan za'o zhes byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6176: rgyal bus bdag long ba sprang po lags pas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6177: po'i sras mo dang lhan cig zas za mi rung
NK043(pi)001:6178: ngo // gal te rgyal pos gsan na bdag la gyod mchi'i zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6180: khyod bdag dang lhan cig mi za na bdag kyang mi za'o zhes lan du mar smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6181: de nas lhan cig zos te /
NK043(pi)001:6182: gtam legs par byas nas bu mo de la chags te gzhan du 'gror ma btub bo //
NK043(pi)001:6183: de nas nyi ma nub pa la rgyal pos bu mo phyir shog cig sbran pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6184: bu mos phyir 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:6185: bdag ni skyed tshal srung ba 'di'i chung mar dga' bas gzhan su yang mi 'tshal to //
NK043(pi)001:6186: yab rgyal po bdag gi bsam pa 'di las mi bsgyur du gsol zhes springs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6187: rgyal pos thos nas bu mo'i ngo ma bzlog ste /
NK043(pi)001:6188: 'di ni ngo mtshar las ngo mtshar che'o //
NK043(pi)001:6189: bu mo 'di rgyal po rin po che'i go cha'i mna' mar bslangs te /
NK043(pi)001:6190: rgyal bu rgya mtsho nas ma 'khor bar sprang po
NK043(pi)001:6191: 'di lta bu'i chung mar dga' ba 'di ni nga'i
NK043(pi)001:6192: rigs sun te / nga'i mgo yang 'deg tu med
NK043(pi)001:6193: pa 'di ngo mtshar che nas yang yang 'bod du
NK043(pi)001:6194: btang ba las bu mo tshig snga ma las ma
NK043(pi)001:6196: de nas rgyal po bu mo la byams pas ngo ma bzlog par /
NK043(pi)001:6197: gnyis ka bsus te nang du bsdus nas khyo shug tu bsdus so //
NK043(pi)001:6198: de nas dus gzhan zhig na bu mo de nyin
NK043(pi)001:6199: par rtag tu song zhing nub mo phyir 'ong bas
NK043(pi)001:6200: / rgyal bu dogs pa skyes te chung ma la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6201: khyod bdag gi chung ma bya zhes khyo shug tu 'dus na /
NK043(pi)001:6202: nyin par rtag tu 'gro zhing mtshan mo 'ba' zhig
NK043(pi)001:6203: phyir 'ong bas 'dir mi rtog pa la bltas nas
NK043(pi)001:6204: / khyod gzhan du sems pa yod par nges so //
NK043(pi)001:6206: bdag ni khyod 'ba' zhig sems te /
NK043(pi)001:6207: bsam pa gzhan pa spu tsam yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:6208: bden par smras pa 'dis khyod kyi mig ya gcig
NK043(pi)001:6209: mthong bar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu mig
NK043(pi)001:6210: ya gcig mthong bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6211: rgyal bus sngar ni dge don yin pa'i tshul su
NK043(pi)001:6212: la'ang ma smras la gang gi gtam de dag gling
NK043(pi)001:6213: nas rgyal bu la khyod kyi pha ma dang yul
NK043(pi)001:6214: gang na 'dug ces dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6215: smras pa khyod kyis rgyal po rin po che'i go cha zhes pa thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:6216: chung mas thos so zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6217: de ni nga'i pha yin te /
NK043(pi)001:6218: khyod kyis rgyal bu dge don thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:6219: chung mas smras pa thos so //
NK043(pi)001:6220: 'o na rgyal bu dge don zhes bya ba ni bdag yin no zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6221: chung ma sdangs nas 'o na ci'i phyir 'di ltar
NK043(pi)001:6222: nyon mongs par gyur ces dris pa la rgyal bus
NK043(pi)001:6223: ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu gtam byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:6224: chung mas smras pa rgyal bu sdig don gyis khyed
NK043(pi)001:6225: kyi mig phyung ba 'di ni 'jig rten gang na
NK043(pi)001:6226: yang mi srid pa yin na /
NK043(pi)001:6227: khyod de dang 'phrad na ji ltar bya snyam /
NK043(pi)001:6229: sdig don gyis nga'i mig phyung ba nyes mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:6230: bdag de la cung zad kyang mi dga' ba'am mkhon du 'dzin pa med do //
NK043(pi)001:6231: chung mas smras pa gnod pa 'di lta bu byas
NK043(pi)001:6232: pa la mi dga' ba med ces smras pa la
NK043(pi)001:6233: bdag yid shin tu ches par dka' 'o //
NK043(pi)001:6235: bdag sdig don la cung zad mi dga' ba ba
NK043(pi)001:6236: sbu'i nyag ma tsam med na bden pa'i tshig des
NK043(pi)001:6237: bdag gi mig ya gcig 'di mthong bar gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:6238: / ces smras ma thag tu mig ya gcig kyang gsal bar mthong bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6239: de ltar rgyal bu'i mig gnyis kyang mthong nas mtshan
NK043(pi)001:6240: dbyibs kyang lhag par che bas bu mo dga' ste
NK043(pi)001:6241: / rgyal po la 'di skad du yab rgyal po rin chen go cha'i sras dge don mkhyen tam /
NK043(pi)001:6243: 'o na rgyal pos gzigs bzhed dam /
NK043(pi)001:6244: rgyal bu de ga re blta'o //
NK043(pi)001:6246: da ltar bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa 'di lags so //
NK043(pi)001:6247: rgyal pos bu mo la bgad de /
NK043(pi)001:6249: 'on te mi dran nam ci nyes /
NK043(pi)001:6250: rgyal bu de ni rgya mtsho nas phyir ma 'khor na /
NK043(pi)001:6251: sprang po la rgyal bu dge don zhes smras /
NK043(pi)001:6253: thugs mi ches na brtag tu gsol /
NK043(pi)001:6254: rgyal po bltar phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6256: lto ba sa la phab nas bdag gis ngo ma shes pas nongs kyis 'gyod do zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6257: de nas rgyal po des gsang te rgyal bu dge don lam srang zhig tu bskyal nas /
NK043(pi)001:6258: dge don rgya mtsho nas gdod 'khor bskad bsgrags te /
NK043(pi)001:6259: blon po rnams dang bcas pas rgyal bu dge don bsus nas pho brang du 'ong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:6260: gdod bu mo yang chung mar byin pa skad du bsgrags so //
NK043(pi)001:6261: de'i tshe bya ngang pa yang phyir yul du phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:6262: yi ge bklags pas dge don yod par shes nas sdig don btson du bzung /
NK043(pi)001:6263: rgyal po li shi bar gyi steng du pho nya
NK043(pi)001:6264: btang nas nga'i bu dge don khyod kyi yul na
NK043(pi)001:6265: 'ongs te nyon mongs shing 'dug pa thos kyi sngar
NK043(pi)001:6266: ma sbran pa yang nyes so //
NK043(pi)001:6267: da yang glang chen dang rta'i tshogs mang pos skyol cig /
NK043(pi)001:6268: ma bskyal na nga nyid kyang 'ong ngo zhes springs so //
NK043(pi)001:6269: de'i tshe dge don gyis phyugs rdzi'i drin dran nas rgyal po li shi bar la gsol te /
NK043(pi)001:6270: rta dang glang po gos dang khang khyim /
NK043(pi)001:6272: gser dngul rin po che dang bran pho bran mo
NK043(pi)001:6273: las byed pa'i mi sogs bya dga' mang du byin
NK043(pi)001:6274: nas tshe gcig tu bde zhing skyid par byas so
NK043(pi)001:6275: // de nas rgyal po rin chen go cha'i pho nya yang der phyin cing /
NK043(pi)001:6276: rgyal po li shi bar gyis glang po che lnga
NK043(pi)001:6277: brgya rin po ches brgyan te g.yog lnga brgya dang
NK043(pi)001:6278: / bu mo'i g.yog gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:6279: shing rta lnga brgya snyed kyang bardzangasa /
NK043(pi)001:6280: rgyal po nyid blon po dang bcas te 'khor brgya
NK043(pi)001:6281: stong du mas rol mo sna tshogs byas te bu
NK043(pi)001:6282: mo bskyal lo // pho nya sngar phyin nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6283: po rin po che'i go cha btsun mo 'khor dang
NK043(pi)001:6285: rgyal bu dang 'phrad pa'i tshe zhon pa la bab
NK043(pi)001:6286: nas pha ma la phyag 'tshal zhing lag par 'jus
NK043(pi)001:6287: te snyun gsol nas rol mo byas shing pho brang
NK043(pi)001:6288: du dong ngo // de nas rgyal bus sdig don ga re zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6289: da lta brtson du bzung ngo zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6290: de thongs shig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6291: nyes pa chen po de btang du mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6292: de nas rgyal bus sdig don ma btang na bdag
NK043(pi)001:6293: kyang pho brang du mi mchi'o zhes gsol bas sdig
NK043(pi)001:6295: der sdig don yang rgyal bu bsur 'ong ba /
NK043(pi)001:6296: spun gnyis gcig la gcig 'jus te nu bo la
NK043(pi)001:6297: sngar bas kyang lhag par byams par gyur pas thams
NK043(pi)001:6299: de nas pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas rin
NK043(pi)001:6300: po che ga re zhes bgas kyis smras pa na
NK043(pi)001:6301: / 'ong ba'i lam du sa brkos pa'i nang du sbas so //
NK043(pi)001:6302: de nas len du btang bas ma rnyed pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6303: dge don dang 'grogs nas gnas der phyin ma thag tu dge don gyis mthong nas rnyed do //
NK043(pi)001:6304: de nas pho brang du 'ongs nas rgyal phran lnga brgya kun la nor bu re re byin zhing /
NK043(pi)001:6305: gcig pu zhig bzhag pa lag tu thogs te smon
NK043(pi)001:6306: lam btab pa bzhin pha ma gnyis 'dug pa'i rin
NK043(pi)001:6308: rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6309: de nas bdag gis sngon rgyal po dang blon po'i
NK043(pi)001:6310: bang mdzod las gang byin te god pa'i rnam pa
NK043(pi)001:6311: thams cad phyir gang bar shog cig ces byas nas
NK043(pi)001:6312: / rin po che de phyogs su bstan pa tsam
NK043(pi)001:6313: gyis bang mdzod thams cad rin po ches gang bar
NK043(pi)001:6314: / gyur to // de nas phyogs thams cad du
NK043(pi)001:6315: dril bsgrags te zhag bdun na rgyal bu dge don
NK043(pi)001:6316: gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs kyis
NK043(pi)001:6317: thams cad 'dus shig ces bsgo nas /
NK043(pi)001:6318: nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtser btags te /
NK043(pi)001:6319: phyogs bzhir phyag 'tshal zhing lag par spos phor thogs te /
NK043(pi)001:6320: nor bu 'di yid bzhin rin po che yang dag yin na /
NK043(pi)001:6321: thams cad ci 'dod pa'i char yid bzhin du phob cig ces smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:6322: rlung langs pas mi gtsang ba phyags te /
NK043(pi)001:6323: char zim bus rdul mi ldang bar byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:6324: zas dang gos dang rin po che'i char babs pas /
NK043(pi)001:6325: yul thams cad gang ste thams cad tshim par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6326: rgyal bus yul thams cad la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6327: da ni phongs pa'i sems med pas thams cad sgo
NK043(pi)001:6328: gsum dge bcu la brtson par gyis zhes bskul bas
NK043(pi)001:6329: thams cad dge bcu la nan tan byas te /
NK043(pi)001:6330: tshe 'phos pa'i dus su mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:6331: de ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon rgyal bu dge
NK043(pi)001:6332: don du gyur pas de lta bu'i sbyin pa dang
NK043(pi)001:6333: bzod pa dang btson pa chen po mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:6334: de'i tshe pha ma ni da lta'i rgyal po zas gtsang dang /
NK043(pi)001:6336: rgyal po li shi bar ni 'od srung dang /
NK043(pi)001:6337: de'i tshe rgyal bu'i chung mar gyur pa de da ltar gyi skye dgu'i bdag mo dang /
NK043(pi)001:6338: sdig don ni lhas byin no zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:6339: yang 'dul ba gzhi las gsungs pa'i rgyal bu dge
NK043(pi)001:6340: byed dang sdig byed kyang 'di dang khog 'dra la
NK043(pi)001:6341: cung zad mi 'dra ba'i khyad yod pas /
NK043(pi)001:6342: drin lan bsabs pa'i mdo las gsungs pa btsun mo
NK043(pi)001:6343: che 'bring gi sras dge don dang ngan don zhes
NK043(pi)001:6344: bya ba yang 'di dang khog 'dra bar snang ngo
NK043(pi)001:6345: // yang bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid 'dzam bu'i gling
NK043(pi)001:6346: 'dir rgyal po byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6347: phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed par gyur
NK043(pi)001:6348: // pa na / de byams pa dang snying rje
NK043(pi)001:6349: dang ldan te tshad med bzhi spyod cing dge bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:6350: // pa na / srid 'dzin to // de'i yul der dgra dang rims gtong ba'i yi dwags dang /
NK043(pi)001:6351: mi'i sha khrag za ba'i 'byung po ma rung pa
NK043(pi)001:6352: gang gis kyang yul der bza' ba ma rnyed nas
NK043(pi)001:6353: ltogs te mthu med par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:6354: der gnod sbyin lnga zhig yul der lhags pas su la'ang gnod ma nus nas /
NK043(pi)001:6355: dben par ba lang rdzi zhig bag brkyangs te gnas
NK043(pi)001:6356: pa la gtam byas pas rgyal po'i yon tan bshad
NK043(pi)001:6357: do // der gnod sbyin lnga po rgyal po'i gan du dong ste /
NK043(pi)001:6358: bdag cag gi zas ni mi'i mdangs dang sha khrag la ltos te lus 'tsho ba las /
NK043(pi)001:6359: yul 'di rgyal pos bka' la btags pas thams cad
NK043(pi)001:6360: dge bcu la gnas pas bdag cag zas skom ma
NK043(pi)001:6361: rnyed par nyam thag pas rgyal po bdag cag la
NK043(pi)001:6362: thugs mi bartse'am zhes gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:6363: rgyal pos kyang de dag la snying brtse bas rang
NK043(pi)001:6364: gi lus kyi yan lag lnga las rtsa bcad cing
NK043(pi)001:6365: gnod sbyin lngas so sos snod bzed de /
NK043(pi)001:6366: de rnams la khrag ngoms par 'thung ngu bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:6367: de nas ral gri rnon pos rang gi sha bcad
NK043(pi)001:6368: de dag ngoms par byas so de dag sha khrag
NK043(pi)001:6369: gis ngoms nas dga' mgu rang te sems gdug pa
NK043(pi)001:6371: dge ba ci nus par spyod cig ces gdams shing
NK043(pi)001:6372: de dag gis kyang rgyal po la bzod par gsol
NK043(pi)001:6373: to // rgyal pos smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:6374: da lta nga'i lus kyi sha khrag gis khyed ngoms
NK043(pi)001:6375: par byas pa de bzhin du phyis sangs rgyas pa'i
NK043(pi)001:6376: tshe na yang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang
NK043(pi)001:6377: shes rab kyis khyod kyi dug gsum bsal te shin
NK043(pi)001:6378: tu bde ba'i myang 'das la 'god par shog cig
NK043(pi)001:6380: phyis bcom ldan 'das nyid sangs rgyas pa'i tshe gnod
NK043(pi)001:6381: sbyin lnga po ni koon+di n+ya la sogs pa'i dge
NK043(pi)001:6383: gang dang gang du skyes par de dag thog mar bsgral bar smon lam btab pas /
NK043(pi)001:6384: thog mar chos bstan ma thag tu 'di dag rnam par grol bar gyur to zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:6385: rgyal po byams pa'i stobs de'i lus kyi rma rnams
NK043(pi)001:6386: kyang brgya byin gyi sman gyis gsos pas sngar bzhin
NK043(pi)001:6387: du gyur te / 'dzam bu'i gling bde bar bskyangs so //
NK043(pi)001:6388: yang rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung pa zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:6389: gyur pas sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs te skye
NK043(pi)001:6390: dgu rnams la ci 'dod pa gtong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:6391: gnod sbyin lnga rang gi khrag gis tshim par byas
NK043(pi)001:6392: pa ji ltar byams pa'i stobs kyi skyes rabs bzhin
NK043(pi)001:6393: du gsungs so // yang bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon
NK043(pi)001:6394: yul ya ba zhes bya bar rgyal po dge ba
NK043(pi)001:6395: zhes bya ba drang po'i chos kyis yul srid skyong
NK043(pi)001:6396: du gsungs so // pa / rgyal phran drug cu la dbang pa /
NK043(pi)001:6397: grong khyer chen po brgyad brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:6398: ba glang lnga brgya yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:6399: blon po bzhi stong mnga' ba /
NK043(pi)001:6400: btsun mo nyi khri yod kyang sras med pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6401: phyis zhig na btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du sras
NK043(pi)001:6402: chags pa de btsas nas btsun mo nyi khri po
NK043(pi)001:6403: thams cad las nu zho rang byung zhing thams cad
NK043(pi)001:6404: dga' bas don grub tu ming btags so //
NK043(pi)001:6405: de lo bcu drug lon pa dang yig rtsis 'phong
NK043(pi)001:6406: dpyad bzo gnas rol mo sogs gang yang mi shes
NK043(pi)001:6408: de rgyal po yab yum la yang rim gro che zhing /
NK043(pi)001:6409: rgyal bu'i pho brang logs shig tu brtsigs so //
NK043(pi)001:6410: de chung nas sbyin pa la dga' bas mi la
NK043(pi)001:6411: sogs te ri dwags dang 'dab chags kyi bar du
NK043(pi)001:6412: sems can thams cad bde skyid par dga' zhing sbyin
NK043(pi)001:6413: pa'i basngagasa pa yang tshig tu rjod par byed do
NK043(pi)001:6414: // rgyal bu cher skyes nas rgyal po zhig gi
NK043(pi)001:6415: bu mo man te zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba
NK043(pi)001:6416: btsun mor blangs nas bu tsha ming sring gnyis yod
NK043(pi)001:6417: // par gyur to // rgyal bu de ltad mor phyin pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6418: brgya byin dbul por bardzusa pa de mthong nas sbyin pa byed par bsams te /
NK043(pi)001:6419: rgyal po la mnga' ba'i bang mdzod na ci mchis
NK043(pi)001:6420: pa thams cad sbyin par 'dod ces zhus pa dang
NK043(pi)001:6421: / rgyal pos kyang ci dga' bar gnang nas ci dang ci 'dod pa byin no //
NK043(pi)001:6422: de'i tshe dgra zlar gyur pa'i rgyal phran zhig gis
NK043(pi)001:6423: bal gyi glang po che pad+mo'i steng nas 'gro ba
NK043(pi)001:6424: su da ya zhes pa stobs che bas dgra zla
NK043(pi)001:6425: gzhan las rtag tu rgyal ba de slong ba'i bram
NK043(pi)001:6426: ze brgyad mngags pa la rgyal bus bal glang gi
NK043(pi)001:6427: lhas nas bal glang gzhan zhig byin kyang ma blangs
NK043(pi)001:6428: par bal glang su da ya bslangs so //
NK043(pi)001:6430: 'di ni yab rgyal po shin tu gces te bdag
NK043(pi)001:6431: dang 'dra bas byin na bdag yul nas bskrad par
NK043(pi)001:6432: 'gyur ro // yang bsams pa sngon bdag gis ci
NK043(pi)001:6433: slong yang de'i yid dang 'gal bar mi bya bar
NK043(pi)001:6434: dam bcas na da bla med byang chub kyi phyir
NK043(pi)001:6435: mi gtong ba ci yod snyam du glang po de
NK043(pi)001:6436: byin nas myur du songs shig yab rgyal pos thos
NK043(pi)001:6437: na 'phrog tu 'ong ngo zhes bsgos nas song ngo
NK043(pi)001:6438: 'gyur ro // // de thos pas blon po dang
NK043(pi)001:6439: yul gyi mi thams cad skrag nas bal glang 'di
NK043(pi)001:6440: yod pas chab srid che ba yin te /
NK043(pi)001:6441: bal glang drug cu'i stobs dang ldan pa dgra zla
NK043(pi)001:6442: la stsal na chab srid kyang stong par 'tshal na
NK043(pi)001:6443: ji ltar bgyi / 'di ltar byin na bang mdzod
NK043(pi)001:6444: kyang stong zhing btsun mo dang sras kyi bar du
NK043(pi)001:6445: sbyin pa bgyid par dogs so zhes rgyal po la
NK043(pi)001:6446: ji ltar bgyi / gsol ba dang / rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:6447: lhag par mi dga' zhing blon po gzhan la dris
NK043(pi)001:6448: pas bden no zhes gsol bas rgyal po khri las
NK043(pi)001:6450: btsun mo rnams kyang sdug bsngal byed do //
NK043(pi)001:6451: de nas rgyal blon bgros pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6452: rgyal bu de bal glang gi lhas su song bas rkang pa bcag par bya /
NK043(pi)001:6453: bal glang bzung bas lag pa gcad pa nas mgo
NK043(pi)001:6454: gcod pa'i bar du bgyid par rigs zhes gsol ba
NK043(pi)001:6455: dang / rgyal po mi dga' zhing nga'i bu legs
NK043(pi)001:6456: pa'i don la mos te sbyin pa la dga' ba
NK043(pi)001:6457: la ji ltar tho 'tsham par byed /
NK043(pi)001:6458: blon po gcig gis de ltar bzung brdeg mi 'ong kyi /
NK043(pi)001:6459: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du dgon par spangs na
NK043(pi)001:6460: sma bab cing ngo tsha bar 'gyur ro zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:6461: pa la rgyal pos kyang mnyan nas /
NK043(pi)001:6462: rgyal bu rgyal tshab bkug ste khyod nga'i bal glang byin pa bden nam /
NK043(pi)001:6464: rgyal bu khyod ci'i phyir nga la ma zhus par dgra zla la byin /
NK043(pi)001:6466: sngar sbyin pa ci byin yang mi 'gal bar mdzad
NK043(pi)001:6467: do zhes dam bcas pa lags pas nyid la ma
NK043(pi)001:6470: dam bcas pa ni nor dbyig sogs la yin na bal glang ci gtogs /
NK043(pi)001:6471: rgyal bus thams cad rgyal po la mnga' ba'i dkor lags na ci'i phyir bal glang mi gtogs /
NK043(pi)001:6472: rgyal pos smras pa khyod ni ri dan tig tu
NK043(pi)001:6473: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du spangs kyis myur du
NK043(pi)001:6474: songs shig / rgyal bus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6475: rgyal po'i bka' mi gcog na /
NK043(pi)001:6476: da dung zhag bdun sbyin pa byas te bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs nas mchi bar 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:6478: de mi gnang gi songs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6479: rgyal bus bka' mi gcog go zhes zhus so //
NK043(pi)001:6480: de nas btsun mo nyi khri snyed kyis rgyal bu
NK043(pi)001:6481: rgyal tshab la zhag bdun sbyin pa byed du 'jug
NK043(pi)001:6482: par rgyal po la gsol bas gnang nas /
NK043(pi)001:6483: rgyal bus phyogs su g.yog mngags te slong ba bsdus nas sbyin pa rgya cher stsal to //
NK043(pi)001:6484: de nas rgyal bus chung ma la bdag ni rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6485: pos lo bcu gnyis su ri dan tig zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:6486: bar spangs tshul smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6487: des smras pa rgyal po'i yul du bde zhing legs
NK043(pi)001:6488: pa'i smon lam 'debs la bdag cag ri la sgom
NK043(pi)001:6489: du 'deng ngo // rgyal bus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6490: ri de ni 'jigs pa'i gnas te bya dka' zhing gcan gzan ma rungs pas 'jigs na /
NK043(pi)001:6491: khyod longs spyod myong myong bas de lta bu bzod
NK043(pi)001:6492: nus sam khyod pho brang gi nang du ni yo
NK043(pi)001:6493: byad ci bde bas 'byor zhing zas gos phun sum
NK043(pi)001:6494: tshogs na / ri la r+ts+wa 'ding zhing 'bras bu za ba la mos pa ci yod /
NK043(pi)001:6495: gzhan yang rlung dang ser ba /
NK043(pi)001:6498: sbrul sogs yod na khyod de lta bu bzod dam /
NK043(pi)001:6500: bdag la mnyen cing 'jam pa'i gos dang mngar ba'i zas sogs kyis ci zhig bgyi /
NK043(pi)001:6501: khyod dang so sor 'bral ba mi bzod pas /
NK043(pi)001:6503: bdag ni rgyal bu la yid brten te grogs bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:6505: bdag ni sbyin la dga' bas /
NK043(pi)001:6506: slong ba'i sems mi bzlog ste /
NK043(pi)001:6507: bu'am khyod nyid slong na yang mi gtong mi nus
NK043(pi)001:6508: pas bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad byed na 'gror
NK043(pi)001:6509: mi rigs so // man tes smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6510: rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzad na bdag kyang yi rangs
NK043(pi)001:6511: shing srog la bab kyang phyir mi 'gyur bas the
NK043(pi)001:6513: rgyal bus kyang khyod de ltar nus na legs so
NK043(pi)001:6514: zhes btsun mo dang sras sras mo gnyis dang bcas
NK043(pi)001:6515: te / yum la mchi phyag byas nas yum gyis skabs su rgyal po la /
NK043(pi)001:6516: dkar po'i chos kyis yul srid bde ba'i gtam gyis gros gdab tu gsol /
NK043(pi)001:6517: yum mya ngan gyis gdungs nas bdag ni bu gcig
NK043(pi)001:6518: pu sdug pa 'di dang 'bral na bdag gi snying
NK043(pi)001:6519: rdo rje ltar migs pa ni ci zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:6520: gal te lha rnams kyis bdag gi smon lam bzhin 'gal bar mi mdzad na /
NK043(pi)001:6521: bdag gi bu phyir yul du 'khor bar shog ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:6522: de'i tshe btsun mo nyi khris mu tig gi do shal re dang /
NK043(pi)001:6523: blon po bzhi stong gis rin chen sna bdun las
NK043(pi)001:6524: byas pa'i pad+ma re re rgyal bu la rdzong ba
NK043(pi)001:6525: byas so // rgyal bu pho brang nas phyung ste
NK043(pi)001:6526: grong khyer gyi byang sgor phyin nas me tog dang
NK043(pi)001:6527: do shal thams cad 'dus pa thams cad la byin
NK043(pi)001:6528: byas so // no // yul de'i mi khri phrag du mas rgyal bu bskyal te /
NK043(pi)001:6529: 'di ni shin tu dge ba yul gyi lha gnyen
NK043(pi)001:6530: lta bu yin na ci phyir spangs zhes thams cad
NK043(pi)001:6532: skyel mi rnams la rgyal bus spro ba bsrings nas phyir dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6533: de nas shing rta la zhon nas rgyal bu nyid
NK043(pi)001:6534: kyi kha lo ba byas te song bas rgyang chad
NK043(pi)001:6535: par phyin nas / skye shing gi drung na ngal
NK043(pi)001:6536: bso ba la bram ze zhig gis shing rta 'khrid
NK043(pi)001:6537: pa'i rta bslangs pa la byin no //
NK043(pi)001:6538: de nas rgyal bus shing rta drangs /
NK043(pi)001:6539: btsun mos shing rta'i phyi nas phul te song ba
NK043(pi)001:6540: las bram ze zhig gis shing rta bslangs pa yang
NK043(pi)001:6541: byin nas rkang pas dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6542: de nas bram ze zhig gis bslangs ba la nor
NK043(pi)001:6543: ci yang med nas lus kyi gos rin po che
NK043(pi)001:6544: byin te gos rnying pa zhig gyon nas dong ngo
NK043(pi)001:6545: // yang bram ze zhig byung ba la btsun mo'i gos byin no //
NK043(pi)001:6546: de nas yang bram ze zhig la rgyal bu gnyis kyi gos byin no //
NK043(pi)001:6547: de ltar thams cad byin kyang 'gyod pa med par /
NK043(pi)001:6549: btsun mos bu mo khur te dga' bzhin du dong
NK043(pi)001:6550: dong ba las da dung ri dan tig ces bya
NK043(pi)001:6551: bar lam ring bas dpag tshad stong yod pa la
NK043(pi)001:6552: / 'brog dgon par phyin nas bkres shing skom pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6553: lha'i dbang pos dgon pa der grong khyer bzang po
NK043(pi)001:6554: zhig tu sprul nas mi rnams kyis rgyal bu bsus
NK043(pi)001:6555: te zas skom dang bde ba'i yo byad kyis bstabs
NK043(pi)001:6556: pa dang / btsun mos rgyal bu la lam ring
NK043(pi)001:6557: po bgrod pas rab tu ngal na da 'dir 'dug
NK043(pi)001:6559: rgyal bus yab rgyal pos ri dan tig song zhes bka' stsal pas /
NK043(pi)001:6560: 'dir 'dug na rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal te /
NK043(pi)001:6561: bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes smras te de nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6562: de ltar song nas ri dan tig gi drung du phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6563: de na chu chen po brgal dka' ba'i zab pa zhig dang 'phrad do //
NK043(pi)001:6564: btsun mos chu bri ba'i bar du 'dir bsdad do zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6566: yab rgyal pos ri dan tig tu song zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:6567: pas 'dir 'dug mi rung zhes byams pa'i ting 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:6568: la zhugs pa'i mod la chu'i nang nas ri chen
NK043(pi)001:6569: po zhig byung nas chu'i rgyun bcad de /
NK043(pi)001:6570: der rgyal bu dang btsun mo gos bardzesa nas chu brgal ma thag tu rgyal bu 'di snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:6571: thal byung song na chu 'khyil ba 'dis sems can mang du 'chi ste 'khyer ro snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:6572: chu la phyir bltas te chu khyod snga ma kho
NK043(pi)001:6573: na bzhin du rgyun du 'bab cing bdag 'dod pa
NK043(pi)001:6574: zhig 'ong na yang thar bar byos shig smras ma
NK043(pi)001:6575: thag tu chu yang snga ma bzhin babs so //
NK043(pi)001:6576: de nas song bas ri dan tig de rad rod dang zad zed du 'dug pa /
NK043(pi)001:6577: shing mang po rgyas shing bya sna tshogs snyan pa'i skad 'byin pa /
NK043(pi)001:6579: 'bras bu ni mngar ba sogs mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:6582: shing dang nags tshal gnam la reg pa skyes kyang barngasa pa'am bcad pa med pas /
NK043(pi)001:6583: chu mig zhim po la 'thung zhing 'bras bu mngar
NK043(pi)001:6584: ba za ba ri 'di la sgom pa dag yod
NK043(pi)001:6586: rgyal bu der phyin pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6587: ri der gnas pa'i bya dang gcan gzan ri dwags thams cad dga' nas rgyal bu basu'o //
NK043(pi)001:6588: de'i tshe ri de la sgom pa'i dge slong a
NK043(pi)001:6589: tshu ta zhes pa lo lnga brgya lon pa yon
NK043(pi)001:6590: tan mchog dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa de'i drung
