NK043(pi)001:6591: du rgyal bu song ste phyag byas nas 'di skad
NK043(pi)001:6592: ces smras so // ri 'dir phyogs gang na chu
NK043(pi)001:6593: mig dang 'bras bu bzang por ldan pa gnas su
NK043(pi)001:6594: rung ba ci yod ces dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6596: ri 'di gnas thams cad du bsod nams dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:6597: pa'i sa gzhi yin pas gang du gnas kyang rung
NK043(pi)001:6598: ste / dben pa'i gnas gtsang ma yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:6599: ci rgyal bu khyod bu smad dang bcas te chos slob tu 'ongs sam /
NK043(pi)001:6600: de la rgyal bus smra ma khoms par btsun mo man te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6601: btsun pa ri 'di la lam bsgoms nas ji srid cig lon /
NK043(pi)001:6603: ri 'dir phyin nas lo bzhi bargya'am lnga brgya tsam lon /
NK043(pi)001:6605: da dung bdag dang bdag gi bar 'dzin na nam zhig lam 'thob /
NK043(pi)001:6606: de srid du ri la gnas kyang rdo shing dang
NK043(pi)001:6607: tha mi dad du bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:6608: na da gdod lam thob par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
NK043(pi)001:6609: dge slong na re bdag gis yang dag pa'i don de lta bu mi shes so //
NK043(pi)001:6610: rgyal bus dge slong la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6611: btsun pa yul ya ba'i rgyal bu rgyal tshab don grub ces bya ba thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:6612: des smras pa bdag gis rgyun tu thos kyi mthong ba ni ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:6613: rgyal bus smras pa bdag ni de yin no //
NK043(pi)001:6615: rgyal bus bdag ni theg pa chen po'i lam 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:6616: dge slong gis khyod ni ring por mi thogs par theg pa chen po'i lam 'thob par 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:6617: de'i tshe bdag nye gnas rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smras nas /
NK043(pi)001:6618: rgyal bu khrid de 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:6619: de nas dge slong gis chos bzhin du rgyal bu'i
NK043(pi)001:6620: skra slas nas mdud pa bor te zas su shing
NK043(pi)001:6623: rgyal bus shing dang r+ts+wa bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:6624: bdag nyid 'dug pa'i r+ts+wa'i spyil po chung ngu zhig dang /
NK043(pi)001:6625: man te ma smad 'dug pa'i spyil po re re yang byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6626: de'i tshe khye'u'i ming ni ya ri zhes bya ste
NK043(pi)001:6627: lo bdun lon pa gos rang gyon nus te pha'i
NK043(pi)001:6629: bu mo'i ming ni ge no yan zhes bya ste lo drug lon pa /
NK043(pi)001:6630: ri dwags kyi pags pa gyon zhing ma'i phyi bzhin 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:6631: ri de na gnas pa'i gcan gzan dang /
NK043(pi)001:6632: ri dwags 'dab chags thams cad kyang rab tu dga' nas rgyal bu la brten cing gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:6633: rgyal bu ri der phyin nas zhag gcig lon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6634: sngon skam pa'i chu mig dang rdzing yang chus gang /
NK043(pi)001:6635: skye shing skam pa thams cad kyang me tog dang 'dab ma skyes /
NK043(pi)001:6636: srin bu gdug pa rnams kyang med par /
NK043(pi)001:6637: gcan gzan gcig la gcig za ba yang so so nas r+ts+wa la za ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:6638: 'bras bu'i shing rnams kyang rgyas shing bzang por gyur /
NK043(pi)001:6639: bya sna tshogs snying rje'i skad 'byin par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6640: btsun mo man tes shing thog dang shing 'bras barngasa te rgyal bu la phul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:6641: sras ming sring gnyis la'ang bsnyod do //
NK043(pi)001:6642: sras ming sring gnyis ni skabs skabs su pha ma gnyis dang bral te /
NK043(pi)001:6643: ha cang yang mi ring ba'i chu mig gi 'gram
NK043(pi)001:6644: dag tu gcan gzan dang ri dwags dang lhan cig
NK043(pi)001:6645: rtse ste / bar 'ga' zhag lon par yang rtse'o //
NK043(pi)001:6646: dus zhig na sras khye'u seng ge la zhon pa las /
NK043(pi)001:6647: seng ge mchongs pas rdab gcig phog gdong cung zad
NK043(pi)001:6648: smras te khrag phyung ba la spre'u zhig gis shing
NK043(pi)001:6649: gi lo mas khrag phyis te chu 'gram du khrid
NK043(pi)001:6650: nas bkrus pa yang rgyal bus rgyang ma nas mthong
NK043(pi)001:6651: ngo // de'i tshe yul kee lee zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:6652: bram ze dbul po zhig lo bzhi bcu lon nas
NK043(pi)001:6654: chung ma ni rab tu bzang zhing sdug la /
NK043(pi)001:6655: bram ze ni rab tu mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma bcu gnyis yod de /
NK043(pi)001:6656: mdog sol ba ltar gnag la /
NK043(pi)001:6657: gdong la 'bur po gsum yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:6658: sna 'khyol zhing mig gnyis shel ltar g.yo ba gdong gnyer ma can la mchu 'phyang ba /
NK043(pi)001:6663: mgo shu ba can skra med pa /
NK043(pi)001:6664: 'dre ltar mi sdug pa zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:6665: chung mas kyang mthong mi 'dod pa tsam du shi
NK043(pi)001:6666: yang sla zhes rgyun du dmod mo byed pa zhig
NK043(pi)001:6667: yod do // dus gzhan na chung ma de chu 'chur song ba las /
NK043(pi)001:6668: lam du khyo ga gzhon nu dum gcig dang 'phrad
NK043(pi)001:6669: nas khyo ga rnams kyis khyim thab kyi gzugs 'di
NK043(pi)001:6671: khyod ni dpe med par bzang zhing sdug na /
NK043(pi)001:6672: ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i chung ma byed nus zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6673: chung mas khyo ga de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6674: rgan po'i mgo ni shing la ba mo chags pa
NK043(pi)001:6675: ltar skya ba de nang nub tu shi bar dga'
NK043(pi)001:6676: na shir mi btub ji ltar bya /
NK043(pi)001:6677: de nas chu snod thogs nas phyir khyim du song ste /
NK043(pi)001:6679: bdag chu 'chur song ba las lam du khyo ga gzhon nu dag dang 'phrad nas /
NK043(pi)001:6680: des bdag la co 'dri zhing bgad de 'aphya'o //
NK043(pi)001:6681: da khyod kyis bkol ba'i bran khol yod nang chu
NK043(pi)001:6682: bcu yang mi dgos la gzhan gyis 'phya bar yang
NK043(pi)001:6683: mi 'gyur ro // khyim thab kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6684: bdag cag ni shin tu dbul zhing phongs na bran khol ga las rnyed /
NK043(pi)001:6686: gal te bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na /
NK043(pi)001:6687: bdag 'gro ste khyod dang lhan cig mi gnas so zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:6690: rgyal bu don grub sbyin pa la mos pas yab
NK043(pi)001:6691: rgyal pos ri dan tig ces bya bar spangs so
NK043(pi)001:6692: // de la khye'u dang bu mo gcig yod ces grag gis de slong du songs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6694: ri dan tig ces pa'i 'di nas dpag tshad drug stong lhag tsam gyi lam yod la /
NK043(pi)001:6695: sngon la bgrod kyang ma myong na da ci ltar bgrod par bya /
NK043(pi)001:6697: bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na bdag 'gegs te 'achi'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6699: nyes na kho bo gcig gis bsad kyang sla khyod
NK043(pi)001:6700: shi bar mi 'dod do zhes smras nas khyod kyis
NK043(pi)001:6701: bdag slong du 'gro ba'i rgyags dang dgos pa sbyor
NK043(pi)001:6703: da songs shig rgyags dang dgos pa yang ci yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:6704: bram ze rgyags rang gis sbyar te rkang pas lam du zhugs zhing song nas /
NK043(pi)001:6705: yul ya ba zhes bya bar song ste /
NK043(pi)001:6706: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo srung ba la rgyal
NK043(pi)001:6707: bu don grub da lta ga la 'dug ces dris
NK043(pi)001:6708: pa dang / sgo srung de nang du song nas rgyal po la de ltar bsnyad do //
NK043(pi)001:6709: tshig de thos pa tsam gyis me la shing bsnan pa ltar khro zhing 'khrugs te /
NK043(pi)001:6710: 'di 'dra ba sha stag gi phyir nga'i sras spangs
NK043(pi)001:6711: na da yang slong du 'ongs snyam nas ma daga'o
NK043(pi)001:6713: rgyal tshab don grub sbyin pa'i grags pa gnam dang
NK043(pi)001:6714: chu'i gting du thug par grags na bdag lam ring
NK043(pi)001:6715: po nas re ba yod pas 'ongs so //
NK043(pi)001:6717: rgyal bu don grub ni da ltar ri dben pa
NK043(pi)001:6718: na gnas te rab tu dbul zhing ci yang med
NK043(pi)001:6719: na khyod la ci zhig sbyin /
NK043(pi)001:6721: rgyal bu la ci yang med kyang bdag 'phrad par daga'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6722: rgyal pos kyang gzhan zhig la lam ston cig ces
NK043(pi)001:6723: bsgos nas bram ze de song song ba las ri
NK043(pi)001:6724: dan tig gi drung gi chu chen po yod par
NK043(pi)001:6725: phyin nas / rgyal bu 'ba' zhig yid la bsams pas chu'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6726: de nas bram ze ri de las thog mar rngon pa zhig dang 'phrad pa na /
NK043(pi)001:6727: ri 'di la rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba mthong ngam zhes dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6728: rngon pa des rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' bas
NK043(pi)001:6729: bram ze 'di lta bu dag gi phyir ri la
NK043(pi)001:6730: spangs par shes nas rngon pa des bram ze de
NK043(pi)001:6731: bzung nas shing la bcings te brdegs pas lus la
NK043(pi)001:6734: khyod rgyal bu dris te ci bya mda' 'phang ngo zhes byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6735: bram ze des da ni 'dis bdag gsod par nges
NK043(pi)001:6736: na rdzun zhig bya'o bsams nas khyod bdag la 'dri
NK043(pi)001:6737: na ci nyes zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6738: rngon pas ci zhig smra snyam du sems nas dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6739: bram ze na re yab rgyal po rgyal bu mthong
NK043(pi)001:6740: bar dga' bas bdag 'dir rgyal bu phyir 'gugs su
NK043(pi)001:6741: 'ongs so zhes smras ma thag tu rngon pas kyang
NK043(pi)001:6742: bkrol te btang nas sngar ma rtogs shing rgyus ma
NK043(pi)001:6743: shes so zhes bzod pa gsol nas rgyal bu gang
NK043(pi)001:6745: de nas bram ze rgyal bu'i thad du phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6746: rgyang ma nas rgyal bus bsus te dga' ba'i sems kyis gus par byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:6747: khyod ga las 'ongs lam du nyon mongs pa dang
NK043(pi)001:6748: ngal bar ma gyur ta ma ci 'dod ces spro
NK043(pi)001:6751: bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs te /
NK043(pi)001:6752: lus thams cad rtse zhing ngal te bkres skom mo zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6753: spyil po'i nang du khrid nas stan la 'dug tu bcug ste /
NK043(pi)001:6754: shing thog dang shing 'bras dang btung ba'i skom mdun
NK043(pi)001:6755: du phab pa bram zes kyang zos shing 'thungs nas
NK043(pi)001:6756: thal byung du 'di skad ces smras te /
NK043(pi)001:6757: bdag ni yul ko le zhes bya ba'i mi yin te /
NK043(pi)001:6758: snga zhig nas rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' zhes phyogs bcur grags pa thos pas /
NK043(pi)001:6759: bdag ni dbul zhing phongs te /
NK043(pi)001:6760: rgyal bu la slong du 'ongs so //
NK043(pi)001:6762: bdag la yod pa khyod la ma byin na /
NK043(pi)001:6763: chags shing ser snar 'gyur na bdag la ci yod
NK043(pi)001:6764: sngar btang bas da ni ci yang sbyin du med
NK043(pi)001:6766: de ltar nor rdzas sbyin du med na khyod kyi
NK043(pi)001:6767: bu ming sring gnyis bdag rgad po'i bran khol du
NK043(pi)001:6768: byin cig / des de bzhin lan gsum gyi bar du smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6769: rgyal bus kyang khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs pas
NK043(pi)001:6770: bdag gi bu 'di gnyis 'dod pa legs kyis sbyin
NK043(pi)001:6772: de'i tshe bu ming sring gnyis rtser song ba las /
NK043(pi)001:6773: rgyal bus bos nas bu la 'di skad ces basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:6774: bram ze 'di lam ring po nas bu khyed gnyis slong du 'ongs pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6775: kho bos kyang khyed gnyis sbyin par byas kyi khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin songs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6776: de thos pas bu gnyis rgyal bu'i mchan du bros nas ngu ste 'di skad ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6777: bdag gis bram ze du ma mthong na 'di 'dra ba gzhan ma mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:6778: 'di ni bram ze ma lags kyi yi dwags sha
NK043(pi)001:6779: za lags pas bdag cag gi ma shing thog tshol
NK043(pi)001:6780: du mchi ba las slar ma 'khor bar bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:6781: gnyis yi dwags 'di'i zas su stsal na gdon mi
NK043(pi)001:6783: bdag cag gi ma slar mchis te bu dang ma 'phrad na /
NK043(pi)001:6784: ji ltar be'u bral ba'i ba ltar du zhing cho
NK043(pi)001:6785: nges 'debs te mya ngan gyis gdung bar 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:6786: // rgyal bus bu la bsgo ba /
NK043(pi)001:6787: kho bos sbyin par gnang bas bsdad du mi rung ste /
NK043(pi)001:6788: 'di bram ze yin gyi yi dwags ma yin pas
NK043(pi)001:6789: mi bza' yi khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin du songs
NK043(pi)001:6792: bu'i ma 'ongs nas bu ma btang na /
NK043(pi)001:6793: rgyal bus bdag la byin pa'i dge sems kyang bu'i mas bzlog ste nyams par byed du dogs so //
NK043(pi)001:6795: bdag gis sbyin pa ci byin kyang thog ma nas 'gyod pa'i sems byung ma myong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6796: de nas rgyal bus chu snod thogs te bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:6797: lag par chu blugs nas bu ming sring gnyis kyi
NK043(pi)001:6798: lag pa nas bzung ste bram ze la phul ba
NK043(pi)001:6800: bu gnyis po bram ze'i phyi bzhin 'gro ma btub
NK043(pi)001:6801: nas phyir yab rgyal bu'i drung du 'ongs te pus
NK043(pi)001:6802: mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad du /
NK043(pi)001:6803: bdag cag gnyis kyi tshe snga ma la sdig pa
NK043(pi)001:6804: ci bgyis nas 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar
NK043(pi)001:6805: gyur / bdag cag ni rgyal po'i rigs su skyes
NK043(pi)001:6806: na ci'i slad du pha rol gyi bran khol du
NK043(pi)001:6807: gyur ces rgyal bu la sdig pa bshags nas /
NK043(pi)001:6808: 'di'i rgyu rkyen gyis sdig pa byang zhing bsod nams skyes te /
NK043(pi)001:6809: gang nas gang du skyes kyang 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:6811: rgyal bus bu ming sring la smras pa 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:6812: na mdza' zhing sdug go cog mthar bye zhing 'bral
NK043(pi)001:6813: bar 'gyur te / thams cad mi rtag pas yid brtan du mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:6814: kho bo nam bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa na khyod thar pa'i don bya'o zhes basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:6815: bu gnyis kyis yab rgyal bu la zhus pa /
NK043(pi)001:6816: bus ni ma la mchi phyag bya ba lags na /
NK043(pi)001:6817: da gzhar yang mi 'phrad de ma'i ngo ma mthong
NK043(pi)001:6818: ba yang bdag cag gi sngon gyi sdig par zad
NK043(pi)001:6819: na / bdag cag gi ma ci'i phyir mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:6820: gyis gdungs shing sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhes smre
NK043(pi)001:6821: na / sngags 'don to // bram zes smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6822: bdag rgas la nyam chung bas bus pa 'di gnyis
NK043(pi)001:6823: kyiis bdag bor te ma'i thad du bros na bdag
NK043(pi)001:6824: gis byar med pas khyod kyis chings la dkris shig
NK043(pi)001:6826: rgyal bus kyang bu gnyis kyi lag pa phyin ka
NK043(pi)001:6827: log tu bzung ste bram ze la 'ching du bcug
NK043(pi)001:6828: nas thag pa de bram ze'i lag par byin te
NK043(pi)001:6830: bu gnyis ni 'gror ma 'dod de 'then pa dang
NK043(pi)001:6831: bram zes lcag thogs te ded nas lam du khrag
NK043(pi)001:6832: byung ba sa la lhags so //
NK043(pi)001:6833: rgyal bus de ltar mthong nas mchi ma phyungs te
NK043(pi)001:6834: mchi ma sa la bo bas sa yang khol bar
NK043(pi)001:6835: gyur to // rgyal bu dang gcan gzan ri dwags
NK043(pi)001:6836: thams cad kyis bu gnyis bskyal te mi snang bar
NK043(pi)001:6837: gyur pa dang gzod phyir log go //
NK043(pi)001:6838: ri dwags dang gcan gzan rnams kyis rgyal bu bskyal te /
NK043(pi)001:6839: phyir rgyal bu dang rtse ba'i gnas su phyin nas
NK043(pi)001:6840: snying rje ba'i skad phyungs te lus sa la rdebs
NK043(pi)001:6841: shing 'agre'o // bram ze de lam du zhugs zhugs te song song ba las /
NK043(pi)001:6842: lam khar skye shing zhig yod pa la bu gnyis btags te 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:6843: de nas chas pa dang bu gnyis ma dang 'phrad
NK043(pi)001:6844: du re bas shing gi phag tu 'khri zhing 'gror
NK043(pi)001:6845: ma btub nas bram zes yang gzhus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6846: bu gnyis kyis bdag cag la ma rdeg cig /
NK043(pi)001:6847: bdag cag rang 'agro'o zhes gnam la yar bltas te
NK043(pi)001:6848: ri gnyen gyi lha dang nags tshal dang shing gi
NK043(pi)001:6849: lha rnams bdag cag la cung zad thugs mi bartse'am
NK043(pi)001:6851: bdag cag ni lam ring por bran khol byed du 'gro ste /
NK043(pi)001:6852: ma dang bral bar gyur na bdag cag gi ma
NK043(pi)001:6853: ri la shing thog 'tshol zhing barngara btang ba la
NK043(pi)001:6854: myur du bdag cag dang ngo 'phrad par shog cig
NK043(pi)001:6855: / ces mi snun nam zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6856: bu'i ma ri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil g.ya' zhing g.yo ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:6857: mig g.yon g.yas pa yin nam snyam /
NK043(pi)001:6859: nu ma gnyis nas nu zho yang rang zag pa
NK043(pi)001:6860: na de 'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i ltas ngan
NK043(pi)001:6861: pa sngon byung ma myong na bdag gi bu gnyis
NK043(pi)001:6862: la ye 'drog ma byung ngam snyam nas shing thog
NK043(pi)001:6863: brdab btang nas myur bar phyir 'gro bar ches pa
NK043(pi)001:6864: dang / de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal bus khye'u gnyis byin pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6865: btsun mos dge ba'i bar chad byed du dogs pas
NK043(pi)001:6866: seng ge mo zhig tu sprul nas lam srang du
NK043(pi)001:6867: bsdad do // btsun mos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6868: khyod ni gcan gzan gyi rgyal mo /
NK043(pi)001:6869: kho mo ni mi'i rgyal mo yin te /
NK043(pi)001:6870: ri la 'khod par 'dra na cung zad lam las byol te bdag thongs shig /
NK043(pi)001:6871: bdag la bu chung ngu shed ma bye ba gnyis shig yod de /
NK043(pi)001:6872: da tsam gyi bar du ci yang ma zos pas bdag 'ong du re ste sdod do //
NK043(pi)001:6873: seng ges kyang bram ze de rgya ring du thal
NK043(pi)001:6874: bar shes nas lam las byol te btsun mo btang
NK043(pi)001:6875: ngo // btsun mo phyir gnas su 'ongs pa na
NK043(pi)001:6876: rgyal bu 'ba' zhig las bu gnyis ma mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:6877: ngo // / bdag nyid kyi spyil bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:6878: bu gnyis 'dug pa'i spyil por bltas kyang ma mthong /
NK043(pi)001:6879: bu rtse ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram du btsal kyang ma mthong la /
NK043(pi)001:6880: sngon bu dang rtse ba'i ri dwags sha ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:6882: gcan gzan seng ge dang spre'u sogs mdun nas lus sa la rdebs shing sgra 'byin la /
NK043(pi)001:6883: sngon brtse ba'i rdzing bu'i chu yang skam par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:6884: phyir rgyal bu ga la ba der songs te bu gnyis ga re zhes dris pa /
NK043(pi)001:6887: bdag nam shing thog khyer te gnas su 'khor ba na /
NK043(pi)001:6888: bdag gi bu gnyis rgyang ma nas rgyug cing mdun bsu nas /
NK043(pi)001:6889: rdeg 'chos na yang phyir langs te dkyu mchong zhing a ma 'ongs a ma 'ongs zhes 'bod de /
NK043(pi)001:6890: bdag 'dug pa'i tshe gnyis ka g.yas g.yon na 'dug
NK043(pi)001:6891: cing phrag pa'am lus la rdul gos na yang 'phyi
NK043(pi)001:6892: zhing sprug / da bdag gi bu ga re ma mthong na gzhan la ma byin nam /
NK043(pi)001:6893: 'di ltar de gnyis ma mthong bas bdag gi snying 'gas bar 'gyur gyi /
NK043(pi)001:6894: bdag gi bu ga la 'dug myur du smros shig /
NK043(pi)001:6896: de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang lan ma btab so //
NK043(pi)001:6898: bu gnyis ma mthong bas lhag par gdungs pa'i steng
NK043(pi)001:6899: du rgyal bus lan ma ster bas lhag par myos
NK043(pi)001:6902: yul kee lee zhes bya ba'i bram ze zhig 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:6903: te bu gnyis slong ba la bdag gi byin to
NK043(pi)001:6904: // de thos ma thag tu btsun mo sa la 'gyel te cho nge btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:6905: rgyal bus smras pa re zhig sdod cig /
NK043(pi)001:6906: khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas mar me
NK043(pi)001:6907: mdzad kyi tshe dam ji ltar bcas pa mi dran
NK043(pi)001:6908: nam / de'i tshe de'i dus na bdag ni bram ze'i bu gzhon nu zhes bya /
NK043(pi)001:6909: khyod ni bram ze'i bu mo sun da ri ka zhes bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:6910: khyod kyis me tog pad+mo bdun zhig thogs bdag la
NK043(pi)001:6911: dngul gyi dong rtse lnga zhig yod cing khyod las
NK043(pi)001:6912: ngas pad+mo lnga zhig nyos te sangs rgyas la phul
NK043(pi)001:6914: khyod kyis nga la pad+mo lhag ma gnyis po yang
NK043(pi)001:6915: byin nas sangs rgyas la 'bul gyis smon lam du
NK043(pi)001:6916: yang bdag skye ba pha rol tu rtag par khyod
NK043(pi)001:6917: kyi chung mar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa
NK043(pi)001:6918: las / de'i tshe bdag gis khyod nga'i chung mar
NK043(pi)001:6919: dga' na bdag gi yid dang 'gal bar ma byed
NK043(pi)001:6920: las / cig / bdag sbyin pa zhig yin na
NK043(pi)001:6921: pha ma gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan sbyin yang bdag
NK043(pi)001:6922: gi yid bzhin du sbyin pa byed pa la 'gal
NK043(pi)001:6923: bar mi byed par dam bcas na de ltar bya'o
NK043(pi)001:6925: de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes dam bcas sam /
NK043(pi)001:6926: da khyod kyis bu gnyis gzhan la byin pa la /
NK043(pi)001:6927: bdag gi dge ba'i sems dkrug tu yang ci yod ces smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:6928: de thos pa tsam gyis sems dwang bas sngon gyi gnas dran par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6929: rgyal bu'i bsam pa myur du rdzogs par 'dod pas
NK043(pi)001:6930: yid bzhin du sbyin pa la rjes su yi rang
NK043(pi)001:6931: bar gyur to // de nas lha'i dbang po bram
NK043(pi)001:6932: ze mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma bcu gnyis dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:6933: bar gyur to // par sprul nas / rgyal bu'i btsun mo bslangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6934: rgyal bus kyang de bzhin du sbyin par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:6936: bdag gzhan la byin na rgyal bu'i g.yog sus bya /
NK043(pi)001:6938: da khyod kyang ma byin na ji ltar bla med byang chub 'thob /
NK043(pi)001:6939: de nas rgyal bus chu snod thogs te bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:6940: lag par kru ba'i phyir blugs nas btsun mo yang
NK043(pi)001:6941: phul lo // de ltar rgyal bu 'gyod pa med
NK043(pi)001:6942: par brgya byin gyis rigs nas lha rnams kyis bstod
NK043(pi)001:6943: cing basngagasa la gnam dang sa yang cher g.yos so
NK043(pi)001:6944: phul lo // // de nas bram ze des btsun
NK043(pi)001:6945: mo khrid de gom pa bdun tsam du phyin pa
NK043(pi)001:6946: phul lo // // dang / phyir log nas btsun
NK043(pi)001:6947: mo 'di rgyal bu la phyir gtams kyis su la'ang
NK043(pi)001:6948: ma byin cig ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:6951: ci mir skyes pa'i chung ma'i nang na chung ma 'di ni shin tu yang bzang zhing mdzes te /
NK043(pi)001:6952: rgyal po gcig la bu mo 'di gcig pu las
NK043(pi)001:6953: med de chung ma 'di bdag la chu gang che
NK043(pi)001:6954: bas la zas btso sreg sogs lag dar de rtag
NK043(pi)001:6955: tu 'grub che la byang bzhin yang bzang bas khyod
NK043(pi)001:6956: khyer na daga'o // bram zes smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6957: bdag ni bram ze ma yin te brgya byin lags so //
NK043(pi)001:6958: ched du tshod bgam pa'i phyir 'ong ba yin no
NK043(pi)001:6959: zhes brgya byin rang gi lus su bsgyur nas khyed
NK043(pi)001:6961: de nas btsun mo ma gus par phyag 'tshal te smon lam gsum gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:6963: gcig tu bdag gi bu khrid pa'i bram ze phyir yang bdag gi yul du song bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:6964: gnyis su na bdag gi bu gnyis bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:6965: gsum du na rgyal bu dang bdag cag gnyis kyang
NK043(pi)001:6966: phyir bdag gi yul du myur bar 'khor bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:6967: cig ces smras pa la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos
NK043(pi)001:6968: kyang smon lam de bzhin 'grub par gyur cig ces
NK043(pi)001:6969: smras so // rgyal bus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:6970: bdag gis ni sems can thams cad skye rga na
NK043(pi)001:6971: 'chi'i sdug bsngal las sgrol bar gyur cig ces smon
NK043(pi)001:6974: smon lam 'di ni rgya che ste bla na med pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:6975: gal te mtho ris su skye zhing nyi zla la dbang ba'i bdag po 'dod dam /
NK043(pi)001:6977: tshe ring zhing yun du gnas par 'dod na de bdag gis sbyin nus kyi /
NK043(pi)001:6978: khyod kyis smras pa'i smon lam khams gsum las mchog tu 'das pa yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:6979: de lta bu bdag gis nus pa ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:6981: de lta na re zhig phyug por gyur te sngon
NK043(pi)001:6982: bas kyang lhag par rtag tu sbyin pa byin zhing
NK043(pi)001:6983: / yab rgyal po dang blon po rnams dang bdag cag 'phrad par shog cig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:6984: brgya byin gyis smon pa de bzhin du nges par 'grub par gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:6985: ces smras nas mi snang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:6986: yul kee lee'i bram ze des byis pa gnyis khrid de khyim du 'ongs ba na /
NK043(pi)001:6987: chung mas 'di skad du khyod ngo so 'di lta bus 'khor te 'ongs pa ngo mi tsha'am /
NK043(pi)001:6988: bus pa 'di gnyis rgyal po'i gdung la gtogs pa yin na snying rje'i sems kyang med de /
NK043(pi)001:6989: 'di ltar 'tsheg brdegs shing lus la rma dang rnag
NK043(pi)001:6990: khrag gis rtsog por byas pa bzod dam zhes byas
NK043(pi)001:6991: nas / bus pa 'di gnyis tshong la bkol du
NK043(pi)001:6992: rung ba gzhan khrid la shog ces bsgo ba bzhin
NK043(pi)001:6993: du bram ze des bus pa gnyis khrid de tshong
NK043(pi)001:6995: brgya byin gyi sprul pas bram ze de la bus
NK043(pi)001:6996: pa 'di gnyis shin tu rin che bas sus kyang
NK043(pi)001:6997: nyo mi nus so zhes smras shing /
NK043(pi)001:6998: bus pa de gnyis bkres shing skom pa las /
NK043(pi)001:6999: brgya byin gyis lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lha'i dri bsung sprul te /
NK043(pi)001:7000: bus pa gnyis kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas lto
NK043(pi)001:7001: 'grangs bar byas shing brgya byin gyis bram ze'i sems
NK043(pi)001:7002: bsgyur te yul ya bar phyin par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:7003: yul de'i blon po dang yul mi thams cad rgyal
NK043(pi)001:7004: bu'i sras rgyal po chen po'i tsha bo yin par
NK043(pi)001:7005: shes nas thams cad mya ngan gyis gdungs te /
NK043(pi)001:7006: bu gnyis ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7008: bdag gis bslangs te 'ongs so drir ci yod ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:7010: bdag cag gi yul du 'ongs na 'dri bar rigs
NK043(pi)001:7011: kyi mi 'dri ba ma yin no zhes smras te
NK043(pi)001:7012: / blon po dang yul mi rnams pa gros nas
NK043(pi)001:7013: bram ze las bu gnyis 'phrog par brtsam pa las
NK043(pi)001:7014: / / de'i nang nas khyim bdag gcig gis rgyal
NK043(pi)001:7015: bus sbyin par byas pa 'phrog na rgyal bu'i yid
NK043(pi)001:7017: gal te rgyal po chen po la gsol na rin
NK043(pi)001:7018: gyis bslu bar 'gyur ro zhes gros btab pa ltar
NK043(pi)001:7019: byas te / rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7020: bram ze dang bu gnyis po nang du khrid la shog ces byas te /
NK043(pi)001:7021: de gnyis mthong bas rgyal po dang btsun mo blon po sogs thams cad du zhing bltas so //
NK043(pi)001:7022: de nas rgyal pos bram ze la bu 'di gnyis la rin ji ltar thob ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7023: bram zes smra ma khom par khye'u de yis 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:7024: bdag bu pho ni dngul gyi dang rtse stong dang ba lang brgya zhig ri'o //
NK043(pi)001:7025: bu mo ni gser gyi dang rtse stong dang ba bzhon nyis brgya ri'o zhes gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7026: rgyal pos khye'u la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7027: 'jig rten pa'i chos lugs kyis mi'i nang na pho ni rin po che ltar che ba yin na /
NK043(pi)001:7028: ci'i phyir pho rin chung la /
NK043(pi)001:7031: pho brang gi slas lta bu rgyal po dang nye ba ma lags la /
NK043(pi)001:7032: ma rabs bran las slas su bzhes te de la
NK043(pi)001:7033: thugs dgyes pas bkur zhing btsun par mdzad de rin
NK043(pi)001:7034: po che'i gos bskon zhing bza' btung ro brgya dang
NK043(pi)001:7036: sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba ri la spangs te
NK043(pi)001:7037: ya mtshan pho brang gi slas dang rol zhing rol
NK043(pi)001:7038: mo mdzad kyang sras la cung zad tsam yang dgongs
NK043(pi)001:7039: pa'i thugs kyang mi mnga' bas na /
NK043(pi)001:7040: de'i phyir bu pho ni rin chung la bu mo ni rin che ba mngon no //
NK043(pi)001:7041: de skad smras pa rgyal pos thos nas lhag par
NK043(pi)001:7042: mi dga' ba'i mya ngan skyes te mchi ma blags
NK043(pi)001:7044: bdag ni rab tu gnod na ci'i phyir kho bo'i pang du mi 'ongs /
NK043(pi)001:7045: khyed nga la mi dga' 'am 'on te bram ze 'dis 'jigs zhes dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7047: bdag cag ni rgyal po chen po la mi dga'
NK043(pi)001:7048: ba'am bram ze la skrag pa yang ma yin te
NK043(pi)001:7049: / bdag cag thos pa rgyal po chen po'i tsha
NK043(pi)001:7050: bo las da lta mi'i bran khol du gyur pas
NK043(pi)001:7051: / / gang na yang mi'i bran khol rgyal po'i
NK043(pi)001:7052: pang du 'dug pa'i chos med pas mi spobs so
NK043(pi)001:7053: / / // rgyal pos de skad thos pas lhag par gdungs nas /
NK043(pi)001:7054: bus gsol pa bzhin du bram ze la rin byin te /
NK043(pi)001:7055: bu gnyis rgyal po'i pang du blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:7056: rgyal pos de gnyis la phyag gis byugs te /
NK043(pi)001:7057: khyed ri la gnas pa na zas su ci za /
NK043(pi)001:7058: gos su ci gyon zhes dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7060: zas su ni shing 'bras dang shing thog za'o //
NK043(pi)001:7061: gos su ni pags pa dang snam bu gyon te /
NK043(pi)001:7062: bya mang po dang rtse dga' bas mya ngan gyi sems med do zhes gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:7063: de nas rgyal pos bram ze de la phyi rol du songs shig ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7064: bu gnyis kyis rgyal po la gsol pa /
NK043(pi)001:7065: bram ze 'di rab tu bkres skom gyis nyen na /
NK043(pi)001:7066: de la kha zas kyis tshim par mdzad du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:7068: khyod la mi dga' ba'am 'khon du 'dzin pa med par phyir kha zas sbyin par sems /
NK043(pi)001:7070: bdag gi pha byang chub kyi lam la dga' bas nor rdzas kyi sbyin pa sbyin du med nas /
NK043(pi)001:7071: bdag gi las kyis slong ba la byin pa yang bdag cag la dbang ba'i bdag po lags te /
NK043(pi)001:7072: 'dis bdag cag la bkol ba'i las tsam byed du
NK043(pi)001:7073: bcug pa yang thog ma nas pha'i bsam pa ltar
NK043(pi)001:7074: ma gyur te / de la snying rje'i sems tsam
NK043(pi)001:7075: yang ma mchis te ltogs shing skom bzhin du 'dug
NK043(pi)001:7076: pa 'di mig gis kyang su zhig gis bzod /
NK043(pi)001:7077: bdag gis phas ni bu yang mi phongs par gzhan la sbyin na /
NK043(pi)001:7078: rgyal po chen pos mi gcig gi kha zas tsam la ser sna mdzad dam zhes gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7079: rgyal pos kyang bram ze de la zas tshim par
NK043(pi)001:7080: byin nas bram ze yang dga' ste phyir bdag gi
NK043(pi)001:7082: de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang nas rgyal bu'i sar chas so //
NK043(pi)001:7083: der chu las mthar nas rgyal bu yid la byas
NK043(pi)001:7084: pas thar zhing rgyal bu'i drung du song ste rgyal
NK043(pi)001:7085: po'i bkas / rgyal bu slar rang yul du gshegs su gsol zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:7086: rgyal bus smras pa thog mar rgyal pos lo bcu
NK043(pi)001:7087: gnyis kyi bar du ri la song zhes bsgos na
NK043(pi)001:7088: / da dung lo gcig ma tshang bas da gdod lo tshang nas bdag 'agro'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:7089: pho nya phyir log ste rgyal po la gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7090: rgyal po nyid kyis rang lag gis yi ge bris pa pho nya la bskur te 'di skad basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:7091: khyod ni mi'i nang na mkhas pa shes rab can
NK043(pi)001:7092: yin pas 'gro ba'ang bzod cing 'ong ba'ang bzod pa
NK043(pi)001:7093: yin na / ci'i phyir khyod khros te 'ong du mi btub /
NK043(pi)001:7094: khyod dang lhan cig bza' ba dang btung ba dag
NK043(pi)001:7095: dgos kyi myur du shog cig ces pho nya 'gugs
NK043(pi)001:7096: su btang ngo // rgyal bus pho nya'i yi ge blangs nas mgo la gtugs shing phyag 'tshal te /
NK043(pi)001:7097: lan bdun skor ba byas nas mod la phyir yul du 'gro bar chas so //
NK043(pi)001:7098: der ri de nas chas pa dang ri de la
NK043(pi)001:7099: gnas pa'i ri dwags dang gcan gzan la sogs pas
NK043(pi)001:7100: rgyal bu 'agro'o zhes thos pas thams cad lus sa
NK043(pi)001:7101: la brdabs nas sa la 'gre zhing ngu ba'i skad
NK043(pi)001:7102: phyung ngo // chu mig rnams kyang skam ste gcan
NK043(pi)001:7103: gzan dang ri dwags kyi phru gu yang mi nu
NK043(pi)001:7104: phyung ngo // / 'dab chags mang po yang snying rje'i skad kyis sgra phyung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7105: de nas rgyal bu gos gyon nas btsun mo dang 'grogs te phyir yul du dong ba las /
NK043(pi)001:7106: dgra zla'i yul gyi rgyal pos /
NK043(pi)001:7107: rgyal bu phyir 'ong ngo zhes thos nas bal gyi
NK043(pi)001:7108: glang po che dkar po la gser gyi sga bltad
NK043(pi)001:7109: de / gser gyi snod du dngul gyi nye'usa bkang /
NK043(pi)001:7110: dngul gyi snod du gser gyi nye'usa bkang ba bshams nas rgyal bu bsu ba'i phyir bzhag go //
NK043(pi)001:7111: rgyal bu bsus nas rgyal pos phrin 'di skad gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:7112: bdag mi shes pa'i dbang du gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7113: rgyal bu la bal gyi glang po che bslangs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7114: rkyen gyis rgyal bu spangs par gyur pa la da
NK043(pi)001:7115: 'gyod pas mthol tshangs su gsol lo //
NK043(pi)001:7116: da rgyal bu slar gshegs zhes thos nas dga' ste
NK043(pi)001:7117: bal glang 'di nyid kyang slar phul zhing gser dngul
NK043(pi)001:7118: gyi nye'u rnams kyang phul na /
NK043(pi)001:7120: nongs pa'i skyon rnams kyang sbyang bar gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:7122: dper na mi zhig gis kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gzhan la byin pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7123: mi des zos nas slar sa la skyugs na /
NK043(pi)001:7124: phyir skyugs pa'i zas dri bsung dang ldan pa de bzang rung ngam /
NK043(pi)001:7125: de bzhin du bdag gis sbyin par byas pa yang phyir mi 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:7126: pho nya khyod bal gyi glang po 'di zhon la rang gi yul du songs shig /
NK043(pi)001:7127: khyod kyis rgyal po la 'di ltar bdag bsu zhing
NK043(pi)001:7128: spro ba'i tshig gis snyan par smras pa rab tu
NK043(pi)001:7129: daga'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7130: des kyang de bzhin byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:7131: bal glang de'i rkyen gyis 'thab pa'i dgra zla de
NK043(pi)001:7132: dag gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems su
NK043(pi)001:7133: gyur te rgyal po dang yul mi thams cad mgo
NK043(pi)001:7134: snyoms pa'i sems su gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7135: de'i tshe rgyal po yab kyis bal gyi glang po che la bcibs te rgyal bu bsus so //
NK043(pi)001:7136: rgyal bus mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin yul du song zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7137: yul mi thams cad kyang rab tu dga' bas me
NK043(pi)001:7138: tog sogs kyis mchod pa bshams te sa gzhi chag
NK043(pi)001:7139: chag btab bo // rgyal bu pho brang gi nang
NK043(pi)001:7140: du 'ongs nas yum gyi drung du phyin te mgo
NK043(pi)001:7141: bos phyag 'tshal nas spro ba'i tshig gis snyun gsol
NK043(pi)001:7142: chag btab bo // to // de nas rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:7143: rin po che'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang rgyal bu
NK043(pi)001:7144: la gtad de yid bzhin du sbyin pa byed du
NK043(pi)001:7145: chag btab bo // to // bcug nas / sbyin
NK043(pi)001:7146: pa snga ma bas lhag par rgyun ma chad par
NK043(pi)001:7147: sbyin pa byed du bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:7148: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu don grub ces
NK043(pi)001:7149: bya bar gyur pa'i yab dang yum ni da lta'i
NK043(pi)001:7150: rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang yum lha mdzes dang
NK043(pi)001:7151: / de'i dus kyi btsun mo ni grags 'dzin dang /
NK043(pi)001:7152: dge slong a tshu ta zhes pa mo dgal gyi bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:7153: de'i tshe brgya byin ni da lta sha ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:7154: ri de'i rngon pa de ni kun dga' bo dang /
NK043(pi)001:7155: khye'u ya ri ni sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang /
NK043(pi)001:7156: bu mor gyur pa ni sru go ta m+ai dang /
NK043(pi)001:7157: bram ze slong mo ba ni lha sbyin nyid dang /
NK043(pi)001:7158: de dus kyi bram ze'i chung ma ni da ltar
NK043(pi)001:7159: bram ze mo tsam tsa yan yin no zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:7160: so // tshul 'di dang khog 'dra bar bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:7161: 'das nyid yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:7162: kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sras rgyal tshab
NK043(pi)001:7163: thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur pa na slong
NK043(pi)001:7164: ba la ci 'dod pa bstsal zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7165: spos kyi glang po che'i mchog gangs kyi ri lta bu zhig yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:7166: nyi 'og gi rgyal po zhig gis mngags pa'i bram
NK043(pi)001:7167: zes slong pa la byin pa'i rkyen gyis yul mi
NK043(pi)001:7170: rgyal pos gzhan ngo tsam du nags su spang bar chad byas pa la btsun mo ma dri dang /
NK043(pi)001:7171: bu gzhon nu dra ba can dang /
NK043(pi)001:7172: bu mo krir+na 'dzin dang bcas par shing rta la zhugs te song ba la /
NK043(pi)001:7173: lam du shing rta 'dren pa'i rta bzhi slong mo'i bram ze la byin /
NK043(pi)001:7174: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis shing rta 'dren pa la /
NK043(pi)001:7175: gnod sbyin gzhon nu bzhis ri dwags dmar po'i gzugs
NK043(pi)001:7176: su bsgyur bas shing rta drangs pas btsun mo daga'o
NK043(pi)001:7177: // de nas lam du dong ba las bram ze
NK043(pi)001:7178: zhig gis shing rta bslang ba byin nas gzhon nu
NK043(pi)001:7179: // de phas thogs / bu mo de mas thogs te rkang pas phyin no //
NK043(pi)001:7180: gnod sbyin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngal ba sel phyir lam bstungs te /
NK043(pi)001:7181: ri 'phang ka mthong sar phyin nas /
NK043(pi)001:7183: las sna tshogs pa'i bzo bos shing lo'i khang pa
NK043(pi)001:7184: mthong na yid du 'ong ba byas nas der 'dug
NK043(pi)001:7185: ste chung mas g.yog byed cing lo phyed tsam du
NK043(pi)001:7186: dka' thub spyod cing gnas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7187: der lam ring po nas bram ze zhig rang gi chung mas g.yog tshol bu btang bas /
NK043(pi)001:7188: sras gnyis bslangs pa sbyin par khas blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:7189: de thos pas sras gnyis skrag nas mig rig rig por gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:7190: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i shugs kyi snying gdungs bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7191: bu khyed gnyis la nga snying mi brtse ba ni
NK043(pi)001:7192: ma yin gyi bla med byang chub kyi phyir ngas
NK043(pi)001:7193: khyed gnyis byin pa la mi dga' bar ma byed
NK043(pi)001:7195: bram ze de la smras pa ngas khyod la 'di gnyis byin mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:7196: 'di gnyis kyi ma nags su rtsa ba dang 'bras
NK043(pi)001:7197: bu tshol du song bas de dang 'phrad par bya
NK043(pi)001:7198: ba'i phyir / de ring sdod la sang rgyan gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i bu gnyis khrid cig /
NK043(pi)001:7199: bram ze des bud med ni g.yon can yin pas
NK043(pi)001:7200: sbyin pa la gegs byed pas bdag mi 'dug go
NK043(pi)001:7201: // byang chub sems dpas de nga'i chos spyod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7202: grogs yin pas sbyin pa'i bar chad byed pa'i dogs
NK043(pi)001:7203: pa med kyang khyod ci dgar zad mod /
NK043(pi)001:7204: gzhan yang byis pa 'di gnyis g.yog gi bya ba
NK043(pi)001:7205: la mi mkhas pas khyod kyi bran byas kyang ci
NK043(pi)001:7206: ltar mgu / nga'i yab rgyal po mthong nas bslu bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:7208: rgyal po rnams sbrul gdug pa dang 'dra ste /
NK043(pi)001:7209: de'i drung du mchi bar rngo mi thogs shing /
NK043(pi)001:7210: nyes na rgyal pos 'di gnyis 'phrog pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:7211: chad pa gcod kyang srid pas 'di gnyis nga'i chung ma'i g.yog tu 'khrid do //
NK043(pi)001:7212: de nas byang chub sems dpas bu gnyis la snying
NK043(pi)001:7213: brtse zhing chags bzhin du g.yog legs par byos zhes
NK043(pi)001:7214: gdams so // de nas bram ze des bu gnyis
NK043(pi)001:7215: la da phyir phyung zhes tshig rtsub mos bsdigs shing
NK043(pi)001:7216: gdams so // khrid pa la / de gnyis pha ma dang bral bas mig mchi mas gang bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:7217: ma phyir ma byung bar du zhog ces yab la zhus so //
NK043(pi)001:7218: bram ze des 'di gnyis kyi ma 'ongs na bu
NK043(pi)001:7219: la byams pas 'gyod de mi sbyin srid snyam du
NK043(pi)001:7220: / de gnyis kyi lag pa lcugs mas bcings te
NK043(pi)001:7221: khrid pas de gnyis gcig la gcig 'khri zhing pha
NK043(pi)001:7222: la lta bzhin du bram ze des bsdigs te khrid
NK043(pi)001:7223: / pa la / bu mo de skad phyung zhing
NK043(pi)001:7224: dus nas yab cig 'di ltar brtse med du brdeg
NK043(pi)001:7225: pa 'di bram ze min gyi sha za bram ze
NK043(pi)001:7226: ltar bcos pa bdag cag za ba 'di la yab
NK043(pi)001:7228: gzhon nu dra ba can gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7229: bram zes brdeg pa de tsam sdug bsngal mi che yi /
NK043(pi)001:7230: bdag cag gi ma shing thog rnams bsnams te 'ongs na /
NK043(pi)001:7231: gnas stong pa mthong nas yum de ji ltar 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:7232: yab gcig yum de thugs ngal chung ba'i thabs dang /
NK043(pi)001:7233: bdag cag gi 'phrin gyis yum la phyag 'tshal zhing thugs ngal mdzad pa las bzlog tu gsol /
NK043(pi)001:7234: slan chad yab yum gyi zhal kyang mthong dka' 'o //
NK043(pi)001:7235: bu mo krish+na tshur shog yab kyis bdag cag bran du gnang zin pas da ni 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:7236: bdag cag byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la
NK043(pi)001:7237: mnyes par ma bgyis pa'i tshig smras pa de dag
NK043(pi)001:7238: byis pa'i nongs pas bzod par mdzad du gsol zhes
NK043(pi)001:7239: smras so // byang chub sems dpa' yang bu la snying rje bas blo blong blong por gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7240: nga'i bu snying ltar gces pa la lhwam yang med
NK043(pi)001:7241: par bram ze ngan pa ngo tsha med pas brdeg
NK043(pi)001:7242: bzhin song ba shin tu gzhon pa de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:7243: bran gyi las ji ltar bzod /
NK043(pi)001:7244: bkres skom gyis nyen na bslang ba'i gnas kyang ci zhig yod /
NK043(pi)001:7245: bdag ni brtan par chos dran kyang /
NK043(pi)001:7246: bu gnyis 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du dgongs so //
NK043(pi)001:7247: btsun mo ma dris kyang mi dge ba'i ltas mthong
NK043(pi)001:7248: nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu khyer te myur du
NK043(pi)001:7249: 'ong snyam yang gcan gzan khro bo rnams kyis lam
NK043(pi)001:7250: chod pas ring zhig lon nas rang gnas su phyin
NK043(pi)001:7251: pa dang / bsur 'ong ran pa'i sa dang rtsed
NK043(pi)001:7252: mo rtse ba'i sa sogs na bu gnyis ma mthong
NK043(pi)001:7254: kye ma byis pa de gnyis rtse rtse nas gnyid log gam /
NK043(pi)001:7257: byis par gyur pas gab cing 'khod dam /
NK043(pi)001:7259: 'on te bsad na ni bya rnams kyang sgra 'byin rigs /
NK043(pi)001:7260: 'on kyang bdag sems mi dga' zhing lhu tshigs bral snyam byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7261: phyogs 'khrugs pa snyam byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7262: nags tshal 'di yang dpal nyams shing g.yo ba snyam
NK043(pi)001:7263: byed pa sogs kyi ltas ngan pa bdag gi lus
NK043(pi)001:7264: la smin nas / rgyal bu yab sras bde legs su gyur cig snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:7265: de nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams phyogs gcig bzhag ste /
NK043(pi)001:7266: khyim thab la byis pa gnyis gar song zhes dris so //
NK043(pi)001:7267: ma ni bu la byams pas phral du mi dga'
NK043(pi)001:7268: ba'i tshig brjod dka' ste cung zad smra ma nus
NK043(pi)001:7269: so // ma dris 'di 'di ltar gdungs shing mi
NK043(pi)001:7270: smra pas bdag gi bu gnyis ma rungs par gyur
NK043(pi)001:7271: to snyam du nags de kun tu sems kyis brtags
NK043(pi)001:7272: kyang mi snang bas mchi mas brnang bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:7273: byis pa gnyis po mi snang zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7274: khyod kyis kyang mi gsung bas kyi hud dag ni
NK043(pi)001:7275: bsad kyis med do zhes smras nas sa la 'gyel
NK043(pi)001:7276: te brgyal lo // de byang chub sems dpas rtsa'i
NK043(pi)001:7277: stan la bzhag ste chu grang mo gtor bas sos
NK043(pi)001:7278: te brgyal lo // pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7279: ngas khyod mi bzod pas dogs par myur du ma smras kyi /
NK043(pi)001:7280: bram ze rgas shing dbul ba zhig la byin gyis mya ngan ma byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:7281: bu la ma sems par nga la ltos /
NK043(pi)001:7282: bslangs na srog kyang mi sbyin par ga la nus /
NK043(pi)001:7283: des na nga'i sbyin pa la rjes su yi rangs par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:7284: de nas ma dris bu gnyis shi bar dogs pa
NK043(pi)001:7285: la gson pa'i gtam thos pas cung zhig mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:7286: chung bar gyur kyang sngon bu gnyis kyis bskyed pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7287: shing phung la 'khyud de du ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7288: byis pa de dag dang rtse ba'i ri dwags kyi
NK043(pi)001:7289: phru gu mthong nas du zhing mya ngan gyi tshig
NK043(pi)001:7290: brjod pa dang / lam gyi rjes la bltas na
NK043(pi)001:7291: 'then cing myur du song ba las brdegs te khrid
NK043(pi)001:7292: do snyam du mya ngan gyi tshig brjod par gyur
NK043(pi)001:7293: brjod pa dang / to // der rgyal bus bdag
NK043(pi)001:7294: gi bu gnyis ni grags pa dang 'khor ba'i bde
NK043(pi)001:7295: ba'i phyir byin pa ma yin gyi bla med byang
NK043(pi)001:7296: chub kyi phyir btang ba yin pa'i tshul gsungs pas
NK043(pi)001:7297: btsun mo yang sems brtan par gyur te khyim thab
NK043(pi)001:7298: mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir mchi ma phyis te ngo
NK043(pi)001:7299: mtshar che ste thug dan ma mdzad par slan chad
NK043(pi)001:7301: bdag byin na yang bar chad mi bgyid do zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:7302: de'i tshe sa g.yos shing ri 'gul ba na /
NK043(pi)001:7303: de'i rgyu brtags pas thams cad sgrol gyi mthu yin
NK043(pi)001:7304: par shes nas de'i phyi nyin brgya byin bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:7305: gzugs kyis chung ma bslang pa dang byin no //
NK043(pi)001:7306: des rang gi gzugs kyis slar phul te khyod kyi
NK043(pi)001:7307: bu gnyis ni yab kyis khrid nas bade'o zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:7308: so // bram ze des byis pa gnyis shi bi
NK043(pi)001:7309: ba'i yul du khrid pa na yul de'i mi thams
NK043(pi)001:7310: cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu
NK043(pi)001:7311: bya dka' ba la snying dad par gyur cing sras
NK043(pi)001:7313: thams cad sgrol slar bkug nas rgyal srid byed du
NK043(pi)001:7314: bcug pas gtong ba chen pos sems can thams cad
NK043(pi)001:7315: kyi bsam pa tshim par byas pas rgyal po thams
NK043(pi)001:7316: cad gtong du yang grags so //
NK043(pi)001:7317: de'i tshe bram ze la sras gnang ba'i rkyen des
NK043(pi)001:7318: 'byor ba chen po dang ldan par gyur pa la
NK043(pi)001:7319: / de'i mdza' bshes rnams kyis bram ze khyod 'di
NK043(pi)001:7320: ltar skal pa bzang por gyur pa thams cad sgrol
NK043(pi)001:7321: / la brten pa'o // des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7322: thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo la ci zhig byas /
NK043(pi)001:7323: kho bo rigs mchog tu gyur pa yon gnas su
NK043(pi)001:7324: gyur pas yin no zhes byas pa mi bzo ba
NK043(pi)001:7325: de ni lhas sbyin yin par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:7326: yang sngon rgyal po gsal stobs zhes bya ba'i btsun mo rnam par sba ba la /
NK043(pi)001:7327: sras gzugs bzang po lta na sdug pa zhig btsas pa la gzugs stobs zhes ming btags so //
NK043(pi)001:7328: de'i 'og tu bu brtson 'grus ldan dang /
NK043(pi)001:7330: shes rab ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bu gsum byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7331: yang btsun mo de'i mngal du bu chags pa na
NK043(pi)001:7332: gang gi nyin par glo bur pho brang gi 'khor
NK043(pi)001:7333: du gser sna tshogs kyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:7334: btsun mo de'i steng du lha'i bla bre rin po
NK043(pi)001:7335: che sna tshogs kyis spras pa byung bas ya mtshan
NK043(pi)001:7336: te / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams la 'di ci zhig /
NK043(pi)001:7337: de rnams kyis lha 'di ni btsun mo'i lhums su sras zhugs pa 'di'i mthu ste /
NK043(pi)001:7338: de ni bsod nams kyi dbang che bar grags pa zhig go //
NK043(pi)001:7339: de nas btsun mo de bdag seng ge'i khrir 'dug
NK043(pi)001:7340: ste gdugs dkar po thogs la rnga yab nor bu'i
NK043(pi)001:7341: yu ba can thogs na ci ma rung snyam pa
NK043(pi)001:7342: rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7343: de bzhin du byas pas 'dod pa de zhi'o //
NK043(pi)001:7344: de bzhin du gser dngul gyi phung po'i steng du 'dug la /
NK043(pi)001:7345: rang lag gis sbyin pa byin nas nor med pa rnams nor dang ldan par bya'o snyam pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7346: btson thams cad btang na snyam pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7347: skyed mos tshal mthong na snyam pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7348: bden pa brjod pas lha'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug
NK043(pi)001:7349: nas skye bo mang po la chos ston pa'i rjes
NK043(pi)001:7350: la ya mtshan 'ga' 'byung ba de lta bu lha
NK043(pi)001:7351: rnams kyis bdag la phul na snyam pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:7353: btsun mo de seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas khri
NK043(pi)001:7354: de yang mi 'greng bdun tsam du nam mkha' la
NK043(pi)001:7356: lha'i bla bre rin chen sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig kyang byung /
NK043(pi)001:7357: skye bo phal mo che bsod nams kyi mthu mthong
NK043(pi)001:7358: bas spos sogs kyis btsun mo la mchod nas mdun
NK043(pi)001:7359: du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:7360: de nas btsun mo des sngon ma byung ba'i tshigs bcad 'di smras so //
NK043(pi)001:7361: bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7362: de phyir mis ni bsod nams bya //
NK043(pi)001:7363: de bas yang dang yang du bya //
NK043(pi)001:7364: de nyid la ni 'dun par bya //
NK043(pi)001:7365: 'di smras ma thag tu bar snang las legs par
NK043(pi)001:7366: smras so mchog tu legs par smras so zhes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7367: sgra byung ngo // lha'i rol mo'i sgra sgrogs shing /
NK043(pi)001:7368: lha'i gos kyi char chen po babs so //
NK043(pi)001:7369: rgyal po gsal stobs sogs skye bo de thams cad dga' zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7370: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis rang gi lus kyi gos
NK043(pi)001:7371: dang rgyan thams cad phud nas chos kyi khri dgab
NK043(pi)001:7373: de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi mthu mthong nas ched du brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:7374: phyis zla ba dgu tshang nas nyi ma shar ba'i
NK043(pi)001:7375: dus su khye'u gzugs bzang la lta na sdug pa
NK043(pi)001:7376: zhig btsas so // de'i chos rnam pa drug tu
NK043(pi)001:7377: g.yos shing nam mkha' las rin po che sna bdun
NK043(pi)001:7378: gyi char btsun mo'i 'khor du babs so //
NK043(pi)001:7379: rgyal po'i pho brang dang 'khor thams cad du gos sna tshogs kyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:7380: rgyal po de'i yul thams cad lha'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char babs so //
NK043(pi)001:7381: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog dang 'bras bu 'thon to //
NK043(pi)001:7382: char zim bu dang bser bu bsil ba'i yid du 'ong ba dag ldang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7383: gzhon nu de btsas ma thag tu rgyal po chen
NK043(pi)001:7384: po bzhis lha'i seng ge'i khri rin chen sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:7385: kyis spras pas brtol te glo bur du phul lo
NK043(pi)001:7386: // lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid lag
NK043(pi)001:7387: dar te gzhon nu'i steng du lha'i gdugs rtsibs brgya
NK043(pi)001:7388: pa dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:7389: // to // de'i steng na sum cu rtsa gsum
NK043(pi)001:7390: pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i gos kyi bla bre bres
NK043(pi)001:7391: // to // so // la las rin po che 'thor /
NK043(pi)001:7392: de bzhin du so so nas gos dang me tog
NK043(pi)001:7393: dang rgyan dang phye ma spos dang phreng ba byug
NK043(pi)001:7395: lha'i rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byed do //
NK043(pi)001:7396: las sna tshogs pas grong khyer kun tu rdo dang gseg ma med par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:7398: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgrengs /
NK043(pi)001:7399: tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab /
NK043(pi)001:7400: bdug pa'i snod mang po ni btags te /
NK043(pi)001:7401: me tog sna tshogs gtor bas lha rnams kyi skyed tshal 'dra bar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:7402: glang po'i mchog brgya ni nags khung nas rang 'ongs te glang po'i bres na gnas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7404: 'bru thams cad kyang ma rmos ma btab par mthu dang ldan par smin /
NK043(pi)001:7405: seng khri'i 'og nas gter chen po lnga rin po
NK043(pi)001:7406: che sna tshogs kyis gang ba rnams kyis kha bstan
NK043(pi)001:7407: te blangs kyang zad par ma gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7408: sems can phan tshun 'khod pa rnams kyang yud tsam la byams pa'i sems su gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7409: gzhon nu mthu dang rdzu 'phrul che ba de btsas ma thag tu tshe rabs dran te /
NK043(pi)001:7410: phyogs bzhir bltas nas tshigs su bcad pa /
NK043(pi)001:7411: bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur sogs sngar bzhin smras so //
NK043(pi)001:7412: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis de'i bsod nams kyi che
NK043(pi)001:7413: ba bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang brjod do
NK043(pi)001:7414: // rgyal po'i yul de'i mi thams cad kyis gzhon
NK043(pi)001:7415: nu'i bsod nams kyi stobs 'di ltar che ba ya
NK043(pi)001:7416: mtshan no zhes ched du brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:7417: rgyal po gsal stobs dga' nas sbyin pa chen po byin no //
NK043(pi)001:7418: re zhig na 'byor pa cher rgyas pas de'i btsas
NK043(pi)001:7419: ston byas nas de'i ming cir gdags zhes bgros te
NK043(pi)001:7420: bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar btags so //
NK043(pi)001:7421: gzhon nu bsod nams stobs ma ma brgyad la gtad
NK043(pi)001:7422: nas 'tsho ba'i yo byad bzang pos bskyed bsrings te
NK043(pi)001:7423: / mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin skye drag par gyur
NK043(pi)001:7424: nas cher skyes pa na yi ge slob tu bcug
NK043(pi)001:7426: rgyal rigs dag gi gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7427: gzhon nu de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge
NK043(pi)001:7428: zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag dang gzhan la phan
NK043(pi)001:7429: par zhugs pa / snying rje can bdag nyid che ba /
NK043(pi)001:7432: gtong dang sbyin pa la dga' ba /
NK043(pi)001:7433: rab tu sbyin cing thams cad gtong ba /
NK043(pi)001:7434: chags pa med par gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:7435: 'di ltar dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /
NK043(pi)001:7436: bkren cing sdug phongs rnams la tha na rang gi
NK043(pi)001:7437: sha'i bar du des ma byin pa dang yongs su
NK043(pi)001:7438: ma btang ba gang yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:7439: der slong ba dag 'ongs na de la byams pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7440: sems bzhag ste nam mkha' la bltas nas ci slong
NK043(pi)001:7441: ba de nam mkha' las 'ong na snyam pa'i sems
NK043(pi)001:7442: bskyed pa'i mod la de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur te
NK043(pi)001:7443: / don de sus kyang mi shes so //
NK043(pi)001:7444: de ltar yo byad dag gis slong ba thams cad
NK043(pi)001:7445: kyi bsam pa yid bzhin rdzogs par byas nas phyir
NK043(pi)001:7446: 'dong ngo // de'i grags pas 'dzam gling dang /
NK043(pi)001:7447: 'og tu klu'i 'jig rten nas steng du tshangs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7448: 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab cing snyan pa'i sgra
NK043(pi)001:7449: grags so // de nas phyis gzhon nu bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7450: stobs phu bo bzhi dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal
NK043(pi)001:7452: de'i lam du yi dwags mchu khab tsam la lto ba ri rab tsam pa /
NK043(pi)001:7453: keng rus bsgreng ba 'dra zhing lus shin tu 'bar
NK043(pi)001:7454: ba thal mo sbyar ba stong phrag du ma dag
NK043(pi)001:7455: gis yongs su bskor ba mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:7456: bsod nams stobs ma gtogs pa gzhan sus kyang de ma mthong la /
NK043(pi)001:7457: yi dwags de dag gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7458: gzhon nu khyod bsod nams kyi stobs kyis che bar grags pa snying rje chen po yin na /
NK043(pi)001:7459: bdag cag bkres skom gyis nyam thag pa la zas skom stsol cig /
NK043(pi)001:7460: bdag cag ser sna'i dbang du gyur pas yi dwags
NK043(pi)001:7461: su skyes pas lo brgya phrag du mar chu yang
NK043(pi)001:7462: mi rnyed na kha zas lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:7463: de skad ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7464: gzhon nus de dag la snying rjes nam mkha' la bltas te lha'i bza' btung dag 'ongs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7465: yi dwags de dag gi sngon las kyi nyes pas
NK043(pi)001:7466: ma mthong nas bdag cag tshim par cis mi byed
NK043(pi)001:7467: ces zer to // gzhon nus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7468: lha'i bza' btung 'di dag byin na ci nyes te mi za /
NK043(pi)001:7469: yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7470: bdag cag sngon gyi nyes pas lha'i bza' btung de dag mi mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7472: kye ma ser sna'i rnam par g.yo ba snyam du
NK043(pi)001:7473: bsams te de dag la byams pa'i sems kyis khyab
NK043(pi)001:7474: par byas nas / ji ste bdag la bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7475: kyi mthu yod na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
NK043(pi)001:7476: des yi dwags 'di dag gis lha'i bza' btung 'di
NK043(pi)001:7477: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing
NK043(pi)001:7478: za ba'i mthu yod par gyur cig ces brjod ma
NK043(pi)001:7479: thag tu zas de dag mthong zhing kha yang tha
NK043(pi)001:7480: mal du gyur nas de dag tshim par byas so
NK043(pi)001:7481: par byas nas / // de dag mang du zos
NK043(pi)001:7482: pas gsus pa brdol zhing bsod nams stobs la dga'
NK043(pi)001:7483: bzhin shi ste dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes
NK043(pi)001:7484: nas bsod nams stobs la gzhon nu khyod kyis bdag
NK043(pi)001:7485: cag lha'i ris su bkod kyis mchog tu dga' ba
NK043(pi)001:7486: par byas nas / // skyed cig / da ni
NK043(pi)001:7487: khyod nyid la brten te sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing
NK043(pi)001:7488: bsod nams dag bya'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:7489: de la gzhon nu mchog tu dga' ste legs so zhes smras te skyed mos tshal du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7490: skyed tshal der 'dug nas mi rnams kyi nyams su
NK043(pi)001:7491: dben pa gang yin zhes gtam 'di lta bu gleng
NK043(pi)001:7493: de nas gzugs dang ldan pa na re /
NK043(pi)001:7494: 'di la brtag tu ci yod 'di ni 'jig rten na rtogs pa kho na ste /
NK043(pi)001:7495: 'di ltar byad gzugs bzang ba ni mi rnams kyi nyams su dben pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:7497: byad gzugs dang ldan pa mthong na sngon ma mthong
NK043(pi)001:7498: ba'i skye bo mang po yang mchog tu dga' zhing
NK043(pi)001:7499: mi dga' ba rnams kyang slar dga' bar 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:7500: // sngon gyi drang srong dag gis kyang byad gzugs
NK043(pi)001:7501: bzang po 'di ni rnyed pa rnams kyi phyed do
NK043(pi)001:7504: yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong
NK043(pi)001:7505: ba'i mod la mi rnams dga' ste dam chos bzhin
NK043(pi)001:7506: du snying nas bkur bar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:7507: de nas de thos nas brtson 'grus can gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7508: gzugs dag gis ci byar yod de /
NK043(pi)001:7509: brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dben pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:7511: byad gzugs dang ldan yang brtson 'grus med pa ni
NK043(pi)001:7512: tshe 'adi'am phyi mar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ci yang
NK043(pi)001:7513: mi snang ste / byad gzugs mi rnams kyi nyams
NK043(pi)001:7514: su dben zhes pa 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo
NK043(pi)001:7515: rmongs par byed par zad do //
NK043(pi)001:7516: brtson 'grus kyis tshe 'dir yang zhing las dang /
NK043(pi)001:7518: zhabs 'bring byed pa rnams kyis 'tsho ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7519: mi gong ma dag gis bstan bcos shes pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7520: bsam gtan pa rnams kyis bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:7521: thob pa sogs tshe 'di'i 'dod pa'i 'bras bu dang
NK043(pi)001:7523: longs spyod chen po dang thar pa thob pa sogs phyi ma'i 'bras bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:7525: yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi dang /
NK043(pi)001:7526: gnod pa rnams bzlog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7527: brtson 'grus can la ni sgrub dka' ba ci yang med do zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:7528: bzo dang ldan pas bgad de smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7529: khyod kyis bden zhing mang ba sna tshogs smra mod kyi nga'i sems ni ma magu'o //
NK043(pi)001:7531: bzo dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bu ci yang 'grub par ma mthong gi /
NK043(pi)001:7532: bzo dang ldan na 'bras bu yod par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:7533: de bas bzo dang ldan pa mi rnams kyi nyams su dben pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:7534: bzo bo ni rigs dma' bar gyur kyang rgyal po sogs kyis bkur ro //
NK043(pi)001:7535: sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bzo can lha dang mi
NK043(pi)001:7536: rnams kyis legs par bkur ro zhes smras pa la
NK043(pi)001:7537: / shes rab can gyis yud tsam bgad de smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7538: shes rab tsam du mi rnams kyi byad gzugs dang /
NK043(pi)001:7540: bzo yang nyams su dben pa ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:7542: shes rab kyis ni gzugs dang bzo //
NK043(pi)001:7544: mi rnams legs dang bde ba'i cha //
NK043(pi)001:7545: shes rab kyis ni thams cad thob //
NK043(pi)001:7547: gzhon nu bsod nams stobs bzhin 'dzum dmul nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7548: ji ltar shes rab dang bral ba'i gzugs dang bzo
NK043(pi)001:7549: dang brtson 'grus thams cad ni nyams su dben pa
NK043(pi)001:7550: ma yin la / shes rab kyis yongs su zin
NK043(pi)001:7551: pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas shing nyams su dben
NK043(pi)001:7553: shes rab de yang bsod nams med par 'thob mi nus te /
NK043(pi)001:7554: de bas na bsod nams 'ba' zhig mi rnams kyi nyams su dben pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:7555: bsod nams zhes bya ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:7556: gcig tu sdug pa'i 'bras bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:7557: phongs pa dang dga' ba dang yid du 'ong zhing
NK043(pi)001:7558: 'thad pa'i 'bras bu rnams kyi gtso bo yin te
NK043(pi)001:7559: / yon tan ma lus pa brjod mi nus kyi /
NK043(pi)001:7560: khyod khong du chud pa'i phyir phyogs tsam brjod par byas na /
NK043(pi)001:7561: bsod nams dag gis byad gzugs thob //
NK043(pi)001:7562: bsod nams kyis ni tshul khrims ldan //
NK043(pi)001:7563: bsod nams dag gis dpal thob cing //
NK043(pi)001:7564: de bzhin longs spyod can du 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7565: bsod nams dag gis shes rab 'thob //
NK043(pi)001:7566: ces sogs kyi basngagasa pa brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:7567: 'on kyang rang rang gi phyogs bzung ste gzhan khas mi len to //
NK043(pi)001:7568: de nas bsod nams stobs kyis /
NK043(pi)001:7569: kye bdag cag myur bar gzhan gyi yul du dong ste /
NK043(pi)001:7570: cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod na /
NK043(pi)001:7575: bsod nams su gang dben pa shes par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:7576: de nas gzhon nu de dag gis de ltar bya'o
NK043(pi)001:7577: zhes yab la ma gsol bar tsham tshom med par
NK043(pi)001:7578: shin tu ring ba'i rgyal khams gzhan dang yul gzhan
NK043(pi)001:7579: du dod nas rgyal po'i pho brang dang 'khor gzhan
NK043(pi)001:7580: du zhugs te cha lugs mi mngon par 'khod pa
NK043(pi)001:7581: na / gzugs dang ldan pa ni mthong na yid
NK043(pi)001:7582: du 'ong bas bsdus pa'i skye bo dag gis bshugs
NK043(pi)001:7584: brtson 'grus can gyis chu klung shugs drag mgyogs shing
NK043(pi)001:7585: zab pa mthong na 'jigs pas tsan dan gyi shing
NK043(pi)001:7586: chen po khyer ba gzhan gyis blang mi nus pa
NK043(pi)001:7587: de brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen pos drangs nas de
NK043(pi)001:7589: bzo dang ldan pa yang bzo byas pa las byung ba'i yo byad kyis 'atsho'o //
NK043(pi)001:7590: shes rab can gyis tshong dpon gnyis 'khon byung nas
NK043(pi)001:7591: yun ring song ba shes rab kyis bsdums te de
NK043(pi)001:7592: gnyis mgu bas nor byin pa tsam gyis 'atsho'o //
NK043(pi)001:7593: gzhon nu bsod nams stobs ni rang gi bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7594: byas pa'i che ba bsgrags pa'i phyir mi shin tu
NK043(pi)001:7595: dbul po zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas /
NK043(pi)001:7596: de gang nyin par khyim der zhugs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7597: de'i bsod nams kyi mthus khyim der 'byor pa chen
NK043(pi)001:7598: po byung nas nor dang 'bru dang gser dngul mang
NK043(pi)001:7599: pos gang ngo // mi dbul po de mchog tu
NK043(pi)001:7600: dga' nas sngon ma byung ba'i 'byor pa 'di ni
NK043(pi)001:7601: mi 'di bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa'i mathu'o snyam
NK043(pi)001:7602: pos gang ngo // du sems so // longs spyod
NK043(pi)001:7603: de dag dbul po der ci bde bar spyod du
NK043(pi)001:7604: bcug ste phyug por gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7605: dbul po des kyang gzhon nu de la bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7606: kyis che bar grags pa 'di la bkur sti bya
NK043(pi)001:7607: bar rigs so snyam du rgyun mi 'chad par bkur
NK043(pi)001:7608: sti byas so // de nas dbul po de'i khyim
NK043(pi)001:7609: du sngar med pa'i gzhon nu zhig 'ongs bas khyim
NK043(pi)001:7610: der dpal byung ngo zhes grags pas skye bo mang
NK043(pi)001:7611: po dag bsod nams stobs la dga' zhing bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7612: kyi mthu la ched du brjod pa brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:7613: ljongs der yang gzhon nu'i mthus me 'bras kyi shing
NK043(pi)001:7614: rgyas shing dus su char 'bebs pas 'bru rnams phun
NK043(pi)001:7616: skye bo mang po dag dga' zhing ltad mo lta
NK043(pi)001:7617: bar gyur pa na gzhon nu des bdag la khyim
NK043(pi)001:7618: rin po che thams cad kyis gang zhing 'tshog chas
NK043(pi)001:7619: sna tshogs dang ldan la bran dang las byed yid
NK043(pi)001:7620: du 'ong ba zhig byung na snyam pa'i mod la
NK043(pi)001:7621: de bzhin du glo bur du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7622: de mthong nas skye bo mang po dag mchog tu
NK043(pi)001:7623: ngo mtshar zhing bsod nams la gces su 'dzin pa
NK043(pi)001:7624: dang / bsod nams stobs la bkur sti chen po byas so //
NK043(pi)001:7625: bsod nams stobs kyis kyang de dag dga' bar shes
NK043(pi)001:7626: nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag gis ci rigs
NK043(pi)001:7627: par bsdus so // dus zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:7630: gnod pa byas pa'i mi zhig gshed ma dag gis yan lag bcad de /
NK043(pi)001:7631: lus la sha khrag zag pa dang kha skam pa
NK043(pi)001:7632: des gzhon nu jo jo bdag la skyobs shig zer
NK043(pi)001:7633: ba la / snying rje'i sems bskyed de /
NK043(pi)001:7634: rang gi lus las khrag gtar ba de la blud nas kha skam pa zhi bar byas /
NK043(pi)001:7635: rang gi rkang lag bcad de mi de'i rkang lag gi gnas su sbyar zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7637: sems can thams cad la byams pas sems bskyed nas
NK043(pi)001:7638: bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag skyes tshun chad mi
NK043(pi)001:7639: dge ba'i las ci yang byas pa mi dran pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7640: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mi 'di la
NK043(pi)001:7641: bdag gi rkang lag 'di gnas su 'byor bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:7642: cig / sngon gyis lus ci lta ba de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:7643: du gyur cig ces bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas
NK043(pi)001:7644: cig / pa'i mod la / mi de sngon bzhin
NK043(pi)001:7645: du gyur pas gzhon nu dga' ste da ge ba
NK043(pi)001:7646: des byang chub thob pa'i smon lam kyang btab bo
NK043(pi)001:7647: cig / pa'i mod la / // de'i tshe sa
NK043(pi)001:7648: g.yos pa des brgya byin gyi pho brang 'gul ba
NK043(pi)001:7649: cig / pa'i mod la / // na / de'i
NK043(pi)001:7650: rgyu brtags te brgya byin bram ze'i cha lugs kyis
NK043(pi)001:7651: bsod nams stobs kyi thad du 'ongs nas /
NK043(pi)001:7652: bsod nams stobs khyod kyis bdag nyid kyi rkang lag
NK043(pi)001:7653: med par byas te gzhag pa 'di ci'i phyir zhes
NK043(pi)001:7654: smras so // gzhon nus de ngo ma shes te ci ltar gyur par rgyas par bsnyad nas /
NK043(pi)001:7655: grogs po bdag ni gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal lo //
NK043(pi)001:7656: bdag ni gzhan bde bas bde ste /
NK043(pi)001:7657: de phyir mi de sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nyam
NK043(pi)001:7658: thag pa mthong nas sdug bsngal de rang gi nyams
NK043(pi)001:7660: rang gi rkang lag btang zhing bden pa bskul bas mi de sngon bzhin du bzhag go //
NK043(pi)001:7661: de nas brgya byin mchog tu ya mtshan par gyur
NK043(pi)001:7662: nas rang gi lus su bstan te khyod yan lag
NK043(pi)001:7663: dang nyid lag gtong ba na sems 'gyod par ma
NK043(pi)001:7664: gyur grang / gzhon nus smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7665: koo shi ka bdag ni 'gyod pa med do //
NK043(pi)001:7669: koo shi ka 'o na bden pa'i byin rlabs bya'o
NK043(pi)001:7670: zhes sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bzhag
NK043(pi)001:7671: ste / rang gi yan lag dang nyid lag gcod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7672: ci ste bdag 'gyod par ma gyur na bden pa
NK043(pi)001:7673: des bdag gi lus snga ma kho bzhin du gyur
NK043(pi)001:7674: cig ces smras ma thag tu bdag nyid chen po
NK043(pi)001:7675: de'i lus sngon bzhin gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7676: nam mkha' las me tog gi char bab cing lha'i rol mo bsgrags so //
NK043(pi)001:7677: brgya byin dad nas khyod 'bad pa 'dis ci zhig bsgrub ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7678: gzhon nus bdag sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
NK043(pi)001:7679: bsgral ba'i bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod do
NK043(pi)001:7681: brgya byin gyis legs so zhes basngagasa nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7682: de nas gzhon nu rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7683: phyis yul de'i rgyal po bu med par tshe dus byas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7684: btsun mo'i 'khor dang blon po dang grong khyer gyi
NK043(pi)001:7685: mi rnams 'dus nas bdag cag gi rgyal por su
NK043(pi)001:7686: zhig dbang bskur bya bar bya zhes bgros pa na
NK043(pi)001:7688: su bsod nams kyis dbang che bar grags pa de
NK043(pi)001:7689: rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes zer ba ltar
NK043(pi)001:7691: de ltar rgyal por 'os pa'i sems can tshol ba na /
NK043(pi)001:7692: rgyal bu bsod nams stobs kyang rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi las kyis bskul nas /
NK043(pi)001:7693: de'i tshe ston grogs dag dang lhan cig phyi rol gyi skyed mos tshal du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7694: song nas kyang de la bkra shis pa'i ltas rnams byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:7695: nam mkha' las chu'i rgyun mgor babs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7696: bya kha dog sna tshogs g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7697: khye'u dang bu mo dag rgyal po'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7698: sems spro ba dang yid bde bas gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7699: de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad zing zhes byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:7700: sa gzhi yang rdo dang gseg ma gyo mo med par gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7701: de'i lus shin tu yang ba dang dga' zhing yid dang 'thad pa'i sgra yang thos pas /
NK043(pi)001:7702: de ltas kyi dpyad la mkhas pas 'di ltar ltas
NK043(pi)001:7703: rnams byung bas deng bdag gdon mi za bar rgyal
NK043(pi)001:7704: po chen por dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du
NK043(pi)001:7705: bsams so // de nas de mthar gyis skyed mos
NK043(pi)001:7706: tshal gyi nang du song ste bde ba nyams su
NK043(pi)001:7707: myong nas shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin tu
NK043(pi)001:7708: rgyas pa zhig gi drung du nyal te gnyid kyis
NK043(pi)001:7709: bsams so // log go // de'i grogs po dag
NK043(pi)001:7710: me tog dang 'bras bu la sems g.yengs nas skyed
NK043(pi)001:7711: tshal de phan tshun kun tu 'khyams pa la zhugs
NK043(pi)001:7712: bsams so // log go // so // de'i skabs
NK043(pi)001:7713: su gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi bsod nams kyi
NK043(pi)001:7714: mthus klu rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma chen po mchog tu
NK043(pi)001:7715: yid du 'ong zhing kha dog dang dri dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:7716: pa 'dab ma stong pa shin tu dga' bar byed
NK043(pi)001:7717: pa zhig sa brtol te 'thon par byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:7718: pad+ma de la gzhon nu de mthar gyis dal bus
NK043(pi)001:7719: btegs te bzhag nas ci nas mi sad pa de
NK043(pi)001:7721: de nas nyi ma gung yol nas zan za ba'i
NK043(pi)001:7722: dus las 'das te shing gzhan dag gi grib ma
NK043(pi)001:7723: shar phyogs su gzhol zhing 'bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:7724: shing mya ngan 'tshang de'i grib mas ni gzhon nu bsod nams stobs de'i lus mi gtong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:7725: skyed tshal de'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing thams
NK043(pi)001:7726: cad kyang shing mya ngan 'tshang de phyogs su 'dud
NK043(pi)001:7727: par gyur / ri dwags dang bya mthong na yid
NK043(pi)001:7728: du 'ong zhing bkra shis par byed pa rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:7729: spyod lam zhi ba'i tshul gyis kun nas bskor te
NK043(pi)001:7730: par gyur / 'khod do // gzhon nu bsod nams stobs gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du /
NK043(pi)001:7731: bdag nyid mi gtsang ba'i phung po'i steng na 'dug pa dang bdag mi gtsang bas yog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7732: bdag gis nam mkha' la lces bldag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7734: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pa dang skye bo phal mo ches bdag la phyag 'tshal ba yang rmis so //
NK043(pi)001:7735: de'i skabs su grong khyer gyi mi dang blon po
NK043(pi)001:7736: yul mi de dag gis chol ba'i mi bkye ba
NK043(pi)001:7737: de rnams gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag kun tu 'khor
NK043(pi)001:7739: der gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyi lha'i 'byor pa
NK043(pi)001:7740: de lta bu mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes
NK043(pi)001:7741: te / 'di ni bsod nams kyi che bar grags
NK043(pi)001:7742: pa zhig go snyam du rigs nas rings par de
NK043(pi)001:7743: dag rgyal po 'tshol ba'i mi de thams cad la
NK043(pi)001:7745: der gzhon nu bsod nams stobs sad nas de rmi
NK043(pi)001:7746: ltas kyi dpyad pa la mkhas pas rmi lam de
NK043(pi)001:7748: mi gtsang ba'i steng na 'dug pa bdag rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:7749: chen po'i bdag po la gnas pa'i snga ltas dang
NK043(pi)001:7750: / mi gtsang bas bdag nyid yog par rmis pa
NK043(pi)001:7751: ni rgyal srid kyi 'byor pa chen po thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:7752: / snga ltas so // nam mkha' lces bldag pa dang pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:7753: rgyal po'i mngal dbang chen pos seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i snga ltas so //
NK043(pi)001:7754: ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pa ni thams cad kyi steng na 'dug pa'i snga ltas so //
NK043(pi)001:7755: skye bo mang pos phyag 'tshal ba ni skye bo
NK043(pi)001:7756: phal po ches bdag la bkur sti byed pa de'i
NK043(pi)001:7757: snga ltas yin te 'di ltar rmi lam rmis pa
NK043(pi)001:7758: dang / ltas mthong ba la dpag na nges par de nyid du rgyal por 'gyur ro snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:7759: de nas rgyal po 'tshol ba la 'ongs pa'i mi
NK043(pi)001:7760: rnams kyis yul gyi mi rnams la sbran nas thams
NK043(pi)001:7761: cad 'dus pas / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba'i
NK043(pi)001:7762: yo byad de khyer te skyed mos tshal der lhags
NK043(pi)001:7763: pa na lha'i 'byor pa de dag mthong nas ya
NK043(pi)001:7765: gzhon nu bsod nams stobs kyang de dag mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:7766: lha'i pad+ma chen po de la skyil mo krung bcas
NK043(pi)001:7767: te 'dug go // de nas de'i bsod nams kyis
NK043(pi)001:7768: bskul nas rgyal po bzhis chen po la 'os pa
NK043(pi)001:7770: brgya byin gyis gdugs dkar po dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can 'bul lo //
NK043(pi)001:7771: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i bla
NK043(pi)001:7772: re rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'grems
NK043(pi)001:7773: so // rlung gtong ba dang bar snang la gnas
NK043(pi)001:7774: pa'i lha rnams ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:7775: so // char 'bebs so // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
NK043(pi)001:7776: kyi lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che'i char 'bebs
NK043(pi)001:7777: shing lha'i rol mo'i sgra rnams kyang sgrogs so //
NK043(pi)001:7780: skyed tshal dang nags tshal du bcas pa de dag
NK043(pi)001:7781: thams cad kyang rdoo dang gseg ma dang gyo mo
NK043(pi)001:7782: med par byas te bzhag go rgyal mtshan dang ba
NK043(pi)001:7783: dan ni bsgrengs / dar gyi lnga ldi'i chun po ni kun tu bris /
NK043(pi)001:7784: dri zhim po'i bdug pa'i snod ni btags /
NK043(pi)001:7785: me tog sna tshogs ni gtor te lha'i gnas 'dra zhing /
NK043(pi)001:7786: lha'i bu las sna tshogs can gyis gzhon nu bsod nams stobs la longs spyod pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:7787: brgya byin gyi bkas skyed mos tshal der lha'i khang
NK043(pi)001:7788: brtsegs rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa rnam
NK043(pi)001:7789: pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig sprul lo //
NK043(pi)001:7790: de nas mi de rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:7791: gus par bsgrims pas tsham tshom med par gzhon nu
NK043(pi)001:7792: bsod nams stobs lha'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs su
NK043(pi)001:7793: gsol nas bkur sti chen pos rgyal srid kyi 'byor
NK043(pi)001:7795: dbang bskur ma thag tu gzhon nu de'i lus las
NK043(pi)001:7796: snang ba gang gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od
NK043(pi)001:7797: med par byas te thad dkar dpag tshad gcig khor
NK043(pi)001:7798: yug tu khyab pa de lta bu'i 'od byung bar
NK043(pi)001:7799: gyur pas de ming sngar las 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7800: rgyal po snang byed ces bya bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7801: der la las ni rgyal po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar shes so //
NK043(pi)001:7802: la las ni rgyal po snang byed ces bya bar shes so //
NK043(pi)001:7803: de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs lha dang mi'i
NK043(pi)001:7804: 'byor ba de dag dang bcas te rgyal po'i pho
NK043(pi)001:7806: brgya byin sogs lha rnams kyis kyang rgyal po de
NK043(pi)001:7807: la yang dag par rim gro byas nas dong ngo
NK043(pi)001:7808: // rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyang rgyal po'i pho brang de na rgyal srid byed de /
NK043(pi)001:7809: yul de thams cad du 'byor pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7813: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7814: rtsod pa dang 'thab pa zhi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7816: chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7817: 'bras s+aa lu dang bu ram shing dang /
NK043(pi)001:7818: ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste /
NK043(pi)001:7819: yul thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin rgyal srid bskyangs so //
NK043(pi)001:7820: de'i tshe me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni
NK043(pi)001:7821: rgyas shing lha yang dus su char 'bebs bas 'bru
NK043(pi)001:7822: rnams shin tu legs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7823: de nas re zhig na gtam de phu bo rnams kyi thos pas ya mtshan du gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7825: bsod nams stobs kyis ni 'di ltar dam bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:7826: dang dbang phyug thob pa'i rgyu de gnyis kyis bdag
NK043(pi)001:7828: de bsod nams chen pos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:7829: bdag cag des ma rmas pa'i snga rol du bdag
NK043(pi)001:7830: cag thams cad dong ste yang dag par mnyes par
NK043(pi)001:7831: bya'o zhes byas te der song nas /
NK043(pi)001:7832: rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:7833: sku tshe ring bar shog cig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
NK043(pi)001:7835: khyod kyis dam bcas pa ni brtan lags so //
NK043(pi)001:7836: 'di ltar khyod kyis dam bcas pa dang dbang phyug gis bdag cag pham par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:7837: bsod nams dag gis khyod rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por bcug pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:7838: de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs gus pa dang
NK043(pi)001:7839: bcas pas la gor du seng ge'i khri las langs
NK043(pi)001:7840: te / phu bo de dag la bsti stang legs
NK043(pi)001:7841: par byas nas che ba la 'os pa'i khri la
NK043(pi)001:7842: 'dug tu bcug cing de dag gis kyang dad pa
NK043(pi)001:7843: phul te phyir seng ge'i khri la 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:7844: 'dug nas phu bo de dag la sngon byung ba'i
NK043(pi)001:7845: gtam gyis yang dag par glod pa nges par byed
NK043(pi)001:7846: pa'i phyir mgu bar byas te /
NK043(pi)001:7847: bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas nas longs spyod chen po dag gi bgo skal byin no //
NK043(pi)001:7848: de nas phyi zhig na phu bo de dag dang /
NK043(pi)001:7849: skye bo mang po dag bsod nams la gzud par
NK043(pi)001:7850: 'dod nas 'khor 'dus pa rnams la 'di skad ces
NK043(pi)001:7851: smras so // bsod nams min pas mi bzad pa'i //
NK043(pi)001:7852: sdug bsngal kun rgyas dmyal bar 'gro //
NK043(pi)001:7853: bsod nams min pas brlag pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:7855: bsod nams min pas bkres skom gyis //
NK043(pi)001:7856: shin tu gzir ba'i yi dwags 'gro /
NK043(pi)001:7857: bsod nams min pas rtag tu ni //
NK043(pi)001:7858: shin tu sdug bsngal bran du 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7859: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas //
NK043(pi)001:7860: bsod nams ma yin pas 'on long lkugs pa //
NK043(pi)001:7863: mdangs dang gzi byin med pa /
NK043(pi)001:7864: mig sogs dbang po med pa /
NK043(pi)001:7883: sems med pa yang dgra ru 'gyur ba /
NK043(pi)001:7884: yi dwags lto 'phyi srin po sogs kyis gnod pa /
NK043(pi)001:7885: phan pa'i sman kyang gnod par 'gyur ba /
NK043(pi)001:7889: longs spyod dag rgyal po dang /
NK043(pi)001:7890: me dang chom rkun sogs kyis rtag tu chud za ba /
NK043(pi)001:7891: longs spyod kyi phyir gla'am yang na 'tshong byed kyang longs spyod chud za la nor mi 'byung ba /
NK043(pi)001:7892: don ci brtsams kyang chud za zhing mi 'grub pa /
NK043(pi)001:7893: rtag tu 'jigs pa dang bcas shing sa yang sdong dum dang tsher mas gang bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:7894: gang dag ci yang 'jig rten na //
NK043(pi)001:7895: mi dga' mi sdug mi phan gang //
NK043(pi)001:7896: de bzhin log par lhung ba kun //
NK043(pi)001:7897: 'di kun bsod nams min las byung //
NK043(pi)001:7898: bsod nams kyis ni bsrung bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7899: bsod nams dag gis brtson par 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7900: bsod nams kyis ni tsha grang skyob //
NK043(pi)001:7901: log 'bab char bzlog bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7903: yid bzhin nor bzang bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7904: bsod nams dag gis dpag bsam shing //
NK043(pi)001:7906: bsod nams dag gis bsod pha thob //
NK043(pi)001:7907: bsod nams kyis ni yid 'ong dpal //
NK043(pi)001:7908: bsod nams dag gis yid brtan 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7909: bsod nams can ni rigs mthor skye //
NK043(pi)001:7910: bsod nams dag gis grags pa 'thob //
NK043(pi)001:7911: bsod nams kyis ni mang thos 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7912: rgya che yid 'ong bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7913: bsod nams dag gis thos pa 'dzin //
NK043(pi)001:7914: nad med 'gyur ba bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7915: bsod nams kyis ni 'chi bdag bcom //
NK043(pi)001:7918: gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyang //
NK043(pi)001:7919: lha yi bde ster bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7920: sum cu gsum pa bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7921: de bzhin bsod nams 'thab bral lha //
NK043(pi)001:7922: dga' ldan lha rab bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7923: 'phrul dga' dag kyang de bzhin te //
NK043(pi)001:7924: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bsod nams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:7925: dbang byed lha yang de bzhin 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7926: bsod nams de bzhin tshangs pa che //
NK043(pi)001:7927: lha rnams bye ba dag gis rjer //
NK043(pi)001:7928: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi //
NK043(pi)001:7929: dbang byed pa yi mnga' bdag 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7930: bsod nams dag gis 'dod dgu yi //
NK043(pi)001:7931: phun sum tshogs dgu rtag tu gnas //
NK043(pi)001:7932: sems med pa yi dngos po yang //
NK043(pi)001:7933: bsod nams dag gis dbang du 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:7934: de ltar tshe 'di dang phyi ma yang dag par
NK043(pi)001:7935: ston pa yid 'phrog pa'i tshig de skad brjod pa
NK043(pi)001:7936: na skye bo phal po che de dag bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:7937: la brten par byed par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:7938: de nas rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis sems can
NK043(pi)001:7939: de dag pas bsod nams la gces su 'dzin pa
NK043(pi)001:7940: bskyed pa'i phyir / nam mkha' la bltas te sems bskyed nas tshig tu smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:7941: bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'di'i phyi nang
NK043(pi)001:7942: kun tu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dang
NK043(pi)001:7943: gos kyi char babs na ci ma rung zhes smras
