NK043(pi)001:7944: ma thag tu lha'i gos che ba la 'os pa
NK043(pi)001:7945: sna tshogs dang / lha'i me tog yid du 'ong
NK043(pi)001:7946: ba'i char babs pa'i rjes la lha'i rin po che
NK043(pi)001:7947: sna tshogs kyi char babs pas thams cad du khebs
NK043(pi)001:7949: de mthong nas skye bo mang po de dag bsod
NK043(pi)001:7950: nams la gces su 'dzin cing ya mtshan pas ched
NK043(pi)001:7952: gtam de dag nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis
NK043(pi)001:7953: thos te bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad 'dus
NK043(pi)001:7954: te dpung gi tshogs bzhi dang bcas pas 'ongs nas
NK043(pi)001:7955: khyod ni bsod nams kyi dbang che ba ste khyod
NK043(pi)001:7956: rgyal po mdzod la bdag cag zhabs 'bring 'tshal lo
NK043(pi)001:7957: // rgyal pos kyang de rnams la chen po la
NK043(pi)001:7958: 'os pa'i rin po che ci 'dod pas 'tshings par
NK043(pi)001:7959: byas nas 'khor dang bcas pa dge ba bcu'i lam
NK043(pi)001:7960: la bkod de rang gi yul du bakye'o //
NK043(pi)001:7961: de nas gtam de rim gyis rgyal po gsal stobs
NK043(pi)001:7962: kyis thos nas thog mar pho nya btang zhing myur
NK043(pi)001:7963: bar dpung chen po dang bcas nas bsod nams stobs
NK043(pi)001:7964: kyi drung du 'ongs shing snying bu la gdungs pas
NK043(pi)001:7965: brgyal te mchi mas gang bzhin glang po che'i rgyab
NK043(pi)001:7966: nas bab ste bu'i mgul du 'khyud nas yun ring
NK043(pi)001:7968: bu gzhon nu da ci zer ba shes par gyis
NK043(pi)001:7969: shig nga rgas shing 'khogs pas rgyal srid kyi 'khur
NK043(pi)001:7971: khyod rgyal srid kyi khur longs shig ces smras nas /
NK043(pi)001:7972: rang gi mgo las dar thod dang cod pan dpung brgyan phud de byin no //
NK043(pi)001:7973: de nas rim gyis rgyal po bsod nams stobs 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:7974: bu'i gling thams cad du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
NK043(pi)001:7975: la dbang byed par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:7976: des 'dzam gling na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po
NK043(pi)001:7977: thams cad ci 'dod par gser dngul gyis 'tshengs bar
NK043(pi)001:7978: byas nas dge ba bcu la bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:7979: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na su yang dbul po'am nad pa med do //
NK043(pi)001:7980: 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad bde zhing nad med la stobs dang ldan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7981: dbang po rnams rgyas shing phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ste /
NK043(pi)001:7982: gser dngul dang bang mdzod 'tshog chas bdogs pa mang zhing 'byor pa rgyas pa lo legs pa /
NK043(pi)001:7984: choms rkun dang mu ge med pa /
NK043(pi)001:7985: rdoo dang gseg ma sogs med cing /
NK043(pi)001:7986: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rgyas pa char dus
NK043(pi)001:7987: su 'beb cing zas dang ba lang dang ma he
NK043(pi)001:7988: dang ldan pa / thams cad bde ba rgyas shing bsod nams la brten pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7989: rtag tu sbyin pa byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:7990: bsnyen gnas la gnas shing tshul khrims blangs te gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:7991: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du mir gyur pa las
NK043(pi)001:7992: 'chi ba gang yang rung ba de dag lus dang
NK043(pi)001:7993: bral nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:7994: te / phal che ba ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:7995: rgyal po bsod nams stobs kyis kyang sems can dpag
NK043(pi)001:7996: tu med pa rnams tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i don
NK043(pi)001:7997: la bkod nas shi 'phos te 'khor sems can stong
NK043(pi)001:7998: phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan lha'i ris
NK043(pi)001:7999: su skyes so // de ltar bdag cag gi ston
NK043(pi)001:8000: pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod
NK043(pi)001:8001: nams stobs zhes bya bar gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8002: de dus kyi yab yum yang da lta'i zas gtsang dang sgyu ma chen mo dang /
NK043(pi)001:8003: gzhon nu gzugs ldan ni sru'i bu dge slong dga' bo dang /
NK043(pi)001:8004: brtson 'grus ldan ni dge slong gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8005: bzo dang ldan pa ni dge slong ma 'gags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8006: shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge slong sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:8007: de dus kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu yin no //
NK043(pi)001:8008: bsod nams stobs gang gi rgyal sar zhugs pa'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8009: po shi 'phos pa de ni bdud sdig can dang
NK043(pi)001:8010: / sngon gyi dbul po bsod nams stobs gang gi
NK043(pi)001:8011: khyim du zhugs pa'i mi de ni dge slong sgra
NK043(pi)001:8012: / gcan zin dang / mi rkang lag med pa
NK043(pi)001:8013: bsod nams stobs kyis sngar bzhin bzhag pa rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:8014: la sman chos gsol ba'i mi de ni koon+di nya
NK043(pi)001:8015: / gcan zin dang / 'di yin no // de
NK043(pi)001:8016: bas na rnam pa thams cad du bsod nams 'dis
NK043(pi)001:8017: ni phan par byed pas bsod nams dang mtshungs par
NK043(pi)001:8018: nyams su dben pa gzhan ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:8019: / gcan zin dang / 'di yin no // so
NK043(pi)001:8020: // der yang dge slong rnams kyis rgyal po bsod
NK043(pi)001:8021: nams stobs kyis las ci bgyis na de ltar rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8022: por gyur pa sogs bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par
NK043(pi)001:8024: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:8025: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:8026: pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig
NK043(pi)001:8027: rten du byon pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad
NK043(pi)001:8028: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung
NK043(pi)001:8029: gi mchod rten rgyal po zhig brtsigs nas /
NK043(pi)001:8030: mchod rten de'i dus ston la tshogs pa'i 'khor 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa'i nang na /
NK043(pi)001:8031: dge slong zhig gis phyed yol tsam na chos ston to //
NK043(pi)001:8032: de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor de na
NK043(pi)001:8033: rgyan po brgyal ba po zhes bya ba rgyan po
NK043(pi)001:8034: la shin tu zhen pa de la chung ma rnam
NK043(pi)001:8035: par rgyal ma zhes bya ba dang bu rnam par
NK043(pi)001:8036: rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod do //
NK043(pi)001:8037: de nas rgyan po pa des ras zung gcig gyon pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8040: pan lnga'i mgron bu rnams ma gtogs pa /
NK043(pi)001:8041: khyim dang phyi rol na ci bdog pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:8042: rgyan skugs su yal nas shin tu dbul bas sdug
NK043(pi)001:8043: bsngal mi bzad pas gdungs te /
NK043(pi)001:8044: kye hud bsod nams ma byas pas dbul ba ni
NK043(pi)001:8045: tha chad mi bzad pa'o zhes smras nas shugs ring
NK043(pi)001:8046: 'byin cing / da lhwam gnyis ni bgos /
NK043(pi)001:8047: pan lnga dang gdugs kyang khyer nas /
NK043(pi)001:8048: rgyan po'i sa nas songs te /
NK043(pi)001:8049: mthar gyis chos nyan pa'i sar song nas dga' zhing /
NK043(pi)001:8050: re zhig ji lta bu 'chad pa nyan zhes bsams nas /
NK043(pi)001:8051: gdugs dang mchil lhwam bzhag ste gus par nyan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8052: re zhig na chos smra ba des tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod de /
NK043(pi)001:8053: bsod nams bsags na bde bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:8054: de phyir mi ni bsod nams bya //
NK043(pi)001:8055: de yang yang dang yang du bya //
NK043(pi)001:8056: de nyid la ni 'dun par bya //
NK043(pi)001:8057: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad 'di thos nas //
NK043(pi)001:8058: bsod nams bsags pas bde ba de ni de bzhin te /
NK043(pi)001:8059: bdag ni 'di ltar shin tu nyam thag pa yang
NK043(pi)001:8060: bsod nams ma byas pas yin na bdag bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:8062: bdag la ci bdog pa la bsams na ras zung dang /
NK043(pi)001:8064: pan lnga'i 'gron bu lus pa las gzhan thams cad rgyan skugs su las par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:8065: ci ste pan lnga dang bla gos byin na ni ltogs te 'chil /
NK043(pi)001:8066: ma byin na ni bsod nams med par 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:8067: pha rol du 'gro zhing der yang dbul ba'i sdug
NK043(pi)001:8069: gang ltogs te mi 'chi zhing bsod nams med par yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8070: yang bsams pa ltogs te shi yang sla'i bsod nams
NK043(pi)001:8071: med par 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba ni
NK043(pi)001:8072: de lta ma yin no bsams nas /
NK043(pi)001:8073: pan lnga dang bla gos 'di nges par sbyin no bsam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8074: de snyam pa'i skabs su chos smra bas yang tshigs bcad 'di brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:8075: bsod nams dal nas byed pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:8076: sdig la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:8077: de phyir dge ba myur te bya /
NK043(pi)001:8078: sdig pa las ni sems kyang bzlog /
NK043(pi)001:8080: de thos pas bsod nams myur te bya'o zhes bshad pas la gor du sbyin pa bya'o snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:8081: seng ge'i khri la chos smra ba 'dug pa'i steng
NK043(pi)001:8082: du gdugs bzung zhing mchil lhwam gnyis rkang pa'i drung
NK043(pi)001:8083: du bzhag / pan lnga'i mgron bu de dag gis rkang pa la gtor nas /
NK043(pi)001:8084: bla gos phud de chos smra ba'i rkang pa la bkab nas /
NK043(pi)001:8085: dad cing spu zing zhes byas te /
NK043(pi)001:8086: rkang pa la btud cing dad pa drag pos smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:8087: dge rtsa dang sems bskyed pa dang chos kyi phyir
NK043(pi)001:8088: btang ba 'dis bdag tshe 'di phan chad dbul por
NK043(pi)001:8089: ma gyur cig / skye ba thams cad du bsod
NK043(pi)001:8090: nams kyis che bar grags shing lha mi rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:8091: bdag rgyal por bcug par gyur cig ci bsam ci
NK043(pi)001:8092: 'dod thams cad nam mkha' las 'grub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8093: bdag btsa' ba na yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yang go 'phyur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:8094: mi zad pa'i gter rin po che mang po can dang /
NK043(pi)001:8095: rin chen sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dag kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas pa la /
NK043(pi)001:8096: chos smra bas kyang kha ton du yongs su bsngo ba byas te 'khor thams cad dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8097: rgyan po ba der sa gcig pu gyon bzhin chos
NK043(pi)001:8098: kyi sbyin pa de la sems shing rang gi khyim
NK043(pi)001:8099: du 'ongs pa chung ma dang bus mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:8100: 'dis bla gos dang rgyan ga shed cig tu rgyan
NK043(pi)001:8101: skugs su yal bar byas so snyam du bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:8102: gnyis kyang yal bar byed pas 'dong ngo zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:8103: so // de ngo tsha nas dbul ba'i nyes pas
NK043(pi)001:8104: 'di ltar sma bab bo bsams nas tshigs su bcad
NK043(pi)001:8105: so // de smras pa / ci zhig sdug bsngal dbul ba sdug bsngal yin //
NK043(pi)001:8106: ci zhig shin tu sdug bsngal dbul de nyid //
NK043(pi)001:8107: dbul pa dag ni shi ba dang yang mtshungs //
NK043(pi)001:8108: bdag ni shi ba 'dam gyi dbul ma yin //
NK043(pi)001:8109: zhes smras te shugs ring 'byin cing cang mi zer bar 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:8110: de nas khyim de'i ra bar khron pa zhig yod
NK043(pi)001:8111: pa der chung mas chu bcu pa'i phyir bum pa
NK043(pi)001:8112: thag pas btags nas btang ste chu yar dbyung snyam
NK043(pi)001:8113: pa dang / gyen du dbyung ma nus nas /
NK043(pi)001:8114: rgyal ba po la jo bo bum pa 'degs par byed du tshur byon zhes bos so //
NK043(pi)001:8115: de gnyis kas kyang ma nus nas bu la bos
NK043(pi)001:8116: te gsum char gyis sha dang pags pa ral ba
NK043(pi)001:8117: tsam gyi 'bad pa chen pos de'u ma phyin te
NK043(pi)001:8119: der bltas pa na bum pa de'i 'og na zangs
NK043(pi)001:8120: zung lnga gser dngul gyis yongs su gang ba thogs
NK043(pi)001:8122: rgyan po pas tshe 'dir sbyin pa'i 'bras bu mthong nas dga' ba rgyas te tshigs bcad smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8123: kye ma nyes pa kun spangs pa //
NK043(pi)001:8124: yon tan ngo bo nyid kyi zhing //
NK043(pi)001:8125: da lta bdag gis sa bon btab //
NK043(pi)001:8126: da lta nyid du 'bras bu smin //
NK043(pi)001:8128: chung mas jo bo 'di ci la dgongs te gsung /
NK043(pi)001:8129: des skabs 'di rgyas par par bsnyad do //
NK043(pi)001:8130: des tshe 'dir bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yid du
NK043(pi)001:8131: 'ong ba smin pa'i rmad du byung ba mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:8133: gtam de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas rgyal po'i pho brang dang 'khor kun tu grags so //
NK043(pi)001:8134: skye bo mang po ngo mtshar du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8135: de nas rgyan po ba glo bur du phyug cing
NK043(pi)001:8136: nor mang ba'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:8137: / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba drag pos bkur sti byas so //
NK043(pi)001:8138: de nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
NK043(pi)001:8139: rten la mchod pa rgya chen po byed cing chos
NK043(pi)001:8140: kyang nyan / dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong
NK043(pi)001:8141: dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas bzang pos
NK043(pi)001:8142: kyang nyan / tshim par byed / dge sbyong dang bram ze /
NK043(pi)001:8145: slong ba gzhan dag kyang nor gyis ci 'dod par 'tshengs bar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8146: gtsug lag khang chen po yo byad thams cad kyis
NK043(pi)001:8147: gang ba byed du bcug ste phyogs bzhi'i dge slong
NK043(pi)001:8148: gi dge 'dun la phul bas de'i grags pa kun
NK043(pi)001:8149: tu rgyas nas phyis rgyal po de bu med par
NK043(pi)001:8151: blon po dang grong gi mi rnams kyis rgyan po
NK043(pi)001:8152: pa bsod nams kyi dbang che bar shes nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8153: por bcug go // de phan chad rgyan po'i ming
NK043(pi)001:8154: med par gyur nas rgyal po rgyal ba po zhes
NK043(pi)001:8156: de nas rgyal po rgyal ba po bsod nams la
NK043(pi)001:8157: yid ches pas rtag tu rgyun mi bcad par sbyin
NK043(pi)001:8158: pa sbyin zhing bsod nams brten par byed /
NK043(pi)001:8159: tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas gnas /
NK043(pi)001:8160: btsun mo dang blon po grong khyer dang yul mi
NK043(pi)001:8161: thams cad kyang bsod nams la yang dag par btsud
NK043(pi)001:8162: do // phyis rgyal po 'chi ba'i chos su gyur
NK043(pi)001:8163: nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po dbang
NK043(pi)001:8164: byed kyi bur skyes pa'i mod la /
NK043(pi)001:8165: nam mkha' las lha'i rin po che dang gos kyi
NK043(pi)001:8166: char bab pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:8167: mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8168: de ltar rgyan po pa rgyal ba po zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:8169: bas gdugs sogs chos smra ba la phul ba de'i
NK043(pi)001:8170: bsod nams kyis tshe de nyid la /
NK043(pi)001:8172: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug kyang thob bo //
NK043(pi)001:8173: las de'i rnam par smin pas lan sum cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:8174: drug gi bar du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
NK043(pi)001:8175: rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob pa dang
NK043(pi)001:8176: / de bzhin du lan so drug gi bar du 'phrul dga' ba'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:8177: lan so drug gi bar du dga' ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:8178: lan so drug gi bar du 'thab bral rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:8179: lan so drug gi bar du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /
NK043(pi)001:8180: lan sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du rgyal chen
NK043(pi)001:8181: ris bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
NK043(pi)001:8182: la dbang byed par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8183: lan brgya phrag du mar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8184: po mtha' bzhi las rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:8185: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rin po che sna bdun
NK043(pi)001:8186: dang ldan pa / dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan
NK043(pi)001:8187: lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan zhing pha rol gnon
NK043(pi)001:8188: pa'i bu stong dang ldan pa yod pa de lta
NK043(pi)001:8189: dang ldan pa / bur gyur nas / rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:8190: des sa chen po rgya mtsho'i mtha' gtugs pa 'di
NK043(pi)001:8191: nyid ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing
NK043(pi)001:8192: dang ldan pa / bur gyur nas / 'tshe ba dang / chad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8193: mtshon gyis bda' ba med par chos dang mthun zhing
NK043(pi)001:8194: snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:8195: // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
NK043(pi)001:8196: gang gis bdag nyid chen po yi //
NK043(pi)001:8198: sangs rgyas phan 'dogs de dag gis //
NK043(pi)001:8201: ngo mtshar 'di dag thos gyur na //
NK043(pi)001:8202: mkhas dang bdag po'i rigs skyes pa'ang //
NK043(pi)001:8203: su zhig dad par byed mi 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:8204: de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing //
NK043(pi)001:8206: sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas la //
NK043(pi)001:8207: dam pa'i chos ni bla mar bya //
NK043(pi)001:8209: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:8210: bu'i gling 'dir stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8211: po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba gzugs mchog tu
NK043(pi)001:8212: bzang zhing skye ba dran pa chos dang ldan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8213: rgyal po chen por gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8214: de'i mthus shing dang lo thog rnams kyang smin la char legs par 'babs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8215: rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rgyal ba'i 'od
NK043(pi)001:8216: ces bya ba mdzes shing lta na sdug pa rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8217: po'i yid du btag pa zhig yod do //
NK043(pi)001:8218: rgyal po des 'dzam gling thams cad du dpya khral
NK043(pi)001:8219: dang sho gam gru btsas med par bde bar bskyangs
NK043(pi)001:8220: shing rgyal po des rang gi sha'i bar du gang
NK043(pi)001:8221: ci slong ba thams cad la bza' btung dang /
NK043(pi)001:8222: rin po che dang gnas mal dang /
NK043(pi)001:8223: gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sogs
NK043(pi)001:8224: gang 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rgya chen po byin te
NK043(pi)001:8225: / gling 'dir gnas pa'i mi thams cad phyug cing
NK043(pi)001:8226: longs spyod che bar gyur pa de tsam du sbyin
NK043(pi)001:8227: / pa byin no // de la blon po stong
NK043(pi)001:8228: phrag bcu gnyis yod pa'i mchog ni blo gros chen
NK043(pi)001:8229: po zhes bya ba mkhas pa rgyal po la phongs
NK043(pi)001:8231: de'i tshe mi thams cad rgyal po dpal gyi sde
NK043(pi)001:8232: la dga' zhing lta bas ngoms pa med par gyur
NK043(pi)001:8233: to // rgyal po des kyang thams cad dge ba
NK043(pi)001:8234: bcu la bkod pas lus zhig pa thams cad lha'i
NK043(pi)001:8235: ris drug tu skyes nas lha'i gnas yongs su gang
NK043(pi)001:8236: to // ba na / de rgyal po de'i mthur
NK043(pi)001:8237: shes nas lha'i dbang po rab tu dga' ste basngagasa
NK043(pi)001:8238: pa brjod pa lha rnams kyis thos nas dad do
NK043(pi)001:8239: to // ba na / // de'i tshe btsun mo
NK043(pi)001:8240: rgyal ba'i 'od rang gi mig phyung nas slar skyes
NK043(pi)001:8241: pa sogs rmis pas mi dga' zhing rgyal po la
NK043(pi)001:8242: to // ba na / // zhus pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8243: btsun mo 'di slong ba zhig 'byung ngo snyam yang
NK043(pi)001:8244: to // ba na / // zhus pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8245: / sgyu ma rmi lam la sems pas ci bya
NK043(pi)001:8247: mtshan mo gnyis pa la bloon po bloo gros chen pos /
NK043(pi)001:8248: rgyal po'i khang bzang zhig nas phan tshun khyer ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:8249: slar yang so sor sbyar ba rmis nas sad do //
NK043(pi)001:8250: rgyal po'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:8251: mtshan mkhan la dris pas kyang de bzhin no zhes smras pas sems khong du chud do //
NK043(pi)001:8252: nub gsum par blon po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis /
NK043(pi)001:8253: khra yis rgyal po'i cod pan phrogs te slar byin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8254: 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad kyi mig phyung ste
NK043(pi)001:8255: slar skyes pa sogs rmi lam lnga rmis pas skrag
NK043(pi)001:8256: nas rgyal po la 'tshe ba mi 'byung ngam snyam
NK043(pi)001:8257: du mtshan mkhan la dris pa de bzhin yin no
NK043(pi)001:8258: zhes smras so // tshul des thams cad smre sngags bton pa rgyal pos thos pas /
NK043(pi)001:8259: nga'i lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur snyam du dga' bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8260: de'i byang phyogs na drang srong lnga brgya gnas pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8261: gcig cig rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs pas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8262: po dang btsun mo skyed tshal du 'jug pa mthong
NK043(pi)001:8263: ste / drang srong des btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od
NK043(pi)001:8264: de mthong pa dang tshe snga mar chung mar yang
NK043(pi)001:8265: gyur pas las kyi 'brel ba'i dbang gis de la
NK043(pi)001:8266: ste / chags so // de'i rang gi slob ma
NK043(pi)001:8267: bram ze'i khye'u gcig rig byed 'don pa rdzogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8268: yon ci tsam dbul 'dod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8269: drang srong des de la rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i
NK043(pi)001:8270: btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od bslangs te nga la byin
NK043(pi)001:8271: cig / bram ze'i khye'u des de ltar bslang dka' bas sems zhum pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8272: drang srong des rgyal po de ni thams cad gtong
NK043(pi)001:8273: ba yin pas dka' ba med do zhes smras pa
NK043(pi)001:8274: la / khye'u des gal te ma song na dmod pas dogs te /
NK043(pi)001:8275: song nas rgyal po'i mdun du smra mi phod par 'dug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8277: bram ze khyod la ci dgos pa smros dang /
NK043(pi)001:8278: ngas khyod kyi re ba rdzogs par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:8279: de nas bram ze'i khye'usa ji lta bar gyur bar bsnyad de btsun mo bslangs so //
NK043(pi)001:8280: rgyal po de yang btsun mo la brtse bas yid mi dga' zhing /
NK043(pi)001:8281: btsun mo 'di rang dang bral na srog ji ltar 'tsho /
NK043(pi)001:8282: 'khor thams cad kyang sdug bsngal drag pos gdung bar
NK043(pi)001:8283: 'gyur snyam du re zhig mi smra bar bsam ste
NK043(pi)001:8284: / bu dang chung ma sbyin mi nus par bla
NK043(pi)001:8285: med rdzogs byang mi thob po snyam du sdug pa
NK043(pi)001:8286: dang bral bas zhum pa'i sems spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:8287: seng ge'i khri las bab nas /
NK043(pi)001:8289: khyo dang bral bas mchi mas gang bzhin mun pa
NK043(pi)001:8290: chen por ltung ba lta bu'i sdug bsngal bas gdong
NK043(pi)001:8291: sa la phab pa de lag pa g.yon pas bzung
NK043(pi)001:8292: nas / lag g.yas gser gyi bum pa thogs te
NK043(pi)001:8293: bram ze'i khye'u de'i lag par chu'i rgyun blugs shing
NK043(pi)001:8294: btsun mo byin nas bla med byang chub thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8296: de'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa sogs ngo mtshar gyi ltas byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8297: de nas btsun mo de khrid nas mkhan po drang srong la byin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8298: btsun mo de nya chu las bton pa bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:8299: nyam thag cing byang chub sems dpa' dran nas zas
NK043(pi)001:8301: sa g.yos pa de rgyal bo de'i mthur shes nas lha rnams kyis basngagasa so //
NK043(pi)001:8302: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu bzhi dang thabs gcig grong khyer der lhags te /
NK043(pi)001:8303: ha cang mi ring ba'i nags su bram ze rgan
NK043(pi)001:8304: po'i cha byad lte ba man chad sog les bcad
NK043(pi)001:8305: pa bzhin du khrag 'dzag pa zhig /
NK043(pi)001:8306: lha'i bu bzhi bram ze de'i bu'i tshul gyis khri las bteg ste /
NK043(pi)001:8307: nga ros 'bod cing khrag gi dris khwa dang bya
NK043(pi)001:8308: rgod sogs rjes su 'brang bzhin du grong khyer gyi
NK043(pi)001:8310: de mthong bas thams cad kyis bram ze 'di sked
NK043(pi)001:8311: pa chad na 'di'i dbang po ma 'khrugs par ji
NK043(pi)001:8312: ltar 'tsho / 'di ni sha za mi'i cha byad can no zhes kha cig 'bros par brtsams so //
NK043(pi)001:8313: dpa' bo kha cig 'di sha za mi'i cha byad can zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:8314: 'di la tshig dris pas thon na ya mtshan no snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:8315: khyod mi'am sha za ci yin lus 'di sus bcad /
NK043(pi)001:8316: ga las 'ong zhes dris pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:8317: tshor ba drag pos nyen bzhin du //
NK043(pi)001:8318: shi bi pa khyed ma 'jigs shig /
NK043(pi)001:8319: bram ze nga yin srin po min //
NK043(pi)001:8320: sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis //
NK043(pi)001:8322: ces sogs tshigs bcad smras te /
NK043(pi)001:8323: rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang sgor song ba dang
NK043(pi)001:8324: pha rol mang po dag kyang mtshar nas de'i rjes
NK043(pi)001:8325: su 'brangs so // lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs
NK043(pi)001:8326: pa'i tshogs kyis rgyal po dpal gyi sde nyam nga
NK043(pi)001:8327: bar 'gyur ro snyam nas cho nge 'debs so //
NK043(pi)001:8328: de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shing du
NK043(pi)001:8329: bas mun par gyur la skar mda' ltung ba sogs
NK043(pi)001:8330: su gyur to // de'i tshe btsun mo rgyal ba'i
NK043(pi)001:8331: 'od khyo dang bral bas gdungs shing zas mi za
NK043(pi)001:8332: ba la drang srong des snying rje zhing slar rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8333: po dpal gyi sde la dbul bar bya'o snyam du
NK043(pi)001:8334: btsun mo de dbugs phyung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:8335: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ltar 'khrugs shing mun pas khebs pa 'dis na /
NK043(pi)001:8336: ring mi thogs par skyes bu chen po 'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes kyang smras so //
NK043(pi)001:8337: de nas bram ze lus phyed pa de rgyal pos pho brang gi steng nas mthong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:8338: bram ze des rgyal po la lus phyed bslang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8339: blon po blo gros chen pos rgyal po la 'di ni mi min zhing sha za yin te /
NK043(pi)001:8340: lus phyed bcad pa ji ltar 'tsho zhing tshig smra /
NK043(pi)001:8342: nga sha za ma yin gyi bram ze yin te /
NK043(pi)001:8343: dbul bas bu dang chung ma bzhag nas rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:8344: dpal gyi sde la nor slong ba'i bsam pas 'ong
NK043(pi)001:8345: nas nyi ma nub ste grong khyer gyi sgo bcad
NK043(pi)001:8346: pas slar bsod nams byed pa'i khang par song ste
NK043(pi)001:8348: stag 'ong nas sog le lta bu'i sos lus phyeed bcad do //
NK043(pi)001:8349: der bdag tshor ba drag pos nyen kyang mi dge
NK043(pi)001:8350: ba'i las kyis bzung nas 'chi bar ma nus pa
NK043(pi)001:8351: shin tu sdug bsngal ba na /
NK043(pi)001:8352: nam mkha'i lha mo zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi
NK043(pi)001:8353: sde'i lus phyed bslangs na nges par ster zhes thos
NK043(pi)001:8354: pas der bdag 'tsho bar re ba skyes te 'tsho
NK043(pi)001:8355: ba byung ngo // der bdag ro smad med pas
NK043(pi)001:8356: 'gro ga la nus so snyam du yi mug pa
NK043(pi)001:8357: dang stes dbang gis nyi ma shar ba na gnyen
NK043(pi)001:8359: bdag nyam nga bar mthong nas ngu'o //
NK043(pi)001:8360: bdag gis 'di rnams dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir lha mo'i tshig rgyas par smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8361: 'di rnams kyis bdag khri la bskyon te 'dir khyer ro //
NK043(pi)001:8362: zhes sogs gdong mchi mas gang bzhin tshigs bcad kyang smras so //
NK043(pi)001:8363: de nas rgyal pos bram ze la mi 'jigs par
NK043(pi)001:8364: dbugs dbyung stee lus sbyin par khas blangs nas skyes
NK043(pi)001:8365: bu zhig sog le rnon po len du mngags pa
NK043(pi)001:8366: dang / de brgya byin gyi mthus rmongs par byas te myur du khyer nas 'ong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8367: rgyal pos blon po rnams bram ze 'di ma shi
NK043(pi)001:8368: bar myur du nga'i ro smad chod la byin cig
NK043(pi)001:8369: / de thos pas thams cad skrag cing dus so //
NK043(pi)001:8370: blon po blo gros chen pos ngu bzhin bkag pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8371: bla med byang chub kyi bar chad ma byed cig
NK043(pi)001:8372: ces zlog tu ma btub pas blo gros chen po
NK043(pi)001:8374: de nas byang chub sems dpas shing mkhan gnyis la
NK043(pi)001:8375: bzhin bzang dag nga'i sbyin pa'i phar phyin rdzogs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8376: grogs bya ba'i phyir sog le 'dis nga'i lus chod
NK043(pi)001:8377: la bram ze'i re ba rdzogs par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:8378: de gnyis ngu zhing 'jug tu ma 'dod pa la /
NK043(pi)001:8379: brgya byin gyis de ltar 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so //
NK043(pi)001:8380: de nas byang chub sems dpas lus yongs su btong
NK043(pi)001:8381: bar dga' bas seng ge'i khri las bab ma thag
NK043(pi)001:8382: tu 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi gdugs dang rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8383: mtshan ba dan thams cad rgyal po'i pho brang ga
NK043(pi)001:8384: la ba der 'dud par gyur pa sogs ltas dang
NK043(pi)001:8385: dud mo'i sgra sogs byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8386: de nas rgyal po des bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:8387: skyes bu gcig gis rgyab nas brten /
NK043(pi)001:8388: rkang pa gnyis brkyangs te gan rkyal du bzhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po g.yos shing /
NK043(pi)001:8389: btsun mo bud med rnams kyis thos nas ngu zhing brang brdungs te /
NK043(pi)001:8390: rgyal po la gsol ba btab kyang /
NK043(pi)001:8391: de dag la sdug pa thams cad 'bral bas na /
NK043(pi)001:8392: dge chos la bag yod par byos zhes gdams nas
NK043(pi)001:8393: shing mkhan de gnyis la myur du chod ces smras
NK043(pi)001:8395: blo gros chen pos bzlog ste 'di ltar byams pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8396: bdag nyid chen po 'di gsod na khyed cag gnyis
NK043(pi)001:8397: lha dang klu la sogs pas sa 'dir ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:8398: bzhag / mi gti mug can khyed gnyis bdag nyid chen po 'dis bu bzhin ma bskyangs sam /
NK043(pi)001:8399: zhes kyi hud lha zhes zer zhing sog le bzung nas bzlog pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8400: byang chub sems dpas de la smras pa bu zhog mya ngan ma byed /
NK043(pi)001:8401: sdug pa thams cad 'bral ba yin pas nga'i lus slong pa la bar chad ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:8402: sngon gyi tshe nga'i lus slong ba la /
NK043(pi)001:8403: lha mo rnams kyis bar chad byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:8404: nga'i bla med byang chub thob pa'i gegs dang /
NK043(pi)001:8405: de dag gi bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:8406: lha mo rnams kyis der bar chad ma byas na
NK043(pi)001:8407: yun ring po mi thogs par bla med byang chub
NK043(pi)001:8409: sa phyogs 'dir stag mo bkres pas nyen pa la
NK043(pi)001:8410: lus btang bas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bskal
NK043(pi)001:8411: pa bzhi bcur zhugs pa phyir lus par byas so
NK043(pi)001:8412: // gzhan yang nga shi bi ba'i rgyal por gyur
NK043(pi)001:8413: te bram ze rgan po slong ba zhig la rang
NK043(pi)001:8414: gi mig gnyis ut+pala sngon po lta bu mdzes shing
NK043(pi)001:8415: dri ma med pa 'phral du sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:8416: rgyal po zla 'od du gyur pa na bram ze drag po'i mig la mgo byin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8417: shi ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na phug ron skyabs
NK043(pi)001:8418: med pa khras ded pa de bsrung ba'i phyir rang
NK043(pi)001:8419: gi sha bcad cing byin no //
NK043(pi)001:8420: gzhan yang ngas bla med rdzogs byang 'dod pas sa
NK043(pi)001:8421: phyogs 'di nyid du rkang pa dang lag pa dag
NK043(pi)001:8422: bu dang chung ma stong phrag yongs su btang ba
NK043(pi)001:8423: byas na sus kyang bar chad ma byas so //
NK043(pi)001:8424: de'i phyir khyod bar chad ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:8425: de nas blo gros chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:8426: tshul la dad pa skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:8427: chen pos bor bar 'gyur ro snyam du tshig sna
NK043(pi)001:8428: tshogs brjod do // de gnyis brgya byin gyis rmongs
NK043(pi)001:8429: par byas pas de bzhin shing mkhan de gnyis kyis
NK043(pi)001:8431: lte ba bcad pa las khrag chen po 'bab pa
NK043(pi)001:8432: mthong nas blo gros chen po sa la 'gyel to
NK043(pi)001:8433: // nam mkha'i lha rnams kyang ngu zhing mchi ma blags so //
NK043(pi)001:8434: de mthong nas mi rnams kyang shas cher sdug bsngal zhing rmongs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8435: brgya byin gyis kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po la
NK043(pi)001:8436: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyis gdungs
NK043(pi)001:8437: pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:8438: lus la tshor ba drag po'i las kun tu sbyor
NK043(pi)001:8439: ba bzang po ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:8440: da ni ji ltar srog mi 'jigs pa de ltar bya'o snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8441: de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing mkhan gnyis kyis
NK043(pi)001:8442: sog le rnon pos bcad pa'i tshor ba drag pos
NK043(pi)001:8443: gdungs pa dang / brtan pa'i stobs kyis slong ba la byams pa'i sems skyes nas bsam pa /
NK043(pi)001:8444: ngas 'khor ba'i skyon gyi rang bzhin shes nas brtson
NK043(pi)001:8445: 'grus brtan pas lus phyogs gcig bcad pas sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:8447: sems can phal cher dmyal bar skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba rnams lta ci smos snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:8448: rang gi sems la sems can thams cad kyi don
NK043(pi)001:8449: du go cha bgo ba'i dam bca' drag pos sems
NK043(pi)001:8450: can kun gyi sdug bsngal sel ba'i smon lam btab
NK043(pi)001:8451: ma thag tu / byang chub sems dpa'i lus bcad
NK043(pi)001:8452: pa'i tshor ba thams cad 'phral du rgyun chad par
NK043(pi)001:8453: ma thag tu / gyur to // de nas byang
NK043(pi)001:8454: chub sems dpas ci'i phyir nga'i lus bcad pa'i tshor
NK043(pi)001:8456: sog le bton par ma gyur tam snyam nas sog le de la bltas so //
NK043(pi)001:8457: bltas nas kyang mchog tu yid mi bde bas 'dar bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8458: brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8459: nyam chung gi nad pa bzhin du rgyal po ci'i phyir 'dar /
NK043(pi)001:8460: khyod ni thams cad ster bar sa steng kun tu
NK043(pi)001:8461: grags na 'gyod par mi rigs te khyod rdzun du
NK043(pi)001:8462: ma gyur tam / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8463: bram ze de'i phyir lus 'dar ba dang 'gyod pa ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:8464: sog le 'di nga'i lus phyed smad la tshabs cher zhugs kyang ma chod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8465: de la ngas sbyin pa mi rdzogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8466: slong ba'i re ba yongs su mi rdzogs par mi
NK043(pi)001:8467: 'gyur ram snyam du lus 'dar gyis sog les drag
NK043(pi)001:8468: tu gcod par mi 'dod pa ni ma yin no
NK043(pi)001:8469: // de thos pas brgya byin mchog tu ngo mtshar te cang mi smra'o //
NK043(pi)001:8470: brgya byin gyis rmongs par byas pa'i mi gnyis kyis
NK043(pi)001:8471: sog le rnon pos byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi
NK043(pi)001:8472: ro smad chod ma thag tu sa'i steng du bzhag
NK043(pi)001:8474: byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus bcad pa'i sdug bsngal la mi sems par /
NK043(pi)001:8475: rings par skyes bu de gnyis la 'di skad ces nga'i lus de bram ze'i lus la sbyor cig /
NK043(pi)001:8476: de gnyis kyang de bzhin du byas so //
NK043(pi)001:8477: sbyar ba tsam gyis 'byor te rma med cing mdog 'dra bar snang bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:8478: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i phyir khri las langs nas 'chag cing 'dug la langs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8479: de ltar slong ba po'i bsam pa rdzogs par mthong
NK043(pi)001:8480: nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dga' ba'i yid
NK043(pi)001:8481: kyis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas te yid la
NK043(pi)001:8482: re ba yongs su rdzogs so snyam du ji ltar
NK043(pi)001:8483: ngas bram ze 'di la lus byin cing sdug pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8484: srog gi 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyabs pa'i dge
NK043(pi)001:8485: ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla med byang chub thob
NK043(pi)001:8486: nas / bram ze 'di 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral te /
NK043(pi)001:8487: shin tu bde ba'i myang 'das la 'god par gyur cig ces smras nas /
NK043(pi)001:8488: tshor ba drag pos gdungs pa dang yid kyis byang
NK043(pi)001:8489: chub tu smon pa byas nas mig btsums te brgyal
NK043(pi)001:8491: de nas brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus
NK043(pi)001:8492: la 'phral du stobs skyed pa dang 'tsho ba'i sman
NK043(pi)001:8493: gyis gsos so // de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig
NK043(pi)001:8494: rten gyi khams kyis lan rnam pa drug tu g.yos
NK043(pi)001:8495: shing sgra shin tu sgrogs so //
NK043(pi)001:8496: 'jigs su rung ba'i sprin dang skar mda' dang phyogs stem pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8497: lha'i rnga brdungs bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:8498: 'jig rten thams cad mun pa mun nag tu 'gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8499: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyi ca co'i sgra dang me
NK043(pi)001:8500: tog dang gos 'thor la lha'i rol mo rdung ngo
NK043(pi)001:8501: // 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad der yud tsam zhig rmongs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8502: grong khyer de'i srog chags brgya stong rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:8503: kyi hud lha bsad pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
NK043(pi)001:8506: la la ni cho nges 'debs pa sogs byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8507: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu bzhi
NK043(pi)001:8508: dang bcas pas bram ze'i cha byad de mi snang
NK043(pi)001:8509: bar byas nas / rang gi gzugs bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:8510: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8511: rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te bram ze ma lags /
NK043(pi)001:8512: rgyal po chen po legs so //
NK043(pi)001:8514: rang gi lus la ma chags pa /
NK043(pi)001:8515: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba sbyin la dga' ba legs so //
NK043(pi)001:8516: de ltar sdug bsngal drag pos bcom yang snying rjes
NK043(pi)001:8517: rang lus sbyin pa las mi ldog pa de ni
NK043(pi)001:8518: legs so // rgyal po chen po khyod la dri yis /
NK043(pi)001:8519: khyod shin tu dka' ba'i brtson pa 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer /
NK043(pi)001:8520: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8521: koo shi ka bdag ni sbyin pa 'dis bla med
NK043(pi)001:8522: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas sems can rnams 'khor
NK043(pi)001:8525: khyod rang lus yongs su btang bas sems rnam pa gzhan du gyur te 'gyod par ma gyur grang /
NK043(pi)001:8526: byang chub sems dpas smras pa 'gyod pa med do //
NK043(pi)001:8529: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8530: ji ltar nga'i lus phyed bcad pa 'di gnas ji lta bar zhog cig /
NK043(pi)001:8531: de nas brgya byin gyis lus phyed de gnas ji lta bar bzhag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8532: byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la byams
NK043(pi)001:8533: pa'i sems bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa
NK043(pi)001:8534: / ji ltar byang chub 'dod gyur na //
NK043(pi)001:8535: snying rjes lus ni btang bas na //
NK043(pi)001:8536: ser sna med cing zhum med de //
NK043(pi)001:8537: deng ni 'gyod par gyur pa med //
NK043(pi)001:8538: 'gyod pa'i sems kyang med gyur na //
NK043(pi)001:8539: bden tshig 'di dang legs byas pas //
NK043(pi)001:8540: brgya byin deng ni nga yi lus //
NK043(pi)001:8541: 'di ni sngon gyi ji bzhin du //
NK043(pi)001:8542: dbang po ma lus rdzogs gyur cig /
NK043(pi)001:8543: ces smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8544: nam mkha'i lha rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po
NK043(pi)001:8545: dag gis de mthong nas ca co sgrogs shing ngo
NK043(pi)001:8546: mtshar ba dang bcas te dga' ba'i sgras khyab par
NK043(pi)001:8547: gyur to // brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:8548: la basngagasa shing mchi ma char bzhin du bab ste
NK043(pi)001:8549: bdag gis nyams bskyed pa'i bsam pas tshor ba drag
NK043(pi)001:8550: po'i las kun tu sbyor bar mdzad pa la bzod
NK043(pi)001:8551: par dgongs shing nam khyod sangs rgyas pa'i tshe bdag
NK043(pi)001:8553: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8554: koo shi ka bzod kyis de bzhin du byas te ngas kyang dran par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:8555: bar der byang chub sems dpa'i mthus 'dzam bu'i gling
NK043(pi)001:8556: kun tu nam mkha'i las lha'i rin po che'i char
NK043(pi)001:8557: bab cing rgyan sna tshogs kyis gang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:8558: lha'i snang bas kyang gsal bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8559: de nas ri la gnas pa'i drang srong des ngo mtshar de mthong nas 'di ci'i yin snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8560: drang srong de la bsti gnas na gnas pa'i lha gzhan gyis gtam 'di rgyas par bstan nas /
NK043(pi)001:8561: drang srong de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba
NK043(pi)001:8562: de lta bu la ba spu ldang zhing bkur bar
NK043(pi)001:8563: 'os pa'i sems can chen po'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:8564: drang srong de 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pas btsun
NK043(pi)001:8565: mo rgyal ba'i 'od khrid de rings par byang chub
NK043(pi)001:8566: sems dpa'i thad du phyin nas /
NK043(pi)001:8567: rgyal ba dang tshe spel bar byas te /
NK043(pi)001:8568: brgya byin dang lhan cig tshigs su bcad pa smras nas btsun mo slar phul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:8569: nam du'ang gzhan la ma stsal cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:8570: drang srong de dang lha'i dbang pos gsol ba btab
NK043(pi)001:8571: pa la rgyal pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs
NK043(pi)001:8572: so // de nas lha'i dbang pos las sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:8573: pa la seng ge'i khri shoms dang bdag nyid kyis
NK043(pi)001:8574: rgyal po dpal gyi sde dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes
NK043(pi)001:8575: smras pa bzhin lha'i seng ge'i khri rin po che
NK043(pi)001:8576: sna tshogs kyis kyis mdzes pa mngon par sprul to
NK043(pi)001:8577: so // // brgya byin rang nyid kyi lag pa
NK043(pi)001:8578: gnyis kyis bzung nas seng ge'i khri la bzhag ste
NK043(pi)001:8579: so // // / lha brgya stong du ma dang
NK043(pi)001:8580: lhan cig lha'i rol mo rnams brdung bzhin bsnyen bkur
NK043(pi)001:8581: chen pos rgyal por dbang bskur to //
NK043(pi)001:8582: skabs der sa g.yo ba dang me tog gi char 'babs so //
NK043(pi)001:8583: de nas lha'i dbang po lha brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa rang gi gnas su dong zhing /
NK043(pi)001:8584: drang srong de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la bstod nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8585: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po dpal gyi
NK043(pi)001:8586: sde skye bo'i tshogs chen pos mngon par btud cing
NK043(pi)001:8587: / yun ring por chos kyi rgyal po byed par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:8588: 'dzam gling gi dman pa dang phongs pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:8589: nor gyis tshim par byas shing dge bcu'i lam la
NK043(pi)001:8590: bzhag te 'dod pa'i lha'i gnas ris drug tu bkye
NK043(pi)001:8591: nas / dus gzhan zhig na srog chags brgya stong
NK043(pi)001:8592: du ma rnams dang de lhan cig tu dus byas
NK043(pi)001:8593: te dga' ldan lha'i ris su skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:8594: de ltar ston pa 'di rgyal po dpal gyi sder gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:8595: btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od ni grags 'dzin ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:8596: blon po'i mchog blo gros chen po ni dge slong sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:8597: de'i tshe brgya byin de ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang /
NK043(pi)001:8598: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gang yin pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:8599: ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang lhan cig
NK043(pi)001:8600: tu bden pa mthong ba'i lha brgya khri po de
NK043(pi)001:8601: dag dang / de dus kyi grong khyer gyi skye
NK043(pi)001:8602: bo'i tshogs ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang
NK043(pi)001:8603: lhan cig nga'i thad du 'ongs pa'i ma ga d+ha'i
NK043(pi)001:8604: bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di rnams yin no //
NK043(pi)001:8605: ri la gnas pa'i drang srong ni mo 'gal bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:8606: btsun mo slang ba'i bram ze'i khye'u de ni sh+aakya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:8607: shing mkhan gnyis po ni lhas byin dang ko ka li ka 'di gnyis te /
NK043(pi)001:8608: smon lam de'i dbang gis 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8609: cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:8611: gzhan yang sngon gyi dus su mi rnams kyi tshe
NK043(pi)001:8612: lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub pa na bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:8613: 'das nyid rgyal po gser mdog ces bya ba gzugs
NK043(pi)001:8614: dang mnga' thang dang longs spyod rgya chen por gyur
NK043(pi)001:8615: pas thams cad la ci 'dod pa sbyin zhing sho
NK043(pi)001:8617: de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na bram ze ltas shes
NK043(pi)001:8618: pa rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab
NK043(pi)001:8619: pas mu ge 'byung bar smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8620: rgyal po de mi dga' zhing bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:8621: de lta na phyug po rnams 'tsho yi /
NK043(pi)001:8622: dbul po rnams kyi de ga byed snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:8623: 'dzam gling gi zas thams cad bsdus te pang bar brtsigs nas /
NK043(pi)001:8624: rtsis pa rnams la 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad brtsis la bza' ba mnyam bar 'ged do //
NK043(pi)001:8625: der lo bcu gcig gi bar du su yang ma shi la /
NK043(pi)001:8626: lo bcu gnyis pa byung ba'i tshe zla ba bcu
NK043(pi)001:8627: gcig tsam lhag pa nas gcig lhag pa'i bar du
NK043(pi)001:8628: mi mang po lto bkres pas shi'o //
NK043(pi)001:8629: de'i tshe 'dzam gling gi zas thams cad zad do //
NK043(pi)001:8630: rgyal po gser mdog la zas kyi lhag ma bre chung gang kho na lus so //
NK043(pi)001:8631: de'i tshe bskal pa bzhi bcur spyod pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:8632: sems dpa' zhig mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 'dir phyin
NK043(pi)001:8633: par gyur to // byang sems des nags khrod zhig
NK043(pi)001:8634: na ma dang bu gnyis nyal po byed pa mthong
NK043(pi)001:8635: par gyur to // nas / e ma nyon mongs
NK043(pi)001:8636: pa zla ba dgur de'i ltor gnas shing nu ma
NK043(pi)001:8637: 'thungs nas de nyid du de ltar byed /
NK043(pi)001:8638: 'di 'dra'i chos min la chags pa sogs kyi sems
NK043(pi)001:8639: can rnams kyi don du byang chub kyi spyod pa
NK043(pi)001:8641: bdag nyid gcig pu'i don bsgrub po snyam nas shing
NK043(pi)001:8642: drung zhig tu nyer len gyi phung po lnga la
NK043(pi)001:8643: skye 'jig rjes su lta bas rang sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:8645: de 'di snyam ste bdag gis sems can rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:8646: phyir dka' ba mang zhig spyad na su la phan
NK043(pi)001:8648: bdag deng su la snying brtse zhing su la bsod snyoms blangs te za'o snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8649: de'i lha'i mig gis 'dzam gling 'dir bltas pas zas thams cad zad par mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:8650: rgyal po gser mdog la zas lhag bre chung gang yod par mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8651: de nas bdag gis de la snying brtse bas blangs te za'o snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:8652: nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'phur te /
NK043(pi)001:8653: rgyal po'i pho brang gser can du rgyal po gser
NK043(pi)001:8654: mdog blon po lnga stong dang lhan cig khang bzang
NK043(pi)001:8655: gi steng na 'khod pa der bab nas gtam byas
NK043(pi)001:8656: te zas kyi phyir 'ong bar smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8657: rgyal po mchi ma phyungs te bdag 'di ltar 'dzam
NK043(pi)001:8658: gling la dbang byas kyang drang srong gcig la bsod
NK043(pi)001:8659: snyoms dbul bar mi nus so snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8660: mdzod pa la khyim na bza' btung cung zad yod na drang srong 'di la 'bul lo //
NK043(pi)001:8661: des smras pa lha nyid mkhyen te /
NK043(pi)001:8662: zas thams cad zad nas lha nyid kyi bshos lhag ma bre gang mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:8663: rgyal po 'di snyam du zos na 'tsho ste ma zos na nges par 'achi'o snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:8665: zos kyang nges par 'chi na 'tsho bas chog gi /
NK043(pi)001:8666: 'di 'dra'i yon gnas la phul lo snyam nas 'khor rnams bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:8667: kyi hud 'di ni rgyal po gser mdog gi sbyin pa gtong ba tha ma ste /
NK043(pi)001:8668: rjes su yi rangs par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:8669: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'dzam gling gi mi thams
NK043(pi)001:8670: cad dbul ba yang dag par gcod par gyur cig
NK043(pi)001:8671: ces / bre chung gang de rang sangs rgyas kyi
NK043(pi)001:8672: lhung bzed du blugs nas de'i lag g.yas su lhung
NK043(pi)001:8673: ces / bzed byin no // des de blangs nas nam mkha' la gshegs so //
NK043(pi)001:8674: rgyal pos ji srid mthong gi bar thal mo sbyar te bltas so //
NK043(pi)001:8675: de nas rgyal pos 'khor rnams la rang rang gi gnas su dengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:8676: 'dir bkres skom gyis 'chi ba'i dus ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:8678: bdag cag lha dpal dang sku skal ldan pa'i tshe zhabs 'bring na rtse zhing dga' la /
NK043(pi)001:8679: dus dang tshod 'di lta bu la yongs su gtong ba ga la bzod /
NK043(pi)001:8680: rgyal po gser mdog ngus te mchi ma phyung nas
NK043(pi)001:8681: mi thams cad la yang 'deng bar bskul ba dang
NK043(pi)001:8682: / de dag gis rgyal po'i rkang par phyag 'tshal te /
NK043(pi)001:8683: bdag gis lha'i zhal blta ba'i tha ma lags te /
NK043(pi)001:8684: gang cung zad lha'i bka' la 'gal ba yod na bzod par gsol lo //
NK043(pi)001:8685: de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsod snyoms de yongs su zos so //
NK043(pi)001:8686: de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bzhi nas
NK043(pi)001:8687: sprin stug po bzhi byung zhing rlung grang ba yang
NK043(pi)001:8688: langs pas / gling thams cad phyag bdar byas shing bza' bca' sna tshogs char bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:8689: 'di ltar 'bras chan dang phye dang zan dron dang /
NK043(pi)001:8690: sha dang la phug dang lo ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:8691: til dang bu ram sogs kyi char bab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8692: rgyal po gser mdog dga' zhing mgu ste /
NK043(pi)001:8694: kye ma bsod snyoms gcig phul ba'i myu gu deng byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:8695: 'bras bu lo ma dang me tog ni phyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:8696: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la zhag bdun du nor dang 'bru'i char phab ste /
NK043(pi)001:8697: 'di ltar til dang 'bras thug po che la sogs pa 'bru'i rigs thams cad kyi char babs so //
NK043(pi)001:8698: de nas zhag bdun du mar sar gyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:8699: zhag bdun du til mar gyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:8700: zhag bdun du be'u ras kyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:8701: zhag bdun du zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dang /
NK043(pi)001:8702: zhag bdun du gser dang dngul dang shel dang beed+aur+ya dang /
NK043(pi)001:8705: sbug rnams te rin po che sna bdun po 'di
NK043(pi)001:8706: dag gi char babs nas rgyal po gser mdog gi
NK043(pi)001:8707: mthus 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad kyi dbul
NK043(pi)001:8708: ba rgyun bcad par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8709: yang sngon gyi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mi rnams kyi tshe lo dpag med thub pa'i dus na /
NK043(pi)001:8710: rgyal po gus pa can nam gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:8711: rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa /
NK043(pi)001:8712: btsun mo dang slas brgyad khri dang /
NK043(pi)001:8713: blon po khri phrag du ma yod par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8714: de'i tshe dus zhig na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags
NK043(pi)001:8715: kyi spyi bo la sgo nga 'dra ba'i sha rmen
NK043(pi)001:8716: zhig byung ste / de yang gsal ba na tsha med pa /
NK043(pi)001:8717: 'jam zhing yang ba de bgas kyis cher skyes te ku ba tsam du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8718: de gas pa'i nang nas gzhon nu lta na sdug
NK043(pi)001:8719: pa gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing can byung
NK043(pi)001:8720: ba la / mtshan mkhan gyis bu 'di ni ngo
NK043(pi)001:8721: mtshar che ba'i yon tan gyi mtshan dang ldan te
NK043(pi)001:8722: ba la / / gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan cing /
NK043(pi)001:8723: khye'u'i ming yang spyi bo skyes zhes btags so //
NK043(pi)001:8724: de skyes pa'i tshe btsun mo thams cad kyi nu ma nas 'o ma rang byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:8725: so so nas nga las nus zhes bya bas de'i ming du nga las nu yang zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:8726: de rgyal srid kyi 'byor ba chen pos dga' zhing
NK043(pi)001:8727: rtsed mo rtse ba'i yun du brgya byin drug tshe
NK043(pi)001:8728: 'phos so // de cher skyes pa na yon tan dang ldan par rigs ste /
NK043(pi)001:8729: yab rgyal pos yul gcig gi rgyal srid byed du bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:8730: de rgyal tshab byed pa'i yun la brgya byin drug tshe 'phos so //
NK043(pi)001:8731: der dus gcig na yab rgyal po tshe dus byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8732: des gzhon nu spyi bo skyes rgyal por dbang skur cig ces byas so //
NK043(pi)001:8733: rgyal phran rnams kyis spyi bo skyes la rgyal po byed par gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:8735: yab rgyal po 'das zin na der song yang ci phan /
NK043(pi)001:8736: bdag rgyal po la gyur pa'i bsod nams dang dbang thang yod na /
NK043(pi)001:8737: rgyal chen dang brgya byin la sogs pas nga la gsol ba btab ste /
NK043(pi)001:8738: rgyal por dbang bskur bar shog ces smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:8739: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi rgyal po rnams bab nas
NK043(pi)001:8740: rin po che'i bum pa spos chus gang ba thogs
NK043(pi)001:8741: te spyi bor blugs pas dbang bskur to //
NK043(pi)001:8742: lha'i dbang pos kyang rin po che'i cod pan mgo
NK043(pi)001:8743: la bcings te yon tan gyi basngagasa pa brjod par
NK043(pi)001:8744: byas so // mi rnams kyis khri dang cod pan
NK043(pi)001:8745: sogs ma bcings pa'i sngon du lha rnams kyis de
NK043(pi)001:8746: byas so // ltar byas so // de nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:8747: phran rnams kyis yul dbus su byon par gsol ba
NK043(pi)001:8748: byas so // ltar byas so // na / des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8749: bdag rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dbang thang yod na /
NK043(pi)001:8750: yul rang nyid nga'i drung du 'od rigs kyi /
NK043(pi)001:8751: nga yul snyegs su mi 'agro'o zhes smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:8752: yul chen po rgyal po'i pho brang dang skyed tshal
NK043(pi)001:8753: dang khrus rdzing la sogs pa dgos pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:8754: der byung bar gyur nas yul de la gnas bcas
NK043(pi)001:8755: su grags so // gser gyi 'khor lo la sogs
NK043(pi)001:8756: pa rin po che sna bdun kyang der byung ste
NK043(pi)001:8757: su grags so // / gling bzhi la dbang byed
NK043(pi)001:8758: pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gyur
NK043(pi)001:8759: su grags so // / te / bu dpa' zhing
NK043(pi)001:8760: rtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:8761: su grags so // / te / pa / pha
NK043(pi)001:8762: rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong
NK043(pi)001:8763: yang tshang bar byung zhing chos bzhin du rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:8764: su grags so // / te / pa / bskyangs
NK043(pi)001:8765: so // de'i tshe yul yangs pa can de'i nye
NK043(pi)001:8766: skor gyi nags tshal zhig na drang srong mngon shes
NK043(pi)001:8767: lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgya bsam gtan byed pa
NK043(pi)001:8768: su grags so // / te / pa / bskyangs
NK043(pi)001:8769: so // dang / der bya gar rab tu mang
NK043(pi)001:8770: po sgra 'byin par bsam gtan gyi tsher ma byas
NK043(pi)001:8771: su grags so // / te / pa / bskyangs
NK043(pi)001:8772: so // dang / pa la / de'i nang na
NK043(pi)001:8773: drang srong rang bzhin ngan zhes bya bas bya gar
NK043(pi)001:8774: rnams 'dab gshog lhung bar 'gyur ba'i dmod pa bor
NK043(pi)001:8775: bas de bzhin du gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:8776: bya de rnams 'dab gshog med par rkang pas 'gro
NK043(pi)001:8777: ba rgyal po ljongs rgyur song tshe mthong nas de
NK043(pi)001:8778: ci ltar gyur pa dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8779: drang srong gis dmod pas de ltar byas so zhes zhus pa la /
NK043(pi)001:8781: sems can la snying brtse ba med pa'i drang srong
NK043(pi)001:8782: 'di lta bu rnams nga'i yul du ma 'dug ces
NK043(pi)001:8783: bsgos pa ltar drang srong rnams la byas pa dang
NK043(pi)001:8784: / de dag gis 'di ni gling bzhi la dbang
NK043(pi)001:8785: ba'i rgyal po yin pas bdag cag ri rab kyi
NK043(pi)001:8786: bang rim du 'agro'o snyam nas der dong ste gnas
NK043(pi)001:8787: / par byas so // de nas rgyal po nga
NK043(pi)001:8788: las nu des mi rnams la sems shing 'jal la
NK043(pi)001:8789: nye bar rtogs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8790: bzo dang las kyi gnas rnams la 'jal zhing rtogs
NK043(pi)001:8791: par byed pa'i phyir de'i ming du shed las skyes
NK043(pi)001:8792: zhes grags so // de nas rgyal po de phyi
NK043(pi)001:8793: rol tu 'chag tu song ba las mi mang po
NK043(pi)001:8795: zhing rmo ba mthong nas rgyal pos blon po rnams
NK043(pi)001:8796: la mi 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa dang
NK043(pi)001:8797: / lha 'di ni srog chags thams cad zas kyis
NK043(pi)001:8798: 'tsho bas na 'di dag gis zhing rmos nas 'tsho
NK043(pi)001:8799: / bar byed do // rgyal pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8800: nga la rgyal por 'gyur ba'i bsod nams yod na /
NK043(pi)001:8801: mi 'di rnams las bya mi dgos par ro brgya
NK043(pi)001:8802: dang ldan pa'i kha zas rang yod par gyur te
NK043(pi)001:8803: / thams cad tshim zhing 'grangs nas bkres skom med
NK043(pi)001:8804: par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu bza' btung
NK043(pi)001:8805: thams cad rang yod par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8807: 'di su'i bsod nams yin de dag gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8808: 'di ni rgyal po'i bsod nams dang sems can rnams kyi yang yin no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:8809: de nas yang 'chag tu song ba las thag pa dag pa la 'khal zhing 'thag pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:8810: 'di ci byed dris pas zas yod kyang gos med pas de ltar byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8811: rgyal pos gos thams cad rang yod pa'i smon lam
NK043(pi)001:8812: btab pa bzhin shing thams cad las gyon pa'i gos
NK043(pi)001:8814: mi thams cad la gos zad mi shes par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8815: 'di su'i bsod nams zhes dris pa dang lan sngar bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:8816: de nas yang rol mo'i cha byad thogs pa mthong nas 'di ci yin dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8817: zas gos chog par yod kyang 'di dag dga' zhing brtse ba'i phyir rol mo byed do //
NK043(pi)001:8818: rgyal pos rol mo'i cha byad rang yod par smon
NK043(pi)001:8819: ma thag tu shing thams cad las rol mo'i cha
NK043(pi)001:8821: rang 'khrol zhing thos pa tsam gyis dga' bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:8822: de nas rgyal po'i bsod nams kyis nam mkha' las
NK043(pi)001:8823: rin po che sna bdun char bzhin babs bas yul
NK043(pi)001:8824: gang bar byas nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la
NK043(pi)001:8825: 'di lta bu su'i yon tan yin zhes dris pa
NK043(pi)001:8826: la / de dag gis 'di ni rgyal po'i yon
NK043(pi)001:8827: tan dang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams lags so
NK043(pi)001:8828: la / // rgyal pos smras pa gal te sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi mthus yin na /
NK043(pi)001:8829: rin po che'i char 'di gnas kun tu 'bab par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:8830: gal te nga 'ba' zhig gi yin na rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig tu bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:8831: phyi rol du kar+sha ba ni gcig kyang mi 'bab par gyur cig snyam pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8834: de dag gis lha'i lags so //
NK043(pi)001:8837: dang po nas lha'i bsod nams kyis yin par shes
NK043(pi)001:8838: na ngas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rin po
NK043(pi)001:8840: 'on kyang khyed rin po che 'dod pa thams cad 'di las longs shig ces basgo'o //
NK043(pi)001:8841: der 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du dbang byed cing
NK043(pi)001:8842: 'dod pa thams cad kyis dga' ba nyams su myong
NK043(pi)001:8843: la lo khri phrag mang por sems can rnams la
NK043(pi)001:8844: phan pa rjes su bstan nas brgya byin drug 'pho
NK043(pi)001:8846: dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i mdun nas 'gro ba
NK043(pi)001:8847: gnod sbyin lha gnas zhes pa la rgyal pos smras
NK043(pi)001:8848: pa / gang nga'i bka' 'og tu mchod pa'i gling gzhan yod dam /
NK043(pi)001:8850: lha shar gyi lus 'phags gling zhes bgyi pa 'byor
NK043(pi)001:8851: zhing rgyas pa mi mang pos gang ba der gshegs
NK043(pi)001:8853: rgyal po yang der 'gro 'dod pas gser gyi 'khor
NK043(pi)001:8854: lo rin po che nam mkhar 'phags pa'i rjes su
NK043(pi)001:8855: rin po che gzhan dang dpung gi tshogs bye ba
NK043(pi)001:8856: brgyad 'bum dang / bu stong dang bcas pa nam
NK043(pi)001:8857: mkha' la 'phags pas shar gyi lus 'phags gling du
NK043(pi)001:8858: phyin nas mi thams cad kyis bsu zhing rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:8859: byas te mi rnams la rjes su ston cing brgya
NK043(pi)001:8860: byin drug gi tshe'i yun du gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:8861: de nas gnod sbyin gyis bskul ba bzhin nub ba
NK043(pi)001:8862: lang spyod du song ste brgya byin drug gi tshe'i
NK043(pi)001:8864: de nas gnod sbyin gyis smras pa ltar byang sgra
NK043(pi)001:8865: mi snyan du song nas dang por ma rmos pa'i
NK043(pi)001:8866: 'bras s+aa lu'i 'bras bu dkar po dang /
NK043(pi)001:8867: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyang mthong nas gnod sbyin
NK043(pi)001:8868: lha gnas la dris shing rgyal pos 'khor rnams la
NK043(pi)001:8869: de ltar rjes su bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:8870: de nas gling der rgyal po byas te brgya byin drug gi tshe'i yun du gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:8871: de nas gnod sbyin gyis bskul ba ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas su chas so //
NK043(pi)001:8872: der ri rab ni gser gyi ri bdun gyis bskor
NK043(pi)001:8873: ba yin pas gser gyi ri dang po mu khyud
NK043(pi)001:8874: 'dzin gyi ri'i rtse mor dpung gi tshogs la rjes
NK043(pi)001:8875: su ston cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad la
NK043(pi)001:8876: longs spyod de gnas pa'i yun la brgya byin drug
NK043(pi)001:8877: tshe 'phos so // de bzhin du rnam 'dud dang /
NK043(pi)001:8882: gnya' shing 'dzin drug po re re'i rtse mor yang
NK043(pi)001:8883: dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston cing bde bar
NK043(pi)001:8884: gnas pa re re'i yun du brgya byin drug re
NK043(pi)001:8885: drug re tshe 'pho ba'i yun du bsdad do //
NK043(pi)001:8886: de nas gnya' shing 'dzin nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8887: rgyal po'i rta dang glang po'i gcin rtug lhung bas
NK043(pi)001:8888: sngar gyi drang srong lnga brgya po yod pa'i lus
NK043(pi)001:8890: 'di cis zhes phan tshun gleng ba na nga las nu yin par shes te /
NK043(pi)001:8891: rgyal po 'thab krol can de 'dir yang 'ongs so zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:8892: der drang srong bzhin ngan zhes bya ba khros te
NK043(pi)001:8893: sngags dang phyag rgya bcings nas khyor bar chu blugs
NK043(pi)001:8894: pa gtor bas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs dang bcas
NK043(pi)001:8895: pa 'gror ma btub par thogs par gyur pa dang
NK043(pi)001:8896: / rgyal po'i mdun na blon po rin po che 'gro bas drang srong de rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8897: bram ze khro bo dor bar gyis //
NK043(pi)001:8899: 'di ni mi dbang nga las nu //
NK043(pi)001:8900: bya gar de dag ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:8901: ci tsam na rgyal po nga las nus phyogs der phyin nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8902: dpung 'di su zhig gis bkag blon po rin po ches smras pa drang srong rnams kyis so //
NK043(pi)001:8904: drang srong 'di rnams yo byad rnams kyi nang na ci zhig la dga' /
NK043(pi)001:8906: lha ral pa la dga' ba lags so //
NK043(pi)001:8909: bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig smras ma
NK043(pi)001:8910: thag tu de dag rnams ral pa byi nas lag
NK043(pi)001:8911: na mda' gzhu thogs te rdzu 'phrul las nyams shing
NK043(pi)001:8912: mdun du brgyug par brtsams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8913: bud med rin po ches smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:8914: lha drang srong 'di dag ni dka' thub can lags na /
NK043(pi)001:8915: 'di dag gis ci bgyi thong lags /
NK043(pi)001:8916: rgyal pos btang ba dang de rnams kyis slar yang
NK043(pi)001:8917: brtson 'grus brtsams pas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon
NK043(pi)001:8919: de nas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'phags te /
NK043(pi)001:8920: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du chas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8921: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srung ma
NK043(pi)001:8922: dang po chu la gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis dpung
NK043(pi)001:8923: gi tshogs bkag par brtsams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8924: rgyal pos dpung 'di sus bkag zhes dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8925: chu la gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis so //
NK043(pi)001:8926: rgyal pos bdag dud 'gro dang g.yul 'gyed dam /
NK043(pi)001:8927: klu 'di rnams bdag gi mdun nas bran bzhin 'gro
NK043(pi)001:8928: bar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu klu rnams
NK043(pi)001:8929: mdun nas 'gro zhing lha lag na yol go thogs
NK043(pi)001:8931: de dag gis ci ste rgyug ces dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:8933: der klu dang lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha
NK043(pi)001:8934: rnams lhags nas dpung gi tshogs thogs par byas pa
NK043(pi)001:8935: dang / sngar bzhin smon lam btab pas lha phreng thogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:8936: rtag myos kyi bar du de bzhin snga ma ltar song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:8937: de nas rtag myos kyi lha rnams kyis rgyal chen
NK043(pi)001:8938: ris bzhi'i lha rnams la 'dir mi'i rgyal po 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:8940: de dag gis 'di ni bsod nams che bas dgag
NK043(pi)001:8941: mi nus so snyam du ma bkag par sum cu
NK043(pi)001:8942: rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la mi'i rgyal po 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:8944: rgyal po nga las nus ri rab kyi rtsen tshal
NK043(pi)001:8945: sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta
NK043(pi)001:8946: bu mthong nas 'di ci yin zhes gnod sbyin lha
NK043(pi)001:8948: shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes lha rnams dbyar zla bzhir
NK043(pi)001:8949: 'dod pa lnga dang ldan pas der rtse zhing dga'
NK043(pi)001:8950: bar byed pa yin pas lha yang der dgyes shing
NK043(pi)001:8952: rgyal pos kyang tshal sngo ba 'di yongs 'du sa
NK043(pi)001:8953: brtol yin pas khyed cag kyang der phyin nas 'dod
NK043(pi)001:8954: yon lnga dang ldan pas rtse bar gyis zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:8955: so // yang ri rab kyi rtse na /
NK043(pi)001:8956: sprin dkar po spungs pa lta bu mthong nas dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:8957: lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang lha rnams don
NK043(pi)001:8958: sems shing 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste lha
NK043(pi)001:8960: rgyal pos kyang 'khor rnams la de rjes su bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:8961: ri rab de'i steng na lha'i grong khyer lta na sdug ces bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:8962: chu zhing du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:8963: 'khor yug tu dpag tshad khri yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:8964: gser gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba
NK043(pi)001:8965: sogs lha'i gnas kyi bkod pa bzang po rgya che
NK043(pi)001:8966: ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa yid du 'ong ba
NK043(pi)001:8967: dag dang ldan pa der lha'i bu dang bu mos
NK043(pi)001:8968: gang zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ji ltar bsam
NK043(pi)001:8969: pa bzhin 'byor pas shin tu nyams dga' ba der
NK043(pi)001:8970: phyin no // der dang por lha rnams skrag nas
NK043(pi)001:8971: sgo thams cad bsdams te lcags kyi gtan pa bcug
NK043(pi)001:8972: phyin no // pa dang / rgyal po 'khor bcas
NK043(pi)001:8973: der phyin nas gzhu rgyud spring zhing dung bus pa
NK043(pi)001:8974: tsam gyis lha'i pho brang gi sgo bcu phrag phyed
NK043(pi)001:8975: dang bcu gnyis po dus gcig tu bye ba dang
NK043(pi)001:8976: phyin no // pa dang / / 'di ltar mi'i
NK043(pi)001:8977: rgyal po nga las nu 'di ni bsod nams dbang
NK043(pi)001:8978: thang shin tu che ba ste 'di sus kyang dgag
NK043(pi)001:8979: par mi nus pas mchod yon thogs te bsu bar
NK043(pi)001:8980: bya'o snyam du brgya byin 'khor bcas phyir bsu byung
NK043(pi)001:8981: ste bsus nas rgyal po 'ba' zhig brgya byin gyi
NK043(pi)001:8982: pho brang gi nang du khrid cing 'khor gzhan rnams
NK043(pi)001:8984: der dbang po dang nye dbang rnams kyi stan bshams
NK043(pi)001:8985: pa'i tha mar nga la nu'i bstan bshams pa la
NK043(pi)001:8986: / rgyal po nga las nu'i bsams pa la stan
NK043(pi)001:8987: bshams pa 'di rnams kyi tha ma gang yin pa
NK043(pi)001:8988: 'di ni gdon mi za bar bdag gi yin no
NK043(pi)001:8989: / snyam nas / kye ma bdag la brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:8990: gyi stan phyed bstabs na ci ma rung snyam pa
NK043(pi)001:8991: / snyam nas / dang / brgya byin gyis rgyal po nga las nul stan phyed bstabs shing /
NK043(pi)001:8992: brgya byin dang stan gcig la 'dug nas mnga' dbang mnyam par gyur te gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:8993: de'i tshe na lha dang mi'i rgyal po de gnyis
NK043(pi)001:8994: gzugs byad che chung dang bzang ngan sogs dang smra
NK043(pi)001:8995: ba dang yon tan gyi khyad par mthong ba ci
NK043(pi)001:8996: yang med de mnyam pa la /
NK043(pi)001:8997: lha'i dbang po ni mig mi 'dzum pa dang 'gro na lha'i mgyogs bul tsam gyi khyad yod do //
NK043(pi)001:8998: der brgya byin dang skal ba mnyam pas lha'i 'dod
NK043(pi)001:8999: pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod de brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:9000: sum cu rtsa drug gi tshe'i yun du gnas par
NK043(pi)001:9001: byas so // de ltar brgya byin sum cu rtsa drug barjesa pa'i tha ma de'i ring la /
NK043(pi)001:9002: lha ma yin rnams lha la dmag drangs te /
NK043(pi)001:9003: gcan srung ma lnga dral nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas su lhags pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9004: gnod sbyin rnams kyis lha'i dbang po la sbran pas /
NK043(pi)001:9005: brgya byin dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te phyir byung nas g.yul 'gyed pa las /
NK043(pi)001:9006: brgya byin gyis ma thub nas phyir rang gi pho
NK043(pi)001:9007: brang du bros te lha'i grong khyer gyi sgo bcad
NK043(pi)001:9008: pa na / rgyal po spyi bo skyes kyis brgya byin bzhugs shig dang bdag mchi'o zhes smras nas /
NK043(pi)001:9009: nga las nu dpung gi tshogs brgyad 'bum dang thabs
NK043(pi)001:9010: cig steng gi nam mkhar 'phags nas dung bus shing
NK043(pi)001:9012: de'i sgra chen po lha min rnams kyis thos nas 'di su'i gzhu rgyud kyi sgra yin /
NK043(pi)001:9013: de rnams kyis 'di ni mi'i rgyal po nga las
NK043(pi)001:9014: nu'i 'o zhes thos nas ngo mtshar zhing skrag go
NK043(pi)001:9015: // ji tsam na de dag phan tshun g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9016: chos nyid kyis lha dang lha min de dag thad kar 'dug ste 'gyed na /
NK043(pi)001:9017: nga las nu'i dpung ni lha min las ches steng
NK043(pi)001:9018: du 'phags te 'dug par gyur pa na bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:9019: gi steng gi nam mkhar spags pa 'di su zhig
NK043(pi)001:9020: / de rnams kyis mi'i rgyal po nga las nu'o zhes bos so //
NK043(pi)001:9021: de thos nas gang gi shing rta bdag cag gi
NK043(pi)001:9022: steng gi nam mkhar spags pa'i sems can 'di ni
NK043(pi)001:9023: bsod nams kyi dbang che bar grags pa yin pas
NK043(pi)001:9024: 'thab mi nus so snyam pas lha ma yin rnams
NK043(pi)001:9025: 'jigs skrag nas g.yul pham ste rang gi gnas su
NK043(pi)001:9026: bros so // rgyal pos smras pa gang rgyal /
NK043(pi)001:9027: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:9029: rgyal po nga las nus bsams pa sum cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:9030: gsum pa'i lha rnams las bdag lhag go snyam mo
NK043(pi)001:9031: // de nas rgyal po nga las nus bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:9032: bdag gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar gyur cing brgya byin gyi stan phyed kyang bstabs te /
NK043(pi)001:9033: bdag gi mthu stobs ni gang dang yang mi mnyam na /
NK043(pi)001:9034: brgya byin dang thun mong du 'dug pa ga la rung /
NK043(pi)001:9035: da ni bdag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gnas
NK043(pi)001:9036: 'di nas phyung la bdag kho nas lha dang mi
NK043(pi)001:9037: rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed
NK043(pi)001:9039: sems de bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po
NK043(pi)001:9040: nga las nu 'byor ba de las yongs su nyams
NK043(pi)001:9041: te 'dzam bu'i gling du phyir lhung zhing sngon gyi
NK043(pi)001:9042: pho brang rnying pa'i sgor lhags nas nad tshabs chen
NK043(pi)001:9043: pos thebs te / 'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug
NK043(pi)001:9044: bsngal myong ba na rgyal po de'i blon po dang
NK043(pi)001:9045: pos thebs te / bcas pa dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9046: gsang sngags kyi lhan cig 'tsho bar byed pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:9047: rgyal po nga las nu gang na ba der phyin
NK043(pi)001:9048: nas / 'di skad ces lha 'das na yul 'khor
NK043(pi)001:9049: gyi mi slad ma rnams kyis rgyal po nga las
NK043(pi)001:9050: nu nongs pa'i tshe ci zhig gsung zhes 'dri na
NK043(pi)001:9051: nas / / bdag cag gis ji skad lan gdab par bya /
NK043(pi)001:9053: de skad 'dri ba de la 'di skad smros shig /
NK043(pi)001:9054: rgyal po nga las nu ni rin po che sna bdun dang yang ldan /
NK043(pi)001:9055: mi'i 'byor pa rnams kyis gling bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas /
NK043(pi)001:9056: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du
NK043(pi)001:9057: yang song nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag
NK043(pi)001:9058: gis ma ngoms bzhin du nongs so zhes gyis shig
NK043(pi)001:9059: / kar+sha pa na'i char babs kyang //
NK043(pi)001:9060: 'dod pa dag la ngoms pa med //
NK043(pi)001:9061: mkhas pas 'dod pa mnog chung zhing //
NK043(pi)001:9062: sdug bsngal mang por shes nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:9063: lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang //
NK043(pi)001:9064: dga' bar 'gyur ba med pa nyid //
NK043(pi)001:9065: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
NK043(pi)001:9066: nyan thos sred pa zad la dga' //
NK043(pi)001:9067: gangs kyi ri dang mnyam pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:9068: gser gyi ri bor gyur kyang ni //
NK043(pi)001:9069: gcig gi nor bu'ang des mi chog /
NK043(pi)001:9070: mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya //
NK043(pi)001:9071: gang zhig gzhi 'dis sdug bsngal rtogs pa de //
NK043(pi)001:9072: 'dod pa dag la gzhar yang ji ltar dga' //
NK043(pi)001:9073: 'jig rten nor dag zug rngur rtogs nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:9074: brten pas de nyid gdul phyir bslab par bya //
NK043(pi)001:9075: zhes tshigs su bcad bdag kyang smras so //
NK043(pi)001:9076: de nas rgyal po nga las nus gtan pa med
NK043(pi)001:9077: pa'i mchod sbyin btang nas tshigs su bcad de smras
NK043(pi)001:9078: pa / 'jig rten pha rol ya nga zhing //
NK043(pi)001:9079: tshe thung bar ni shes byas nas //
NK043(pi)001:9080: bsod nams dag ni bya ba ste //
NK043(pi)001:9081: bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:9082: de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis //
NK043(pi)001:9083: sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang byas na //
NK043(pi)001:9085: sbyin pa byed pa dga' bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:9086: ci tsam na grong gi mi dang yul mi rnams
NK043(pi)001:9087: kyis rgyal po nga las nu na zhing shi la
NK043(pi)001:9088: thug ste 'dug go zhes thos nas kyang srog chags
NK043(pi)001:9089: brgya stong phrag du ma blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa
NK043(pi)001:9090: dang / rgyal po des skye bo'i tshogs de rnams la 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
NK043(pi)001:9091: khyim na gnas pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
NK043(pi)001:9092: 'dod pa la smad pa yang bshad pas srog chags
NK043(pi)001:9093: brgya stong mang po khyim spangs nas nags su drang
NK043(pi)001:9094: srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:9095: tshangs gnas bzhi bsgoms pas 'dod pa la chags pa
NK043(pi)001:9096: dang bral te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so
NK043(pi)001:9097: // de ltar rgyal po nga las nu de ji
NK043(pi)001:9098: srid gzhon nu'i sa na rtse ba nas sum cu
NK043(pi)001:9099: rtsa gsum du gnas pa de srid kyi yun la
NK043(pi)001:9100: brgya byin brgya dang bcu bzhi shi 'phos pa yin
NK043(pi)001:9101: // no // brgya phyin re re'i tshe tshad ni
NK043(pi)001:9102: mi rnams kyi lo brgya la sum cu rtsa gsum
NK043(pi)001:9103: pa'i lha'i zhag gcig yin no //
NK043(pi)001:9104: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba zla ba
NK043(pi)001:9105: bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:9106: kyi lo stong thub pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:9107: de mi'i los bgrangs na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang sa ya drug yod de /
NK043(pi)001:9108: brgya byin gcig gi tshe tshad do //
NK043(pi)001:9109: brgya byin brgya dang bcu bzhi po'i tshe tshad mi'i
NK043(pi)001:9110: lor brtsis nas ther 'bum bzhi dang dung phyur gcig
NK043(pi)001:9111: dang sa ya bzhi yod de /
NK043(pi)001:9112: de tsam du rgyal po nga las nu lha dang
NK043(pi)001:9113: mi'i 'dod yon la longs spyod pa'i yun rags pa
NK043(pi)001:9114: yin no // 'dul ba'i dpe 'gar brgya byin brgyad
NK043(pi)001:9115: cu rtsa bzhi sogs yig skyon re zung zhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:9116: yin no // 'dug go // de bzhin skyes rabs
NK043(pi)001:9117: kyi skabs 'dir cung zad re'i 'dra min yod pa
NK043(pi)001:9118: rnams mdo sde rgyas bsdus bsdur nas bris pa yin
NK043(pi)001:9120: brgya byin so drug po'i nang gi dang po nga
NK043(pi)001:9121: las nu la stan phyed stob pa de ni dge
NK043(pi)001:9123: gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:9124: 'di gnas 'di nas byung la bdag gis rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:9125: bya'o snyam pa'i brgya byin de ni sangs rgyas 'od
NK043(pi)001:9126: srung yin te / sems can shin tu dbang che
NK043(pi)001:9127: bar grags pa la ngan sems bskyed pa des ni
NK043(pi)001:9128: 'byor ba las nyams nas 'dzam gling du 'ongs shing
NK043(pi)001:9129: nad tshabs chen pos thebs te 'chi ba la thug
NK043(pi)001:9130: pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pa myong bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:9131: srung yin te / // de'i tshe nga las nu de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:9132: nga las nu des gling bzhi dang lha'i gnas su
NK043(pi)001:9133: rgyal srid thob par gyur pa'i rgyu ni sngon de
NK043(pi)001:9134: bzhin gshegs pa rnam gzigs 'jig rten du byon pa
NK043(pi)001:9135: / rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9136: 'bru tshong pa'i tshong pa zhig gis sangs rgyas de lta bas chog mi shes par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:9137: sran ma mu dag la spar bas bcus te gtor ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9138: 'brum bu bzhi lhung bzed kyi nang du song /
NK043(pi)001:9139: gcig lhung bzed kyi kha khyer la phog /
NK043(pi)001:9140: gcig dbu'i rtse mor chags pas gling bzhi dang lha'i
NK043(pi)001:9141: ris su longs spyod kyi dga' ba yun ring myong
NK043(pi)001:9142: ba thob bo // de'i pho brang du zhag bdun
NK043(pi)001:9143: du gser sogs kyi char babs pa ni de bzhin
NK043(pi)001:9144: gshegs pa thams cad zil gnon zhes bya ba 'jig
NK043(pi)001:9146: tshong dpon gyi bu khyim phug nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:9147: yul de'i chos lugs kyis bag ma btang nas ring
NK043(pi)001:9148: po ma lon par bag rdzongs btab ste khyim thab
NK043(pi)001:9149: la gtong ba'i bag ma gang yin pa de rin
NK043(pi)001:9150: po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog gis
NK043(pi)001:9151: brgyan nas khyim thab la gtong la /
NK043(pi)001:9152: des kyang khrid nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas /
NK043(pi)001:9153: tshong dpon gyi bu des rin po che las byas
NK043(pi)001:9154: pa'i me tog thogs nas bzhon pa la zhon te
NK043(pi)001:9155: / rang gi khyim du chas pa'i lam du sangs
NK043(pi)001:9156: rgyas de nyid tshur ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa mthong
NK043(pi)001:9157: / nas / des skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:9158: dad pas brlan pa'i sems kyis gzhon pa las babs
NK043(pi)001:9159: nas rin po che'i me tog de rnams kyis sangs
NK043(pi)001:9161: sangs rgyas de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog de dag
NK043(pi)001:9162: shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag tu gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:9163: gshegs na phyi bzhin 'ong zhing bzhugs na 'dug pa
NK043(pi)001:9164: de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas /
NK043(pi)001:9166: sbyin pa rgya chen sogs kyi tshigs bcad kyang brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:9167: de'i rnam smin gyis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i
NK043(pi)001:9168: dus su yang de'i pho brang yang gser las byas
NK043(pi)001:9169: pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:9170: nga las nu'i pho brang du zhag bdun du gser gyi char kyang babs so //
NK043(pi)001:9171: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
NK043(pi)001:9172: rgyal po chen po de bas na khyod kyis 'di
NK043(pi)001:9173: ltar mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
NK043(pi)001:9174: chog shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mi gang dag
NK043(pi)001:9175: yod pa ni nyung la chog mi shes par 'chi
NK043(pi)001:9176: bar 'gyur ba ni ches mang bar rigs par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:9177: zhes bka' stsal pa bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:9178: byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi ji ltar byung ba'i gtam brjod pa 'di dag gis kyang /
NK043(pi)001:9180: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9181: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms pa med pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:9182: rab tu bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang shes
NK043(pi)001:9183: par byas nas bdag legs su 'dod pa rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:9184: mi dge ba spangs shing dge ba ci nus su
NK043(pi)001:9186: 'dod pa'i yon tan la ma chags pa'i blo bskyed par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:9187: yab sras mjal pa'i mdo na mi bdag grags pa
NK043(pi)001:9188: mtha' yas kyi skyes rabs gsungs pa yang 'di dang
NK043(pi)001:9190: yang mdo de las gsungs pa'i rgyal po'i lha zhes pa'ang de dang 'dra'o //
NK043(pi)001:9192: rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9195: rgyal bu ku sha zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9196: gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9197: rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9198: rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba la sogs par
NK043(pi)001:9199: gyur pa'i tshe mnga' dbang chen po dang gtong ba
NK043(pi)001:9200: sogs kyis sems can la pan btags pa rnams 'dul
NK043(pi)001:9201: ba lung gzhi bam po zhe gsum pa'i skor du
NK043(pi)001:9202: shes par bya'o // yang bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon
NK043(pi)001:9203: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dbang byed pa'i rgyal po shi
NK043(pi)001:9204: bi zhes bya bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9205: brgya byin lha'i dbang po tshe 'pho ba'i ltas byung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:9206: 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos ni nub ste
NK043(pi)001:9207: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi bzhugs na kho bo
NK043(pi)001:9208: gang la skyabs su 'gro ba mi shes nas mya
NK043(pi)001:9211: lha'i dbang po 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po chen
NK043(pi)001:9212: po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa shi
NK043(pi)001:9213: bi zhes bya ba bzhugs pa yi dam brtan zhing
NK043(pi)001:9214: brtson pas byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar nus pa
NK043(pi)001:9215: de la skyabs su song na bgegs las rnam par
NK043(pi)001:9216: thar bar byed do zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9217: der brgya byin gyis byang sems yin min dang por
NK043(pi)001:9218: bgam pa'i slad du khyod phug ron zhig tu sprul
NK043(pi)001:9219: la / nga khrar sprul te ded nas rgyal po de'i gam du skyabs btsal nas 'dug ste /
NK043(pi)001:9220: de dus sgyu yod dam bden pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:9222: lha'i dbang po skyes bu chen po byang chub sems
NK043(pi)001:9223: dpa' chen po la 'tshe ba mi bya'i mchod par
NK043(pi)001:9224: rigs kyi / shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po 'di lta bus gtso bar mi rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:9226: bdag ni de la ngan sems min //
NK043(pi)001:9227: gser ltar sad nas mngon par 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:9228: bden pa rtogs par 'dod pa na //
NK043(pi)001:9229: byang chub sems dpa' sad par bya //
NK043(pi)001:9230: zhes smras nas khra dang phug ron du sprul te /
NK043(pi)001:9231: des de bzung la khad du rgyal po'i mchan khung
NK043(pi)001:9232: du phug ron de zhugs te srog gi skyabs gsol
NK043(pi)001:9233: to // khra yang mod la phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:9235: phug ron 'di ni bdag gi zas lags te /
NK043(pi)001:9236: myur du bdag la stsol cig /
NK043(pi)001:9237: bdag ni bkres pas nyan to //
NK043(pi)001:9239: bdag la gang skyabs su 'ongs pa thams cad phyir
NK043(pi)001:9240: mi gtong bar dam bcas pas 'di yang mi sbyin
NK043(pi)001:9242: khyed thams cad kyi skyabs mdzad na /
NK043(pi)001:9243: bdag la yang zas mi stsol na /
NK043(pi)001:9244: bdag thams cad kyi nang du ma gtogs sam /
NK043(pi)001:9246: khyod la sha gzhan sbyin na za'am /
