NK043(pi)001:9248: bdag ni gsar du bkum pa'i sha rlon pa 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:9250: bdag gis gsar du bsad pa'i sha rlon pa zhig
NK043(pi)001:9251: spyar na ni gcig bsad de gcig gso bar mi
NK043(pi)001:9252: rigs pas / bdag 'ba' zhig gi lus ma gtogs
NK043(pi)001:9253: bar gzhan srog dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi
NK043(pi)001:9254: srog phongs so snyam du gri rnon pos rang gi
NK043(pi)001:9255: barla'i sha bcad pa khra la byin te phug ron
NK043(pi)001:9257: khras de ltar phug ron gyi srog bslu na srang gis gzhal te mnyam pa zhig stsal du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:9259: phug ron dang barla'i sha lcid gzhal ba na /
NK043(pi)001:9260: barla dang rtsib logs sogs lus kyi sha zad par
NK043(pi)001:9261: bcad kyang phug ron dang mnyam par ma gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:9262: rgyal po nyid bzhengs te srang gi nang du 'gro
NK043(pi)001:9263: bar gzas kyang nyams kyis ma nus te sa la
NK043(pi)001:9265: ring zhig nas dran pa rnyed par gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9266: rang gi sems la 'di ltar smad de khyod thog
NK043(pi)001:9267: ma med pa'i dus nas ma nus pas khams gsum
NK043(pi)001:9268: 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs
NK043(pi)001:9270: da ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dus la bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:9271: le lo bya ba'i dus min no zhes spyos shing /
NK043(pi)001:9272: 'bad pa bskyed nas srang gi gzhi'i nang du phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9273: da ni legs so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:9274: de'i tshe gnam sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas
NK043(pi)001:9275: gzugs khams kyi lha man chad steng gi bar snang
NK043(pi)001:9276: la lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' chos phyir lus
NK043(pi)001:9277: srog la mi lta ba'i dka' ba spyad pa de
NK043(pi)001:9278: mthong nas 'chi ma char bzhin zag cing /
NK043(pi)001:9279: lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char phab bo //
NK043(pi)001:9280: de nas brgya byin rang gi lus su bsgyur te /
NK043(pi)001:9281: 'di lta bu'i dngos po gang gi ched du bgyid pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9282: 'gyod pa med dam zhes dri ba snga ma rnams bzhin du dris te /
NK043(pi)001:9283: de la rgyal pos 'gyod pa med pa'i bden tshig
NK043(pi)001:9284: gis lus sngar bas kyang lhag par bzang por gyur
NK043(pi)001:9285: to // yang sngon rgyal po shi bi zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:9286: bar gyur pa na sems can rnams la ci 'dod
NK043(pi)001:9287: pa gtong zhing lhag par nad pa rnams la byams
NK043(pi)001:9288: to // par byed do // de'i tshe nad pa
NK043(pi)001:9289: nyam thag pa sman pa kun gyis bor ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:9290: rgyal po de'i drung du song stee lha bdag la
NK043(pi)001:9291: to // par byed do // dpyad mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:9292: rgyal pos sman pa rnams bos nas nad pa de
NK043(pi)001:9294: de dag gis 'di'i sman ni shin tu rnyed dka' ste /
NK043(pi)001:9295: btsas nas khro ma myong ba zhig gi khrag las
NK043(pi)001:9296: nas thugs bgyis te zla ba drug tu blud na
NK043(pi)001:9298: de nas rgyal pos sman de ni dkon te de 'dra ba bdag yin nam snyam du brtags nas /
NK043(pi)001:9300: bdag sngar su la yang khro ba yod dam /
NK043(pi)001:9302: gzhon nu khyod bdag gi pang du byon pa de
NK043(pi)001:9303: nas bdag kyang su la'ang lan gcig kyang khro ma
NK043(pi)001:9304: myong na khyod lta ci smros /
NK043(pi)001:9305: de nas ma'i drung du song ste de ltar dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9306: khyod bdag gi rum du zhugs nas bdag kyang khro ma myong na khyod lta ci smros /
NK043(pi)001:9307: de nas sman rnyed do snyam du bsams te sman
NK043(pi)001:9308: pa rnams la nga'i lus las khrag gtar nas nad
NK043(pi)001:9309: pa gsos shig / de dag gis ma nus pa
NK043(pi)001:9310: dang rgyal po rang gis rtsa gtar ba'i khrag des
NK043(pi)001:9311: rdzi'u bkang nas zla ba drug tu nyi ma re
NK043(pi)001:9312: re bzhin nas thug dang sbyar te blud pas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:9313: po de la byams pa'i 'khor thams cad ngu zhing
NK043(pi)001:9314: yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa rnams kyis kyang mi
NK043(pi)001:9315: gcig gi phyir 'di rnyed kyi sems can 'dor ba
NK043(pi)001:9317: des nad pa de sos par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9318: der rgyal po de'i lus khrol tshags ltar gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:9319: gzi byin nyams kyang lha rnams kyis gzi byin bcug
NK043(pi)001:9321: mi de nad zhi ba na rgyal pos grong rdal
NK043(pi)001:9322: mchog lnga byin nas yul gyi gtso bor bkur bar
NK043(pi)001:9323: byas so // de la ya mtshan du skyes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9324: mi rnams kyis mi de la rgyal po shi bi
NK043(pi)001:9325: pas khyod la rim gro byas zhes grags pa bden
NK043(pi)001:9326: byas so // nam / mi des bdag la ci zhig byas /
NK043(pi)001:9327: ngan khrag sa la pho'am gzhan la byin yang rung
NK043(pi)001:9328: ste ngo mtshar ci zhig che zhes smras ma thag
NK043(pi)001:9329: tu de'i khyim la me shor nas thams cad tshig
NK043(pi)001:9330: par gyur to // yang shi bi'i rgyal po'i bu
NK043(pi)001:9331: gzhon nu zhig tu gyur pa de gzhogs phyed skam
NK043(pi)001:9333: gzhon nu'i yab rgyal po de la sman pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:9334: kyis shang shang te'u'i sha bcud thams cad dang mar
NK043(pi)001:9335: du bsnyal te byin na 'atsho'o zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:9336: bcud thams cad bsags kyang shang shang te'u'i sha lo bcu gnyis su ma rnyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9337: sman pa rnams kyis bya ba dag la bsgo ba /
NK043(pi)001:9338: me long dang bya gang zhig khyer nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ded la /
NK043(pi)001:9339: der snyi btsugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long bzhag na /
NK043(pi)001:9340: bya gag gis rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di
NK043(pi)001:9341: bya gag yin no snyam du skad 'byin par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:9342: la / shang shang te'usa bya gag gi skad thos
NK043(pi)001:9343: nas de'i drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te de gzung
NK043(pi)001:9344: ba'i thabs ni de yin no zhes smras pa ltar
NK043(pi)001:9345: byas te shang shang te'u zhig zin to //
NK043(pi)001:9346: 'jig rten chags nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus
NK043(pi)001:9347: na chos nyid kyis dud 'gro rnams kyang mi skad
NK043(pi)001:9348: smra shes pas shang shang te'u des smras pa bdag
NK043(pi)001:9349: gar bkri / de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9350: des smras pa thongs shig thongs shig /
NK043(pi)001:9351: sha'i mthu yod par byed pa'i sman dang rin po che rnams smra'o //
NK043(pi)001:9353: re zhig khyod kyi sman de dag ji 'dra ba lta yis ston cig /
NK043(pi)001:9354: des smras pa bdag khrus byas pa'i chu la sha'i mthu yod pas de khyer la dengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:9355: rin po che 'di rnams yin no zhes bstan kyang /
NK043(pi)001:9356: rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor zhing
NK043(pi)001:9357: shang shang te'u de khyer nas rgyal po la phul
NK043(pi)001:9358: te ji skad gyur pa rnams kyang de bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:9359: smras so // rgyal pos shang shang te'u de la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9360: lha bdag gi khrus byas pa'i chab ni sha stobs can du bgyis pa lags so //
NK043(pi)001:9361: de nas rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos
NK043(pi)001:9362: bkang bar bzhag pa de srid du bya de khrus
NK043(pi)001:9363: byas nas ngal sos pa dang mod la khang pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9364: steng du 'phur nas 'jigs pa dang bral te smras
NK043(pi)001:9365: pa / re zhig thog mar bdag blun te /
NK043(pi)001:9366: phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go //
NK043(pi)001:9367: de nas rgyal po blun pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:9368: blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs /
NK043(pi)001:9370: ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul na rang sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:9371: lnga brgya gnas pa las de na gcig gzhogs phyed
NK043(pi)001:9372: skam par gyur la rang sangs rgyas de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:9373: tshe dang ldan pa ljongs su song la sman pa
NK043(pi)001:9376: skye bo mang pos mi 'dod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9377: yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos dang /
NK043(pi)001:9378: sems can thams cad la thun mong gi chos ni
NK043(pi)001:9379: 'di lta ste 'chi ba zhes bya ba de 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:9380: nas bdag nad dang bcas te 'khyer ba 'gyur na
NK043(pi)001:9383: de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gang zag skyes bu
NK043(pi)001:9384: tshul khrims dang ldan pa ji tsam du 'tsho ba
NK043(pi)001:9385: de tsam du bsod nams bsogs la /
NK043(pi)001:9386: ji tsam bsod nams bsags pa de tsam du mtho
NK043(pi)001:9387: ris su dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes skul ma btab
NK043(pi)001:9388: nas ljongs su bab ste rim gyis yul shi bi'i
NK043(pi)001:9389: dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas sman
NK043(pi)001:9390: pa la nad 'di la phan pa'i sman ston cig
NK043(pi)001:9391: / sman pas smras pa 'phags pa khyed kyi nad
NK043(pi)001:9392: 'di ji lta bar rgyal po'i sras kyi nad kyang
NK043(pi)001:9393: / de 'dra ste / lo bcu gnyis kyi bcud
NK043(pi)001:9394: thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyis bzhud la
NK043(pi)001:9395: / de 'dra ste / slongs shig / gal te thob na des 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:9396: rgyal po'i pho brang de'i sgor slong ba'i skye bo
NK043(pi)001:9397: dag byung na sbron pa'i slad du dril bu 'dogs
NK043(pi)001:9398: so // rang sangs rgyas de pho brang gi sgor song te dril bu de dkrol lo //
NK043(pi)001:9399: de nas rgyal bus pha ma la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:9400: yab yum slong ba zhig mchis kyis ci slong smros shig /
NK043(pi)001:9402: bu bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams
NK043(pi)001:9403: bsags te btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di 'thungs dang
NK043(pi)001:9404: / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba dri'o //
NK043(pi)001:9405: de ngo mtshar dang bkra shis bde legs su byas nas mar 'thung bar 'dod na /
NK043(pi)001:9406: slong ba po'i skye bo'i re ba yid la bcags
NK043(pi)001:9407: pas gnad du phog nas ma 'thungs par smras pa
NK043(pi)001:9408: / yab yum re zhig slong ba po nang du ma bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:9409: rgyal pos sgo ba la bsgos te slong ba po nang du btang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9410: rgyal bus 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed /
NK043(pi)001:9411: des rgyas par smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9413: 'phags pa bcud ni khyod kho na la 'os kyi bdag la ma lags pas dbul gyis bzhes shig /
NK043(pi)001:9414: des lhung bzed zed pa dang dga' ba'i bsam pa drag pos bcud der blugs so //
NK043(pi)001:9415: bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal bus sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9416: 'phags pa de yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon
NK043(pi)001:9417: lam 'grub par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir smon lam
NK043(pi)001:9418: btab ste rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas gnyis ka
NK043(pi)001:9419: nad las thar bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9420: rgyal po seng ge'i sras phan 'dod ces bya ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9421: rabs kyang 'di dang tshul 'dra la cung zad mi
NK043(pi)001:9422: 'dra ba'i khyad par yod pa zhig kyang yod do
NK043(pi)001:9423: // sngon b+aa ra n+aa sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin
NK043(pi)001:9424: zhes bya bar gyur pa snying brtse can des rang
NK043(pi)001:9425: gi blon po lnga brgya so so rgyal po la
NK043(pi)001:9426: kha zer ba'i gleng ba thos nas rgyal pos 'di
NK043(pi)001:9427: rnams bsad de ci rung snyam du snying rje'i sems
NK043(pi)001:9428: kyis ma bsad par yul nas bton la bye gling
NK043(pi)001:9430: de rnams skoms pas nyen kyang chu ma mthong nas skad phyung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9431: phyogs der bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:9432: glang po che mchog cig tu gyur pas mthong bas
NK043(pi)001:9433: sna chus bkang ste brgyugs nas blon po de rnams
NK043(pi)001:9434: kyi kha bshal te rang gi rgyab tu zhon bcug
NK043(pi)001:9435: nas ri sul du bskyal zhing 'bab chu dang 'bras
NK043(pi)001:9436: bu dang rtsa bas tshim par byas nas smras pa
NK043(pi)001:9437: / ri 'di'i pha rol na glang po che'i gtso bo zhig gi ro yod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:9438: de'i rgyu lto bkrus la chus bkang ste rtsa ba
NK043(pi)001:9439: dang 'bras bu bsdus la dengs shig dang de ltar
NK043(pi)001:9440: na 'brog 'di brgal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan nas
NK043(pi)001:9441: / glang po che de ri de la 'dzegs nas
NK043(pi)001:9442: ji ltar bdag gis nyam thag 'di dag bskyabs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9443: thabs bstan cing rang gi srog btang ba bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:9444: bdag sangs rgyas nas 'di dag bdag gis 'khor ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9445: 'brog dgon pa las bsgral bar gyur cig ces smras
NK043(pi)001:9446: / te / ri de'i kha nas mchongs pas shi bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9447: blon po rnams kyis btsal ba na de mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:9448: bdag cag la srog sbyin pa'i glang po khar sang
NK043(pi)001:9449: gi de 'di yin na 'di'i steng du lag pa
NK043(pi)001:9450: bzhag na bdag cag gi lag pa sa la ci
NK043(pi)001:9451: ste mi lhung zhes gleng ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9452: de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lhas bdag nyid chen po
NK043(pi)001:9453: 'dis gang gi don srog gtang ba'i yid la re
NK043(pi)001:9454: ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:9455: de nas de rnams kyis glang po de'i rgyu lto
NK043(pi)001:9456: bkrus te chus bkang nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:9457: rnams khyer / glang po de'i rol mchod pa byas
NK043(pi)001:9458: te 'brog brtol nas bdag nyid chen po 'di sangs
NK043(pi)001:9459: rgyas pa'i tshe na bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral
NK043(pi)001:9461: sngon 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer b+aa r+aa na
NK043(pi)001:9462: sir bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid rgyal po pad+ma zhes
NK043(pi)001:9463: bya bar skye ba bzhes nas sems can thams cad
NK043(pi)001:9464: la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams pas bskyangs zhing
NK043(pi)001:9465: gtong ba dang gtong ba chen por zhugs par byas
NK043(pi)001:9466: so // de'i tshe dus tshigs ma snyoms pas mi nad chen po byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:9467: sems can skya rbab kyi nad kyis btab pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9468: rgyal po des snying rje bskyed nas sman pa thams
NK043(pi)001:9469: cad bsdus shing sman gyis gso bar byas kyang yun
NK043(pi)001:9470: ring por sems can de dag gso ma nus nas
NK043(pi)001:9471: / sman pa rnams kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:9472: sman sna gcig mchis pa ni nya ro hi ta
NK043(pi)001:9473: zhes pa de rnyed na gso nus kyi gzhan gang
NK043(pi)001:9474: gis gso mi nus so zhes smras pa bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:9475: rgyal pos nya ro hi ta kun tu btsal kyang ma rnyed do //
NK043(pi)001:9476: phyis zhig na rgyal po 'chag tu gshegs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9477: nad pa de dag 'dus te rgyal po la bdag
NK043(pi)001:9478: cag nad 'di las bskyab cing srog stsal du gsol
NK043(pi)001:9479: zhes zhus so // rgyal po des de rnams la snying rje bskyed cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:9480: bdag gis gzhan sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams zhi bar byed ma nus na /
NK043(pi)001:9481: 'tsho ba dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'dis ci dgos snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:9482: nor phal po che yongs su gtong bar byas /
NK043(pi)001:9483: bu thu bo rgyal por bcug cing nye du dang skye bo rnams la nyes pa bshags /
NK043(pi)001:9484: pho brang gi mi dang blon po rnams spro ba sring bas bstod /
NK043(pi)001:9485: nad pa sdug pa rnams dbugs dbyung /
NK043(pi)001:9486: brtul zhugs yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas khang
NK043(pi)001:9487: bzang gi steng du song ste me tog dang bdug
NK043(pi)001:9488: pa sogs gtor nas shar du kha bltas te smon
NK043(pi)001:9489: lam btab la / bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
NK043(pi)001:9490: gang gis sems can shin tu phongs pa rnams nad
NK043(pi)001:9491: kyis gzir ba mthong nas rang gi srog phongs pa
NK043(pi)001:9492: btang ba 'dis bdag chu klung zlog byed 'di'i nang
NK043(pi)001:9493: du nya ro hi tar skye bar shog ces smras
NK043(pi)001:9494: te khang bzang gi steng nas bdag nyid mchongs so
NK043(pi)001:9495: lam btab la / // der lhung ba'i mod la
NK043(pi)001:9496: shi nas chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya
NK043(pi)001:9498: der lha rnams kyis yul kun tu nya ro hi
NK043(pi)001:9499: ta chu klung zlog byed du skyes pa des nad
NK043(pi)001:9500: tshabs bo ches yun ring gzir ba rnams kyi bdud
NK043(pi)001:9502: de thos ma thag tu skye bo rnams mtshon dang
NK043(pi)001:9503: rkon pa thogs te nya gson po de'i sha gcod
NK043(pi)001:9505: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar lus gcod pa na
NK043(pi)001:9506: sems can de dag la byams pas khyab par byas
NK043(pi)001:9507: nas gdong mchi ma dron mo 'dzag cing /
NK043(pi)001:9508: bdag gis sha khrag gis sems can 'di dag bde
NK043(pi)001:9509: bar 'gyur ba ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do
NK043(pi)001:9510: snyam du de ltar lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du
NK043(pi)001:9511: rang gi sha khrag gis sems can de dag tshim
NK043(pi)001:9512: par byas te bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
NK043(pi)001:9514: gang gi tshe sems can de thams cad nad zhi
NK043(pi)001:9515: bar gyur pa de'i tshe nya ro hi ta des
NK043(pi)001:9516: bsgrags pa / kye sems can dag khyod nyon cig /
NK043(pi)001:9517: nga ni rgyal po pad+ma zhes bya ba de yin te /
NK043(pi)001:9518: ngas khyod kyi don du rang gi srog yongs su
NK043(pi)001:9519: btang nas lus 'di lta bu blangs pa yin gyis
NK043(pi)001:9520: / nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /
NK043(pi)001:9521: gang gi tshe nga bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK043(pi)001:9522: 'thob pa'i tshe yang khyed nad las gtan du thar
NK043(pi)001:9523: bar bya ste / mya ngan las 'das pa gzhan
NK043(pi)001:9524: gang gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba
NK043(pi)001:9527: de skad thos nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag dang /
NK043(pi)001:9528: rgyal blon 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis me tog sogs kyis mchod nas smon lam btab pa /
NK043(pi)001:9529: shin tu dka' ba byed pa khyod 'tshang rgya ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9530: tshe na bdag cag khyod kyi nyan thos su gyur
NK043(pi)001:9531: cig ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:9532: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK043(pi)001:9533: grong khyer b+aa r+aa na sir rgyal po tshangs pas
NK043(pi)001:9534: byin zhes bya bar gyur pa chos bzhin du rgyal
NK043(pi)001:9535: srid byed pa 'byor zhing bde ba /
NK043(pi)001:9536: nad dang mu ge nang 'khrugs sogs med pa /
NK043(pi)001:9537: rgyal po de yang chos 'dod cing snying rje che ba gtong ba la gnas pa zhig go //
NK043(pi)001:9538: der dus phyi zhig na bar gyi bskal pa dang
NK043(pi)001:9539: 'dra bar mu ge chen po byung nas mi rnams
NK043(pi)001:9540: yi dwags dang 'dra bar gyur nas rgyal po la
NK043(pi)001:9542: rgyal pos mdzod na ci yod pa'i zas skom la gzhal te rtsis pa mkhas pas rtsis nas /
NK043(pi)001:9543: mi thams cad nyin re bzhin kham re re dang
NK043(pi)001:9544: rgyal po la khams gnyis re gsol bar byas so
NK043(pi)001:9545: // der rtsis la ma gtogs pa'i bram ze gcig lhags pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9546: rgyal po'i kham gnyis las gcig byin pas rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:9547: dang yul mi thams cad nyin re kham re za
NK043(pi)001:9548: bar byas so // de'i tshe lha'i dbang pos rgyal
NK043(pi)001:9549: po 'di ltar dka' ba byed pa de bgam par
NK043(pi)001:9550: bya'o snyam du bram ze'i cha lugs su byas nas
NK043(pi)001:9551: bar byas so // / go la bab pa'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:9552: rgyal po la nyid kyi kham gcig po de bdag
NK043(pi)001:9554: rgyal pos rang gi srog yongs su btang ste kham
NK043(pi)001:9555: gcig po bram ze la byin no de ltar nyin
NK043(pi)001:9556: gcig nas zhag drug gi zan bcad kyang skye bo
NK043(pi)001:9557: gzhan zan za bar mthong nas dga' bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:9558: // lha'i dbang pos rgyal po de ltar shin tu dka' ba byed pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:9560: skye dgu skyong ba 'di lta bu yod pas skye bo mgon dang bcas pa ste legs so //
NK043(pi)001:9561: khyod kyi dka' ba 'dis bdag mnyes so //
NK043(pi)001:9562: da sa bon thams cad thob ces yul thams cad du bsgo bar gyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:9563: bdag gis zhag bdun na 'bru rnams rgyas par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:9564: ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char pa dbab
NK043(pi)001:9565: par bya'o zhes smras pa bzhin char bab ste mu
NK043(pi)001:9566: ge med par lo legs shing bde bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:9567: // yang bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po zhi ldan
NK043(pi)001:9568: zhes bya bar gyur nas snying rje chen pos thams
NK043(pi)001:9569: cad gtong ba la zhugs te /
NK043(pi)001:9570: mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang du zas skom dang gos
NK043(pi)001:9571: dang rin po che sogs ci 'dod pa ster ba
NK043(pi)001:9574: blon po dang yul gyi mi rnams la yang ci
NK043(pi)001:9575: 'dod par byin yang bsod nams kyis chog ma shes
NK043(pi)001:9576: par bdag gis mi rnams tshim par byas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:9577: srog chags phra mo rnams lus pa de rnams ci zhig gis tshim par bya snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:9578: rang la bdog pa thams cad btang bas gos ya
NK043(pi)001:9579: gcig las med par rang lus sbyin par bsams nas
NK043(pi)001:9580: lus po bzhogs shing sha sbrang sogs yod sar lus
NK043(pi)001:9581: bor te 'dug nas khrag gis tshim par byas so
NK043(pi)001:9582: // de bgam pa'i phyir brgya byin bya rgod nag por sprul te /
NK043(pi)001:9583: mig bru bar gzas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9584: rgyal po mi skrag par nga'i lus las ci 'dod pa longs zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:9585: de nas brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs kyis mig bslangs pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9586: nges smras pa nga'i lus 'di la 'gog pa su
NK043(pi)001:9587: yang med kyis khyeer cig ces byas pas brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:9588: rang gi gzugs bstan te bstod cing basngagasa par byas
NK043(pi)001:9589: so // yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK043(pi)001:9590: rgyal po'i pho brang ut+pala dang ldan pa zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:9591: so // ba'i phyogs su / grong khyer gyi gtso
NK043(pi)001:9592: bo'i bud med lha mo dang 'dra ba'i gzugs ldan
NK043(pi)001:9593: ma zhes bya bar skye ba bzhes pa'i tshe na
NK043(pi)001:9594: gzhan phan la brtson par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9595: dus zhig na yul der char med cing sa skam
NK043(pi)001:9596: por gyur pas mu ge'i nyen pa chen po byung
NK043(pi)001:9597: ste sems can rnams shin tu nyam thag pa'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:9598: na / der bud med dbul mo bu byung ba
NK043(pi)001:9599: shin tu rid pa bkres pa drag pos rang gi
NK043(pi)001:9600: bu bza' bar 'dod pa zhig mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9601: des de la sring mo shin tu mi bzad pa'i las byed dam zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9602: bud med des 'di ni sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can
NK043(pi)001:9603: no snyam du rang gi gnas skabs ji ltar bar
NK043(pi)001:9604: smras te bu bza' bar 'dod do zhes byas pa
NK043(pi)001:9605: la / des shin tu snying rje zhing mchi ma
NK043(pi)001:9606: klag ste bu bzar mi 'os pa'i gtam smras kyang
NK043(pi)001:9607: de bkres pas mi bzar mi bzod do zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:9608: la / pa la / gzugs ldan mas bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:9609: gal te khyim du song ste bza' bar blangs na
NK043(pi)001:9610: 'di bkres pas de'i bar du bu za bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:9611: la / bu 'di bdag gis khyer te song na
NK043(pi)001:9612: 'di bkres pas shi yang srid do snyam du bsams
NK043(pi)001:9613: nas rang gi lus las snying rje len pa'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:9614: 'di la sha khrag sbyin no snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:9615: der bud med des gzugs ldan ma la khyod 'dir
NK043(pi)001:9616: 'dug bzhin bdag gis byis pa bzar mi spobs pas
NK043(pi)001:9618: gzugs ldan mas khyod la mtshon cung zad yod na longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:9620: rang gi nu ma gser gyi bum pa lta bu
NK043(pi)001:9621: gnyis bcad nas de la byin nas rang gi khyim
NK043(pi)001:9622: du song ngo // de'i lus dang mu tig gi do shal sogs khrag gis gos par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:9623: rang gi khyim thab stan las langs te /
NK043(pi)001:9624: ci'i phyir nu ma bcad ces dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9625: des kyang ji ltar gyur pa bshad de /
NK043(pi)001:9626: bkres pas nyen pa'i bud med de la bza' btung sbyin par 'os zhes smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:9627: des kyang de ltar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9628: de ltar gzugs ldan ma'i ngo mtshar ba skye bo'i tshogs kyis gleng bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9629: khyim thab des 'di snyam du ji ltar skyes pa
NK043(pi)001:9630: gzhan gyis kyang sbyin pa 'di 'dra mi nus pas
NK043(pi)001:9631: na bden pa des 'di'i nu ma sngar ltar shog
NK043(pi)001:9632: ces brjod pa'i mod la sngar ltar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9633: de nas lha'i bdag pos 'jig rten thams cad kyi
NK043(pi)001:9634: gtong ba las lhag par gyur pa'i gzugs ldan ma
NK043(pi)001:9635: 'di lha'i grong khyer du khrid de rang nyid kyis
NK043(pi)001:9636: bdag tu byed 'dod pas mngon par 'dod pa'i bram
NK043(pi)001:9638: slong mo'i zol gyis gzugs ldan ma'i khyim du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9639: des bza' btung bzang po khyer ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9641: khyod kyi nu ma btang ba'i snyan grags 'jig rten du khyab par gyur na /
NK043(pi)001:9642: dka' ba 'dis lha'i dbang po'i gnas sogs ci zhig don du gnyer /
NK043(pi)001:9644: bdag ni bla med byang chub 'dod pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:9645: bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa nyid du gyur
NK043(pi)001:9646: cig ces brjod pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dngos por
NK043(pi)001:9647: gyur te / brgya byin rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9648: der byang chub sems dpa' gzugs ldan zhes ming grags so //
NK043(pi)001:9649: yul de'i rgyal po sras med par grong pa'i tshe blon po sogs kyis gros byas te /
NK043(pi)001:9650: gzhon nu gzugs ldan 'di la rgyal po'i mtshan thams
NK043(pi)001:9651: cad tshang pas 'di rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o
NK043(pi)001:9652: zhes byas te rgyal por byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9653: des chos bzhin khrims kyis sa thams cad bskyangs zhing
NK043(pi)001:9654: skye dgu rnams bde zhing char 'bebs pa sogs dus
NK043(pi)001:9655: tshigs legs par rgyu bas thams cad dar bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:9656: pa'i tshe / sa skyong de seng ge'i khri la
NK043(pi)001:9657: 'dug nas skye bo thams cad la bdag gis sbyin
NK043(pi)001:9658: pa byas pa'i rnam smin gyis tshe 'dir skyes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9659: dngos po thob pa sogs ni me tog tsam zhig
NK043(pi)001:9660: pa'i tshe / ste / pha rol du ni 'bras
NK043(pi)001:9661: bu rgya chen po sangs rgyas 'byung bas na su
NK043(pi)001:9662: zhig tshul khrims dang sbyin pa'i bsod nams la gus
NK043(pi)001:9663: par mi byed ces chos bstan pas skye dgu rnams
NK043(pi)001:9664: dge ba'i lam la bkod par mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:9665: yang sngon gyi tshe rnam thos bu dang 'dra ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9666: tshong dpon gyi rigs chen po zla 'od ces bya
NK043(pi)001:9667: ba zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe sbyin gtong rgya chen
NK043(pi)001:9668: po byas shing / yon tan can gyi bla ma rnams las /
NK043(pi)001:9669: bstan bcos dang snyan ngag thams cad la bslabs pas
NK043(pi)001:9670: mkhas pa'i grags pa'i 'od zer kun tu khyab par
NK043(pi)001:9672: rang gi bla ma'i 'khor lnga brgyas khyod brtse ba
NK043(pi)001:9673: che bas gal te srog slong ba byung na'ang ster
NK043(pi)001:9674: ro snyam mo zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9676: slong ba po ni sbyin pa po la phan khyad
NK043(pi)001:9677: par du gdags pa yin pas de la ci'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:9678: mi brtse ste bartse'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:9680: khyod de ltar sbyin na dbang po dang 'khor sgyur sogs ci zhig 'dod /
NK043(pi)001:9681: des smras pa bdag ni 'khor ba'i bde ba mi brtan pa mi 'dod de /
NK043(pi)001:9682: sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ched du bla med
NK043(pi)001:9683: byang chub 'dod do zhes smras pa la de dag
NK043(pi)001:9685: dus zhig na bdag nyid chen po des bdag gis slong mo ba'i skye bo'i don byas te /
NK043(pi)001:9686: da ni rang gi sha khrag gis dud 'gro rnams
NK043(pi)001:9687: tshims par bya'o zhes mtshon cha dang sbrang rtsi dang
NK043(pi)001:9688: mar blangs te / gnyen 'dun rnams la ma smras
NK043(pi)001:9689: par mtshan mo'i dus su dur khrod du song nas
NK043(pi)001:9690: ro'i tshogs la brtags te chags pa dang bral bar
NK043(pi)001:9691: byas shing mtshon cha rnon pos rang gi yan lag
NK043(pi)001:9692: kun gzhogs te sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis byugs pas
NK043(pi)001:9693: 'dzag par byas nas grog spur rnams la zar bcug
NK043(pi)001:9694: mar blangs te / go // der 'dab chags drag
NK043(pi)001:9695: pos de'i mig brus nas de la slar smras pa
NK043(pi)001:9696: mar blangs te / go // / mig bton pas
NK043(pi)001:9697: sdug bsngal chen po myong ngam zhes smras pa la
NK043(pi)001:9698: mar blangs te / go // / / byang chub sems dpa' na re /
NK043(pi)001:9699: gal te su la mi mkho bar bdag gi lus bor na sdug bsngal gyis /
NK043(pi)001:9700: gang mkho bar gyur pas khyer ba la ni bdag
NK043(pi)001:9701: ci ste sdug bsngal te shin tu dga' ba myong
NK043(pi)001:9702: ngo // de nas bya rnams kyis zos nas sha zad de rus par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9703: de'i nang par gnyen gyi skye bo'i tshogs kyis tshol
NK043(pi)001:9704: zhing 'ongs pas pha des de mthong nas de la
NK043(pi)001:9705: dris pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa bshad pas de mya ngan gyis 'gyel to //
NK043(pi)001:9706: der des smre sngags sna tshogs 'don zhing byang chub
NK043(pi)001:9707: sems dpa'i rus pa bsregs te rang gi khyim du
NK043(pi)001:9708: song ngo // der lha'i rol mo'i sgra dang me tog gi char babs so //
NK043(pi)001:9709: yang bcom ldan 'das 'di bram ze gzhon nu sprin
NK043(pi)001:9710: lung bstan pa'i mdo la chos kyi lung thob par
NK043(pi)001:9711: gyur nas / de'i 'og tu brgya byin mig mdzes zhes bya bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9712: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nad chen po'i bskal pa bar
NK043(pi)001:9713: ma byung nas lus la rma sogs gsor mi rung
NK043(pi)001:9714: ba'i nad sna tshogs byung ba na mgon dang skyabs
NK043(pi)001:9715: med nas sgra chen po byung ste lha klu sogs
NK043(pi)001:9716: la gsol ba btab pa brgya byin des snying rje'i
NK043(pi)001:9717: sems kyis nges pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags su
NK043(pi)001:9718: sprul nas / de dag gis sha blangs te zos
NK043(pi)001:9719: na nad las thar bar 'gyur bas 'jigs pa med
NK043(pi)001:9720: par longs shig ces sgra byung bas /
NK043(pi)001:9721: mi thams cad kyis srog chags des ba de las
NK043(pi)001:9722: sha bcad cing blangs na yang de'i lus la bri
NK043(pi)001:9723: gang mi mngon par gyur cing 'dzam gling gi mi
NK043(pi)001:9724: thams cad nad sna tshogs byang nas bde ba la
NK043(pi)001:9725: 'god pa na / mi thams cad kyis srog chags
NK043(pi)001:9726: nges pa'i drung du 'tshogs nas khyod kyis bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:9727: nad las thar bar mdzad na /
NK043(pi)001:9728: bdag cag rnams kyis khyod la mchod pa ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:9729: srog chags des rang gi lus mi snang bar brgya byin gyi gzugs dngos su bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:9730: nga la ni grong dang grong khyer sogs mi dgos kyi /
NK043(pi)001:9731: khyed cag srog gcod pa sogs mi dge ba spong bar gyis shig dang /
NK043(pi)001:9732: des nga la mchod par 'gyur ro zhes byas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9733: thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba bzung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9734: srog chags des gsos pa'i sems can gcig kyang ngan
NK043(pi)001:9735: song du ma lhung bar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9736: lhar skyes so // sems can de dag theg pa gsum la smin par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9737: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku thob nas 'dul
NK043(pi)001:9738: ba tha dad pa'i tshul mig 'phrul lta bu'i rnam
NK043(pi)001:9740: de la sems pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9741: der byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku la yang 'pho 'gyur dang skye 'gag med par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:9742: yang sngon gyi tshe skyes bu rnam par rgyal ba
NK043(pi)001:9743: zhes bya bar gyur pa 'phong sogs bslab pa thams
NK043(pi)001:9744: cad mthar 'byin pa des yab 'das pa'i rjes su
NK043(pi)001:9746: thams cad la ci 'dod pa sbyin zhing dge bcu'i
NK043(pi)001:9747: lam la bkod pas lha'i gnas 'phel ba de'i mthu
NK043(pi)001:9749: brgya byin gyis de sang pa'i phyir sprul pas sha
NK043(pi)001:9750: dang khrag bslangs pa la rang gi sha khrag byin
NK043(pi)001:9751: cing mthar brgya byin des sman rnams bsdus nas lus
NK043(pi)001:9753: yang sngon tshong dpon du gyur pa na sbyin pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9754: grags pa phyogs su khyab cing der rang sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:9755: gcig de'i khyim du bsod snyoms bslangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9756: der bdud sdig can gyis de'i bar du sems can
NK043(pi)001:9757: dmyal ba chen po'i me 'bar ba zabs su mi
NK043(pi)001:9758: 'greng bdun yod pa 'jigs su rung bar sprul pas
NK043(pi)001:9759: / chung ma zhal zas 'bul du mngags pa phyir log ste skrag par gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9760: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'di bsod snyoms ma
NK043(pi)001:9761: bzhes par slar bzhud par mi rung snyam du rang
NK043(pi)001:9762: gi lag gis bza' bca' bzang po khyer te song
NK043(pi)001:9763: ba dang / bdud lha'i cha byad kyis sbyin pa
NK043(pi)001:9764: byin pa nor chud gsan pas lo du mar dmyal
NK043(pi)001:9765: ba'i me 'dir gnas so zhes sbyin pa las bzlog
NK043(pi)001:9766: ba dang / par byas kyang / de la khyod
NK043(pi)001:9767: kyis kho bo la phan pa'i phyir legs par smras
NK043(pi)001:9768: mod kyi bdag gi yid mi ldog go zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:9769: te the tshom med par me'i 'obs brgal nas phyin
NK043(pi)001:9770: pas me tog gi tshal du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9771: bdud skyengs par gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9772: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:9773: stobs po che zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe mchod
NK043(pi)001:9774: sbyin chen po bshams nas zas dang gos dang rin
NK043(pi)001:9775: po che sogs nor thams cad dang /
NK043(pi)001:9776: bu dang bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa sogs so
NK043(pi)001:9777: so rang rang ci 'dod pas sbyin pa rgya cher
NK043(pi)001:9778: btang ba la / de'i tshe lhas byin lha'i dbang
NK043(pi)001:9779: por gyur pa des mchod sbyin la bar chad bya
NK043(pi)001:9780: ba'i phyir bram ze zhig tu sprul nas rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:9781: de'i yan lag bslangs pa la bcad nas byin kyang
NK043(pi)001:9782: btang ba la / / bsam pa dag pa'i stobs kyis lus snga ma ltar sos so //
NK043(pi)001:9783: lha'i dbang po de mchod sbyin gzhig pa'i bsam ngan
NK043(pi)001:9784: des bsod nams zad nas dmyal ba mnar med du
NK043(pi)001:9785: skyes so // yang sngon tshong dpon zil gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:9786: non par gyur pa zhes phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen
NK043(pi)001:9787: du gyur pa des ci 'dod pa byin yang zad
NK043(pi)001:9788: du dogs pa'i sems ma skyes pa la brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:9789: gyis bgam pa'i phyir de'i nor thams cad mi snang
NK043(pi)001:9790: bar byas te thag pa dang zor ba zhig bzhag
NK043(pi)001:9791: skyes so // go // des de ltar mthong ba
NK043(pi)001:9792: dang longs spyod gzhan med kyang des thag pa dang
NK043(pi)001:9793: zor ba des nyin bzhin r+ts+wa btsongs pa'i rin gyis
NK043(pi)001:9794: phongs pa rnams mgu bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9795: de nas brgya byin gyis de rab tu dbul bar
NK043(pi)001:9796: gyur kyang zhum pa med par sbyin pa la dga'
NK043(pi)001:9797: ba mthong nas rang gi lus yang mngon du bstan
NK043(pi)001:9798: nas / 'di skad du khyim bdag khyod sbyin la dpa' ches te /
NK043(pi)001:9799: 'di tsam sbyin pa la ma chags par gyis dang 'byor pa thob par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:9800: des smras pa bdag rab tu phongs kyang ma rabs
NK043(pi)001:9801: kyi chos bya mi nus te ser sna'i sems byung
NK043(pi)001:9802: na nor de bdag la med kyang sla'i slong ba
NK043(pi)001:9803: pa'i sdug bsngal mthong nas med ces smrar mi nus
NK043(pi)001:9806: khyim bdag khyod 'byor zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang
NK043(pi)001:9807: don ma grub par gzhan la sbyin pa 'dod par
NK043(pi)001:9808: nongs te re zhig sbyin pa thong la nor sog
NK043(pi)001:9809: cig / 'byor pa med par sbyin pa ni mi rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:9811: bdag rang don 'dod na 'byor ba spangs nas sbyin dgos la /
NK043(pi)001:9812: 'byor pas mtho ris sogs mi 'grub kyi sbyin pas 'grub bo //
NK043(pi)001:9813: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal la ci mi snyam du bdag
NK043(pi)001:9814: gi bde ba mi myong ngo zhes sogs smras te
NK043(pi)001:9815: / yid phyir mi zlog pa mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:9816: brgya byin dga' nas khyod kyi nor rnams bdag gis sbas te /
NK043(pi)001:9817: ngas rjes su bzung bas khyod kyi nor zad par
NK043(pi)001:9818: yang mi 'gyur la sbyin pa byos so zhes bzod
NK043(pi)001:9819: par gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:9820: to // yang sngon gyi tshe na rgyal po'i bu
NK043(pi)001:9821: mo thub pa zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:9822: rin chen gtsug phud kyi dus su mar me'i yo
NK043(pi)001:9823: byad sbyar bas sangs rgyas su lung bstan cing /
NK043(pi)001:9824: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na'ang mar me mang pos mchod
NK043(pi)001:9825: pa byung ngo zhes gsungs pa sogs kyis mtshon nas
NK043(pi)001:9826: sangs rgyas du ma la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:9827: mdo sde rtogs brjod brgya pa sogs las 'byung ba
NK043(pi)001:9828: bzhin dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas tshad med grangs
NK043(pi)001:9829: med la bde ba'i yo byad tshad med pa thams
NK043(pi)001:9830: cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i tshul rgya cher mdo
NK043(pi)001:9832: yang khyim bdag sdums byed du skyes nas /
NK043(pi)001:9833: drang srong nyis stong la mu ge byung ba'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:9834: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zas skom sbyar ba
NK043(pi)001:9835: dang / khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:9836: rang sangs rgyas stong la mu ge'i tshe lo bcu gnyis kyi 'tsho ba sbyar ba dang //
NK043(pi)001:9837: rgyal po phur bu'i lhas bram ze khri phrag brgyad
NK043(pi)001:9838: cu la lo khri'i bar du gser gyi stan bting
NK043(pi)001:9839: zhing gser gyi snod nas nad so so zhi ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9840: kha zas yid dang mthun pas mchod sbyin chen po
NK043(pi)001:9841: byas pa dang / yang ko sa li'i mi bdag
NK043(pi)001:9842: tu gyur pa'i tshe sngon gla mir gyur pas zan
NK043(pi)001:9843: dron gcig dge slong bzhi sde la phul bas da
NK043(pi)001:9844: lta rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po thob pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:9845: dran nas 'di ni sngon gyi sbyin pa de'i myu
NK043(pi)001:9846: gu tsam zhig yin tshul gyi tshigs bcad smras shing
NK043(pi)001:9847: sbyin sogs bsod nams chen po byas pa'i tshul skyes
NK043(pi)001:9848: rabs so bzhi par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:9849: gzhon nu nor bzang du gyur pa'ii tshe na mi'am
NK043(pi)001:9850: ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma'i ched du brtson 'grus
NK043(pi)001:9851: chen pos mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas su song ste
NK043(pi)001:9852: yig 'phrog ma phyir bkug nas lo bcu gnyis su
NK043(pi)001:9853: gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa sogs byang
NK043(pi)001:9854: chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i rabs rnams tshad med pa
NK043(pi)001:9855: las cung zad cig mdo sde las bstan pa dag
NK043(pi)001:9856: las 'dir ni cha shas tsam brjod pa'o //
NK043(pi)001:9858: da sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9859: rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pa yang med na nor la lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:9860: longs spyod kyi dngos po la 'di ni bdag gi ba'i 'du shes med cing /
NK043(pi)001:9861: dngos po 'di dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong ste /
NK043(pi)001:9862: bdag 'di la skal ba yod pa ji lta bar
NK043(pi)001:9863: sems can thams cad la yang skal ba yod do
NK043(pi)001:9864: snyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye
NK043(pi)001:9865: bar gyur kyang bdag la skal ba yod do mi
NK043(pi)001:9866: snyam pa dang / sems par / longs spyod 'di
NK043(pi)001:9867: ni sems can thams cad kyi yin pas bdag la
NK043(pi)001:9868: skal ba ci yang med do snyam du sems pa
NK043(pi)001:9870: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang nye bar gyur pa thob kyang de la mngon par zhen pa'ang med /
NK043(pi)001:9871: yongs su sdud cing len par mi byed pas dang du len pa med pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9872: stong pa'i chos dang nye bar zhi ba'i chos la mos par byed kyi /
NK043(pi)001:9874: dngos po'i chos dang gzod nas yod pa nyid du mos par mi byed do //
NK043(pi)001:9876: yang sngon rgyal po shud do lag gar ni zhes
NK043(pi)001:9877: pa rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang bar
NK043(pi)001:9878: gyur pa'i tshe / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi
NK043(pi)001:9879: 'bab pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mu ge
NK043(pi)001:9880: byung nas phal cher tshe 'phos pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9881: rgyal po des smon lam btab ste g.yang kha nas lus bor bas /
NK043(pi)001:9882: bardzusa te skyes pa'i nya chen po lus dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig tu gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:9883: nya des mi skad du khyed cag bkres na nga'i
NK043(pi)001:9884: sha longs shig ces bsgo bas mi thams cad kyis
NK043(pi)001:9885: sha bcad de zos pa slar skyes te lo bcu
NK043(pi)001:9886: gnyis kyi bar du ma zad par thams cad tshims
NK043(pi)001:9887: par byas la / sha zos pa thams cad mtho ris su skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:9888: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po mig 'byed ces bya
NK043(pi)001:9889: ba rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed
NK043(pi)001:9890: pas / rang gi mdzod thams cad sbyin par btang zhing /
NK043(pi)001:9891: rgyal phran rnams la bsgos te sbyin du bcug cing /
NK043(pi)001:9892: de'i tshe bka' mi nyan pa'i mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal
NK043(pi)001:9893: phran zhig bka' 'og tu gzhug pa'i phyir blon po
NK043(pi)001:9894: lo dar zhes bya bas dmag byed par brtsams pa
NK043(pi)001:9895: dang / rgyal phran de skrag nas mnga' 'og gi
NK043(pi)001:9896: long ba zhig la mig ya gcig slong du btang
NK043(pi)001:9897: ba la spyan byin nas bram ze long ba de'i
NK043(pi)001:9898: mig tu bcug ste bden tshig gi smon lam brjod
NK043(pi)001:9899: pa'i mod la mthong bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:9900: bram ze dga' nas mig 'dis chog gi ya gcig mi dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:9902: kho bos mig gnyis ka khyod la sbyin no zhes smras pas gcig po yang byin te /
NK043(pi)001:9903: smon lam btab pas bram ze'i mig gnyis kas mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9904: brgya byin gyis dris shing bgam pa la bden stobs
NK043(pi)001:9905: brjod pas rgyal po'i spyan gnyis kyang sngar bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:9906: gyur cing bram ze de la rin po che dag
NK043(pi)001:9907: kyang bstsal te phyir dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9908: der rgyal phran des dris pa na de ltar gyur
NK043(pi)001:9909: pa brjod pas rgyal phran pas la dbar zhes pa
NK043(pi)001:9910: de snying gas nas tshe 'phos par gyur ba dang
NK043(pi)001:9911: / yang rgyal po bsod nams stobs zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:9912: gyur pa'i tshe rgyal po rang nyid kyis nad pa
NK043(pi)001:9913: thams cad la rim gro dang sman dpyad byas te
NK043(pi)001:9914: nad thams cad las thar bar byas shing lha'i dbang
NK043(pi)001:9915: po long ba'i gzugs kyi spyan ya gcig bslangs pa
NK043(pi)001:9916: la mig gnyis ka byin nas slar yang bden pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9917: stobs kyis sngar bzhin sos so //
NK043(pi)001:9918: yang sngon dgon pa'i gnas zhig tu ri bong du
NK043(pi)001:9919: gyur pa'i tshe na sram dang ce spyang dang spre'u
NK043(pi)001:9920: la sogs pa'i srog chags mang po rnams kyi slob
NK043(pi)001:9921: ma dang bcas te phan tshun byams pas gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:9922: de'i grags pa lha yul du yang grags so //
NK043(pi)001:9923: tshes bco lngar de 'khor dang bcas pa gso sbyong
NK043(pi)001:9924: la gnas shing rigs par rnyed pa'i zas kyis glo
NK043(pi)001:9925: bur ba'i mgron byung na srog gzung bar rigs so
NK043(pi)001:9926: zhes smras pa bzhin du kun gyis nyan to //
NK043(pi)001:9927: de nas ri bong des bsams pas glo bur ba'i
NK043(pi)001:9928: mgron byung na de dag gis cir yang rung bas
NK043(pi)001:9929: mgron byar yod la bdag gis cir yang byar med
NK043(pi)001:9930: de / sos bcad pa'i rtsa yi myu gu ni sbyin du mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:9931: de bas na mgron gcig byung na rang gi lus 'dis mgron bya snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:9932: de'i ngo mtshar lha rnams kyis bsgrags pa brgya byin
NK043(pi)001:9933: gyis thos nas bram ze ltog pa zhig tu sprul
NK043(pi)001:9934: te la ma nor zhing nyi ma tsha bas nyan
NK043(pi)001:9935: pa nyam thag pa skad byas te dus pa la
NK043(pi)001:9936: / ri bong des dbugs da byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:9937: slob ma'i nang nas zhag dang por sram gyis nya ro bdun rnyed pas mgron byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9938: phyi nyin ce spyang gis sbyin gor gcig dang zho
NK043(pi)001:9939: rdzu'u gcig gzhan gyis bor ba rnyed pas gsos so
NK043(pi)001:9940: // de nas spre'usa shing thog a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa so sor dag byin no //
NK043(pi)001:9941: de nas ri bong gis rang gis lus sbyin par brtsams pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9942: brgya byin gyis me'i phung po sprul pas me de mthong nas dga' ste /
NK043(pi)001:9943: pad+ma'i mtsho la ngang pa bzhin du me de'i nang du mchongs so //
NK043(pi)001:9944: brgya byin rang gi gzugs su byas te bstod cing
NK043(pi)001:9945: rang gi lag pas blangs nas sum cu rtsa gsum
NK043(pi)001:9946: pa'i lha rnams la bstan te basngagasa pa brjod /
NK043(pi)001:9947: khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9948: 'dun sa tshes bzang gi khang brtsegs dang /
NK043(pi)001:9949: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ri bong gi gzugs bris pa deng sang gi bar du'ang gsal to //
NK043(pi)001:9950: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid gcan
NK043(pi)001:9951: gzan kun tar skyes pa'i tshe na de'i pags pa
NK043(pi)001:9952: gser gyi mdog can 'dod pa'i phyir tshol du btang
NK043(pi)001:9953: ba'i rngon pa bkres pas nyam thag pa zhig srog
NK043(pi)001:9954: chags des bskyabs te shing thog dang chus 'tsho bar
NK043(pi)001:9955: byas nas rngon pa de mi dga' bar mthong ba
NK043(pi)001:9956: la de'i rgyu dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:9957: des khyod kyi pags pa'i ched du 'ongs so zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:9958: srog chags de dga' ba'i yiid kyis bdag gi pags
NK043(pi)001:9959: pa bshus te khyer cig ces byas nas pags pa
NK043(pi)001:9960: khyer ba dang / de'i sha zos pa'i sbrang ma
NK043(pi)001:9961: sogs srog chags rnams mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so
NK043(pi)001:9962: khyer ba dang / // yang rus sbal du gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:9963: rgya mtshor gru zhig pa'i tshong pa lnga brgya rang
NK043(pi)001:9964: gi rgyab tu bzhag ste rgya mtsho las bde bar
NK043(pi)001:9965: brgal bar byas nas rus sbal de gnyid log pa
NK043(pi)001:9966: la srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri 'ongs te
NK043(pi)001:9967: de'i lus zos pas sad par gyur kyang srog chags
NK043(pi)001:9968: de dag la gnod par dogs pas ma 'gul bar
NK043(pi)001:9969: zar bcug ste bla med byang chub kyi phyir smon
NK043(pi)001:9971: yang sngon khung zhig na srog chags skyin gor byams pa'i bdag nyid can du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:9972: rngon pa zhig gis de'i pags pa bshus te btang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:9973: de na tsha che bas chu 'gram bsil ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:9974: tu nyal ba la grog tshang zhig gi grog ma
NK043(pi)001:9976: des thar bar nus mod kyi sems can 'di snyed
NK043(pi)001:9977: ma rungs par 'gyur ro snyam du brtags nas ma
NK043(pi)001:9978: 'gul bar sha thams cad zar bcug ste bla med
NK043(pi)001:9979: byang chub kyi phyir smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:9980: yang klu gzhon nu tsam pa ka zhes bya ba
NK043(pi)001:9981: dad pa bzang zhing dge sems can du gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:9982: des tshes brgyad dang bcur bzhir gso sbyong blangs nas
NK043(pi)001:9983: gnas gzhan du lus chen por byas te lus la
NK043(pi)001:9984: mi blta bar lus btang nas gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:9985: der lo nyes byung nas gnag rdzi sogs mi mang
NK043(pi)001:9986: pos klu'i sha bcad de zos shing de ltar mang
NK043(pi)001:9987: po rang gi shas tshim par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:9988: yang rgyal bu dge don zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK043(pi)001:9989: tshe blon po sgra gcan 'khus pa'i dmag gis 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:9990: nas lam ring por bros pas rgyags chad par gyur
NK043(pi)001:9991: pas rang gi pha ma la lus byin nas dgon
NK043(pi)001:9992: pa las thar pa'i tshul drin las bsabs pa'i mdo
NK043(pi)001:9994: yang rgyal bu me tog ces bya ba mdzes shing
NK043(pi)001:9995: rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang ldan pa rkya
NK043(pi)001:9996: rbab kyi nad kyis zin pa la rang gi rkang
NK043(pi)001:9997: brus te lus la byugs pas nad de sos par
NK043(pi)001:9998: gyur pa sogs bcom ldan 'das 'dis sngon mig dang
NK043(pi)001:9999: khrag dang rkang lag la sogs pa bla med byang
NK043(pi)001:10000: chub thob pa'i phyir du byin pa ni grangs dang
NK043(pi)001:10002: rgya mtsho chen po chus yongs su gang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10003: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rdul ni tshad bzung nus kyi /
NK043(pi)001:10004: byang chub sems dpas mig la sogs pa byin pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10005: grangs ni tshad bzung mi nus so zhes mdo las
NK043(pi)001:10006: gsungs so // yang gang pos zhus pa las /
NK043(pi)001:10007: sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar
NK043(pi)001:10008: gyur pa de gcig pu grogs med par song ba
NK043(pi)001:10009: gcan gzan gyis bsad pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:10010: des 'chi khar gcan gzan de dag sems can mang
NK043(pi)001:10011: du bsad de zos kyang mi 'grang bar shes nas
NK043(pi)001:10012: bdag dud 'gro lus po che zhig tu skyes te
NK043(pi)001:10013: gcan gzan ma rungs pa bdag gi srog bcad pa
NK043(pi)001:10014: de dag tshim par gyur cig ces smon lam btab
NK043(pi)001:10015: pa de bzhin du dud 'gro lus po cher skyes
NK043(pi)001:10016: nas gcan gzan thams cad tshim par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10017: de bzhin du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya
NK043(pi)001:10018: stong snyed du lus blangs nas sems can rnams la
NK043(pi)001:10020: bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par sngon byang chub
NK043(pi)001:10021: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can bkres
NK043(pi)001:10022: shing skom pa la rang gi sha khrag gis tshim
NK043(pi)001:10023: par byas pa dag brjod na zad par mi 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:10025: de ltar na byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa btang
NK043(pi)001:10026: ba'i spyod pa'i phyogs nyung shas zhig mdo rnams las
NK043(pi)001:10027: gsungs la / de las ci rigs rags bsdus tsam 'dir bstan gyi mtha' dag ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:10028: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi rgyal po dbang phyug
NK043(pi)001:10029: sde zhes bya ba grong khyer chen po brgyad khri
NK043(pi)001:10030: bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig yod pa de'i
NK043(pi)001:10031: dus su 'dzam gling du nad kyi bskal pa chen
NK043(pi)001:10032: po byung bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10033: rgyal po de'i btsun mo'i mngal du sras zhugs pa
NK043(pi)001:10034: dang btsun mo de'i lus kyi yan lag lag pas
NK043(pi)001:10035: reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos par gyur
NK043(pi)001:10036: la / zla ba tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas pa
NK043(pi)001:10037: de btsas ma thag tu bdag gis nad pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:10038: gso bar nus so zhes smras shing /
NK043(pi)001:10039: de'i tshe 'dzam gling gi lha klu rnams kyis tshig
NK043(pi)001:10040: mthun par 'di ni mi'i sman yin no zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:10041: pa'i sgra kun tu grags pa'i phyir de'i ming yang
NK043(pi)001:10043: de'i tshe nad pa thams cad khrid nas rgyal bu de la bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10044: rgyal bu'i lus sam lag pas reg pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sos nas bde bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10045: de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i nad
NK043(pi)001:10046: pa thams cad gsos te lo stong gi bar du
NK043(pi)001:10047: gnas nas rgyal bu de tshe 'phos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10048: nad pa rnams kyis bdag cag sus sdug bsngal las thar bar byed ces smre sngags bton nas /
NK043(pi)001:10049: rgyal bu de bsregs pa'i gnas der rus pa blangs
NK043(pi)001:10050: te lus la bskus pa thams cad kyang sos so
NK043(pi)001:10051: // da dung yang mi'i sman gyis na ba rnams gso nus so zhes grags so //
NK043(pi)001:10052: rus pa rnams zad pa'i 'og tu bsregs pa'i gnas
NK043(pi)001:10053: de'i sa dang thal ba dang sol bas bskus pa
NK043(pi)001:10054: rnams kyang nad las thar bar gyur te de ltar
NK043(pi)001:10055: mi'i sman ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:10056: skyes rabs gzhan na sems can sman zhes pa 'di dang 'dra la /
NK043(pi)001:10057: de'i lus rdzing bu dga' bar ma rnyings par gnas pa la reg pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10059: phyogs de'i chu 'thungs pas thams cad nad las thar zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10060: de lta yang de'i ming thos pas nad byang bar byed do zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:10061: yang sngon tshong dpon legs par rnyed pa zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:10062: bar gyur te rgya mtshor zhugs pas rin po che
NK043(pi)001:10063: rnyed nas slar log pa la khyim du ma phyin
NK043(pi)001:10064: pa'i bar du slang mo ba dag gis nor bu
NK043(pi)001:10065: rin po che rnams slong ba na nor bu re
NK043(pi)001:10066: re yang gser srang brgya stong du ma ri ba
NK043(pi)001:10067: bye ba phrag brgyad cu snyed kyi rin po che
NK043(pi)001:10068: sogs mang po de snyed btang nas /
NK043(pi)001:10069: slar khyim du ma phyin par yang rgya mtshor zhugs
NK043(pi)001:10070: te snga ma las phyed 'gyur gyis bzang ba'i rin
NK043(pi)001:10071: po che thob cing lo brgyad cu 'das nas rang
NK043(pi)001:10072: gi grong du 'jug pa de'i tshe gshed mas bzung
NK043(pi)001:10073: ba'i mi gcig mthong nas de bskyab pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:10074: gshed ma'i mi de dag re re la yang nor
NK043(pi)001:10075: bu rin po che gser srang bye ba ri ba
NK043(pi)001:10077: khyed cag gis bdag rgyal po'i drung nas slar ma
NK043(pi)001:10078: 'ongs bar du mi 'di ma bsad par sdod ces
NK043(pi)001:10079: byas nas rgyal po'i drung du myur bar song ste
NK043(pi)001:10080: / rgyal po la bdag gis rin po che bzang
NK043(pi)001:10081: po dag gis mi 'di'i srog 'jal bar 'tshal lo
NK043(pi)001:10083: mi 'di ni nyes pa che bas btang du mi rung btsong du mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10084: gal te snying thag pa nas nyo 'dod na khyod
NK043(pi)001:10085: la nor ci bdog pa nga la byin nas bdag
NK043(pi)001:10086: nyid kyang 'chi bar khas len na gdod btang ngo
NK043(pi)001:10087: zhes smras pa thos nas tshong dpon de dga' zhing
NK043(pi)001:10088: mi 'di'i skyabs byas nas bdag gi smon pa yongs
NK043(pi)001:10090: khyim na nor ci yod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10091: rgya mtsho nas thob pa'i nor bu rin po che
NK043(pi)001:10092: bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa rnams rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:10093: la phul te / rgyal po chen po mi 'di gtang du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:10094: bdag la nor ci mchis pa 'dir mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:10095: rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas gshed ma la bsgo ba /
NK043(pi)001:10096: legs par snyed pa 'di khrid la sod cig ces smras pa ltar khrid de /
NK043(pi)001:10097: mtshon gdab par brtsams pa las de dag gi lag
NK043(pi)001:10098: pa rengs nas gdab tu ma btub pa na ngo
NK043(pi)001:10099: mtshar bas rgyal po la gsol to //
NK043(pi)001:10100: rgyal po des bdag nyid kyis mtshon thogs nas bteg ste gdab par gzas pa las /
NK043(pi)001:10101: de'i tshe rgyal po'i lag gnyis sa la lhung ste sdug bsngal drag pos 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10102: de'i dus kyi rgyal po blun po de ni lhas byin nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:10103: yang sngon mu stegs can gyi drang srong mngon shes can du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10104: mtshan mo mun nag tu lam stor zhing gol ba
NK043(pi)001:10105: mgon med pa smre sngags 'don pa'i tshong pa lnga
NK043(pi)001:10106: brgya la lam bstan pa'i phyir rang gi lag pa
NK043(pi)001:10107: gnyis snum ras kyis dkris te me sbar nas mtshan
NK043(pi)001:10108: der 'bar bas lam bstan par byas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10109: de bsam pa dag pas byang chub tshol ba'i dge
NK043(pi)001:10110: ba'i las kyis nam langs pa dang lag pa sos
NK043(pi)001:10111: te snga ma ltar gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10112: tshong pa rnams ngo mtshar zhing dad par gyur te
NK043(pi)001:10113: drin gso ba'i phyir dge ba la sems par gyur
NK043(pi)001:10114: pa dang // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di ri dwags kyi khyu dpon du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10115: rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs kyis ri dwags rnams bskor bar gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10116: der chu drag po brgal bar dka' ba de'i dbus
NK043(pi)001:10117: su zhugs nas ri dwags rnams la nga'i rgyab tu
NK043(pi)001:10118: rkang pa zhog la 'gram du brgal bar gyis zhes
NK043(pi)001:10119: smras pas / de'i rgyab tu ri dwags rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:10120: rmig pas bardzisa pas rus pa'i bar du gnad chad
NK043(pi)001:10121: par gyur kyang brtson pa ma btang la thams cad
NK043(pi)001:10122: brgal ba'i rjes su gang ma brgal ba yod snyam
NK043(pi)001:10123: du rgyab tu bltas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10124: ri dwags kyi phru gu gcig ma brgal bar mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:10125: gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ba'i tshor ba
NK043(pi)001:10126: nyams su myong bzhin ri dwags kyi phru gu de
NK043(pi)001:10127: rgyab tu bkol nas chu bo las brgal te bla
NK043(pi)001:10128: med byang chub thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba
NK043(pi)001:10129: las bsgral ba'i smon lam btab ste tshe'i dus byas
NK043(pi)001:10130: so // de'i dus kyi ri dwags rnams grong khyer r+ts+wa can gyi gyad rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:10131: ri dwags phru gu de ni kun tu rgyu rab bzang yin par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:10132: yang sngon w+aa r+aa na sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes pas chos bzhin rgyal srid byed pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10133: de'i rta cang shes shi ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10134: khams kyi rgyal phran zhig gis rta cang shes shi ba thos nas pho nya btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:10136: yang na grong gi sgor ma phyungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:10137: gzhan du na nges par ske nas btags la 'dir 'khrid do zhes springs so //
NK043(pi)001:10139: grong khyer gyi sgor phyung bzhin du rta cang shes
NK043(pi)001:10140: btsal bas rnyed nas dpyid kyi dus me tog rgyas
NK043(pi)001:10141: pa na / nags su song ste slar grong khyer
NK043(pi)001:10142: du ma phyin pa'i bar der khams kyi rgyal phran
NK043(pi)001:10143: pa na / des thos nas / dpung bzhi'i dmag 'ongs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10144: rgyal po tshangs byin rta cang shes la zhon te dpung bzhi dang ldan pas g.yul bkye ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10145: rgyal phran gzhan zhig gis rta cang shes kyi glor
NK043(pi)001:10146: mdung bsnun te rgyu ma lug cing gnad chad pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10147: tshor ba myong bzhin bsran btsugs nas rgyal po nyam
NK043(pi)001:10148: nga bar mdor bar grong khyer du bskyal lo snyam
NK043(pi)001:10149: du brtags nas / rdzing bu tshangs ldan me tog
NK043(pi)001:10150: sna tshogs kyis gang ba de'i me tog rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:10151: steng du rkang pa bzhag nas brgal te rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:10152: rang yul du thar bar byas shing rta de tshe'i
NK043(pi)001:10153: du brtags nas / dus byas so // rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:10154: nga'i srog 'byin pa ni rta cang shes yin na
NK043(pi)001:10155: du brtags nas / dus byas so // / de
NK043(pi)001:10156: la rgyal srid kyi byed stsal dgos kyang dus las
NK043(pi)001:10157: du brtags nas / dus byas so // / 'das
NK043(pi)001:10158: te / ma 'das kyang byin yang ci byar yod
NK043(pi)001:10159: snyam nas de'i ched du sbyin gtong byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10160: rta cang shes ni bcom ldan 'das so //
NK043(pi)001:10161: yang sngon gyi tshe gangs ri'i rgyal po'i drung na
NK043(pi)001:10162: glang po che lnga brgya gnas pa'i rgyal por gyur
NK043(pi)001:10163: pa'i glang po sdug cing yid du 'ong ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:10165: glang po de rnams lam nyam nga ba dog pa
NK043(pi)001:10166: lam gcig las med pa zhig tu mtshan mo gnas
NK043(pi)001:10167: par gyur pa rngon pa lngas mthong nas mtshan thog
NK043(pi)001:10168: thag tu lam nyam nga ba der rlubs chen po
NK043(pi)001:10169: brkos nas / glang po 'di thams cad phyir lhung
NK043(pi)001:10170: bar byas la bdag cag gis ci dgar blang bar
NK043(pi)001:10171: bya'o snyam nas glang po che rnams der 'das pa
NK043(pi)001:10172: brkos nas / dang / rlubs yod pa'i steng du
NK043(pi)001:10173: btang ba na der rlubs yod par shes nas brgal
NK043(pi)001:10174: brkos nas / dang / ma nus pas / glang
NK043(pi)001:10175: po'i rgyal po des bdag nyid kyi lus rlubs kyi
NK043(pi)001:10176: steng du 'phred du nyal te zam pa byas nas
NK043(pi)001:10177: glang po che lnga brgyas rgyab kyi steng du bardzisa
NK043(pi)001:10178: shing brgal te song ba'i rjes su bdag nyid mchongs
NK043(pi)001:10179: nas rlabs de las brgal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10181: sdig can rlubs zab brkos gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10182: de na glang bdag blo ldan gyis /
NK043(pi)001:10183: bdag dang gzhan gnyis bzlas pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10184: don med rlubs zab brkos par zad /
NK043(pi)001:10186: yang rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can du gyur
NK043(pi)001:10187: pas tshong pa srin mo'i gling du tshud pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:10188: slar 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar brgal ba dang
NK043(pi)001:10189: // yang seng ge ral pa can du gyur pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10190: tshe na don mthun lnga brgya sprul gdug pas kun
NK043(pi)001:10192: rang gi lus dang srog la mi lta bar de rnams thar bar byas pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:10193: yang ded dpon nor gyi shing rta zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:10194: gyur pa'i tshe na tshong pa lnga la snying brtse
NK043(pi)001:10195: bas de dag gi don du de rnams dang lhan
NK043(pi)001:10196: cig grur zhugs pa rlung drag pos gru bshig du
NK043(pi)001:10197: cha ba dang / ded dpon des gzhan la ma skrag cig /
NK043(pi)001:10198: gru zhig na khyed rnams nga la 'jus dang ngas brgal bar bya'o zhes smras nas /
NK043(pi)001:10199: rin po che chen po rnams rang gi mchan du
NK043(pi)001:10200: btags te gru zhig pa'i tshe de rnams ded dpon
NK043(pi)001:10202: des brtson pas brgal bas ngal zhing dub pas srog
NK043(pi)001:10203: gi lhag ma cung zad lus pa tsam gyis rgya
NK043(pi)001:10205: ded dpon de dbugs chad de shi'o //
NK043(pi)001:10206: de rnams kyis ro de skam la phyungs shing /
NK043(pi)001:10207: mchan khung na rin po che'i tshogs mthong nas khyer
NK043(pi)001:10208: te yul du dong zhing dbul ba med par gyur
NK043(pi)001:10209: to // yang ded dpon thams cad skyobs su gyur
NK043(pi)001:10210: pa na 'brog dgon par chu med pas ngal ba'i
NK043(pi)001:10212: der lhag par nyam thag pa'i tshong pa mi lnga
NK043(pi)001:10213: zhig bskyab pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig gis lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:10214: bskul bas / dbang phyug chen pos char phab ste /
NK043(pi)001:10215: de rnams 'brog dgon las bde blag tu thar par byas pa sogs /
NK043(pi)001:10216: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i dus na sems can phongs
NK043(pi)001:10217: pa sna tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dag dbugs phyin cing
NK043(pi)001:10218: 'jigs pa med par byas pa tshad dang grangs kyis
NK043(pi)001:10219: bgrang bar mi nus pa mdzad pa las /
NK043(pi)001:10220: 'dir mdo las byung ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig bshad pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:10221: sbyin pa'i rabs kyi skabs so //
NK043(pi)001:10222: sngon bskal pa tshad med pa 'das pa'i snga rol
NK043(pi)001:10223: na bskal pa mngon par dga' ba la 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:10224: gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya bar bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:10225: 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba byon pa
NK043(pi)001:10226: na / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i
NK043(pi)001:10227: bkod pa zhes bya ba bu stong tshang ba byung
NK043(pi)001:10228: na / ngo // de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:10229: tshe tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun thub par
NK043(pi)001:10230: na / ngo // gyur to // rgyal po de
NK043(pi)001:10231: bu stong dang btsun mor bcas pas sangs rgyas de
NK043(pi)001:10232: la yo byad thams cad kyis mchod de chos nyan
NK043(pi)001:10233: par byed cing bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
NK043(pi)001:10234: sems bskyed nas rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob
NK043(pi)001:10235: na / ngo // gyur to // pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10236: chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub
NK043(pi)001:10238: rab tu byung ba'i basngagasa pa brjod pas /
NK043(pi)001:10239: rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de 'dod pa'i dga'
NK043(pi)001:10240: ba dang rgyal srid la mi dga' bar rab tu
NK043(pi)001:10241: byung bar 'dod pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
NK043(pi)001:10242: gnang ngo // rgyal po des bu stong po la
NK043(pi)001:10243: khyed cag sus rgyal srid bsgrub pa dang sems can
NK043(pi)001:10244: rnams la chos 'dzin tu 'jug par spro ba su
NK043(pi)001:10245: gnang ngo // yod / de thams cad kyis bdag
NK043(pi)001:10246: cag kyang dad pas khyim ma mchis par rab tu
NK043(pi)001:10247: byung bas bdag cag mdor cig ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10249: khyed thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10250: 'jig rten khams kyi skye bo thams cad chud zos
NK043(pi)001:10251: par 'gyur gyis / khyed rnams las bdag don la
NK043(pi)001:10252: mi lta bar sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying
NK043(pi)001:10253: rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des /
NK043(pi)001:10254: rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du chug cig ces smras pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10255: gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas /
NK043(pi)001:10256: rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya ba des /
NK043(pi)001:10257: rang gi pha dang rgan rabs rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10258: rab byung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes //
NK043(pi)001:10259: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs mod kyi //
NK043(pi)001:10260: de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na //
NK043(pi)001:10261: 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub //
NK043(pi)001:10262: ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing //
NK043(pi)001:10263: gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi //
NK043(pi)001:10264: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa smras pa na //
NK043(pi)001:10265: thams cad kyis legs so byin zhing basngagasa te rgyal srid la bzhag nas /
NK043(pi)001:10266: rgyal po dang bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang
NK043(pi)001:10267: ba rnams rab tu byung ste mngon shes lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:10268: gzungs dang chos kyi shes pa yang skyes par gyur
NK043(pi)001:10269: to // rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems
NK043(pi)001:10270: kyis kyang zla ba nya'o cog tu gling chen po
NK043(pi)001:10271: bzhi po de dag tu chos bstan pa rjes su
NK043(pi)001:10272: ston par byas pas sems can dung phyur phrag dgu
NK043(pi)001:10273: dang bye ba phrag gnyis bla med rdzogs pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:10274: chub tu sems bskyed par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10275: de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung ste /
NK043(pi)001:10276: phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10277: de dus kyi rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa ni lha'i bu ded dpon dang /
NK043(pi)001:10278: chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10279: bu stong po ni bskal ba 'di'i sangs rgyas stong po dag la /
NK043(pi)001:10280: de'i nang gi byang chub sems dpa' snying rje cher sems ni bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:10281: yang sngon gyi tshe bskal pa ches grangs med pa'i sngon rol na /
NK043(pi)001:10282: de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo zhes pa 'jig rten du byon pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:10283: sems can rnams kyi tshe lo bye ba phrag bcu thub pa'i dus der /
NK043(pi)001:10284: rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i
NK043(pi)001:10285: gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed
NK043(pi)001:10286: pa pho brang rin po che snang ba zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:10287: ba rin chen sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can 'byor
NK043(pi)001:10288: pa shin tu rgya che ba de'i sras /
NK043(pi)001:10289: rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs
NK043(pi)001:10290: bzang zhing lta na sdug pa de btsas ma thag
NK043(pi)001:10291: tu rin chen sna bdun gyi gter stong byung zhing
NK043(pi)001:10292: / rgyal po'i khang bzang gi nang du rin chen
NK043(pi)001:10293: sna bdun gyi gter mi bcu'i tshad tsam byung bar
NK043(pi)001:10294: / gyur to // de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad yi rangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10295: btson pa rnams btson las thar ro //
NK043(pi)001:10296: rgyal bu de 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal thams cad la mkhas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10297: de la gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis nam gyi
NK043(pi)001:10298: gung thun la bag yod pa'i gtam dang mi rtag
NK043(pi)001:10299: pa dang / 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
NK043(pi)001:10300: byang chub dam pa 'tshol ba'i tshigs bcad brjod pas
NK043(pi)001:10301: de yid la bzung nas lo bcu'i bar du gnyid
NK043(pi)001:10302: dang rmug pa dang rgod cing rtse ba dang dga'
NK043(pi)001:10303: ba'i yo byad thams cad la ma bltas par gcig
NK043(pi)001:10304: pur sems shing gnas par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:10305: snying rje med pa'i 'khor ba'i skyon bsams nas gcig pur mi smra bar gnas par gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10306: yab rgyal po des gzhon nu'i longs spyod pa'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:10307: sa phyogs zhig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya
NK043(pi)001:10308: ba / lho byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:10309: rin chen sna bdun gyi dril bu gser gyi d+r+wa
NK043(pi)001:10310: ba dang mu tig dang rin po che'i bla re
NK043(pi)001:10311: dang d+r+wa ba sogs rgyan gyi khyad par dang /
NK043(pi)001:10312: rin po che'i shing stong btsugs pa rin po che'i
NK043(pi)001:10313: skud pa drug gis sbrel ba shing ta la'i phreng
NK043(pi)001:10315: der glu gar dang rol mo'i cha byad byed pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10316: bu mo lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod nas gzhon nu'i
NK043(pi)001:10317: dga' bskyed cig ces byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:10318: lam srang thams cad du bzhon pa dang gos dang
NK043(pi)001:10319: zas sogs ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rgya che
NK043(pi)001:10321: rin po che'i khang bzang dpag tshad tsam yod pa /
NK043(pi)001:10322: rta babs brgyas brgyan pa de'i nang du gzhon nu'i mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams shing /
NK043(pi)001:10323: dbus su skyed mos tshal me 'bras kyi shing dang
NK043(pi)001:10324: rin po che'i ljon shing dang them skas sogs bkram
NK043(pi)001:10325: pa / gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad nas chu 'bab cing /
NK043(pi)001:10326: me tog sna tshogs rtag tu rgyas pa /
NK043(pi)001:10327: shing ljon pa brgyad brgya rin po che'i skud pas sbrel ba /
NK043(pi)001:10328: de dag rlung gis bskyod pas sil snyan lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba sgrogs pa /
NK043(pi)001:10329: gzhon nu'i lus la rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes rdzing de rin po che'i d+r+wa bas bkab bo //
NK043(pi)001:10330: khang bzang der rin po che'i khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te /
NK043(pi)001:10331: de'i stengs su ras bcos bu lnga brgya bting ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10332: rgyal bu de 'dug pa'i khri rin po che sna
NK043(pi)001:10333: bdun las byas pa 'phang du mi 'greng bdun tsam
NK043(pi)001:10334: yod pa der ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad
NK043(pi)001:10336: khri thams cad kyi drung du a ga rus bdug
NK043(pi)001:10337: cing nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog
NK043(pi)001:10338: 'grems pa dang / gser gyi lda ldi dang mu
NK043(pi)001:10339: tig dang nor bu'i d+r+wa ba rin po che'i 'od
NK043(pi)001:10340: 'grems pa dang / kyis gsal zhing / rin po che'i shing las ba dan brgya brgya bshams so //
NK043(pi)001:10341: skyed tshal kun tu yang nor bu rin po che
NK043(pi)001:10342: 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu
NK043(pi)001:10343: rtsa dgu bzhag pas 'jig rten thams cad snang bar
NK043(pi)001:10344: gyur to // skyed tshal de ni re skeg dang /
NK043(pi)001:10345: ne tsho dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ngang kun la dang /
NK043(pi)001:10346: ka la ping ka shang shang te'u rnams mi skad
NK043(pi)001:10347: du smra zhing skad bsgrags pas lha'i dga' tshal dang
NK043(pi)001:10349: ro lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams kyang rgyun du bshams te /
NK043(pi)001:10350: de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug nas nyi shu
NK043(pi)001:10351: lon pa thams cad bsdus nas pho brang der btsud
NK043(pi)001:10352: de / bzo dang las kyi gnas dang 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:10353: pa'i dga' ba dang bya ba shes pa bye ba
NK043(pi)001:10354: phrag brgyad cu der btsud do //
NK043(pi)001:10355: rgyal bu de la pha ma gnyis kyi bu mo bye ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10356: nye dus tshogs kyis bye ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10357: grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10358: rgyal po gzhan thams cad kyis kyang bu mo bye ba byin te /
NK043(pi)001:10359: de thams cad gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa sha stag go //
NK043(pi)001:10360: de thams cad lo bcu drug lon pa /
NK043(pi)001:10361: glu dang rol mo dang skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa /
NK043(pi)001:10363: tshul mkhas pa sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi pha rol
NK043(pi)001:10364: du son pa sogs yon tan thams cad dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:10365: pa / me tog ud pa la'i dri 'byung ba /
NK043(pi)001:10366: lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba /
NK043(pi)001:10368: rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer gnas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10369: des spyod yul de dag dang glu gar de la /
NK043(pi)001:10370: bdag gi mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dge chos
NK043(pi)001:10371: yongs su nyams par byed pa ltung ba 'di la
NK043(pi)001:10372: lta bar mi bya snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:10373: dper na gsad par bya ba'i mis gshed ma mthong
NK043(pi)001:10374: nas ngo mtshar ba'i sems mi skyed pa bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:10375: bud med sogs 'dod yon de dag mthong na ya
NK043(pi)001:10377: lo bcu po der bdag mi mdza' ba'i tshogs 'di
NK043(pi)001:10378: las nam zhig thar nas bag yod pa'i spyad pa
NK043(pi)001:10379: spyod snyam du bsam pa ma gtogs par gzugs sgra
NK043(pi)001:10380: sogs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar yang ma gyur to
NK043(pi)001:10381: // de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la /
NK043(pi)001:10382: lha gzhon nu ni mi rol to //
NK043(pi)001:10383: dgyes par mi mdzad do zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:10384: rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang
NK043(pi)001:10385: lhan cig rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer ga la
NK043(pi)001:10386: bar phyin nas gdong mchi ma zag cing dus te
NK043(pi)001:10387: sa la 'gyel nas yang langs te /
NK043(pi)001:10388: bu khyod kyi phyir nga ni mya ngan byed na khyod ci phyir mi dga' /
NK043(pi)001:10389: de smros dang ngas de la chad pa chen pos gcad par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:10390: khyed kyi ched du ngas lha'i khyim ltar nyams dga'
NK043(pi)001:10391: ba'i pho brang 'dir ma tshang ba ci yod smros
NK043(pi)001:10392: dang / brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10393: lha'i bu mo lta bu'i tshogs la ltos la mya
NK043(pi)001:10394: ngan ma phyed par de rnams dang rtses shig ces
NK043(pi)001:10395: sogs kyi don tshigs su bcad pas smras pa la
NK043(pi)001:10396: / srid pa'i skyon mthong nas 'dod pa la yid byung ba des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10397: 'khor ba'i d+r+wa bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'dir bltas nas /
NK043(pi)001:10398: thar ba don gnyer ba la smras pa yab gson cig /
NK043(pi)001:10399: lha gcig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis /
NK043(pi)001:10400: bdag ni 'di ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags /
NK043(pi)001:10401: zhes sogs bud med sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi nyes dmigs dang lha rnams kyis bskul tshul dang /
NK043(pi)001:10402: bdag dben par dga' ba'i tshul rnams tshigs su bcad de smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10403: de nas rgyal bu de khang bzang gi nang na
NK043(pi)001:10404: 'dug bzhin yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
NK043(pi)001:10405: bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'greng ba dang
NK043(pi)001:10406: 'gro ba dang 'dug pa'i spyod lam gsum gyis gnas
NK043(pi)001:10407: shing rmugs pa dang gnyid spangs so //
NK043(pi)001:10408: khang pa'i steng du song ste sa rkyang pa la
NK043(pi)001:10409: gnas nas 'dug pa nam gyi gung la bab pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10410: tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams par snang la 'gro
NK043(pi)001:10411: zhing sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi basngagasa
NK043(pi)001:10413: thos nas lus spu zing zhes byed cing mchi ma
NK043(pi)001:10414: glags te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la su'i
NK043(pi)001:10415: yon tan brjod cing bar snang la 'gro /
NK043(pi)001:10416: de thos pas bdag yid bade'o zhes tshigs bcad du smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10417: lha rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pas sangs rgyas don
NK043(pi)001:10418: grub blo 'khor bsam gtan byed pa'i dge slong rnams
NK043(pi)001:10419: dang lhan cig bzhugs so zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10420: rgyal bus sangs rgyas de yi gzugs ci 'dra ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10421: ji ltar spyad na sangs rgyas su 'gyur pa'i byang
NK043(pi)001:10422: chub spyod pa ci 'dra zhes tshigs su bcad pas
NK043(pi)001:10423: dris pa la / lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas de'i mtshan bzang dang /
NK043(pi)001:10424: yon tan gyi khyad par tshigs su bcad pas smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10425: de nas rgyal bus sangs rgyas kyi basngagasa pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10426: chos dang dge 'dun gyi basngagasa pa thos nas yid rab tu dga' ste /
NK043(pi)001:10427: sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'khor dang chos rnams la sems /
NK043(pi)001:10428: 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs rnams kyang bsam /
NK043(pi)001:10429: 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas bag med pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10430: skye bo'i nang na 'dug pa ni bde 'gro'i lam
NK043(pi)001:10432: bla med rdzogs byang lta ga la 'thob /
NK043(pi)001:10433: de'i phyir bdag sgo nas phyung na nye du'i tshogs kyis bar chad byed kyis /
NK043(pi)001:10434: bdag khang steng 'di nas mchong bar bya snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:10435: de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo logs su khang bzang gi steng nas mchongs te /
NK043(pi)001:10436: de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs she na /
NK043(pi)001:10437: de bzhin gshegs pa des dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:10438: de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo'i phyag g.yas pa
NK043(pi)001:10439: brkyangs te 'od byung nas rgyal bu la reg go
NK043(pi)001:10440: // 'od de las pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam byung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10441: pad+ma de dag las kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba
NK043(pi)001:10442: chen pos rgyal bu khyab par byas shing pad+ma de
NK043(pi)001:10443: la 'dug ste sangs rgyas de'i logs su thal mo
NK043(pi)001:10444: sbyar bas / phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du brjod do //
NK043(pi)001:10445: de nas 'od de brtul ba dang gzhon nu de de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du babs so //
NK043(pi)001:10446: des de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag brgya stong du 'tshal te /
NK043(pi)001:10447: tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:10448: de bzhin gshegs pa des rgyal bu'i lhag pa'i bsam
NK043(pi)001:10449: pa mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya
NK043(pi)001:10450: cher yang dag par bstan pas rnam par thar pa
NK043(pi)001:10452: mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob ste /
NK043(pi)001:10453: nam mkha' la gnas nas me tog rnams mngon par sprul pas /
NK043(pi)001:10454: de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor nas slar bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:10455: mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal //
NK043(pi)001:10456: gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:10457: rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis //
NK043(pi)001:10458: mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:10460: der mtshan mo 'das nas nam langs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10461: rgyal po 'od zer ldan des gzhon nu'i 'khor gyi
NK043(pi)001:10462: bud med ngu ba'i sgra thos nas myur bar song
NK043(pi)001:10464: rgyal bu mi gada'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:10466: yang langs nas grong khyer kun tu lan brgya stong
NK043(pi)001:10467: du btsal ba na grong khyer gyi lha des rgyal
NK043(pi)001:10468: po la gzhon nu ni sangs rgyas don grub blo
NK043(pi)001:10469: la blta zhing mchod pa'i phyir shar phyogs su song
NK043(pi)001:10471: rgyal po de btsun mo'i 'khor dang gzhan srog chags
NK043(pi)001:10472: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:10473: bzhi dang lhan cig shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:10474: pa de'i drung du song ste phyag 'tshal nas tshigs
NK043(pi)001:10475: su bcad pas bstod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10476: bla med byang chub kyi phyir smon lam btab pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10477: de bzhin gshegs pa des rgyal po'i lhag pa'i bsam
NK043(pi)001:10478: pa mkhyen nas bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi
NK043(pi)001:10479: ldog pa'i chos de ltar bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:10480: de nas rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer gyis bcom
NK043(pi)001:10481: ldan 'das la bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod
NK043(pi)001:10482: gsol bar zhus pa bzhin cang mi gsung bas gnang
NK043(pi)001:10483: ste / rgyal bus pha ma dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10484: bud med de dag la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10485: khyed cag yi rangs par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:10486: ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:10487: de dag gis rjes su yi rangs bar smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10488: rgyal bus grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10489: ro bro'i zhal zas lnga brgya yang de bzhin gshegs
NK043(pi)001:10490: pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
NK043(pi)001:10491: gsol to // dge slong de dag thams cad kyi
NK043(pi)001:10492: phyir rin chen sna bdun gyis gtsug lag khang nor
NK043(pi)001:10494: steng du rin po che'i d+r+wa ba'i bla re phres pa /
NK043(pi)001:10495: g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa /
NK043(pi)001:10496: pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa /
NK043(pi)001:10497: ras bcos bu brgya stong dri ma med pa'i mal bshams pa /
NK043(pi)001:10498: dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho
NK043(pi)001:10499: ba med pa gang byin pa phyi de nyin mi
NK043(pi)001:10500: byin gyi / nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:10501: lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid spangs nas /
NK043(pi)001:10502: sangs rgyas mchod pa las yid byed gzhan spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:10503: skabs der 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i rnam rtog ma byung /
NK043(pi)001:10504: rgyal srid la dga' ba med cing lus srog la
NK043(pi)001:10505: yang mi lta na dngos po gzhan la lta ci
NK043(pi)001:10506: smos te / de lta bu'i tshul gyis bsnyen bkur byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:10507: skabs de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis ci gsungs
NK043(pi)001:10508: pa thams cad lan gcig gis bzung ste lan gnyis
NK043(pi)001:10509: ma zhus so // bar der khrus dang lus bkru ba ma byas ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed /
NK043(pi)001:10510: zas za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10511: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan
NK043(pi)001:10512: las 'das pa'i sku gdung tsan dan dmar po'i zhugs
NK043(pi)001:10513: la bzhus nas phyogs der lo brgya stong du ring
NK043(pi)001:10514: bsrel la 'dzam bu'i gling gi me tog dang spos
NK043(pi)001:10515: dang phreng ba dang rol mo'i mchod pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:10516: pa byas nas / phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byas te /
