NK043(pi)001:10517: de dag rin chen sna bdun gyi d+r+wa bas g.yogs shing mu tig gi bla re bres so //
NK043(pi)001:10518: mchod rten re re la yang rin chen sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya re phul lo //
NK043(pi)001:10519: sil snyan brgya stong dang mar me'i rdza bo brgya stong dang /
NK043(pi)001:10520: spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gi mar me dang /
NK043(pi)001:10521: spos dang phreng ba byug pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10522: phyogs kyi khor yug tu me tog gi shing ljon
NK043(pi)001:10523: pa bskrun pa sogs kyi mchod pa lo bye ba'i
NK043(pi)001:10525: de nas rab tu byung ste chos gos gsum par gyur cing rtag tu bsod snyoms spyod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10526: rtag tu tsog pu pa ste nam yang go ma phab la /
NK043(pi)001:10527: rmugs gnyid kyis nam yang non par ma gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10528: de nas zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye
NK043(pi)001:10529: ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa byin
NK043(pi)001:10530: te / des gzhan las legs so zhes pa'i tshigs
NK043(pi)001:10531: tsam la'ang re ba med na rnyed bkur la lta
NK043(pi)001:10532: te / ci smos / des chos 'chad pa'am nyan pas ngal bar ma gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:10533: de la lha rnams kyang bsnyen bkur byed do //
NK043(pi)001:10534: yul mi dang btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang grogs
NK043(pi)001:10535: po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su rab tu byung
NK043(pi)001:10536: ngo // der bsod nams 'od zer gyi rjes su
NK043(pi)001:10537: rab tu byung ba rnams la gnas gtsang ma'i lha
NK043(pi)001:10538: rnams kyis 'di rnams la bdag cag gis bsnyen bkur
NK043(pi)001:10539: byas na dkon mchog gsum la rim gros byas par
NK043(pi)001:10540: 'gyur ro snyam du rim gro byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10541: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las
NK043(pi)001:10542: 'das nas kyang lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa
NK043(pi)001:10543: bzhi'i bar du dge slong bsod nams 'od zer des
NK043(pi)001:10544: dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10545: tshul 'di lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig
NK043(pi)001:10546: stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de
NK043(pi)001:10547: lta bu'i mchod pa byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10548: de ltar rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid yin la /
NK043(pi)001:10549: rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni sangs rgyas 'od dpag med dang /
NK043(pi)001:10550: grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o //
NK043(pi)001:10552: rgyal bu bsod nams 'od zer de ltar byang chub
NK043(pi)001:10553: sems dpas bla med rdzogs byang 'dod pas lhag pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10554: bsam pas sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su
NK043(pi)001:10555: spangs te bag yod par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:10556: yang sngon yul ka shi'i nags stug po zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:10560: glang po che bzhi gnas pa de dag phan tshun
NK043(pi)001:10561: yid gcugs pas mthun la rtsod pa med par dga'
NK043(pi)001:10563: dus zhig na de dag bgros te gang la bsnyen
NK043(pi)001:10564: bkur bya ba'i rgan pa shes par 'dod nas dris
NK043(pi)001:10565: pa dang der shing nya gro d+ha zhig yod pa
NK043(pi)001:10566: de bstan nas / gong ma sreg gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10567: shes ldan dag shing 'di'i tshad sngon ci tsam mthong /
NK043(pi)001:10569: bdag cag lam 'dir 'gro ba na kho bo'i lus
NK043(pi)001:10570: dang mnyam pa tsam skyes pa de dus nas mthong
NK043(pi)001:10572: kho bo khyu dang lhan cig 'gro tshe 'di kho
NK043(pi)001:10573: bo'i lus dang mnyam pa tsam skye ba'i skabs so
NK043(pi)001:10574: // de dag gis glang po bas khyod rgan no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10576: kho bos 'di'i lo ma gnyis skyes pa na der chags pa'i zil pa lces bldags so //
NK043(pi)001:10577: de dag gis 'di bas kyang khyon rgan no //
NK043(pi)001:10578: gong ma sreg gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10579: khyed cag gis shing chen po'i rnam par mthong gis /
NK043(pi)001:10580: kho bos sa bon rnams zos nas phyogs 'dir rtug
NK043(pi)001:10581: pa bor ba las shing 'di skyes pa yin no
NK043(pi)001:10582: // de dag gis smras pa bdag cag thams cad
NK043(pi)001:10583: las khyod rgan pas gsum pos de la bsnyen bkur
NK043(pi)001:10584: // bya ba dang / spre'usa ri bong dang /
NK043(pi)001:10586: ri bong gis ni gong ma sreg kho na dang /
NK043(pi)001:10587: glang po ches thams cad la bsnyen bkur bya bar dam bcas te /
NK043(pi)001:10588: de ltar rgan rim bzhin bsnyen bkur byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:10589: phan tshun rgyu zhing gang gi tshe gzar po'i phyogs su 'gro ba na /
NK043(pi)001:10592: ri bong la gong ma sreg zhon te 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:10593: de dag de ltar sdug pa 'phel zhing zhes bcas
NK043(pi)001:10594: pa yod kyis re zhig bdag cag dge ba gzhan
NK043(pi)001:10595: cung zad blangs te 'jug par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:10597: gong ma sreg gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10598: srog gcod pa spang bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:10599: de dag gis de ci zhig /
NK043(pi)001:10600: gong ma sreg gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10601: lo 'bras me tog rnams srog chags dang bcas pa'am
NK043(pi)001:10602: srog chags med pa yang yod pas bdag cag gis
NK043(pi)001:10603: deng phyin chad srog chags med pa la longs spyod
NK043(pi)001:10605: lo 'bras sogs 'dzin pa med pa len pas ma
NK043(pi)001:10606: byin len pa spang ba dang bsgrod bya min par
NK043(pi)001:10607: bsgrod pa'i log g.yem spong pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10608: brtags shing dus su bden par smra bas rdzun spong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10609: myos 'gyur gyi chang spong ba la yang /
NK043(pi)001:10611: myos par mi 'gyur pa yang yod pas deng slan
NK043(pi)001:10612: chad myos par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu spang par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:10613: zhes pa ltar brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga la gnas
NK043(pi)001:10614: pa na / gong ma sreg gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10615: bdag cag gzhi lnga la gnas na gzhan dag kyang der dgod par bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:10616: ri bong gis ri bong thams cad dang /
NK043(pi)001:10618: glang po ches glang chen dang /
NK043(pi)001:10619: stag seng gung thams cad rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:10621: khyed kyis 'dul ba ma yin pa /
NK043(pi)001:10624: 'dab chags gang yin thams cad kho bos brtul zhugs
NK043(pi)001:10625: kyi gzhi lnga la dgod par bya'o zhes dud 'gro'i
NK043(pi)001:10626: skye gnas pa'i srog chags ji snyed pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:10627: brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga la bkod de /
NK043(pi)001:10628: gcig la gcig gnod mi byed par nags stug po
NK043(pi)001:10629: der shes bzhin gyis gnas pa'i mthus lhas dus su
NK043(pi)001:10630: char phab pas lo 'bras dang me tog rgyas par
NK043(pi)001:10631: gyur to // mi rnams kyis tshul de lta bu mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:10632: de'i yul de'i rgyal pos ngas chos bzhin gyi rgyal srid byas pa'i mthu yin no zhes zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:10633: btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang /
NK043(pi)001:10634: blon po dang grong mi sogs kyis rang rang gi mthur bsam mo //
NK043(pi)001:10635: rgyal pos bsam pa 'di dag thams cad kyis so so'i mthur 'dzin na /
NK043(pi)001:10636: 'di su'i mthu zhes ltas mkhan pa rnams la dris kyang ma shes nas /
NK043(pi)001:10637: b+aa r+aa na si dang ha cang mi ring ba'i
NK043(pi)001:10638: skyed tshal zhig na drang srong mngon shes lnga dang
NK043(pi)001:10639: ldan pa kun gyis mchod pa zhig yod do //
NK043(pi)001:10640: rgyal po de'i drung du song ste /
NK043(pi)001:10641: 'di skad ces bdag gi yul na srog chags ji
NK043(pi)001:10642: snyed pa thams cad gcig la gcig 'tshe ba med
NK043(pi)001:10643: par shes bzhin du gnas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10644: lhas dus su char phab pas rtsi shing dang lo 'bras rnams rgyas par gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10645: bdag gis ni chos bzhin rgyal srid bskyangs pa'i mthu yin no snyam la /
NK043(pi)001:10646: btsun mo sogs grong gi mi rnams kyi bar gyis
NK043(pi)001:10647: rang rang gi mthur bsam na 'di su'i mthu lags
NK043(pi)001:10649: 'di ni rgyal po khyod kyi mthu ma yin la /
NK043(pi)001:10650: btsun mo dang gzhon nu sogs gang gi mthu ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:10651: 'on kyang khyod kyi yul na srog chags bzhi yod pa de dag gi mathu'o //
NK043(pi)001:10656: de dag gis yang dag par blangs te spyad pa de spyod mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:10660: srog gcod pa spong pa sogs lnga po bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:10661: de nas rgyal pos bdag gis brtul zhugs kyi gzhi
NK043(pi)001:10662: lnga blang bar bya'o zhes de ltar spyad pa dang
NK043(pi)001:10663: / btsun mo dang gzhon nu rnams nas /
NK043(pi)001:10664: yul mi rnams kyi bar gyi thams cad kyis brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:10665: rgyal po tshangs byin 'khor dang bcas pas brtul zhugs
NK043(pi)001:10666: kyi gzhi lnga blangs par thos pas khams kyi rgyal
NK043(pi)001:10667: phran thams cad kyis de bzhin du byas te /
NK043(pi)001:10668: 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phal cher brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga blangs pas /
NK043(pi)001:10669: der 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:10670: de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i 'khor rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10671: gus bcas zhe sar bcas pa dag /
NK043(pi)001:10672: dka' thub tshal na gnas pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:10673: gong ma sreg gis tshangs spyod dag /
NK043(pi)001:10674: 'jig rten so sor rab tu bstan //
NK043(pi)001:10676: bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:10677: de'i tshe gong ma sreg tu gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10678: ri bong ni dge slong sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:10679: spre'u ni mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:10680: glang po che ni kun dga' bo yin no zhes gsungs te /
NK043(pi)001:10681: byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes
NK043(pi)001:10682: pa na yang rang dang gzhan tshul khrims kyi bslab
NK043(pi)001:10683: pa la gnas par byed na lha dang mir gyur
NK043(pi)001:10684: pa na lta ci smos so //
NK043(pi)001:10685: yang sngon lha'i dbang po brgya byin du skyes pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:10686: lha ma yin gyi dpung chen po lhags nas lha
NK043(pi)001:10687: rnams de dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe lha rnams pham
NK043(pi)001:10688: par gyur te phyir log pa'i lam du shing shal
NK043(pi)001:10689: ma li la mkha' lding gi tshang bcas pa shing
NK043(pi)001:10690: rta'i gnya' shing gi rtse mos phog pas bya phrug
NK043(pi)001:10691: rnams lhung du nye ba na /
NK043(pi)001:10692: brgya byin gyis kha lo ba ma ta li la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10693: bye'u phrug ma tshar ba 'di dag la ma phog par shing rta drongs shig /
NK043(pi)001:10695: lha ma yin gyi dmag phyir 'brangs nas 'ong bas ci bgyir ma mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:10698: bya phrug 'jigs pas nyen pa 'di dag bsad mi rung bas shing rta slar zlog cig /
NK043(pi)001:10699: des shing rta slar bzlog pa'i mod la lha ma yin rnams skrag nas byer bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10700: yang sngon gyi dus su bcom ldan 'das 'di bram ze'i rigs chen po zhig gi bur skyes nas /
NK043(pi)001:10701: blon po thos pa che zhing yon tan ldan pa zhig las /
NK043(pi)001:10702: rig byed bslabs pas mkhas shing gsal la gus pa sogs kyi yon tan lhag par gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:10703: de la bla ma lhag par byams par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10704: der mkhan po des slob ma rnams kyi ngang tshul
NK043(pi)001:10705: brtag pa'i phyir bsang ba byed pa'i dus bdag dbul
NK043(pi)001:10706: ba'i sdug bsngal gyi gtam rtag tu byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:10707: slob ma rnams mkhan po de la byams pas bsod snyoms mang po bsgrubs nas phul ba la /
NK043(pi)001:10709: khyed cag bsod snyoms bsgrubs pas ngal ba 'dis ci bya /
NK043(pi)001:10710: nga bskyab par 'dod na nor bsgrub par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:10712: bdag cag skal ba chung bas 'di tsam las rdo mi thogs na ji ltar bgyi /
NK043(pi)001:10713: sbyin pa'i skye bo nyung la /
NK043(pi)001:10714: bram ze rnams la nor sgrub pa'i thabs kyang chung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10716: bram ze rnams la nor sgrub pa'i thabs gtsug lag las byung ba yod kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10717: nga ni rgas pas mthu med de mi nus so //
NK043(pi)001:10718: slob ma rnams kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10719: gal te de bdag cag gis bsgrub rung na gsung
NK043(pi)001:10720: dang bdag cag gis chos kyi drin lan glan par
NK043(pi)001:10722: gzhan yang snying la rtsol mi phod pa rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:10723: sgrub par dka' mod kyi nan gyis 'dod na nor
NK043(pi)001:10724: sgrub pa'i rig pa de 'di yin te /
NK043(pi)001:10725: bram ze rgud tshe rku ba chos su bshad /
NK043(pi)001:10726: 'jig rten na yang nor med rgud pa'i mchog /
NK043(pi)001:10727: de bas gzhan nor ma mthong blang bar gyis /
NK043(pi)001:10728: 'di dag kun kyang bram ze'i nor yin no //
NK043(pi)001:10729: mngon sum du ni nor 'phrog nus gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10730: bdag gi grags pa bsrung bar bya dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:10731: zhes bshad pas slob ma de dag gis ma brtags par de ltar bagyi'o zhes mnyan to //
NK043(pi)001:10732: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba
NK043(pi)001:10733: yin pas tshig de mi rigs par mthong nas ngo
NK043(pi)001:10734: tsha bas mgo smad de cang mi smra'o //
NK043(pi)001:10735: mkhan pos de mthong nas 'di la yon tan zhig yod par 'dug snyam du bsam zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10736: yang 'di rtsol mi phod pa'am ngal mi byams pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:10737: 'on te chos kyi 'du shes kyis rkun po mi byed pa gang yin brtag go snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:10739: bram ze 'di rnams kyis nga rgud pa mi bzod pas sems stobs bskyed par gyur na /
NK043(pi)001:10740: ci khyod nga la mi byams pa'am /
NK043(pi)001:10741: rtsol mi phod pa'am ci ltar mi smra bar gnas /
NK043(pi)001:10742: byang chub sems dpas gsol ba /
NK043(pi)001:10743: bdag ni mkhan po la mi byams shing snying sra
NK043(pi)001:10744: nas bla ma'i sdug bsngal gyis ma gdungs pa yang
NK043(pi)001:10745: ma lags te / mkhan pos bstan pa'i rig pa
NK043(pi)001:10746: 'di mi srid pa'i phyir 'di la spro ba ma
NK043(pi)001:10747: ma lags te / mchis so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK043(pi)001:10748: 'di ltar sus kyang ma mthong bar sdig pa spyad
NK043(pi)001:10749: du rung ba'i dben pa de lta bu mi srid
NK043(pi)001:10751: 'byung po rnams dang lha dang thub pa dag gis
NK043(pi)001:10752: mi mthong bar gyur pa ni gang na yang med
NK043(pi)001:10753: cing / bdag gis byas pa gzhan gyis ma shes
NK043(pi)001:10754: so snyam du sdig pa byed pa'i byis pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:10756: nyes par byas pa bdag rang nyid kyis mthong bzhin
NK043(pi)001:10757: du byas na sus kyang mi mthong ba ma yin
NK043(pi)001:10758: te / rang gis mngon sum mthong ba'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:10759: de la sdig pa med pa mi srid pas /
NK043(pi)001:10760: de'i slad du bdag de ltar de la spro ba med par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:10761: de la mkhan po de rab tu dga' nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10762: khyod ni ngas smras pa la yang skyon yon shes
NK043(pi)001:10763: pa'i blos nor gyi phyir yon tan chud mi gson
NK043(pi)001:10764: pa legs so // ngo tsha bor nas chos dang 'gal bas lha'i dbang po thob pa las /
NK043(pi)001:10765: gyo mo'i snod thogs te dgra'i sgor slong mo byed pa bzang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10766: bu bram ze chen po legs so zhes bstod par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10767: yang yul shi bi ba rnams kyi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:10768: skye dgu rnams la pha dang 'dra bar phan 'dogs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:10769: de'i blon po chen po'i bu mo lha'i bu mo
NK043(pi)001:10770: dang 'dra ba chags bcas sus mthong yang yid drangs
NK043(pi)001:10771: par byed pa myos byed ma zhes bya ba yod
NK043(pi)001:10772: pas / de'i phas rgyal po la khyod kyi yul du bud med rin po che byung na /
NK043(pi)001:10773: phyag tu bzhes sam mi bzhes nyid mkhyen no zhes byas pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10774: rgyal po des de 'os pa yin min bram ze rnams rtog tu btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10775: bram ze rnams la bu mo des kha zas drang
NK043(pi)001:10776: ba'i tshe bu mo de 'ba' zhig la lta zhing
NK043(pi)001:10777: zas zar ma nus pas de'i phas bu mo mi
NK043(pi)001:10778: snang bar byas te zas byin nas slar gyes so
NK043(pi)001:10779: // bram ze de rnams kyis 'di ni mig 'phrul lta bu bcos pa'i gzugs can de /
NK043(pi)001:10780: 'di byad bzhin bzang ches pas drang srong rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:10781: bslu nus pas 'di dang 'phrad na nges par rgyal
NK043(pi)001:10782: po myos nas chos dang srid kyi don bsgrub pa
NK043(pi)001:10783: las g.yel bar 'gyur ro snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:10784: rgyal po la de ni byad bzhin bzang yang mtshan
NK043(pi)001:10785: ngan pas rgyal pos gzigs su mi rung na khab
NK043(pi)001:10786: tu bgyid pa lta ci smos zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:10787: de thos pas rgyal po chags pa med par gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:10788: rgyal pos mi bzhed par shes nas blon po gcig la byin no //
NK043(pi)001:10789: rgyal po de me tog ku mu ta'i dga' ston la song ba'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:10790: myos byed mas rgyal po 'dis bdag mtshan ngan zhes
NK043(pi)001:10791: bor ro snyam du byad bzhin mdzes par byas te
NK043(pi)001:10793: rgyal pos mthong nas ya mtshan pa'i mig gis ring zhig bltas te /
NK043(pi)001:10794: 'di ni lha'am lha min sogs ci yin snyam du
NK043(pi)001:10795: bltas pas tshim par ma gyur bzhin shing rta gzhan
NK043(pi)001:10796: du thal bas yid mi dga' zhing de 'ba' zhig
NK043(pi)001:10797: sems pas rang gi gnas su phyin pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:10798: kha lo sgyur ba la bud med de su zhig yin zhes dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10799: de ni blon po a b+hi pa /
NK043(pi)001:10800: ra ka zhes pa'i chung ma myos byed ma zhes bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:10801: bu mo de gzhan gyi chung mar gyur pas re
NK043(pi)001:10802: thag chad bzhin de ni myos byed ma zhes pa
NK043(pi)001:10803: ming don dang mthun par gyur to snyam du 'dod
NK043(pi)001:10804: pas myos pa'i mthus brtan pa dang bral te yid
NK043(pi)001:10805: mi bde bas / bzhin dang mig mdangs dang sha bri nas srab mor gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:10806: myos byed ma'i bdag po blon po de brda dang
NK043(pi)001:10807: mtshan ma la mkhas pas rgyal po de 'dod chags
NK043(pi)001:10808: kyi mthus de ltar ma rungs par shes nas /
NK043(pi)001:10809: rgyal po la snying nye bas dben par gsang ste gsol ba /
NK043(pi)001:10810: bdag da nang lha mchod pa'i tshe gnod sbyin zhig
NK043(pi)001:10811: gis myos byed ma la rgyal po thugs chags pa
NK043(pi)001:10812: mi shes sam zhes bgyis nas mi snang bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:10813: pa / de ltar mod na lha gcig bdag la ci'i phyir bka' mi stsal /
NK043(pi)001:10814: myos byed ma 'di bdag la brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig /
NK043(pi)001:10815: de thos pas rgyal po ngo tsha ste mgo smad nas 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10816: chos la sems pa goms pa'i phyir brtan par nyams par mi 'dod pas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10817: de ni mi rigs te bsod nams nyams par 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:10819: khyod kyang de dang bral bas mya ngan skye ba'i
NK043(pi)001:10820: phyir na 'di dang pha rol gnyis su bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:10822: mi mkhas byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa'i chos de /
NK043(pi)001:10823: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsten par mi byed do //
NK043(pi)001:10825: chos dang 'gal ba'i dogs pa mi mdzad du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:10826: bdag gi sbyin pa'i grogs byas pas khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:10827: ma bzhes na bdag gi sbyin pa'i gegs byas pas bsod nams min par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:10828: gleng pa ngan pa'i skabs kyang med do //
NK043(pi)001:10829: 'o skol gnyis min pa 'di sus shes /
NK043(pi)001:10830: des mis khrel 'byung don med do //
NK043(pi)001:10832: nga la rab tu byams kyang de lta bu'i sbyin pa mi rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:10833: sus ma mthong bar sdig pa byas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10834: dug zos bzhin du mi bde ste /
NK043(pi)001:10835: lha dang rnal 'byor can gyis mi mthong ba mi srid do //
NK043(pi)001:10836: gzhan yang 'di btang na khyod la sdug bsngal 'byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10840: bran mo 'di la khyod dbang bas chos dang ci zhig 'gal /
NK043(pi)001:10841: 'di bdag la phongs nas phongs su zad de /
NK043(pi)001:10842: phongs pa byin na phyi mar rab tu dga' zhing phongs pa thos pas lha 'di bzhes su gsol /
NK043(pi)001:10843: rgyal pos smras pa de skad ma zer zhig /
NK043(pi)001:10844: chos spyod pa dag pas dpal thob kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10845: sbyin pa po de la gnod pa byed pa las /
NK043(pi)001:10847: me nang du zhugs kyang sla'o //
NK043(pi)001:10850: thams cad kyis spyad du rung ba'i smad 'tshong ma'i tshul du bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:10854: skyon med pa'i chung ma la /
NK043(pi)001:10855: nga yi chad pas ji ltar gcad /
NK043(pi)001:10856: de lta na smad pa'i gnas su khyod 'gyur te 'di dang gzhan du bsreg par 'gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:10857: des na byar mi rung ba la yus ma che bar rigs pa la dga' bar gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:10859: gal te khyod bde na bdag yid bde ste //
NK043(pi)001:10860: chos dang 'gal lam skye bos smad kyang bzod do //
NK043(pi)001:10861: khyod las lhag pa'i mgon med pas bdag gi bsod nams 'phel phyir 'di bzhes su gsol /
NK043(pi)001:10863: nga la byams pas bdag gi don la yang mi lta ba khyod la /
NK043(pi)001:10864: de'i phyir yang ngas lhag par yal bar 'dor mi rung bas /
NK043(pi)001:10865: 'jig rten gyis smad pa la mi 'dzem pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10866: 'di dang phyi ma'i 'bras bu la mi lta ba
NK043(pi)001:10867: ni lha dang dpal gyis spong bas na srog gi
NK043(pi)001:10868: phyir yang chos min la mi dga' ste /
NK043(pi)001:10870: legs pa chung zhing dogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:10871: gzhan yang dam pa rnams ni pha rol smod pa
NK043(pi)001:10872: sogs sdug bsngal byas na bdag nyid bde ba mi
NK043(pi)001:10873: 'grub pas de'i phyir da ni su la yang mi
NK043(pi)001:10874: gnod par chos la gnas nas rang gi don sgrub
NK043(pi)001:10876: rje'i don du gus pa'i 'bangs kyis spyad pa 'di
NK043(pi)001:10877: ltar phul ba la chos min gyi nongs pa ci
NK043(pi)001:10878: mchis / de la yul 'di'i mi rnams kyis kyang chos min gyi tha snyad gdags su ci yod /
NK043(pi)001:10879: de bas na bzhes su gsol /
NK043(pi)001:10881: khyod ni don la gzhol mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:10882: 'o cag gnyis dang yul shi ba pa'i ljongs kyi
NK043(pi)001:10883: mi dang bcas pa'i nang na su chos shes pa'i
NK043(pi)001:10884: mchog yin pa de gang yin dpyad dgos so //
NK043(pi)001:10886: rgan pa bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:10887: thos mang blo rno ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10888: don gyi mchog rig pa lha gcig khyed las che ba med do //
NK043(pi)001:10890: de lta na nga 'di la bslu bar mi rigs te /
NK043(pi)001:10892: 'jig rten na phan pa dang gnod pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:10893: rgyal po rnams kyi spyod pa la rag lus pas /
NK043(pi)001:10894: 'bangs rnams la snying nye bar bsams nas /
NK043(pi)001:10895: gtam snyan 'byung ba'i lam la blta zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10896: khyu mchog gang du song ba'i rjes su 'gro ba rnams dogs pa med pa 'brangs pa ltar /
NK043(pi)001:10897: 'bangs rnams kyang rgyal po'i rjes su 'brangs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:10899: des rang nyid srung ma nus na 'bangs ji ltar srung /
NK043(pi)001:10900: bdag ni 'bangs la lta ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10901: chos dang grags pa dri ma med par lta ba'i sems kyis /
NK043(pi)001:10902: 'dod pa'i sems kyi dbang du mi 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:10903: de nas blon po des rgyal po bsran tshugs par rigs nas phyag byas te /
NK043(pi)001:10904: rgyal po khyod lta bu bzhugs pa'i 'bangs rnams ni skal ba bzang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:10905: chos la gnas shing bde ba la ma chags pa
NK043(pi)001:10906: khyod lta bu dka' thub kyi nags na'ang dkon no
NK043(pi)001:10907: // rgyal po chen po zhes pa'i sgra yang yon
NK043(pi)001:10908: tan ldan pa khyod la 'os so zhes basngagasa so
NK043(pi)001:10909: // // de ltar bdag nyid chen po rnams ni sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:10910: ngan pa'i lam du mi 'jug pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:10911: yang sngon byang chub sems dpa' lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:10912: lha'i bde ba phun sum tshogs kyang snying rje'i dbang
NK043(pi)001:10913: gis 'jig rten gyi don la bya ba la lhod
NK043(pi)001:10915: mi'i 'jig rten du nyul zhing lha'i mig gis mthong ba las /
NK043(pi)001:10916: mdza' bo zhes bya ba'i rgyal po zhig /
NK043(pi)001:10917: mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa'i skyon gyis
NK043(pi)001:10918: blon po dang 'bangs su bcas pa chang 'thung ba
NK043(pi)001:10919: la dga' zhing skyon du mi lta ba la /
NK043(pi)001:10920: bdag nyid chen po des chang 'thung ba skyon du
NK043(pi)001:10921: che bar mthong nas de la thabs ji ltar bya
NK043(pi)001:10922: snyam pa dang / thog mar rgyal po nyid bcos na de'i rjes su 'khor rnams 'jug pas /
NK043(pi)001:10923: byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin de gser gtso ma'i mdog ltar yid du 'ong ba /
NK043(pi)001:10924: skra'i thor tshugs cung zad rtsub pa g.yas su 'khyil ba can /
NK043(pi)001:10925: shing shun dang ri dwags a dzi na'i lpags pa byon pa /
NK043(pi)001:10926: tshangs pa lta bur lus gzi byin ldan pa gcig tu sprul zhing /
NK043(pi)001:10927: chang gis gang ba'i bum pa ha cang mi che ba zhig lag g.yon du thogs nas /
NK043(pi)001:10928: rgyal po 'dza' bo 'khor gyi nang du 'dug ste /
NK043(pi)001:10933: rgun chang gi gtam gleng ba'i skabs su de dag
NK043(pi)001:10934: gi mdun gyi mkha' las byung ste 'dug pa dang
NK043(pi)001:10935: / skye bo de dag ngo mtshar zhing gus pas langs nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la /
NK043(pi)001:10936: des 'brug gi sgra lta bur gsang bstod de smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10937: me tog gi mgul chings can gyi bum pa 'di sus nyo 'dod /
NK043(pi)001:10938: de la rgyal po ya mtshan pas gus pas thal mo sbyar te /
NK043(pi)001:10939: 'jig rten na nyi zla ltar mdzes pa'i sku can khyod su zhig /
NK043(pi)001:10940: 'jig rten kun gyis ngo shes par bya ba'i slad du gsungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:10941: khyod la yon tan ya mtshan can yod par bdag cag sems so //
NK043(pi)001:10943: nga su yin phyis shes par 'gyur gyis /
NK043(pi)001:10944: khyed cag 'jig rten gzhan dang tshe 'dir brlag pa
NK043(pi)001:10945: la mi 'jigs na bum pa 'di nga las nyo
NK043(pi)001:10946: bar gyis shig / rgyal pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10947: e ma khyod kyis tshong zong btsong ba 'di ni sngon ma byung ba zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:10948: 'jig rten na zong rnams yon tan brjod cing nyes pa'i skyon bcab na /
NK043(pi)001:10949: rdzun du mi smra ba khyod lta bu'i tshul 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:10950: cing dge ba rnams ni bden pa dag phongs par
NK043(pi)001:10951: gyur kyang mi gtong ba lags na /
NK043(pi)001:10952: bum pa 'di ci zhig gis bkang /
NK043(pi)001:10953: khe spog chen po ci yod nas khyod kyis bdag
NK043(pi)001:10954: la btsong ba'i don bdag nyid chen po khyod smos
NK043(pi)001:10955: shig / brgya byin gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:10956: rgyal po chen po gson cig /
NK043(pi)001:10957: 'di ni chu dang zho dang dar ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:10959: ge sar dri zhim pa'i khu ba'i chu dang /
NK043(pi)001:10960: mar dang 'o mas gang ba min te /
NK043(pi)001:10961: sdig pa'i rang bzhin can gyis gang ba'i bum pa 'di'i yon tan nyon cig /
NK043(pi)001:10962: gang zhig 'thung na ra ror song nas gom pa dbang med 'dor zhing 'gro //
NK043(pi)001:10963: yul phyogs ma 'dris par yang 'khyams shing rdeg 'chos dran pa nyams par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:10964: bza' dang mi bza' dpyad pa med par de dag bzar gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:10965: de dang de yis gang ba'i bum pa tha shal 'di nyos shig /
NK043(pi)001:10966: ces sogs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas /
NK043(pi)001:10967: rang gi sems la dbang med pas phyugs bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:10969: de'i mdun sar gar byed cing brang brdung ba /
NK043(pi)001:10970: gang 'thung bas ngo tsha spangs nas gcer bur byed cing grong khyer du rgyu ba /
NK043(pi)001:10971: skyugs shing khyi yis kha bldag pa la dogs pa mi shes pa /
NK043(pi)001:10972: dran pa med par lam po cher nyal ba /
NK043(pi)001:10973: myos nas pha ma dang nor gyi bdag po dag kyang khyad du gsod pa /
NK043(pi)001:10974: phan tshun 'thab pa sogs kyi skyon can btsongs na 'grims pa de bum pa 'dir blugs so //
NK043(pi)001:10975: gang la chags na dpal gyi gzhir gyur rigs /
NK043(pi)001:10976: je mtho je mthor 'gyur ba'ang brlag par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:10977: nor gyi dbyig ldan rigs kyang phung bar 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:10978: btsong rgyu de ni bum pa 'di na 'dug /
NK043(pi)001:10979: glo bur ngu zhing dgod la ma nges smra //
NK043(pi)001:10980: gdon zin bzhin du mig ni mchi mas gang //
NK043(pi)001:10981: smad cing brnyas pa'i gnas su nges 'gyur ba //
NK043(pi)001:10982: blo nyams 'gyur de bum pa 'di na yod //
NK043(pi)001:10984: myos 'gyur rig sngags sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa //
NK043(pi)001:10985: sdig pa'i ma mo byung ngan mngon sum bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:10986: rtsod pa'i lam dang tha dad ma yin pas //
NK043(pi)001:10987: snying gi mun pa mi bzad de nyos shig /
NK043(pi)001:10989: mi yi bdag po chang ni 'di 'dra yang //
NK043(pi)001:10990: 'jig rten na ni lha zhes rab tu grags //
NK043(pi)001:10991: yon tan la ni yang dag mi dga' ba //
NK043(pi)001:10992: de dag chang 'di nyo la 'bad par gyis //
NK043(pi)001:10993: gang zhig bsten na ngan pa spyod par 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:10994: rab tu 'jigs pas sems can dmyal bar lhung //
NK043(pi)001:10995: dud 'gro'i gnas dang yi dwags dbul gyur pa //
NK043(pi)001:10996: mthong bar 'dod pa de ni su zhig yod //
NK043(pi)001:10998: tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur zhing gtam ngan mngon sum 'byung //
NK043(pi)001:10999: ngo tsha med cing blo gros dri ma can du 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:11000: gang zhig 'thungs na yon tan de dang de nyams pa //
NK043(pi)001:11001: de bas rgyal po khyod kyis chang 'thung ga la rigs //
NK043(pi)001:11002: zhes smras pa rgyal po de'i snying la 'bab pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11003: tshig rnams kyis chang 'thung ba'i nyes pa shes te
NK043(pi)001:11004: chang 'thung ba la chags shing zhen pa med par
NK043(pi)001:11005: gyur nas brgya byin la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11006: khyod ni byams pa'i pha ma dang 'dul bas mnyes par byas pa'i bla ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:11007: tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa'i thub pa bzhin te /
NK043(pi)001:11008: khyod kyis bdag la phan phyir legs par gdams pa
NK043(pi)001:11009: de nyams su blangs la tshul bzhin mnyes par bagyi'o
NK043(pi)001:11010: // legs par smras pa'i lan du yul gru bzang
NK043(pi)001:11011: po lnga yang khyod la 'bul na bdag las bzhes
NK043(pi)001:11012: // par rigs so // bran brgya dang bzhon pa lnga brgya dang /
NK043(pi)001:11013: rta mchog dang sbyar ba'i shing rta bcu po 'bul na /
NK043(pi)001:11014: bdag gi bla ma phan pa ston pa khyod /
NK043(pi)001:11015: gzhan yang bdag gis gang dang gang bgyi ba 'dir
NK043(pi)001:11016: spring zhing slan chad kyang bdag la spyan ras kyis
NK043(pi)001:11017: stsol bar gsol / brgya byin gyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11018: yul gru mchog lnga sogs nga mi 'dod de /
NK043(pi)001:11019: nga ni lha'i dbang po yin par rgyal pos shes par gyis /
NK043(pi)001:11020: phan par smra ba la mchod par byed pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:11021: bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin nyams su len pa yin la /
NK043(pi)001:11022: tshe 'dir dpal dang grags pa'i gzhi dang /
NK043(pi)001:11023: skye ba slad mar bde ba 'thob pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:11024: chang la chags pa spongs la chos bzhin gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:11025: ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11026: de phyin chad rgyal blon 'bangs su bcas pas chang mi 'thung bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11027: yang sngon gyis dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di byang
NK043(pi)001:11028: chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe bsam gtan la goms
NK043(pi)001:11029: par byas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes nas
NK043(pi)001:11030: bsam gtan gyi bde ba chen po thob kyang snying
NK043(pi)001:11031: rje la goms pa'i dbang gis gzhan la phan par
NK043(pi)001:11032: bzhed pas 'dod pa'i khams sdug bsngal dang yid mi
NK043(pi)001:11033: bde bas gang ba la bltas nas /
NK043(pi)001:11034: yul lus 'phags po'i rgyal po yan lag sbyin zhes
NK043(pi)001:11035: bya ba mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pas
NK043(pi)001:11036: 'jig rten pha rol dang las kyi rnam smin med
NK043(pi)001:11037: pa'i lta ba bzung nas chos spyod pa la rgyab
NK043(pi)001:11038: kyis phyogs pa de bdag nyid chen po lha'i drang
NK043(pi)001:11039: srong des ngan song la gzhol ba'i sems can de
NK043(pi)001:11041: de gzhal med khang zhig na 'dug pa'i mdun du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:11042: nyi ma ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:11044: de la lta zhing langs te gus par smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11045: nyi ma ltar mdzes shing gsal ba'i gzugs can khyod su zhig /
NK043(pi)001:11047: bdag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i drang srong lags so //
NK043(pi)001:11048: rgyal po des legs so zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:11050: rkang pa bkrus pas bkur sti byas nas 'phags pa
NK043(pi)001:11051: khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul ni mthu che ste 'di ces
NK043(pi)001:11053: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11054: bsam gtan tshul khrims dri med dang //
NK043(pi)001:11055: dbang po rnams ni rab bsdams shing //
NK043(pi)001:11056: srid pa gzhan la'ang goms byas pa //
NK043(pi)001:11059: 'jig rten pha rol yod ces zer ba ni bden nam /
NK043(pi)001:11061: rgyal po chen po bden te 'jig rten pha rol mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:11063: 'phags pa 'di bdag gis ji ltar yid ches par bgyi /
NK043(pi)001:11064: byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11065: rgyal po 'di rab tu gsal te /
NK043(pi)001:11066: mngon sum la sogs pa'i rigs pa tshad ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:11067: yid gcugs pa'i tshig gis bstan pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11068: brtag pa'i rim pas kyang yid ches par byar rung ngo snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:11069: nyi zla skar mas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' dang //
NK043(pi)001:11070: dud 'gro brtags pa'i rnam pa mang po 'dis //
NK043(pi)001:11071: 'jig rten pha rol mngon sum bzhin du snang //
NK043(pi)001:11072: 'di la the tshom blo ngan khyod ma bskyed //
NK043(pi)001:11073: gzhan yang bsam gtan can gyis sngon gyi tshe rabs
NK043(pi)001:11074: dran pa yod pas 'jig rten pha rol rjes su
NK043(pi)001:11075: dpag go // rang gi blo la brtags na yang /
NK043(pi)001:11076: snga ma'i blo la phyi ma'i blo 'grub pas 'jig rten pha rol yod par mngon no //
NK043(pi)001:11077: mngal na 'dug pa'i snga rol gyi blo de ni de ma thag tshe sngon ma'i blo'o //
NK043(pi)001:11078: shes bya rtogs par byed pa la blo zhes brjod de /
NK043(pi)001:11079: de bas skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bcas pa'i blo las yul yod cing /
NK043(pi)001:11080: mig sogs tsam zhig blo ma yin pas de ni tshe 'di kho nar byung ba tsam min te /
NK043(pi)001:11081: de lta bu'i blo ni 'jig rten pha rol du yang yod do //
NK043(pi)001:11082: skye bo rnams kyi tshul khrims dang dad pa la sogs pa'i bye brag ni /
NK043(pi)001:11083: pha ma'i tshul dang mi mthun par snang ba de
NK043(pi)001:11084: dag tshe rabs snga ma rnams su goms pa'i shugs
NK043(pi)001:11085: che chung yin gyi blo bur du byung ba min
NK043(pi)001:11086: no // blo mthu mi gsal zhing dbang po blun
NK043(pi)001:11087: pa rnams kyang btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma
NK043(pi)001:11088: bstan par nu zho 'thung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:11089: kha zas la rtsol ba de dag kyang srid pa gzhan la goms par byas par mngon no //
NK043(pi)001:11090: gang dang ci'i las la goms par byas pas mkhas par gyur pa yod pas /
NK043(pi)001:11091: sngar goms pa'i stobs kyis phyis su gsal por 'grub pa bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:11092: 'jig rten pha rol yod par yid mi ches pa dag gis /
NK043(pi)001:11093: ji ltar pad+ma rnams 'byed pa dang 'dzum pa dag
NK043(pi)001:11094: tshe rabs snga ma'i goms pa las gyur pa mi
NK043(pi)001:11096: nu zho 'thung ba dag kyang tshe rabs snga ma'i goms pa las ci'i phyir 'dod snyam na /
NK043(pi)001:11097: dus nges pa dang ma nges pa'i khyad yod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11098: 'bad pa rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i khyad yod pas pad+ma dang mi mtshungs te /
NK043(pi)001:11099: pad+ma 'byed 'dzum nyi ma shar ba'i rgyu la ltos pa'i dus nges pa yod la /
NK043(pi)001:11100: nu zho 'thung bar rtsol ba ni blo'i 'dun pa
NK043(pi)001:11101: la ltos pas phyi'i dus la nges pa med pa
NK043(pi)001:11102: dang / pad+ma la ni 'bad pa'i rtsol ba med de sems med pa'i phyir dang /
NK043(pi)001:11103: nu zho 'thung ba ni sems kyis rtsol ba'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:11104: de gnyis rnam pa kun tu mtshungs par bsgrub du rigs pa ma yin no //
NK043(pi)001:11105: de bas rgyal po legs par brtags na 'jig rten pha rol yod par rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11106: de nas rgyal po log lta la blo zhen che
NK043(pi)001:11107: zhing sdig che bas 'jig rten pha rol yod pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11108: gtam des nyams mi bde nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11109: kye drang srong chen po 'jig rten pha rol zhes
NK043(pi)001:11110: pa gal te byis pa bsdigs tshul 'dra ba ma
NK043(pi)001:11111: yin par / 'di ni bdag gi yid ches par bya bar khyod sems na /
NK043(pi)001:11112: 'o na de ring gser srang lnga brgya nga la byin dang /
NK043(pi)001:11113: de'i skyin po gser srang stong srid pa gzhan du sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:11114: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11115: re zhig nor 'byor bar 'dod pas bu lon gtong
NK043(pi)001:11116: ba de ni bdag nyid ngan zhing brkams pa mi
NK043(pi)001:11117: mkhas pa le lo can la nor mi gtong ste
NK043(pi)001:11119: gang ngo tsha shes shing rigs btsun pa nor spel ba la mkhas pa /
NK043(pi)001:11120: rab tu dbul yang bu lon 'jal bar byed pa la btang na nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:11121: 'jig rten gzhan la bu lon mjal ba'i tshig gis /
NK043(pi)001:11122: lta ba ngan pa can khyod la nor btang yang don med de /
NK043(pi)001:11123: lta ba ngan pa'i rang gi las kyis dmyal bar
NK043(pi)001:11124: lhung nas sdug bsngal ba'i tshe gser srang stong su
NK043(pi)001:11126: dmyal bar skyes pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyang zhib tu brjod pas /
NK043(pi)001:11127: rgyal po des sems can dmyal ba'i gtam 'jigs su
NK043(pi)001:11128: rung ba thos pas log pa'i lta ba la chags
NK043(pi)001:11130: 'jig rten pha rol yod par yid ches par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:11131: drang srong chen po de la phyag 'tshal nas smras
NK043(pi)001:11132: pa bdag ni lta ngan gyi lam du song bas
NK043(pi)001:11133: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos pas skrag ste bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:11134: de lta bu nam myong snyam du sems so //
NK043(pi)001:11135: gang gis ngan 'gror mi ltung ba'i lam bshad du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:11136: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11137: khyod ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la gnas nas /
NK043(pi)001:11138: gzhan yang de la bskul te /
NK043(pi)001:11139: snying rje dang ldan pas ser sna dang tshul 'chal sogs chos min spongs la /
NK043(pi)001:11140: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la gnas pas dbang po bsdams par gyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:11141: bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus ngan song du mi 'gro
NK043(pi)001:11142: bar mtho ris kyi bde ba mang po myong bar
NK043(pi)001:11143: 'gyur ro zhes gdams nas de nyid du mi snang
NK043(pi)001:11144: bar gyur to // rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs nas /
NK043(pi)001:11145: sbyin pa dang sdoms pa sogs bsod nams la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11146: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:11147: tshangs pas byin gyis sras ka shi mdzes pa zhes
NK043(pi)001:11149: de skye ba gzhan du goms pa'i shes rab kyi mthus /
NK043(pi)001:11150: lang tsho dang po'i dus su yang bud med kyi
NK043(pi)001:11151: dngos po sogs 'dod pa'i spyod yul la sems mi
NK043(pi)001:11152: 'phro zhing rgyal srid la nyes dmigs su bltas nas
NK043(pi)001:11153: rgyal tshab kyi bya ba dor te nags su gnas
NK043(pi)001:11154: par gyur cing bsam gtan byed do //
NK043(pi)001:11155: de dus gcig na bsam gtan las langs te nags kyi tshal du rgyu ba na /
NK043(pi)001:11156: gzugs kyi yon tan mchog tu mnga' ba'i mi'am ci mo zhig mthong bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11157: mi'am ci mo des kyang de mthong bas gzugs bzang
NK043(pi)001:11158: pos yid 'phrogs nas de'i mdun du pheb par smra
NK043(pi)001:11159: zhing / bdag gi grogs mo mi'am ci mo zhig
NK043(pi)001:11160: gzugs dang lang tsho'i yon tan gyi che bas lha
NK043(pi)001:11161: rnams kyang skyengs par byed pa des khyod mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:11162: rtag tu chags pa'i gdung ba kho nar gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:11163: des bdag khyod kyi drung du mngags pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:11164: khyod kyis de dga' bar bya 'os so //
NK043(pi)001:11165: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11166: ci mi'am ci mo de khyod bas na tshod lhag gam des lhag ces zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:11167: byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa /
NK043(pi)001:11168: 'di ltar na tshod ni yud kyis 'gyur ba ste khyod kyang na tshod 'da' zhing 'jug ste /
NK043(pi)001:11169: mi'am ci mo de yang lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:11171: lus ni mi gtsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor te /
NK043(pi)001:11172: de la chags pas sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po byed pa sogs kyi tshul bstan pas /
NK043(pi)001:11173: de'i 'dod pa'i me zhi nas bsam gtan byed par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11174: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi spyil bur zhugs par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:11175: de ltar mi'am ci mo mchog tu mdzes mas kyang dka' thub shigs par ma gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:11176: phyis su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:11177: gar mkhan gyi bu mo ut+pala zhes bya bas bcom
NK043(pi)001:11178: ldan 'das kyi mdun du gar dang glu rnams byas
NK043(pi)001:11179: pa la ston pas chos bstan pas lang tsho'i rgyags
NK043(pi)001:11180: pa bsal bar byas nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:11182: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:11183: rigs su 'khrungs shing bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha
NK043(pi)001:11185: sbyin sreg sogs kyi las la brtson pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:11186: kyis bkur ba zhig tu gyur pa na des khyim
NK043(pi)001:11187: gyi nyes pa mthong nas dka' thub kyi nags su
NK043(pi)001:11189: de byams pa'i stobs kyis sbrul dang /
NK043(pi)001:11191: khwa dang ri dwags te grogs po bzhi de'i mdun du 'dus shing slob ma ltar 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:11192: der ri dwags des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11193: drang srong chen po 'jigs pa las sdug bsngal che ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11195: bkres pa las che ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan ma mthong bas 'di las skyob pa'i thabs gsungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:11197: khro ba'i me 'dis rang gzhan gnyis ka sreg pas 'di zhi ba'i thabs ci zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:11199: 'dod chags kyi mes gdung ba la ni zla ba
NK043(pi)001:11200: dang chu bsil sogs cis kyang zhi bar mi nus
NK043(pi)001:11202: 'dis zil gyis mi gnon pa'i thabs gsungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:11203: de la byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11204: sdug bsngal 'di bzhi po'i rtsa ba ni ma rig pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:11205: ma rig pa 'gags na 'du byed sogs nas sdug
NK043(pi)001:11206: bsngal gyi phung po mtha' dag 'gag par 'gyur ro
NK043(pi)001:11208: sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba can skye ba 'di la ji ltar chad par 'gyur /
NK043(pi)001:11210: gal te zhi bar 'dod na srog gcod rku dang
NK043(pi)001:11211: mi tshangs spyod dang rdzun sogs spangs te dbang po
NK043(pi)001:11212: thul bar byas na skye ba'i ljon shing rtsad nas
NK043(pi)001:11214: de la thams cad kyis legs so zhes gsol te
NK043(pi)001:11215: so so'i gnas su drang srong thub pa'i gdams ngag
NK043(pi)001:11216: bzhin du srog chags la mi 'tshe ba sogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:11217: brtul zhugs dang ldan pas gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:11218: dedaga tshe 'phos pa'i rjes su mir skye ba thob nas zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11219: tshul khrims dang ldan pa chos la gnas pa dag gi bden pa'i tshig grub pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:11220: sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid skar ma rgyu ba dang phyogs kyi dpyad dang /
NK043(pi)001:11221: glo bur ba'i ltas dang mtshan ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:11222: dus dang dus min gyi bye brag dang /
NK043(pi)001:11223: nya dang chu'i kha dog sogs rgya mtsho'i dpyad dang /
NK043(pi)001:11225: bya dang ri dwags sogs kyi mtshan mas kyang rgya mtsho'i phyogs kyi dpyad la mkhas pa /
NK043(pi)001:11226: le lo dang gnyid chung zhing dran shes dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:11227: tsha grang sogs kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa /
NK043(pi)001:11229: gru drongs pa dang bzlog pa'i thabs la mkhas pas
NK043(pi)001:11230: rgya mtsho'i tshong pa rnams 'dod pa'i yul du phyin
NK043(pi)001:11231: par byed pa de'i ming legs par pha rol tu
NK043(pi)001:11232: phyin par byed pa zhes bya bar skye ba bzhes
NK043(pi)001:11233: pa na de bkra shis shing don 'grub pa phun
NK043(pi)001:11234: sum tshogs pa'i phyir tshod pa rnams kyis bkur sti
NK043(pi)001:11235: cher byed cing gsol ba btab nas rgya mtshor 'jug
NK043(pi)001:11236: par byed do // dus shig na yul b+ha tu
NK043(pi)001:11237: kats+tsha nas tshong pa gser gyi gling du 'dong zhing
NK043(pi)001:11238: don grub par 'dod pa zhig gis de la ded
NK043(pi)001:11239: dpon byed par gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11241: bdag rgas pas bgrod mi nus zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11242: de dag gis khyod la bgyi ba gzhan med mod /
NK043(pi)001:11243: khyed grur zhugs na bkra shis shing don grub pa'i slad du gsol ba 'debs so //
NK043(pi)001:11244: des de dag la snying brtse bas rgya mtsho chen
NK043(pi)001:11245: por grur zhugs pas tshong pa de dag gis gdon
NK043(pi)001:11246: mi za bar don grub bo snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:11247: de nas mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por nya'i rigs sna tshogs rnam par rgyu ba /
NK043(pi)001:11248: rlung gis bskyod cing chu rlabs sgra dang bcas pa mang po 'byung ba /
NK043(pi)001:11249: rin po che dang sa'i kha dog gi khyad par mang pos mdog mi 'dra bar gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:11250: dbu ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa /
NK043(pi)001:11251: lha min dang klu mchog rnams kyi gnas gting dpag
NK043(pi)001:11252: med pa'i rgya mtsho de'i nang du zhugs pa las
NK043(pi)001:11253: / re zhig na phyi dro'i dus su rlung chen po langs pas sprin bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:11254: nyi ma'i 'od zer med par byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:11255: rgya mtsho la yang rlabs 'khrugs pas sgra chen po byung /
NK043(pi)001:11256: sprin nag po las glog 'byin zhing 'brug gi sgra grags te /
NK043(pi)001:11257: rim gyis nyi ma nub tu nye pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11258: char drag po dang rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'dres pas 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:11259: pa chen po byung nas tshong pa de dag skrag
NK043(pi)001:11260: ste / lha sogs la gsol ba 'debs par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:11261: der rlung dang chu'i shugs kyis bdas pas nyin zhag du mar chu'i 'gram mi mthong zhing /
NK043(pi)001:11262: rgya mtsho'i mtshan ma ji 'dod pa ma mthong bar
NK043(pi)001:11263: sngar ma mthong ba sha stag mthong bas sems 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:11264: shing ci bya gtol med du gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11265: ded dpon des khyed cag zhum zhing mya ngan byas pas mi phan gyis /
NK043(pi)001:11266: thabs mkhas pa la bsten na rab tu dka' yang
NK043(pi)001:11267: tshegs chung dus thal bar 'gyur bas sems rab tu
NK043(pi)001:11268: brtan par gyis shes spro bsrings nas /
NK043(pi)001:11269: rgya mtsho'i 'gram mthong du re bas bltas pas /
NK043(pi)001:11270: mi'i gzugs 'dra ba dngul gyi ya lad gyon pa
NK043(pi)001:11271: chu'i nang du bying nas phang steng du 'jug pa
NK043(pi)001:11272: mthong ngo // de ci zhes ded dpon la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11273: 'di ni mi ma yin gyi nya mi dang 'dra ba yin gyis /
NK043(pi)001:11275: 'on kyang bdag cag rnams phar tshur gyi yul gnyis ka las ring du thal nas /
NK043(pi)001:11276: rgya mtsho spu gri'i phreng bar son pas 'di las bzlog par 'bod cig /
NK043(pi)001:11278: chu rtag tu 'bab pa dang rlung rtog nub nas
NK043(pi)001:11279: langs pas gru mgyogs par song ste bzlog ma nus
NK043(pi)001:11280: so // der mthar gyis khyer bas dngul gyi mdog
NK043(pi)001:11281: lta bu'i chu dkar po dbu phreng can gyi rgya
NK043(pi)001:11283: ded dpon la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11284: 'di ni 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i zho phreng gi rgya mtsho zhes bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:11285: bdag cag ring du chus khyer bas shin tu dka' ste /
NK043(pi)001:11286: 'di las thal te 'gro mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11288: gru bo che rab tu mgyogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11289: rlung yang drag pas gru dal bus btang yang mi
NK043(pi)001:11290: nus na slar log par ga la nus zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:11291: so // de nas rgya mtsho de 'das te /
NK043(pi)001:11292: rgya mtsho'i chu gzhan rlabs kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa gser gyi mdog lta bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:11293: chu'i mdog me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:11294: ded dpon la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11295: 'di ni rgya mtsho me yi phreng ba zhes bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:11296: 'di las bzlog nus na legs zhes de'i ming tsam
NK043(pi)001:11297: bstan nas chu'i kha dog de ltar gyur pa'i gtan
NK043(pi)001:11300: rgya mtsho gzhan rin po che sbur med dang /
NK043(pi)001:11301: an+da rnyil gyi mdog kyang 'dra la /
NK043(pi)001:11302: rtsa ku sha smin pa'i mdog 'dra ba mthong nas dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11303: 'di ni rgya mtsho ku sha'i phreng ba can te /
NK043(pi)001:11304: lcags kyu med pa'i glang po che dang 'dra ba
NK043(pi)001:11305: bzod par dka' ba'i chu 'bab pa 'dis bdag cag
NK043(pi)001:11306: gi dga' ba nyams par byed pas slar bzlog pa
NK043(pi)001:11308: tshong pa de dag 'bad kyang gru bzlog tu ma btub par /
NK043(pi)001:11309: rgya mtsho de las kyang thal nas /
NK043(pi)001:11310: chu'i mdog beed+aur+ya lta bu sngon po'i mdog can gyi rgya mtsho mthong nas dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11311: ded dpon des tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal bar
NK043(pi)001:11312: shes nas mi dga' ba'i shugs ring phyungs te dal
NK043(pi)001:11313: bus smras pa / 'di ni rgya mtsho 'dam bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:11314: da ni 'dir thal bas phyir bzlog par dka' la
NK043(pi)001:11315: phyir ma log na 'jig rten tha mar byed pa'o
NK043(pi)001:11317: tshong pa de dag sems zhum lus kyi tshigs shig shig por gyur /
NK043(pi)001:11319: rgya mtsho de las kyang thal nas nyi ma'i 'od kyang je chung du nub la nye zhing /
NK043(pi)001:11320: rgya mtsho ni bla 'og bsgyur ba ltar gyur te
NK043(pi)001:11321: chu thams cad mthur du gcong rong chen po'i nang
NK043(pi)001:11324: ser ba drag po bab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11325: smyig tshal mes bsregs pas tog yar gyi sgra lta
NK043(pi)001:11326: bur sgra che zhing rab tu 'jigs par byed pa
NK043(pi)001:11327: thos so // der tshong pa dag 'ur langs shing
NK043(pi)001:11328: phyogs kun tu bltas nas blo rab tu blong blong
NK043(pi)001:11329: thos so // por gyur te / ded dpon gyi drung du 'dus shing smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11330: bdag cag ni rna ba gas shing snying yang 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:11331: pas dkrugs pa'i chung bdag po khros pa lta bu'i
NK043(pi)001:11333: chu thams cad gcong rong 'jigs pa'i nang du 'bab pa 'dra na rgya mtsho 'di 'dra ci lags /
NK043(pi)001:11335: de nas bdag nyid chen po de yang rtab pa'i tshul gyis /
NK043(pi)001:11336: e ma ho mtshar byas zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:11337: gad du phyin na slar mi ldog pa'i 'chi bdag
NK043(pi)001:11338: gi kha lta bu rgya mtsho'i klong zhes bya ba
NK043(pi)001:11340: de thos pas tshong pa rnams rgya mtsho'i klong gi
NK043(pi)001:11341: khar chud do snyam zhing gson du re ba med
NK043(pi)001:11342: pas 'chi bas 'jigs pas sems blong blong por gyur
NK043(pi)001:11345: kha cig 'khum ste ci yang byed mi nus /
NK043(pi)001:11346: kha cig sems stor nas phongs pa'i yid kyis lha'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal /
NK043(pi)001:11347: de bzhin du kha cig gis /
NK043(pi)001:11352: rgya mtsho'i lha rnams la skyabs su dong /
NK043(pi)001:11354: gzhan dag lha mo la phyag 'tshal /
NK043(pi)001:11355: kha cig legs par pha rol du phyin pa'i drung du 'ongs nas smre sngags 'don te /
NK043(pi)001:11356: phongs pa las thar bar bgyid pa'i mthu chen po can khyod /
NK043(pi)001:11357: bdag cag klong gi khar chud pa'i mgon med pa
NK043(pi)001:11358: rnams la thugs brtan par dgongs la skyabs mdzad cing
NK043(pi)001:11359: khyod kyi mthu chen po ston cig /
NK043(pi)001:11360: rgya mtsho 'dis kyang khyod kyi bka' mi gcog snyam du sems te /
NK043(pi)001:11361: de bas 'khrugs pa 'di las bzlog cig ces gsol ba btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:11362: de'i tshe bdag nyid chen po des snying rje'i sems
NK043(pi)001:11363: kyis tshong pa de dag spro ba sring ba'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:11364: smras pa / bdag gis 'di la yang bcos su yod pa'i thabs 'ga' zhig mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:11365: re zhig snying rjes sbyar bar bya na /
NK043(pi)001:11367: de thos pas 'di la'ang bcos su yod do zer
NK043(pi)001:11368: ro snyam du re thag ma chad de yid rton
NK043(pi)001:11370: byang chub sems dpa' legs par pha rol du phyin
NK043(pi)001:11371: pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
NK043(pi)001:11372: mo g.yas pa'i lha nga gru bo che la btsugs
NK043(pi)001:11373: te / lus thams cad kyis btud cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:11374: tshong pa khyed rnams dang rgya mtsho dang nam mkha'
NK043(pi)001:11375: la gnas pa'i lha khyad par can rnams gson cig
NK043(pi)001:11376: / bdag ni shed byed tshun chad du //
NK043(pi)001:11377: nam yang ched du bsams nas su //
NK043(pi)001:11378: srog chags rnams ni nam du yang //
NK043(pi)001:11379: bsad par bdag gis yod mi dran //
NK043(pi)001:11380: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag dang //
NK043(pi)001:11381: bdag gi bsod nams mthu dag gis //
NK043(pi)001:11382: rgya mtsho'i klong du ma song bar //
NK043(pi)001:11383: gru 'di bde bar slar lo gcig /
NK043(pi)001:11384: de skad smras pa'i mod la rlung de chu'i shugs
NK043(pi)001:11385: dang bcas pa slar log pas gru de yang slar
NK043(pi)001:11386: log pa dang / de mthong nas tshong pa de
NK043(pi)001:11387: dag rab tu ya mtshan zhing dga' bar gyur pas
NK043(pi)001:11388: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bskyed
NK043(pi)001:11389: de gru slar log go zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:11390: de nas bdag nyid chen po des myur du ba dan tshugs shig ces bsgos pas /
NK043(pi)001:11391: las su bskos pa de dag gis dga' zhing spro ba bskyed de bsgo ba bzhin byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11392: de nas chu dang rlung mthun par bab cing langs
NK043(pi)001:11393: pas skye bo rnams dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pas bsten
NK043(pi)001:11394: pa'i gru de gzhal med khang gi tshul du ci
NK043(pi)001:11395: bder 'gro zhing nam stod du nyi ba'i tshe khad
NK043(pi)001:11396: kyis mun pas kheb cing skar ma rnams bkra bar
NK043(pi)001:11397: snang ba nam stod la bab pa'i tshe ded dpon
NK043(pi)001:11398: gyis 'dam bu'i phreng ba tshun chad kyi rgya mtsho
NK043(pi)001:11399: las bye ma dang rdo ba ci mthong ba rnams
NK043(pi)001:11400: longs la grus ci theg pa gru nang du zhog
NK043(pi)001:11401: dang de ltar byas na gru 'di lcid kyis non
NK043(pi)001:11402: pas ldog par yang mi 'gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:11403: bye ma dang rdo ba 'di dag bkra shis par
NK043(pi)001:11404: bkur ba sha stag yin pas khyod cag gdon mi
NK043(pi)001:11405: za bar rnyed pa grub par 'gyur ro zhes byas
NK043(pi)001:11406: pas / de dag gis legs par pha rol tu
NK043(pi)001:11407: phyin pa la yid dga' zhing gus pas lha rnams
NK043(pi)001:11408: kyi bstan pa'i gling de dang de dag gi bye
NK043(pi)001:11409: ma dang rdo ba yin snyam pa'i blos /
NK043(pi)001:11410: beed+aur+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams blangs te gru bo che'i nang du bardzangasa so //
NK043(pi)001:11411: de nyid kyi mtshan mo gru de yul b+ha tu &&& phyin to //
NK043(pi)001:11414: beed+aur+ya dang gser gyis gru bkang ste /
NK043(pi)001:11415: de dag ru 'gram du phyin par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:11416: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ded dpon bdag nyid
NK043(pi)001:11417: chen po de la mchod cing rjod par byas so
NK043(pi)001:11418: // gzhan yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag gi
NK043(pi)001:11419: tshe 'dir yang dge ba'i bsam pa 'grub na tshe
NK043(pi)001:11420: rabs gzhan du lta ci smros te /
NK043(pi)001:11421: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid mtsho ha cang mi che ba me tog ga la ha ra dang /
NK043(pi)001:11422: pad+ma dkar po dang dmar po dang ut+pala rnams kyis brgyan pa /
NK043(pi)001:11423: ngang dur sogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
NK043(pi)001:11424: mtsho 'gram na shing ljon pa dang me tog mang
NK043(pi)001:11425: po yod pa gcig na nya'i rgyal po zhig tu
NK043(pi)001:11426: gyur pa de tshe rabs mang por gzhan don la
NK043(pi)001:11427: spyad pas de na gnas pa'i tshe yang gzhan la
NK043(pi)001:11428: phan bde byed pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:11429: nya gzhan rnams la bu ltar byams shing phan 'dogs
NK043(pi)001:11430: pa dang phan tshun gnod pa las bzlog cing gcig
NK043(pi)001:11431: la gcig byams pa bskyed nas /
NK043(pi)001:11432: thabs mkhas shing rigs pas nya'i chos lugs rab tu
NK043(pi)001:11433: brjod par byas te bskyangs pas nya de rnams rab
NK043(pi)001:11435: ji ltar mi yi rgyal po chos bzhin spyod pas 'bangs rnams bskyangs pa bzhin no //
NK043(pi)001:11436: de nas re zhig cig na sems can de dag skal pa chung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:11437: lha'i bu char 'bebs pa rnams bag med pas char
NK043(pi)001:11438: ma 'bab pas mtsho de sngon bzhin gang bar ma
NK043(pi)001:11439: gyur la / rim gyis dpyid dus nyi ma'i 'od
NK043(pi)001:11440: tsha zhing rno bas gdungs pa dang 'brel ba'i rlung
NK043(pi)001:11441: gis bskams nas nyin re bzhin bri ste lding ka
NK043(pi)001:11443: nya de rnams la khra de rnams kyis kyang glags lta na bya gzhan lta ci smros te /
NK043(pi)001:11444: de ltar nya rnams bskum zhing mi dga' la cung zad mgul mi nus pa rnams la /
NK043(pi)001:11445: nya'i rgyal po des bltas nas snying rje bzhin du /
NK043(pi)001:11446: kye hud nya 'di rnams ma rungs par 'gyur ro snyam nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11447: chu yang nyin re bri bar gyur //
NK043(pi)001:11448: tshe zad pa dang 'gran pa bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:11449: char sprin 'du bar gyur pa yang //
NK043(pi)001:11450: da dung rab tu dka' ba 'dra //
NK043(pi)001:11451: bros te 'gro ba'i lam yang med //
NK043(pi)001:11452: gzhan du khyer ba'ang su yang med //
NK043(pi)001:11453: bdag cag brlag par dga' ba yi //
NK043(pi)001:11454: nged kyi dgra yang de ring byung //
NK043(pi)001:11455: chu yi lhag ma 'di skam na //
NK043(pi)001:11456: bdag gis mngon sum mthong bzhin du //
NK043(pi)001:11457: dgra rnams kyis ni zos yang dag /
NK043(pi)001:11458: 'di la ci ltar byas na rung //
NK043(pi)001:11460: bden pa'i byin rlabs 'ba' zhig gis phongs pa la phan 'dogs par mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:11461: byang chub sems dpa' nya'i rgyal po des snying rje'i
NK043(pi)001:11462: gdung bas shugs nar phyungs shing gnam du bltas nas
NK043(pi)001:11463: smras pa / rab tu phongs par gyur nas bdag cag gis //
NK043(pi)001:11464: bsam bzhin srog chags bsad pa mi dran te //
NK043(pi)001:11465: bden pa 'di yis lha yi rgyal po rnams //
NK043(pi)001:11466: char pa 'beb cing mtsho 'di gang bar shog /
NK043(pi)001:11470: de la dga' ba'i lha klu gnod sbyin rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:11471: mthus dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po chus gang
NK043(pi)001:11472: ba / sgra snyan zhing zab pa sgrogs bzhin glog
NK043(pi)001:11473: gi phreng bas brgyan pa dag phan tshun 'dus te
NK043(pi)001:11474: char gyi rgyun mu tig gi sil ma chu gtor
NK043(pi)001:11475: ba lta bus sa gzhi thams cad du gang zhing
NK043(pi)001:11476: ba / / mtsho de gang bar gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:11477: nya rnams gson du re la /
NK043(pi)001:11478: de dag za 'dod pa'i bya rnams ni byer bar gyur pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11479: byang chub sems dpa' snying rab tu dga' bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:11480: kyang char chad du dogs pas char sprin chen po
NK043(pi)001:11481: khyod 'brug dang glog gi tshul dang bcas te char
NK043(pi)001:11482: pa'i rgyun yun ring du phob ces smras pa bzhin
NK043(pi)001:11483: gyur pa la / brgya byin rab tu dga' nas
NK043(pi)001:11484: char chen po babs pa 'di ni nya'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:11485: khyod kyi bden pa'i mthu ste /
NK043(pi)001:11486: 'jig rten phan byed kyi skyes bu khyod lta bu'i
NK043(pi)001:11487: spyod pa la brnyas par bltas pa thams cad nongs
NK043(pi)001:11488: kyi / deng phan chad khyod kyi grogs bgyid cing /
NK043(pi)001:11489: yul phyogs 'di yang khyod kyi yon tan gyis slan
NK043(pi)001:11490: chad phongs par mi 'gyur ro zhes basngagasa nas mi
NK043(pi)001:11492: yang sngon byang chub sems dpa' nags chen po zhig tu sreg pa'i phrug gur gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:11493: shing gnyis drud pa'i mes nags de tshigs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11495: rang gi 'dab ma chus gsher bar byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:11496: me chen po de'i steng du 'dug ste 'dab ma sprugs bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:11497: 'di na bya gang dag 'phur mi nus pa yod pas me khyod ma g.yo bar 'dug cig /
NK043(pi)001:11498: byams pa bsgoms pa'i bden tshig gis me sdod cig ces smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:11499: brgya byin gyis de'i grogs byas nas char chen po phab pas me rab tu zhi bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11501: rigs che zhing btsun la khong gzo zhing mkhas pa
NK043(pi)001:11502: nor gyis phyugs pa'i khyim bdag rin po che ltar
NK043(pi)001:11503: rgyal pos bkur ba'i tshong dpon chen po zhig tu
NK043(pi)001:11504: skyes pa'i tshe / sems dpa' chen po de rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11505: po'i pho brang du song ba'i 'og tu mag pa
NK043(pi)001:11506: de'i sgyug mo chung ma'i ma de rang gi bu
NK043(pi)001:11507: mo dang phrad pa'i phyir tshong dpon de'i khyim du
NK043(pi)001:11508: 'ong ba la bkur sti byas nas gtam gleng ba'i
NK043(pi)001:11509: skyes pa'i tshe / skabs su / ma na to
NK043(pi)001:11510: bu mo khyod kyi khyim thab de khyod la byams
NK043(pi)001:11511: skyes pa'i tshe / skabs su / sam mi byams
NK043(pi)001:11512: / khyod kyis bkur sti byas pa la des drin
NK043(pi)001:11513: skyes pa'i tshe / skabs su / sam mi byams
NK043(pi)001:11514: / gazo'am mi gzo / mi bde ba lta med
NK043(pi)001:11516: bu mo de ngo tsha bas bcom bskyung bzhin smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11517: de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang yon tan dang spyod
NK043(pi)001:11518: yul ni rab tu byung ba la yang med do
NK043(pi)001:11520: ma de nyid rgas nas rna ba mi gsang zhing
NK043(pi)001:11521: bu mo de skad chung bas legs par ma thos
NK043(pi)001:11522: la / rab tu byung zhes pa'i sgra gcig thos
NK043(pi)001:11523: pas bdag gi bu mo'i mag pa nges par rab
NK043(pi)001:11524: tu byung ba lta zhig snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:11525: bu mo de'i phyir mya ngan gyis skad phyungs te dus so //
NK043(pi)001:11526: 'di ltar bdag gi bu mo snying nye ba yang
NK043(pi)001:11527: bor ba de'i rab byung dang tshul khrims kyi yon
NK043(pi)001:11528: tan dang spyod tshul kyang ci 'dra ba zhig ste
NK043(pi)001:11529: gzhon cing rgyal po'i gnad chen du gyur pa /
NK043(pi)001:11530: nang mi dang 'khon med la nad med par snying rje med pa des /
NK043(pi)001:11531: 'di ltar nor dang nang gi skye bo'i tshogs spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:11532: dgon par rab tu byung ba'i blo ji ltar skyes zhes smre sngags bton pas /
NK043(pi)001:11533: bu mo de yang bud med kyi rang bzhin du gyur pas mi brtan par gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:11534: bdag gi khyim thab rab tu byung bas ma 'di
NK043(pi)001:11535: ltar mi dga' bar byed snyam du sems 'khrugs pas
NK043(pi)001:11536: gtam gleng ba'i 'phro yang brjed nas /
NK043(pi)001:11537: khyim thab rab tu byung ba'i sgra thos te bdag
NK043(pi)001:11538: gi ma mya ngan bsangs pa'i phyir 'ongs so snyam
NK043(pi)001:11539: du ngu zhing brgyal bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11540: der khyim gyi mi thams cad de thos nas ngu ba las /
NK043(pi)001:11541: khyim mtshes dang mdza' bshes kyi skye bo bram ze
NK043(pi)001:11542: dang khyim bdag dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
NK043(pi)001:11543: kyang phal cher khyim bdag de la rjes su chags
NK043(pi)001:11545: de thams cad mtshungs par sdug bsngal par gyur pa'i skabs der /
NK043(pi)001:11546: byang chub sems dpa' khyim de'i nye sar phyin pas
NK043(pi)001:11547: smre sngags kyi sgra thos shing mi mang po 'dus
NK043(pi)001:11548: pa mthong nas 'di ltar bu gyur pa ci nyes
NK043(pi)001:11549: rtog la shog ces g.yog po mngags pa las /
NK043(pi)001:11550: des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do //
NK043(pi)001:11551: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bsam
NK043(pi)001:11552: pa dag pa'i steng du tshig des bskul ma btab
NK043(pi)001:11553: pa ltar ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas
NK043(pi)001:11555: skye bo rnams de ltar re ba legs so snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:11556: skye bo rnams kyis bdag la yon tan tu brjod cing basngagasa pa thos pas /
NK043(pi)001:11557: gal te bdag khyim la phyogs na mir yang mi rung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11558: bdag da dung yon tan khyad du bsad nas skyon la dad nas /
NK043(pi)001:11559: dge ba spangs pas bdag gson kyang ci zhig bya /
NK043(pi)001:11560: des na skye bo rnams kyis re ba 'di ltar /
NK043(pi)001:11561: khyim gyi gnas spangs nas dka' thub kyi gnas su yon tan nyams su blang bar bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:11562: de slar log ste rgyal po'i gsol kha pa la zhus nas rgyal po'i drung du song ba na /
NK043(pi)001:11563: rgyal pos ci'i phyir 'ong zhes dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11564: lha bdag ni rab tu byung bar 'tshal na gnang bar rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:11565: rgyal po des byams pa'i tshig gis nga lta bu'i
NK043(pi)001:11566: gnyen dang mdza' ba'i mchog yod bzhin du khyod ci'i
NK043(pi)001:11568: gal te nor 'dod na nga las longs shig /
NK043(pi)001:11569: gnod pa yod na ngas bzlog par bya yis /
NK043(pi)001:11570: nga dang gnyen rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa ci zhig gi mi 'dod nas 'gro /
NK043(pi)001:11572: khyod la brten pas gnod pa yang ga la yod /
NK043(pi)001:11573: nor gyis kyang phongs pa med mod /
NK043(pi)001:11574: phongs nas bas mthar 'gro ba min kyang /
NK043(pi)001:11575: skye bo'i tshogs mya ngan gyis gdungs bas ngu zhing bdag rab tu byung zhes bsgrags pa des na /
NK043(pi)001:11576: bdag ni yon tan can du sems pa'i skabs su gyur pa de'i phyir bdag dgon par mchi'o //
NK043(pi)001:11578: khyod skye bo'i tshig tsam gyis nged 'dor bar mi rigs la /
NK043(pi)001:11579: khyod lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la
NK043(pi)001:11580: ni skye bo'i tshig bsrung ba tsam gyis chog pa
NK043(pi)001:11581: min la / de ma byas na mi rung ba gang yang med do //
NK043(pi)001:11582: 'jig rten mu cor smra ba'i gtam ni rang gar
NK043(pi)001:11583: rtog pa rnams la 'phro ba de dag snying la
NK043(pi)001:11585: de byed pa rnams smros ci dgos /
NK043(pi)001:11586: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11587: rgyal po chen po de skad du bka' mi stsal du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:11588: skye bo'i gtam dge bar grags pa rnams la'ang de ltar mi bgyid pa ma lags te /
NK043(pi)001:11589: lha mi'i rgyal po chos dang ldan zhes dge bar
NK043(pi)001:11590: grags pa las nyams par mi bgyid cing ngo tsha
NK043(pi)001:11591: ba'i phyir de bzhin rab tu 'bad par rigs na
NK043(pi)001:11592: / yon tan yod ces grags shing de ltar re
NK043(pi)001:11593: ba byas pa yang ji ltar gyur kyang rung ste
NK043(pi)001:11594: / / khyod kyis gnang na grags pa bzhin du gtam snyan 'phel la /
NK043(pi)001:11595: gzhan du gyur na grags pa don med par khron
NK043(pi)001:11596: pa skam po bzhin du yon tan gyi grags pa
NK043(pi)001:11597: mi 'phel lo // mi rnams grags pa nyams pa dag /
NK043(pi)001:11598: slar yang grags pa thob par dka' la /
NK043(pi)001:11599: dug sbrul gyi tshang lta bu rtsod pa'i rgyur gyur
NK043(pi)001:11600: pa'i khyim gyi gnas spang rigs pa de ni spang
NK043(pi)001:11602: lha gcig gis bdag bzlog par mi rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:11603: gus pa'i 'bangs la byams pa khyod kyis de ltar gsung pa rigs mod kyis /
NK043(pi)001:11604: bdag sems kyis rab tu byung lags na 'du 'dzis
NK043(pi)001:11605: ci zhig bgyi zhes smras pas rgyal pos gnang ste
NK043(pi)001:11606: dka' thub kyi nags su 'gro bar chas so //
NK043(pi)001:11607: de nas de'i mdza' bo dang nye du dang /
NK043(pi)001:11608: de la bsten pa'i tshogs rnams lhags nas ngu zhing
NK043(pi)001:11609: rkang pa la 'jus te 'gro bar mi ster zhing
NK043(pi)001:11611: da dung bya ba ma zin pa yod pa skad dang /
NK043(pi)001:11612: nang mi rnams snying mi rje'am zhes sogs brjod pa du ma smra zhing lam bkag ste /
NK043(pi)001:11613: de slar ldog tu 'bad pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11615: mdza' bo dag bdag bag med cing bya ba ngan
NK043(pi)001:11616: par zhugs pa lta na khyed cag thabs sna tshogs
NK043(pi)001:11617: byar rigs kyi / nga gson bzhin nags na gnas par 'dod pa la 'gogs shing ci ste du /
NK043(pi)001:11618: gal te nga dang bral bas mi dga' na /
NK043(pi)001:11619: nga dang lhan cig nags su ci ste mi 'gro /
NK043(pi)001:11620: dka' thub byed du 'gror mi ster na /
NK043(pi)001:11621: dgra dang dmag sogs 'gyed du 'gro ba la de ltar cis mi byed /
NK043(pi)001:11622: khyim gyi yon tan dang dka' thub dang nags kyi
NK043(pi)001:11623: nyes pa mthong ba ni blo mig phyin ci log
NK043(pi)001:11624: yin zhing / nga yon tan che bas yin na khyed cag nga'i rjes su rab tu byung zhig /
NK043(pi)001:11625: 'jig rten mdza' ba rnams ni phal cher mi brtan
NK043(pi)001:11626: pa gar mkhan gyi spyod pa dang 'dra bas nges
NK043(pi)001:11627: pa med la / cis kyang brtan pa'i sems kyis 'bral mi phod na /
NK043(pi)001:11628: rigs pa'i las dka' thub kyi nags su 'dod rigs
NK043(pi)001:11629: kyi bzlog mi rigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 'jam
NK043(pi)001:11630: pa'i tshig gis brid de rang nyid dka' thub kyi
NK043(pi)001:11631: nags su song nas dge ba la bag yod pas
NK043(pi)001:11632: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs rdzogs par byas te bsam
NK043(pi)001:11633: gtan la sbyor bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11634: de ltar na yon tan med pa la yon tan can du bsgrags pa'i skye bo'i tshig tsam la'ang /
NK043(pi)001:11635: yon tan shes pa dag gis yal bar mi 'dor na /
NK043(pi)001:11636: yon tan gang yang rung ba thob nas de las nyams par mi byed pa lta ci smos /
NK043(pi)001:11637: de lta bur dge slong dang dge bsnyen dang /
NK043(pi)001:11639: rtogs ldan la sogs pa'i ming gis yon tan yod par bsgrags na /
NK043(pi)001:11640: rang gis rang la brtags te skye bo rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:11641: bdag la 'di ltar re ba byed pa bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:11642: slur mi rung ngo snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:11643: nges par rang nyid yon tan de dang de dag
NK043(pi)001:11644: gis brgyan par ma byas kyi bar du ngo tsha
NK043(pi)001:11645: ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar yin par
NK043(pi)001:11646: shes par bya'o // yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11647: dus na grong khyer b+aa r+aa na ser rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:11648: tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che
NK043(pi)001:11649: shes par bya'o // ba zhig la / btsun mo
NK043(pi)001:11650: dpe med ma zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes pa rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11651: po la sdug par gyur pa zhig yod do //
NK043(pi)001:11652: de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la /
NK043(pi)001:11653: bcom ldan 'das nyid rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:11654: gzugs dang yan lag bkra ba rin po che'i mchu
NK043(pi)001:11655: can de la 'khor lnga brgya de'i slad bzhin 'brang
NK043(pi)001:11656: ba yod do // dus zhig na rma bya'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11657: po des nam phyed kyi thun la b+aa r+aa na
NK043(pi)001:11658: si'i grong khyer de'i steng du skad bsgrags pa khang
NK043(pi)001:11659: steng na 'dug pa'i btsun mo dpe med mas thos
NK043(pi)001:11660: ba yod do // nas / rgyal po la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11661: 'di ltar shin tu dga' zhing chags par byed pa'i sgra 'di su'i lags /
NK043(pi)001:11663: lha mo ngas kyang ma mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:11664: gangs kyi ri'i lho phyogs na rma bya'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:11665: gser du snang ba zhes yod par thos pa de'i
NK043(pi)001:11666: sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong zhes thos so zhes
NK043(pi)001:11667: smras pa la / btsun mo na re /
NK043(pi)001:11668: lha rma bya'i rgyal po de 'dir blang du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:11670: nam mkha' la rgyu ba de mthong bar ga la nus btsun mos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11671: gal te rma bya'i rgyal po de ma mthong na bdag 'gum par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:11672: rgyal pos btsun mo dpe med ma la sems chags
NK043(pi)001:11673: pas ngas rngon pa dang bya ba dag dgye yi
NK043(pi)001:11674: re zhig sdod ces smras te /
NK043(pi)001:11675: rngon pa dang bya ba'i mi rnams la rma bya'i rgyal po de rnyis zungs la 'dir thon cig /
NK043(pi)001:11676: de blang nus na legs kyis ma nus na khyed thams cad kyi srog yal lo zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11677: de nas rngon pa dang bya ba de rnams srog
NK043(pi)001:11678: gi 'jigs pas bya rgya dang rnyi rnams thogs nas
NK043(pi)001:11679: gangs ri'i lho phyogs der phyin nas rma bya'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11680: po gnas pa'i phyogs der rgya bres shing rnyi btsugs
NK043(pi)001:11681: kyang rma bya'i rgyal po des gang du bltas pa
NK043(pi)001:11682: de dag tu rgya ral zhing rnyi chad de zhag
NK043(pi)001:11683: bdun gyi bar du sha thang yang rma bya'i rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11684: po de bzung ma nus so //
NK043(pi)001:11685: de nas rma bya'i rgyal po des de dag la snying rje ste smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11686: zho shas 'tsho ba khyed rnams ci'i phyir phyogs 'di na sha thang zhing 'khod /
NK043(pi)001:11687: de dag gis rma bya'i rgyal po shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:11688: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 'di ltar bgos te
NK043(pi)001:11689: btang gis bdag cag srog gi 'jigs pas 'di ltar
NK043(pi)001:11691: rma byas smras pa nga rnyi dang rgyas bzung mi nus kyis /
NK043(pi)001:11692: rgyal po tshangs pas byin nga lta bar 'dod na
NK043(pi)001:11693: grong khyer gtsang zhing bkod pas brgyan par byos la
NK043(pi)001:11694: / zhag bdun gyi nyin par dpung gi tshogs yan
NK043(pi)001:11695: lag bzhi dang ldan par 'dir shog dang nga ni
NK043(pi)001:11696: der 'gro bar bya'o zhes smras pa ltar de dag
NK043(pi)001:11697: gis mnyan te rgyal po tshangs pas byin la gsol
NK043(pi)001:11698: ba bzhin du rgyal pos grong thams cad brgyan zhing
NK043(pi)001:11699: / / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta
NK043(pi)001:11700: sbyar te dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa gangs kyi
NK043(pi)001:11701: ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos der phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11702: rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de rin po che'i shing rta la bzhag nas /
NK043(pi)001:11703: de'i skad byung bas rgyal po dpung gi tshogs dang
NK043(pi)001:11704: bcas pa mchog tu dga' bas bkur sti chen po
NK043(pi)001:11705: byas te grong khyer b+aa r+aa na s+air phyin pa
NK043(pi)001:11706: na / grong khyer de'i sgor rma bya'i skad byung bas grong de thams cad du khyab cing /
NK043(pi)001:11707: yul der gnas pa thams cad dga' zhing lta ba'i phyir lhags so //
NK043(pi)001:11708: der btsun mo dpe med ma la rma bya 'di
NK043(pi)001:11709: ni khyod kyi gan du rang 'ong ngo zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:11710: te dga' zhing gus par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11711: rgyal po des rma bya'i rgyal po de la me
NK043(pi)001:11712: tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyis rim gro byas so
NK043(pi)001:11713: // dus gzhan na rgyal po de brel ba zhig
NK043(pi)001:11714: byung nas sus rma bya'i rgyal po la rim gro
NK043(pi)001:11715: byed nus snyam du bsam zhing /
NK043(pi)001:11716: btsun mo dpe med ma ni mkhas shing shes rab
NK043(pi)001:11717: che bas des nus so snyam du lha mo khyod
NK043(pi)001:11718: kyis ngas ji ltar byas pa bzhin du rma bya'i
NK043(pi)001:11719: rgyal po 'di la rim gro gyis shig ces smras
NK043(pi)001:11720: pa bzhin des kyang me tog dang 'bras bus rim
NK043(pi)001:11721: gro byas so // de nas dus zhig na btsun
NK043(pi)001:11722: mo dpe med ma skyes pa gzhan la chags par
NK043(pi)001:11723: gro byas so // gyur te / dus btab pa
NK043(pi)001:11724: rma bya gnas pa'i skyed tshal du byung ba la
NK043(pi)001:11725: rma byas chos bstan pas mi des 'dod pas log
NK043(pi)001:11726: par g.yem pa spangs te phyir song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11727: btsun mo des bdag gi bya ba 'di ni rma byas shes kyi /
NK043(pi)001:11728: rma bya'i rgyal po 'di ni mi skad smra bas
NK043(pi)001:11729: rgyal po tshangs byin la smras na bdag bsad par
NK043(pi)001:11730: mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas zas skom dug
NK043(pi)001:11731: can byin pas rma bya'i rgyal po de lta de
NK043(pi)001:11732: ltar gzugs mdzes shing lta na sdug par gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:11733: la / btsun mo the tshom skyes pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11734: rma bya'i rgyal pos khyod skyes pa gzhan la chags
NK043(pi)001:11735: pa ngas shes snyam du dug can gyi zas byin
NK043(pi)001:11736: kyang nga gsad par mi nus so zhes smras pas
NK043(pi)001:11737: btsun mo dpe med ma khrag skyugs shing nad tshabs
NK043(pi)001:11738: chen pos btab ste shi nas dmyal ba ngu 'bod
NK043(pi)001:11739: du skyes so // rma bya'i rgyal po ni bde
NK043(pi)001:11740: bar thar te slar rang gi gnas su song nas
NK043(pi)001:11741: srog chags rnams la chos bstan par mdzad do //
NK043(pi)001:11742: de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs pas byin ni dge slong sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK043(pi)001:11743: de'i dus kyi btsun mo dpe med ma ni da
NK043(pi)001:11744: ltar bram ze'i bu mo g.yo ma yin no zhes
NK043(pi)001:11745: gsungs so // yang sngon bskal pa tshad med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na /
NK043(pi)001:11746: rgyal po shing rta ni mo zhes bya ba /
NK043(pi)001:11747: rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa
NK043(pi)001:11748: de la phyis su sras 'khrungs pa shes rab 'od
NK043(pi)001:11749: ces bya ba der bcom ldan 'das 'di gyur pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11750: tshe na / mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan te /
NK043(pi)001:11751: gzhan las 'phags pas rgyal tshab tu byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11752: der yab rgyal po tshe 'phos nas sras de rgyal por dbang bskur bar brtsams pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11753: blon po rnams la rgyal bus bdag gis rgyal po mi nus te /
NK043(pi)001:11754: sems can 'di dag mi rigs pa byed pa la
NK043(pi)001:11755: bdag gis bsad pa sogs chad pa bcad na bdag
NK043(pi)001:11756: la kha na ma tho ba'i las 'byung bas gal
NK043(pi)001:11757: te yul mi rnams dge bcu'i las byed nus na
NK043(pi)001:11758: kho bos rgyal po bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:11759: kun gyis de legs te khyod kyis dpang mdzod ces byas nas rgyal por dbang bskur ro //
NK043(pi)001:11760: des dge bcu'i las spyod par bka' la btags pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11761: bdud kyi rgyal pos phrag dog byas te /
NK043(pi)001:11762: sngar dge ba byas kyang mngon rtags med pas da
NK043(pi)001:11763: phyin chad mi dge bcu la spyod cig ces skur
NK043(pi)001:11764: yig bris pa rgyal phran thams cad la springs so
NK043(pi)001:11765: // der thams cad yid ma ches nas rgyal po la zhus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11766: rgyal po ngo mtshar nas ngas ni 'di skad bris
NK043(pi)001:11767: pa med na ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur ces sngangs
NK043(pi)001:11768: te / rgyal po rang nyid mi rnams sngar las 'gyur yod med brtag pa la dong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:11769: lam du bdud kyi rgyal pos me 'bar ba'i nang
NK043(pi)001:11770: du sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa'i mi zhig gi
NK043(pi)001:11772: rgyal pos de la khyod ci nyes zhes dris pa la de na re /
NK043(pi)001:11773: bdag gis sngon mi 'di dag dge bcu la bkod
NK043(pi)001:11774: pas da 'di ltar bdag shin tu sdug bsngal lo
NK043(pi)001:11776: rgyal pos dge ba byed par bskul na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra myong ba mi srid de /
NK043(pi)001:11777: khyod kyis bskul ba'i dge byed de dag gis bde ba'i 'bras bu thob bam /
NK043(pi)001:11779: de dag gis ni thob ste /
NK043(pi)001:11780: dge ba byed par skul ba po 'ba' zhig 'di ltar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11781: rgyal po de thos nas shin tu dga' ste smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11782: pha rol pos dge 'bras thob na ni /
NK043(pi)001:11783: bdag sdug bsngal myong yang 'gyod pa med do zhes smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11784: bdud de de ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11785: rgyal po des yul thams cad du gshegs nas 'bangs
NK043(pi)001:11786: thams cad la dge bcu bsgrags shing basngagasa pa brjod
NK043(pi)001:11787: pas thams cad sgo gsum dge ba la 'dun par
NK043(pi)001:11788: gyur cing / de'i tshe gser gyi 'khor lo sogs
NK043(pi)001:11789: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los
NK043(pi)001:11791: gling bzhi po kun dge ba la bkod par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11792: de ltar rang nyid dge bcu la gnas shing gzhan dge bcu la bkod pas /
NK043(pi)001:11793: da lta sangs rgyas pa'i tshe zhabs kyi mthil na
NK043(pi)001:11794: 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi mtshan dang ldan par gyur
NK043(pi)001:11796: yang sngon ded dpon thams cad skyob dang legs grub
NK043(pi)001:11797: zhes bya ba re re la tshong ba'i 'khor bzhi
NK043(pi)001:11798: khri yod par gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:11799: legs grub nges par 'byung ba la dga' bas drang
NK043(pi)001:11800: srong gi drung du rab tu byung nas bas mthar
NK043(pi)001:11801: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byas so
NK043(pi)001:11802: // tshong pa de dag gis legs grub ma mthong nas btsal bar gyur kyang ma rnyed par /
NK043(pi)001:11803: ded dpon thams cad skyob la de ltar smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11804: des btsal bar bya'o zhes tshong pa brgyad khris bskor nas gnas kun tu btsal ba na /
NK043(pi)001:11805: rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11806: khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs nas rab tu byung zhes dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11807: bdag nyid chen po lus kyis chos ston gyis ngag gis ma yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:11808: des 'bar ba dang glog 'byin pa sogs kyi cho 'phrul bstan pas dad par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11809: de nas tshong dpon thams cad skyob kyis tshong pa
NK043(pi)001:11810: brgyad khri po zang zing gi bsdu bas mgu bar
NK043(pi)001:11811: byas nas / 'di la bya ba byos dang 'bras bu smin par 'gyur ro zhes byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:11812: de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:11813: tshong pa de rnams tshong dpon des bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la yang bkod do //
