NK043(pi)001:11814: de ltar ded dpon thams cad skyob ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:11816: 'dzam gling 'dir yul b+aa r+aa na s+air bram ze
NK043(pi)001:11817: ha li zhes pa'i bu legs tshol zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:11818: bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11819: de'i spun du gyur pa nyes tshol zhes par lhas byin gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11820: de spun gnyis rgya mtshor rin po che len par
NK043(pi)001:11821: so so nas 'khor lnga brgya re dang bcas par
NK043(pi)001:11823: lam ring bas zhag bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin
NK043(pi)001:11824: pa tsam na rgyags chad de srog bral du nye
NK043(pi)001:11825: ba na / legs tshol sogs thams cad nyam thag ste lha sogs la mchod par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:11826: der rgyang ma nas skyed shing bzang po zhig mthong
NK043(pi)001:11827: nas der song ba dang chu mig legs pa gcig
NK043(pi)001:11828: kyang yod pas / thams cad der 'thung /
NK043(pi)001:11829: bdag cag gis lha mchod pa'i rtags 'di yin no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:11830: der lhas mngon sum du skyed shing gi yal ga
NK043(pi)001:11831: chod cig dang 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ngo smras
NK043(pi)001:11832: pas / yal ga gcig bcad pa dang btung ba zhim po byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11833: yang gcig bcad pa dang kha zas ro brgya dang
NK043(pi)001:11834: ldan pa thams cad byung nas thams cad kyis tshim
NK043(pi)001:11835: par zos so // yang yal ga gcig bcad pas gos sna tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:11836: yang gcig bcad pas nor bu rin po che sna
NK043(pi)001:11837: tshogs byung ste khal thams cad longs par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:11838: // de nas nyes tshol la sogs pa thams cad
NK043(pi)001:11839: kyang der lhags te snga ma'i yal ga cad pa
NK043(pi)001:11840: las rin chen sna tshogs 'ong ba mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:11841: shing 'di'i rtsa ba bcad na nor bu rin chen
NK043(pi)001:11842: mang du yod snyam nas shing gi rtsa ba bsko
NK043(pi)001:11845: bdag cag phongs shing srog dang bral ba las shing 'dis bskyabs na /
NK043(pi)001:11846: shing 'di ma gcod ces smras kyang ma nyan pas /
NK043(pi)001:11847: legs tshol de mthong mi 'dod pas sngon du song ba'i rjes su /
NK043(pi)001:11848: nyes tshol sogs kyis shing de'i rtsa ba bcad pa na /
NK043(pi)001:11849: de nas srin po lnga brgya byung ste nyes tshol sogs tshong pa de thams cad zos so //
NK043(pi)001:11850: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus yongs su btang
NK043(pi)001:11851: nas kyang sems can rnams la ji skad smras pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11852: tshig bslu bar mi 'gyur ba rtag tu srung ba
NK043(pi)001:11853: yin te / sngon bskal pa ches grangs med pa 'das pa'i dus na /
NK043(pi)001:11854: bcom ldan 'das 'di seng ge yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur pa de /
NK043(pi)001:11855: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i rjes su zhugs
NK043(pi)001:11856: shing rtsa ba dang lo 'bras me tog za ba
NK043(pi)001:11857: / ri'i phug bgrod dka' ba na gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:11858: der spre'u gnyis zhig gnas pa la dus zhig na bu gnyis byung ba seng ge la bcol nas /
NK043(pi)001:11859: spre'u pho mo gnyis spyod yul du dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11860: der bya rgod kyi rgyal po spu gri zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:11861: bas spre'u'i phrug gu de gnyis blangs nas steng gi
NK043(pi)001:11862: bar snang la 'dug pa seng ges mthong ste tshigs
NK043(pi)001:11863: su bcad pas bdag la skyabs su 'ong ba'i phrug
NK043(pi)001:11864: gu de gnyis thong zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:11865: bya rgod des ri dwags rgyal po khyod bdag 'dor na btang gi /
NK043(pi)001:11866: gzhan khyod khros kyang ngas 'di gnyis zos te nam mkhar song na ci zhig bya /
NK043(pi)001:11867: ri dwags kyi rgyal pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:11868: bdag ni btang gis za bar gyis la spre'u'i phrug gu gnyis gtong bar gsol /
NK043(pi)001:11869: byang chub tu zhugs pa dam bcas pa srung zhing
NK043(pi)001:11870: rdzun du smra ba med na sems can rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:11872: bya rgod kyis de lta bu'i ngo mtshar mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:11873: spre'u'i phrug gu de gnyis btang zhing ri dwags kyi
NK043(pi)001:11874: rgyal po khyod kyi lus kyang ma 'dor zhig ces
NK043(pi)001:11876: de'i tshe spre'u pho mo ni 'od srung dang ser skya bzang mo dang /
NK043(pi)001:11877: sgra gcan zin dang kun dga' bo ni sprel phrug dang /
NK043(pi)001:11878: dge slong phreng ba bzang po de'i tshe bya rgod
NK043(pi)001:11879: kyi rgyal po spu gri bar gyur to zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:11880: so // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang /
NK043(pi)001:11881: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'dzam gling 'dir khye'u chos smra ba'i mchog gnyis su gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11882: rab tu byung nas gcig pur nags su gnas pa /
NK043(pi)001:11883: snyan ngag dang bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing bsam gtan dang rdzu 'phrul thob pa na /
NK043(pi)001:11884: ri dwags bshor pa'i rgyal po glang po zhes pa
NK043(pi)001:11885: 'khor bye ba khrag khrig drug cu dang bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:11886: la chos bstan nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do
NK043(pi)001:11887: // de'i dus su dge slong brkam chags can mang po dag gis chos smra de gnyis la /
NK043(pi)001:11888: 'di ni mu stegs chad par smra ba yin te /
NK043(pi)001:11889: phung po gdod nas med ces las dang rnam smin 'jig pa'i chos ston pa yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:11890: 'di sod ces rgyal po de la bskul bas /
NK043(pi)001:11891: rgyal po yang cung zad the tshom du gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:11892: rgyal po de dang sngon lhan cig spyad pa spyad pa'i lha mo phyir 'brang ba zhig gis /
NK043(pi)001:11893: rgyal po la sdig pa'i grogs po'i tshig dag gis 'di lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig /
NK043(pi)001:11894: 'di gnyis ni yang dag pa'i chos smra ba de /
NK043(pi)001:11895: sngar chos bstan pa dran par gyis la 'di gnyis ma spongs shig /
NK043(pi)001:11897: rgyal po des de'i rjes su bsam zhing rgyal ba'i bstan pa ma btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:11898: rgyal po de'i nu bo ma rungs pa nyan gor rgyal po byed pa la /
NK043(pi)001:11899: rigs sngags kyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i dge slong 'di
NK043(pi)001:11900: gnyis sod ces sdig grogs de dag gis bskul bas
NK043(pi)001:11901: / des dmag gi dpung go bgos te gsod du
NK043(pi)001:11902: 'ong ba klu dang gnod sbyin nags na gnas pas
NK043(pi)001:11903: rdo dang so phag gi char gyis phyir bskrad de
NK043(pi)001:11905: rgyal po ma rungs pa 'chi ba'i dus byas te /
NK043(pi)001:11906: chos smra la khros pa'i nyes pas tshe rabs drug cur mnar med par skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:11907: rgyal po de rbad cing gtong ba'i dge slong dmigs
NK043(pi)001:11908: pa'i lta ba can mang po de dag tshe rabs
NK043(pi)001:11909: bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas par sems can dmyal
NK043(pi)001:11910: ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11911: lha mo gang gis rgyal po la bskul zhing chos
NK043(pi)001:11912: smra ba srung ba de sangs rgyas gang+g+aa'i bye snyed
NK043(pi)001:11913: mthong zhing mchod la spyad pa spyod cing /
NK043(pi)001:11914: rgyal po dang lhan cig chos thos shing sems bskyed
NK043(pi)001:11915: pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig drug cu po
NK043(pi)001:11916: dag ni zhing gzhan dang gzhan du sangs rgyas par
NK043(pi)001:11917: gyur to // chos thos pa'i rgyal po de byams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11918: lha mo phan 'dod de ni zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:11919: rgyal po'i nu bo ma rungs pa ni lhas byin yin no //
NK043(pi)001:11921: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11922: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yangs pa dpag tshad 'bum phrag dgu bcu yod par gyur la /
NK043(pi)001:11923: grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad rin chen sna bdun gyis byas pa /
NK043(pi)001:11924: lha'i yul ltar 'byor pa rmad du byung ba der /
NK043(pi)001:11925: bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po dpas byin zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:11926: ba chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur
NK043(pi)001:11927: te / grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong du rgyal
NK043(pi)001:11928: po de'i khyim brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa'i khyim
NK043(pi)001:11929: re rer yang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med brgyad
NK043(pi)001:11931: rgyal po de'i pho brang rin po che sna bdun
NK043(pi)001:11932: las byas pas bde ba'i yo byad thams cad ldan
NK043(pi)001:11933: pa brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i khang bzang lta bu
NK043(pi)001:11934: yod pa sogs 'byor ba'i mthu rmad du byung ba
NK043(pi)001:11935: dang ldan pa'i rgyal po de /
NK043(pi)001:11936: rang gi sras bsod nams kyi mnga' bdag chen po
NK043(pi)001:11937: byang chub sems dpar gyur pa bsod nams mchog ces
NK043(pi)001:11939: khyim gyi longs spyod la ma chags par rab tu byung ba'i rjes su /
NK043(pi)001:11940: rgyal po dpas byin nyid kyis kyang sangs rgyas la
NK043(pi)001:11941: rgyal srid phul zhing rab tu byung ste chos spyod
NK043(pi)001:11942: cing bzod pa yang bskyed par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:11943: de'i rjes su zhing dang dus der bde bar gshegs
NK043(pi)001:11944: pa bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba thams cad
NK043(pi)001:11946: de dag gi bstan pa la chos spyod pa dang
NK043(pi)001:11947: brtson 'grus brtsams par byas shing shes rab kyi stobs
NK043(pi)001:11948: dang ldan pas mi 'jigs pa brnyes te srog chags
NK043(pi)001:11949: bye ba mang po dgrol bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11950: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po phyogs rab sgrogs zhes
NK043(pi)001:11951: bya ba'i sras su bcom ldan 'das nyid 'khrungs pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11952: tshe lha rnams kyis btsas ma thag tu 'jig rten
NK043(pi)001:11953: na chos la spyod pa zhig byung ngo zhes sgra
NK043(pi)001:11954: bsgrags so // gzhon nu de lo bdun lon pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11955: tshe yab rgyal po la chos dang chos min dris
NK043(pi)001:11956: nas bdag nyid rab tu byung bar zhus shing /
NK043(pi)001:11957: yang sdig pa'i las byas pa'i rnam smin sogs chos
NK043(pi)001:11958: bshad pas yab rgyal po dang yum dang bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:11959: rab tu byung nas tshul khrims la gnas shing mngon
NK043(pi)001:11960: par shes pa lnga thob nas sems can mang po
NK043(pi)001:11961: bla med byang chub tu nges par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:11962: yang drang srong dbang po bsdams pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:11963: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba so sor brtags pas
NK043(pi)001:11964: dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa las bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis
NK043(pi)001:11966: dbang po yul rnams la nyon mongs pa mi skye
NK043(pi)001:11967: ba'i phyir dgon pa dang tshal rnams su 'gro ba'i
NK043(pi)001:11968: tshe yun ring zhig na bud med gcig mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:11969: chags pa skyes par gyur pa la dran pa rnyed
NK043(pi)001:11970: de / bdag gis so sor brtags pa 'dis dbang po bzung gis /
NK043(pi)001:11971: shes rab kyi so sor brtag pas ni ma yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:11972: da shes pa gang gis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:11973: ba'i 'phags pa'i ye shes btsal bar bya'o snyam du
NK043(pi)001:11974: so sor rtog pa na bdag nyid kyi shes pa
NK043(pi)001:11975: skyes te / 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bud
NK043(pi)001:11976: med kyi rang bzhin la brtags pas kun nas nyon
NK043(pi)001:11977: mongs pa'i chos mi dmigs par rtogs shing 'dod pa
NK043(pi)001:11978: las 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes su thob ste
NK043(pi)001:11979: skyes te / / gang yang nyon mongs pa med
NK043(pi)001:11980: pa'i 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis the tshom med par
NK043(pi)001:11981: skyes te / / gyur to // yang sngon gyi
NK043(pi)001:11982: tshe de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes snang ba zhes
NK043(pi)001:11983: bya ba sku tshe lo bye ba phrag bcur bzhugs
NK043(pi)001:11984: skyes te / / gyur to // pa des /
NK043(pi)001:11985: bcom ldan 'das 'di rgyal po khyad par sems zhes
NK043(pi)001:11986: bya bar gyur pa dang lhan cig pa'i skye bo
NK043(pi)001:11987: mang po la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:11988: gyi chos kyi rnam grangs las /
NK043(pi)001:11989: lus kyi sdom pa'i sgor 'jug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa legs par bstan pas /
NK043(pi)001:11990: rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas /
NK043(pi)001:11991: lo bye ba phrag bcur tshangs par spyod pa dri
NK043(pi)001:11992: ma med pa spyod cing tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi yang
NK043(pi)001:11993: bsgoms pas sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu mthong bar
NK043(pi)001:11994: gyur la / de'i rjes su rim bzhin sangs rgyas
NK043(pi)001:11995: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed las rab tu byung
NK043(pi)001:11996: nas tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyad cing mang
NK043(pi)001:11997: thos spobs par ldan pa'i dge slong chos smra ba'i
NK043(pi)001:11998: mchog tu gyur te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i
NK043(pi)001:11999: bdag nyid la gnas par byas so zhes gsungs pa
NK043(pi)001:12000: la sogs pas mtshon nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK043(pi)001:12001: ni rtag par yang nyes spyod sdom pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12003: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rigs par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12005: sngon bskal pa tshad med 'das pa'i pha rol na /
NK043(pi)001:12006: w+aa r+aa na s+air yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs
NK043(pi)001:12007: byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed cing yul de
NK043(pi)001:12009: de'i tshe rgyal po de btsun mo dang 'dus pa
NK043(pi)001:12010: las khye'u mchog tu gzugs bzang ba zhig btsas pa
NK043(pi)001:12011: la ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes btags so //
NK043(pi)001:12012: yang rgyal po de'i btsun mo las bu btsas pa
NK043(pi)001:12013: na yul der 'thab mo byung bas khye'u de'i ming
NK043(pi)001:12016: chos dang chos min gyis kyang rgyal srid byed du
NK043(pi)001:12017: 'jug pas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dgas de mthong
NK043(pi)001:12018: nas bdag kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur zhing
NK043(pi)001:12019: bdag gis kyang chos dang chos min pas rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:12020: byed du bcug na dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur gyis
NK043(pi)001:12021: bdag khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam
NK043(pi)001:12022: nas pha yi drung du song ste rkang pa la
NK043(pi)001:12023: gtugs nas smras pa yab bdag rab tu byung bar
NK043(pi)001:12027: mchod sbyin dang dka' thub byed pa'i rgyal srid de
NK043(pi)001:12028: khyod kyi lag tu 'ong na ci'i phyir rab tu
NK043(pi)001:12030: nags na shing shun r+ts+wa gyon zhing //
NK043(pi)001:12032: ri dwags gdug pa rnams dang ni //
NK043(pi)001:12033: lhan cig gnas pa mchog lags kyi //
NK043(pi)001:12035: mkhas pas rgyal srid slad du ni //
NK043(pi)001:12036: gsod dang bcings dang rdeg pa dag /
NK043(pi)001:12037: bgyid pa de lta ma lags so //
NK043(pi)001:12039: gzhon nu shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:12040: khyod ni nga'i bu gcig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba mi mthun pa med pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:12041: nga shi bar gyur na ni mi 'dod bzhin du khyod dang 'bral grang /
NK043(pi)001:12042: gson bzhin du lta ga la btang /
NK043(pi)001:12044: yab gal te gnang na ni de lta lags /
NK043(pi)001:12045: gal te mi gnang na zan kyang mi za phyag kyang mi 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:12046: de nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' nyi ma gcig la zan bcad par byas pa nas /
NK043(pi)001:12047: gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi bar du zan bcad par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12048: der rgyal pos gzhon nu la /
NK043(pi)001:12049: tshangs par spyod pa spyad dka' zhing gcig bur dben
NK043(pi)001:12050: par ri dwags rnams dang lhan cig gnas shing gzhan
NK043(pi)001:12052: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i rtsed mo dang dga'
NK043(pi)001:12053: ba thams cad spang dgos pas bu gzhon nu rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12054: tshab gyis la 'dod pa la spyod cing sbyin pa
NK043(pi)001:12055: dang bsod nams dag byos shig ces smras kyang gzhon
NK043(pi)001:12057: de nas rgyal po des btsun mo dang blon po
NK043(pi)001:12058: mdun na 'don rnams la gzhon nu slongs shig ces
NK043(pi)001:12060: de dag gis kyang gzhon nu khyod shin tu gzhon
NK043(pi)001:12061: pas bde ba bzhed kyang sdug bsngal mi mkhyen pa
NK043(pi)001:12062: ste dben par ni gnas daka'o zhes sngar bzhin du
NK043(pi)001:12064: de nas rgyal pos bskul te gzhon nu de dang
NK043(pi)001:12065: lhan cig tu rtse rtse ba'i blon po'i bu dang
NK043(pi)001:12066: mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:12067: gzhan yang gzhon nu rnams kyis de la sngar bzhin smras kyang de cang mi smra'o //
NK043(pi)001:12068: de nas gzhon nu de rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs byin la gsol ba /
NK043(pi)001:12070: gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' ni 'gum na ci rung /
NK043(pi)001:12071: 'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:12072: mkhas pa rnams kyis basngagasa pa lags te /
NK043(pi)001:12073: gal te de la dga' na gson par 'gyur bas /
NK043(pi)001:12075: gal te der ma dga' nas drang srong las slar
NK043(pi)001:12076: log na bu'i gnas ni pha ma lags pas de
NK043(pi)001:12079: gzhon nu dag gal te de lta na gnang bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:12080: de nas gzhon nu de rnams kyis ka shi mdzes dga' la de ltar gnad bar smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12081: de nas gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dga' bcud kyi
NK043(pi)001:12082: khu bas rim gyis lus brtas nas w+aa r+aa na
NK043(pi)001:12083: s+ai nas phyung ste drang srong rnams kyi nang du
NK043(pi)001:12085: de 'bad cing brtson pas 'dod pa las chags pa dang bral te /
NK043(pi)001:12086: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur nas sems
NK043(pi)001:12087: can thams cad la brtse ba dang ldan par gyur
NK043(pi)001:12088: pa'i byams pa de'i stobs kyis ri dwags gdug pa
NK043(pi)001:12089: rnams kyang bsti gnas su 'dris par gyur te gnod
NK043(pi)001:12090: pa mi byed pas de'i ming bzod par smra ba
NK043(pi)001:12091: zhes bya bar gyur te 'khor drang srong lnga brgya
NK043(pi)001:12093: nam zhig na rgyal po tshangs byin shi nas 'thab mo skyes rgyal srid la bzhag ste /
NK043(pi)001:12094: des chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug go //
NK043(pi)001:12095: drang srong bzod par smra bas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12096: mkhan po bdag gi lus ni kha zas dang btung
NK043(pi)001:12097: bas bskyed pas dgon pa'i sman gyis 'tsho bar rngo
NK043(pi)001:12098: mi thogs kyis grong mthar gnas su mchi lags so
NK043(pi)001:12100: bu grong ngam dgon par gnas kyang rung ste /
NK043(pi)001:12101: drang srong rnams ni dbang po rnams srung bar byed
NK043(pi)001:12102: kyi song la b+aa r+aa na s+ai'i nye 'khor du
NK043(pi)001:12103: lo ma'i spyil bu byos la gnas par gyis shig
NK043(pi)001:12104: ces / de ltar mkhan po las lung thob nas
NK043(pi)001:12105: rim gyis gnas btsal zhing rgyu ste pha'i skyed mos
NK043(pi)001:12106: tshal gyi zhi ba'i phyogs shig tu gnas par byas
NK043(pi)001:12107: ces / so // dus gzhan zhig na so ga'i dus su me tog gi shing rnams rgyas shing /
NK043(pi)001:12108: ngang pa dang khu byug shang shang te'u sogs bya rnams kyi skad 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal der /
NK043(pi)001:12109: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas te dong ba las /
NK043(pi)001:12110: skyed tshal der rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gnyid log pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:12111: me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba'i bud med rnams phan tshun du rgyu bar brtsams pa las /
NK043(pi)001:12112: ci tsam na drang srong bzod par smra ba spyod
NK043(pi)001:12113: lam zhibs pas mtha' na gnas pa de mthong nas
NK043(pi)001:12114: dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas te /
NK043(pi)001:12116: drang srong des kyang de rnams la chos bshad par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12117: ci tsam na rgyal po gnyid las sad de /
NK043(pi)001:12118: btsun mo'i 'khor ma mthong nas de khros pas ral gri blangs te /
NK043(pi)001:12120: drang srong gi drung na 'khod pa mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12121: rgyal po de khros pa shes nas btsun mo'i 'khor skrag ste byer ro //
NK043(pi)001:12122: 'thab mo skyes kyis drang srong la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12123: kye nad rdze khyod su zhig yin /
NK043(pi)001:12124: bdag ni bzod par smra ba'o //
NK043(pi)001:12126: khyod gzugs med bzhi'i ting 'dzin dang bsam gtan bzhi sogs thob bam /
NK043(pi)001:12130: khyod yon tan de dag ma thob na khyod tha mal pa yin te /
NK043(pi)001:12131: bud med rnams dang dben pa skyabs yod kyi gnas na 'dug pa ji ltar yid ches su rung /
NK043(pi)001:12132: rtag tu 'di na gnas pa khyod las ci byed /
NK043(pi)001:12135: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis ral gri phyungs te /
NK043(pi)001:12136: khyod bzod pa bsgom zhe na /
NK043(pi)001:12137: kho bo 'khrugs pa la bzod mi bzod sad do zhes drang srong gi lag pa gnyis bcad de /
NK043(pi)001:12138: khyod su yin zhes dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:12139: bdag ni bzod pa can bzod par smra ba'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12140: yang rkang pa bcad de dris pa la yang bdag ni bzod par smra ba'o //
NK043(pi)001:12142: de'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang bcad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12144: gal te bdag gi lus la ni //
NK043(pi)001:12145: til 'bru tsam du gtubs pa yis //
NK043(pi)001:12146: lus ni bye ba brgyar gtubs kyang //
NK043(pi)001:12147: sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong //
NK043(pi)001:12148: gang phyir bdag ni byams dge ba'i //
NK043(pi)001:12149: sems ni rtag tu goms byas pas //
NK043(pi)001:12150: bu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la //
NK043(pi)001:12151: bzod pa de gtong spro ba med //
NK043(pi)001:12153: rgyal po 'di bud med kyi phyir mtshon thogs nas
NK043(pi)001:12154: nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis bdag la yang nas yang
NK043(pi)001:12155: du yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs pa de
NK043(pi)001:12156: bzhin du / bdag bzod cing nges par gyur pa'i dge rtsa 'dis /
NK043(pi)001:12157: bdag nyid kyi nyon mongs pa rnams bcom nas bla
NK043(pi)001:12158: med byang chub tu sangs rgyas pa na 'di la
NK043(pi)001:12159: shes rab kyi ral gris yang nas yang du rmed
NK043(pi)001:12160: cing thog mar de'i nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur
NK043(pi)001:12161: cig ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:12162: de'i tshes rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing nye gnas
NK043(pi)001:12163: lnga brgya po nam mkhar 'phur te de'i drung du
NK043(pi)001:12164: lhags nas slob dpon de ltar sdug bsngal bar mthong
NK043(pi)001:12165: nas bzod pa'i sems nyams par ma gyur ram zhes
NK043(pi)001:12166: smras pa na / bzod par smra bas sems gzhan du ma gyur pa'i tshul smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12167: de nas bzod par smra ba la mngon par dga' ba'i lha des /
NK043(pi)001:12168: rgyal po ngan pa 'dis drang srong nyes pa med
NK043(pi)001:12169: par gnod pa 'di lta bu byed na gnam lcags
NK043(pi)001:12170: phab ste rgyal po 'di 'khor dang bcas pa deng
NK043(pi)001:12171: nyid du bsad par bya'o zhes smras pa na /
NK043(pi)001:12173: gang gis bdag lus rkang pa lag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12174: sna dang phral nas ma rungs byas gyur kyang /
NK043(pi)001:12175: de la'ang sdig pa cung zad mi 'dod na /
NK043(pi)001:12176: nyes med 'gro ba rnams la smos ci dgos /
NK043(pi)001:12177: zhes smras te gsad du ma bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:12178: de nas w+aa r+aa na s+ai'i lha gang yin pa des yams nad dang /
NK043(pi)001:12179: byi ba dang ne tso rnams btang bas yul de
NK043(pi)001:12180: ma rungs par gyur cing lhas kyang char ma phabs
NK043(pi)001:12181: pas skye bo phal cher shi bar gyur pa na
NK043(pi)001:12182: / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams la dris pa las /
NK043(pi)001:12183: drang srong la gnod pa byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:12184: lha rnams ma dga' ste de ltar gyur to zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12185: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhes dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12186: lha rnams la gtor ma sogs kyis mchod cing drang
NK043(pi)001:12187: srong dang lha rnams la bzod par gsol na des
NK043(pi)001:12188: phan no zhes smras pa bzhin rgyal pos grong khyer
NK043(pi)001:12189: thams cad du de ltar bsgrags te lha rnams mchod
NK043(pi)001:12190: cing phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin nas /
NK043(pi)001:12191: drang srong bzod par smra ba'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtug nas bzod par gsol te /
NK043(pi)001:12193: rgyal po chen po bzod do //
NK043(pi)001:12194: de ci ltar yid ches par bya /
NK043(pi)001:12196: bdag rdzun med na lus las khrag 'dzag pa 'adi'o
NK043(pi)001:12197: ma ltar gyur cig ces smras pa'i mod la de
NK043(pi)001:12201: khyod bdag gi lus gtubs kyang bdag la shin tu
NK043(pi)001:12202: phra ba'i zhe sdang kyang yod pa min na bdag
NK043(pi)001:12203: gi lus snga ma ltar shog cig ces smras pa
NK043(pi)001:12204: na / sngon gyi lus ji lta bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:12205: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas ya mtshan pa'i mig
NK043(pi)001:12206: gis lta zhing rkang pa la phyag byas te dong
NK043(pi)001:12207: ngo // rgyal po des kyang drang srong de la rtag tu mchod pa byed do //
NK043(pi)001:12208: der slob dpon gzhan la zhugs pa'i kun tu rgyu
NK043(pi)001:12209: stong tsam zhig gis rgyal po'i mchod gnas su gyur
NK043(pi)001:12211: phrag dog gis mi gtsang ba'i sa rdul gyis 'thor ba la /
NK043(pi)001:12212: drang srong des bdag gis bzod pa bsgom pa 'dis
NK043(pi)001:12213: nam sangs rgyas pa na bdud rtsi'i chus khyed kyi
NK043(pi)001:12214: rdul dang dri ma thams cad bkrus te /
NK043(pi)001:12215: 'dod pa'i btsog pa yongs su dag par shog ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:12216: de ltar drang srong bzod par smra ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid dang /
NK043(pi)001:12217: rgyal po 'thab mo skyes ni kun shes koo n+di nya dang /
NK043(pi)001:12218: de'i blon po bzhi ni lnga sde gzhan dang /
NK043(pi)001:12219: kun tu rgyu stong po ni chu bo 'od srung
NK043(pi)001:12220: sogs dge slong stong po yin no zhes gsungs so
NK043(pi)001:12221: // yang sngon gyi dus su bcom ldan 'das 'di
NK043(pi)001:12222: grong khyer b+aa r+aa na s+ai'i rgyal po dbang chen
NK043(pi)001:12223: sde zhes par gyur pa'i tshe yul de 'byor zhing
NK043(pi)001:12224: rgyas la lo legs par gyur cing /
NK043(pi)001:12225: des chos bzhin rgyal srid byas nas sems can thams
NK043(pi)001:12226: cad la ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed cing dge
NK043(pi)001:12227: ba bcu la bkod pas mi ma yin pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:12228: kyang srung zhing rgyal khams de shin tu bde bar
NK043(pi)001:12229: gyur to // de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:12230: ni chos min gyi rgyal srid byed pas sems can
NK043(pi)001:12231: mang po la 'tshe bar byas pas de'i mi rnams
NK043(pi)001:12232: dpya khral dang chad pa chen pos 'jigs te rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12233: po dbang chen sde'i yul du dong ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12234: nyi 'og gi rgyal po des rang gi yul pa
NK043(pi)001:12235: rnams der dong bar mthong nas dpung bzhi dang ldan
NK043(pi)001:12236: pa'i dmag bshams te rgyal po dbang chen sde'i yul
NK043(pi)001:12237: du 'ong ngo // de rgyal po dbang chen sdes thos nas /
NK043(pi)001:12238: rang gi blon po rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12239: tshe gcig gi 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir nga ni sdig pa byed mi phod do //
NK043(pi)001:12240: khyed cag yul phung bar 'gyur ba mi 'dod na
NK043(pi)001:12241: nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la phyag 'tshol cig
NK043(pi)001:12242: / ngas ni de la gnod pa mi byed do //
NK043(pi)001:12243: nags nang shing shun shar bu'i gos gyon cing //
NK043(pi)001:12244: 'bras bu za la gcan gzan 'grogs pa bla'i //
NK043(pi)001:12245: 'jig rten pha rol 'dzem pa'i mi rnams kyis //
NK043(pi)001:12246: rgyal srid phyir ni gsod dang bcings mi bya //
NK043(pi)001:12248: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po 'dis ni su la yang gsod mi phod pas /
NK043(pi)001:12249: bdag cag kun med par byas na ma rung gis 'di gcig pu bor yang bla'o snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:12250: nyi 'og gi rgyal po la btud do //
NK043(pi)001:12251: de rgyal po dbang chen sdes tshor nas blon po
NK043(pi)001:12252: 'di rnams kyis bdag bor ro snyam du nags kyi
NK043(pi)001:12253: gnas su song nas gnas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12254: nyi 'og gi rgyal pos yul mi rnams rang gi zhabs su phab ste /
NK043(pi)001:12255: rgyal po gar song zhes dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12256: de rnams kyi bros so zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12257: der nyi 'og gi rgyal pos yul der mnga' dbang byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12258: de'i tshe na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na bram
NK043(pi)001:12259: ze dbul zhing 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig la bu
NK043(pi)001:12260: dang bu mo mang po btsas te /
NK043(pi)001:12261: yul der mu ge byung ba na gso ma nus nas /
NK043(pi)001:12262: rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes pa byams pa'i bdag
NK043(pi)001:12263: nyid can de la nor slong ngo snyam du b+aa
NK043(pi)001:12264: r+aa na s+air song ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12265: rgyal po dbang chen sde nags su song ba thos
NK043(pi)001:12266: nas de sdug bsngal zhing nags su de'i drung du
NK043(pi)001:12267: song na nor sbyin par yang srid snyam du nags
NK043(pi)001:12268: gang du byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa der song
NK043(pi)001:12269: ste lo rgyus zhib tu gsol ba na /
NK043(pi)001:12270: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12271: bdag nags kyi gnas su gnas bcas pa khyod kyis ma thos sam /
NK043(pi)001:12273: bram ze de re thag chad nas sa la 'gyel ba la /
NK043(pi)001:12274: byang chub sems dpas gdong du chu gtor te bslangs so //
NK043(pi)001:12275: bram ze des nag stug po'i nang du zhugs nas
NK043(pi)001:12276: shing khar thag pa btags te 'gags cing 'chi bar
NK043(pi)001:12277: brtsams pa / byang chub sems dpas mthong nas snying rje ste /
NK043(pi)001:12278: gal te 'dis bdag khrid de dgra'i drung du song
NK043(pi)001:12279: na des 'di la nor gyi phung po sbyin par
NK043(pi)001:12282: khyod gzu lum ma byed cig dang /
NK043(pi)001:12283: ngas khyod kyi dbul ba bsal bar bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:12284: bram ze tshur shog khyod kyis nga phyin ka log tu dam por chings la /
NK043(pi)001:12285: nyi 'og gi rgyal po che ge mo'i thad du khrid de song dang /
NK043(pi)001:12286: des khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:12288: bdag ni khyod lta bu 'chings mi phod do //
NK043(pi)001:12289: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12290: the tshom ma byed par chings te khrid cig /
NK043(pi)001:12291: de las thabs gud na ma mthong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12292: de nas bram ze des de ltar bgyis te b+aa
NK043(pi)001:12293: r+aa na s+air rgyal po de'i thad du dong ba
NK043(pi)001:12294: dang / skye bo mang po dag gis de mthong nas ngo shes te rgyal po la gsol te /
NK043(pi)001:12295: de la rgyal po yid ma ches nas ched gtad du byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song bas /
NK043(pi)001:12296: bram ze des de ltar khrid pa mthong nas khyod 'di ga las khrid /
NK043(pi)001:12299: bdag gis dka' thub kyi nags na gnas pa mthus bzung nas khrid de mchis so //
NK043(pi)001:12302: bram ze lus zhan pas 'dis 'di bzung mi nus kyi /
NK043(pi)001:12303: 'di ni snying rje che bas bdag bcing du bcug
NK043(pi)001:12304: nas 'di la byin par gor ma chag snyam du
NK043(pi)001:12305: / bram ze de la khyod kyis ji ltar gzung ba drang por smros zhes byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:12306: bram ze des ji ltar gyur pa rgyal po la bsnyad par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12307: de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de dad par
NK043(pi)001:12308: gyur te sems can 'di lta bu la bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:12309: gnod par byas so snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:12310: bcing ba rang nyid kyis bkrol te /
NK043(pi)001:12311: rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs shing yan lag
NK043(pi)001:12312: thams cad kyis 'khyud nas seng ge'i khri la bzhag
NK043(pi)001:12313: pa la / rang gi cod pan gyi thod phud
NK043(pi)001:12314: de byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la btags nas smras
NK043(pi)001:12315: pa la / pa / khyod ni rgyal po'i 'os lags kyi /
NK043(pi)001:12316: bdag ni 'os ma lags so zhes byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:12317: des de la dpung gi tshogs dang dkor mdzod rnams
NK043(pi)001:12318: phul nas bzod par gsol te rang gi yul du
NK043(pi)001:12319: song ngo // de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes
NK043(pi)001:12320: bram ze de la nor gyi phung po chen po
NK043(pi)001:12321: byin nas dge bcu'i lam la gnas par byas so
NK043(pi)001:12322: song ngo // // phyis bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nas /
NK043(pi)001:12323: gnyan yod du bzhugs pa na /
NK043(pi)001:12324: bram ze'i bu bram ze'i bslab pa thams cad la
NK043(pi)001:12325: mkhas par gyur pa zhig bram ze'i lugs kyis lo
NK043(pi)001:12326: bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du tshangs par spyad nas /
NK043(pi)001:12327: de'i 'og tu chung ma gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa zhig blang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12328: chung ma de g.yem zhing skyes pa gzhan 'dod pas
NK043(pi)001:12329: bram ze rgan po dang lhan cig 'dug pas snying
NK043(pi)001:12330: ma tshim par skyes pa gzhan dang nyal bar 'dod
NK043(pi)001:12331: nas de gzhan du 'gro ba'i thabs su nor btsal
NK043(pi)001:12332: bar bskul ba ltar de yul gzhan du song ste
NK043(pi)001:12333: / kar+sha pa na mang po zhig rnyed nas phyir
NK043(pi)001:12334: 'ong ba'i lam du mi rgod kyis bcom pas shin
NK043(pi)001:12335: tu sdug bsngal zhing da khyim du song na yang
NK043(pi)001:12336: bram ze mo dang 'thab mo chen mo 'byung bas
NK043(pi)001:12337: nags khung thib por shing la btags te 'gags nas
NK043(pi)001:12338: 'chi bar bya'o snyam du de ltar brtsams pa na
NK043(pi)001:12339: / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des dgongs shing gnyan yod nas nags khung der gshegs te /
NK043(pi)001:12340: bram ze gzu lum ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:12341: ngas khyod la nor sbyin no zhes gsungs zhing gter
NK043(pi)001:12342: bstan te 'di khyod kyi nor yin gyi srog phangs
NK043(pi)001:12343: pa ma dor cig ces gsungs nas slar gshegs so
NK043(pi)001:12344: // bram ze des nor khyer zhing rang khyim du
NK043(pi)001:12345: song nas 'byor ba rgyas par byas te sbyin pa'i
NK043(pi)001:12346: bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs so //
NK043(pi)001:12348: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni bdag la phan pa byed pa yin gyi /
NK043(pi)001:12349: bdag khyim spangs nas de'i thad du rab tu byung
NK043(pi)001:12350: bar bya'o snyam pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
NK043(pi)001:12351: te / chos nyan pas rgyun zhugs kyi 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:12352: mngon sum byas nas rab tu byung zhing brtson pas
NK043(pi)001:12353: dgra bcom pa thob par gyur pa ni sngon gyi
NK043(pi)001:12354: bram ze de yin par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:12355: mi bdag bsod nams mi dman par gyur pa'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:12356: dgra zla la ma 'thabs par nags su song ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12357: tshe / bram ze zhig gi gnyen rnams btson du
NK043(pi)001:12358: bzung ba thar ba'i phyir des nor bslangs pa la
NK043(pi)001:12359: nor sbyin rgyu med nas nga rang gi mgo bo
NK043(pi)001:12360: 'di chod la dgra zla'i rgyal po la byin ces
NK043(pi)001:12361: tshe / smras kyang / des ma brangs zhing /
NK043(pi)001:12362: des de bcings nas dgra zlar phul bas btson btang
NK043(pi)001:12363: zhing rang nyid rgyal srid thob pa gong dang cha
NK043(pi)001:12365: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med 'das pa'i dus na /
NK043(pi)001:12366: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul b+aa r+aa na s+air /
NK043(pi)001:12367: rgyal po ba la ma dar zhes pa dpung bzhi dang bcas te /
NK043(pi)001:12368: tshal gyi nang du rtser song ba las /
NK043(pi)001:12369: ri dwags dang 'phrad de de'i phyi bzhin rgyug pas /
NK043(pi)001:12370: rgyal po gcig pu nags tshal 'thug por phyin nas rta las bab ste 'dug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12371: seng ge mo zhig 'dod chags kyis nyan nas 'ong
NK043(pi)001:12372: ba rgyal po dang 'phrad de mjug ma bteg cing
NK043(pi)001:12373: bsnyegs so // rgyal pos kyang 'dod chags skyes par
NK043(pi)001:12374: rigs nas 'di gcan gzan khro bo gsad pa'i mthu
NK043(pi)001:12375: bsnyegs so // yod pas / gal te yid bzhin ma byas na srog la bab bo snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:12376: skrag bzhin seng ge mo la 'khrig pa spyad do //
NK043(pi)001:12377: seng ge mo song ba'i 'og tu g.yog rnams lhags pas /
NK043(pi)001:12378: rgyal po bsus nas pho brang du khrid do //
NK043(pi)001:12379: seng ge mo de sbrum pa zla ba tshang nas /
NK043(pi)001:12380: lus thams cad mi dang 'dra la /
NK043(pi)001:12381: rkang pa 'ba' shig khra bor 'dug pa btsas pa
NK043(pi)001:12382: seng ge mos rgyal po'i bu yin par dran nas
NK043(pi)001:12383: / rang gi rgyab tu bkal te rgyal po'i thad du bskyal lo //
NK043(pi)001:12384: rgyal pos kyang bdag gi bu yin par shes nas
NK043(pi)001:12385: gsos bskyed de ming rkang bkrar btags pa dpa' zhing
NK043(pi)001:12387: rgyal po de tshe 'phos pa'i rjes su rkang bkras
NK043(pi)001:12388: rgyal po'i srid thob ste rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i
NK043(pi)001:12389: rigs kyi btsun mo gnyis blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:12390: der rgyal po skyed tshal du 'chag tu song ba'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:12391: btsun mo gnyis la 'di skad ces /
NK043(pi)001:12392: gang khyed gnyis nga'i phyi bzhin mgyogs par 'ong ste /
NK043(pi)001:12393: nga dang gang sngar 'phrad pa de la nyin gcig bzhin rtse dga' spyad la /
NK043(pi)001:12394: gang phyis 'ong ba de 'phrad du mi btub bo zhes byas nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12395: btsun mo de gnyis kyang rgyan gyis brgyan cing /
NK043(pi)001:12396: gzhon pa la zhon nas dus gcig chas so //
NK043(pi)001:12397: lam du lha rten zhig yod pa der btsun mo
NK043(pi)001:12398: bram ze'i rigs can bzhon pa las bab cing phyag
NK043(pi)001:12399: byas te myur du song bas phyis nas /
NK043(pi)001:12400: rgyal pos kyang 'phrad du ma ster ro //
NK043(pi)001:12401: btsun mo des lha la khros te /
NK043(pi)001:12402: bdag ni khyod la phyag 'tshal bas phyis nas rgyal pos ma 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:12403: gal te lha khyod la mthu zhig yod na ci'i phyir nga'i mgon skyabs mi byed ces smras te /
NK043(pi)001:12404: yid la rgyal po la gnod pa bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:12405: phyir pho brang du song nas /
NK043(pi)001:12406: rgyal po la btsun mo des bdag nyi ma gcig
NK043(pi)001:12407: cig dga' bar bgyid du gnang bar dbang skur cig
NK043(pi)001:12408: ces byas pa ltar rgyal pos kyang gnang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12409: der mi mang po mngags nas lha'i rten bcom ste sa yang bsnyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:12410: rten de srung ba'i lha shin tu ma dga' nas /
NK043(pi)001:12411: rgyal po la gnod pa bya bar bsams te song
NK043(pi)001:12412: ba pho brang srung ba'i lhas nang du ma btang
NK043(pi)001:12413: ngo // de'i tshe drang srong gcig ri la gnas
NK043(pi)001:12414: pa de la rgyal po rkang bkras mchod pa byas
NK043(pi)001:12415: pas nyin gcig bzhin du 'phur zhing pho brang du
NK043(pi)001:12416: 'ongs nas zas bzang po mi 'dod kyi tha mal
NK043(pi)001:12418: nyi ma gcig drang srong de mi 'ong bar shes
NK043(pi)001:12419: nas lha des drang srong gi gzugs su sprul te
NK043(pi)001:12420: pho brang du 'ongs pa pho brang srung ba'i lhas
NK043(pi)001:12421: bkag pa dang / sgo nas bos te /
NK043(pi)001:12422: nang du 'ong mi ster ro zhes pa rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:12423: thos nas nang du thong zhes bka' stsal bas nang
NK043(pi)001:12424: du btang ngo // de'i rgyun du za ba'i zas
NK043(pi)001:12425: ma zos nas kha zas 'di ches ngan gyi sha
NK043(pi)001:12426: dang nya baza'o zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12427: rgyal pos drang srong chen po sngon chad khyod zas tha mal pa za bas na /
NK043(pi)001:12428: sha dang nya ma sbyar ba yin no //
NK043(pi)001:12430: da phan chad kha zas ngan pa 'di mi 'dod kyis /
NK043(pi)001:12431: sha dang nya sbyor cig ces smras nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12432: phyi de nyid drang srong de 'ongs pa la sha dang nya sbyar ba'i zas phul bas /
NK043(pi)001:12433: drang srong de khros pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12434: rgyal pos drang srong chen po khar sang 'ong ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12435: tshe kha zas 'di lta bu sbyor zhes ma bsgos
NK043(pi)001:12436: sam drang srong gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12437: khar sang nyin gcig zan bcad de ma 'ongs pa yin /
NK043(pi)001:12438: de skad sus bsgos khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa 'di lta bu byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:12439: khyod lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi sha 'ba'
NK043(pi)001:12440: zhig za bar gyur cig ces smras nas song ngo
NK043(pi)001:12441: // de nas nyin gcig rgyal po'i g.yos mkhan gyis
NK043(pi)001:12442: sha ma 'byor nas 'phral du byis pa'i ro zhig
NK043(pi)001:12443: // dang 'phrad pa / de'i nang lag bcad de
NK043(pi)001:12444: g.yos su byas pa spod sna tshogs btab nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12446: rgyal pos kyang de zos pas sngon gyi sha bas
NK043(pi)001:12447: lhag par zhim par mthong nas 'di ci'i sha zhes
NK043(pi)001:12448: dris so // g.yos mkhan skrag nas gdong smad de /
NK043(pi)001:12449: khyod gyod mi rmo na drang por gsol zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:12450: rgyal pos drang por smos dang gyod mi rmo'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12452: bdag gis 'phral du sha gzhan ma rnyed nas byis
NK043(pi)001:12453: pa chung ngu 'gum pa'i ro zhig rnyed pa g.yos
NK043(pi)001:12454: su byas te phul ba rgyal pos mkhyen pa lags
NK043(pi)001:12456: sha 'di lhag par zhim pas da phyin chad sha 'di lta bu rtag tu sbyor cig /
NK043(pi)001:12460: phyin chad kyang khyod kyis gsang thub par gyis la /
NK043(pi)001:12461: gzhan gyis ma tshor bar longs dang nga la dbang yod do //
NK043(pi)001:12462: g.yos mkhan gyis byis pa rnams mtshan mo gsang ste brkus nas bsad cing drangs so //
NK043(pi)001:12463: de'i tshe grong khyer de'i mi phal cher bu stor ro zhes ngu zhing bsgrags te /
NK043(pi)001:12464: 'di ltar cis 'gyur zhes blon po rnams 'dus shing /
NK043(pi)001:12465: bgros nas mtshan mo srang mdor mel tse byas pas
NK043(pi)001:12466: rgyal po'i g.yos mkhan gyis bu chung rnams brku ba
NK043(pi)001:12467: zin te / rgyal po la phul nas snga phyir
NK043(pi)001:12468: bu 'di snyed cig stor ro zhes gsol ba dang
NK043(pi)001:12469: zin te / / rgyal po cang mi zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:12470: de ltar lan gsum gsol kyang mi zer ba la /
NK043(pi)001:12471: da bdag cag gis nyes pa byed pa bzung ba
NK043(pi)001:12472: 'di la nyes par mngon na zhal lce bcad rigs
NK043(pi)001:12473: kyi / mi smra bar mi rigs so zhes gsol ba la /
NK043(pi)001:12474: rgyal pos ngas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12475: der blon po rnams mi dga' ste /
NK043(pi)001:12476: khon du bzung nas so sor song zhing gcig la
NK043(pi)001:12477: gcig bdag cag la sogs pa'i bu kun za ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12478: dgrar gyur pa'i rgyal po mi sha za ba 'di
NK043(pi)001:12479: dang lhan cig srid gcig tu byar mi rung gis
NK043(pi)001:12480: / 'di bsad par rigs zhes gros byas so //
NK043(pi)001:12481: grong de'i phyi rol skyed tshal du rdzing bu yod
NK043(pi)001:12482: par rgyal po nyin gcig bzhin du khrus byed du
NK043(pi)001:12483: 'gro ba la / blon po rnams skyed tshal du dpung gi tshogs sbas nas /
NK043(pi)001:12484: rgyal po khrus byed du 'gro ba'i tshe bzung ste gsad par brtsams pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12485: rgyal po skrag nas ci'i phyir khyed rnams nga 'dzin du 'ong /
NK043(pi)001:12486: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12487: rgyal po zhes bya ba 'bangs mang po gso ba yin na /
NK043(pi)001:12488: 'bangs kyi bu kun rgyal pos zos pas 'bangs thams
NK043(pi)001:12489: cad med par 'gyur pa mi bzod pas khyod gsad
NK043(pi)001:12491: 'di ltar byas pa ngas nyes mod kyi da phyin
NK043(pi)001:12492: chad de ltar mi bya bas 'di'i tshe btang du
NK043(pi)001:12493: mi rung ngam zhes byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12495: gal te gnam la kha ba nag po bab pa'am
NK043(pi)001:12496: khyod kyi mgo la sbrul nag po skyes kyang btang
NK043(pi)001:12497: ba med kyis da ma smra zhig /
NK043(pi)001:12498: rgyal po rkang bkras tshig de thos nas da ni
NK043(pi)001:12499: nges par srog dang 'bral lo snyam ste smras pa
NK043(pi)001:12500: / da khyod kyis gsad par chad na skad cig
NK043(pi)001:12501: tsam zhig kho bo bde bar bsam du chug la
NK043(pi)001:12502: gdod song cig blon po de rnams cung bsdad de
NK043(pi)001:12504: rgyal po de'i yid la yid dam bcas te /
NK043(pi)001:12505: bdag gis sngon chad dge ba ci byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12506: rgyal srid chos bzhin byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12507: drang srong la sbyin pa byas pa'i bsod nams ci yod pa thams cad kyi mthus /
NK043(pi)001:12508: bdag nam mkhar 'phur ba'i srin por gyur cig ces bsngosa shing smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:12509: steng gi nam mkhar 'phags nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12510: khyed kyi mthus nga gsad par brtsams kyang nga'i bsod nams kyis rang sos par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:12511: da phan chad khyod bzod par byos shig /
NK043(pi)001:12512: khyod kyi chung ma dang bu sdug pa ci yod
NK043(pi)001:12513: pa thams cad bza' bar bya'o zhes smras shing 'phur
NK043(pi)001:12515: de phyin chad mi'i nang du mi za bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12516: mi mang po yang de la 'jigs skrag nas rtag tu bros shing gab par byed la /
NK043(pi)001:12517: srin po mi sha za ba de srin po mang
NK043(pi)001:12518: po dang bsdongs te 'khor g.yog kyang mang par gyur
NK043(pi)001:12519: nas / srin po'i 'khor rnams kyis srin po rkang
NK043(pi)001:12520: bkral bdag cag khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog tu gyur
NK043(pi)001:12521: nas / na / bdag cag la ston mo chen po byin cig ces gsol ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12522: des kyang de bzhin gnang ste /
NK043(pi)001:12523: rgyal bu lnga brgya bsad pas ston mo byed do
NK043(pi)001:12524: zhes bgros nas song song ste rgyal po rnams blangs
NK043(pi)001:12525: pa brag phug tu bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:12526: bzhi brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnyed de gcig ma rnyed pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12527: brag phug na gnas pa'i rgyal bu de dag gcig la gcig smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12528: bdag cag phongs te skyabs med pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12529: gal te rgyal bu zla ba stobs dang ldan pa
NK043(pi)001:12530: de 'dir 'ongs na bdag cag thar srid ces smras
NK043(pi)001:12531: nas / rgyal bu zla ba 'ong bar srin po la gsol bar bya'o zhes bgros te /
NK043(pi)001:12532: srin po'i rgyal po khyod kyis ston mo byed na
NK043(pi)001:12533: bdag cag mi'i rgyal po 'ba' zhig gi ston mo
NK043(pi)001:12534: byas pas ston mo bzang po mi 'gyur gyis /
NK043(pi)001:12535: rgyal bu zla ba zhes pa yon tan chen po
NK043(pi)001:12536: can de rnyed na gdod ston mo chen por 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:12538: srin pos 'di ni ci dka' zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:12540: su ta so ma len du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12541: de'i tshe rgyal bu zla ba de rgyal tshab byed
NK043(pi)001:12542: cing rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang bcas nas
NK043(pi)001:12543: skyed mos tshal du song ba der /
NK043(pi)001:12544: bram ze legs par smra ba zhig 'ongs nas rgyal bu zla ba la /
NK043(pi)001:12545: legs bshad kyi skyes sbyin cing nor thob pa'i re bas der 'ong ste /
NK043(pi)001:12546: rgyal bu'i gzugs bzang po la lta zhing sems chags bzhin 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:12547: bram ze de dang chos kyi gtam bya ba'i longs
NK043(pi)001:12548: med par skye bo'i tshogs kun ca co'i sgra chen
NK043(pi)001:12549: po sgrogs pa la 'di ci yin ltos zhes rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12551: de dag skrag nas rtab bzhin du lha su da
NK043(pi)001:12552: ya'i bu rkang bkra zhes pa srin po mi zan
NK043(pi)001:12553: de slebs so // de la skrag nas dpung rnams kyang byer na de la ci zhig bgyid /
NK043(pi)001:12554: de nas byang chub sems dpas rkang bkra'i ngang tshul shes nas /
NK043(pi)001:12555: de la phan pas gso bar bsams te /
NK043(pi)001:12556: de 'dir 'ongs na bdag gis mgron bya'o zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12557: btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad du bzhin slar btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:12558: rgyal bu zla ba rang nyid ca co chen po sgrogs pa der song ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12559: srin po rkang bkra 'jigs shing mi sdug pa phub
NK043(pi)001:12560: dang ral gri phyar bas dpung gi phyi bzhin bsnyegs
NK043(pi)001:12561: par mthong nas / byang chub sems dpas bos te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12562: ka ye zla ba ni nga yin te /
NK043(pi)001:12563: khyod mi sha za ba la zhugs pas bkren chos
NK043(pi)001:12564: ngan pa des ci bya slar log ste tshur shog
NK043(pi)001:12565: ces smras pas / de tshur log nas /
NK043(pi)001:12566: byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu rang bzhin zhi bar mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:12567: nga yang khyod tshol du 'ong zhes smras te 'dzem dogs med par phrag par thogs nas bros so //
NK043(pi)001:12568: byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di re zhig bcos pa'i
NK043(pi)001:12569: dus ma yin no snyam nas btang snyoms su bsdad
NK043(pi)001:12570: do // der de'i gnas mi sdug pa mi bsad
NK043(pi)001:12571: pa'i keng rus mang pos gang zhing khrag gis gos
NK043(pi)001:12573: rgyal bu zla ba de'i gzugs bzang po phun sum
NK043(pi)001:12574: tshogs pa la mig bgrad de lta zhing 'dug go
NK043(pi)001:12575: // de nas byang chub sems dpas bram ze legs
NK043(pi)001:12576: par smra ba'i skyes khyer te 'ongs pa des bdag
NK043(pi)001:12577: 'khrid pa shes nas re thag chad par gyur pas
NK043(pi)001:12578: bdag gis de'i re ba rdzogs par ma byas snyam
NK043(pi)001:12579: du sems la dran pas snying rjes gdung ba'i mchi
NK043(pi)001:12580: // ma phyung ngo // de la bltas nas srin po bgad de /
NK043(pi)001:12581: khyod ni yon tan mang pos brtan zhes grags na /
NK043(pi)001:12582: 'on kyang nga yi dbang du gyur ba'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:12584: khyod srog gam sdug pa gzhan ci dran nas du /
NK043(pi)001:12585: rgyal bu zla bas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12587: sdug pa gzhan dag dran nas mi dga' ba min gyis /
NK043(pi)001:12588: da ci'i skyed mos tshal du bram ze zhig legs
NK043(pi)001:12589: bshad kyi skyes khyer nas bdag las nor thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:12591: bdag khrid pas bram ze de re thag chad par 'gyur snyam du dran nas mchi ma 'byin no //
NK043(pi)001:12592: gal te khyod bdag la thugs brtse na slar btang bar gyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:12593: bdag bram ze de las legs bshad kyang nyan /
NK043(pi)001:12597: khyod btang na phyir 'ong du btub bam /
NK043(pi)001:12599: bdag skyes nas rdzun du smra ma myong bas dam bcas pa 'dor ba mi srid mod /
NK043(pi)001:12600: 'on kyang yid mi ches na nga ma 'ongs kyang khyod la blang ba'i mthu yod pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:12601: sngon du yang nga khyod kyi drung du bsnyegs pa yin nam /
NK043(pi)001:12603: rgyal bu de phyir 'ongs bas gshin rje'i kha las thar ba ltar rang gi mi rnams dga' zhing /
NK043(pi)001:12605: de las tshigs bcad bzhi mnos so //
NK043(pi)001:12606: der tshigs bcad gcig la gser srang stong gi rin thang du yang brtsis te /
NK043(pi)001:12608: gzhan yang ci 'dod pas mchod par byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:12609: de nas rgyal bu'i phas cung zad tsam zhig gi
NK043(pi)001:12610: ched du nor de tsam god tshabs che bar mthong
NK043(pi)001:12612: bu legs par smras pa las ci tsam ran par
NK043(pi)001:12613: sbyin pa legs kyis ha cang ches na nor gyi
NK043(pi)001:12615: khyod kyi khyim dang 'bangs kyi bya ba nor la
NK043(pi)001:12616: ltos pas tshod dang 'tshams par gyis la rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:12617: skyongs shig ces smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12619: lha gal te legs par smra ba la rin thang bcad rung na rgyal srid kyang sbyin 'os te /
NK043(pi)001:12620: gang zhig thos na shes rab skye zhing gti mug
NK043(pi)001:12621: med par byed pa'i thos pa dang 'dra ba'i yon
NK043(pi)001:12622: tan ldan pa gzhan med pas /
NK043(pi)001:12623: de thos pa'i dus su ci ste mi mchod /
NK043(pi)001:12624: nyes pa chen po'i 'byung gnas rgyal srid kyang bdag la mi dgos kyi /
NK043(pi)001:12625: bdag ni srin po'i drung du sngar khas blangs pa
NK043(pi)001:12626: bzhin slar 'agro'o zhes smras pa la pha de shin
NK043(pi)001:12627: tu rtab rtab por gyur nas /
NK043(pi)001:12628: bu khyod nyid la phan pa'i phyir de skad smras kyis mi dga' bar ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:12629: bu su zhig bsam bzhin dgra'i drung du 'gro ste /
NK043(pi)001:12630: khyod kyis khas blangs kyang ngas mi gnang zhing /
NK043(pi)001:12631: rang gi srog bsrung ba dang bla ma'i don du
NK043(pi)001:12632: rdzun byas kyang sdig pa med par rig byed mkhas
NK043(pi)001:12633: pa dag gis bshad pa'i phyir ro //
NK043(pi)001:12635: rang gi don la mi lta ba'i ngan dus de thongs shig /
NK043(pi)001:12636: gal te khyod rang gi dam bcas pa dang 'gal snyam na yang /
NK043(pi)001:12637: ngas khyod thar pa'i phyir dpung bzhi bshams zin gyis
NK043(pi)001:12638: des bskor te song la dgra de'i dbang du mi
NK043(pi)001:12640: khas blangs pa la yang khrel bda' rgyu med la /
NK043(pi)001:12643: lha khas blangs pa las gzhan du bgyid par mi nus te /
NK043(pi)001:12646: mgon ma mchis pa de lta bu la snying rje can su zhig gis brgal /
NK043(pi)001:12647: mi sha za ba'i srin po des kyang bdag la yang bar bgyis nas phyir btang na /
NK043(pi)001:12648: des bdag gi tshig la yid ches bzhin btang ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12649: drin las bdag gis legs bshad 'di yang thos pas
NK043(pi)001:12650: / da ni bdag gis de rjes su bzung ba'i dus yin pas bdag 'gum par mi byed do //
NK043(pi)001:12652: dpung gzhan phyir bkye nas rang nyid gcig pu srin po'i drung du song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12653: srin pos kyang de rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong ste /
NK043(pi)001:12654: yun ring por rtsub mo'i sems kyis bgos pa'i dri
NK043(pi)001:12655: ma shas che ba yang dad pa'i sems su gyur
NK043(pi)001:12656: te / a la la ngo mtshar che /
NK043(pi)001:12657: 'di ltar 'chi ba la mi 'dzem par bden pa
NK043(pi)001:12658: rjes su srung ba'o snyam du sems par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:12660: bdag ni legs par smra ba rnyed cing mchod pa
NK043(pi)001:12661: yang byas pas sems dga' ste khyod kyi drin dran
NK043(pi)001:12662: no // da ni bdag 'dir 'ong bas ci 'dod par zo zhig /
NK043(pi)001:12664: nga yis khyod bza' ba'i dus da dung snang gi
NK043(pi)001:12665: re zhig legs par bshad pa de ston dang nyan
NK043(pi)001:12666: 'dod do // byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12667: khyod ni 'di ltar ma rungs par gyur cing snying
NK043(pi)001:12668: rje med pa lto tsam gyi phyir gnas skabs 'di
NK043(pi)001:12670: tshigs bcad 'di rnams kyis chos 'ba' zhig ston cing /
NK043(pi)001:12671: chos dang chos min mi mthun pas /
NK043(pi)001:12672: srin po bas kyang tshul ngan pa dag la 'phags pa'i lam bstan pas ci zhig bya /
NK043(pi)001:12673: srin pos 'phyas pa de la lan du /
NK043(pi)001:12674: rgyal po rnams kyis rtsed mo'i phyir du ri dwags
NK043(pi)001:12675: phrug gu sdug pa'ang gsod pa de bzhin 'tsho ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12676: phyir mi bsad na chos dang 'gal gyi ri dwags
NK043(pi)001:12678: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12679: gang dag ri dwags gsod pa de yang chos la gnas pa ma yin mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:12680: mi sha za ba ni de las kyang smad de
NK043(pi)001:12681: rigs mtho ba'i mi rnams kyis mi sha bzar mi
NK043(pi)001:12682: rung ngo zhes tshig rtsub mos 'phyas kyang /
NK043(pi)001:12683: byang chub sems dpas byams pa'i yon tan gyi mthus
NK043(pi)001:12684: khro ba zil gyis mnan nas de'i tshig rna bar
NK043(pi)001:12685: 'ong ba bzhin du 'dzum dmul te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12686: nga yis khyod btang nas khyim du rgyal po'i longs
NK043(pi)001:12687: spyod dga' ba thams cad myong nas slar yang nga'i
NK043(pi)001:12688: drung du 'ong ba khyod gzhung lugs kyi tshul la
NK043(pi)001:12690: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12691: bdag 'phral gyi bde ba la ma chags shing rang
NK043(pi)001:12692: nyid srung ba'i lam 'ba' zhig la lta ba'i gzhung
NK043(pi)001:12693: lugs ngan pa'i tshul spangs nas bden pa srung ba'i
NK043(pi)001:12694: phyir 'dir 'ong ba de nyid gzhung lugs kyi tshul
NK043(pi)001:12696: gzhung lugs 'di ni grags pa dang bden pa'i don dang mi 'gal la /
NK043(pi)001:12697: gzhung lugs ngan pa rnams ni 'gal zhing de la gnas pa rnams shi nas ngan song du 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:12699: phongs pa'i srog dang nang mi mchi mas gang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12700: rgyal srid kyi bde ba bor nas bden pa'i tshig la don ci zhig mthong nas 'dir 'ong /
NK043(pi)001:12701: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12702: bden pa la yon tan khyad par can mang du mchis te mdo tsam bshad na /
NK043(pi)001:12703: rgyan kun las khyad par bden pa 'phags la /
NK043(pi)001:12704: ro kun las khyad par du bden tshig zhim mo //
NK043(pi)001:12705: dka' thub sogs nyon mongs ma byas kyang bsod nams sgrub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12706: 'gro ba mtha' dag khyab pa'i grags pa 'phel //
NK043(pi)001:12707: bden pa 'jig rten gsum las 'da' ba'i lam //
NK043(pi)001:12708: lha yi gnas su 'jug pa'i sgo yang yin //
NK043(pi)001:12709: 'khor ba'i rdzing las thar ba'i zam pa'ang yin //
NK043(pi)001:12711: srin pos de la legs so zhes bstod nas /
NK043(pi)001:12712: mi gzhan nga yi dbang du gyur pa'i tshe brtan pa nyams shing skrag nas /
NK043(pi)001:12713: khyod ni dpa' mi 'gong pas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med pa 'dra snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:12715: rab tu bsgrims nas 'bad kyang bcos su mi rung ba'i 'chi ba la 'jigs pas ci zhig phan /
NK043(pi)001:12716: gzhan yang dge ba ma byas shing sdig pa bgyis
NK043(pi)001:12717: pa rnams 'chi ba'i tshe rgyu de las 'jigs pa
NK043(pi)001:12718: skye la / bdag ni yid 'gyod par byed pa'i
NK043(pi)001:12719: sdig pa byas pa mi dran la chos la gnas
NK043(pi)001:12720: nas sbyin sogs bgyis pas bsam pa bde bas 'chi
NK043(pi)001:12722: de'i phyir khyod kyis bdag mchod sbyin bya'am za ba gang 'dod gyis shig ces smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12723: srin po de dad pa skyes te mig mchi mas
NK043(pi)001:12724: gang zhing sdig pa'i sems brjed par gyur nas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12726: rgyal mchog khyod lta bu la shes bzhin du su zhig gnod par byed /
NK043(pi)001:12727: legs par smras pa de dag kyang bdag la ston cig dang nyan par 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:12728: khyed kyis legs par bshad pa'i mthus rang gi spyod pa ngan pa la'ang yid gdung bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12730: rgyal bu byang chub sems dpas srin po de la
NK043(pi)001:12731: sngar drang srong gi dmod pa'i lo yang tshang zhing
NK043(pi)001:12732: chos la gzhugs pa'i dus su bab pas chos la
NK043(pi)001:12734: 'o na chos 'dod pa la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i spyod lam dgos pas /
NK043(pi)001:12735: rab tu dma' ba'i stan la 'dug /
NK043(pi)001:12736: dul ba'i dpal ni rnam par bskyed //
NK043(pi)001:12737: dga' dang ldan pa'i mig gis blta //
NK043(pi)001:12738: tshig gi bdud rtsi 'thung pa bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:12739: gus pa bskyed cing rtse gcig btud //
NK043(pi)001:12740: rab tu dad pa dri med yid //
NK043(pi)001:12741: nad pas sman pa'i tshig nyan bzhin //
NK043(pi)001:12742: rim gro bskyed de chos nyon cig /
NK043(pi)001:12743: de nas srin po rkang bkra des rdo leb mthon
NK043(pi)001:12744: po gcig gi steng du rang gi stod g.yogs bting
NK043(pi)001:12745: ste de la byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas /
NK043(pi)001:12746: de'i gdong du blta bzhin sems dpa' chen po gsungs shig ces smras so //
NK043(pi)001:12747: byang chub sems dpas gdang gsal bas sngar thos pa'i tshigs bcad de smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12748: dam pa bdag la lan gcig tsam //
NK043(pi)001:12750: 'dris par bya ba mi dgos par //
NK043(pi)001:12751: rab tu brtan pa nyid du 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12752: rkang bkras de thos nas legs so zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:12753: mgo bsgyur se gol gtogs nas mgu bar byas te //
NK043(pi)001:12754: byang chub sems dpa' la yang gsungs shig ces smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:12755: byang chub sems dpas tshigs bcad gnyis pa smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12756: dam pa rnams ni sus kyang mi bsring ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12757: ngur ba'i tshul gyis dge ba bsten par bya //
NK043(pi)001:12758: de dang nye na de yi yon tan rdul //
NK043(pi)001:12759: ched du ma bsgos par yang gos par gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12761: dge ba rnams kyis legs smras pa //
NK043(pi)001:12762: khyod kyis rnam pa kun gyis mchod //
NK043(pi)001:12763: nor yang gnas su phyin par btang //
NK043(pi)001:12764: 'bad de don grub thog tu bab //
NK043(pi)001:12767: rgyal po'i shing rta rin chen gser brgyan dang /
NK043(pi)001:12768: lus kyang rgas pas mi sdug par yang 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12769: dam pa rnams kyi chos ni rgas mi 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12770: dge ba rnams ni yon tan rjes chags brtan //
NK043(pi)001:12771: rkang bkras se gol gtogs shing bdag ni bdud rtsi'i char pas ngoms par bgyis so //
NK043(pi)001:12773: byang chub sems dpas tshigs bcad bzhi pa smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12774: nam mkha' dang ni sa gzhi'i bar yang ring //
NK043(pi)001:12775: rgya mtsho'i pha rol tshu rol 'gram yang ring //
NK043(pi)001:12776: shar dang nub kyi ri yi bar yang ring //
NK043(pi)001:12777: phal pa dag dang dam chos de bas ring //
NK043(pi)001:12778: de nas rkang bkra de rab tu dga' zhing gus
NK043(pi)001:12779: par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa
NK043(pi)001:12780: / khyod kyi tshigs su bcad pa tshig don gsal
NK043(pi)001:12781: ba bzhi po de dag thos pa'i yon du mchod
NK043(pi)001:12782: / pa'i phyir / dam pa bzhi 'bul bar 'tshal na /
NK043(pi)001:12783: ci bzhed pa bslang du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:12785: khyod ni bdag la rang dbang med par mi rigs
NK043(pi)001:12786: par byed pa la brtson na dge ba spyod pa
NK043(pi)001:12787: phyin ci log tu gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:12788: khyod kyis gzhan la dam pa ji ltar sbyin /
NK043(pi)001:12789: bdag gis dam pa sbyin zhes gnang ba byin kyang
NK043(pi)001:12790: khyod kyi yid sbyin pa la spro bar mi 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:12791: bas de skad ma smra zhig /
NK043(pi)001:12792: de nas rkang bkra cung zad ngo tsha zhing mgo smad nas /
NK043(pi)001:12793: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12794: khyod de ltar dogs pa ma skyed cig /
NK043(pi)001:12795: bdag gis srog kyang btang nas dam pa de dag 'bul gyis bzhes shig /
NK043(pi)001:12796: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12797: bden pa'i brtul zhugs longs la sems can gsod pa spongs /
NK043(pi)001:12798: skye bo brtson du bzung ba 'di rnams ma lus thongs /
NK043(pi)001:12799: dpa' bo khyod kyis mi sha za ba rab tu spongs /
NK043(pi)001:12800: dam pa'i nang nas mchog gyur 'di bzhi sbyin par gyis /
NK043(pi)001:12802: dam pa snga ma gsum ni khyod la 'bul //
NK043(pi)001:12803: dam pa bzhi pa gzhan zhig bslang du gsol //
NK043(pi)001:12804: bdag ni mi sha mi za mi nus pas //
NK043(pi)001:12805: snga nas khyod nyid mkhyen par ma gyur tam //
NK043(pi)001:12807: khyod kyis dam pa sbyin par ga la nus zhes ngas ma smras sam /
NK043(pi)001:12808: khyod mi sha za ba la ma spangs na /
NK043(pi)001:12809: ji ltar bden par smra zhing srog chags mi gsod par byed /
NK043(pi)001:12810: de ltar na dam pa snga ma gsum yang ji ltar sbyin te /
NK043(pi)001:12811: khyod kyis srog btang nas dam pa bzhi sbyin zhes pa de ltar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12813: gang gi phyir na rgyal srid nyams //
NK043(pi)001:12814: nags tshal sdug bsngal bdag gis myong //
NK043(pi)001:12815: chos las nyams shing gtam ngan thob //
NK043(pi)001:12816: bdag gis de ni ji ltar btang //
NK043(pi)001:12818: gang phyir khyod ni chos dang srid //
NK043(pi)001:12819: bde dang grags pa nyams par 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12820: phongs par byed pa'i 'byung gnas de //
NK043(pi)001:12821: ji ltar btang ba mi rigs kyi //
NK043(pi)001:12823: khyod sngon rgyal srid la gnas pa las 'dir mi
NK043(pi)001:12824: sha za ba'i srin por byed pa'i sems kyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:12825: du mi 'gro bar chos dang srid la mi gnod
NK043(pi)001:12826: pa'i lam du 'jug par rigs zhes gdams pas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12827: bu rkang bkra des phyag byas shing slan chad mi
NK043(pi)001:12828: sha mi za bar khas blangs nas btson rnams kyang
NK043(pi)001:12829: 'bul lo // der rgyal bu zla ba de rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12830: rigs kyi bu btson pa rnams kyi drung du song
NK043(pi)001:12831: bas de rnams dga' zhing bdag cag thar ro snyam
NK043(pi)001:12832: du dga' ba la dbugs byin nas /
NK043(pi)001:12833: de dag la phyin chad rkang bkra la gnod mi byed pa'i mna' bgags shing /
NK043(pi)001:12835: rgyal bu rkang bkra yang rgyal bu lnga brgya po de dag gis bskyal te /
NK043(pi)001:12836: rgyal srid la bzhag nas chos dang ldan par rgyal
NK043(pi)001:12837: srid byed cing rgyal bu de dag gis kyang rim
NK043(pi)001:12838: gro byed la / rgyal bu gzhan rnams kyang so so'i rgyal srid la bkod do //
NK043(pi)001:12839: de yang rgyal bu zla ba ni bcom ldan 'das nyid yin la /
NK043(pi)001:12840: srin po rkang bkra ni phyis dge slong sor mo'i phreng ba can no //
NK043(pi)001:12841: de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams dang 'phrad na legs pa chen po 'byung ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:12842: dam pa rnams ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12843: thabs la mkhas pas rang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12844: dka' ba'i gnas chen po yang bzod cing nyams nga
NK043(pi)001:12845: bar gyur kyang chos lam las mi ldog pa dang
NK043(pi)001:12846: / chos la brten nas rang dang gzhan gyi don
NK043(pi)001:12847: rgya chen po 'grub pa'ii tshul rnams la bsams te
NK043(pi)001:12848: chos kyi yon tan la gus par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:12849: yang sngon b+aa r+aa na s+air rgyal po tshangs sbyin
NK043(pi)001:12850: zhes bya bas rgyal srid byed cing yul thams cad
NK043(pi)001:12852: de'i tshe mdun na 'don bram ze de'i bu ljang
NK043(pi)001:12853: gu zhes bya ba'i rigs pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi
NK043(pi)001:12855: dad pa dang dge ba'i bsam pa can /
NK043(pi)001:12856: bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa /
NK043(pi)001:12857: snying rje can pha ma la sri zhu byed pa
NK043(pi)001:12858: zhig tu bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpa'i
NK043(pi)001:12859: tshe gyur to // bram ze ljang gu'i pha ma
NK043(pi)001:12860: rgas nas mig nyams te mdongs la thug pa na
NK043(pi)001:12861: tshe gyur to // / pha ma de gnyis kyis
NK043(pi)001:12862: rgyal po tshangs sbyin la gzhon nu ljang gu 'di
NK043(pi)001:12863: mdun na 'don du dbang bskur du gsol /
NK043(pi)001:12864: bdag cag dka' thub kyi nags su mchi lags so //
NK043(pi)001:12865: rgyal pos ljang gu la mdun na 'don gyis shig ces smras kyang /
NK043(pi)001:12866: ljang gu na re bdag ni mdun na 'don mi 'tshal gyis /
NK043(pi)001:12867: rgas shing nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:12868: kyi rim gro 'tshal ba lags so zhes zhus te
NK043(pi)001:12869: / mdun na 'don dang khyim gyi gnas mchil ma'i
NK043(pi)001:12870: thal ba bzhin du spangs shing pha ma'i grogs su
NK043(pi)001:12872: de nangs par langs nas pha ma la so shing dang chu gtsang mas bsnyen bkur byed de /
NK043(pi)001:12873: de'i rjes su me'i sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin byas
NK043(pi)001:12874: nas phyis 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i phyir nags khrod
NK043(pi)001:12875: du zhugs te / 'bras bu dang rtsa ba dang chu bsil ba khyer nas 'ong ba /
NK043(pi)001:12876: pha ma la byin nas de'i 'og tu phyogs gcig
NK043(pi)001:12877: tu bsam gtan la brtson par byed pa de lta
NK043(pi)001:12879: de nyi ma gzhan zhig la nangs par langs te /
NK043(pi)001:12880: pha ma'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas rmi lam du mthong ba smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12881: bdag gi g.yar lam na sbrul nag pos rang gi lus zos pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12882: zhags pa nag pos bcings nas lho phyogs su 'khrid pa rmis te /
NK043(pi)001:12883: g.yar lam 'jigs byed mthong ba dag gis snying la dogs pa skyes te /
NK043(pi)001:12884: bdag bla ma dang bral ba mi bzad par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam bgyid ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12885: ji tsam na pha ma de gnyis kyis dbugs dbyung zhing /
NK043(pi)001:12886: nyi ma la kha bltas te 'dug nas bden pas
NK043(pi)001:12887: gsol ba btab la ril ba khyer nas chu len
NK043(pi)001:12888: du song ngo // der rgyal po tshangs sbyin ri
NK043(pi)001:12889: dwags gshor du chas te dka' thub kyi nags der
NK043(pi)001:12890: du song ngo // zhugs pa dang / rgyal po de sgra grag sar 'phog pa zhig yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:12891: des gzugs ma mthong yang ri dwags kyi sgra lta
NK043(pi)001:12892: bu zhig thos pas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste
NK043(pi)001:12893: 'phangs pas ljang gu'i snying gar phog par gyur to
NK043(pi)001:12894: // de mdas gnad du phog pas sa la 'gyel
NK043(pi)001:12895: kyang der bdag gi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad de
NK043(pi)001:12896: pha ma kho na'i phyir sems bzhin mya ngan byed
NK043(pi)001:12897: // cing smras pa / mda' gcig bsnun pas bdag dang ni //
NK043(pi)001:12898: dbang po nyams par gyur pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:12899: pha dang de bzhin ma dag dang //
NK043(pi)001:12900: bdag cag skye bo gsum bsad do //
NK043(pi)001:12901: de rgyal pos thos nas dris pa //
NK043(pi)001:12902: ji ltar mda' gcig gis skye bo gsum bsad /
NK043(pi)001:12903: de nas ljang gu snying rje rje skad du ngus nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12904: bdag bas ches ni nyam thag pa'i //
NK043(pi)001:12905: pha ma yang ni ldong bar gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12906: bdag kyang mda' yis bsnun pas na //
NK043(pi)001:12908: de nas rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12909: bram ze'i khye'u ngas nyes pa byas te /
NK043(pi)001:12911: nga la dmod pa 'dor du ma gzhug par pha ma la gsol ba bya bar rigs so //
NK043(pi)001:12912: de nas ljang gus gus pa dang bcas pas rgyal po dbugs 'byin par byed do //
NK043(pi)001:12913: rgyal po chen po bdag dang nye bar mchis pa
NK043(pi)001:12914: rnams la dbang zhig mchis na snying rje can dang
NK043(pi)001:12915: / skye bo la byams pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12916: 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba lags pas dmod pas ma bsnyengs shig /
NK043(pi)001:12918: bdag gi pha bla ma gang na bar ril ba 'di snoms mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:12919: de dag gi ni rkang pa bkru ba tha ma 'di lags so //
NK043(pi)001:12920: bdag gi tshig gis de'i rkang pa la phyag mdzod la /
NK043(pi)001:12921: 'di skad ring por mi thogs par 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs shig /
NK043(pi)001:12922: de nas rgyal po rang kho nas ril ba de khyer te nags khrod du chas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12923: de'i tshe phyogs bzhir mi ma yin pa che thang du 'khrugs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12924: de nas long ba de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12925: ljang gu 'di ni mtsho'i 'gram du ring mo zhig lon no //
NK043(pi)001:12927: da lta kho bo'i ljang gu de //
NK043(pi)001:12929: ngang pa sgra skad 'byin pa na //
NK043(pi)001:12930: ri dwags lhan cig rtse bar byed //
NK043(pi)001:12931: de nas rgyal po drung du phyin pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:12932: de'i rdog sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12933: snying du sdug cing mthong dga' ba /
NK043(pi)001:12934: ljang ku ci ste nang du 'jug /
NK043(pi)001:12935: pha ma nyam chung bkres pa yis //
NK043(pi)001:12936: nyam thag pa la ci zhig gtso rgyal po de
NK043(pi)001:12937: yid mi dga' nas snying rje rje skad du smras
NK043(pi)001:12938: pa / kho bo ni ljang gu ma yin gyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:12943: ljang ku chab dang 'bras bu thogs nas de'u de mchi'o //
NK043(pi)001:12944: mi dbang ljang ku zhes bya ba //
NK043(pi)001:12945: yon tan rnam ldan rang bzhin byams //
NK043(pi)001:12946: de yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'dir //
NK043(pi)001:12947: ri dwags dang ni bya rnams gnas //
NK043(pi)001:12948: de nas rgyal pos drang srong gi rkang pa gnyis
NK043(pi)001:12949: la gtugs nas mchi ma zag cing skad 'dar pos
NK043(pi)001:12950: smras pa / ljang ku ni nags tshal 'di'i nang
NK043(pi)001:12951: du snying la mda' phog te srog gi lhag ma
NK043(pi)001:12952: cung zad cig lus shing 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:12953: ril ba chus bkang ba 'di des bskur te /
NK043(pi)001:12954: 'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa'i khrus tha ma mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:12955: de gnyis kyis thos nas sa la 'gyel te brgyal lo //
NK043(pi)001:12956: rgyal pos chus gtor nas bslangs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12957: de gnyis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa /
NK043(pi)001:12958: rgyal po chen po de gum pas bdag cag kyang 'gum du zad do //
NK043(pi)001:12959: de lta mod kyi phyogs gang na mchis par der bdag cag khrid cig dang /
NK043(pi)001:12960: bu de ma gum pa la lag pas reg par bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:12961: de nas rgyal pos khyo shug gnyis khrid nas phyogs der phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12962: de yang srog gi lhag ma cung zhig lus /
NK043(pi)001:12963: de'i pha mas ljang gu'i lus la byugs nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12964: sdug pa 'di ni su yis bsgyel //
NK043(pi)001:12965: ljon shing dam pa su yis bcad //
NK043(pi)001:12966: de nas rgyal pos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:12967: kho bo sdig pa'i las kyis su //
NK043(pi)001:12968: nags tshal nang nas rgyu ba na //
NK043(pi)001:12969: khyed cag gi ni bu gcig pa //
NK043(pi)001:12970: 'di ni mda' yis bsnun par gyur //
NK043(pi)001:12971: de nas pha ma snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing bden pas gsol bar byas pa /
NK043(pi)001:12972: bu khyod kyis ni pha ma la /
NK043(pi)001:12973: bsnyen bkur lha la me yi ni /
NK043(pi)001:12974: sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang //
NK043(pi)001:12975: des ni dug kyang zhi bar shog /
NK043(pi)001:12976: de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i gnas g.yos par
NK043(pi)001:12977: gyur nas 'di rgyu ci las gyur ces brtags pa
NK043(pi)001:12978: na / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK043(pi)001:12979: gnad du mda' phog ste dug gis rlangs pas sdug
NK043(pi)001:12980: bsngal bar gyur pa mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:12981: rang gi gnas nas bab ste bdud rtsi btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:12982: pha ma'i bden tshig dang lha'i dbang po'i mthus zug rngu rnams phyung bar gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:12983: rma yang sos dug gi shugs de yang zhi nas
NK043(pi)001:12984: ljang gu sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar te
NK043(pi)001:12985: yun ring por pha ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas
NK043(pi)001:12986: so // de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad par gyur
NK043(pi)001:12987: kyang pha rol la khro ba med pa'i byams pa'i
NK043(pi)001:12988: sems brtan pa nyid du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:12989: yang sngon gyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dom zhig
NK043(pi)001:12990: tu skye ba bzhes nas ri'i phug tu gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:12991: na / yul de'i mi dbul po zhig shing khur len pa'i phyir nags su zhugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:12992: dus min pa'i char rlung drag pos gtses te /
NK043(pi)001:12993: sa thams cad gsher bar gyur pa'i ri phug tu
NK043(pi)001:12994: zhugs pas dom mthong ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang
NK043(pi)001:12995: / dom des dbugs phyungs nas drod la bcar zhing rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshim par byas /
NK043(pi)001:12996: yul ngan yang zhag bdun gyi bar du byung ba
NK043(pi)001:12997: las bskyabs nas zhag brgyad par char chad pa dang
NK043(pi)001:12998: rtsa 'bras tshim par bstabs te slar btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:12999: mi des kho bos khyod la lan ci zhig glan /
NK043(pi)001:13001: kho bo su la yang ma bstan na de nyid lan glan pa yin no //
NK043(pi)001:13002: des kyang de bzhin bya zhes smras te phyag byas nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13003: de'i khyim mi sogs kyis dus min gyi char drag
NK043(pi)001:13004: po des bya dang ri dwags sogs kyang du ma
NK043(pi)001:13005: shi na mi de shi'am snyam yang ji ltar ma
NK043(pi)001:13007: des ji ltar gyur pa bshad do //
NK043(pi)001:13008: mi de dag gis dom de gang na yod pa'i phug ston cig ces pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13011: de rnams kyis de la dom bsad pa'i sha'i skal ba sum gnyis sbyin par chad byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:13012: mi des dom gnas pa'i phug bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:13013: phug der me btang bas dom de 'tshubs cing sdug
NK043(pi)001:13014: bsngal bzhin 'gyod pa dang khro ba med par las
NK043(pi)001:13015: kyi mthu rjes su bsam bzhin shi'o //
NK043(pi)001:13016: de'i sha'i skal ba sum gnyis mi byas pa mi bzo ba de la byin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13017: blang bar gzas pa'i mod la lag pa gnyis sa la lhung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13018: de nas rngon pa gzhan dag kyang rang gi skal ba bor nas dong bas /
NK043(pi)001:13019: der ya mtshan pa'i mi dang /
NK043(pi)001:13020: rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba yang der song ste /
NK043(pi)001:13021: dom gyi pags pa blangs nas gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa'i dge 'dun rnams la smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13022: de na gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig yod pas
NK043(pi)001:13023: 'di ni dom ma yin te bskal ba bzang po'i
NK043(pi)001:13024: byang chub sems dpa' yin pas mchod par 'os so
NK043(pi)001:13025: zhes smras pas / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas
NK043(pi)001:13026: dri'i shing spungs te dom de'i phung po bsregs nas
NK043(pi)001:13027: phyogs de nyid du mchod rten byas pa gdugs sogs
NK043(pi)001:13028: kyis brgyan cing dus mchod byas pas /
NK043(pi)001:13029: de la bya ba byas pa thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13030: yang mi dbul po shing 'tshong zhig nags su shing thur phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13031: nags tshal chen po de na byang chub sems dpa' dom du skye ba bzhes pa nyid gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:13032: mi de stag gis gtses nas stes dbang gis ngom
NK043(pi)001:13033: gnas pa'i shing de la 'dzegs pa na ngom mthong
NK043(pi)001:13034: nas lhag par skrag kyang dom des mi de pang
NK043(pi)001:13035: du blangs nas byams par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13036: stag de kha zas la chags nas dom la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13037: kye bdag nyid chen po mi mgo nag 'di rnams
NK043(pi)001:13038: ni byas pa mi gzo bas 'dir bor cig dang
NK043(pi)001:13040: mi gzhan phal che ba dag kyang skyabs su 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:13041: pa la byams na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smos
NK043(pi)001:13042: kyang ci dgos pas dom des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13043: 'di bdag la skyabs su 'ongs pas bdag gis mi 'dor ro //
NK043(pi)001:13044: stag de sha khrag la chags pas de nyid du 'dug gis yun ring du ma song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13046: kho bo ngal gyi re zhig khyod mel tse la 'dug shig dang /
NK043(pi)001:13047: kho bo ngal gso bar bya'o zhes ngal zhing dub pas gnyid log go //
NK043(pi)001:13048: stag gis mi de la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13049: mi khyod ji srid cig tu 'dir 'dug /
NK043(pi)001:13050: 'o na dom mar bor cig dang zos la 'agro'o //
NK043(pi)001:13051: de nas khyod ci bder songs shig /
NK043(pi)001:13052: snying rje med pa des bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:13053: bdag ji srid 'dir 'dug pa las 'di dor ba
NK043(pi)001:13054: legs snyam du dom de shing kha nas bor ba
NK043(pi)001:13056: kye min tshig des kyee ci sems ngan bsten grogs zhes smras bzhin ltung nas stag gis bsad do //
NK043(pi)001:13057: mi des de thos nas 'dis bdag la ci zhig
NK043(pi)001:13058: bgo bsha' 'dod de 'di skad smras so snyam ngu
NK043(pi)001:13059: de chags pas bla bar gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:13060: sems 'khrugs shing smyos nas thams cad du 'khyams bzhin kye min sogs gong ltar kha nas 'don to //
NK043(pi)001:13061: de gnyen rnams kyis khrid na yang de bzhin du smra zhing /
NK043(pi)001:13062: de rnams kyis 'byung po'i dpyad bya ba'i sngags 'dzin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13063: dge slong dang bram ze dang mdza' bshes rnams la dris na /
NK043(pi)001:13064: de rnams rnam pa sna tshogs su smra zhing dpyad byar ma shes so //
NK043(pi)001:13065: de'i tshe b+aa r+aa na s+ai dang ha cang mi ring ba'i nags zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:13066: drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan zhig gnas pa'i drung
NK043(pi)001:13067: du mi de gnyen rnams kyis khrid de song nas
NK043(pi)001:13068: ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13070: sems can 'di ni sdig pa byed pa ste rang
NK043(pi)001:13071: bzhin ngan pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dogs
NK043(pi)001:13072: pa stag gi mdun du bor te bdag nyid chen
NK043(pi)001:13073: po des ni 'di la chos bshad par bya'o snyam
NK043(pi)001:13074: du bsams na / 'dis de stag la bor ba
NK043(pi)001:13075: na mya myo khyer te tshigs su bcad pa bcu
NK043(pi)001:13076: las yi ge re re dran pa ni /
NK043(pi)001:13077: kye min sogs gong ltar de yin no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13078: drang srong de'i slob ma zhig gis mkhan po tshigs
NK043(pi)001:13079: su bcad pa de rnams ji lta bu lags pa
NK043(pi)001:13080: gsungs shig / drang srong gis smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13082: chos ma min pa mi bzod do //
NK043(pi)001:13083: tshogs par mi dbyung mi rnams la //
NK043(pi)001:13084: grogs po gsod par byed pa yod //
NK043(pi)001:13085: grogs gsod gnas skabs gang du yang //
NK043(pi)001:13086: bde bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //
NK043(pi)001:13087: stan la ma yin lam du mina //
NK043(pi)001:13089: de ltar snying ni rje rje skad //
NK043(pi)001:13090: 'di la tshiga tu smras pa gang //
NK043(pi)001:13091: des ni sems can blo ngan po //
NK043(pi)001:13092: ji ltar khan da 'bar bzhin bsreg /
NK043(pi)001:13093: shin tu mi bzad las byas pa //
NK043(pi)001:13094: desa khyod 'jig rten pha rol du //
NK043(pi)001:13095: sdug bsngal reg pa'i tshor ba ni //
NK043(pi)001:13096: sim pa ma yin myong bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:13097: tha shal bas kyang tha shal khyod //
NK043(pi)001:13098: ngu 'bod shin tu mi bzad par //
NK043(pi)001:13099: kyi hud kyi hud ces sgrogs pa'i //
NK043(pi)001:13100: sdug bsngal ngan pa chen po 'thob //
NK043(pi)001:13101: mi dge'i las can gtum de la //
NK043(pi)001:13102: de yis ci zhig byas gyur na //
NK043(pi)001:13103: tshogs par mi dbyung mi rnams las //
NK043(pi)001:13104: grogs po gsod par byed pa yod //
NK043(pi)001:13105: chos 'jig byed pa mi bzod pa'i //
NK043(pi)001:13106: semas ni sdig pa yin par shes //
NK043(pi)001:13107: khyod kyis dom la sdig pa dang //
NK043(pi)001:13108: stag la gang byas dran par gyis //
NK043(pi)001:13109: blo ngana khyod kyis ji lta bur //
NK043(pi)001:13110: grogs la bya ba mi shes te //
NK043(pi)001:13111: gsod par byed pas gsod 'thob la //
NK043(pi)001:13113: stag gi 'jigs chen byung ba na //
NK043(pi)001:13114: khyod ni yun ring basten byas shing //
NK043(pi)001:13115: nyal ba na yang khyod bsrungs na //
NK043(pi)001:13116: khyod kyis de ni ma bsrungs so //
NK043(pi)001:13117: grogsa mkhu kha na ma tho cher //
NK043(pi)001:13118: chos smra ba rnams rjod byed do //
NK043(pi)001:13119: blo ngan lus ni zhig gyur nas //
NK043(pi)001:13120: dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur //
NK043(pi)001:13122: dom de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid dang /
NK043(pi)001:13123: mi de ni lhas byin nyid yin no zhes gsungs te /
NK043(pi)001:13124: byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gror skyes pa 'chi ba'i
NK043(pi)001:13125: nyam nga ba thob pa'i skabs na yang chos bstan
NK043(pi)001:13126: pa'i rnam 'phrul 'di lta bu sems can rnams la
NK043(pi)001:13127: lam dang lam min gsal byed du 'gyur ba yin
NK043(pi)001:13128: na / sangs rgyas nas chos ston pa ni lta ci smros te /
NK043(pi)001:13129: de ltar yon tan shes nas gus par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:13130: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi ring la /
NK043(pi)001:13131: mi zhig nags su shing thur song ba seng ges bdas nas sul khung du lhung la /
NK043(pi)001:13132: seng ges kyang de bsnyegs pas khung der lhung zhing /
