NK043(pi)001:13133: yang sbrul gyis skrag nas byi ba zhig bros pa
NK043(pi)001:13134: de bza' ba'i phyir khras ded pa de thams cad
NK043(pi)001:13135: las kyi dbang gis khung der mnyam du lhung ba
NK043(pi)001:13136: na / de dag gcig gis gcig la gnod sems kyis bsad par 'dod pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:13138: khyod thams cad kho bos thub pa yin mod /
NK043(pi)001:13139: bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thos pas 'di
NK043(pi)001:13140: ni gcig la gcig gnod pa'i dus ma yin pas
NK043(pi)001:13141: 'khod cig / der stes dbang gis rngon par gyur pa zhig gis phyogs de dag tu phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:13142: sul khung der bltas pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13143: de rnams kyis rtab pa'i tshig gis skyabs mdzod ces smras pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13144: rngon pa des thog mar seng ge bton pas rngon pa de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13145: bdag ni khyod kyi drin gzo bar bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:13146: 'on kyang 'di na mi mgo nag po gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:13147: 'di ni byas pa chud gson pa yin pas ma
NK043(pi)001:13148: dbyungs shig ces smras nas song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13149: ji tsam na rngon pa des de thams cad rim gyis phyung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13150: dus gzhan seng ges ri dwags bsad pa dang rngon
NK043(pi)001:13151: pa de ngo shes nas ri dwags kyi ro de
NK043(pi)001:13152: byin no // rgyal po tshangs sbyin btsun mo dang
NK043(pi)001:13153: lhan cig skyed tshal du song nas rgyal po gnyid
NK043(pi)001:13155: btsun mo rnams rgyan bkrol te bag yangs su gnas pa las /
NK043(pi)001:13156: khras rgyan rnams blangs nas khyer te drin gzo ba'i phyir rngon pa la byin no //
NK043(pi)001:13157: btsun mo rnams rgyan stor nas rgyal po la gsol pas /
NK043(pi)001:13158: des blon po rnams la rgyan sus khyer rtsad chod ces byas pa ltar dri zhing rmed pas /
NK043(pi)001:13159: sngar gyi mi de rngon pa de'i rtsar ngo shes
NK043(pi)001:13160: shing rgyu bas der yod par shes nas rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13161: la bsnyad do // rgyal pos rngon pa bkug ste
NK043(pi)001:13162: rgyan rnams brkus so zhes byas ba la rngon pa
NK043(pi)001:13163: des ji ltar gyur pa smras nas rgyan rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13164: la phul kyang mi de bcings nas btson rar bzhag
NK043(pi)001:13165: la bsnyad do // go // byi bas de mthong nas sbrul la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13166: mgo nag sdig byed des bdag cag la phan pa'i
NK043(pi)001:13167: grogs po bcings nas btson du bzhag go zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:13168: so // sbrul des rngon pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13169: kye de ring bdag gis rgyal po 'dzin par bya yi /
NK043(pi)001:13170: khyod kyis sngags kyi tshigs 'di dang sman 'di dag
NK043(pi)001:13171: gis gsos shig ces byas nas rgyal po bzung ngo
NK043(pi)001:13172: // rngon pa des sngags dang sman gyis gsos pas
NK043(pi)001:13173: rgyal po mgu zhing btson nas btang ste longs spyod
NK043(pi)001:13174: dag gi bgo bsha' yang byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13175: de ltar dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la yang byas pa gzo ba yod na /
NK043(pi)001:13176: mi phal cher byas pa mi gzo ba ni shin tu smad pa yin par shes par bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:13177: sngon bcom ldan 'das rngon par gyur pa de'i tshe
NK043(pi)001:13178: byas pa mi gzo ba'i mi de ni lhas byin
NK043(pi)001:13179: yin cing / da ltar sangs rgyas pa'i tshe yang
NK043(pi)001:13180: byas pa mi gzo zhing gnod par byed mod kyis
NK043(pi)001:13181: yin cing / / bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sras
NK043(pi)001:13182: sgra gcan zin dang kun tu mtshungs pa'i thugs byams
NK043(pi)001:13184: yang byi ba gang g+aa'i byin zhes pa dang sbrul
NK043(pi)001:13185: dang ni'u le'i lo rgyus kyang 'dul ba las 'byung
NK043(pi)001:13186: ngo // yang sngon gyi tshe me tog mkhan zhig
NK043(pi)001:13187: gis me tog gi ra ba chu'i pha rol na
NK043(pi)001:13188: yod pas nyin bzhin chu brgal te me tog 'thu
NK043(pi)001:13189: ngo // ba'i tshe / dus zhig na a mra'i
NK043(pi)001:13190: 'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig rnyed pa sgo ba
NK043(pi)001:13193: rgyal pos btsun mo la byin no //
NK043(pi)001:13194: btsun mos kyang myangs pas de'i ro la zhen nas /
NK043(pi)001:13195: rgyal po la 'di 'dra ba gzhan yang stsal bar rigs zhes gsol ba byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13196: rgyal pos gsol ka pa la 'bras bu de gang las 'ong /
NK043(pi)001:13197: zhes sogs rim pas rtsad bcad de /
NK043(pi)001:13198: me tog mkhan de la rgyal pos dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13199: ji ltar gyur pa gsol bas song la 'di 'dra ba gzhan yang khyer shog ces bsgos pas /
NK043(pi)001:13200: rgyal po'i bka' lci ba ldog tu med pas /
NK043(pi)001:13201: des de btsal bar brtsam ste rgyags khyer nas song
NK043(pi)001:13202: bas ri'i phyogs gcig na a mra'i shing spre'u las
NK043(pi)001:13203: mi thar ba zhig mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:13204: der a mra'i 'bras bu 'dod nas zhag mang du lon te rgyags zad pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13205: des bdag 'di bzhin bsdad na 'chir cha bas ci
NK043(pi)001:13206: byung yang rdo rnams la 'jus te 'dzegs par bya'o
NK043(pi)001:13207: snyam du de ltar byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13208: a mra'i 'bras bu ma thob par g.yang du lhung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13209: ri de la bcom ldan 'das nyid spre'u'i dpon po
NK043(pi)001:13210: byang chub sems dpar gyur pa phyogs der phyin pa
NK043(pi)001:13211: des mthong nas mi de dbyung ba'i phyir dang por
NK043(pi)001:13212: rdo la shed goms par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:13213: mi de dang mnyam pa 'degs nus pa na bdag
NK043(pi)001:13214: gis mi 'di dbyung nus so snyam du bsams nas
NK043(pi)001:13215: mi de g.yang las phyungs pas shin tu dub par
NK043(pi)001:13216: gyur kyang / des mi'i skad du mi de la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13217: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pas spre'u'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13218: des mi 'di a mra'i 'bras bu'i phyir nyam nga
NK043(pi)001:13220: bdag gis 'di la 'bras bu de sbyin par bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:13221: lus dub bzhin shing de las a mra'i 'bras bu klag nas /
NK043(pi)001:13222: mi de la ci 'dod za bcug cing thu ba gang bkang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13223: byang chub sems dpa' ni lus can thams cad la bag phab par gnas pa yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:13224: mi de'i drung du bab ste kho bo dub pas
NK043(pi)001:13225: yud tsam zhig nyal gyis re zhig phyogs su byar
NK043(pi)001:13226: gyis zhes smras nas gnyid log pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13227: mi des bsams pa bdag rgyags dang bral bas a
NK043(pi)001:13228: mra rnams zos na rgyal po la ci zhig dbul
NK043(pi)001:13229: / de bas spre'u 'di bsad la sha skam du byas te lam du 'jug go snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:13230: snying rje med pa 'jig rten pha rol la mi
NK043(pi)001:13231: lta ba des rdo ba chen pos bsad pa na
NK043(pi)001:13233: phan 'dogs pa yi mtshan nyid dang //
NK043(pi)001:13234: de bzhin drin gzo grogs por brjod //
NK043(pi)001:13235: mi rnams la yang kha cig ni //
NK043(pi)001:13236: phan pa byas pa mi shes so //
NK043(pi)001:13238: de ltar lhas byin nyid sngon gyi tshe me tog
NK043(pi)001:13239: mkhan du skyes pas spre'u rgyal po la byas pa
NK043(pi)001:13240: mi gzo ba byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13241: sangs rgyas pa'i dus su yang byas pa mi gzo
NK043(pi)001:13242: zhing byas pa mi tshor ba yin kyang bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:13243: 'das nyid ni sngon gyi dus su yang de la
NK043(pi)001:13244: bu gcig pa ltar byams par mdzad na da lta
NK043(pi)001:13245: sangs rgyas pa'i dus su smos ci dgos zhes gsungs
NK043(pi)001:13246: so // yang sngon nags tshal chen po g.yang sa can zhig tu spre'ura gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK043(pi)001:13247: mi zhig bstor nas phyogs der dong ba shing tin
NK043(pi)001:13248: du'i 'bras bu bza' ba'i phyir shing la 'dzegs pa
NK043(pi)001:13249: shin tu thar bar dka' ba'i gcong rong chen por
NK043(pi)001:13250: lhung nas thar du med pa'i mya ngan gyis non
NK043(pi)001:13251: pa'i tshe spre'u des shing thog bskyal zhing rdo la
NK043(pi)001:13252: shed goms par byas te mi de g.yang sa de
NK043(pi)001:13253: las bton nas ngal bas rdo leb zhig gi steng
NK043(pi)001:13255: mi blun po des mel rtse byed par khas blangs
NK043(pi)001:13256: nas gnas pa'i tshe bdag dgon pa las thar ba'i
NK043(pi)001:13257: lam rgyags su spre'u 'di stobs che bas gal te
NK043(pi)001:13258: sad na mi sod kyi gnyid ma sad pa'i bar
NK043(pi)001:13259: du gsod snyam du rdo chen po zhig spre'u'i mgo
NK043(pi)001:13261: rdo'i zur mgo la phog pa tsam las thams cad
NK043(pi)001:13262: du ma phog nas mgo la rma byung bzhin mchongs
NK043(pi)001:13264: mi de nongs bzhin skrag nas 'dug pa las gzhan ma mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:13265: 'di nyid kyis byas so snyam du bdag snad pa'i sdug bsngal la mi sems par /
NK043(pi)001:13266: 'di ltar phan pa la mi lta bar mi bzad
NK043(pi)001:13267: pa'i las byed pa'o snyam du de la snying rje
NK043(pi)001:13268: chen pos mig mchi mas gang bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:13269: khyod mir gyur ba 'di 'dra'i las byed pa kye ma /
NK043(pi)001:13270: bdag la gnod byed gzhan yod na khyod kyis bzlog rigs mod /
NK043(pi)001:13271: 'di ltar tshe 'di dang phyi ma brlag par byed pas don ci zhig grub /
NK043(pi)001:13272: da khyod nags 'di las grong 'dab du ma phyin
NK043(pi)001:13273: par chud za bas ngas khyod bskyal bar bya zhes
NK043(pi)001:13274: byas nas grong 'dab tu bskyal zhing lam bstan te
NK043(pi)001:13275: sdig pa'i las spong bar gyis zhes gdams nas song
NK043(pi)001:13276: ngo // mi de las mi bzad pa'i rnam par smin pas mdzes zin nas /
NK043(pi)001:13277: gzugs sha za ltar gyur pas gang du song yang bskrang pas nags 'dab zhig tu gnas pa /
NK043(pi)001:13278: rgyal po ri dwags gshor ba zhig gis mthong nas dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13279: byams pa la snying ring byas pa'i las kyi tshul las gyur pa brjod par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13280: yang sngon gyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bya shing rta mo zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13281: phyogs der ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge zhig
NK043(pi)001:13282: sha zos pa'i rus pa kha'i nang du zug pas
NK043(pi)001:13284: bya shing rta mo des dris nas /
NK043(pi)001:13285: de'i kha'i rus pa mthong bas seng ge de gnyid log pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13286: de'i khar zhugs te rus pa phyungs nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13287: khyod ni ri dwags kyi rgyal po ste /
NK043(pi)001:13288: phan gdags par nus pas bdag la dus su phan par byos shig /
NK043(pi)001:13289: des kyang de bzhin bya'o zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13290: ji zhig na bya shing rta mo de bya khra
NK043(pi)001:13291: zhig gis zin te de'u shi ba las thar te
NK043(pi)001:13292: bkres pa dang / seng ge de sha za ba'i
NK043(pi)001:13293: drung du bdag bkres kyi sha cung zad byin cig
NK043(pi)001:13294: bkres pa dang / / des smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13295: kho bo gtum po'i mche ba'i bar du khyod 'ong ba gson pa drin mi che'am /
NK043(pi)001:13296: bya shing rta mos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13297: rgya mtshor lhung ba phyung ba ste //
NK043(pi)001:13298: rmi lam bsam pa don med yin //
NK043(pi)001:13299: phong na bsten pa gang yin dang //
NK043(pi)001:13300: byas mi gzo la byas don med //
NK043(pi)001:13302: khro ba dang 'khrugs pa med par gnas par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13303: seng ge ni lhas byin no //
NK043(pi)001:13304: yang sngon gyi dus su rgyal bu bzhi rang rang
NK043(pi)001:13305: gi btsun mo blangs te gnas pa de dag gis
NK043(pi)001:13306: rgyal po la brnyas thabs byas pas de bzhi ka
NK043(pi)001:13307: rgyal pos spyugs te rang rang gi chung ma khrid
NK043(pi)001:13309: ji tsam na dgon pa'i lam du phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:13310: rgyags chad pa na de rnams nang khrims bcas te
NK043(pi)001:13311: chung ma re re bsad la de'i sha khrag gis
NK043(pi)001:13312: dgon pa'i lam nas brgal bar bya zhes smras so
NK043(pi)001:13313: // de'i nang gi rgyal bus ga zhes bya bas
NK043(pi)001:13314: gzhan gyi srog gcod pa las rang gi srog chud
NK043(pi)001:13315: // zos pa bla'i / chung ma khrid de 'bros
NK043(pi)001:13316: par bya'o snyam du bros te song ba dang lam
NK043(pi)001:13317: du bza' btung dang bral bas chung ma des bdag
NK043(pi)001:13319: rgyal bus bsams pa bdag gis 'di srog bskyabs nas
NK043(pi)001:13320: shi bar mi bya'o snyam du rang gi barla'i sha
NK043(pi)001:13322: lag pa'i rtsa bcad pa'i khrag 'thung du bcug ste
NK043(pi)001:13323: rim gyis re zhig gi drung du phyin nas der
NK043(pi)001:13325: ri de'i drung na 'bab chu zhig yod pa der
NK043(pi)001:13326: mi zhig dgras rkang lag gtubs te chur bor ba
NK043(pi)001:13327: des nyam thag pa'i nga ro'i skad 'byin pa rgyal
NK043(pi)001:13328: bus thos nas snying rjes bltas pas mi de mthong
NK043(pi)001:13329: nas chu las bsgral te gtam dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13330: des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad do //
NK043(pi)001:13331: mi de rtsa ba dang 'bras bus tshims par byas
NK043(pi)001:13332: nas chung ma la gtad cing de'i rim gro byas
NK043(pi)001:13333: pas mi de sos par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13334: de de dang shin tu gcugs pas gtam sna tshogs smra zhing 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:13335: byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod pas
NK043(pi)001:13336: gdung bar mi byed par res 'ga' tsam las 'khrig
NK043(pi)001:13337: pa rgyun du mi bsten cing /
NK043(pi)001:13338: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus phyogs de'i rtsa 'bras rnams
NK043(pi)001:13339: rgyas shing bcud dang ldan pas de dag lus brtas
NK043(pi)001:13341: chung ma des mi rkang lag rdum pa de bsgugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13343: khyod kyi khyo bos kho bo shi ba lta bu las gsos pas /
NK043(pi)001:13344: da 'di 'dra byas pa tshor na srog dang bral ba'i nyen yod do //
NK043(pi)001:13345: zhes smras nas nyan du ma gtubs kyang /
NK043(pi)001:13346: des de yang nas yang du bsgugs pa nyon mongs
NK043(pi)001:13347: pa thul dka' nas de dang lhan cig nyal lo
NK043(pi)001:13348: // de nas ches chags par gyur nas mngags kyang rang gi khyo'i drung du mi 'gro ba na /
NK043(pi)001:13350: sha 'khon rnams kyi nang na tha chad ni bud med kyi sha 'khon yin pas /
NK043(pi)001:13351: 'di 'di ltar chags shing bdag dang lhan cig nyal
NK043(pi)001:13352: bar shes na gdon mi 'tshal bar gnod par 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:13354: chung ma des smras pa 'di bden gyis thabs shig bya'o snyam ste /
NK043(pi)001:13355: mgo gos kyis dkris nas ri brag zhig na nyal ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:13356: sa gas r+ts+wa 'bras khyer nas 'ongs te dris pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13358: des ci phan zhes dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13359: ri'i bya skyibs na rdo dreg zhig 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13360: sngar klad pa na ba'i tshe sman pas rdo dreg bstan te sos so zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13361: sa gas rdo dreg btsal lo zhes smras te /
NK043(pi)001:13362: bud med des g.yo thabs kyis dpyang thag bzung nas
NK043(pi)001:13363: sa ga rdo dreg gi steng du btang ba'i rjes
NK043(pi)001:13364: su dpyang thag btang ste chu la bor bar byas
NK043(pi)001:13365: so // de chus khyer nas rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu phyin pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13366: yul de'i rgyal po bu med par shi nas /
NK043(pi)001:13367: bsod nams kyi skal pa dang ldan pa zhig rgyal
NK043(pi)001:13368: srid la bzhag go zhes yul de'i blon po sogs
NK043(pi)001:13369: mi rnams kyis bram ze mtshan mkhan la 'tshol du
NK043(pi)001:13370: bcug pa dang / sa ga de phyogs zhig na
NK043(pi)001:13371: 'dug pa der rgyan gyis brgyan pa bzhin du mthong
NK043(pi)001:13372: bcug pa dang / nas / mtshan mkhan rnams kyis /
NK043(pi)001:13373: de skal ba dang ldan pa mthong ste blon po rnams la smras pas rgyal srid la bzhag go //
NK043(pi)001:13374: de'i tshe de la btsun mo blang ba'i phyir yul
NK043(pi)001:13375: de'i blon po rnams dang yul gzhan gyi rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13376: dang nor can rnams kyi bu mo rgyan thams cad
NK043(pi)001:13377: kyis klubs nas khrid de rgyal pos khab tu bzhes
NK043(pi)001:13378: par zhus kyang / rgyal po de bud med kyis
NK043(pi)001:13379: sun phyung ba yin pas khas ma blangs shing bud
NK043(pi)001:13381: gang gi tshe bud med byas pa chud gzon pa
NK043(pi)001:13382: des khyim thab ri la bor ba de tshe rtsa
NK043(pi)001:13383: ba dang 'bras bu rnams srab par gyur cing mthu
NK043(pi)001:13384: med par gyur nas mu ges nyen pas mi rkang
NK043(pi)001:13385: lag ma tshang ba de nyid khur du thogs te
NK043(pi)001:13386: lam srang thams cad du rgyu zhing /
NK043(pi)001:13388: bdag khyim thab las mi 'phyo ba'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:13389: gang du zhugs pa der slong mo 'thob pa de
NK043(pi)001:13390: rim gyis rgyal po de'i pho brang du phyin nas
NK043(pi)001:13391: / kha cig ngo mtshar skye zhing lta bar byed la /
NK043(pi)001:13392: bdag cag gi rgyal po 'dis bud med thams cad
NK043(pi)001:13393: la smod par byed kyang khyim thabs las mi 'phyo
NK043(pi)001:13394: ba'i bud med 'di 'dra yod pa ma mthong ba
NK043(pi)001:13395: lta zhes smras pa'i gtam de rim gyis rgyal pos
NK043(pi)001:13396: thos nas bud med de blta yis khug cig /
NK043(pi)001:13397: der 'ongs pa dang rgyal po 'dzum dmul te /
NK043(pi)001:13398: nga yi barla yi sha dag dang //
NK043(pi)001:13399: khrag kyang zos shing 'thung nas ni //
NK043(pi)001:13400: rngum po khur du thogs pa khyod //
NK043(pi)001:13402: rdo dreg dag gi ched du ni //
NK043(pi)001:13403: nga ni g.yang sar bor nas su //
NK043(pi)001:13404: rngum po khur du thogs pa khyod //
NK043(pi)001:13406: zhes gsungs pas bud med de ngo tsha bas gdong smad de 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:13407: blon po rnams kyis de rgyal po la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13408: ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:13409: bud med de la rlangs pa'i tshig gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bskrad do //
NK043(pi)001:13410: de skabs kyi rgyal bu gzhon nus ga ni bcom ldan 'das nyid yin la /
NK043(pi)001:13411: bud med de ni lhas sbyin yin par gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:13412: yang sngon rgya mtsho'i 'gram na shang shang te'u gnyis
NK043(pi)001:13413: lus gcig tu gyur pa zhig gnas te gcig gi
NK043(pi)001:13416: ji tsam na chos min gnyid log pa /
NK043(pi)001:13417: chos can mel tse byed pas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig rnyed pa na de blangs te bsam pa /
NK043(pi)001:13418: re zhig 'di bslang ngam 'on te za /
NK043(pi)001:13420: zos kyang lus po gcig kho na gso bar zad do snyams pas /
NK043(pi)001:13421: de gnyid las ma bslangs par zos so //
NK043(pi)001:13422: chos min sad pas chos can bdud rtsis 'bras bu'i
NK043(pi)001:13423: sgreg pa byung ba tshor nas 'di ci zhig gis
NK043(pi)001:13424: sgreg pa yin / chos can gyis bdud rtsis 'bras bu yin no //
NK043(pi)001:13426: des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pas /
NK043(pi)001:13428: khyod kyis mi legs pa byas te ngas kyang dus shes par bya'o zhes ji zhig na /
NK043(pi)001:13429: chos can gnyid du song ba'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:13430: chos min mel tshe byed pas dug gi 'bras bu
NK043(pi)001:13431: chus khyer ba mthong nas de zos pa dang brgyal
NK043(pi)001:13432: bar gyur to // chos min dug gis 'khrugs nas
NK043(pi)001:13433: gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang
NK043(pi)001:13434: der khyod gsod pa dang phyir rgol ba dang dgra
NK043(pi)001:13435: bor gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:13436: chos can gyis bdag gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs
NK043(pi)001:13437: de dag tu khyod la byams pa bsgrub par gyur
NK043(pi)001:13439: de ltar chos can ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK043(pi)001:13440: chos min ni lhas sbyin no //
NK043(pi)001:13441: ngang pa mgo gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o //
NK043(pi)001:13442: gzhan yang nya ba'i khye'u snyan ngag mkhan dang /
NK043(pi)001:13443: rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud du gyur pa'i dus dang /
NK043(pi)001:13444: nor bu mkhan nor bu'i rin thang che chung du brtsod pa gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:13445: khyim bdag zhig gi bu gnyis dang /
NK043(pi)001:13446: bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa'i dus su yang
NK043(pi)001:13447: sngon lhas sbyin dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i tshul
NK043(pi)001:13448: ni 'dul ba gzhi bam po brgya dang gsum par
NK043(pi)001:13449: blta bar bya'o // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di lus 'phags kyi rgyal por gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13450: rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal po snga
NK043(pi)001:13451: ma las stobs chung bas rtag tu cig shos kyi
NK043(pi)001:13452: dpal la 'khu zhing dgra zlar byas kyang lus 'phags
NK043(pi)001:13453: kyi rgyal pos rtag tu byams pa'i sems su byed
NK043(pi)001:13454: do // nam zhig tshangs sbyin des dpung gi tshogs
NK043(pi)001:13455: bzhi bshams te lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang g.yul
NK043(pi)001:13456: sprad pa'i phyir lhags pa na lus 'phags kyi rgyal
NK043(pi)001:13457: po de bas ches stobs dpung che yang de la
NK043(pi)001:13459: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi lam bstar te /
NK043(pi)001:13460: rgyan gyi bkod pas brgyan nas /
NK043(pi)001:13461: bsod pa'i bza' btung sta gon byas te /
NK043(pi)001:13462: blon po dang grong mi rnams bsrings nas bsus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13463: rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang khro ba'i kun dkris dang
NK043(pi)001:13464: bral nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur
NK043(pi)001:13465: bar byas te / slar ldog go bsams nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13466: de bkur sti chen pos nang du khrid de /
NK043(pi)001:13467: kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:13468: rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod //
NK043(pi)001:13469: khyod la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud //
NK043(pi)001:13470: bdag ni grogs por gyur lags na //
NK043(pi)001:13471: khyod kyis bdag la brtse bar mdzod //
NK043(pi)001:13474: bzod pa yi ni gzhu bdungs nas //
NK043(pi)001:13475: khro dang nga rgyal 'joms pa yi //
NK043(pi)001:13476: yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis //
NK043(pi)001:13477: khyod kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo //
NK043(pi)001:13478: de nas de gnyis phan tshun yid gcugs par gyur nas tshangs byin rang gi yul du dong ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13479: yang bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sngon rgyal po gnyen ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13480: 'gran zla rgyal po drag po'i lha zhes bya bas
NK043(pi)001:13481: dpung gi tshogs bshams nas gnyen ldan gyi rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:13483: gnyen ldan gyis blon po rnams la de la ci ltar byed ces dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13484: kha cig gis snying stobs bskyed par bya dang slar ldog go zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:13485: de bzhin du nor sbyin pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13486: blon po'i tshogs kyis ji ltar bsgrub pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13487: dmag gis brgal bar bya'o zhes dang /
NK043(pi)001:13488: grong khyer gyi gtso bo chu lha zhes pa phyug
NK043(pi)001:13489: cing nor mang ba yid gzhungs shing snying rje yod
NK043(pi)001:13490: pa des bdag gis nor ji snyed pa stsal la
NK043(pi)001:13491: sngags kyis bzlog par bya'o zhes gleng ba bzhin /
NK043(pi)001:13492: dgra zla'i rgyal po de la pho nya btang nas
NK043(pi)001:13493: nor byin kyang zlog par ma btub la dmag 'ongs
NK043(pi)001:13494: so // de nas rgyal po gnyen ldan gyis phan
NK043(pi)001:13495: tshun rang rang gi rgyal srid 'dis chog par byas
NK043(pi)001:13496: nas lha cig dga' bar mdzad 'tshal lo //
NK043(pi)001:13502: chung ma gcig tsam gyis chog pa de ltar shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:13503: mkhas pa ni pha rol dang rtsod par mi byed de /
NK043(pi)001:13504: sems can gcig la gser gyi ri zhig yod kyang
NK043(pi)001:13505: des chog mi shes par rnyed pa la chags pa
NK043(pi)001:13507: grogs po dag re zhig dgongs la rgol ba de gtang bar mdzod cig /
NK043(pi)001:13508: mkhas pas ni chog shes par bskyed par bya'o zhes
NK043(pi)001:13509: rjes su mthun par byas kyang chags pas zil gyis
NK043(pi)001:13510: mnan pa de mi ldog ste 'ongs nas khyod bsad
NK043(pi)001:13511: na ni nga'i rgyal srid dang /
NK043(pi)001:13512: bdag bsad na khyod kyi rgyal srid du 'gyur zhes pa'i spring yig ston to //
NK043(pi)001:13513: der rgyal po gnyen ldan des 'jig rten gyi khams
NK043(pi)001:13514: gang dang gang la chags pa de las sdug bsngal
NK043(pi)001:13516: khams yod na sems can gyi yo byad dgos la /
NK043(pi)001:13517: khams med na mi dgos so snyam du rgyal srid
NK043(pi)001:13518: btang ste rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:13519: bzhi bskyed cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so
NK043(pi)001:13520: // yang sngon bskal pa grangs med bsam gyis mi
NK043(pi)001:13521: khyab pa'i pha rol na sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
NK043(pi)001:13522: 'jig rten du byon nas de'i bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan
NK043(pi)001:13523: // gyis dus na / yul b+aa r+aa na s+air
NK043(pi)001:13524: rgyal po chen po mkhas shing drang ba mchog dang
NK043(pi)001:13525: // gyis dus na / ldan pa / rgyal phran
NK043(pi)001:13526: drug cu la dbang bsgyur ba'i sras su bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:13527: 'das nyid rgyal bu bzod pa zhes bya bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:13528: pa sbyin la dpa' zhing snying rje chen por gyur
NK043(pi)001:13529: // gyis dus na / ldan pa / to //
NK043(pi)001:13530: der blon po khro zhing g.yo sgyu can nyes pa
NK043(pi)001:13531: med par stabs las gcod pa drug yod pa de
NK043(pi)001:13532: dag rang gi skyon gyis rgyal bu de la rtag
NK043(pi)001:13534: de'i tshe rgyal po nad tshabs chen pos btab pa na /
NK043(pi)001:13535: rgyal bus yab rgyal po'i sku tshabs ji 'dra zhes blon po rnams la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13536: de dag gis rgyal po ni ring por mi thogs par 'ada'o //
NK043(pi)001:13537: de ci'i phyir na sman bzang po mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13538: rgyal bu de shin tu mi dga' nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:13539: blon po drug po dben par bgros te /
NK043(pi)001:13540: rgyal bu bzod pa 'di med par ma byas na /
NK043(pi)001:13541: bdag cag nam yang mi bade'o zhes so //
NK043(pi)001:13542: der gcig gis 'di la nyes pa med na ji ltar med par bya /
NK043(pi)001:13545: rgyal bu ga la bar song nas bdag cag gis mtha' rgyal phran drug cu'i yul dang /
NK043(pi)001:13546: grong khyer brgyad brgya'i nang du rgyal po 'tsho ba'i sman btsal kyang ma rnyed do zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13547: rgyal bus rgyal po la sman ci dgos nas ma rnyed /
NK043(pi)001:13549: sman ni thog mar btsas nas khro mi shes pa
NK043(pi)001:13550: zhig gi mig 'bras dang rkang dgos pas de ma
NK043(pi)001:13552: de thos pas rgyal bu mi dga' zhing yang bsams te /
NK043(pi)001:13553: bdag de dang ldan no zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13554: blon po rnams kyis de ltar yang bya daka'o //
NK043(pi)001:13556: yab rgyal po bsnyun las thar na bdag gi lus brgya stong btang yang dka' ba med do //
NK043(pi)001:13557: de nas rgyal bus yum la phyag byas te /
NK043(pi)001:13558: bdag gi lus 'di rgyal po'i sman du gsol gyi
NK043(pi)001:13559: gal te srog mi 'tshor dogs pas yum la mchi
NK043(pi)001:13560: phyag 'tshal gyis yum mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig
NK043(pi)001:13561: / de thos pas yum brgyal te sa la 'gyel lo //
NK043(pi)001:13562: de chu grang mos gtor nas yang smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13563: yab rgyal po sku tshe ring por mi thogs pas don sku tshe 'tsho bar bagyi'o //
NK043(pi)001:13564: rgyal bu des blon po rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:13566: 'khor mang po rnams la'ang mchi phyag byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:13567: blon pos rigs ngan pa'i shan pa zhig bos nas rgyal bu'i rkang rus bcag ste rkang ni phyungs /
NK043(pi)001:13568: mig 'bras gnyis phyungs pa sman dang brdungs nas rgyal po la phul bas nad sos par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13569: rgyal po nad sos nas blon po rnams la 'di
NK043(pi)001:13570: lta bu'i sman bzang po srog thar bar byed pa
NK043(pi)001:13571: ga las rnyed / gsol pa sman 'di ni rgyal bu bzod pas sbyar ba lags so //
NK043(pi)001:13572: de skad thos pas rgyal po brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas /
NK043(pi)001:13573: rgyal bu bzod pa da lta ga re zhes dal gyis dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13574: da lta phyi rol na lus kyi sman gso zhing srog mi 'tshor dogs so //
NK043(pi)001:13575: de skad thos pas rgyal po skad phyungs shing lus
NK043(pi)001:13576: sa la brdabs nas kho bo khrel med yin te
NK043(pi)001:13577: ci'i phyir bu'i sha sman du zos zhes bu ga
NK043(pi)001:13579: rgyal po ma slebs par rgyal bu yang tshe 'das so //
NK043(pi)001:13580: rgyal blon btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas bskor zhing
NK043(pi)001:13581: yum yang rgyal bu'i ro'i steng du lus brdab cing
NK043(pi)001:13582: smre sngags 'don / der rgyal po dang rgyal phran
NK043(pi)001:13583: rnams kyis tsan dan gyi shing las bsregs te rus
NK043(pi)001:13584: pa rin chen sna bdun gyi mchod rten byas so
NK043(pi)001:13585: smre sngags 'don / // de dus kyi rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13586: yab yum ni da lta'i zas gtsang dang lha mdzes
NK043(pi)001:13588: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid seng ge
NK043(pi)001:13589: yi dam brtan pa zhes bya ba lus gser gyi
NK043(pi)001:13590: mdog ltar 'tsher bar gyur pa zhig tu gyur pa
NK043(pi)001:13591: des zas su 'bras bu dang rtsa ba za zhing
NK043(pi)001:13592: sems can su la'ang mi gnod cing rab tu byung
NK043(pi)001:13593: ba la gus par byed pas gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:13594: der rngon pa zhig gis seng ge 'di bsad nas /
NK043(pi)001:13595: lpags pa rgyal po la phul na bdag dbul ba bor bar 'gyur ro snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:13596: gos ngur smrig gyon te rab tu byung pa ltar
NK043(pi)001:13597: bcos nas mda' gzhu thogs shing seng ge gnyid log
NK043(pi)001:13598: pa la dug mdas bsnun no //
NK043(pi)001:13599: seng ge sad nas rngon pa'i rtsar bsnyegs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13600: chos gos gyon pa mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:13601: dus gsum gyi 'phags pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan chos
NK043(pi)001:13602: gos 'di 'chang ba la bdag gis gnod pa byas
NK043(pi)001:13603: na dus gsum gyi 'phags pa rnams la ngan sems
NK043(pi)001:13604: bskyed pa yin no snyam du gsod sems btang ba
NK043(pi)001:13605: dang / dug mdas phog pas srog bral ba la thug pa na 'di skad ces /
NK043(pi)001:13606: ya la la ba sha sa s+aa h+aa /
NK043(pi)001:13607: zhes smras pa'i tshig gis gnam sa kun g.yos shing sprin med par char bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:13608: lha rnams kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' seng
NK043(pi)001:13609: ge'i tshul du zhugs pa rngon pas bsad par mthong
NK043(pi)001:13610: nas / lha'i me tog gi char gyis seng ge'i lus la mchod par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13611: rngon pas pags pa khyer te /
NK043(pi)001:13612: rgyal po de byi la phul nas bya dga' zhus pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13613: gtsug lag las dud 'gro gang gi spu gser ltar
NK043(pi)001:13614: 'dug na nges par byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu
NK043(pi)001:13615: chen po yin no zhes 'byung bas na ci'i phyir
NK043(pi)001:13616: rngon pa 'di la bya dga' sbyin /
NK043(pi)001:13617: gal te byin na bdag gis gsod pa dang 'dra
NK043(pi)001:13618: bar sdig par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa dang
NK043(pi)001:13619: / rngon pas yang bskul bas cung zad cig byin nas rngon pa la 'di skad du /
NK043(pi)001:13620: seng ge 'di bsad pa'i tshe ngo mtshar ram ltas
NK043(pi)001:13621: ci byung zhes dris pa na de'i kha nas sngar
NK043(pi)001:13622: gyi yi ge 'bru brgyad po 'di smras /
NK043(pi)001:13624: sprin med pa las char bab ste /
NK043(pi)001:13625: lha rnams kyis me tog gi char phab bo zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:13626: de thos nas rgyal po shin tu mi dga' ste dad pa'i sems bskyed nas /
NK043(pi)001:13627: blo ldan kun bkug ste seng ges smras pa'i tshig
NK043(pi)001:13628: dpyad pa na gcig gis kyang ma go ma shes
NK043(pi)001:13629: so // gnas dben par drang srong sha ma zhes pa'i mkhas pa zhig la dris pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13630: des ya la la zhes pa'i don ni /
NK043(pi)001:13631: skra breg la chos gos kha dog bsgyur ba gyon
NK043(pi)001:13632: pa 'ba' zhig skye shi las myur du thar ro
NK043(pi)001:13633: zhes zer ro // ba sha sa zer ba ni /
NK043(pi)001:13634: skra breg ste chos gos mdog bsgyur ba gyon pa thams cad 'phags pa'i mtshan ma yin te /
NK043(pi)001:13635: mya ngan las 'das pa dang nye'o zhes zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:13636: s+aa h+aa zhes pa'i don ni /
NK043(pi)001:13637: skra breg ste chos gos mdog bsgyur ba gyon na
NK043(pi)001:13638: lha dang mi dang 'jig rten du bcas pa thams
NK043(pi)001:13639: cad kyis bkur sti byed do zhes pa'i don yin
NK043(pi)001:13642: rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong bsdus te /
NK043(pi)001:13643: rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du
NK043(pi)001:13644: seng ge'i pags pa bzhag pa kun gyis mthong bar
NK043(pi)001:13645: byas / spos dang me tog gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal du bcug go //
NK043(pi)001:13646: de nas gser sgrom du pags pa de bcug ste mchod rten byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13647: der mi mang po dag mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:13648: de ltar ston pa bcom ldan 'das nyid seng ger
NK043(pi)001:13649: gyur pa gos ngur smrig gyon pa la dge sems
NK043(pi)001:13650: bskyed pas bskal pa khri phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor
NK043(pi)001:13651: los bsgyur bar gyur te sems can kun la bde
NK043(pi)001:13652: ba byin cing / bsod nams kyi las rgyas par byas nas ma ngoms par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13653: rgyal po de byis seng ge'i pags pa la mchod
NK043(pi)001:13654: pas bskal pa khri phrag bcu'i bar du lha mi'i
NK043(pi)001:13655: mchog tu gyur nas dge ba kun byas pa de
NK043(pi)001:13656: ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'o //
NK043(pi)001:13657: drang srong de ni sh+aa ri'i bu /
NK043(pi)001:13658: rngon pa de ni da ltar lhas sbyin yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:13659: yang sngon gyi tshe na b+aa r+aa na s+air rgyal
NK043(pi)001:13660: po tshangs byin zhes bya ba byams zhing snying rjer
NK043(pi)001:13661: ldan pa gtong ba chen po dang ldan pa de
NK043(pi)001:13662: la / btsun mo gtum zhing khro la gzu lum
NK043(pi)001:13663: che ba de'i sras chos skyong zhes bya ba gcig
NK043(pi)001:13665: khye'u de yang bsam pa bzang la dad pa dang
NK043(pi)001:13666: ldan zhing rang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa snying
NK043(pi)001:13667: rje che ba zhig ste thams cad kyi snying du
NK043(pi)001:13669: mkhan po'i thad du byis pa rnams dang lhan cig yi ge slob pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:13670: dpyid kyi dus su rgyal po dang btsun mo rnams dang lhan cig skyed tshal na rtse ba na /
NK043(pi)001:13671: btsun mo blo ngan ma phrag dog dang khro bas non te 'khrugs so //
NK043(pi)001:13672: de la rgyal pos skom 'thungs pa'i phyed bskur ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:13673: de 'khrugs pas rgyal po la phrin springs pa /
NK043(pi)001:13674: gal te bdag khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i phyed 'thungs na
NK043(pi)001:13675: bdag bu'i khrag 'thung bar gyur cig ces byas so
NK043(pi)001:13676: // 'dod pa bsten pas sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas /
NK043(pi)001:13677: rgyal po tshangs byin chos dang ldan pa yin mod
NK043(pi)001:13678: kyis 'dod pas kun nas dkris pa dang ma bral
NK043(pi)001:13679: te / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis phe'u btab kyang khro ba'i me 'bar te je thur khros nas /
NK043(pi)001:13680: khyed deng la khye'u chos skyong gi mgul pa chod
NK043(pi)001:13681: la blo ngan ma de la khrag lud cig ces
NK043(pi)001:13682: basgo'o // de khye'u chos skyong byis pa'i gra khang na 'dug pas thos nas ngus shing /
NK043(pi)001:13683: 'khor ba na sems can mi mthun pa ni tha chad yin te /
NK043(pi)001:13684: 'di ltar khro ba'i dbang gis rang gi lus las
NK043(pi)001:13685: byung ba'i bu yang gsod par byed do zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:13686: nas / khye'u de rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin yab la phyag 'tshal te /
NK043(pi)001:13687: yab gcig pha'o cog la bu sdug na bdag gis
NK043(pi)001:13688: nongs pa ma bgyis pas bdag mi dgum du gsol
NK043(pi)001:13690: bu sdug gal te khyod kyis mas bzod na ngas kyang bzod par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:13691: de nas khye'u chos skyong ma'i thad du song nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te /
NK043(pi)001:13692: yum bzod par mdzad cing bdag gsod du ma bcug cig /
NK043(pi)001:13693: ces snying rje rje skad ngu sdug la gti zhing
NK043(pi)001:13694: smra ba'i tshig thos kyang ma nges bzod pa ma
NK043(pi)001:13695: byas par gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis mtshon rnon pos
NK043(pi)001:13696: khye'u'i mgul pa bcad de blo ngan ma la khrag
NK043(pi)001:13697: blud kyang 'gyod pa ma skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:13698: khye'u chos skyong ni pha ma dang gshed ma dag la dga' zhing byams pa'i sems skyes nas shi'o //
NK043(pi)001:13699: de ltar khye'u chos skyong ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK043(pi)001:13700: btsun mo blo ngan ma ni lhas sbyin yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:13701: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po ri rab zhes bya
NK043(pi)001:13702: ba de shing rta la zhon nas dpung gi tshogs
NK043(pi)001:13703: dang bcas pa ri dwags gshor bar nags su song
NK043(pi)001:13704: ba dang rgyal po de shing grib zhig na ngal
NK043(pi)001:13705: gso ba la / byang phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i tshong
NK043(pi)001:13706: pa dag gis skyes phul zhing rang gi phyogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:13707: rgyal po rdo rje'i dbyug pa can zhes pa'i che
NK043(pi)001:13709: des rgyal po ri rab phrag dog gis sems dkrugs nas /
NK043(pi)001:13710: rang gi pho brang du song zhing rgyal po rdo
NK043(pi)001:13711: rje'i dbyug pa can la khyod 'dir myur du phyag
NK043(pi)001:13712: byed par ma 'ongs na nan tan byed par tshar
NK043(pi)001:13713: gcod do zhes pho nya mngags so //
NK043(pi)001:13714: de thos pas rgyal po gtum po rdo rje'i dbyug
NK043(pi)001:13715: pa can khros pas dpung bzhi bshams nas rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:13716: ri rab kyi yul du chas te phan tshun g.yul
NK043(pi)001:13717: drag po bkyes pas mang po 'chi zhing rmas par
NK043(pi)001:13718: gyur to // de'i tshe blon po dag gis rgyal po ri rab la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13719: khyed gnyis phan tshun rgyal po stobs mnyam pa yin
NK043(pi)001:13720: pas 'khrugs pa 'di dor nas mthun par byas na
NK043(pi)001:13721: legs tshul smras pas rgyal po ri rab kyis de
NK043(pi)001:13722: ltar mnyan no // rdo rje'i dbyug pas kyang rang
NK043(pi)001:13723: gi dmag tshogs 'grib par mthong zhing skyo ste mthun
NK043(pi)001:13724: ltar mnyan no // par 'dod do // de nas
NK043(pi)001:13725: rgyal po ri rab kyis rdo rje'i dbyug pa can
NK043(pi)001:13726: la gus pa dang bcas pas nor byin cing nyin
NK043(pi)001:13727: zhag 'ga' song ba'i rjes su rang gi bu mo
NK043(pi)001:13728: lha mo ltar mchog tu 'phags pa sbyin par byas
NK043(pi)001:13729: pas rgyal po de mchog tu mgu nas rang gi
NK043(pi)001:13731: der dus cig gi tshe rgyal po ri rab kyi
NK043(pi)001:13732: bu mo snar ma zhes pa de la bcom ldan
NK043(pi)001:13733: 'das nyid mngal du chags par gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:13734: btsun mo de'i mngal na gnas pa'i mthus yid la
NK043(pi)001:13735: rtog pa byung ba ltar rgyal pos de'i steng du
NK043(pi)001:13736: gdugs bzung zhing btson rnams kyang btang ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13737: der sras nyi ma ltar gsal ba'i gzugs kyi yon
NK043(pi)001:13738: tan can nor bu'i gdugs bkra ba zhig btsas te
NK043(pi)001:13739: / rim gyis bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa /
NK043(pi)001:13740: shin tu bzod pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi gnyen ltar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13741: de nas rgyal po bgres nas sras rgyal srid la bzhag ste yab 'das so //
NK043(pi)001:13742: de'i tshe des chos kyi rgyal srid bskyangs nas bdag
NK043(pi)001:13743: gi pho brang 'dir lha'i kha zas dang gos dang
NK043(pi)001:13744: rgyan cha sogs 'byung bar gyur cig snyam pa'i mod
NK043(pi)001:13745: la de ltar byung bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13746: mdza' bo rnams la'ang gus pas dga' bar byas pas
NK043(pi)001:13747: de'i ming du'ang dga' ba'i gong bu zhes bya bar
NK043(pi)001:13748: grags so // rgyal po nga'i mthus rnga sgra'i brgyud
NK043(pi)001:13749: pa de'i yul na gnas pa'i khyim thams cad du
NK043(pi)001:13750: lha'i longs spyod byung bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13751: der blon po blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba
NK043(pi)001:13752: yid rtsub pa zhig gis dga' ba'i gong bu 'di
NK043(pi)001:13753: bsad par byas na skye bo'i tshogs 'di dbang du
NK043(pi)001:13755: rgyal po ri rab la 'phrin yig btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:13756: dga' ba'i gong bu 'di ni khyod kyi dgra'i bu ste /
NK043(pi)001:13757: de bas 'di bsad na khyod 'dzam bu'i gling thams
NK043(pi)001:13758: cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing bdag kyang lha'i zhabs
NK043(pi)001:13759: 'brings su 'gyur ro zhes smras pa mnyan nas /
NK043(pi)001:13760: rgyal po ri rab kyis de la pho nya btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:13761: khyod kyis phas bdag gi nor 'phrog pas sdug bsngal bar byas na /
NK043(pi)001:13762: da ni bdag gis kyang stobs chen pos khyod la de ltar gnod par bya'o zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13763: dga' ba'i gong bus bsams pa /
NK043(pi)001:13764: rgyal po ri rab 'dir 'ongs na bdag gi skye
NK043(pi)001:13765: bo rnams sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro snyam nas pho
NK043(pi)001:13766: nya la smras pa byis pa bdag gi bla ma
NK043(pi)001:13767: de rnams mjal bar bya ba ste /
NK043(pi)001:13768: bdag nyid der 'ong zhes zhu bar mdzod cig ces
NK043(pi)001:13769: byas nas rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen pos dpung gi
NK043(pi)001:13770: tshogs dang bcas te chas shing rgyal po'i yul dang
NK043(pi)001:13771: nye ba gang+g+aa'i 'gram du song nas blon po blo
NK043(pi)001:13772: ngan la bdag gi mes po la bla ma pas
NK043(pi)001:13773: kyang shin tu bla ma khyod la bdag cis mi
NK043(pi)001:13774: 'dud ces zhus shig ces mngags pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13775: des dga' ba'i gong bus rgyal po ri rab khyod
NK043(pi)001:13776: 'dir gus par shog ces 'jigs pa mi shes pa
NK043(pi)001:13777: des lha la smra'o zhes dbyen sbyar bas /
NK043(pi)001:13778: rgyal po ri rab shin tu khros so //
NK043(pi)001:13779: de la blo ngan gyis dga' ba'i gong bu ni
NK043(pi)001:13780: shin tu stobs chung ba blun pa yin pas lha
NK043(pi)001:13781: khyed la cung zad gnod mi nus so zhes kyang
NK043(pi)001:13782: byas so // der rgyal po ri rab dpung gi
NK043(pi)001:13783: tshogs bzhi dang bcas te 'thab mo 'dod pas dga'
NK043(pi)001:13784: ba'i gong bu can gyi dmag gi sar song ngo
NK043(pi)001:13785: byas so // // der dga' ba'i gong bu yang
NK043(pi)001:13786: lha'i gzhal med khang chen po dang 'dra ba'i gru
NK043(pi)001:13787: chen po la zhugs shing glu len pa'i skye bo'i
NK043(pi)001:13788: tshogs kyis bskor te gang+g+aa'i chu la rtse ba myong
NK043(pi)001:13790: rjes su byug pa dang bza' ba'i dus su rnga
NK043(pi)001:13791: yi sgra byas pa'i sgra de dag 'brug gi sgra
NK043(pi)001:13792: dang 'dra bar ri 'gul ba ltar gyur pa la
NK043(pi)001:13793: / rgyal po ri rab 'khrugs nas 'dis ci byed ces blo ngan la dris so //
NK043(pi)001:13795: rnga yi sgra 'dis dga' ba'i gong bus lha'i bza'
NK043(pi)001:13796: ba dang btung ba dag bskyed nas nang mi rnams
NK043(pi)001:13797: dang lhan cig bza' bar 'dod do zhes smras so
NK043(pi)001:13799: gang gi bsod nams kyi mthu 'di lta bu na /
NK043(pi)001:13800: bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas pa'i steng du 'bar ba'i thog lhung bar byed par mi 'gyur ram /
NK043(pi)001:13801: nges par bdag cag gi tsha'u 'di bzod pa dang ldan pa'o snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:13802: der rgyal po ri rab dogs pa dang bcas par
NK043(pi)001:13803: shes nas dga' ba'i gong bu can gyis thabs kyis
NK043(pi)001:13804: 'di rjes su gzung bar bya'o snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:13805: skye bo rnams kyis 'dwi ltar khyod bdag dang mi mthun par byed do zhes sgrogs mod kyi /
NK043(pi)001:13806: gal te khyod bdag dang mthun par mi byed na /
NK043(pi)001:13807: bdag gis bzod pa spangs te /
NK043(pi)001:13808: 'bar ba'i thog gis khyod bsad par bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK043(pi)001:13809: rgyal po ri rab skrag nas mthun par gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:13810: dga' ba'i gong bu de rgyal po ri rab rang gi gnas su bos pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13811: cho ga bzhin tu bkur sti byas shing rnam pa du mas basngagasa pa byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13812: dga' ba'i gong bus kyang chos kyi gtam gyis de
NK043(pi)001:13813: chos lam la gnas par byas nas rang gi grong
NK043(pi)001:13815: dga' ba'i gong bu de'i lha'i dpal 'byor thob pa'i
NK043(pi)001:13816: rgyu ni sngon b+aa r+aa na s+air bram ze rtsa
NK043(pi)001:13817: ba can zhes par gyur pas /
NK043(pi)001:13818: nad kyis gzir ba'i rang sangs rgyas la sman dang
NK043(pi)001:13819: bsres pa'i thug pa gsol zhing bsil grib kyi slad
NK043(pi)001:13820: du gdugs bzung ba'i rnam smin yin la /
NK043(pi)001:13821: blon po blo ngan ni lhas byin yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK043(pi)001:13822: yang sngon gyi tshe shing sna tshogs dang bya dang
NK043(pi)001:13823: ri dwags kyi tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i nags su bcom
NK043(pi)001:13824: ldan 'das nyid glang po'i rgyal po mche ba drug
NK043(pi)001:13825: dang ldan pa khyu'i tshogs kyi bdag po sprin dkar
NK043(pi)001:13826: po lta bu rmad du byung ba zhig tu gyur
NK043(pi)001:13827: pa'i tshe na / glang po'i khyu rnams legs par skyong bar byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:13828: de la bzang mo dang shin tu bzang mo zhes bya ba'i glang mo gnyis yod do //
NK043(pi)001:13829: dus gcig na nam mkhar chu 'dzin 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' la /
NK043(pi)001:13830: yid du 'ong ba'i na chung ma dang 'khor gyis
NK043(pi)001:13831: kun nas bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dag 'gro
NK043(pi)001:13833: mtsho ma dros pa las byung ba'i gser gyi rang
NK043(pi)001:13834: bzhin gyi pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam pa
NK043(pi)001:13835: dris khyab pa zhig nags kyi ri de la gcig
NK043(pi)001:13836: pur gnas pa'i glang po'i bdag po de'i mdun du
NK043(pi)001:13838: des de blangs nas glang mo gnyis las dang por
NK043(pi)001:13839: su 'ong ba de la sbyin no snyam du shin
NK043(pi)001:13840: tu bzang mo dang por 'ongs pa byin no //
NK043(pi)001:13841: des gus pa dang bcas pas mgo la btags te 'dug go //
NK043(pi)001:13842: phyis bzang mo 'ongs pas de'i dpral ba'i pad+ma de
NK043(pi)001:13843: mthong nas tshogs kyi bdag pos chung ma 'di la
NK043(pi)001:13844: byin te bdag la ma byin no snyam du phrag
NK043(pi)001:13845: dog skyes pas glang po'i bdag po de spangs nas
NK043(pi)001:13847: r+ts+wa mi za zhing chu ma 'thung la sems 'khrugs par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:13848: des ri 'bigs byed kyi brag gi dbus na bsam
NK043(pi)001:13849: gtan byed pa'i rang sangs rgyas chos gos dmar po
NK043(pi)001:13850: can mthong nas / rgya mtsho las ku mu ta blangs pas mchod par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13851: de nas glang mo de ni 'bigs byed kyi 'gram du gnas te /
NK043(pi)001:13852: bdag gis rang sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge rtsa 'dis
NK043(pi)001:13853: spos kyi glang po 'di gsod pa'i phyir rgyal po'i
NK043(pi)001:13854: btsun mor gyur cig snyam du smon nas /
NK043(pi)001:13855: bdag nyid lcebs te shi ba rgyal po zhig gi
NK043(pi)001:13856: bu mo skye ba dran pa zhig tu skyes so
NK043(pi)001:13857: // de shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs dang ldan pas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi btsun mor byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13858: nam zhig de tsha ba'i rims drag pos gzir pa'i tshul du byas nas /
NK043(pi)001:13859: bdag po shin tu mi dga' ba'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:13861: bdag gi rims 'di tsan dan sa mchog sogs kyis kyang mi sel te /
NK043(pi)001:13862: ri 'bigs byed la glang po'i bdag po chen po'i mche ba lon na /
NK043(pi)001:13863: de'i ba sos mal cha byed cing mche ba la
NK043(pi)001:13864: yod pa'i mu tig rnams kyis lus brgyan na nad
NK043(pi)001:13865: 'di zhi yis gzhan cis kyang mi phan no zhes
NK043(pi)001:13866: smras pa la / bdag po rgyal po des btsun
NK043(pi)001:13867: mo 'dis skye ba gzhan la de mthong ngam thos
NK043(pi)001:13868: par nges kyi de ltar bya'o bsams nas rngon pa
NK043(pi)001:13869: bos te glang po de'i mche ba longs dang nor
NK043(pi)001:13870: chen po sbyin no zhes byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13872: de ltar nus na bya'o zhes zer ro //
NK043(pi)001:13874: glang po che de dga' ba'i thabs bdag gis shes te /
NK043(pi)001:13875: rab tu byung ba'i cha byad kyis dug mdas gnad
NK043(pi)001:13876: du bsnun par bya'o zhes bsgos pa ltar song ba
NK043(pi)001:13877: re zhig nags der 'chag pa glang po'i tshogs kyis
NK043(pi)001:13878: mthong nas dogs pa skyes te glang po'i bdag po
NK043(pi)001:13880: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13881: 'di dogs par bya ba min te /
NK043(pi)001:13882: khrel yod zhi ba'i lam mtshon pa'i thub pa rnams
NK043(pi)001:13883: kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa yin pas lta bar 'os
NK043(pi)001:13885: der rngon pas shing zhig gi rgyud du sbas pa'i
NK043(pi)001:13886: tshul gyis gdungs te dug mdas glang po'i bdag po
NK043(pi)001:13888: de khrag gis gos pa'i lus su mthong bas glang po'i tshogs dang /
NK043(pi)001:13889: glang mo shin tu bzang mo 'khrugs cing mya ngan du gyur te mda' phyungs par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13890: glang po la bdag po des gal te bdag 'chi
NK043(pi)001:13891: ba'i dus byed par gyur na glang po'i tshogs 'di
NK043(pi)001:13892: mgon med par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:13893: gal te bdag rngon pa 'di la'ang khro ba med
NK043(pi)001:13894: cing mnyes gshin par gyur na bden pa des bdag
NK043(pi)001:13895: gi dug zad par gyur cig ces brjod pa'i mod
NK043(pi)001:13896: la bsnun pa'i gnod pa las yongs su grol bar
NK043(pi)001:13897: gyur to // de de ltar gson par gyur pa mthon nas rngon pa des btud de /
NK043(pi)001:13898: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i gtam de brjod par byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13899: des snying rje'i sems kyis mche ba gnyis phud nas
NK043(pi)001:13900: byin cing bden pa'i stobs kyis slar yang mche ba
NK043(pi)001:13901: gnyis skyes so // rngon pa des mche ba gnyis khyer te /
NK043(pi)001:13902: rgyal po'i pho brang du song bas rgyal po des rngon pa la nor gyi bya dga' byin cing /
NK043(pi)001:13903: mche ba mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes so //
NK043(pi)001:13904: btsun mo des kyang skye ba snga mar phrag dog
NK043(pi)001:13905: gis nyams su myong ba'i tshul ji ltar du gyur
NK043(pi)001:13906: pa rang gi bdag po la bden par smras nas
NK043(pi)001:13907: / kye hud nags kyi glang po'i bdag po dka'
NK043(pi)001:13908: thub dang zhi ba'i yid can de phrag dog ngan
NK043(pi)001:13909: pa'i sems kyis bdag gis bcom mo zhes smre sngags
NK043(pi)001:13911: rngon pas btsun mo mya ngan ma byed cig /
NK043(pi)001:13912: bdag nyid chen po de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis
NK043(pi)001:13913: srog 'tsho zhing mche ba slar skyes te khyu'i tshogs
NK043(pi)001:13914: skyong bar byed do zhes smras pa la dga' bar
NK043(pi)001:13915: gyur to // yang sngon gyi tshe chu bo b+aa
NK043(pi)001:13916: r+aa na s+air zhes bya ba'i ngogs kyi ri'i dgon
NK043(pi)001:13917: pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das nyid ri dwags kyi
NK043(pi)001:13918: bdag po lto ba dkar la rgyab gnag pa'i gzugs
NK043(pi)001:13919: sdug pa zhig tu gyur pas ri dwags kyi tshogs
NK043(pi)001:13920: bde bar skyong zhing gnas so //
NK043(pi)001:13921: de dang byad gzugs sogs cha 'dra ba'i ri dwags
NK043(pi)001:13922: kyi khyu gnyis pa'i gtso bo gzhan lhas byin zhes
NK043(pi)001:13923: bya ba zhig dang gnyis yod do //
NK043(pi)001:13924: nam zhig rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes pa dpung
NK043(pi)001:13925: gi tshogs dang bcas pas nags der ri dwags gshor
NK043(pi)001:13926: du byung zhing mtshon phyungs te ri dwags rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:13928: de'i tshe rgyal po mda' gzhu gzung ba'i sngon du
NK043(pi)001:13929: ri dwags kyi dpon po de song nas mi bdag
NK043(pi)001:13930: ri dwags 'di thams cad cig car bsad pas ci
NK043(pi)001:13931: bya / nyin re nyin rer ri dwags re re
NK043(pi)001:13932: khyod la bdag gis gtong bar bya'o zhes byas pa
NK043(pi)001:13933: bya / la / rgyal pos kyang de bzhin bden na rung ste /
NK043(pi)001:13934: gzhan du ri dwags rnams gzhom par bya zhes chad byas nas rgyal po song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13935: der ri dwags rnams bsdus te tshogs kyi dpon pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13936: thams cad cig car mi gsod pa'i slad du nyin
NK043(pi)001:13937: re bzhin rgyal po'i tshang mang du ri dwags re
NK043(pi)001:13938: re 'gro bar chad byas so zhes ri dwags kyi
NK043(pi)001:13939: dpon po gnyis kyi bkas nyin zhag kha cig tu
NK043(pi)001:13940: ri dwags re re mngags so //
NK043(pi)001:13941: de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i res ri dwags mo sbrum
NK043(pi)001:13942: ma gcig la bab pa des ri dwags kyi tshogs
NK043(pi)001:13943: dpon lhas byin la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:13944: nges par sang gi nangs par bdag la phru gu skye bar 'gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:13946: 'di dang bcas nas ma yin no zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:13947: de na re khyod kyi res la bab na gzhan
NK043(pi)001:13948: su zhig 'gro 'os te bdag gi bka' gcog mi
NK043(pi)001:13950: ri dwags mo des ri dwags kyi tshogs dpon cig
NK043(pi)001:13951: shos snying rje can de'i mdun du phyin te smras
NK043(pi)001:13952: pa / bdag 'gro ba'i res la bab pas sang
NK043(pi)001:13953: phru gu btsas pa'i tshe de lces ldag cing nu
NK043(pi)001:13954: ma 'thung du bcug nas rang gi nu mo la
NK043(pi)001:13955: pa / gtad de / de nas bdag 'chi ru
NK043(pi)001:13956: 'gro bas phru gu 'di srung ba'i phyir gnang ba
NK043(pi)001:13957: stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:13958: tshogs kyi dpon po des de ltar phru gu la
NK043(pi)001:13959: chags pa la snying rje drag po skyes nas smras
NK043(pi)001:13960: pa / bzang mo khyod phru gu la lta zhing bde bar yun ring du sdod cig /
NK043(pi)001:13961: bdag ni khyod kyi tshab tu 'gro bar bya'o zhes dbugs dbyung bar byas te /
NK043(pi)001:13962: bla med byang chub kyi phyir smon lam btab nas rang gi khyu'i tshogs kyis gdung bzhin bskyal te /
NK043(pi)001:13963: de rnams la slar log ces byas nas skyo ba'i
NK043(pi)001:13964: chos bstan cing rang nyid gcig pur song ba de
NK043(pi)001:13965: la ri dwags rnams kyis mi mthong ba'i bar du
NK043(pi)001:13966: lta zhing pha dang bral ba ltar mya ngan byed
NK043(pi)001:13967: do // byang chub sems dpa' de khrag dang rus
NK043(pi)001:13968: pas gang ba'i shan pa de dag gi gnas su
NK043(pi)001:13969: do // song ngo // de rnams kyis ma bsad par rgyal po la bstan pas /
NK043(pi)001:13970: rgyal pos ri dwags mang du yod na tshogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:13971: bdag po khyod ci la 'ongs zhes dris pa la
NK043(pi)001:13972: ji ltar gyur pa bshad pas rgyal po mgu nas
NK043(pi)001:13973: khyod ni gzhan don byed pa'i skyes bu chen po
NK043(pi)001:13974: ste / bdag cag ni dud 'gro lta bu'o zhes basngagasa nas khri la bzhag cing /
NK043(pi)001:13975: des kyang de la chos bstan pas rgyal po mgu
NK043(pi)001:13976: ste phyin chad ri dwags rnams la mi 'jigs pa
NK043(pi)001:13977: sbyin par byas shing tshogs kyi bdag po la basngagasa
NK043(pi)001:13978: so // tshogs kyi dpon po des kyang bdag po
NK043(pi)001:13979: med pa'i ri dwags rnams mya ngan byed pas na
NK043(pi)001:13981: rgyal pos kyang gnang nas slar nags su song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:13982: ri dwags rnams kyis de mthong nas bsu zhing dga' la /
NK043(pi)001:13983: sngar gyi ri dwags mo la'ang phru gu bde bar
NK043(pi)001:13984: btsas te dga' ba'i gtam byas nas ri dwags kyi
NK043(pi)001:13985: khyu gnyis ka bde bar bskyang bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:13986: de ltar byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen pos
NK043(pi)001:13987: gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi khur du len pa'i
NK043(pi)001:13988: bzod pa'i stobs la gus par bya'o //
NK043(pi)001:13989: yang sngon gyi tshe pha rol rnam par gnon pa'i
NK043(pi)001:13990: stobs sogs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa ka ling
NK043(pi)001:13991: ka'i rgyal po la sras med pas lha rnams la
NK043(pi)001:13993: chags pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i bram ze'i blon po
NK043(pi)001:13994: des rgyal po nyid sras 'byung ba'i don du btsun
NK043(pi)001:13995: mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs dang bdag gis lha
NK043(pi)001:13996: mchod cing rgyal srid bskyangs zhes byas pa bzhin byas
NK043(pi)001:13997: pas ji zhig na btsun mo zhig la sras chags
NK043(pi)001:13998: par gyur te mtshan dang ldan pa zla ba'i 'od
NK043(pi)001:13999: la 'gran pa zhig btsas pa la ming zla ba
NK043(pi)001:14000: zhes btags pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK043(pi)001:14001: btsun mo gzhan sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams la'ang sras re btsas so //
NK043(pi)001:14002: nam zhig rgyal bu zla ba lo brgyad lon pa
NK043(pi)001:14003: de rgyal po'i bla ma dag gi drung du bsten
NK043(pi)001:14004: par byas shing / ri dwags gshor ba sogs kyi
NK043(pi)001:14005: tshe rgyal bu zla ba ni gzi brjid dang dpung
NK043(pi)001:14006: pa'i stobs sras gzhan las lhag par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:14007: de rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas gzhon nu gzhan rnams la'ang yul 'ga' zhig byin no //
NK043(pi)001:14008: de rgyal bu gzhan rnams dang lhan cig rang gi
NK043(pi)001:14009: yul kun tu song ba las bram ze dum bu
NK043(pi)001:14010: 'dzin zhes pa'i 'byor pa chen po mthong nas /
NK043(pi)001:14011: de'i ming gis mtshan pa'i yo byad thams cad mthong bas /
NK043(pi)001:14012: rgyal bu zla bas bdag gi pha ni rgyal po'i ming tsam zhig ste /
NK043(pi)001:14013: 'di ni rgyal po yang dag go snyam mo //
NK043(pi)001:14014: der gzhon nu rnams kyis 'o na dum bu 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:14015: pa'i ming 'di phyis nas rgyal bu zla ba'i ming
NK043(pi)001:14016: bri bar bya'o zhes de ltar zhugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14017: bram ze dum bu 'dzin khros te bram ze rnams bsdus nas /
NK043(pi)001:14018: rgyal bu 'dis bdag gi dbang thang 'phrog pas 'di bsad par khyed rnams kyis shes par gyis shig /
NK043(pi)001:14019: de rnams kyi khyod nyid kyis thabs rtogs shig zer ba la dum bu 'dzin na re /
NK043(pi)001:14020: gal te rgyal po 'dis rmi lam rmis pa khyed
NK043(pi)001:14021: rnams kyi mdun du smra na de'i tshe bram ze
NK043(pi)001:14022: dum bu 'dzin rmi lam gyi don shes pa la
NK043(pi)001:14023: dris shig ces brjod par byos zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:14024: nam zhig rgyal pos rmi lam du gzhan gyi lus
NK043(pi)001:14025: bcings te shing khang gi gnas su bor ba rmis
NK043(pi)001:14026: nas bram ze rnams la rmi lam de ci zhes
NK043(pi)001:14027: dris pa na / de dag gis dum bu 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:14028: pa rmi lam gyi 'bras bu shes pa la dris
NK043(pi)001:14029: zhes smras pa ltar byas pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14031: rmi lam 'di ni mi bzang ste /
NK043(pi)001:14032: zla ba gnyis kyis rgyal srid las nyams pa'am 'chi
NK043(pi)001:14033: bar 'gyur zhes smras pas sa skyong de mi dga'
NK043(pi)001:14034: bas gdungs nas de la thabs ci yod ces dris
NK043(pi)001:14036: rgyal bu zla ba dang sras gzhan dag kyang lhan cig mchod sbyin gyi las la bsad nas /
NK043(pi)001:14037: de dag gi khrag gi rdzing bu rgya che ba byas te /
NK043(pi)001:14038: der rgyal po zhugs na gnod pa de las thar bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
NK043(pi)001:14039: rgyal po des bdag 'tsho na slar yang sras yon tan can 'byung ngo snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:14040: gzhon nu phal pa rnams lcags sgrog gis bcings te
NK043(pi)001:14041: dum bu 'dzin pa la mchod sbyin gyi don du
NK043(pi)001:14042: byin no // der dum bu 'dzin pas sras zla
NK043(pi)001:14043: ba med na mchod sbyin mi rdzogs pas de bos
NK043(pi)001:14045: rgyal pos pho nya btang ste /
NK043(pi)001:14046: sras zla ba ni bla ma la gus pa yin
NK043(pi)001:14047: pas ji ltar bsgo ba las mi 'da' bas 'dir
NK043(pi)001:14049: pho nya des mchi ma dang bcas te /
NK043(pi)001:14050: rgyal bu zla ba de dpyid dus skyed tshal na gnas pa la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pas /
NK043(pi)001:14051: 'khor rnams kyis zla ba la smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:14052: 'di thams cad dum bu 'dzin pa'i ngan sems kyi g.yos byas pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:14053: de bsad par bya zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14054: rgyal bus bden mod bdag gis dum bu 'dzin pa la mi rigs pa shes kyang /
NK043(pi)001:14055: de la khro ba zhi bar byas nas yab yun
NK043(pi)001:14056: ring gson par 'gyur na bdag gi srog btang ba
NK043(pi)001:14057: don yod pas bdag ni 'gro bar bya ste /
NK043(pi)001:14058: khyed cag kyang dum bu 'dzin pa la khro bar mi bya'o zhes rgyal po'i drung bu song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:14059: der zla bas bdag yab kyis btang na mchod sbyin
NK043(pi)001:14060: du 'gro bar spro'o zhes byas pas rgyal pos mchi
NK043(pi)001:14061: ma gzag go // der dum bu 'dzin pas mchod sbyin gyi mkhan po rnams la /
NK043(pi)001:14062: sreg blugs dang por rgyal bu zla ba bsad de /
NK043(pi)001:14063: phyis gzhon nu gzhan rnams de ltar gyis zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14064: gzhon nu gzhan de dag skrag cing bdag cag phyugs
NK043(pi)001:14065: bzhin dum bu 'dzin pa snying rje med pas gsod
NK043(pi)001:14066: pa la spun zla bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis
NK043(pi)001:14067: snying mi rje'am zhes zla ba la smras so //
NK043(pi)001:14068: zla ba nyid de dag la snying rje zhing byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pas /
NK043(pi)001:14069: rgyal bu de rnams kyi lcags sgrog rang grol bar
NK043(pi)001:14070: gyur pa la 'di ci zhes rtog pa'i mod la
NK043(pi)001:14071: mi rung ba'i las de'i chad pa gcod pa'i byed
NK043(pi)001:14072: por lha sogs 'khrugs pa'i stobs kyis nam mkhar las
NK043(pi)001:14073: chu 'dzin shin tu stug pos nyi ma'i snang ba
NK043(pi)001:14074: bsgribs nas sprin gyi sgra dang thog gis ri rtse
NK043(pi)001:14075: 'jig cing / rdo ba'i char gyis ril ba sogs bcom la /
NK043(pi)001:14076: chu'i rgyun drag pos mchod sbyin gyi me bsad nas bram ze rnams kyi skra med par byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:14077: rdo ba'i char gyis rgyal po dang dum bu 'dzin
NK043(pi)001:14078: bsad par gyur pa thos nas btsun mo yang mya
NK043(pi)001:14079: ngan gyis srog btang bar byas so //
NK043(pi)001:14080: pho brang dag kyang rdo'i char gyis phal cher bcom
NK043(pi)001:14081: par byas shing yul de'i srog chags phal cher brlag
NK043(pi)001:14082: par byas so // de'i tho rangs kyi dus su
NK043(pi)001:14083: byang chub sems dpas pha ma'i lus mes bsreg par
NK043(pi)001:14084: par byas so // byas shing / kye ma'o //
NK043(pi)001:14085: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'dus byas thams
NK043(pi)001:14086: cad skad cig gis 'jig cing mi rtag pa zhes
NK043(pi)001:14087: gsungs pa ni legs par gsungs pa'o snyam du spun
NK043(pi)001:14088: zla rnams la skyo ba'i tshig smras nas dka' thub
NK043(pi)001:14089: kyi nags su song bar gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:14090: yang sngon grong khyer sha ka pa zhes bya bar /
NK043(pi)001:14091: chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gser gyi gtsug phud
NK043(pi)001:14092: ces bya ba'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du bcom
NK043(pi)001:14094: de mngal na gnas pa'i mthus ma'i bsam pa bzhin du slong ba la nor byin cing /
NK043(pi)001:14095: ma des dam pa'i chos kyang bshad /
NK043(pi)001:14096: rgyal pos sdug bsngal can rnam pa sna tshogs dbugs
NK043(pi)001:14097: 'byin pa sogs dge ba'i las sna tshogs bgyis so
NK043(pi)001:14098: // der dus su khye'u lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa /
NK043(pi)001:14099: gtsug na nor bu rin po che mtshan mor yang
NK043(pi)001:14100: nyin mo ltar gsal ba rang chas su yod pa
NK043(pi)001:14101: btsas so // de'i tshe lha'i me tog gi char sogs dag pa'i ltas mang du byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:14102: de'i gtsug gi nor bu la reg pa tsam gyis
NK043(pi)001:14103: lcags rnams gser du bgyid pas slong ba rnams kyi
NK043(pi)001:14104: bsam pa rdzogs par byed cing /
NK043(pi)001:14105: de'i ming yang gtsug na nor bu zhes btags so //
NK043(pi)001:14106: de nas dus gzhan zhig na yab rgyal po 'das pas gzhon nu rgyal por gyur te /
NK043(pi)001:14107: slong ba rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing ltar gyur nas su yang phongs pa med par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:14108: rgyal po de las srung gi bu lta bu'i glang po che bzang po'i ri zhes bya ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:14109: lha'i gzhon pa 'dra ba'i rta gser gyi phreng ldan
NK043(pi)001:14110: la sogs pa lha'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs pa'i yo
NK043(pi)001:14111: byad dag kyang yod par gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:14112: de la btsun mos gzhi 'dzin zhes pa mchog tu mdzes pa yod do //
NK043(pi)001:14113: nam zhig na b+h+ri gu'i rigs las 'khrungs pa'i thub
NK043(pi)001:14114: pa srid 'byor zhes bya bas pad+ma ba ti zhes
NK043(pi)001:14115: bya ba'i bud med lha'i bu mo 'dra ba de
NK043(pi)001:14116: khrid nas / rgyal po la basngagasa pa brjod cing /
NK043(pi)001:14117: mdzes ma 'di me tog pad+ma'i sbubs nas byung ba
NK043(pi)001:14118: bdag gis sbyin sreg gi lhag mas gsos pa yin
NK043(pi)001:14119: te / khyod kyi chun mar bzhes zhes phul lo //
NK043(pi)001:14120: de la bu pad+mo'i gtsug ces bya ba yid du
NK043(pi)001:14121: 'ong ba snying stobs sogs yon tan rgya che ba
NK043(pi)001:14122: btsas so // der mchod sbyin chen po bgyid pa'i tshe b+h+ri gu'i bu sogs thub pa rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:14123: ku ru'i mi bdag rab tu bzod dka' sogs 'ong zhing /
NK043(pi)001:14124: me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i me'i dbus nas lha'i dbang pos srin po'i gzugs su byas te /
NK043(pi)001:14125: zas bslangs pa la bza' ba sna tshogs byin kyang
NK043(pi)001:14126: ma 'dod par bdag ni shas 'atsho'o zhes smras so
NK043(pi)001:14127: // de mi bdag gtsug na nor bus gzhan gyi
NK043(pi)001:14128: sha sbyin par mi 'os snyam du rang gi lus
NK043(pi)001:14129: kyi sha khrag sbyin par khas blang ba la /
NK043(pi)001:14130: nang mi rnams kyis bzlog kyang ma btub par lus kyi sha dang khrag rnams byin pas /
NK043(pi)001:14131: btsun mo pad+ma ldan smre sngags 'don zhing 'gyel to //
NK043(pi)001:14132: der rgyal po'i snying stobs mthong nas lha dbang rang gi lus su bstan te /
NK043(pi)001:14133: basngagasa shing lha'i sman gyis lus rnal du gnas par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:14134: de nas mchod sbyin legs par rdzogs te /
NK043(pi)001:14135: rgyal ba dang thub pa'i mchog rnams mchod par byas shing /
NK043(pi)001:14136: de'i mjug tu mdzes ma dang /
NK043(pi)001:14139: lha'i gzhon pa lta bu rta gser gyi phreng ldan dang bcas pa byin no //
NK043(pi)001:14140: nyi ma gcig la dpag tshad brgyar yang bgrod nus
NK043(pi)001:14141: pa'i glang chen bzang po'i ri zhes pa mdun na
NK043(pi)001:14142: 'don tshangs pa'i shing rta zhes pa la byin pa'i
NK043(pi)001:14143: tshe / rgyal po bzod dka' yang glang po de la chags pa'i yid du gyur to //
NK043(pi)001:14144: deng mchod sbyin gyi mjug bsdus nas b+h+ri gu'i bu la gtad pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:14145: ma ri tse zhes pa'i slob ma bram ze b+aa
NK043(pi)001:14146: hi ka zhes pas bla ma'i yon du g.yog gi
NK043(pi)001:14147: ched du btsun mo pad+ma can bu dang bcas pa
NK043(pi)001:14148: bslangs ba de la byin pa khrid nas bla ma
NK043(pi)001:14149: la phul lo // skabs 'dir ku ru'i rgyal po
NK043(pi)001:14150: bzod dkas glang chen bzang po'i ri slong ba'i pho
NK043(pi)001:14151: nya btang yang sngar mdun na 'don la byin zin
NK043(pi)001:14152: la phul lo // pas / de la ma byin
NK043(pi)001:14153: pas khros nas dpung gi tshogs bshams te g.yul 'gyed
NK043(pi)001:14154: la phul lo // pas / du 'ongs so //
NK043(pi)001:14155: der rgyal po gtsug na nor bu snying stobs can
NK043(pi)001:14156: gyis g.yul 'gyed pas pha rol pham par nus kyang
NK043(pi)001:14158: kye ma rgyal po bzod dka' 'di bdag gi grogs
NK043(pi)001:14159: yin kyang glang po che la chags pas 'phral du
NK043(pi)001:14160: dgra nyid du gyur pas blun po 'di la snying
NK043(pi)001:14162: bdag nyid nags su 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14163: rang sangs rgyas bzhi nam mkha' las rang 'ongs nas
NK043(pi)001:14164: rgyal po la phebs par smras shing nags su 'gro
NK043(pi)001:14165: bar bskul bas / de rnams dang lhan cig gshegs te rang sangs rgyas rnams rang gnas su byon /
NK043(pi)001:14166: rgyal po de ri gangs can gyi nags su gnas par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:14167: de nas thub pa ma ri tse la /
NK043(pi)001:14168: gtsug nor gyi blon po dag gis rgyal po'i sras slar bslangs pa des byin no //
NK043(pi)001:14169: blon po des rgyal bu de rang gi grong khyer du khrid nas dmag gi tshogs dang bcas pas /
NK043(pi)001:14170: ku ru'i rgyal po bzod daka'i dpung pham par byas te slar song ngo //
NK043(pi)001:14171: der rgyal po bzod daka'i grong du mu ge dang
NK043(pi)001:14172: yams kyi 'tshe ba chen po byung bas nyam thag
NK043(pi)001:14173: pa'i tshe / de la thabs ci zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14175: gal te rgyal po gtsug na rin chen gyi gtsug
NK043(pi)001:14176: gi nor bu bdud rtsi'i rlan dang ldan pa de
NK043(pi)001:14177: rnyed na rgud pa 'di las thar ro //
NK043(pi)001:14178: rgyal po de ri gangs can gyi ngos na bzhugs
NK043(pi)001:14179: pa de la bslangs na mi gtong ba ci yang
NK043(pi)001:14180: med ces thos so zhes smras pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14181: rgyal pos bram ze lnga nor bu slong du mngags so //
NK043(pi)001:14182: skabs 'dir rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thub pa
NK043(pi)001:14183: ma la ya'i ri'i rtser gnas pa'i nye 'khor du
NK043(pi)001:14185: der lha mo pad+ma can rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i
NK043(pi)001:14186: zas za zhing mi med pa'i nags su 'ong ba
NK043(pi)001:14187: de rngon pas 'dzin par 'dod pa la 'dar zhing
NK043(pi)001:14188: smre sngags 'don bzhin kye mi bdag gtsug na nor
NK043(pi)001:14190: rgyal po gtsug na nor bu brgyugs te bltas pas
NK043(pi)001:14191: pad+ma can lus nyams shing sdug bsngal bar mthong zhing
NK043(pi)001:14193: pad+ma can gyis kyang rgyal po nags su 'khyams pa mthong nas sdug bsngal dang /
NK043(pi)001:14194: de mthong bas dga' ba lhan cig byung ngo //
NK043(pi)001:14195: der bdud sdig can skyes bu'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas /
NK043(pi)001:14196: rgyal po la dga' ma 'di nags su btang ba dang /
NK043(pi)001:14197: khyod kyang rgyal srid spang ba mi 'os zhes smras
NK043(pi)001:14198: pa la bdud du shes nas 'dzum ste smras pa
NK043(pi)001:14199: / dul ba zhi ba rnams ni 'dod pas rmongs
NK043(pi)001:14200: par bya mi nus pa'i tshul smras pas bdud mi
NK043(pi)001:14202: pad+ma can gyis yid 'byung ba'i gtam gyis smre sngags bton pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14203: rgyal pos lha mo chos bya bar rigs kyi /
NK043(pi)001:14204: mya ngan bya mi 'os zhes mi rtag pa dang
NK043(pi)001:14205: chos kyi gtam brjod nas pad+ma can slar song ngo
NK043(pi)001:14206: // der rgyal po bzod dkas mngags pa'i bram ze
NK043(pi)001:14207: lngas yul du nyer 'tshe zhi ba'i ched du gtsug
NK043(pi)001:14208: gi nor bu bslangs pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14209: des mgo la skyes pa'i nor bu 'di chod la
NK043(pi)001:14210: khyer ces smras pa'i mod la sa chen po yang
NK043(pi)001:14211: g.yos so // de dag gis mtshon rnon pos spyi bo bkam par byas te /
NK043(pi)001:14212: nor bu 'od dang ldan pa blangs so //
NK043(pi)001:14213: de'i tshe lha rnams mkha' la lta ba'i phyir lhags so //
NK043(pi)001:14214: rgyal po'i lus khrag gis gos bzhin 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de /
NK043(pi)001:14215: rang gi sdug bsngal zil gyis gnon par gyur cing
NK043(pi)001:14216: nor bu byin pa'i bsod nams kyis sems can sdug
NK043(pi)001:14217: bsngal can rnams sgrol ba'i smon lam btab bo //
NK043(pi)001:14218: der nor bu de rang gis blangs nas bram ze
NK043(pi)001:14219: rnams la byin pa rgyal po bzod daka'i grong du
NK043(pi)001:14220: khyer bas nyer 'tshe thams cad zhi bar gyur to
NK043(pi)001:14221: // der b+h+ri gu'i bu dang go tam dang /
NK043(pi)001:14222: ma ri tse sogs kyi thub pa rnams kyis de
NK043(pi)001:14223: ltar rin po che byin pa thos pas nags nas
NK043(pi)001:14224: der 'ongs so // lha mo pad+ma can yang ma
NK043(pi)001:14225: ri tse nyid kyi rjes bzhin du song bas rgyal
NK043(pi)001:14226: po de ltar gyur pa mthong nas sa la 'gyel
NK043(pi)001:14227: der 'ongs so // bar gyur to // de nas
NK043(pi)001:14228: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis rgyal po'i grags pa brjod
NK043(pi)001:14229: pas phyogs su khyab par byas so //
NK043(pi)001:14230: de'i tshe rgyal po'i sras de blon po'i tshogs dang
NK043(pi)001:14231: bcas pa rgyal po de'i drung du 'ong ba na
NK043(pi)001:14232: / rgyal po'i lus khrag gis gos bzhin sa la
NK043(pi)001:14233: 'gyel ba mthong nas smre sngags 'don cing kye ma
NK043(pi)001:14234: gzhan gyi don du rang gi srog gtong ba zhes
NK043(pi)001:14235: / brjod do // ma ri tse'i thub pas kyang
NK043(pi)001:14236: mchi ma dang bcas pa'i mig gis sa skyong de
NK043(pi)001:14237: la bltas nas kye ma khyod rang gi srog la
NK043(pi)001:14238: mi lta bar 'di ltar lus yal bar bor ba
NK043(pi)001:14240: skyo ba'i rnam 'gyur mi mnga' ba ci zhes dris pa la /
NK043(pi)001:14241: rgyal po des dub pa bzod par byas nas gdong gi khrag phyis te smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:14242: thub pa bdag la 'dod pa gzhan med de /
NK043(pi)001:14243: 'khor ba'i sems can sgrol bar 'dod do //
NK043(pi)001:14244: slong bar lus btang ba la mi dga' ba gang yang med de /
NK043(pi)001:14245: ngas brjod pa 'di bden na nga yi lus 'di
NK043(pi)001:14246: rnal du gnas par gyur cig ces brjod ma thag
NK043(pi)001:14247: tu gtsug gi nor bu dang bcas pa'i lus sngar
NK043(pi)001:14249: de la tshangs dang brgya byin sogs lha rnams dang /
NK043(pi)001:14250: thub pa'i drang srong thams cad kyis rgyal po byed
NK043(pi)001:14251: par gsol ba btab kyang mngon par bzhed par ma
NK043(pi)001:14252: gyur la / slar yang pad+ma ldan dang thub pas
NK043(pi)001:14253: bskul nas rgyal po'i sras dang bcas pas rgyal po'i
NK043(pi)001:14254: khri la bzhugs par gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14255: der sngar gyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang nam mkha'
NK043(pi)001:14256: las 'od zer gyis phyogs kyi cha kun nas 'gengs
NK043(pi)001:14257: bzhin byon nas gzhan don du lus gtong ba sogs
NK043(pi)001:14259: da ni rang gi skye bo'i tshogs yun ring bral
NK043(pi)001:14260: ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non pa rnams la btang snyoms
NK043(pi)001:14261: bya mi 'os zhes brjod pas mi yi dbang pos
NK043(pi)001:14262: kyang de ltar nges so snyam nas /
NK043(pi)001:14263: nam mkha'i lam nas rang gi pho brang du phyin te /
NK043(pi)001:14264: sras dang btsun mor bcas pa sngar ltar lhan cig
NK043(pi)001:14265: dga' bas 'khod nas yun ring du rgyal srid bskyangs
NK043(pi)001:14266: zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mdzad pa rgya cher byas
NK043(pi)001:14267: so // yang sngon gyi tshe na tshogs kyi dbang
NK043(pi)001:14268: phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
NK043(pi)001:14269: bcom ldan 'das 'di dge slong snyan pa'i 'od ces
NK043(pi)001:14271: zab mo stong pa nyid kyi chos smra bar gyur pa gzugs dang tshul khrims dang /
NK043(pi)001:14272: ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes sogs kyis khyad par
NK043(pi)001:14273: du 'phags pa rgyal po'i bu sogs thams cad kyis
NK043(pi)001:14275: gzhan dge slong stong dag gis phrag dog byas te yid 'khrugs pa rigs nas /
NK043(pi)001:14276: rgyal po'i bu des srog chags stong phrag lnga go
NK043(pi)001:14277: bgos pas srung zhing chos zab mo stong pa nyid
NK043(pi)001:14279: de'i tshe dmigs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis
NK043(pi)001:14280: chos min smra ba'i dge slong 'di bsad na bsod
NK043(pi)001:14281: nams su 'gyur zhes mtshon cha thogs te 'ongs pa
NK043(pi)001:14282: na / dge slong snyan pa'i 'od kyis /
NK043(pi)001:14283: rgyal ba rnams la phyag 'tshal nas chos 'di rnams
NK043(pi)001:14284: stong pa nyid yin na bden pa'i stobs des mtshon
NK043(pi)001:14285: cha 'di rnams me tog man d+aa ra bar gyur
NK043(pi)001:14286: cig ces smras ma thag tu /
NK043(pi)001:14287: mtshon cha rnams me tog man d+aa ra bar gyur cing sa chen po yang g.yos pas /
NK043(pi)001:14288: dge slong mtshon thogs pa rnams skrag cing ngo mtshar du gyur te tshur nye ma nus shing /
NK043(pi)001:14289: ras bcos bu brgya yis mchod cing chos nyan pa la stong pa nyid kyi chos bstan to //
NK043(pi)001:14290: yang dge slong phyir rgol ba stod dag gis chos
NK043(pi)001:14291: smra ba snyan pa'i 'od de la rtag tu brnyas
NK043(pi)001:14292: shing mi snyan pa'i tshig brjod kyang bzod pa'i stobs
NK043(pi)001:14293: las nam yang nyams par ma gyur te sems can
NK043(pi)001:14294: mang por yun ring du chos bstan no //
NK043(pi)001:14295: yang bcom ldan 'das 'di klu yi rgyal po rda
NK043(pi)001:14296: zhes par gyur pa la kun dga' bo nu bo
NK043(pi)001:14297: nye rda zhes bya bar gyur pa spun gnyis so
NK043(pi)001:14298: // yul gzhan na klu rnga sgra zhes pa gnas
NK043(pi)001:14299: pa'i drung du phyin pa na de khros nas du
NK043(pi)001:14300: ba can gyi dbugs btang ste g.yon can tshul chos
NK043(pi)001:14301: can zhes sogs tshig rtsub pos spyos shing yang nas
NK043(pi)001:14304: klu de'i grong thams cad brlagsa par brtsams pa na /
NK043(pi)001:14305: klu chen po rnga yis legs par bshad pa'i tshig
NK043(pi)001:14306: gis khro ba bzlog ste nye rnga sems dad par
NK043(pi)001:14307: byas te legs bshad kyi tshig des kyang da dung
NK043(pi)001:14308: gi bar du 'gro ba mang po'i don byas so
NK043(pi)001:14309: // tshigs bcad de dag ni klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs bcad na gsal lo //
NK043(pi)001:14310: skyes rabs gzhan na klu ngar ngar dang nye ba'i
NK043(pi)001:14311: ngar ngar zhes pa 'di dang tshul 'dra ba yod
NK043(pi)001:14312: do // yang glang po che sa srung mche ba drug ldan du gyur pa na /
NK043(pi)001:14313: ngur smrig bgos pa'i rngon pas dug mdas bsnun pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:14314: glang mos rngon pa bardzisa te bsad par 'dod pa
NK043(pi)001:14315: bzlog cing gus pa'i sems kyis rang gi mche ba
NK043(pi)001:14317: yang sngon gyi dus su nags tshal dgon pa zhig
NK043(pi)001:14318: na ma he rgod po rnams kyi khyu mchog stobs
NK043(pi)001:14319: dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK043(pi)001:14320: spre'u mi srun pa zhig gis ma he'i khyu mchog
NK043(pi)001:14321: de snying rje che zhing khro ba med pa nges
NK043(pi)001:14322: shing mngon par gsal ba'i ting 'dzin shes nas 'jigs
NK043(pi)001:14324: sems dpa' chen po de la rnam pa kun tu
NK043(pi)001:14325: 'tshe ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnod pa byed
NK043(pi)001:14326: par zhugs so // ma he de bde bar gnyid
NK043(pi)001:14327: log pa'i skabs su spre'u de glo bur steng du
NK043(pi)001:14328: par zhugs so // mchong pa dang / bar bar de la zhon nas rgyug pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14329: bar bar bkres te zas za ba'i lam bkag pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14330: bar bar shing gis de'i rna ba dkrugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14331: bar bar de chu nang du rkyal du 'gro ba'i
NK043(pi)001:14332: tshe mgo'i steng du zhon nas lag pa gnyis kyis
NK043(pi)001:14334: bar 'gar de la zhon nas dbyug pa phyar te
NK043(pi)001:14335: brgyugs pas gshin rje'i tshul du 'chos par byas kyang
NK043(pi)001:14336: / byang chub sems dpas ma rungs pa'i kyal ka
NK043(pi)001:14337: byas pa de thams cad la khro ba dang mi
NK043(pi)001:14338: dga' ba med par phan btags pa bzhin du bzod
NK043(pi)001:14339: / par gyur to // gnod sbyin zhig gis des de gtses pa ma bzod nas brtag pa'i phyir /
NK043(pi)001:14340: khyu mchog de la spre'u zhon te song ba'i lan du bsgugs nas kye khyod cung zad sdod cig /
NK043(pi)001:14341: khyod spre'u mi srun pa 'dis nyos sam ci /
NK043(pi)001:14343: 'on te 'jigs pa cung zad cig yod dam ci ste bdag la mthu med par shes sam /
NK043(pi)001:14344: ci ste 'di de ltar brnyas shing zhon /
NK043(pi)001:14346: khyod kyi rwas rdo'i ri yang 'joms nus la /
NK043(pi)001:14347: khros te rkang lag 'phrad pas brag gi rtse mo yang bshig cing /
NK043(pi)001:14348: khyod lus mkhregs shing brtan pa mthu stobs phun sum tshogs pas seng ge yang dpa' bkong nus na /
NK043(pi)001:14349: spre'u rang bzhin ngan pa bcos su mi rung ba
NK043(pi)001:14350: 'di la byams na slar yang je thur 'gyur bas
NK043(pi)001:14351: rmig pa'am rwa yis 'di rab tu choms shig ces
NK043(pi)001:14352: smras pa la / byang chub sems dpas tshig 'jam pos smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:14353: spre'u 'di mthu stobs chung zhing rtag tu ma drang
NK043(pi)001:14354: bar spyod pa shes nas de la bdag gis 'di
NK043(pi)001:14356: mthu chung 'khrul pa dag la bzod na bzod pa lags so //
NK043(pi)001:14357: de'i phyir mthu stobs chung ba 'dis brnyas thabs byas pa la nus bzhin dang du len te /
NK043(pi)001:14358: bzod pa'i chos las nyams par mi byed do //
NK043(pi)001:14360: de lta na khyod ni 'dis gnod pa bye da
NK043(pi)001:14361: pa las nam yang thar bar mi 'gyur te mi
NK043(pi)001:14362: srun pa la bzod pa bsgoms kyang gnod pa phyir
NK043(pi)001:14363: yang mi gtong bar dam du 'dzin to //
NK043(pi)001:14364: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK043(pi)001:14365: bdag ni bzod pa la gnas nas pha rol la
NK043(pi)001:14366: gnod pa mi byed mod gal te 'di la thabs
NK043(pi)001:14367: kyis bsgo yang gal te ma go na bzod pa
NK043(pi)001:14368: chung ba gzhan yod pas 'di log pa'i lam las
NK043(pi)001:14369: bzlog kyang srid de skye bo de lta bus brnyas
NK043(pi)001:14370: pa byas na bdag tu lta ba can 'di yang
NK043(pi)001:14371: de ltar nyes dmigs mthong nas phyis mi byed la
NK043(pi)001:14372: / 'on kyang bdag nyid de las thar bar 'gyur ro //
NK043(pi)001:14374: gnod sbyin de rab tu dga' zhing se gol brdabs la legs so //
NK043(pi)001:14375: dud 'gro rnams la 'di 'dra'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhes basngagasa nas /
NK043(pi)001:14376: spre'u mi srun pa de de'i rgyab nas phab ste
NK043(pi)001:14377: de bsrung bar bskos nas de nyid du mi snang
NK043(pi)001:14378: bar gyur to // yang sngon gyi tshe 'brog dgon
NK043(pi)001:14379: pa'i phyogs kyi gnas ri dwags mang po gnas pa
NK043(pi)001:14380: bar gyur to // zhig tu / ri dwags sha ra b+ha stobs rtsal dang mgyogs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14381: sems stobs phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu gyur pa ste /
NK043(pi)001:14382: snying rje'i sems kyi gzhan la mi gnod par r+ts+wa
NK043(pi)001:14383: dang lo ma chu tsam gyis 'tsho zhing gnas so
NK043(pi)001:14384: // der rgyal po zhig dpung gi tshogs 'phong skyen
NK043(pi)001:14385: pa rnams dang lhan cig dpung bzhi dang ldan par
NK043(pi)001:14386: 'ongs nas rgyal po de mda' gzhu thogs shing 'phong
NK043(pi)001:14387: skyen pa ston pa'i phyir ri dwags de'i phyi bzhin
NK043(pi)001:14388: // bsnyegs nas / rta mgyogs pa la zhon te brgyugs pa dang /
NK043(pi)001:14389: ri dwags kyi rgyal po des de mthong nas slar
NK043(pi)001:14390: rgol nus su zin kyang ma brgal bar mgyogs par
NK043(pi)001:14391: song ba dang / lam der grog rong chen po
NK043(pi)001:14392: zhig yod par ri dwags rgyal po de mchongs nas
NK043(pi)001:14394: der rgyal po slebs nas rta de mchong ma nus
NK043(pi)001:14395: par 'then pas rgyal po rta thog nas grog rong
NK043(pi)001:14396: der lhung ngo // de nas rta'i rmig sgra mi
NK043(pi)001:14397: grags pas byang chub sems dpas phyir bltas pa dang
NK043(pi)001:14398: der lhung ngo // / rta zhon pa'i mi med
NK043(pi)001:14399: par rta de grog rong gi kha na 'dug par
NK043(pi)001:14400: mthong nas rgyal po de grog rong du lhung bar
NK043(pi)001:14401: gor ma chag go snyam du /
NK043(pi)001:14402: de gsod du 'ong ba yin kyang de la snying rje chen po bskyed de /
